detail: When the warm winds of tropical seas arrive  they bring with them a shower of white petals that are the very meaning of escapism. There is the insinuating eroticism of a Tahitian dance  the sensuous Caribbean rhythm  and the infinite tenderness of women in the tropics.

name: a-drop-dissey-1
detail: Immerse yourself in a new dreamscape. Look  feel  let yourself go. Enjoy the everyday moments of happiness. Take a step back. See things from a new perspective. Marvel at the poetry of nature. Change your point of view. Discover a new world. Embark on an adventure like no other.
ingredients: ['Lilac', 'Musk', 'Almond Milk', 'Orange Blossom', 'Rose Damascena', 'Green Notes', 'Star Anise', 'Lactonic Accord (fruity milky)', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)', 'Cedarwood (America)', 'Vanillin (Vanilla note)']

name: cher-wood-1
detail: Prince of the forests  full of freedom  willing traveller of nomadic imagination. Sensual  bewitching and enigmatic  his trail adorns our skin to make it unique in the world.

name: california-snow-1
detail: Pass from the headlands to the cedar grove and into the desert. You drift in gusts of coastal sage  over the city and into the hills. The lights below match the stars in the sky. A breeze blows rosebuds and powder. This is California snow. Dawn meets boundless light and embraces you. A song rises like a whisper: You are the one who opens inside.

name: long-island-iced-tea
detail: "A slice of citrus on the top. Cherry Coke mixed with all kinds of liquor. The recipe formed into Long Island Iced Tea…my antidote"

name: triple-tea
detail: A refreshing yet elegant scent with a sweet trail.

name: kenzo-memori-soleil-the
detail: The golden light of long summer afternoons shines through the shoji (Japanese sliding doors). At tea time  children delight in a magical sight: a flower blossoms in their cup on contact with the simmering water. A radiant interpretation of this poetic bloom  Soleil Thé is a summer caress on the skin.

name: coriander-tea
detail: Coriander is an extremely popular spice with a pleasing lemony flavor. Its aroma can often be detected in Asian and European cooking

name: achille
detail: A fresh  bold and alluring scent inspired by the spirit of the ancient heroes of mythology. Vicky Tiel's Achille is a true representation of masculinity  passion and vigor.

name: cross-the-line-1
detail: Masculinity is embodied in the lively  fruity and spicy aromtic fragrance - at once a refined classic  yet at the same time fun and ready to party.

name: mountain-pepper-bergamot-coriander
detail: A fragrance that follows a spicier  uplifting bitter-sweet mood and combines herbs and aromatic wood.

name: green-orange-coriander
detail: "Green Orange & Coriander is soulful and cheeky. It has a wonderfully clean scent and the marriage of green citrus and herbs is perfectly matched and very sexy. This fragrance reminds me of Sunday brunch in New York; it's incredibly comforting and at the same time evokes a real sense of passion and warmth." Love Jo x

name: latelier-des-subtils-eau-de-bois-1
detail: Intense  seductive and profound.

name: camaro-blue
detail: Symbol of style  robust design  and aggressive performance  Camaro is a car that speaks to different generations. Brand lovers appreciate speed combined with comfort and value the pleasure of driving a classic that has been reinvented and modernised  without ever losing its original signature.

name: iris-coriandre-1
detail: Iris Coriandre is a game of opposites and contrasts. A chiaroscuro of flowers and fruits  a candy perfume that cultivates paradox with elegance.

name: leau-dissey-pour-homme-pour-lete-2
detail: Issey Miyake's interpretation of exotic fruits  simply scrumptious! Now  all we have to do is take a bite out of these exotic fruits by Issey Miyake.

name: white-peach-coriander-1
detail: This well-balanced fragrance is pure balsam for the stressed soul. The aroma of peach caresses and captivates the senses. A contrast is created by the lively  lemony coriander  which refreshes tired spirits. An inspiring fragrance composition  which brings purity and clarity to the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

name: original-men-1
detail: For people who are authentic and remain faithful to who they are  what they think  and how they feel.

name: colors-man-blue-4
detail: Let's celebrate diversity because diversity isn't just seeing life in colour  it's learning from those colours! Diversity is surprising yourself every day with something new  understanding that every colour  every race  every culture is a new world to discover.

name: awrag
detail: A unique and aromatic scent. Awrag is the scent to record your unforgettable memories.

name: lua-1
detail: A superb fruity blend of Mediterranean romanticism. A bouquet distilled with ingredients of rare quality. Citrus fused with rare flowers gives a typically Xerjoff character. The ingredients develop on a seductive base to give an elegant and noble balance.

name: liris
detail: L'Iris reinterprets the very history of Florence  of which this flower is still the symbol  celebrating its multiple and multifaceted facets. But also by relating to the legend of the goddess Iris  messenger of the gods  and to a flower already present in the Egyptian  Greek and Latin civilisations. Grace  mystery and elegance merge in a scent that distills the essence of time itself.

name: acqua-di-iris
detail: Acqua Di Iris delivers a unique expression of the classic flower. Its luxurious spirit -rich in Italian heritage- remains true  but is designed here with sparkling clarity. The Iris takes on splashy transparency. Elements of spice serve to drive the immediacy of the signature and invigorate the power and strength of the Iris.

name: franck-olivier-women-1
detail: Endowed with a magical power  Franck Olivier perfume enchants and seduces  bringing to life once again the aroma of forbidden fruit. The secret? It's the pure essence of a woman.

name: secret-sandalwood
detail: Natural Mysore sandalwood and pieces of sublime material make this essence a true initiation into the hidden secrets of the East.

name: manaubusson-1
detail: Man.Aubusson is a classical fragrance with a contemporary edge. The core notes evoke sophistication and elegance  leading into a dark and masculine signature. The Man.Aubusson gentleman is masculine  sexy and elegant  this scent was created for the man who never goes unnoticed.

name: virtuous-2
detail: Virtuous is oozing with tantalising ferocity; it indulges us from the beginning with magnificent notes throughout  settling with a sumptuous charm that is positively arresting.

name: orange-aoud
detail: The rich and noble character of this fragrance combines citrus and spices with a beautiful floral heart  and an enthralling woody base.

name: sandalo-4
detail: A rich  refined perfume from the Indian tradition  made with Mysore Sandalwood.

name: bois-des-iles-eau-de-parfum
detail: In 1922  the "Bœuf sur le Toit" cabaret opened in Paris and immediately became the epicenter of society's nightlife. In its smoky  Bohemian atmosphere  flappers danced the Charleston and Black Bottom to the sound of hot jazz improvisation. Inspired by this wave of exotic energy  Coco Chanel launched Bois des Iles  a captivating fragrance that transports us to the tranquil  unknown waters of distant islands  filled with languid flowers and opiate scents.

name: blanc-kogane
detail: A reinterpretation of a destructured luminous musk  embodying the delicacy and enveloping purity of the skin.

name: white-tea-eau-fraiche
detail: A reinterpretation of the original White Tea fragrance  but with fresher and gentler accents.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Mandarin', 'Tonka Bean', 'Water Lily', 'Mahonial', 'Bergamot', 'Blood Orange', 'Musk', 'Pear', 'Woody Notes', 'Sea Breeze', 'Ambrofix (Ambergris)']

name: leau-majeure-dissey
detail: A fragrance inspired by water as a masculine symbol of strength and movement. Water in greater mode. The evocation of salted wood.

name: clouds
detail: An ethereal scent with elegant  delicate accords.
ingredients: ['Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Sea Breeze', 'Jasmine', 'Rose', 'Bergamot', 'Camphor', 'Lime', 'Metallic Notes', 'Musk', 'Vetiver']

name: leau-super-majeure-dissey
detail: A fragrance that combines the strength of purity. In this sense  it's very close to water. This natural element can just as well be tumultuous as serene and soothing. L'Eau Super Majeure d'Issey for men is a perfume of movements that seems to be shaped by the course of the water when this natural element meets wood  minerals  and terrestrial plants. A radiant scent that is revealed to the eyes of men in their pure state.

name: salaria
detail: A ferny fragrance with brackish and daring tones that gives the strength of the sea to the wearer.

name: jordan-drive-1
detail: This wild  fresh fragrance opens with fruity notes playing off crisp oceanic notes. The core refreshes with a bouquet of flowers. Woody notes blend with musky notes for a strong close.

name: salt-air-1
detail: Imagine a perfect sea breeze on the perfect beach at your favourite tropical island. Now you have the perfect description Salt Air. There's just no denying it  Salt Air will have you thinking of that last vacation and much needed new one.

name: pure-ocean
detail: Pure Ocean is a gentle perfume that evokes a walk along the sand with the waves lapping at your feet.

name: pure-lightness
detail: Pure Lightness embodies a special attitude  an encouragement to women to enjoy life and have fun  free of obligations and expectations. After all  sport is a game.

name: white-tea-eau-de-parfum
detail: A crisp and vibrant floral with a lingering warmth that takes you to a moment of blissful escape.

name: acqua-sale-1
detail: Let yourself be caressed by this gentle sea breeze of perfume.

name: mediterranean-memories-1
detail: Like a Mediterranean breeze blowing through sun-drenched citrus trees by the sea  capturing the freshness and purity. Mediterranean Memories is a unique and unforgettable experience that will captivate and awaken your senses.

name: alba-pompeia
detail: Alba Pompeia is a dynamic  fresh fragrance with a hint of gorse and olive blossom that welcomes you with a gentle start and provides an energy boost.

name: petit-attitude
detail: A hint of sea breeze mixed with romantic floral notes brings the joy and attitude that every girl needs.

name: st-barts-men
detail: Escape to an island paradise with Tommy Bahama Set Sail St Barts! Fresh and exhilarating  this fragrance will take you to where the palm trees sway gently in the breeze; where the cocktails have a splash of tequila and a twist of lime!

name: aquamarine-1
detail: Aquamarine has been a talisman for sailors and travellers. The stone opens wide horizons and invites one to journey. Its ice blue light breeds consciousness and nourishes inspiration.

name: infinite-aqua-1
detail: Infinite Aqua was inspired by a drive along the Pacific Coast highway  the sheer expansiveness of the ocean  and the exhilarating feel of salty sea air on the skin. This fragrance delivers an intense feeling of infinity and invigoration.

name: un-air-de-bretagne
detail: Fascinated by the wild Brittany coast and its inexhaustible energy of wind and waves  the perfumer wanted to capture this iodised oxygen in a bottle. Imagined as a breeze on the body  the fragrance is a salty taste on the lips and on the skin after a stormy day.

name: 212-vip-black-smiley-2022-1
detail:
Carolina Herrera joins forces with The Smiley Company to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the “brand of happiness!" 212 VIP Men Black x Smiley adds a playful and rogue twist to 
the most powerful  sensual  and rebellious men’s fragrance of the 212 family. Enjoy its explosive energy!

name: malagasy-1
detail: Malagasy is defined as the evocation of a trip to the heart of the island of Madagascar  in search of a native plant. A treasure that bears the name of voatsiperifery or wild pepper.

name: painter
detail: Brushes  spatulas  pigments  solvents  oils  await patiently for the next gesture  for the creative impulse  to translate the artist’s explosive idea onto the canvas.

name: red-vetiver-1
detail: A perfume that starts with fresh  invigorating ingredients followed by a warm depth in the background where old meets new and tells of dark intrigue.

name: winner-action
detail: This fragrance was inspired by a man who believes in the power of his energy and passion.
ingredients: ['Geranium', 'Ginger (Madagascar)', 'Sandalwood', 'Cardamom', 'Lavender', 'Mint', 'Clary Sage', 'Wormwood', 'Pepper (Madagascar)', 'Grapefruit', 'Mandarin', 'Green Apple', 'Amber', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean', 'Energetic Accord', 'Honeydew Melon']

name: gingembre-latte
detail: Dive into the refreshing delights of this Madagascar ginger ice milk.

name: green-tea
detail: Because sensations of well-being pass through the sense of smell  Alyssa Ashley has created a perfume that has the ability to convey a pleasant feeling of relaxation to ourselves and others  and at the same time  to energise the spirit.

name: white-darjeeling
detail: The delicate bubbles of white champagne elegantly dance with the sweet fruity aroma of bitter darjeeling tea  creating a feast in a teacup.

name: elephant-1
detail: Huge trees quake at their approach. They come with appetites as massive as their lumbering bodies. When the behemoths move on  they leave behind a path of destruction. Yet what often looks like carnage is actually a renaissance. The elephants fulfill a vital role- purging the delicate ecosystem  allowing new life to flourish.

name: bvlgari-pour-homme-1
detail: A woody  floral  musky eau de toilette that is both comfortable and refreshing: the perfect fragrance for men who wish to exalt their personality subtly.
ingredients: ['Tea (Darjeeling)', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Water Lily', 'Cardamom', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Vetiver', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Iris / Orris', 'Musk', 'Pepper']

name: high-intensity-1
detail: High Intensity is captivating  refined and distinctive. Its scent demands attention with Royal King Wood  an exclusive Mary Kay® ingredient that brings a rich intensity to this masculine cologne.

name: 212-vip-men-3
detail: A king of the party but a young prince at heart. On the pulse of the nightlife scene to everyone and everything. A signature scent you'll recognise on the dance floor and one you won't forget when you leave.

name: fleur-de-pivoine
detail: "The peony flower is a coral pink with sublime petals  symbolising optimism and joy. I based this fragrance around a peony granita to accentuate its sparkling  zesty dimension. Peonies gradually unfurl and blossom day after day  opening their petals. Their closed buds are poised to reveal a floral symphony of colours  and it is this unpredictable blossoming that particularly inspired me ” Emilie Coppermann  Perfumer.

name: police-to-be-born-to-shine-for-him
detail: This fragrance dares to push the boundaries and plays with the senses  for a guy that exudes power and energy.

name: giardini-di-seta
detail: Vibrant and luminous  Giardini di Seta is born to surprise and opens the doors to the hidden gardens of fantasy.

name: essencial-oud-vanilla-masculino
detail: The meeting of Oud wood with the preciousness of Bahian vanilla from Brazil  an ingredient never before used in perfumery and which undergoes an artisanal pollination process.

name: solaris-8
detail: Sensational. Generous. Warming. An ode to the sun  reaching through time and space. A scent with uplifting strength and celestial grace.

name: peonypop
detail: PeonyPop is like a bouquet of pink flowers.
ingredients: ['Peony', 'Raspberry', 'Moss', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Plum', 'White Wine', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Geranium', 'Grapefruit', 'Musk', 'Myrrh', 'Sandalwood', 'Vetiver', 'Violet Leaves', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: karl-vienna-opera
detail: From 1980 to 1983  Karl Lagerfeld taught art at the University of Applied Arts in Vienna  in a sumptuous 19th century building. This hub of Viennese culture  home to a staggering number of masterpieces  amplified his love of painting. This fragrance is a celebration of Karl's beloved city with a classical structure elevated by a touch of impertinence.

name: mon-bourjois-la-magnetique-1
detail: A sensual Eau de parfum with a gourmet and addictive trail. All the fantasy of a carousel ride in the heart of the capital is captured in a fragrance for women! This is the magic of La Magnétique  an inimitable fragrance with a typically Parisian "je ne sais quoi"  the very essence of the Bourjois brand.

name: neeeum-white-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A tribute to the determination of the F1® drivers and their fearlessness on display.

name: shadow-for-her-1
detail: The modern woman knows what she wants and Shadow offers her the fragrance she desires. Blessed with the generosity of floral aromas mixed with fruits.

name: je-reviens
detail: Launched in 1932  Je Reviens remains the most famous and revered of the Worth perfumes. Embodying the romanticism and elegance of Paris in the 1930s  this perfume achieved formidable success in the 1940s  when it became a favourite gift from soldiers to their girlfriends. It is a timeless classic that transcends styles and trends.

name: sophia-midnight-1
detail: I'm a silhouette walking towards him; cue for the moonlight to take a break. From the look on his face  I can tell what's going on in that beautiful mind. I know it's been a while  long enough for us to be strangers again  but if he just closed his eyes  I'm sure he'll sense that nothing's changed at all. We know these nights never go to plan  but we'll be counting stars for sure.

name: narcissus-poeticus
detail: Fresh and slightly powdery  Narcissus Poeticus is a joyful memory of springtime delight.

name: opulent-vanilla
detail: When the golden light of the setting sun seems to merge heaven and earth  it carries with it the memory of the day that has come to an end and the sensual promise of the night to come. An unusual harmony between the vibrant top notes and the delicious heart notes under the sensual sign of the base notes. The result is a rich  sensual fragrance that evokes the opulence of vanilla  starting with its name.

name: avant-lorage
detail: Time is suspended. It lives the cold and the heat  the yes and the no.

name: haft
detail: Earthy  thick  dry woods. Rain on hot tarmac. October morning.

name: i-am-scotch-and-soda-women-1
detail: Inspired by relentless optimism and the power of self-expression  this scent captures the free spirit of Amsterdam.

name: follow-your-soul-men-1
detail: He skillfully makes his dreams a reality. An air of assertiveness and brilliance surround him. He knows that his instincts never let him down. Follow Your Soul Men will accentuate the independent strength of those who wear it with a certain "je ne sais quoi": the enthralling belief in one's own inner power.

name: rose-de-taif-extrait-1
detail: Experience the fragrance Rose de Taif in its purest form. Subtle touches differentiate the extrait from its eau de parfum and bring forth an unmatched intensity and depth  making the original scent richer  more opulent and utterly captivating.

name: ambra-2
detail: Taking on an olfactory family this well known is no mean feat. It's a testament to Vanina's originality and creativity that this Ambra is very “Jeroboam”  in other words modern  daring and sensual.

name: galaor-1
detail: Galaor was a knight errant and in the service of noble causes  and therefore considered one of the most virtuous men of the European Middle Ages. Together with his brother Amadis  the Knight of the Green Sword  he won battles against the Roman Empire.

name: amber-blend
detail: Indulge your passion for the finest things in life with the elegance and vibrancy of Davidoff Amber Blend. Designed for connoisseurs only.

name: i-belong-to-u
detail: Top hit on the go  this magnetic creation is designed around a symphony of ylang-ylang  tuberose and gardenia and a pizzicato of pink pepper and addictive balm.

name: fumerie-turque-2
detail: ''Secreted behind the screens of the Topkapi harem  Murad IV's favorites and courtesans smoke long sculpted pipes  blowing smoke curls to pass the time; a contest of patience to create the most evocative curls which may hint at their destiny. Soft tobacco combines with the delicious scent of opiates  inviting you into the harem of the Great Lord of Istanbul.'' Serge Lutens.

name: 34-boulevard-saint-germain-benjoin-boheme
detail: Imagine the scent of the resident of 34 boulevard Saint-Germain. No doubt a British dandy or a Latin bohemian  he is a perfumed aesthete. An olfactory scent that reveals his identity.

name: goldmund
detail: A luminous scent with a vivacious structure that creates an intense marriage smoothed by warm sensuality.

name: contralto
detail: A fragrance that invites you to defy expectations and embrace your individuality. The scent of a resilient woman.

name: experimental-first-time
detail: First glance. First touch. First kiss. First dance. The first time only happens once.

name: dangerous-woman-eau-de-parfum
detail: A bold fragrance for the powerful and sensual woman.

name: cuba-la-vida
detail: Surround yourself with Cuba La Vida  a fragrance that will make you feel wonderful all day long. This perfume is an expression of optimism and happiness.

name: luan-santana-man
detail: Luan Santana  a celebrity in Brazil  presents Luan Santana Man fragrance  which translates in a modern and exclusive way  the essence of the artist.

name: caramel
detail: Sweet molten sugar notes  with that bit of browning that makes you want to savor it that much longer.

name: flavia-vanilla-82
detail: She walks through the streets with wide steps and leaves behind her a sweet sillage. Her scent is irresistibly kind and reassuring. There is a sense of familiarity in the air. Flavia is vanilla  dark and sweet  familiar and exotic  tender and fascinating  totally seductive.

name: t-mat-1
detail: T;Mat is for the young  self-confident woman who enjoys every moment of her life.

name: parfum-sacre
detail: This Parfum Sacré is a divine nectar  unsettlingly sensual! The bewitching signature of an absolutely irresistible woman.

name: tabac-blanc-1
detail: "An immersion in the luxurious landscapes of South America  Tabac Blanc is a fresh tobacco scent with a radiant freshness and enveloping comfort." Jean Jacques  in-House Perfumer.

name: belle-de-niassa
detail: Belle de Niassa testifies to the power of olfactory memory through the story of a quest to northern Mozambique  in a stunning natural setting  to find and recreate the bewitching scent of the mahogany flower. For the first time in perfumery  it is transcribed in a sumptuous soliflore fragrance  where the power of white flowers is softened by the juicy freshness of star fruit.

name: lady-caron-1
detail: An homage to New York  the city of freedom and to our first boutique on Madison Avenue.

name: etoile-filante-1
detail: A voyage for the senses  a precious nectar composed in Grasse by Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier  who chose osmanthus to be his keynote  a flower that is venerated in the Far East and which the perfumer has adored since childhood. Touched by grace  Étoile Filante carries within it the most beautiful emotions  celebrating joy  hope and sheer beauty.

name: jasmin-de-grasse
detail: Bring tranquility and leisure under the blossoming trees in the afternoon.

name: scandal-essence-de-parfum-1
detail: "When a scandal occurs  heads turn and secrets are revealed. Everything is exposed  barriers are broken and boundaries are tested. You either hide or accept it. But be careful  because when wearing this daring bouquet  it's impossible not to tempt others to talk " Roja Dove.

name: grasse-jasmine
detail: A celebration of an experimental jasmine in Grasse  picked at 4 o'clock in the morning  with a particularly fresh and clean scent.

name: sainte-blanche-1
detail: Sainte Blanche evokes the mist and dew-covered flowers that surround Maison Sainte Blanche.

name: eau-dadette-2018
detail: Eau Dadette continues Santiago Burgas' s work inspired by Dadaism. The scent is dedicated to Juliette Roche  a French painter and writer  associated with members of the Dadaism movement. Even if her work and writings are unknown to many of us  they are full of wisdom.

name: feminin-pluriel-1
detail: A beautiful creation composed of a multitude of facets  FÉMININ PLURIEL was conceived to evolve with freedom and sensuality  unbound by passing fashions. A challenge to time and a quest for timelessness  the recognisable quality of the great classics.

name: bonne-etoile
detail: Bonne Étoile is the evocation of sweetness  an invitation to the tenderness of childhood  the age when the senses awaken  where a child's laughter enchants and dreams reign.

name: for-her-christmas-2020
detail: Get ready to shine for Christmas! The iconic black bottle gets a radiant label in the colour of Christmas: gold. An enveloping fragrance in an exquisite bottle to offer as the perfect gift.

name: le-male-xmas-collector-2023
detail: The iconic edgy scent in a 2023 collector bottle to celebrate in style.

name: burberry-her-eau-de-parfum-petals-2024
detail: Burberry Her Eau de Parfum Petals is a dreamy and uplifting fragrance that playfully combines the sweetness of crushed berries with floral notes of violet and jasmine. Rounded off with wood and creamy amber  this Burberry scent is housed in an archive-inspired glass bottle elevated with floating pink petals.

name: lor-de-jadore
detail: "L’Or de J'Adore goes back to basics  celebrating the beauty of flowers carried in a smooth and solar concentrate. The gold of J’Adore is in all its flowers ” Francis Kurkdjian  Perfume Creation Director.

name: radical-rose-1
detail: "I wanted to create a fragrance containing the largest amount in the world of one of the most beautiful Absolutes: an Absolute extracted from organic Rose Centifolia flowers  grown in the Grasse region in France " Aurélien Guichard.

name: leau-dissey-roserose-1
detail: Intriguing  powerful  poetic  nature never ceases to amaze. Generous and multi-faceted  she lends her splendour to L'Eau d'Issey Rose&Rose. An ode to natural ingredients  For her the rose  uncontested queen of flowers.

name: mystic-sunset-1
detail: The setting of the sun has always had a mystical connotation in Positano and this is perhaps one of the reasons why it's considered one of the most beautiful sunsets in the world. Thus our tribute to this daily marvel with a fragrance that embodies the soul-moving warmth of a summer sunset in Positano.

name: encens-celeste
detail: Encens Céleste celebrates the exquisite frankincense in a creative blend  with a bewitching contrast between fresh and ambery  spicy and floral notes. An uplifting fragrance that envelops us in an airy yet profound atmosphere  to elevate the soul.

name: rose-omeyyade-2023
detail: Atelier Des Ors poetically magnifies each of its creations in a glittering ballet of stardust. An intensely distinguished emotion.

name: fame-1
detail: All the women you are  all the women you can be  that's what Fame is all about. Try on as many femininities as you want. Let all your facets shine through  leaving a scent as unique and powerful as you are. Claim your fame.

name: flowerbykenzo-poppy-bouquet-couture-edition-1
detail: FlowerByKenzo Poppy Bouquet celebrates a contagious energy and the power to make the world more beautiful.

name: lace-couture-1
detail: An ode to an elegant but daring woman.

name: patchouli-de-sumatra
detail: This scent is a composition based on patchouli. This is not however an earthy  dark patchouli that would appear as base notes  but instead a luminous  fresh  energetic fragrance  as if there were a wellspring of patchouli in which you could take a refreshing dip.

name: roman-wood
detail: An immaculate gradient of crystalline green to glowing amber. Peppery and effervescent  Zegna’s exclusive essence concentration heightens the impact of this woody aromatic fragrance.

name: happy-magnolia-bliss-1
detail: Happy Magnolia Bliss is a tender and soothing elixir. May this luxurious creation bring you a wealth of positive emotions.

name: leau-dissey-au-fil-de-leau-2022-1
detail: Issey Miyake takes us on a summery journey in 2022. An invitation to follow the flow of water away from the daily grind defies every imaginable cliché: the concept combines the most cherished Mediterranean memories of Dora Baghriche  Daphné Bugey  and Marie Salamagne. Using the exquisite corpse method  each perfumer worked after the other to create a completely unique fragrance  the fruit of their combined emotions. To visually illustrate these fragrant emotions  French artist Kevin Lucbert drew the main steps of the journey using his faithful ballpoint pen  his artist’s instrument of choice which he uses incredibly poetically.

name: abyssae-1
detail: For this seventh chapter of La Botanique  Daphne Bugey was inspired by the eucalyptus forests of Portugal  where she lives  by the tall  dense trees that hide the sun. "In this fragrance  the darkness of the forest symbolises the darkness of the water  the dizzying height of the trees evokes the vast depths of the seabed".

name: scandal-xmas-collector-2021
detail: The elegant aura that it leaves in her wake is sullied by the festival spirit of Paris's scandalous neighbourhoods  beloved by Jean Paul Gaultier.

name: loubikiss
detail: Loubikiss is an ode to eternal love. This skull crowned with white flowers. A bewitching and magical kiss that leaves a memorable  eternal and hypnotic trail!

name: loubiraj
detail: Majestic and wild  Loubiraj roars intensely like a full-bodied fragrance. One thing is certain  in her footsteps  magic sings  dances and leaves a powerful trail.

name: crepusculum-mirabile-1
detail: The fiery breath of jasmine in the twilight.

name: wood-original
detail: Young and capturing the zeitgeist  the protagonist for this fragrance lives on passions  good vibes and an impulse towards what’s new. He’s looking for a sophisticated essence that expresses the authenticity  depth and passion that defines him.

name: loubicroc
detail: The crocodile is the keeper of the secrets of the pyramids and of this mysterious and seductive elixir.

name: narciso-eau-de-parfum-grace
detail: Narciso Eau de Parfum Grace captures powerful femininity in an exquisite fragrance that celebrates women  their pure beauty and the delicate grace that resonates from within.

name: forum-jeans-2
detail: A young  sexy and innovative unisex perfume. Forum Jeans2 has a fragrance that evokes the warmth that is produced when two bodies meet. A pleasant  welcoming and seductive warmth. Its scent incites to celebration  the Jeans2

name: red-power
detail: You feel powerful  you are powerful: confidence in yourself is the force that leads you to overcome barriers  to be yourself  determined and extraordinary.
ingredients: ['Patchouli', 'Green Apple', 'Ambertonic (Woody Ambery)', 'Blackcurrant', 'Pear', 'Tangerine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Praline', 'Vanilla', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Ambrein', 'Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Sandalwood (New Caledonia)', 'Ylang-ylang (Madagascar)', 'Nebulone (Musk)']

name: love-joy-aqua-1
detail: Light and breezy with plentiful character  Aqua from the Love and Joy collection is a fresh blend of floral and woody notes  with an unmistakable scent of the sea.

name: blue-blue-for-him
detail: Blue & Blue For Him is a woody masculine scent that combines delicious citrus notes and the freshness of green notes.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Calone (Marine)', 'Green Notes', 'Artemisia', 'Geranium', 'Lavandin', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Grapefruit', 'Jasmine', 'Leather', 'Lemon', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Mandarin', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Pineapple', 'Sandalwood', 'Tamarind', 'Vetiver', 'Violet', 'Watermelon', 'Woody Notes', 'Cedarwood (Texas)', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)']

name: kenzo-homme-eau-de-toilette
detail: A blue bamboo cambered by the wind. Pure  sleek lines stretch out to the sky. An original fragrance  a timeless woody marine. Iodine notes merge with floral sea sprays for instant freshness.

name: cool-water-love-the-ocean-2015
detail: The journey to protect our seas together with National Geographic continues! You can help the mission today. For each bottle of Davidoff Cool Water Love The Ocean purchased  you help protect 10 000m2 of precious blue waters.

name: acqua-di-gio-pour-homme
detail: A fragrance of contrasting sensations  which opens with a splash of freshness like a powerful sea breeze that soothes in a very natural harmony. Energising  stimulating  it expresses a healthy sensuality; an authentic  serene virility. Its complexity  however  suggests a subtle personality  full of nuances. Its perfumed trail is particularly long-lasting and memorable.

name: traveller
detail: A dynamic fragrance  a tonic freshness  a perfume of freedom and escape for a modern man in search of authenticity

name: zeitgeist
detail: Zeitgeist is a fragrance experience which is fresh and seductive  at the same time  fleeting like a summer shower but unforgettable  delicate as chiffon but profound.

name: gold-regatta
detail: Gold Regatta is an exclusive and luxurious scent inspired by one of the most iconic and exciting moments in Venetian life: the Regata Storica.

name: nude-amber-1
detail: A sparkling  luminous burst of citrus fruit enhances the delicate white floral nuances of the heart. An enveloping base of ambery woods gives the accord an ethereal quality.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Bergamot', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Peony', 'Lime']

name: incantevole
detail: The scent of a daring woman who is not afraid to live her life fully.
ingredients: ['Iris / Orris', 'Lorenox (Ambergris)', 'Water Fruits', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Mugane (Lily of the Valley)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Bergamot', 'Driftwood', 'Marine']

name: rock-ermanno-scervino-1
detail: Rock is a perfume with an energetic  feminine personality and a rock & roll touch.

name: romantica-3
detail: Romantica is a sophisticated and joyful creation to be worn as the most elegant accessory.

name: trussardi-pure-jasmine-1
detail: “We sought to create a striking signature scent that reveals the character of the woman wearing it. Pure Jasmine is our declaration of modernity and femininity " Julie Massé and Violaine Collas  Perfumers.

name: si-passione-red-maestro-2019
detail: Sì Passione Maestro is more than a fragrance. This limited edition fragrance is unique and elegant  inspiring women to discover the power of passion and use it fully to enjoy their lives.

name: trussardi-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Trussardi is designed for these women who know how to combine ethics and aesthetics and a love of justice and beauty. They are determined to always be in charge of their destiny and educate future generations.

name: si-nacre-eau-de-parfum-2020
detail: Wrap yourself in radiance with Sì Nacre Eau de Parfum 2020  a shimmering version of the chypre Sì fragrance. For a limited time  Sì transforms with a swirl of golden shimmer that leaves a pearly sparkle on the skin. Perfect for special occasions or for those moments when you want to feel a little more luxurious.

name: passeggiata-in-galleria-vittorio-emanuele-ii-1
detail: "This fragrance is inspired by the unique atmosphere of Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II in Milan. I'm sitting at a cafe terrace  enjoying an exquisite Italian espresso that goes perfectly with a piece of airy light Panettone and an addictive Piemontese hazelnut accord " Julie Massé  Perfumer.

name: vanille-riviera
detail: Vanille Riviera draws on the memory of a floral and green vanilla  freshly harvested in Madagascar. Lightened by vegetal tones  the dark and carnal side of the pod meets the brightness of jasmine. Some woody and spicy shades highlight the sensuality of this bewitching melody.

name: black-opium-le-parfum-1
detail: Black Opium Le Parfum is the most intense and radical interpretation of Yves Saint Laurent's Black Opium. An unexpected high  exalted with a quartet of faceted vanillas that sublimates the original signature in supreme pleasure.

name: shalimar-eau-de-toilette
detail: Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess  Shalimar  which means "temple of love" in Sanskrit  symbolises the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire. With its smouldering and slightly impertinent character  the star oriental fragrance in perfumery embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden.

name: nina-le-parfum
detail: Nina Le Parfum is the most daring addition to the Nina by Nina Ricci Range. The eau de parfum bursts open with an apple trio  refreshed with the zesty notes of upcycled Italian lemon. The heart reveals a sophisticated white bouquet of orange blossom  gardenia and tuberose  infusing the fragrance with a floral intensity. The base blends sensual amber wood with warm vanilla to create a deliciously sensuous promise. A fruity woody floral perfume with a uniquely addictive and elegantly powerful character. Will you fall for Nina?

name: vanille-planifolia-extrait-21
detail: Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 reveals vanilla in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain. Taken to its climax  the overdose of vanilla is tinged with that Guerlain je ne sais quoi which makes it a great perfume  in an ultimate extrait concentration.

name: bambu-hombre-1
detail: Inspired by the stunning bamboo forest of Anji  China. A composition full of energy  strength and vitality.

name: bamboo-harmony-1
detail: Bamboo Harmony pays homage to bamboo  considered by the “Men of Letters” as the symbol of human perfection. It is also the main component of their brush  the central element of calligraphy which  in Chinese culture  is the representation of Art and Beauty.

name: calice-becker
detail: A pretty scent that will wake you up from the warmth of the spring breeze

name: love-dont-be-shy-rose-oud-2019-1
detail: Love: Don't Be Shy Rose & Oud celebrates the floral facet of the original fragrance with the warm  beautiful and iconic Bulgarian rose.

name: love-dont-be-shy-amber-oud-special-blend-2023
detail: Each year  Kilian revisits one of its most popular and iconic perfumes  Love  Don’t Be Shy  to draw a new dimension of its complex perfume personality towards the richness of oud. The scent receives a limited-edition interpretation in 2023  highlighting the incredibly rich and diverse facets of oud oil.

name: love-dont-be-shy-eau-fraiche-2019-1
detail: "Love is life's narcotic its folly and its freshness. It is something we return to  in spite of ourselves  like any proper addiction " says Kilian Hennessy.

name: i-am-not-going-to-disturb-you-homme
detail: I Am Not Going To Disturb You is a perfume statement of Yohji Yamamoto's personality  life  and attitude.

name: the-musc-by-calice-becker
detail: Fresh  honeyed and warm at the same time  The Musc is a subtle blend of haunting smells.

name: indigo-smoke
detail: Rich and smoky  the scent of black tea floats in plumes of indigo smoke as the leaves are dried. An aromatic landscape of narrow serpentine rivers  blue mountains and incense-filled temples condensed into a fragrance that's both comforting  energising and extremely long-lasting.
ingredients: ['Vetiver', 'Lapsang Souchong', 'Apricot', 'Bergamot', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Mandarin', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Cinnamon', 'Fir Balsam', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Mate', 'Vanilla', 'Cedar leaf']

name: georgette-1
detail: As a divine textile  Georgette has been beloved by Teresa from her early beginnings. A diaphanous silk with a timeless appeal for its refined elegance.

name: after-sunset
detail: Blended like an olfactive cocktail that is fresh  fruity and energising  "Fun Things Always Happen After Sunset" gets to the heart of when the party starts.

name: cassili
detail: Cassili opens a new dimension in the women's fragrance range of Parfums de Marly. Sweet perfumes are very much in fashion  a vital part of the craft today. I wanted ours to be anti-conformist  indulgent  yet  subtle  elegant and almost classic. True to Marly's creations!” - Julien Sprecher  creator of Parfums de Marly

name: salado
detail: Salty is the scent of sun-kissed skin  dotted with dried salt crystals left after a summer swim in waters the colour of blue tourmaline. It is cool and refreshing like a gentle Mediterranean breeze brushing the deck of a sailboat moored at sea.

name: sacred-wood-15-years-2022
detail: Kilian celebrates its 15th anniversary with a limited edition collection for the holiday season  with a special design inspired by the Eiffel Tower  a tribute to Kilian's French heritage. Sacred Wood is a portrait of sandalwood  especially the most coveted Mysore variety  with its spicy  woody and milky facets  simply amazing.

name: nuit-pourpre
detail: In the middle of the night  the darkness coils into mysterious swirls. Then  this voluptuousness is illuminated by the softness of the moon that redraws its forms  thanks to its dusty halos of silvery rays. It is the prelude to an intense and enigmatic perfume. The mysterious beauty of the queen of the night.

name: romance-8
detail: This fragrance exudes magnetism with the distinct notes it embodies  and complements the sense of curious passion in the modern women who go through life with effortless heart.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Green Notes', 'Animalic Notes', 'Hyacinth', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Citruses', 'Moss']

name: beyond-paradise-1
detail: The new fantasy in fragrance. It's an intoxication of the senses ... rare  radiant  intriguing. Beyond Paradise transports you to a perfect world of optimism and wonder. Unfolds on your skin with a fascinating blend of tropical wetness  zesty freshness  and bursting floralcy.
ingredients: ['Hyacinth', 'Jasmine', 'Plum Blossom', 'Honeysuckle', 'Orange Blossom', 'Orchid', 'Mahonia', 'Jabuticaba', 'Woody Notes', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Green Watery Accord']

name: apollo-hyacinth
detail: Apollo Hyacinth is an elegant and subtle fragrance inspired by the smell of a Hyacinth freshly cut stem  a tribute to Eric's workshop during the spring season.

name: jacinthe-et-rose-romantica-1
detail: This original  captivating and precious concoction is timeless  complicit and highly feminine.

name: fleurs-dorlane
detail: A unique and original fragrance in which the flowers and the most fragrant essences blend to compose the most rare and brilliant bouquets.

name: acqua-di-gio-2
detail: Acqua di Giò is a tempting  fresh aquatic fragrance which explores another side of pleasure. A thirst for foreign lands  a certain taste for escape  a scent which is fresh yet full of passion. The essence of Acqua is an exploration of its source - an extra-sensory adventure ... travelling with the flow wherever it may lead. And its essence is in the air!

name: crystal-bloom-beloved-charm
detail: Like a mother's gentle affection that swaddled you when you were young  this special fragrance is filled with the sweetness of flower nectar and gives you secret strength like a protective charm. Every movement  that charm softly wraps you in a fragrance that confers beloved joy and a sense of security.

name: crystal-bloom-snow
detail: The miraculous instant in which flowers and snow meet and resonate together. This is the most beautiful and pure fragrance in the world  like a vista of pure white that spreads into infinity.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Apple', 'Musk', 'Freesia', 'Iris / Orris', 'Magnolia', 'Osmanthus', 'Peony', 'Powdery Notes', 'Rose', 'Snowdrops', 'Sweet Pea', 'Water Lily', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Blackcurrant', 'Plum', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Orange']

name: stronger-with-you-only-2
detail: Emporio Armani pays tribute to the power of love and togetherness with Stronger With You Only.

name: the-vert-2020-1
detail: Subtle and revitalising  Thé Vert Eau de Toilette captures the fresh and delicate aromas of green tea.

name: do-son-eau-de-parfum-limited-edition-2022-1
detail: As a child  Yves Coueslant  one of Diptyque’s founders  spent his summers at the seaside in a pagoda that his father had built in Do Son  close to Halong Bay. In this limited edition  Do Son is clad in blue. An evocation of fresh tuberoses mingling with the sea air  the turquoise water blending into the sky in the distance. The mood inspires a mysterious fragrance that permeates the night. An invitation to set your imagination adrift.

name: black-musk-night-bloom
detail: Black Musk Night Bloom is a fierce and seductive fragrance  inspired by the flowers that bloom at night to reveal their secret scents.

name: united-dreams-am-together-for-him
detail: Having a dream is all you need! United Colors of Benetton is as well known for its provocative (and thought-provoking) ad campaigns as for its on-trend fashion designs. Using controversial imagery  the brand conveys powerful messages of tolerance  non-discrimination and human rights.

name: crystal-bloom-something-pure-blue-2020
detail: A pure fragrance that drifts with the soft translucency of a wedding veil  brimming with the most blessed feeling in the world.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Pear', 'Musk', 'Edelweiss', 'Hortensia', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Osmanthus', 'Rose', 'Sweet Pea', 'Delphinium', 'Apple', 'Peach', 'Bergamot', 'Snow Accord']

name: eau-fusion-1
detail: In Eau Fusion  the classic citrus notes meet the power of gemstones. The result is a uniquely refreshing  revitalising fragrance.

name: stronger-with-you-leather
detail: Stronger With You Leather by Armani unfolds an olfactory chapter as a tribute to the Middle East. A refined concentrate of addiction and sensuality  this masculine fragrance captures the luxurious allure of leather  one of the most sensual and sophisticated accords in perfumery.

name: united-dreams-pm-together-for-him-2019
detail: Having a dream is all you need! United Colors of Benetton is as well known for its provocative (and thought-provoking) ad campaigns as for its on-trend fashion designs. Using controversial imagery  the brand conveys powerful messages of tolerance  non-discrimination and human rights.

name: united-dreams-together-for-him-4
detail: United Dreams Together complements the United Dreams line of perfumes with a call to believe in the universal dream that unites us all  love. If we can love  dream and be together  regardless of our differences  we have the power to change the world.

name: rose-calisson-2020
detail: Of all the sweet treats from Provence  the most iconic has to be the calisson. L'Occitane introduces a twist on this traditional delicacy by combining it with rose in a delicious olfactory creation with a floral and powdery trail.

name: wild-attraction-1
detail: A virile and irresistible scent.

name: darjeeling-tea
detail: Radiant Darjeeling Tea. Richly floral  with an exotic sweetness. Often found high in the foothills of the Himalayas. Vibrant  spring buds grow on the steepest slopes among mountain mists. A heady  sublime rare tea infusion.

name: fairy-juice-blue-1
detail: Do you like to feel a shiver down your spine  its fragrance is Fairy Juice Blue! The scent will leave you free and light as air. Your colour is blue  with a refreshing and energising splash effect. A pure parenthesis of well-being and harmony that will carry you through the whirlwind of your day.

name: elle-laime-a-la-folie-1
detail: Personifying a bold  passionate  loveable woman  totally comfortable leading her own life... Someone who excels as if she were in love. The love story continues in a new adventure deep and mysterious  passionate and warm  the expression of love in its greatest form.

name: elle-laime-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Love lives in her and perfumes her days. Her heart is wrapped in joy with every step she takes. The shimmering  pearly light reflects her soul. She is the heroine of her own fairy tale: the Elle L'Aime woman is self-confident  passionate and master of her destiny.

name: bonbon-couture-1
detail: Bonbon Couture is an even more opulent  intense interpretation of Bonbon – the all-encompassing sensory experience of the fragrance is enriched  the ritual enhanced and the ceremonious pursuit of pleasure acutely heightened.

name: muse-blanche-1
detail: Muse Blanche opens with fresh notes of citrus and light flowers. A tender heart is followed by a woody chord and deeper floral notes which finally leads you to a powdery gourmand base.

name: black-label-men-eau-legere-1
detail: Black Label Men Eau Légère brings freshness to the elegant business world embodied by the original. It accompanies the wearer's careful and confident style and at the same time refreshes. Despite all the energy and powerful accords  this fragrance also manages to retain its modern  simple elegance.

name: pour-monsieur-eau-de-parfum
detail: A man opens the door of a car to a woman. Elegant in heart and mind  he cultivates an English sense of humour  as well as a sense of values: tradition  refinement  fidelity  discretion.

name: encre-noire
detail: A masculine and enigmatic fragrance for a sophisticated and elegant man.

name: electra-gaze-2022
detail: A hypnotic scent with addictive accords that will empower whoever wears it.

name: town-country
detail: Originally created in 1925 and famously worn by Winston Churchill  Town & Country was a shining star of a new era of the Crown Perfumery Company. Today it is reimagined with the Clive Christian hallmarks of complexity  concentration and dedication to the finest ingredients  perfectly crafted for self-expression.

name: alien-eau-de-parfum
detail: Alien is a talisman capable of revealing the light and creative force of every woman. It illuminates the woman who wears it with an extraordinary halo.

name: 1947-dahlia
detail: A sensual Floriental  a sensual woody that rounds off the elegant white floral accord.

name: guess-seductive
detail: Seductive  a sexy scent that embodies the unique magnetism and playfully captivating style synonymous with the Guess brand.

name: just-give-me-roses-1
detail: It is simple  but very profound. The memory of a rose can melt the heart. Like your fondest memories of flowers received and gifts exchanged  there is no token of love more meaningful than the rose. Just Give Me Roses saturates the universal charm of the iconic flower in a warm and rich bouquet.
ingredients: ['Rose Damascena', 'Cedarwood', 'Saffron', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Black Pepper', 'Hot Pepper', 'Cypress', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Patchouli', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Cashmere Wood']

name: my-day
detail: A composition that embodies self-care and self-love  My Day blends feelings of serene confidence with sensations of tingling excitement.
ingredients: ['Iris / Orris', 'Bergamot', 'Tonka Bean', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Orange Blossom', 'Osmanthus', 'Tuberose', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Mandarin', 'Pink Pepper', 'Cedarwood', 'Star Anise', 'Vetiver', 'Cashmere Wood', 'Sandalwood (Sri Lankan)']

name: let-the-dance-begin
detail: Make every move as exciting as a slow dance with a fast heartbeat. Feel the rhythm as glances meet and sparks of electricity fly. Let the Dance Begin encapsulates the melodic harmony of high and low notes flowing in flirtatious partnership.
ingredients: ['Sandalwood (Sri Lankan)', 'Cardamom', 'Tuberose', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Orange', 'Cashmere Wood', 'Davana', 'Pink Pepper', 'Black Pepper', 'Caramel', 'Cinnamon', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Rose Damascena', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Hot Pepper', 'Geranium (Egypt)']

name: pomona-vitalis
detail: Pomona Vitalis is a voluptuous perfume celebrating vitality and joie de vivre. The scent pays homage to Pomona  the radiant and rosy cheeked goddess of gardens and orchards.

name: santal-indien
detail: Expect the unexpected  as this is not your typical sandalwood. Exotic intensity abounds from the start with exotic and spicy top notes. At the base  the creamy depth of santalum album  the most prized and valuable variety of sandalwood from India and Sri Lanka  anchors this exotic fragrance with a warm and welcoming embrace.

name: alchemists-oud-1
detail: Alchemists Oud is a powerful and exquisite fragrance created by world-class perfumer Frank Vöelkl. A unique signature fragrance with an aura of intense  radiant luxury and a sense of opulence.

name: leisure
detail: The state of "leisure" should be bright green  comfortable  rooted in the soil  and spreading upward. Pressing the pump  the fine mist of the perfume instantly disperses. Bringing us to a morning right after mowing the lawn.

name: my-euphoria
detail: The feeling of Euphoria is an intense warm and invigorating sensation taking over the body  with an overwhelming feeling of elation. It can be triggered and expressed in as many ways as there are unique individuals.

name: hugo-reflective-edition-1
detail: Boss Reflective Edition is a bold fragrance that celebrates the power of our unique reflections and spotlights the beauty in individuality. This unique scent is for the rule-breakers  risk-takers  and explorers. There is only one of you. So how will you reflect on your time?

name: midnight-sandalwood
detail: A sensual enveloping powdery scent for the delicate woman.

name: charcoal-1
detail: A stick of pure charcoal as it leaves its mark. Bold and enigmatic spices ruminate with warmth  enhanced with naturally aromatic resins.  Each earthly element comes together in a striking vibration  crystallising a sleek  mineral carbon accord. Pressure creates diamonds.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Rose Centifolia', 'Black Pepper', 'Limbanol (Woody ambery)', 'Elemi', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Saffron', 'Carbon Accord', 'Cardamom']

name: mcm-ultra
detail: Ultra invites all women to embrace their own individuality and journey  encouraging the belief that anything is possible. The contemporary fragrance inspires an optimistic attitude and the confidence to live freely and creatively.

name: zephirine
detail: Liberty’s Eden’s Awakening print evokes a fantastical palace filled with lavish flora and fauna and decadent figs just waiting to be picked. Step deeper into this enchanted realm to discover our luscious and spiritual amber scent. Notes of stalky fresh fig leaves and velvety rose petals combine with an aura of incense  soft leather and rich vetiver.

name: mood-ring
detail: Take a euphoric sugar trip. A dynamic  vibrant mood enhancing fragrance that transports you to a technicolor daydream.

name: le-petit-chocolatier-i-confiture
detail: Confiture  considered the fruitiest and sweetest of the collection  a mouth-watering and delicious fragrance for chocolate lovers. It will make any woman feel a dreaming world full of chocolate and a pleasant smell that addicts you to always try it.

name: cotton-candy-1
detail: Demeter's Cotton Candy captures that fresh  warm scent of cotton candy just made at the fair on a warm summer day. If there is a more pleasant childhood memory to be had  we have yet to find it.

name: police-to-be-purple-night-2022-1
detail: With the potent pull of a magnet  Police To Be Purple Night overflows with allure and promises immediate attraction and passion.

name: light-happy
detail: Light & Happy feels like pure joy.

name: west-1
detail: An ode to the pursuit of dreams and optimism  West is Ellis Brooklyn's first true citrus fragrance. Inspired by the Los Angeles writers of the 1970s  West bursts with the energy of a brilliant new idea and unfolds in a story full of nuance and devastating beauty.

name: gingham-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Fresh. Vibrant. Happy. Gingham celebrates everything you love about Bath & Body Works. With a higher concentration of fragrance oils  our perfume gives you a more intense  longer-lasting scent for the ultimate  most luxurious indulgence.

name: sun-15
detail: The life of the beach party captured in a scent as joyful and playful as an afternoon in the sunshine.

name: electro-limonade-1
detail: Sitting on a terrace overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Relaxing with a cocktail and watching the sunset. Electro Limonade is an effervescent  sparkling and aromatic electronic cologne that will accompany you until the early hours of the morning.

name: ck-one-shock-for-him-1
detail: Turn down the lights. Amplify the sound. Act on impulse. Introducing ck One Shock for Him. Addictive skin scents for when you don't feel like sharing.

name: 101-clementine-violet-flower-1
detail: Olfactive Facet 101 is a vibrant and complex fragrance created around citrus fruits and violet. It encompasses a crisp and citrusy accord with notes of violet leaves resting on a warm musky base.

name: cravache-2
detail: Classic Cravache has been reimagined for today's astute fragrance aficionado  taking this traditional aromatic blend and adding a modern addictive twist to its universal appeal.

name: indaco-indigo
detail: An enveloping and intense fragrance  the breath of a memory  the joy of a new found moment.

name: magnolia-nobile
detail: The follow up to the popular Iris Nobile  Magnolia Nobile captures the subtly enchanting radiance of the magnolia flower. As the bouquet evolves  citrus and woody notes are revealed for an uplifting yet sensual fragrance that's emblematic of 'la dolce vita'.

name: lhomme-velvet-edition
detail: Housed in a decadent velvet bottle to echo Prada's Autumn/Winter 2017 collection  the Prada L'Homme Prada Velvet Edition boasts an aesthetic redolent of '70s-style. Seductive and rich  this timeless fragrance

name: miu-miu-twist-eau-de-magnolia
detail: With a light and elegant touch  this fragrance is a delicately attractive composition that celestial dreams are made of.

name: white-musk-7
detail: A soft  sensual  and velvety scent that is also luxurious and sumptuous. To have White Musk that means you have the perfect complement to every outfit  occasion  and mood.

name: get-ready-for-her
detail: Passionate. Spontaneous. Ready to take in life to the fullest. It is inspired by the Brazilian colourful way of life. Brazil is far more than a place - it's a feeling! A unique blend of happiness  dance  and freedom.

name: patchouli-magnetik
detail: A scent like a motorcycle ride through patchouli fields during a tropical storm.

name: hibiscus-mahajad-1
detail: "Around 4pm  the market I was in was gradually coming to life. I remember sitting between two stalls to rest. I was served a fresh  lively  fruity and sweet infusion made from rose and hibiscus petals. A supreme delight " Thibaud Crivelli  Founder.

name: valaya
detail: Beyond the boundaries of artifice  and beyond time. Valaya rouses an intimate sensation  a universal emotion  a deep breath of fresh air. The sensation of the petticoat ladies wore under their various garments during the 18th century  or the modernity of a white shirt worn directly against the skin. A fragrance that revisits 18th-century heritage with elegance and modernity.

name: soleil-neige
detail: The remote holiday of Tom Ford Soleil traverses from Courchevel to Megeve  inspiring Soleil Neige. This fragrance is alive with radiance and light-reflective ethereality  that mimics the serene shimmer of sun on snow.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Benzoin', 'Bergamot', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Rose Damascena', 'Jasmine (Grandiflorum)', 'Karmaflor (Floral notes)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Honey', 'Vanilla', 'Woody Notes']

name: eau-de-jasmin-rouge
detail: Eau de Jasmin Rouge is a refreshing and elegant version of Jasmin Rouge. If Jasmin Rouge is a voluptuous  spice-saturated fragrance  Eau de Jasmin Rouge is a sparkling  effervescent composition. A reinterpretation of the carnal allure of jasmine.
ingredients: ['Jasmine (China)', 'Cardamom', 'Clary Sage', 'Broom', 'Jasmine (India)', 'Karmaflor (Floral notes)', 'Bergamot', 'White Pepper', 'Black Pepper', 'Ginger (India)', 'Mandarin (green)', 'Mandarin (Sicily)', 'Orange (Valencia)', 'Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Leather', 'Woody Notes', 'Vanilla (Mexico)']

name: authentic-hero-style-1
detail: This fragrance embodies the deepest essence of a modern hero. He lives with a purpose that is bigger than himself: his conviction is to transform the environment in which he lives and to intensely protect what he believes to be true.

name: absolute-by-elite-gentleman
detail: Discover pure sophistication with a fresh burst of Italian citrus  intensified by one of the rarest and most exclusive woody notes in perfumery  made even more refined with the luxurious woody quality of amber.

name: comme-des-garcons-eau-de-parfum-2011
detail: A scent that is deliberately unnamed. As for the fragrance  it interprets the smell of a scotch tape flower  an imaginary scent that mixes waves of industrial glue and adhesive tape. Sometimes  almost without realising it  we can stumble upon beauty.

name: b683-extrait
detail: "I like the raw  and yet so chic aspect of the perfume  a very refined and wild fragrance." Quentin Bisch  Perfumer.

name: play-red-1
detail: Play Red. Design by not designing. No design is design. The prototype is strong. Absence of concept is creation.

name: orange-sanguine-love-birds-1
detail: Orange Sanguine Love Birds is a celebration of endless love. No matter the distance  there is always a way to reconnect with the people you care for and love.

name: orange-sanguine-2023
detail: It was the kind of moment you would want to revisit. Everyone was here  gathered on the terrace for breakfast  and the scent of fresh oranges was diffusing in the yellow heat. A symphony of their laughter and waves hitting the cliffs played in the air. Enjoy the iconic ORANGE SANGUINE in a limited edition bottle.

name: perry-ellis-for-men-2017-1
detail: Perry Ellis for Men is a vibrant  fresh scent that opens with crisp notes  followed by an exotic heart. An intriguing and memorable dry down leaves a signature trail.

name: shadescents-creme-dnude-1
detail: The nude-coloured pigment of Crème d'Nude lipstick inspired a fragrance that embodies the vibrant sensuality of clean  radiant  glowing skin. A cocoon of velvety aspects envelops the fragrance's structure  while the freshness of the heart emits a sensual skin luminosity.

name: original-penguin-original-blend
detail: Original Blend is a new fragrance by Original Penguin featuring a refreshing  clean  marine scent that aligns with the Penguin guy's laid-back yet socially active fashion-forward lifestyle.

name: hale-bopp-1
detail: Comet Hale Bopp is one of the brightest comets ever to appear in the night sky and is charged with a mysterious and benevolent charm. Each time it passes through our section of the celestial vault  it brings luck and wonderful events  just like the creation it inspired.

name: vanille-iconique-1
detail: This fragrance is based on the iconic ingredient of Comptoir Sud Pacifique: vanilla. An exotic  sunny  velvety and enveloping scent created using the most sought-after types of vanilla. It reveals a treasure trove of nuances and subtleties on your skin.

name: wicked-1
detail: Black lace. Leather jacket. Downtown after dark. An edgy sister to our original Crush fragrance  Wicked is inspired by the idea of a flirtation turned into obsession. In a lace bodysuit and leather jacket  our flirty Crush girl gets Wicked. Your darkest new addiction. It's Wicked.

name: shalimar-souffle-de-lumiere-collector-edition-2018-1
detail: Souffle de Lumière: a radiant olfactory creation that evokes the beauty of a silhouette against the light  the caressing breath of sun on diaphanous skin  the brightness of dawn at the other end of the world. The light of a dreamed East  bathed in enchanting scents and mystery.

name: tuberose-le-soir-1
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the rich  sensual scent of tuberose in full bloom  harvested in India as the sun sets  and is perfect for an evening out.

name: lune-feline-1
detail: Atelier Des Ors poetically magnifies each of its creations in a glittering ballet of stardust. An intensely distinguished emotion.

name: vivamore-1
detail: A new fragrance for women by Selena Gomez. An effervescent and intoxicatingly floral fragrance that embodies the philosophy of living life and loving more. An uplifting creation for a fragrance that celebrates life and love.

name: la-nuit-tresor-leau-de-parfum-caresse-1
detail: Lancôme's gourmand love potion La Nuit Trésor advances to La Nuit Trésor Caresse  adding another exciting option to the legendary Trésor fragrance collection. The unique aroma moves on a softer and fresher expression but retaining the character of gourmand sweetness of the original fragrance.

name: la-nuit-tresor-le-parfum
detail: Embark on a sensual love story in La Nuit Trésor Le Parfum  inspired by an irresistible passion that comes alive at night.

name: izia-la-nuit-1
detail: Izia la Nuit is more than a fragrance  a place or a moment. It is a journey  an experience  a discovery. An ode to the night  the perfume is a tribute to a unique and mysterious rose that grows in the garden of co-founder Isabelle d'Ornano and only blooms fleetingly once a year.

name: jasmine-leather
detail: It was in Florence during the Renaissance that the fashion of scenting leather began  and it gave birth to a real craze for scented leather accessories  with jasmine-scented leather gloves becoming the epitome of style. It's a marriage meant to be: jasmine and leather belong to each other  each contributing its own uniqueness to a timeless personal note.

name: sensuous-stars
detail: Delight in the sensuous tranquility of walking among plum trees under a moonlit sky. In one exhilarating moment  an irresistible breeze takes you sky high  breathlessly floating among swirling stars.

name: daisy-love-pop-2024
detail: A delicious  airy and fresh interpretation of pistachio.

name: eve-prive
detail: You’re one-of-a-kind  so why shouldn’t your fragrance be unique too? As part of the customisable musk technology in Eve Privé  a delicate white musky molecule is used to support the ‘skin-feel’ accord that was exclusively designed to mix with the chemistry of your skin to enhance your natural scent and make you smell like you  only better. Reveal your true essence.

name: invisible-touch
detail: You may not see it  but you will feel its delicate presence. Like the sensation of wearing La Perla lingerie  Invisible Touch envelops you in an aura of confidence and grace. How much do you decide to reveal?

name: aegea-blossom-1
detail: A voyage around the Greek islands served as inspiration for this vibrant fragrance. Aegea Blossom is a journey for the senses capturing the blue sea cool breezes and pure light of Greece.

name: lovely-alba
detail: "Mizensir is a family story. This is what guides me every moment and always. We can only be true and sincere when we create with and for those we love. And I could not express my profession in any other way. Each creation is a very particular emotion  an open book about what inspires and moves me. Lovely Alba is like that  I created it for my granddaughter and her mother  like a moment of tenderness in a delicate and flowery perfume. "Alberto Morillas  Perfumer

name: little-bianca
detail: "My dearest Bianca  you have my eyes  but I do not know if you have my nose. And I can't tell if you will be a “nose” one day! Yet  I know one thing  the world of scents is one of the wonders of our planet. Scents don't lie  dear Little Bianca  they talk to your heart in the language of truth." Alberto  your Granddad

name: solar-blossom
detail: Mizensi's Solar Blossom Eau De Parfum unveils layer upon layer of olfactory recollections starting with soft  warm orange blossom with a hint of sweetness  just like a pastry from your childhood.

name: cologne-du-mate
detail: "I had wanted to work on this olfactory duo for a long time. Mandarin is an extraordinary fruit for a perfumer  very faceted  at the same time fruity with this delicate bitterness that we like in a citrus fruit and very acidic. Mate is surprising  offering much greener and more herbaceous nuances than tea. Between the two they offer this very lively and spicy freshness that leaves the skin with the delicious scent of a freshly peeled mandarin". - Alberto Morillas  Perfumer

name: 2-wood-1
detail: Young and capturing the zeitgeist  the protagonists for this fragrance live on passions  good vibes  and an impulse towards what's new. They are looking for a sophisticated essence that expresses the authenticity  depth  and passion that defines them.

name: bvlgari-man-glacial-essence-2
detail: Bvlgari climbs one of the highest peaks in the world to capture the freshest  purest  entirely overwhelming breath of fresh air. One that inspires us to reach for more. It is a pervasive wind of change  brought to life in Bvlgari Man Glacial Essence. Life is filled with unexpected moments.

name: unlock-for-him
detail: Inspired by the moment you escape the rhythm of the rat race  this vital scent duet acts as the key to your original  creative self. Unlock inspires you to break from the repetitive monotony and unleash your limitless ingenuity and vision. Free from the constraints of the daily grind  you can explore  invent and create the new.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood (Alaska)', 'Asphalt', 'Sea Water', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Cardamom', 'Jasmine', 'Gourmand Accord']

name: bella-night-1
detail: Mesmerising and luminous  Bella Night embodies Oscar de la Renta's captivating vision of nighttime glamour. The fragrance pays homage to the allure of the shimmering night sky and the sensuality of the Oscar de la Renta woman.

name: segno-impact
detail: A powerful and inspiring fragrance  Segno Impact is a sophisticated fragrance like no other.

name: wet-stone-1
detail: The sound of water cascading over jagged rocks as it descends  carving its way through a frozen landscape  Wet Stone evokes the visceral power and magnificence of a mountain waterfall.

name: oscar-lavender
detail: The timeless elegance of lavender breathes nostalgia into this contemporary classic.

name: epine-de-rose
detail: "I wanted to focus on a rose for men  away from the romantic and delicate femininity that is so often associated with rose-based perfumes. But I am also aware that it is worn by women. I liked the idea that the rose does not exist without its thorns  and that is where all its power lies. That's why I was inspired by this aspect of the flower to reveal something new  at once floral but also woody and spicy". - Alberto Morillas  Perfumer

name: noir-anthracite
detail: A new quality recently added to the perfumer's palette and used in unprecedented concentrations in Tom Ford's New Noir  creating a warm  tenacious and sweet scent that brings depth  richness and soft sensuality.

name: calvin-klein-women-eau-de-parfum
detail: Celebrating the multifaceted nature of femininity  Calvin Klein Women fuses strength and freshness with fragility and sensuality. Delicate  yet strong. Sensual  yet fresh  this scent is a tribute to the women all around the world.

name: explorer-platinum
detail: Explorer Platinum captures the thrill and beauty of a journey to higher altitudes with a powerful woodsy fragrance. The journey to the summit is challenging and unpredictable  but perhaps the most exhilarating and inspiring.

name: oud-tabac
detail: "When creating Oud Tabac  I had in mind something deliciously intoxicating  sensual  unforgettable and addictive. I wanted to start with something spicy and invigorating. The result is seductive and irresistible and should convey a sense of personal attraction and magnetism to the wearer. This is my Oud Tabac  soft  sensual  addictive. "Ilias Ermenidis  Perfumer

name: corfu-kumquat
detail: A penetrating freshness. Citrus rind exposed to salty sea air and rugged terrain. A moment of respite and unexpected depth. Corfu Kumquat takes its name and its raw material from the regal Greek island of Corfu. A citrus expression that lingers long after the moment of release.

name: palissandre-dor-2021-1
detail: A symphony of fine-grained burnished woods spins into a smoothly opulent perfume. There is a new light on the immemorial scent of precious woods with Palissandre d'Or  which arrives in a smouldering palette of burnt sienna  lacquered red and molten gold. Originally launched in 2015.

name: extreme-sport
detail: Well-defined fragrance  with a young and challenging spirit. Ideal for those who love to compete and are always looking to win.

name: orris-noir-1
detail: "Orris Noir was inspired in part by the elegant dignity and beauty of Queen Rania of Jordan. I had a very spicy oriental in mind  but not another guy to walk into a room before me! Black Iris is a very dark purple  almost defiantly mystical  but once its fragrance develops on the skin  it is not remotely heavy. It leaves a complex but comforting drydown."

name: luxure-sensuelle
detail: Unabashedly sexy  Luxure Sensuelle takes sensuality to a new level in its quest for ecstasy and strong sensations.

name: pasha-de-cartier-edition-noire
detail: Wearing Pasha de Cartier means sporting a fragrance that has a cool elegance and the power of seduction. The subtlety of this fragrance comes from the hint of freshness  which perfectly balances the smooth warmth of woods.

name: love-potion-so-tempting
detail: Let your imagination run wild with this deliciously sensual mist fragrance. A floral  oriental and gourmand fragrance  with an addictive sparkling honey accord that will leave you wanting more.

name: crystal-noir-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A light luscious scent  reminiscent of a walk through a floral garden with that leaves a warm gourmand veil on the skin.

name: liquid-illusion
detail: Committed to making alluring fragrances for modern heroines  Liquid Illusion from Juliette has a Gun is an invitation to enter a trance. The scent is composed of key notes  swirled together with a warming sensual  aura.

name: gouttes-sensuelles
detail: An exquisitely sensual  carnal and passionate perfume.

name: giovanna-baby-peach
detail: Giovanna Baby Peach is charming and engaging  just like you.

name: mini-cici-bela
detail: Mini Bela for the vainest  coolest and most tuned teens!

name: 214-golden-gardenia-1
detail: 214 Golden Gardenia has captured the scent of the beautiful gardens of French Polynesia on warm  sunny days. It is an intoxicating fragrance that combines warmth with the sophistication of amber.

name: love-chloe
detail: Love  Chloé  is a celebration of radiant  generous  spontaneous femininity. Free and graceful movement. Contagious beauty. She loves life  making others smile with just a glance. Her natural charm comes through in her walk and in her every move. Her fragrance is a tribute to her unique personality  her aura  and her symbol.

name: good-girl-collector-superstars-2021
detail: A fragrance as powerful as it is sensual. An audacious blend of dark and light elements. For the woman who knows when it's good to be bad.

name: boss-the-scent-for-her-magnetic-1
detail: Boss The Scent for Her Magnetic is an invitation to experience the power of attraction and seduction like never before.

name: roberto-cavalli-signature-golden-anniversary-2021
detail: Roberto Cavalli celebrates their 50th anniversary with this addictive blend of warm and opulent notes.

name: boss-the-scent-for-her-elixir
detail: This mesmerising scent conjures up the feeling of vibrancy  warmth  and dark sensuality.

name: cherie-1
detail: Chérie brings the joyful spirit of Kate Spade New York to Paris and adds a touch of energy and cheerfulness to the brand's fragrance range.

name: cerruti-1881-reve-de-roses
detail: A voluptuous yet energising scent that will make heads turn.

name: d-by-diesel
detail: Embark on the new era of Diesel with the captivating fragrance D by Diesel. The scent was designed for people to come together and take action for a better future.

name: unravel-2138-1
detail: Unravel is about searching and finding. Finding comfort. Finding yourself. 21|38 takes you through the storm and becomes the fragrance you end up with.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Violet Leaves', 'Iris / Orris', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Orange Blossom', 'Pink Pepper', 'Ambrette Seed']

name: leau-revee-daria
detail: L'Eau Rêvée d'Aria combines the spicy flavour of ginger with the complexity of osmanthus to create a fragrance with a lively and joyful personality  like a fantastic costume party.

name: off
detail: A tall and unruly jasmine grows alone in the middle of the night. The thin moon shines in the sky  and the clean musk  as cool as water  evokes a high-altitude night wind  making provocative and sensual desires invisible in an instant  leaving only aloofness and indifference.

name: idole-now
detail: With Idôle Now  Lancôme stands up for a committed perfumery while thoroughly embodying the values of the Idôle community. Inspired by a brighter future  Idôle Now expresses through its fragrance the exhilarating urge to join the unstoppable movement of a collective of women gathering their strength and unleashing their power.

name: valentino-donna-born-in-roma-coral-fantasy-1
detail: The golden hour is the olfactory inspiration for this fragrance  when the city of Rome vibrates with the force of renewed energy. This golden hour invites everyone to reinvent themselves  express their personality and give free rein to their dreams  desires and fantasies. A world of fantasy awaits you at Roma Coral Fantasy.

name: tommy-hilfiger-impact-spark-1
detail: For those with a boundless sense of imagination  who dare to dream  desire and disrupt  Impact Spark ignites the passions of goal setters and game changers.

name: navis
detail: I am a raft floating in the middle of the ocean. I am a wooden ship and my hull  caressed by the waves  is saturated with salt water. My interiors hide fragrant treasures  rich in citrus and rare spices  my sails are filled with iodine-filled wind and scorching sun. I embrace the fog and share the storms. I resist the furious waves with my love of rough  dangerous seas. I'm a drunken boat on a mission.

name: herbae
detail: Herbae is aimed at women who like to flirt with their wild side. Women who know how to shine on the professional stage  but who can't help but kick off their shoes to run barefoot in the sand.

name: police-extreme-1
detail: This fragrance is dedicated to the man who flaunts his virility to the extreme and has an exuberant and kaleidoscopic personality. He does not surrender to fashion  he dictates it!

name: eau-superbe
detail: As a tribute to her ancestors who made Maison Rancé world famous  Jeanna Sandra Rancé has recreated this classic fragrance  under the name of Rue Rancé  the street in Grasse where the Rancé Family lived and had their perfume houses for centuries.

name: series-5-sherbet-peppermint
detail: Peppermint in the Sherbet range is an uplifting fragrance created to savour the freshness  that makes you want to try it. To taste it!

name: cool-water
detail: Modern  fresh - a unique fragrance. Sensuous yet daring  like the changing moods of the ocean. Clean  clear and compelling  Davidoff Cool Water is an iridescent composition of contrasts - a fragrance that gets "under your skin."

name: menthe-fraiche-1
detail: "I loved the idea of doing a perfume that isn't really a perfume. Something that is natural and fresh that it doesn't really smell like a perfume. Menthe Fraiche is what I call an olfactory interlude. I love this on a hot summer's day  or after a shower before putting on a fresh shirt.
