It is hard to beat the smell of freshly crushed mint leaves and I never got bored of this one " James Heeley.

name: malamata
detail: A floral that prides itself on green.

name: voodoo-chile-2
detail: “I was inspired by the iconic Jimi Hendrix track. Rosemary and patchouli are the opposite forces in action here but the rosemary  like Hendrix’s guitar  is distorted to make it hot and dense ” Nicolas Beaulieu  Perfumer.

name: boss-the-scent-elixir
detail: Capturing the spirit of passionate nights  this tantalising scent conjures up a complex spicy aroma full of provocative attitude.

name: david-beckham-beyond
detail: "No matter how small you start  always dream big. Incredible things happen when you dream big. That's what I've always believed in. - David Beckham

name: dance-red-midnight-2021
detail: Feel the power of the night. The music embraces you and moves you to join in its most sensual dance and become one with it. The darkness covers everything  creating the perfect setting for you to uninhibit yourself. A caress  a glance  a few words whispered in your ear. You are consumed by that moment of the night when your senses sharpen and the desire that had been veiled blooms.

name: ginger-apple-jewel-2023
detail: The luxury of party season. Indulge the night away.

name: red-wood-1
detail: A sparkling and audacious experience with a contemporary spirit that tells everything about you and your personality. It is the most intimate and distinctive element  which makes you recognisable and different in a non-descriptive way. We like to think of Red Wood as a personal accessory that defines the style and character of Dsquared2.

name: big-pony-pink-2-for-women
detail: Sporty  sensual  free-spirited and stylish. Today's woman should have a fragrance wardrobe to match her multitude of passions and achievements. She coordinates her fashion according to mood and occasion: now she can choose a scent to complement her every taste.

name: tommy-girl-summer-2021-1
detail: The bright spirited berries meet the pop of red fruits. As the perfume heads into warmer waters with solar florals  the perfume gets a little tipsy! As we arrive at the finale  a picnic on the beach is packed with sun-warmed woods and clean notes.

name: maa-arwaak-for-her
detail: Maa Arwaak for Her is a floral fruity gourmand fragrance that is very soft  light and feminine.

name: black-xs-for-her-eau-de-parfum
detail: She follows her woman's instincts. Intensely  in excess. Eau de parfum Black XS for her. Black rose  narcotic. Disturbing  sensual  rebellious fragrance. Rock. In excess. A fragrance reserved for the free and disconcerting woman. An attitude  a lifestyle. Breaks the rules. Captures the moment. Deep  sincere emotion.

name: stash-sjp
detail: This addictive fragrance from Sarah Jessica Parker is an absolute rule breaker. Inspired by her own secret fragrance obsession  Stash has been shared with only a few - until now. Risk-taking and irresistible  Stash is Sarah Jessica Parker's most personal and provocative fragrance. The secret is out.

name: santal-massoia-1
detail: «There are linear  vertical woods like cedar  and others that are horizontal  round  supple and velvet-smooth  such as sandalwood and massoia. With this understanding in mind  I composed this enigmatic  inviting yet distant perfume of milky woods  with its unusual  pungent hints of resin and dried fruit  and familiar smells of dulce de leche and flowers.» Jean-Claude Ellena  perfumer

name: roma-uomo
detail: Complex  sophisticated  rich in nuances and facets that reveal themselves generously  one after the other  ROMA UOMO is a manifestation of virility and strength of character  along with an unexpected fragility of feeling. It is a classic fragrance  an irresistible blend of romanticism and modernity that pays homage to the strong qualities of man and expresses them in a style characterised by timeless elegance.

name: yes-i-am-bloom-up
detail: Yes I Am Bloom Up is a joyful scent for the optimistic woman.

name: cosmopolitan-cocktail-1
detail: True to the legendary Cosmo  this fragrance is an inviting and refreshing combination of Vodka  Cranberry Juice  a hint of Lime Juice and a touch of Cointreau.

name: so-brit
detail: So…? Brit is an exciting fragrance that is an ode to the British “it” girl style with a ferocious edge and acute sense of fun and excitement. Defying the dull  she colours of the world with her bright personality and eclectic fashion  towards ideas. Not afraid to experiment  she adores missing high fashion with high street  sequins with Wellingtons  Primark with Westwood  Shoreditch chic with Kensington class.

name: baiser-de-russie
detail: Inspired by the beautiful arrival of cold weather  romantic heroines  sensual spies  podium queens and decidedly urban  Baiser de Russie takes us to the heart of eternal Russia.

name: flowerhead
detail: At traditional Indian weddings  flowers are everywhere. The explosion of colour is wildly festive and the intertwined scents are overwhelming. The flower heads are strung on gigantic leis  which are exchanged by the bride and groom as a sign of mutual respect.

name: plum-twist-1
detail: Plum Twist is a fresh and effervescent fragrance that will leave a sparkling trail.

name: paris-dream
detail: Splashing fruits create a sparkling start with Paris Dream. While tender florals in the heart are gently caressed as the perfume slowly glides down into a heavenly dry down.

name: midnight-moon
detail: Marvel at the bright places of the illuminated night with this alluring scent. Uncover the mystery as the brilliant moon rises. As you embrace the stillness  watch as the darkness becomes brighter.

name: tommy
detail: Tommy captures the diversity of America and Tommy Hilfiger's own widespread following. So put on your backpack and your walking shoes and take a trip across the country with us as we explore sensations and scents that are so very much a part of the American landscape.

name: rock-the-night-for-men
detail: A unique aroma lovingly designed for her most loyal male followers. A very special way of thanking them for their support and the passion they convey in every one of her concerts.

name: la-femme-ungaro-1
detail: La Femme celebrates the glamorous femininity of a cosmopolitan woman  extroverted and extremely intriguing. She feels lighthearted and dynamic  beautiful  desirable and multi-faceted.

name: cranberry-1
detail: Cranberries are one of the only three fruits native to North America and we have our own memories of the cranberry bogs of Massachusetts. With Cranberry from the Demeter Fragrance Library  make your own New England moment...

name: like-a-trip-to-new-york
detail: Essence Like A Trip To New York - as exciting and joyful as a short trip with your best friend. soho  times square  5th avenue. the big apple awaits!

name: parisienne-leau
detail: The portrait of an incredibly free woman. Free to think and to take action. She was not born in Paris  but Paris has adopted her because she knows who to love and live and live and love.

name: tubereuse-mystique-2
detail: Capture the fleeting hour. Tubereuse Mystique is a sensual tuberose harvested at its twilight peak.

name: gilio-2019-1
detail: Gilio is a unique blend of evocative notes. An ode to the city of Florence. A heartfelt celebration of the feminine universe.

name: signorina-holiday-edition-2019
detail: Amo Ferragamo Holiday Edition embraces the holiday spirit with this unique sparkling fragrance  where the magic of Christmas comes alive.

name: signorina-misteriosa-fashion-edition-2020
detail: La Signorina Misteriosa is illuminated in electric blue  an enchanting colour that reflects its bold soul. The regenerated leather bow elevates the visual and tactile refinement of the precious bottle in blocks of colour. Salvatore Ferragamo transforms an iconic Signorina into a unique personality  Signorina Fashion.

name: gardenia-oud-absolu
detail: A solar floral emerges from the depths of smoky  sensual oud and warm amber  evoking a captivating vision of radiant gardenias blooming in the Arabian desert. Unexpected and seductive  the fragrance is enhanced with lingering white musk for a soft finish.

name: noir-kogane
detail: An earthy ahd leathery mysterious vetiver enhanced by a spicy and warm saffron.

name: gorgeous
detail: "My whole career has been about making women feel confident  strong and beautiful. It's about being the best version of yourself. Michael Kors Gorgeous! is like an explosion of optimism and confidence in a single spray " Michael Kors.
ingredients: ['Tuberose', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Orange Blossom', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Pink Pepper', 'Benzoin', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Styrax', 'Suede', 'Tonka Bean']

name: signorina-fashion-edition-2020-1
detail: Elegant and fresh  Signorina Eau de Parfum is dressed in nude tones. The precious bottle in traditional format is reinvented with a bow inspired by the Viva Shoe  heir to Salvatore Ferragamo's iconic Vara shoe. Signorina Fashion Edition reinterprets the classic women's fragrance in a new monochromatic look  ready to be discovered.

name: signorina-ribelle
detail: Young yet determined  fierce yet gracious  independent yet romantic: Signorina Ribelle is a paradox rooted in the real-life of the modern young woman. She perpetuates a silent revolution deciding to live her life to the fullest by celebrating her unique identity  enhancing her qualities and embracing her flaws.

name: boss-bottled-marine-2022-1
detail: This special composition contrasts the refreshing coolness of the ocean with the warmth of the sun and perfectly captures the uplifting mood of a summer’s day along the coast.

name: elegant-vetiver
detail: Elegant Vetiver replicates the moment of pure gratification when stepping into a suit made-to-measure. From head to foot  the full-length figure of a man in vetiver is flattered to the extreme thanks to pistachio  an unexpected gourmand guest star. This olfactory garment stands in a class of its own  like the perfect custom-made suit.

name: vetiver-velours-1
detail: Vetiver is a staple masculine fragrance. Here it is reinvented and refined by softening the sharp  bitter edges to create a more rounded experience. The wearer will enjoy its incomparable complexity.

name: annicke-5
detail: Warm  elegant and mysterious  Annicke 5 is an intoxicating fragrance featuring the liquorice accents of rum alongside the golden nectar of delicious honey. The dry-down leaves behind a sensual oriental trail that rounds off this unexpected and intense perfume.

name: sweet-dreams
detail: Sweet and addictive. Shakira Sweet Dream will evoke a sense of warmth and sweet dreams.

name: bad-boy-cobalt-elixir
detail: Bad Boy Cobalt Elixir is ambery and aromatic with a fresh intensity. It’s a fiery blend of sage  black truffle  and resinous wood. It’s good to be bad.
ingredients: ['Woody Notes', 'Clary Sage', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Black Pepper', 'Ambergris', 'Fir Balsam', 'Oak', 'Vetiver', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Geranium (Egypt)', 'Truffle', 'Leather', 'Vanilla', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: magnific
detail: An exuberant scent that offers everything you need to make you feel empowered and face daily challenges with great elegance and sophistication.

name: dkny-be-delicious-guava-goddess-2022
detail: Deliciously ripe and refreshingly tropical  Guava Goddess is a fragrance destined to make summer 2022 a little sweeter. Effervescent  fruity and free-spirited  it's the only fragrance that has to be delicious in summer.

name: 212-heroes-1
detail: "Feeling young is all about embracing who we are  going with the current  letting ourselves be surprised  taking risks  letting go  and seizing every moment. 212 Heroes conjures our intuitive  rebel and free self " Carolina A. Herrera  Olfactive Director.

name: invictus-platinum
detail: A striking eau de parfum made for epic achievers. The fragrance for those who always rise to the challenge.

name: flowerbomb-ruby-orchid
detail: Breathe in  close your eyes  it’s showtime! Time to unleash your femme fatale. Life is a stage  waiting for your performance. Be the star of the show  express yourself and embrace your sensuality!

name: invictus-victory-elixir-1
detail: Discover Invictus Victory Elixir  the pinnacle of Invictus intensity. A powerful elixir that transcends all boundaries. Now is the time to experience your moment of immortality. A rich  powerful and long-lasting nectar blending spicy woods and biting freshness  for the epic achiever. The fragrance for absolute winners. The ultimate expression of victory. Never stop winning.

name: jawhara-oriental
detail: Discover this beguiling scent in which intense shadows meet warm light in an homage to the rich  storied culture of the Middle East.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Opoponax', 'Spicy Notes', 'Myrrh', 'Vanilla (Bourbon)', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Cedarwood', 'Iris / Orris', 'Woody Ambery Note']

name: perfect-charm-2023
detail: A comforting floral scent with an addictive quality  an unconditional yet harmonious clash of fresh floral and calming smooth accords.

name: bad-boy-cobalt-1
detail: Bad Boy Cobalt celebrates the bond of brotherhood  inspired by the strength of cobalt and its powerful pigmented hue.

name: azzaro-wanted-eau-de-parfum
detail: Azzaro Wanted Eau de Parfum is an invitation to feel the adrenaline.

name: marc-jacobs-perfect-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Uplifting and joyful  this bright eau de toilette brings a fresh olfactive facet and a more intimate interpretation of the original Perfect Eau de Parfum. A luminous floral scent that celebrates the power of being true to yourself.

name: tous-loveme-the-onyx-parfum
detail: The intensity of the fragrance notes is a reflection of the intensity of the precious stone from which it draws its inspiration. LoveMe The Onyx Parfum is a powerful and addictive fragrance.

name: baiser-vole-eau-de-parfum-collector-2021-1
detail: The urgency of living in the present moment is the whirlwind of life. Take a moment to spritz Baiser Volé and allow it to remind you of walks through a springtime garden. Wear it for all occasions  from a day at the office to a night out in town with friends. Its refreshing aromas linger for hours  surrounding you with warmth and comfort. Now in a special bottle.

name: invictus-victory
detail: Failure is not an option. The smell of triumph goes by the name of Invictus Victory  an extreme eau de parfum with an intense duality. Between two forces at odds: freshness and intensity. A signature scent that is simply unstoppable. Victory is within your reach.

name: new-york-forever
detail: New York Forever honors the 20th anniversary of Bond No. 9  with none other than liquid gold. A smell of luxury and authenticity  this scent leaves a memorable trace in its wake  representative of the everlasting legacy of the beloved city Bond No. 9 was originally created for.

name: leau-revee-deliya
detail: L'Eau Rêvée d'Eliya revisits a tropical forest and imagines a utopian jungle  vibrant after the rain: a new and innocent garden  filled with mythical birds and unknown sounds. Its atmosphere  intriguing  warm and fragrant  is the starting point of a radiant juice mixing exotic flowers combined with tuberose and violet.

name: new-york-forever-swarovski-disco-ball-2023
detail: Our sexy new anniversary tribute fragrance gets a fabulously festive limited-edition revamp reminiscent of a tinsel-strewn Studio 54. Bond No. 9 embellished the iconic Silhouette Bottle with a mix of bold tile-shaped Swarovski crystals that dance and shimmer like a disco ball on your vanity. A powerful fragrance for a powerful city.

name: marc-jacobs-perfect-intense-1
detail: An uplifting ode to individuality  Perfect Intense explores a unique facet of self-love  encouraging everyone to celebrate and revel in the powerful beauty of being real and being bold.

name: flowerbomb-pearly-coral-pink-2021-1
detail: The ultimate floral fantasy  this iconic perfume for women is a whirl of intoxicating flowers. Presented in a limited-edition pearly coral pink bottle  a glamorous homage to the transformational power of beauty  positivity and the creative spirit.

name: crimson-rocks-1
detail: "While creating this fragrance  I was inspired by the crimson colour of the Rock Rose of Al Hajar and the shade of its mountains  illuminated by the last rays of the April sun " Domitille Michalon-Bertier  Perfumer.

name: lady-million-royal-1
detail: A bold and glamorous scent for the sensual woman. It's time to shine  you are the queen.

name: flowerbomb-mariage-2021-1
detail: An explosion of floral sensations  Flowerbomb enchants the world. An exceptional trail of volume. Sublime  delicious and addictive.

name: luna-confiante
detail: Celebrate the freedom to feel confident in your own skin with Luna Confiante!
ingredients: ['Moss', 'Pear', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Bergamot', 'Frangipani', 'Freesia', 'Jasmine', 'Musk', 'Pink Pepper', 'Rose', 'Vetiver', 'Woody Notes', 'Ambrette Seed']

name: lov-u
detail: This fragrance will tell beautiful and modern love stories of couples who really respect each other  who see love in the small affectionate gestures  and who build that feeling for a lifetime.
ingredients: ['Raspberry', 'Rose Petal', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Water Lily', 'Pink Pepper', 'Champagne Rosé', 'Cream (Chantilly)', 'Vanilla', 'Almond Milk', 'Toffee Apple']

name: eudora-unique
detail: Eudora Unique is inspired by the luxurious Kir Royale drink of French royalty  a sweet liqueur fragrance with great ballast  intensity and sensuality  revealing a combination of exclusive scents.
ingredients: ['Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Brown Sugar', 'Champagne Rosé', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Amber', 'Blackberry', 'Blueberry', 'Cedarwood', 'Champagne', 'Musk', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: perry-woman-1
detail: Style is individual. It's a unique thumbprint. It defines a persona and can even make you immortal. Discover the style of Perry Woman.

name: 212-vip-rose
detail:
A vibrant opening of Champagne Rosé is complemented by a light and seductive heart of peach blossom. Luxe Queen Wood and radiant amber complete the playful  feminine base.
A new generation of 212 comes to life with youthful glamour and fearless authenticity in 212 VIP Rosé  with its feminine tone and fresh  dynamic scent.

name: x-se-cruising-area
detail: It's the smell of the nocturnal myth. It's that hidden  underground space  with inaccessible and dark passages  with mouldy walls and ephemeral pleasure  where personal stardom is abandoned to leave room for one's own nakedness without ever questioning who one really is.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Patchouli', 'Amyris', 'Vetiver', 'Hot Spices', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Woody Notes', 'Black Pepper', 'Clove', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Smoke']

name: au-dela-du-noir
detail: "Among the great vintages of the Côte de Nuits  there is one whose bouquet impregnated my memory for ever. In this creation  the reminiscences of this exceptional black wave with red reflections match the animal incandescence of Kyara Wood  beyond black " Pierre Guillaume.

name: aoud-melody-1
detail: A perfect blend of luxurious  delicate florals and warm spices  rounded off with a dry touch of sensual woods.

name: patchouli-on-fire
detail: A one of a kind mixture of fresh citrus accords and aromatic scents. Activate your full potential with Patchouli on Fire.

name: tobacco-leather
detail: Inspired by freedom  Tobacco Leather is a royal fragrance that is lavish in luxury.

name: vol-870-yul-cdg-1
detail: This perfume expresses the beginning of a beautiful journey that bridges the gap between the New World and the Old Continent. Time stands still for a while until the pull of Europe grows stronger and leads to a soft landing on rich notes that create a naive yet sensual  bold yet tamed scent.
ingredients: ['Hot Spices', 'Amber', 'Osmanthus', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Apricot', 'Peach', 'Bergamot', 'Clary Sage', 'Pine Needles', 'Cedar leaf', 'Cypress', 'Leather', 'Resins', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: intense-cedrat-boise
detail: Fresh  fruity yet utterly masculine  Cedrat Boise has been a constant source of excitement in our collection since its launch. Discover its intense version. The one to choose when you can only choose one.

name: turathi-brown
detail: Turathi Brown is a fresh and spicy fragrance for the refined and elegant gentleman.

name: amberesque
detail: Amberesque is a golden fragrance with warm  precious accords.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Woody Notes', 'Hot Spices', 'Vetiver', 'Geranium', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Rose Damascena', 'Raspberry leaves', 'Bergamot', 'Fruity Notes', 'Oakmoss', 'Orange', 'Patchouli', 'Sugar']

name: whispers-of-truth-noir
detail: Whispers of Truth Noir takes you on a seductive and explosive journey of passion. It ignites your soul with blazing flares of erotic embers and euphoric bliss. Get ready to explore the world of sensuality.

name: cuba-1
detail: So close to America  yet so far away and exotic to most Americans. Cuba evokes the rich  vibrant nightlife of Havana: warm  inviting and sensual.

name: dark
detail: Black color and the world of seduction  darkness  mystery  and intrigue  that evokes inspiration.

name: curious-amber
detail: Curious Amber reinvents the lushness of a classic. Polished yet primal  with amber at the heart for an addictive fragrance.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Saffron', 'Woody Notes', 'Benzoin', 'Cocoa', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coriander', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Rose', 'Vanilla', 'Hot Spices', 'Bergamot', 'Pepper', 'Rum', 'Tobacco Leaf']

name: tonka-sarrapia-extrait-75
detail: Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 reveals the tonka bean in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain with a most addictive signature.

name: the-porter-house
detail: When you need to retreat and break free from social boundaries  The Porter House is your switch into a moment of mindfulness.
ingredients: ['Hot Spices', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Green Notes', 'White Flowers', 'Amber', 'Vanilla', 'Coconut Milk', 'Sandalwood', 'Violet Leaves']

name: bvlgari-man-in-black
detail: Like Vulcan  the charismatic Roman god of fire  this fragrance harnesses the power of the Mediterranean and the extreme unbridled strength of the earth. It is designed to be worn by a man who embodies a very modern and unmistakable masculinity. The mood is  like the quintessential Bulgari man  inspiring and triumphant.

name: sand-aoud-1
detail: This as an audacious and alluring ambery scent. Slightly bitter yet surprisingly gourmand with a hint of darkness

name: tres-nuit-lyric-pour-homme
detail: An explosive and extrovert fresh  spicy scent for men.

name: cuba
detail: So close to America  yet so far away and exotic to most Americans; exotic is the perfect starting point for this fragrance. We focus on the rich and vibrant nightlife of Havana: warm  welcoming and sensual.

name: cinnamon-bun
detail: This scent is for everyone who gets excited when they smell the aroma of cinnamon rolls.

name: 212-vip-red-rose-1
detail: VIP  Rosé Red means supporting a charity cause and combating AIDS in Africa. Friendship and collaboration are among the values promoted by 212 VIP.

name: fancy-love-jessica-simpson-1
detail: "Romance has never been more important to me  so I wanted to celebrate that special feeling with this new fragrance. Fancy Love is fresh and pure  like a timeless piece of white lace  always pretty and innocent. This fragrance has a touch of passion because  after all  a girl has to be a little flirty sometimes." Jessica Simpson.

name: dont-tell-jasmine
detail: The seemingly effortless seduction of jasmine  a direct emotional connection to the senses.

name: magic-woman-1
detail: Whether angelic-innocent or devilish-provocative  this Magic Woman will seduce you. Magic Woman will bring out the sexiest in you.
ingredients: ['Strawberry', 'Passion Fruit', 'Sandalwood', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Violet', 'Champagne Rosé', 'Melon', 'Red Currant', 'Musk', 'Patchouli']

name: passion-fruit-2
detail: A delicious scent that blends juicy red berries with the joyful appeal of exotic passion fruit and the green fruity notes of golden quince for a sparkling  fruity burst.

name: 767-original-carrera-jeans-donna-camouflage
detail: The scent of an intense and restless spirit with an overwhelming personality who enchants and hypnotises.

name: passion-fruite
detail: A lush bouquet of sweet fruits.

name: eau-de-juice-happy-place-1
detail: Keep it fresh with Happy Place!

name: passiflora-2
detail: A perfume from paradise with an abundance of exotic notes. The passion fruit and flower with zesty green notes make for a sparkling fresh and very mischievous scent.

name: libertine
detail: Sexy and provocative  Libertine is inspired by history and the English Monarchy.

name: bouquet-damour-1
detail: Bouquet d'Amour is a graceful and luminous fragrance  sensual  delicate  enveloping and truly elegant.

name: dolce-lily-1
detail: Expressing the authentic and caring side of the Dolce girl  this luminous scent embodies her evolution to a self-confident young woman. Always on-the-go  yet enjoying the simple pleasures in life  her unique character and energy are perfectly captured by the vibrant scent of Dolce Lily.

name: armani-code-a-list-2018
detail: The Code A-List has a natural magnetic personality. He seduces with his charming presence and leaves a sensual trail in his wake.

name: black-label-women
detail: Black and white: contrary  and yet the perfect unity. Puristic  and not a bit boring. The classic scent that embodies pure elegance and manages to make a clear statement in its simplicity. One that finds itself in the new scents of s.Oliver Black Label.

name: pink-heart-v6-1
detail: A new floral dimension lead by a single protagonist - the narcissus. At once hallucinogenic and hypnotic. It transports us into a dance of ecstasy that opens with playful notes  into an opulent bouquet. This floral explosion mingles on the skin for a mesmerising ride.

name: sloane-ravers
detail: Inspired by the tribes of London's Sloane Street  Sloane Ravers revisits the great British tradition with an avant-garde spirit. It blends boldness and timeless chic through an unexpected alchemy of sweet and woody notes.

name: santal-greenery-1
detail: “The union of two opposites  yet perfectly and poetically balanced: resilient sandalwood with the lively  green leaf of fig. The everlasting and the ephemeral together ” Nisrine Grillié  co-Perfumer.

name: acqua-di-pino-fougere
detail: Acqua di Pino Fougère is an intense and enveloping fragrance for a man of undeniable virility and elegance.

name: petitgrain-paraguay
detail: Petitgrain Paraguay is a fragrance of classic elegance with a modern twist. The vibrant freshness of citrus fruits creates a joyful hint of sparkle and vitality enhanced by the vegetal note of petitgrain  giving a subtle earthy undertone to the composition.

name: tapis-volant
detail: Born from the weightless dream of imaginary flight; like an enchanted vehicle of a solar journey with aerial magic and breathtaking manoeuvers. This sensational fragrance will make you dizzy with its never-ending silken waves.

name: desert-suave-1
detail: "Désert Suave is a warm breath. Essences of oasis stir the mind. A gentle mirage of the senses." - Philippe Di Méo

name: fizzy-green-tea
detail: Fizzy Green Tea is an energetic cocktail of citrus and green tea  perfect for summer.

name: sutumn
detail: Sutumn evokes summer  lush trees and sunny days  cool waterfalls and juicy fruit.

name: mistral-fleur-de-vichy
detail: An elegant fragrance opening on fresh  invigorating citrus top notes and on a heart of marine notes for a splash effect and a fresh sweetness of the sea breeze on an ambery base.

name: vetiver-santal-de-cuir
detail: A bouquet of sandalwood and amber notes  unveiled on a bed of jasmine  vetiver and tonka bean. A fragrance of rare intensity  divinely mysterious and devilishly enigmatic.

name: moncler-pour-femme-1
detail: This scent evokes a crisp  cool ode to the great outdoors wrapped in an opulent cocoon of warmth.

name: tea-mountain
detail: The spring rain is falling  making tea and entertaining guests  sitting quietly and listening to the rain. Stroll through the tea hills after the rain and enjoy the fragrant orchid. In good times  go out and pick spring tea.

name: praise-for-life
detail: Living in a concrete jungle  how can we free ourselves to stop and watch? Let's go back to our mother’s hotbed in a sweet dream  when the umbilical cord carried love and hope. Her soft arms are nurturing great expectations. All of a sudden  eyebrows are no longer tense  minds are no longer chaotic. Power up and get ready to move on.

name: ch-pasion-for-her-1
detail: What would life be without a touch of passion? For Carolina Herrera  it's impossible to conceive. Since the creation of her fashion house in 1981  the New York designer has created a universe of fashion  fragrance and beauty that rejects boredom and celebrates joy  enthusiasm and spontaneity as vital attributes. Her fragrances for women and men  CH Passion  pay homage to that philosophy with a clear objective: to celebrate the Joy of Life that empowers us all to overcome any circumstance. "CH Pasión fragrances are a shot of creative energy for women and men  a love letter to the colours that define our House and an exercise in optimism that invites us to be intrepid. Herrera  Creative Director.

name: alien-man-mirage-2020-1
detail: Alien Man Mirage is enhanced by the powerful  sophisticated aromas of leather and patchouli  the fragrance leaves behind a carnal  luminous trail. A fragrance radiating with power.

name: neroli-bergamote-de-denim
detail: Néroli & Bergamote by Denim is a fragrance with a luminous top note with spicy  sparkling and invigorating citrus and bergamot notes. The floral heart reveals a bouquet of mimosa and roses combined with an ambery base note that gives it the character of a modern and colourful cologne.

name: auter
detail: Auter evokes the autumn solstice  crows and sparrows  spinning winds and falling leaves.

name: white-heart-v7-1
detail: White Heart v.7 is about love and it's powers and dualities.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Aldehyde', 'Gardenia', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Cardamom', 'Plum', 'Lavender (Provence)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Incense / Olibanum']

name: liquide-gold-2022
detail: In the final transmutation  my gold transforms you  regenerates you with the brilliance of its warm light  its purity  and turns you into a precious  solar being. From my yellow nugget in its uncut state  I melt and pour into an intense ingot that’s pure gold  into sacred  royal objects  jewellery and ornaments.

name: stussy-laguna-beach-1
detail: Stüssy has collaborated with Comme des Garçon  Parfums on a fragrance that captures the mood  essence  and lifestyle of Laguna Beach.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-naughty-leather-1
detail: Naughty Leather embarks on a game of unbridled passion. The fragrance bursts with its primal and irresistible notes. From a seductive trail that boasts an irresistible and elegant charm emerges an unmistakably animalic skin-on-skin sensation.

name: halley-1
detail: Halley's comet is the most famous and brightest of the periodic comets known to date. It is the bringer of many mysteries and the collective mind and the heavenly body most capable of influencing our earthly lives  just like the creation to which it so kindly offers his name. Halley is a fragrance of irresistible and fatally seductive power  emanating a brilliant  luminous trail just like the famous comet that soars across our skies.

name: original-oud
detail: If I were a country? It would be Laos  in a deep forest where only a few rays of light break through.

name: precious-oud
detail: Precious Oud is a majestic celebration of oud  which reveals its true strength and sensuality. Both mellow and intense  this woody and floral fragrance blends into a subtle alchemy.

name: acqua-di-parma-oud-spice-2
detail: This fragrance elevates to art the sun-filled transparency of citrus fruits with surprising spicy hints  revealing in a rich perfume journey the depth of oud and enhancing its unique nature.

name: soul-of-oud
detail: Inspired by the essence of elegance  Soul of Oud is like a silk dressing gown  the wind carrying the scent of flower petals into the air.

name: jasmin-du-malabar
detail: The scent of jasmine is intense  full and enchanting: the essence of love. Jasmine is called the King of essential oils and rose is the Queen.

name: french-bouquet-1
detail: Exclusive to Harrods  French Bouquet is a tribute to the legacy of French perfumes of the 1970s. It showcases the authentic Parisian sophistication and passionate nights of the capital  embodying the ultimate in French elegance.

name: miss-charming
detail: The perfume of a virgin witch  provocative  elegant and sensual. One instant  holding up the pressures of the world and the next  crying hot tears over the death of Enzo  her goldfish…! A fragrance that makes up ingenuousness and lucidity. A fragrance with a powerful  rich and sensual wake. Charming!

name: secret-amber-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Sensuous  Secret Amber is a mysterious fragrance with a very modern type of sensuality.

name: aqua-universalis-forte-1
detail: From Eau de Toilette to Eau de Parfum is only one step  but it is a decisive step  which many perfumers do not like to take unless they consider it really worthwhile. Composing yet another score for Aqua Universalis was a musical challenge for Francis Kurkdjian: and forte is the key.

name: rose-oud-3
detail: Rose Oud is a fresh fragrance with a touch of sensual notes. It is part of the Museum Collection  which uses classic raw materials and olfactory families from Europe and Asia  reminiscent of the fragrance library of an ancient perfumer.

name: rose-rhubarb
detail: Rose bushes grow from a rhubarb patch. A scent that sparks a childlike joy within. Pink to green like rhubarb stalks  this is a rose that’s bursting with colour.

name: evernia
detail: Wear Evernia for any occasion when you want to feel seductive.
ingredients: ['Oakmoss', 'Rose (Morocco)', 'Cardamom', 'Freesia', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Violet', 'Bergamot', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Coriander', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Musk', 'Opoponax', 'Pink Pepper', 'Sandalwood', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: mogador
detail: Mogador is a beautiful Moroccan island whose symbol is the rose. In Mogador the perfume we have blended three of the great ladies of the rose world  Dades  Bulgarian and May. The most coveted  velvety and rich roses create this iridescent modern perfume.

name: rose-blanche
detail: Rose Blanche has been designed for a certain state of mind  or a great occasion.

name: rose-oud-43
detail: Rose Oud is inspired by the intense world of the Orient. The scent bestows character and persistence  resulting in a sensual and noble fragrance.

name: pink-roses-1
detail: Enchanting and royal  Pink Roses is as delicate as the eponymous flower  embodying the ultimate femininity.

name: milieu-rosa-1
detail: Milieu Rosa is characterised by the layering of petals from top to bottom. Equal parts bright  soft and woody  this luminous floral composition blends notes of timeless tenderness.

name: desert-rose-1
detail: Inspired by the unique relationship of “Le Petit Prince” from Antoine de St. Exupéry and his beloved flower  this fragrance is dedicated to all men and women sharing this adoration. “Desert Rose” subtle balance between freshness and warmth makes this timeless love flower contemporary and “special” to everyone.

name: powdery-mimosa
detail: A beautiful fragrance  fresh and elegant at the same time.

name: cocoa-cashmere
detail: Blissful. Like the first taste of a decadent dessert.

name: woody-blanc-1
detail: Woody Blanc evokes the true feelings of satisfaction and long-lasting fresh scent.
ingredients: ['Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Pear', 'Apple', 'Rose', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Green Notes', 'Musk']

name: corn-poppy-iris-1
detail: The day you had an extravagant dream in autumn still lingers in winter.

name: lily-of-the-beach
detail: Carefree. Like bottled sunshine. Escape to an ocean beach on the perfect summer day. Lily of the Beach has the ability to transport you back to a special time  and smelling it after that time  might recall those memories and wonderful moments.

name: ikks-young-man-endless-paradise-2023
detail: Discover the Italian coast with Little Paradise. An extraordinarily free-spirited eau de toilette!

name: je-men-fous
detail: The wind picks up  we take a corner fast and then up into the hills. Sunglasses  warm skin. We are being beautiful together. So what? Maybe the party finished. Maybe we need a ride home. That’s cool  let’s just walk. Let’s hitch a ride. Let’s swim in dawn  get made new. Let’s see what happens. Je M'En Fous is a brief impression of Santa Monica in June 1999.

name: armani-code-colonia
detail: "I think a man is elegant when he is discreet in his choice of clothes and knows how to wear even casual outfits with ease and effortlessness". Giorgio Armani. Elegant  charming  powerful  irresistible. Code.
ingredients: ['Bergamot', 'Orange Blossom', 'Amberwood', 'Mandarin', 'Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Clary Sage', 'Heliotrope', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Notes']

name: fleur-de-tiare-ylang
detail: A natural and organic perfumed universe  joyful and bright.

name: verde-erba-i-1
detail: Pontile Sant'Elena at daybreak. The morning air is crisp and delicate: she revels in an empowering sensation of freedom. Verde Erba I captures this moment of grace with a rich springlike bouquet.

name: rem-lacqua
detail: Celebrate 20 years of Rem with Rem L'Acqua! Imagine a fragrance that feels like a burst of joy! A real beam of sunshine. A luminous creation filled with summer radiance revealing a modern cologne effect  orchestrated by vibrant tangy notes.

name: appelez-moi-paris-seychelles-1
detail: Solar flowers and warm sand  Left Bank-style. In this white floral  blending exoticism with the allure and distinction of the Saint-Germaine-de-Prés  the perfumer bridges two olfactory universes  returning to the Left Bank holiday by the Indian Ocean  a Parisienne carrying back the essence of the tropical beach on her skin. A delicate composition  conjuring warm  salty skin under a classic cashmere sweater.

name: sakura-imperial-1
detail: Ikigai is a Japanese term that indicates the reason for being  the thing that gives us the strength to wake up every morning. Sakura Imperial is this: a guide able to take us through the magic of cherry blossoms in Japan. This fragrance is an invitation to seek your own reason for being thanks to a perfect cohesion between raw materials of different nature.
ingredients: ['Cherry Blossom', 'Lemon', 'Tonka Bean', 'Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Apple Blossom', 'Jasmine', 'Raspberry Blossom', 'Blackcurrant Flowers', 'Chamomile', 'Cypress', 'Sandalwood', 'Black Pepper']

name: replica-sailing-day
detail: Dive. The deeper you go  the cooler it feels. Swim back to the surface. Open your eyes  the endless sea  infinite blue lies before you. A warm breeze guides the sailing boat towards the horizon. The invigorating memory of a sailing day.

name: mmmm
detail: “Mmm... Behind that sound lies a world of hidden pleasures that goes beyond words. As my grandmother used to say: 'a little too much is just enough!' " Romano Ricci  Olfactive Director.

name: pleasures-aqua
detail: Become awakened with sparkling dewy top notes creating a crisp juicy freshness. Luminous floralcy grows from the heart  blossoming smoothly inviting the delicate  sheer sensuality. Warmth builds in the drydown like the gentle haze of sunlight against the sea to leave a tender sensation of creamy golden sensuousness.

name: freckled-and-beautiful-1
detail: Sweetness  sweat on the upper lip  and freedom. Sneaking time to ourselves. We don’t know what will happen next. That means we can stretch out and take up this entire moment. Come play! We would have so much fun.

name: atitlan
detail: Enter the earth  enter under the earth. Imagine these ramifications of forces  these encounters of smells  this unprecedented fermentation of phenomena. Alluviums  crystallizations  vegetations  transformations that lead to the creation of the most diverse realities from the diamond to the hummingbird  from the blue lily of the Persian springs  through the rocks of pure sulfur of Iceland and up to at the edge of the world  on the flank of volcano Atitlàn.

name: nectar-love-1
detail: Experience the allure of Nectar Love as it bottles the heart-stopping moment when eyes meet and the whole world stops. Like a bee captivated by the irresistible draw to a lush blooming flower  Nectar Love captures nature's pull of undeniable attraction.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Vanilla', 'Nectarine', 'Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Freesia', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Solar Notes', 'Beeswax', 'Cedarwood', 'Grapefruit', 'Mandarin', 'Mirabelle (Plum)', 'Neroli']

name: night-dose-1
detail: A mystical journey through the deep dark night  where two cultures combine.
ingredients: ['Mirabelle (Plum)', 'Plum', 'Jasmine', 'Patchouli', 'Cedarwood', 'Sandalwood', 'Amber', 'Apple', 'Grapes', 'Saffron', 'Tonka Bean', 'Animalic Notes', 'Coconut', 'Heliotrope', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Peach', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Rose Damascena']

name: de-los-santos-1
detail: Earthen notes of cistus flourish in dry heat. In homage to the traditions of Día de los Muertos and All Saints’ Day  De Los Santos captures the transcendent power of coming together in collective ceremonies  translating scent into a new ritual of remembrance.

name: lady-million-empire-collector-edition-1
detail: Are you looking for a way to be noticed? If so  this deliciously bold  feminine scent is perfect. Like a gorgeous pink diamond reflecting glamour in all directions  the Lady Million Empire perfume Collector's Edition is sure to cause a sensation.

name: bodytalk-woman
detail: When the language of love is transformed into a fragrance experience.

name: re-nero
detail: A conceptual fragrance dedicated to the Age of Enlightenment. A historical period that represents a renaissance and a break with old patterns when light replaces darkness.

name: chloe-nomade-eau-de-parfum
detail: Chloé Nomad is a modern interpretation of a perfumery classic but with a more daring and adventurous side. It's all about crossing the next frontier  always pushing the boundaries of who you are.

name: lucky-charm
detail:
Life’s a gamble  so roll the dice and see what happens! Whether you’re superstitious or not  there’s no harm in always having an ace up your sleeve. Cue the Lucky Charm fragrance. Or should we say  Fortuna herself? Like an unexpected breeze laden with the scent of iris flowers and hope  she comes and goes at the eleventh hour. And although she likes to be courted by all  she’s been known to favour the bold  enveloping them in a comforting vanilla 
embrace before releasing them with a thrilling plum mirabelle kiss. She’s Lady Luck  or summer in a bottle if you will  and as filled with possibility as a balmy night out on the town in your best frock.

name: magnolia-bliss-1
detail: It was a summer afternoon  one of those summers that linger deliciously long. A scent of magnolia wafted through the air as if suspending time and dancing in her long wild hair. With her crown of flowers and bare feet  she looked like a Janis Joplin muse. Magnolia Bliss is the Flower Power spirit embodied in a fragrance!

name: panama-sospeso
detail: Sospeso's inspiration comes from an ancient Neapolitan custom: people used to leave a pre-paid coffee  called "caffè sospeso". A gesture of great kindness towards humanity.

name: saint-2
detail: Created by Kat Von D  tattoo artist  reality-TV star  and owner of High Voltage Tattoo  this edgy color collection exemplifies old-Hollywood glamour with an L.A. vibe. From pin-up perfection to rocker chic  this limited-edition lineup allows you to tap into your bad-girl side and unleash your inner artist.

name: dahlia-divin-eau-de-parfum
detail: Dahlia Divin is the epitome of Haute Couture elegance and divine femininity. Tinged with the sensual radiance of jasmine sambac  the intensely sensual eau de parfum reveals luminous  golden notes.

name: rumba
detail: Coming from the street with all the vitality of its red heart this Latin dance call the Rumba develops the intensity of most cheerful  sensual and dancing suggestions. Rumba is the amazing elegance of Latin energy.

name: scusami
detail: Haunted by remorse  in the raging of destiny. And the anger grows. Unexpected wounds mark silence. Violence and steam. Nobody wants to talk. Ignorance. Don't forget to ask for forgiveness. I'm sorry.
ingredients: ['Freesia', 'Amber', 'Mirabelle (Plum)', 'Heliotrope', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Bergamot', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon', 'Cedarwood', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Sandalwood', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Ice Cube Effect']

name: tom-tailor-for-her-1
detail: Tom Tailor stands for always saying 'yes'. Yes to life and to yourself. The for Her scent embodies this attitude and radiates sporty elegance for all adventures which life brings.

name: forever-7
detail: A delicately fresh  and subtly verdant floral fragrance that evokes memories of sweet spring days.

name: plum-japonais
detail: "I have always been fascinated by unusual ingredients steeped in exotic cultures. The Ume plum is an exotic and exquisite ingredient that has great significance in Eastern culture; in Japan and China it is a sacred symbol of spring. I wanted to create a fragrance around the Ume  because it has an exquisite texture and aroma. Tom Ford

name: so-new-york-1
detail: Uptown or downtown  New Yorkers have always loved chocolate. This scent is ideal for the chocoholic who loves her rich dessert to have bite and spice. A whiff of New York's consuming passion above-all-else for chocolate desserts and frothy lattes.

name: tobacco-tonka-bean
detail: Inspired by the resinous richness and creamy sweetness of vanilla  which allows for a decadent fragrance centred on the extraction of the pods  highlighting dark and sensual notes.

name: lady-million-empire
detail: Lady MILLION Empire perfume for women. Ultra-insolent  floral chypre created by Paco Rabanne. How do you build an empire? Set your own rules. Queen without sharing. Empowered girl. Dare to do anything. All the time. Wish for your destiny. Right now. Criticized? Who cares? Diamonds? Wear them. Lady MILLION Empire Perfume. Sparkling magnolia notes over addictive cognac scent. Deliciously insolent. Feel the intoxicating intoxication of success.

name: max-mara-le-parfum
detail: MaxMara Le Parfum is a fragrance that every woman can make her own  a fragrance that enhances her world with sensuality and a touch of originality.

name: naughty-fruity
detail: As bold as it is attractive  Naughty Fruity is a multi-faceted eau de parfum that delights the senses and embodies features that are both a delicious and illicit contrast of aromas.

name: for-her-rose-musc
detail: "I was passionate about the idea of creating a fragrance using rose  the quintessential symbol of refinement  and musc  which is more raw. The process of finding the right fragrance was a challenge and I think we overcame it " Narciso Rodriguez.

name: chloe-eau-de-parfum-2008-1
detail: A fresh  feminine fragrance suitable for a free spirit with an innate sense of elegance.

name: velvet-rose-1
detail: Velvet Rose is the Designers' homage to the Mediterranean rose. Nourished by the freshest of water and the brightest of sun  it is characterised by its intensity of brightness  of tonality and of scents.

name: rendez-vous-a-moscou
detail: This is Moscow: dignified and warm. We dedicate this fragrance to this amazing city. The perfect fragrance for those who want to bring a little bit of the third Rome into their sillage.

name: rosie
detail: Rosie is inspired by the cooler months and by BRJ founder Rosie Jane's favorite flower  the Rose.  The fragrance is designed to feel perfectly sheer even under the layers of winter.

name: eau-des-4-reines-rose
detail: The story could be a legend of the Pays de Forcalquier. The daughters of the Count of Forcalquier were as beautiful as the four roses they caressed. Each of these daughters married a king. Their favourite roses are blended and concentrated in Eau des 4 Reines  a fresh  delicate and velvety perfume with soft fruity notes.

name: grace-by-grace-coddington
detail: “I so don't like change. I've always loved the smell of roses and the first fragrance I ever wore was rose water. Over time  I've experimented with everyone else's version of rose and even got sidetracked by some others along the way. Now I've arrived back at the point I first started  with Rose. Except for this time  it's my Rose ” Grace Coddington.

name: sahara-rose
detail: Sahara Rose is the perfect fragrance for men and women. Rich  vibrant  refreshing and uplifting. Deep  rich and rare like a rose found in the African Sahara Desert.

name: intimacy-noir-1
detail: Intimacy Noir combines charisma  femininity and sensuality with ingredients that set the tone for this contemporary  feminine fragrance.

name: lacoste-pour-femme-legere
detail: Inspired by the timeless and elegant woman  the classic fragrance of Lacoste Pour Femme champions the perfect style worn with an unconventional attitude. The Lacoste Pour Femme woman embraces life with enthusiasm and grace and possesses timeless innate flair and confidence  now complemented by a hint of daring Joie de vivre  enchanting all those around her.

name: hero-2
detail: Express your inner hero. Follow your instinct. Be confident as a man  but also embrace your sensitivity with Burberry Hero.

name: lacoste-pour-femme-intense-1
detail: Lacoste pour Femme Intense is a concentration of femininity  a cosmopolitan essence infused with that unique “ Elégance à la française ”. A perfume that asserts a personality without arrogance  combining softness with boldness and self-confidence with perfectly handled elegance.

name: burning-for-oud
detail: A passionate and fierce aroma that consumes you from the inside.

name: lacoste-pour-femme
detail: Today  women feel liberated enough to choose their lifestyle in the moment  saying "this is who I am and what I want". They are free spirits who want to go with the flow and act on impulse. Genuine  open and committed  they try everything once and always enjoy where life takes them.

name: lagerfeld-classic-grey
detail: An ode to masculinity  Lagerfeld Classic Grey combines sensuality and modernity in an eau de toilette that has the makings of a great classic while embodying the codes of modern perfumery.

name: gentleman-givenchy-society
detail: Givenchy imagines the gentlemen of today united within a contemporary and disruptive Gentleman Society reflecting multi-faceted masculinity  resolutely facing the future. What do its members have in common? Values ​​of respect  openness  attention to others  and elegance. Regardless of their origin or their past  what brings them together is their know-how and off-the-beaten-track attitude  which has inspired a unifying fragrance unlike any other.

name: silver-scent-infinite-silver
detail: An infinitely sensual fragrance. An irresistible weapon of seduction.

name: mysterious-rose-elixir
detail: This iridescent elixir comes from a luscious enchanted rose whose velvety petals unfurl one by one. Mysterious Rose takes you on a glorious daytime journey into the sunset.

name: kenzo-world-eau-de-toilette
detail: A madcap performance like a breath of fresh air  encountering women to dare to be themselves and not mind what others think.

name: rose-sheherazade-1
detail: At dawn  the stars disappear  taking with them the last whispers of a swirling party. I remember the sounds  smells and colours of a dreamy night. Still echoing in my years are the swirling notes of an orchestra praising a thousand and one legends. At dawn  I recognise in the morning dew  its evanescent elegance  its immortal beauty. Rose Sheherazade

name: ginza
detail: Guided by the idea that everything already exists inside us  Shiseido offers Ginza as a fragrance that heightens the most vibrant and powerful facets of femininity. A sacred synthesis of contradictions: subtle yet intense  delicate yet strong  wise yet passionate. To achieve the utmost harmony.

name: lolitaland
detail: As an invitation in the new garden of wonders  a new lush and vegetal Eden. A journey to the heart of the perfume that awakens the senses. A generous and festive nature with notes alternately sparkling and airy  floral and velvety  sweet and delicious.

name: mon-petit-1
detail: Wonderfully fresh and sweet  Mon Petit Eau de Senteur embodies the very essence of childhood.

name: oh-ma-biche
detail: Oh Ma Biche is Lolita Lempicka's bold and captivating eau de parfum. A sparkling and fruity bouquet that awakens the senses and emotions.

name: burberry-her-london-dream-1
detail: Burberry Her London Dream translates the energy of London and is a tribute to the free-spirited London woman. Her London Dream is for spontaneous  vibrant girls with a romantic heart.

name: kenzo-world-intense
detail: An expression of femininity  strong  powerful  and determined. "A rich floral explosion in a striking bottle expressing the dual nature of the KENZO woman " Humberto Leon.

name: elie-saab-le-parfum-essentiel
detail: The secret to her inner glow is her authenticity. Always radiant  addicted to success  she is a doer  a traveler  and a ceiling-breaker. Yet she knows how to get back to essentials. When to escape the hectic city to reconnect to her roots. Her values. Her self.

name: joop-homme-eau-de-parfum
detail: Joop! crosses the limits of addiction with this dark and decidedly mysterious fragrance. An overdose of sensuality for a man of undeniable charisma.

name: milk-musk-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Golden shards of sunlight bathe an eternal embrace. A tender handshake and a cashmere-soft kiss. Cheerful bundles of down create blissful warmth  scented with silvery musk and comforting vanilla. Nourish your senses with a pure olfactory union.

name: elie-saab-le-parfum-royal
detail: Royal has a unique scent: Le Parfum Royal. Bold  powerful  feminine  a fragrance for all women to reveal their strength  power  and aura.

name: ginza-intense
detail: A captivating scent for the powerful and passionate woman.

name: high-tea
detail: A scent inspired by the distinctly British tradition of afternoon tea. A light-filled moment of peaceful reflection set amongst grand manor houses.

name: armani-code-parfum
detail: Armani Code Parfum connects with the contemporary man  a man who chooses to rewrite the code of masculinity  a man who is continually moving forward.

name: shadescents-candy-yum-yum-1
detail: Electric fruits  a hint of rose and an attractive lacquer are at the heart of Candy Yum-Yum. The gourmand aspect of the fragrance makes it irresistible and addictive  creating a delicious finish.

name: vanillade
detail: Citrus  sweet flowers and resins in a graceful and elegant composition that is never cloying.

name: wild-essence-weil
detail: Wild Essence is fantastically surprising  citrus and spicy notes melt to contrast and harmonise with the exalting and sensual base notes.

name: ryder-1
detail: Ryder is a fragrance suitable for everyone.

name: lemon-in-zest-lugano-1
detail: Lemon in Zest is a unique fragrance influenced by the city of Lugano and the iconic Italian liqueur Limoncello  a sour but refreshing liqueur. The scent has a fresh and unique harmony.

name: tilleul-cedrat
detail: In the shade of a lime tree  the sparkling notes of citron and violet leaves bring a welcome freshness  while the Provençal sun envelops us in its embrace of perfumed flowers.

name: meu-bebe-carinho-1
detail: A comforting scent that will make the moments between you and your baby even more special.

name: sun-song
detail: Sun Song sings of the good weather and the sun's rays reflected in the sea. The absolute joy of the summer sun caressing the skin.

name: vetyver-1
detail: Vetyver by Chantecaille. A fresh  free  mature and clean fragrance. As appealing to men as it is to women. It is an incredibly chic and distinctive fragrance  easy to wear. A luminous  morning fragrance that lingers elegantly throughout the day  deepening into a warm  sexy  evening fragrance. Ultra-fine and elegant.

name: raspberry-tangerine
detail: Spritz. Spray again. Be happy. Whether you splash copiously or spritz lightly  you'll fall in love the first time.

name: intense
detail: Inspired by intense  attitude-filled women who are not afraid to take advantage of life.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Lemon Zest', 'Musk', 'Iris / Orris', 'Orange Blossom', 'Orchid', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Ginger', 'Star Anise', 'Vanilla']

name: violet-vibe
detail: “I was looking to create a scent that captured the joy of the smell and refreshing feeling of eating a cold ice cream on a summer day ” Jérôme Epinette  Perfumer.

name: kiji-for-him-1
detail: Kiji is an abbreviated nod to the word 'kijimihon'  which means 'shades' in Japanese. It reflects the vibrant  harmonious look of Japanese watercolours. A fresh and addictive trail.

name: mandarina-duck-cool-black
detail: Following the Pure Black fragrance  Mandarina Duck launches its Cool Black flanker. Cool Black is a sporty edition aimed at active men who lead a dynamic life.

name: udv-vip-1
detail: UDV V.I.P. is a fresh and luminous fragrance that evokes a sense of freedom.

name: italian-citrus
detail: A bracing cologne from the coastal Italian citrus rinds.
ingredients: ['Mandarin (green)', 'Lemon Zest', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Bergamot', 'Blood Orange', 'Chinotto', 'Grapefruit', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Violet Leaves', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss']

name: eau-de-cologne-imperiale-1
detail: Created in 1853 by Pierre-François-Pascal Guerlain  Eau de Cologne Impériale was the very first Eau de Cologne by Guerlain. Specially composed for the Empress Eugénie  wife of Napoleon III  it earned its creator the title of "Perfumer to His Majesty". The Empress enjoyed the exclusive use of this fragrance before giving her authorisation for it to be sold. On its label  it bears the symbol of the Empire with the coat of arms chosen by Napoleon: the eagle  the imperial crown and the sceptre.

name: cedrat-de-diamante
detail: Cédrat de Diamante boasts the zest of more efflorescent than traditional citrus aromas. Inspired by the Mediterranean  the perfume encompasses notes of citrus and natural woods.

name: aqua-imperi-1
detail: "Aqua Imperi  a timeless cologne. A wild garden where nature is ruling again. " Jean-Claude Ellena  Olfactive Director

name: lemon-leaves-intense
detail: Invigorating notes from lemon trees. Lemon Leaves Intense opens with the freshest uplifting citrus notes  while the heart is reinforced with soft florals. These are complemented by the warm woody notes that come together to create a green  fresh  yet unique scent.

name: gin-tonic-cologne
detail: A sparkling cocktail of zesty herbal and bitter notes.

name: parole-deau
detail: A modern and unique composition that proves water is definitely scented. A perfume that represents real deep water. An immersion in pure water.

name: sugar-princess-1
detail: Spring is all around us  so soak and spritz on Sugar Princess  a delight springtime scent.

name: fl18-1
detail: A complex yet playful floral fragrance  exploring classic light and dark textures infused with a modern twist. Hidden notes that emerge as the fragrance dries down surprise you when you think you really know it.
ingredients: ['Cotton Candy', 'Leather', 'Night Blooming Jasmine', 'Saffron', 'Elemi', 'Amberwood', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Mate', 'Ambrette Seed']

name: boardwalk-delight
detail: A stroll down the sunny boardwalk brings fond memories to the front of your mind. Sandy toes  sweet treats  and smiles on the shore are brought to life. This scent is meant to inspire you to relive and recreate the memories of your youth with the power of fragrance.
ingredients: ['Cotton Candy', 'Guava Blossom', 'Watery', 'Vanilla', 'Apple', 'Musk', 'Solar Notes', 'Water Lily', 'Coconut Milk', 'Raspberry Sorbet']

name: delicious-cotton-candy-1
detail: Combining citrus with fruity notes and gourmand touches  Gale Hayman's Delicious Cotton Candy fragrance appeals with its irresistibly sweet femininity. A sweet fragrance of sugary perfection.
ingredients: ['Cotton Candy', 'Cedarwood', 'Bergamot', 'Brown Sugar', 'Clementine', 'Orange', 'Vanilla', 'Caramel', 'Fig Leaf', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Liquorice (Licorice)', 'Musk', 'Plum', 'Strawberry']

name: sugar-sky
detail: Sugar Sky  sweeter than a sunset.

name: sugarful-1
detail: The innocence of first love is revealed in sweet chords. A delicious sugarful whirlwind to satisfy any addiction.

name: 6-six
detail: This scent describes the moments when you are the freest version of yourself  detached from all conventions and rules. A fragrance for the most intimate moments  the most rebellious  and for the days you want to remember how they felt.

name: lamour-rose-et-bleu
detail: L'Amour Rose et Bleu is a blend of sensuality and delicacy in a passionate explosion.

name: indomabile-1
detail: Indomabile is a powerful and vigorous fragrance  combining an unusual blend of vanilla and oud  then fading into ambery accords.

name: ballerina-2
detail: Poised  she waits for the signal of the orchestra to make her entrance. Something indescribable fills her body and she takes flight. Under the moon  satin and tulle merge with her skin  and the ethereal White Swan dances on the shore of the lake. Pure seduction  the Ballerina soars lightly off the stage of The Bolshoi.

name: zodiac
detail: Let the magic happen with this luminous and sensual scent.

name: dolce-woman
detail: Egeo Dolce Woman was inspired by the sweet side of life! The fragrance recreates the smell of candy floss  a pleasant aroma  and a comforting experience that everyone has loved since childhood.

name: angel-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: “I always wanted to make a perfume which would have the same resonance for everyone  something like tenderness  or childhood  and I wanted there to be such a sensual contact with this perfume  that you almost feel like devouring the person you love ” Thierry Mugler.

name: age-of-innocence
detail: A nostalgic recollection of youth. Age of Innocence draws from founder and perfumer  David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi's childhood memory of bicycles  busy streets and sweet treats.

name: boum-candy-land
detail: Cupcakes and cake pops  sweets and macaroons  madeleines  and marshmallows. You won't be able to resist anymore  enter a world of treats with Boum Candy Land.

name: ellen-1
detail: This fragrance is the embodiment of who you are. It enters the room before you and stays an extra moment after you've gone. We believe there is no more intimate a decision than the scent a woman puts on her body.

name: magic-circus-1
detail: A scrumptious gourmand perfume. A splendid wonder swirling in enchantment.

name: 9-nine
detail: The warmth of your skin radiates around you like a golden aura. Like liquid  golden honey  a sensual floral scent will surround you.

name: n-4-candy
detail: A gorgeous scent with an extra sweet trail.

name: tutti-frutti-1
detail: "A multi-fruity fragrance with all-summer freshness  perfect on its own or combined with Scent Mix Lovely Apple".

name: yum-pistachio-gelato-33
detail: A truly yummy fragrance that charms with an unforgettably intense  gourmand scent trail that will have you smelling good enough to eat.

name: arz-el-rab-2
detail: The legendary cedars of Mount Lebanon. Arz El-Rab  are described as the Cedars of God.

name: papyrus-oud-71-1
detail: Papyrus Oud / 71 is a meeting point between two spaces of time  the Middle East and the West. The spiritual tradition of incense and precious woods  including Papyrus  emblem of Lower Egypt and the Renaissance  is the highlight  worked with the subtle delicacy of Western accords.

name: mandarine-glaciale
detail: His telegrams came repeatedly and she persisted in ignoring them. He knew what she was capable of  but she refused to work his way. This time  despite herself  she gave in. The ultimate request  she must deliver his commissioned painting in person. The private plane would arrive in the morning. For the moment  she rode her horse freely along the river.

name: ceo
detail: Ceo encapsulates the strength of timeless elegance in a drop of pure rational madness.

name: gingembre-eau-de-gingembre-1
detail: This unexpected  sparkling new fragrant water  reveals as many mysteries as treasures Ginger  sparkling and bright  blooms in a sensual bouquet of oriental flowers and musk.

name: noir-gabardine-1
detail: The elegance of a soft heart  dressed with warm woods  followed by the mystery and sensuality of a clear trail. Black  color or not  an emotion beyond definition.

name: lhomme-yves-saint-laurent-cologne-gingembre
detail: The embodiment of contemporary masculinity: sensual magnetism. The power of attraction of a man with a unique style  a mix of virility and natural charisma  of courage and contrasts. The perfect balance between refinement and out-and-out masculinity.

name: vladimir-1
detail: He is a decadent and incalculable poet. He is guided by his moods and is predisposed to mood swings. Cold and fascinating  cinematic in appearance  he silences everyone with a chilling gaze.

name: temeraire
detail: Téméraire is a go-getter  a rebel  afraid of nothing and no one. The fragrance’s unfurling sillage is a testament to its intrepid determination  as fearless as its primary flower: an immaculate white tuberose  plunged into darkness with an unexpected inky accord.

name: le-ciel-1
detail: The light  the flesh  the air of flowers. An ethereal  vaporous  atmospheric fragrance. Flowers in weightlessness.

name: rendez-vous
detail: Inspired by the pleasure of a lasting encounter. With the sweet stir of excitement and the thrill of possibility  butterflies flutter to the surface. More than a chance encounter  a union of two cultures and a moment meant to be.

name: magnetic-wood
detail: Magnetic Wood is an energetic fragrance that invigorates the wearer  like the sun bringing forth the first flowers. Fresh and elegant  it is a sophisticated Yin fragrance that renews and enriches.

name: paradise-moon
detail: Escape to a moonlit forest filled with unexpected temptations for the senses and rare  tantalising flowers. Even the air shimmers with the aura of its moon-drenched power  a paradise forever untamable  forever wild.

name: peng-lai-1
detail: "I was inspired by the unique scenery of the Yangtze River  formerly known as the Blue River. On its banks there is the delicate flower of Osmanthus  symbol of wisdom  calm and balance." Sebastian Martin  Perfumer

name: arsenic-osman-1
detail: Arsenic Osman is a wonderful homage to the mysterious and powerful Osmanthus flower. This mesmerising perfume evokes that same instance of pleasure experienced when we fill the unbearable void of addiction. Darkness turns to light; silence erupts and a unique sense of euphoria captures your mind and body as one last blissful rush. This mildly addictive poison will immerse you in depths of radiant fragrances adorned with delicate senses.

name: oudh-osmanthus
detail: Since the dawn of time  due to its scarcity and cost  precious Oudh has traditionally been a resin reserved for gods and majesties. It is a mystery  a myth that goes far beyond a fragrance that reveals itself to be soft and enchanting  enveloping us in its luxurious aura  enclosed in a thousand and one nights.

name: 1000-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A totally unique blend of exotic and romantic blossoms. 1000 Mille  a fragrance for the true romantic.

name: palindrome-iii
detail: Palindrome III is an overflowing and layered composition inspired by the osmanthus  which reveals itself as an elevated delight for the senses.

name: true-oud
detail: A rare and daring oud re-interpretation for a scent that is impossible to ignore.

name: m7-oud-absolu-m7-la-collection
detail: The original classic fragrance in a new bottle. M7 is the 7th men's fragrance from Yves Saint Laurent. Intensely masculine and elegant in a dark amber glass bottle  it expresses a new vision of masculine sensuality. A fresh  woody and sensual fragrance.

name: essence-n-8-santal
detail: Balancing strength and lushness  Essence N°8 Santal traces a singularly elegant olfactory silhouette  in a tribute to the most suave of woods.

name: black-calamus
detail: The bright sweetness of calamus embraces the dazzle of the darkness  sumptuously blending with exotic resins and balsams. A majestic perfume that delivers an endless sensual delight.

name: lame-perdue
detail: In the lineage of its history  Le Galion celebrates the woman once more. Ode to flowers  subtle alliance of modernity and great classic perfumery. A great floral  of the name of the first perfume created by Paul Vacher  which resonates like a unique era for the House of Galion. That of audacity and conquest.

name: passion-victim
detail: Sensual  warm  unctuous and velvety  this fragrance evolves and spirals like a fragrant volute of smoke. An opulent floral heart adds to the intrigue and the attraction is no other than fatal.

name: divine-exclusive-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Emanate radiance from within and exude undeniable star quality with Divine Exclusive.

name: eternal-lily-amber
detail: This scent embodies the transcendental will to flourish  the desire to explore the meaning of existence  to grasp the path of life along with the aspect of passage.

name: nuit-azur
detail: From the sun-drenched inflections of Bel Azur's bright days  comes the warm evening breeze of Nuit Azur  a fragrance that spotlights against a backdrop of florals and dark woods to capture the sensation of a moonlight swim.

name: 801-embruns-cedre-pamplemousse
detail: 801 EMBRUNS CÈDRE PAMPLEMOUSSE is a contrast between the warm and cold notes. An elegant scent  suitable for the refined gentlemen or sophisticated women.

name: aqua-universalis-extrait-de-parfum
detail: Aqua Universalis is a fragrance to share  the bond that unites women and men. Luminous and evolving  its ethereal trail is the epitome of refinement.

name: vendemmia
detail: "This fragrance reminds me of a vineyard where dozens of harvesters dance in the golden light of the late afternoon." - Fabrice Pellegrin

name: green-tea-citron-freesia
detail: A harmonious scent with sparkling accords to lift your spirit up.

name: amore
detail: Inspired by the beautiful woman who believes in the eternity of true love.

name: indompte
detail: "I dreamt of a woman who was free  no longer shrouded in fabrics or skins. My dresses are real dresses  ultra-lightweight dresses that brush  against the liberated body like a breath of air." - Hubert de Givenchy

name: aoud-lagoon-1
detail: Mysterious flowers from the Far East  sweetened by juicy citrus fruits invite you on an intimate journey  where guided by the mystical and sensual flowers of the tropics  you will discover your inner strength at the base that leaves an unforgettable trail.

name: eau-de-rochas
detail: Eau de Rochas - Mineral scents are exception in perfumery and are a rarely exploited olfactory path. L'Eau de Rochas  which was long called with stunning pertinence  "Eau de Rochas" is a lovely example. It was built on a blend of citrus and floral notes  it's a pioneer in the eau fraîche family. Thanks to its success it became trans-generational  almost a family fragrance.

name: n-1-for-men
detail: No.1 means to be number one; it makes the wearer shine like the solitary diamond nestling around his neck. Clive's inspiration and his instructions to the perfumer were that there were no cost restrictions; the perfumer had carte blanche  which is rare. The result was the world's most expensive perfume: in Clive's opinion  it is the fragrance of the self-confident  worldly and uncompromising  the fragrance of supreme luxury.

name: rinascimento-1
detail: "Rinascimento is an elegant  floral perfume inspired by the ancient symbol of Florence  the lily. Created for both men and women  Ferragamo diffuses like a seductive Auran  an unforgettable trail in the air"  Alexander Lee  Perfumer.

name: sette-agrumi
detail: For aesthetes in search of the absolute.

name: limone-di-sicilia-1
detail: "Limone di Sicilia is pure radiance. Feminine  luxurious  and joyful. Inspired by Sicily's brilliant sunlight and the sparkling scents of bergamot and lemons in the air " Aerin Lauder  Founder.

name: orchidea-selvaggia-oud
detail: Inspired by one of the finest and most refined raw materials in the world of perfumery  oud wood is an ingredient whose secret charm is linked to the cultural tradition and craftsmanship of the Middle East and whose rich and sophisticated scent is married together. With the perfumers' skill  combining Wild Orchid  they have created an olfactory journey into the secret history of irresistible Arabian passions.

name: mandarino-di-sicilia-1
detail: Mandarino di Sicilia pays tribute to the citrus essence by encapsulating the warmth of the sun rays.

name: aqua-vitae-cologne-forte-1
detail: Aqua Vitae Cologne Forte is a pampering fragrance with a sunny and sensual trail.

name: marine-vodka
detail: A delicious fruity cocktail with exotic  and narcotic  frozen elements. A voluptuous body with ethereal notes. A summer experience to tonify your mind.

name: palindrome-ii
detail: PALINDROME II functions as a palindrome in a different way. It revolves around solid  powdery notes  which are felt from the first to the last stages of its evolution. Darkness is transformed into light. A fragrance full of light and hope  patiently waiting to be released  conveying a message of harmony and peace.

name: imagination-1
detail: Imagination. The essence of audacity. The measure of every success. The infinite possibilities that lie within each and every one of us. Imagination takes flight across one's skin in an extraordinary encounter that ignites the senses and spirit to give rise to an irrepressible  universal attraction.

name: lacrima
detail: I am the precious water laden with your most intimate emotions  your fears  your joys  your passions and your disappointments. I am a vital substance  a saline and holy liquid. My perfume dispels melancholy  a sense of sorrow and heartache. I am the lethal weapon to combat your temperament. I am the water of the eyes  Lacrima.

name: spiritual-healing-sexual-healing
detail: The perfect perfume for a couple after spending a great night  with passion and fire... making love. It becomes a second skin. The perfect moment of harmony and intimate connection of body  heart and mind.

name: serge-noire-1
detail: Serge was used to make Cossacks and school smocks. It is a twill weave whose name has since been given to the man who dedicated himself to all things feminine. An ethereal woodiness with a smoky sillage  therein lies its ambiguity.

name: cuir-mauresque-1
detail: "Back when the Moors occupied Cordoba  leather acquired a particular odour: animal hides were tanned using acacia bark." Serge Lutens.

name: series-6-synthetic-tar
detail: Tar evokes the smells of the hot asphalt road that excites passionate drivers  the smell of exhaust pipes  melted bitumen and cigarette smoke. Through all this chaos  and pollution  you will find a whiff of wet soil after the rain.

name: black-oud-extreme-amber-extrait-de-parfum-1
detail: When the Oud flows like lava  the intense heat forms a crystal shield that trembles in the midst of the powerful darkness. Like incandescent lava flows the inevitable that will forever change the path  deepening the traces of the journey. Prayer becomes prophecy and prophecy commands truth. Extreme amber  once concentrated  creates an extraordinary fire.

name: oud-sublime-1
detail: "Oud Sublime is  for me  the perfect fragrance for perfume lovers  and I am pleased to present it to you"  Patricia de Nicolaï.

name: hyrax-1
detail: Climbing to its perch in the morning sky  the African sun reaches across a mountain range to caress a wide  flat boulder  baking it to a gentle heat. From the shade of a narrow crevice  a family of hyrax emerges  hot dust dulling the sheen of their golden fur. They settle onto the warm expanse of rock to partake in their ritual sunbath  but remain ever vigilant. As the heat from sweltering sun intensifies  ancient aromas are coaxed from the scorched rocks  sparse vegetation and petrified hyraceum. Eerily  they intertwine to form a scent that is both primitive and exotic.

name: couleur-fauve
detail: A rebellious  indomitable  challenging and colourful movement. Fauvism is a hymn to life  joy and above all  pleasure. The « Happiness of Life » painting by Matisse has inspired Couleur Fauve.

name: boxeuses
detail: What is remarkable in a fight is the contrast of styles. You have to keep your guard up! Appraising the enigmatic boxer's elegant strokes is the newest scent from Serge Lutens.

name: absolute-aphrodisiac
detail: Flash after flash of white and red. Its human side  vanilla  excites the palate. Its animal side  leather  unleashes the wild. The euphoria of the carnal dance awakens the feline instincts  embracing you in its storm.

name: amber-elixir
detail: Amber Elixir is the expression of the smell of amber in the air. A decadent oriental scent that captures the deep atmosphere of Middle Eastern souks and shisha bars.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Teak Wood', 'Dried Fruits', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Amber', 'Sandalwood', 'Saffron', 'Tonka Bean', 'Castoreum', 'Davana', 'Grapes', 'Musk', 'Rum', 'Black Pepper']

name: cuir-mauresque-2
detail: A Moorish king  dressed in white  enters the Alhambra and rides a white thoroughbred with its mane and tail dyed henna red. Pigeons with perfumed wings take flight  leaving in the limpid air the softness of amber and roses. Splendour  architecture or mirage  a place of the spirit. When the Moors left Andalusia  they left paradise. The legend they left behind: Cuir Mauresque.

name: 1-parfum-1
detail: “Out of all the quotes anybody has ever written about me  my favourite was when I was described as the ‘pornographer of perfume'. I have always loved overtly sensual perfumes  and so created Parfum De La Nuit as a collection of three scents which allow us to reveal the inner desires lurking within us all ” Roja Dove.

name: semi-bespoke-no-10-1
detail: The best-kept secret of Haute Parfumerie  Roja Dove's elusive Semi-Bespoke collection. Numbered from 1 to 16  each of these creations has been crafted from the finest natural raw materials in the world  regardless of cost or scarcity  they are the perfumery equivalent of Haute Couture. Offered to a select elite clientele  once 50 names have been added to the "Book" of creations  the book will be closed.

name: oud-cambodi-intense-1
detail: At last  a fragrance for the heroic  the ones who can walk with charm  grace and poise in the densest of woods. Haramain Oud Cambodi Intense is a magnificent blend of the finest  rarest and exotic elements to create a fragrance that immerses you into a rich  pleasant  relaxing and uplifting woody experience.
