Relish the deliciously prolific perfume and unearth the hidden treasures of nature waiting to be discovered.

name: sticky-fingers
detail: Patchouli rock-chic  in a decadent and sumptuous interpretation. Wild and carefree  dangerously leather-clad but playful. Don't be fooled by the iris  there's no romance here: the tobacco leaves roll up  the leather jacket ends up lying somewhere and the delicious  tantalising smell of leather finally emerges.

name: 2-parfum-1
detail: “Out of all the quotes anybody has ever written about me  my favourite was when I was described as the ‘pornographer of perfume'. I have always loved overtly sensual perfumes  and so created Parfum De La Nuit as a collection of three scents which allow us to reveal the inner desires lurking within us all ” Roja Dove.

name: unutamam
detail: Unutamam (the name of a famous Turkish song) intentionally straddles the line between lush seduction and animalistic ferocity  leaving it to the wearer to decide which mood to allow the scent to embody.

name: cerequio
detail: A powerful fragrance with strong spice and incense accords that will appeal to men and women alike.

name: katy-perrys-mad-potion-1
detail: She is a fascinating force whose beauty and charm cast a spell. With a wink and a smile  she lures you into a fantastic and crazy world. She unleashes her spell  creating a mesmerising potion. It's time to make magic with Katy Perry's Mad Potion.

name: boss-orange-man-1
detail: Boss Orange Man is about modern casual wear that adapts to the lifestyle of the metropolitan man  who follows his individual taste and conveys his own personality through his style of dress  which makes him a great ambassador of Boss fragrances.
ingredients: ['Apple', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Vanilla (Mexico)', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Cardamom', 'Cedrat', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coriander', 'Melilot / Sweet Clover', 'Hay', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Patchouli', 'Clary Sage']

name: amabile
detail: Timeless and avant-garde  Amabile is an exceptional fragrance that has inspired many but was never equaled.

name: john-varvatos-dark-rebel
detail: Sweet  redolent leaves impregnated with golden  intoxicating spirits meet the rhythm of sensual  resinous woods.
ingredients: ['Cade', 'Leather', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Castoreum', 'Styrax', 'Vanilla (Mexico)', 'Akigalawood (Patchouli note)', 'Fir Balsam', 'Cardamom', 'Davana', 'Nutmeg', 'Rum', 'Clary Sage', 'Black Pepper', 'Sugar Cane']

name: jasmin-rouge
detail: Tom Ford's Jasmin Rouge combines exquisite and innovative ingredients that saturate and dramatically contrast this fragrance's floral character and takes it to unexpected destinations.

name: lily-of-the-valley-10
detail: The lily of the valley is a graceful flower with an elusive scent that is challenging to recreate. Paul Vacher did brilliantly so in 1948. Today  Domitille Michalon-Bertier transcends his work. Her masterstroke? A 2020 version that is 100% synthetic for an exquisite natural result. A transfiguration of the Lily of the Valley  a vertiginous green floral.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley
ingredients: ['Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Starfleur (Lily Of The Valley)', 'Sinfonide (Musk)', 'Lily', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Kharismal (Light Jasmine)', 'Ambertonic (Woody Ambery)', 'Benzoin', 'Cinnamon', 'Clove', 'Honey', 'Mirabelle (Plum)', 'Oakmoss', 'Patchouli', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Plum', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Vanilla (Mexico)']

name: eau-sauvage-eau-de-toilette
detail: Revolution of yesterday  the great myth of today. Modern absolutely. A guarantee of good taste and refined virility  Eau Sauvage Eau de Toilette is much more than a perfume. It is synonymous with an absolute of elegance  of a "Dior spirit" which endures  intact of modernity.

name: emotions-calm
detail: A unique moment of calm and reconnection.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Violet', 'Violet Leaves', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Starfleur (Lily Of The Valley)', 'Ambertonic (Woody Ambery)', 'Geranium', 'Lavender', 'Clary Sage', 'CristalFizz']

name: hidden-fantasy-1
detail: Seductive and sensual  Hidden Fantasy is about the secrets desires we dare not tell. It is the new fragrance for the woman who lets her imagination run wild without boundaries or restrictions. Her deepest thoughts and desires are kept secrets. What do you have to hide?

name: sandors-70s-1
detail: At the crest of upper Barcelona  once a place to see and be seen  an iconic bar where the smoke of cigars flirted with the aristocratic leather armchairs. Sandor 70's audaciously combines refined suede notes with the celebrated Spanish leather  all caressed by sweet smoke.

name: fleur-du-mal
detail: “I wanted to create a perfume of contrast using osmanthus which has a duality and unexpected quality. It appears innocent but it can be very sensual  almost animalic. This flower  that seems to be an angel  can turn devilish ” Quentin Bisch  Perfumer.

name: love-osmanthus-1
detail: The night-blooming osmanthus flower adds a fruity essence to an exotic moonlit garden. Love Osmanthus captures the aura of this special flower in the same way that a secret garden offers a haven to forbidden lovers.

name: ebene-fume-1
detail: “I wanted a scent that captures a meditative feeling. Ébène Fumé has an almost spiritual sensuality that uplifts your mood  which might be the most seductive indulgence of all " Tom Ford.
ingredients: ['Ebony Tree', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Osmanthus (China)', 'Thyme', 'Papyrus', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Palo Santo', 'Cade', 'Fir Balsam', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Rose', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Cypress', 'Styrax', 'Violet Leaves', 'Black Pepper', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: more-is-more
detail: Dark and enlightened at the same time  this stunning perfume plays with contrasts like no other: a fragrant chiaroscuro  both enigmatic and elegant  glistening and somber at the same time  like a hide of the softest and shiniest black leather.

name: osmanthus-3
detail: "When I smell this creation  I have the sensation of a ray of moon touching the osmanthus to let us see through their velvety petals of its flowers. It is the scent of happiness and peacefulness at the same time " Marypierre Julien  co-Creator of Osmanthus with Michel Girard.

name: perceive-sunshine-1
detail: An authentic and uplifting fragrance that translates the energy of the rising sun and true serenity of nature. A cushion of softness extends the magic of this ephemeral moment to feel the freedom and infinite possibilities of the day to come.

name: snow-blossom
detail: This scent was inspired by the essence of snowflakes forming on petals.

name: wining
detail: Wining is a celebration of spring. The air is warmer and the narcissus flower is blooming. Forget the cold  spring is back.

name: elixirs-of-nature-swietenia
detail: Swietenia instantly transports you to the humid planes of Bangalore  South India  as its scent keeps you vibrant and fresh on a balmy afternoon.

name: pur-blanca-liberte-1
detail: An invigorating fragrance that celebrates new beginnings. The perfect portrayal of a simple moment. A breath of fresh air that fills lungs  with purity and innocence  making you feel alive again.

name: tease
detail: Life is delicious  and it’s yours for the taking. Playful and feminine  Tease is a delicious floral fragrance for those who embrace life and crave every experience it has to offer.

name: sprimmer
detail: Sprimmer evokes a spring mighty breeze  passing through lush grass and blooming flowers.

name: little-sequin-dress
detail: Dazzling and stylish – like your sequin dress. Sensual composition for special occasions for a woman who knows how to attract glances.

name: magnific-audaz
detail: Magnific Audaz is a tribute to the courage and audacity of magnificent women  who conquer their space in the world every day.

name: expression-celebrate
detail: With this unique scent  celebrate unconditional friendship  the one that accompanies you at every stage  no matter what happens.

name: moreta-1
detail: The Spaniards have a word for a stunning  attractive woman of ravishing femininity who knows how to win attention; they call her "Moreta". This voluptuous perfume impresses with its charm  freshness and natural charisma.

name: 14s-48e-madagascar
detail: Madagascar is known for its incredible biodiversity. Because of the island's long geographical isolation  its plants and animals are unique. But Madagascar is also a melting pot of cultures  bringing with them new and fascinating people and plants.

name: good-girl-blush-klossette-edition-2023
detail: Own a piece of fashion history with this limited edition of Good Girl Blush  the winning entry from our Fashion Klossette Roblox collaboration. A fresh floral explosion of femininity  it is dressed in a vibrant floral print inspired by a silk-chiffon gown from our Resort 2024 runway show held in Rio.

name: irresistible-eau-de-parfum-very-floral
detail: More daring than ever  Very Floral reveals fervently free femininity. Its language? That of the body bounding with fervour and elation. The dance  performed in the beating heart of the city  is confident  determined. Unstoppable.

name: sur-la-lande
detail: Look into the distance  an endless horizon afar. Where the wild flowers of La Lande meet the salty winds of the sea. Stand proud  stand strong. Face the winds  the waves  the ups and the downs. Push the limits. Reinvent the world.

name: loubimar-1
detail: At the bottom of the sea  Christian Louboutin anchors his famous stilettos in the urchin of a hood bristling with spikes.

name: juliana-paes-glam-2020-1
detail: The fresh and sparkling notes of citrus combine with softness in the heart  resulting in a young  modern  and seductive perfume.

name: mon-rouge-1
detail: “An assertive and radiant wake combining the power of the patchouli  the brilliance of the neroli essence  and the sensuality of the iris ” Caroline Dumur  Perfumer.

name: sauge
detail: Sauge is the scent of nature just after the storm. Even the faintest fragrance is euphorically magnified. The delicate scent of a barely-blossomed wild flower permeates the air  symbolising the promise of renewal  the hope of a possibility.

name: demain-promis-1
detail: You've decided to turn off Netflix  meditate in the mornings and finish that book that's been sitting on your bedside table for six months. But then  along comes this perfume. Tomorrow you'll think about your new resolutions  I promise.

name: chloe-nomade-jasmin-naturel-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: The ideal perfume for the young  sensual and free woman.

name: singulier-pour-homme
detail: Completely Boucheron and uniquely masculine  Singulier Pour Homme captures all the Parisian essence of the brand in its intriguing trail.

name: of-a-love-trance
detail: Succumb to your fantasies. Love is hypnotising  uncontrollable and consumed by desire. Heady white florals drink the sun's rays and release their carnal scents into the night. In a moment  the addictive sweet bite of hazelnut and vanilla absolute casts an erotic floral trance. Lost in an obsession sweeter than any reality.

name: une-rose-au-paradis-rb
detail: This perfume is a taste of the future on the lips of the other. At the fifth aurora borealis  we fall tenderly into a space-time rift where we are lulled to sleep until the night of time.

name: be-insane-queen-black-1
detail: The party goes on with a top note where the blend of citrus and pear nectar brings full character to the fragrance. Black orchid blends with almonds in the heart to merge into a base note of patchouli  amber and vanilla.

name: rayon-vert-1
detail: Rayon Vert is all about nature in full bloom. It's a wild spring awakening. It's party time in a bottle and all about shining and dancing. Rayon Vert is bright explosion of life!

name: of-someone-i-knew
detail: The memory of the scent of another. A meeting that can only take place in the blur of a daydream. At once craving and no one  in a haze of amber and oakmoss. Overexposed through a familiar lens  playing over and over. The promise of one day in the memories of their scent.

name: immortelle
detail: The immutable immortelle  or everlasting flower  has been viewed for millennia as a symbol of eternity. Perfumer Caroline Dumur has sought to capture its scent as it is enjoyed in nature  along the paths leading to the beaches of the Mediterranean.

name: chloe-nomade-naturelle-eau-de-parfum
detail: A quest for freedom. Open-mindedness. The delight of discovery. Driven by the allure of elsewhere  the Nomade woman soars away to new horizons  new encounters. Nomade Eau de Parfum Naturelle celebrates the merging of cultures and the poetry of encounters.

name: iris-crush
detail: "We created a sensual and feminine perfume by melting a powdery cosmetic facet with addictive red fruits. This fragrance is an ode to femininity and glamour like the red lipstick you never forget to put on " Anne Flipo  Caroline Dumur  Perfumers.

name: odeur-du-theatre-du-chatelet-1
detail: Théâtre du Châtelet is in the middle of Paris  on the banks of the Seine  across the river from Notre Dame  in between the Louvre and the Centre Pompidou. Built-in 1862  to be the largest theatre in Paris  it had always made its own shows and looked for innovation and originality.
ingredients: ['Rose', 'Tuberose', 'Musk', 'Heliotrope', 'Iris / Orris', 'Orange Blossom', 'Aldehyde', 'Coffee', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Black Pepper', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Musk Ambrette']

name: flacon-fusion-anniversary-edition-2022-1
detail: For a dazzling celebration of Lalique’s century of crystal  perfumer Alexis Dadier concocted an original fragrance. A bold  seductive reinvention  combining several rare and precious natural ingredients.

name: true-religion-for-women-1
detail: True Religion for WomenDay or night  this clean fragrance takes you on a refreshing journey. It is a delicious and highly addictive fragrance.
ingredients: ['Pear Blossom', 'Green Apple', 'Hinoki Wood', 'Amaryllis', 'Freesia', 'Red Currant', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Mirabelle (Plum)', 'Violet Leaves', 'Cedarwood', 'Skin Accord', 'Musk Ambrette']

name: les-soirs-de-siam
detail: Les Soirs de Siam depicts the enigmatic nature of twilight in the city.

name: ds
detail: D.S. is the culmination of a year of work dedicated to developing a fragrance using the Indian materials that our perfumer David Seth Moltz loves best. Following our DURGA perfume  he has created another fragrance with more fine oils.

name: paperwork-solution-no-1-31106
detail: Solution 3 is a modern and racy fragrance from the most beautiful and timeless of flowers  the rose.

name: velvet-mughetto-1
detail: This new scent has been imagined as an allegory of the Sicilian spring: the mild temperatures awakening the island’s landscape and its delicate yet colourful blossoms. Century after century  the temples of Sicily have borne witness to the eternal rhythms of nature’s renaissance  the green plants bringing freshness  while the golden rays of the sun warm the gentle air and illuminate the bountiful fields of wildflowers.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Pink Pepper', 'Magnolia', 'Bergamot', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Sandalwood', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: this-is-love-her
detail: This Is Love Her! is a story of love at first sight. A couple in love who adore each other and meet in "a Paris" they know by heart. They are artists of the present. A love story that seems like a challenge. A brush  then a kiss. Freedom is shared; warmth and sin are a blank canvas on which they draw with their fingertips. It is the fragrance of burning love  inedible and undisciplined.

name: this-is-her-zadig-dream-2023
detail: A joyful scent to enjoy summer. An invitation to travel and dream.

name: ga-dandy-or-not
detail: Wearing G.A. means making the choice of contrast between perkiness and elegance. To be or not to be a Dandy  why choose? Absolute freedom is the ability to change your mind.

name: bois-damande
detail: "When creating this fragrance  I imagined almond trees under the Italian sun. I wanted to create a wonderful contrast between the verticality of the woody notes and the irresistible tenderness of an almond accord  along with a vanilla base " Sidonie Lancesseur  Perfumer.

name: blue-moon-ginger-dash-2023
detail: Kilian drops the quintessential summer cocktail in scent. Blue Moon Ginger Dash is a limited fresh addition to The Liquors  inspired by Kilian Hennessy's summer cocktail  the cult beachside party drink from the '90s  Blue Lagoon  a mix of lemon  vodka and blue caraçao liquor.

name: eccentric
detail: To wear Eccentric is to feel happy and different. Eccentric  so you're not like everyone else!

name: this-is-her-vibes-of-freedom-1
detail: Vibes of Freedom is an invitation to get away. To cast off. A breath of fresh air that fills you with energy and lets your mind sail free. The essential step before you make a move. Press pause. City vibrations give way to those of nature. Because the Zadig & Voltaire woman can do without the city  but she can’t give up her vibe.

name: rose-tangerine-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Chloé Rose Tangerine revisits its signature eau de toilette  now bolder and more emphatic. Even the great classics can be reinvented. Beyond a reinterpretation  this is a rediscovery.

name: angel-eau-croisiere-act-ii-2020-1
detail: A fresh breeze blows over Angel and brings with it other-worldly dreams. Both exuberant and exotic  playful and mystical  Angel Eau Croisière takes us on a journey towards vibrant  colourful  sunny destinations  where celebrations are in full swing!

name: apple-brandy-on-the-rocks-1
detail: Apple Brandy returns  featuring the original apple brandy core but  this time  with an added uplift that carries sophistication into the night.

name: eau-de-rochas-lescapade-2022
detail: An ultra-colourful limited edition with an energy in stark contrast to the composition  inviting the wearer to disconnect and experience a renewing feeling of plenitude.

name: dose-of-rose
detail: This fragrance is like a deep dive into a unique rose with fascination at its core.

name: black-phantom-memento-mori-15-years-2022
detail: Kilian celebrates its 15th anniversary with a limited edition collection for the holiday season  with a special design inspired by the Eiffel Tower  a tribute to Kilian's French heritage. Black Phantom  Memento Mori ensures that a difficult journey has a sweet reward.

name: rose-coup-de-foudre-1
detail: Somewhere between a shiver and a throb  a heady passion.

name: limon-tonka
detail: The freshness of lemon starts off this fragrance  accompanied by bergamot and lavender  before turning green in a heart of geranium and petitgrain. At the base  tonka bean takes centre stage accompanied by amber and musk notes.

name: 303-piment-baie-rose-benjoin-2019-1
detail: Between hot and cold spices  303 plays with the contrasts  soft and spiky  light and shadow. This perfume is a spice infusion with hot floral and amber notes  leaving a very sensual scent on the skin.  A fragrance made from natural raw materials with strong character.

name: saks-fifth-avenue-for-him-1
detail: Metro-modern. Elegant. Sophisticated. The eclectic downtown spirit and style of NoHo-based Bond No. 9.

name: guess-night
detail: Confidence is the master of the night. A sexy energy that you feel as soon as you enter a room. Adrenaline created by the excitement and adventure of nightlife. You don't prepare for the night  you own it!

name: lapollon-1
detail: Athlete's body  a devastating smile  L'Apollon fantasises about the world! Sportsman sculpts his body without neglecting his mind. He is a man of action  enterprising  that none and nothing can resist. His virility and charisma are sublimated by his masculine and captivating scent. Warning! This is a weapon of massive seduction.

name: series-2-red-palisander
detail: The blending of two majestic trees  the Palisander of Brazil and the gargantuan Red Wood from Virginia  combined to create this enigmatic Red fragrance.

name: ultraviolet-6
detail: Utterly urban  full of daring  a lover of adventures. In vogue with the latest styles. She is trendy and aesthete  an independent personality and knows exactly what she wants.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-hot-pepper-1
detail: Hot Pepper electrifies the entire body with its hot notes. Designed to be a sharp Fougère fragrance  this fragrance palpitates the pulse points. Little by little  temptation rises to the point of exaltation.

name: gucci-guilty-pour-homme-eau-de-parfum
detail: Suggestive and unexpected  Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Parfum was created to provoke. The celebration of freedom in the #ForeverGuilty story continues to add a new level of intensity.

name: still-life-in-rio
detail: "While the art of light shines through Still Life in Rio  this sunny perfume is best described in terms of starlight  the primeval flicker " Dora Baghriche  Perfumer.

name: club-de-nuit-private-key-to-my-success
detail: This scent is for the free spirit who dares to thrive and accomplish the lifestyle that goes with it.

name: uzon-explorer
detail: Uzon Explorer  an elegant woody who is inspired by the explorer and adventurous spirit of men.

name: volcano
detail: Deep  complex and powerful  Volcano is a fascinating fragrance that honors the magnificent force of nature.  It's vapors are rich and fecund  swelling with emotion  dispersing  seeds of sentiment  giving to the recollection of powerful past-life experiences. Volcano is a mesmerizing aromatic eruption full of life!

name: be-exceptional-1
detail: Exceptional  iconic  unique  and extremely appealing  all these words as a milestone for Be Exceptional  an utterly masculine scent by S.T.Dupont.

name: eau-extraordinaire
detail: This comforting scent revives your inner strength and awakens your senses in a single gesture.

name: cheap-and-chic-chic-petals
detail: The astonishing elegance and genuine beauty of flowers express a new sense of lightness  tinged with joy and spontaneity. A fragrance for an "interesting" woman  who moves in the lush  flowery field of imagination with style and authority.

name: gingembre-petillant-1
detail: Full of bright contrasts  Gingembre Pétillant was inspired by the intricacies of Middle Eastern traditional scents.

name: the-one-for-men-gold-1
detail: The One for Men Gold celebrates a man who has a natural but unmistakable magnetism. A true gentleman  he exudes confidence with his innate elegance and unique style.

name: on-men-red-1
detail: On Men Red invites you to enjoy the provocative nights  the seductive looks and the intense passions as if there was no tomorrow  after all you only live once! The exclusive Secret of Eudora brings sensuality and ensures that the meetings are even more irresistible. On Men Red. Live your most intense days!

name: polo-red-intense
detail: "Polo Red Intense was inspired by the qualities I love in a powerful car  speed  style  and beauty  " Ralph Lauren.

name: john-varvatos-usa-1
detail: A relaxed  casual yet elegant fragrance through clean and bright notes spiced with an unusual encounter of warm spice and fragrant grasses.

name: polo-red-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: "For Polo Red Eau de Parfum  I was inspired by the idea of transcending everyday life. This meant creating a Polo Red fragrance where the different elements have been rearranged to capture the essence of Red  in turn fostering a transformative experience. The fragrance aims to take you to new places and immerse you in the endlessly passionate and fiery colour red " Olivier Gillotin  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Red Ginger', 'Clary Sage', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Blood Orange', 'Cranberry', 'Grapefruit', 'Red Apple', 'Tonka Bean', 'Citruses', 'Lavender', 'Leather', 'Musk']

name: speed-legends-night-drive-2023
detail: Midnight  full speed: vision tightens  heart beats  lights scroll in the obscurity  adrenaline takes control. Speed Legends Night Drive is an exclusive and limited iteration designed in collaboration with American photographer RIOCAM> He enhanced woody and ambery notes to create a stronger and sensual sillage  always on the edge. The final result is an evocation of the thrilling atmosphere of a night drive and its cinematic vibes out of time  space  and any limits.
ingredients: ['Clary Sage', 'Blackcurrant', 'Tonka Bean', 'Bergamot', 'Pink Pepper', 'Red Ginger', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Patchouli', 'Vetiver', 'Woody Ambery Note']

name: red-sin-1
detail: "Sometimes it is impossible to resist the temptation " Christina Aguilera.

name: all-or-nothing-amplified
detail: This voluptuous fragrance is warm  with a rich dry down. Amplify your presence with this powerfully feminine  daring fragrance.

name: liz-earle-botanical-essence-n-9-1
detail: A rich and warming handcrafted scent combining traditional chypre scents with succulent dark forest fruits. Enjoy this luxurious perfume when worn alone  or create your own customised scent by layering with other beautiful Liz Earle fragrances.

name: azzaro-the-most-wanted-parfum-2022-1
detail: The Azzaro Wanted man is back  more playful than ever. His fearsome weapon? A spicy and terribly addictive fragrance: The Most Wanted Parfum.

name: lastre
detail: Ava Gardner met the perfumer and owner of Le Galion  Paul Vacher in the 1950s. She asked him to compose a tailor-made fragrance just for her. The perfumer  valuing distinction and femininity  obliged and created L'Astre. In 2023  Le Galion launched a contemporary rewrite of a formula that has remained private for decades. Working in collaboration with the Estate of Ava Gardner and her heirs who offered access to their archives  L'Astre is an elixir of opulence that sweeps away inhibitions and abolishes hesitations. A perfume that seeks  and certainly finds  the most complete attention.

name: spirited
detail: Perry Ellis Spirited is a fresh and energetic scent that opens with juicy fruits. The heart evolves with tantalizing notes  while the base warms down to rich and woody notes.

name: oud-praline-1
detail: Inspired by praline  this fragrance combines an irresistible blend of caramel and dried fruits with the intensity of oud wood. Balanced with fresh spicy ginger  cardamom and coriander.

name: armani-eau-daromes
detail: A fresh and modern interpretation of comfort; classic as a tweed jacket. It was the inspiration for the perfumer to create a fragrance which is classic but with a twist  so that it becomes up-to-date  cutting-edge.

name: black-beetle-1
detail: Seemingly discreet  Black Beetle gradually reveals itself and leaves an unforgettable wake.

name: poivre-samarcande
detail: "A massive  beautiful oak tree once grew in front of my house  blocking our view of the Mediterranean. Eventually  it grew ill and was felled. The scent of the cut wood etched itself in my memory. The soul of the old tree lives on in this fragrance. The name Samarcande is an homage to the city through which spice caravans once passed on their way from East to West." - Jean-Claude Ellena  perfumer

name: la-commedia
detail: "This fragrance is a journey to the centre of the earth. It is like the breath of the mysterious fire that emerges from the extraordinary world of Dante"  Nathalie Gracia-Cetto  Perfumer.

name: gold-flowers-1
detail: An intense solar strength radiates from this fragrance.  Lively Indian spices flutter like the brightly coloured materials that shine and shimmer in the warm breeze.

name: cloud-nine-1
detail: A state of serene euphoria is achieved with a Cloud Nine mist. Let your soul take flight to reach a higher serenity.

name: merveilles-nuit
detail: Merveilles & Nuit is a powerful and sensual fragrance that will enchant your nights.

name: spicebomb-infrared-eau-de-parfum
detail: Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum plays and pushes the cursors of sensuality and unveils the hottest elixir of the Spicebomb fragrance family.

name: iris-goddess
detail: Iris Goddess is like an explosion of powdery petals clashing with ripe red fruits. A mystical  otherworldly scent.

name: lhomme-ideal-intense-1
detail: The Idéal man is like any other man  just better. Being yourself is your greatest superpower. A light pressure of a simple finger will awaken your inner everyday superhero.

name: et-si-ce-matin
detail: If you like green and floral perfumes  this scent is definitely made for you! The bright and sunny notes evoke the first days of spring  a special time of the year.

name: gaggia-medio-i
detail: Dorsoduro  wandering through winding alleyways  an encounter of skin and stone. Her silhouette fades into a stony labyrinth  her hands caress the walls  her sensual essence charged with the minerality all around her.

name: 603-cuir-encens-feve-tonka
detail: Escape to a clandestine Parisian party  piercing music against a backdrop of blinding smoke. Or savour an ultra-toning treatment in a discreet spa  luxurious but discreet.

name: spritz-veneziano-1
detail: Intoxicating  aromatic and sparkling  Spritz Veneziano is a tribute to the irresistible drink that has conquered and been enjoyed by the whole world  giving magical moments of conviviality.

name: bahia-samba
detail: The sunny and sensual atmosphere of Bahia Samba instantly transports us to the shores of Brazilian beaches with wild rhythms. More than a perfume  a one-way ticket to Brazil.

name: dolce-amalfi-1
detail: An olfactory escapade to the Amalfi coast  this enchanting scent promises elegance and refinement. Relax  it's the dolce vita!

name: hysope
detail: In use since the cleansing rituals of antiquity  the hysope flower holds a special place in Mylène Alran’s memory  evoking images of both her childhood in the south of France and her travels across the mountains of Morocco. By pairing it with a citrusy accord and a touch of rose water  the perfumer has created a note as pure and crisp as a breeze  expressing all the beauty of uncorrupted nature.

name: tome-2-la-legerete
detail: A true ode to the adolescence. "A whiff of freedom  a one-way journey toward natural elegance." -Mylène Alran  Perfumer

name: santorini-sunrise-2023-1
detail: Fresh and exhilarating  Santorini Sunrise is inspired by the pure bliss of an island getaway with friends  where fantasy becomes reality and anything is possible. Deep blue seas provide a stunning backdrop to luminous white architecture  while the scent of flowers drifts on the breeze and each new day holds the promise of memories that will last forever.

name: guaria-morada-1
detail: This fine fragrance promises floral sweetness and fruity delicacy for a unique journey into the heart of the Costa Rican landscape. Behind this lush nature hides a treasure  the country's unique and iconic flower: Guaria Morada. Linking the past with the present  it is a symbol of luck and a source of good fortune. The wealth of Costa Rica in a glass bottle.

name: momentum-night-edition
detail: An ode to the intensity and charm of city nightlife. Momentum Night Edition man is a winner by day and by night. Whether he is travelling around the world or enjoying the spectacular sights of a cityscape  this urban trendsetter knows how to turn every moment of his journey into an exceptional moment. Always on the lookout  always on the move  the city's nightlife holds no secrets for him.

name: grl-pwr
detail: GRL PWR is much more than just an abbreviation for "Girl Power". It stands for a new generation of young women who are courageous  curious  clever and full of energy. They prefer to savour the exciting feeling of freedom through self-determination  independence and strength.

name: quatre-en-rouge-1
detail: Quatre en Rouge tells the story of a perfume  more daring  more passionate and more intense. A burning opus that reveals the flamboyant side of this woman so inspiring  to whom all would like to look.

name: realist
detail: Inspired by the ancient Buddhist incense ceremonies in Japan  this scent story follows a monk’s journey up a mountain and captures his enlightened spirit as the moon slips to give rise to morning. Exploring the olfactory passage from cold night to daybreak and the effect it has on the smell of the crisp mountain air  forest trees  and the few belongings he’s brought with him.

name: roses-de-chloe-15
detail: Roses de Chloé is an invitation to tenderness.

name: ddd
detail: A flower  like a magnificent dancer in movement  as captured by the gaze of an impressionist painter. In the background  we imagine music  perhaps Debussy  evoking the beauty of the stringed instruments. D.D.D. is a deeply luminous fragrance that conveys the joy of a splendid ballet.

name: craft-glamour
detail: In a unique collaboration  Miller Harris worked with The Royal Opera House to create Craft & Glamour  an Eau de Parfum inspired by the contrast and collaboration between the highly skilled artisans who work behind the scenes; costume designers  musicians  wig makers  painters and builders; and the opulence of the production; the velvet seats  gilded furniture  elaborate plaster mouldings  and decadent private boxes.

name: verbena-2
detail: A fragrant verbena from her parents' garden that perfumer Mylène Alran remembers rubbing in her hands as a child to keep the fragrance with her all day long. In an olfactory composition  this verbena enhances the bouquet with a delicate lemony freshness and a natural radiance.

name: bottega-veneta-eau-de-velours
detail: Mysterious and velvety  Bottega Veneta's Eau de Velours  is an intense and concentrated fragrance to seduce women looking for a sophisticated opulent scent.

name: kaviar-gauche
detail: The well-balanced ingredients of Kaviar Gauche mirror the typical floral design of the Couture label. Heart note is the tantalising scent of peony to symbolise the female nobleness. Aromatic woods as well as a spicy accord work as a striking contrast.

name: rosca-ametlla
detail: It all started with a rousquille and a particular taste that reminds us of childhood that takes us back to Catalonia. It also evokes the Spanish woman filmed by Almodovar. A woman so strong  full of character  who lifts mountains  yet sensitive  emotional and caring.

name: monoi-7
detail: Monoi is an original and magnificent fragrance with vibrant solar notes.

name: framboise-the-vert-matcha
detail: This fragrance expresses the powerful  deep vegetal notes of Matcha Green Tea with a touch of sulfur and green evoking the unique taste of Raspberry achenes.

name: scotch-soda-women-1
detail: Scotch & Soda Women starts is a modern scent that reveals an exhilarating and long lasting sensuality.

name: magnetic
detail: Magneticaddictive and sensual.

name: parco-palladiano-viii-neroli
detail: Parco Palladiano VIII Neroli brings to life a leisurely stroll through the orange grove in the early afternoon. Near the villa  the trees are in full bloom  filling the air with the scent of sweet  honeyed neroli infused with the woodiness of the bark.

name: beach-hut-woman
detail: This aromatic ode is a vintage flashback to the mesmerizing beaches and forgotten summers. Beyond the weathered beach hut and soft white sands  a garden full of bright wild flowers  despite the crisp  wintery air. The juxtaposition of warm and cool elements creates a scent that gives us all a sense of nostalgia.

name: brompton-immortals-extrait
detail: Created as a tribute to Harrods  Brompton Immortals Extrait is a sensual and warm scent mixing old English tradition and new olfactory adventures.

name: polo-earth-antilles-vetiver
detail: Consciously designed for all genders  Polo Earth Antilles Vetiver celebrates the beauty of nature with its natural-origin ingredients.

name: le-feu
detail: A milky infusion of flowers and spices  bark and rhizomes. Botanical and narcotic  an extravagant fragrance with pure  saturated and solar tones.

name: velvet-confident
detail: Velvet Confident is the invitation to be confident in your own skin  after all  a woman who is comfortable and confident in herself makes her revolutions on a daily basis.

name: hades
detail: Hadès is a fragrance dedicated to a dark and mysterious fascination  with a dominant presence that arouses turmoil in all who come into contact with it.

name: tasman-santal
detail: On an island at the end of the world  ancient eucalyptus trees tower into the sky. Surrounded by raindrops  their long blue-green leaves captivate with their unparalleled beauty. In the distance  the waves give rhythm to my journey in a sea of tree ferns. This sanctuary of intoxicating perfume entrusts me with a secret. Its warm  languid wood delights me  its magical scent stuns me. Tasmanian sandalwood.

name: soleil-de-jeddah-afterglow
detail: Soleil de Jeddah Afterglow is a sensual and voluptuous version of Soleil de Jeddah. A magnificent and captivating fragrance with a rich trail.

name: wood-mystique
detail: A divine fusion captivates at first breath. With a brilliant sparkle  this alluring first impression draws you deeply into Wood Mystique.

name: aqua-celestia-forte
detail: In an aura of absolute serenity  the blue of the sky and the blue of the sea separate  allowing the glow of a radiant sun to spring forth. A burst of heaven.

name: aqua-celestia-1
detail: The olfactory composition of Aqua Celestia is said to explore the different facets of the freshness of water.

name: one-love
detail: Throughout his life  Jean-Louis Scherrer travelled far and wide to draw inspiration for his creations. However  he always returned to Paris  which he called his "One Love". One Love. The name evokes a wealth of emotions  something individual  just like this exquisite and expressive fragrance.

name: silver-iris-1
detail: A woman of such intimidating beauty and sparkling vitality won the adoration of all those around her. Yet no one knew what she had been through. With her wild spirit  she was tough  stronger than metal and never looked back. When she met him for the first time in her life  she couldn't stop herself. She may have found the absolute man.

name: montaigne-1
detail: This Montaigne is a couture fragrance and the epitome of French elegance! Timeless.

name: lets-travel-to-paris-for-woman
detail: The most romantic city in the world! Because it is the cradle of chic  for its elegance and its inimitable charm  the so-called city of light deserves a hedonistic and relaxing stop.

name: white-flowers-1
detail: Les Royales Exclusives collection  one of the most ambitious projects in Creed's 250 years  the masterpiece White Flowers is a statement to the aesthetic world about the legacy  quality and collectability of fragrance as art. Olivier Creed uses hand-picked ingredients of this world to imagine a world that is beyond. Serene and composed  White Flowers is a voyage into spirit and dream.

name: monbloom-1
detail: Celebration time Five years represented by five main elements: exuberance  glitz/glamour  glamour  solemnity and emotionality. Just in time to celebrate Bloomingdale's Dubai's 5th anniversary.

name: 700-original-carrera-jeans-uomo
detail: A special scent  for classic fragances lovers that understand quality and choose a timeless fragrance with very sophisticated raw materials.

name: a-la-nuit
detail: A nocturnal scent pervades the warm air. Lady of the Night  white jasmine is the sleepwalker who climbs the walls of her milky way  opening her calyces to catch the breeze that will whisk her to the stars. Her long-coveted  incomparable sumptuous fragrance is synonymous with the night.

name: boucheron-eau-de-toilette
detail: Boucheron is a brilliant and sensual Oriental Floral. Sparkling and fruity at the start  its soft and sensual signature evokes a voluptuous bouquet of white flowers. Crowned with a sapphire colored cabochon and filled with a luminous golden perfume  Boucheron is like a precious jewel that enhances the allure of a remarkably beautiful and generous yet audacious and independent woman.

name: white-amber
detail: White Amber is a celebration of amber. It refers to the origin of the world as much as to its future. Its countless virtues never fail to bless those who wrap themselves in its suave and mysterious perfume.

name: raindrops-1
detail: Raindrops is a modern fragrance that exudes a sleek  simplistic elegance  enveloping the wearer in a delicate weave of contemporary elements. The fragrance  with its clean and simple elegance  is designed to appeal to women seeking practical scents  reminiscent of the freshness of the outdoors.

name: jasmin-imperatrice-eugenie-1
detail: Jasmin Impératrice Eugénie was commissioned by a historic French emperor for his wife  Empress Eugénie  who wanted a fragrance of seductive  oriental-floral charm. A sensual fragrance full of warmth and strength  much like the woman after whom it was named. Jasmin Impératrice Eugénie has become a favourite for women who appreciate an opulent scent that takes centre stage.

name: jasmin-de-toscane
detail: A celebration of the emblematic jasmine flower: elegant  modern and comforting.

name: joy-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A lighter  fresher version of the original Joy  it was offered as a gift to his valued American customers; a hymn to life in what was a difficult time for many of his customers. Joy has since become one of the great fragrances of haute perfumery.

name: musk-maliki-1
detail: Musk Maliki is like a garden full of blooming colourful flowers.

name: bella-belara-1
detail: Bella Belara is more than a fragrance  it's a beautiful feeling. The exuberant floral-fruity perfume captivates immediately. The senses are first treated to a delectable fruit medley. At the heart of this women's perfume  dew-covered flowers unfold  while a delightful mix of creamy blonde woods and cool moss linger.

name: pois-de-senteur
detail: A honeyed bouquet  the beloved flowers of spring  the memories of a trip in Italy.

name: revolution-de-la-fleur
detail: An escapist  floral scent  this stars the essential oil of Madagascan ylang-ylang whose energising properties promote inner strength and a sense of calm – being linked to the heart chakra. A few spritzes are enough to take you from the busy city streets to the sapphire waters of Tulum  with other exotic blooms like Moroccan jasmine and frangipani creating a sensory carnival.

name: very-sexy-fabulous-1
detail: Fluffy florals combined with weightless fruits on a base of whipped warmth. The result is an innovative floral fragrance that is beyond sexy.

name: tubexotic
detail: This extrait de parfum frees the tuberose from all those frills that give it the old-style aura typical of outdated lady's fragrances. Tubexotic is a sunny  pop and energetic jus.

name: regal
detail: Seductive and imposing. Regal conveys a sense of sophistication  charm and drama. Regal  one of the most majestic eau de parfums in our portfolio  is both majestic and seductive: an imperious perfume with animalic notes that leaves others in its wake.

name: rumz-al-rasasi-9453-pour-elle
detail: Beauty  grace  style  stealth with a mysterious edge makes for a fascinatingly lethal combination. Rumz Al Rasasi 9453 is for a woman who revels in the power of her unique and powerful personality.

name: bal-dafrique-1
detail: Focusing on beauty and fantasy  Bal d'Afrique is Ben Gorham's 'love letter' to Africa. Wishing to encapsulate and celebrate Africa's reach and influence through time  in particular the way its multiple cultures have shaped dance  art and music  the idea of an imaginary event.

name: infinity
detail: For our 20th birthday  discover Infinity. You will fall for this rare ambered and deeply oriental feeling  where subtlety and mystery set themselves as character traits.

name: the-ritual-of-holi-eau-so-lovely-1
detail: Project your personality into the world with a sophisticated floral fragrance perfect for the young  contemporary woman. This fragrance has a bit of sass with hints of sensual femininity  the sign of a woman ready to spread her wings and fly.

name: rose-de-grasse-joyful-bloom
detail: Joyful Bloom is a carefree and romantic fragrance for the woman who approaches each day with utter delight in the colour  spirit and energy of a city like New York. She feels an exuberance for discovery and the total joy of being oneself. It's the perfect symbol of the brand's 10 years of history and heritage as a lifestyle concept of its own.

name: lorose-1
detail: Communicating through fragrances  just like ants do. With a sophisticated formulation of the theoretical system inspired by the theory of communication used by ants  which leads us to a new way of creating and using fragrances.

name: aoud-lime-1
detail: The sensuality of precious oud from the mountains of Pakistan is refreshed by flowers from the East  on a background of resins to create a sensual and exotic perfume.

name: deep-night
detail: The fragrance of love" fuses rose with the delicacy of apricot and peach  which complement the vanilla and musk tones.

name: celestial
detail: The Romans were keen astronomers naming the planets after gods  and such was their belief in the power and influence of the skies over their destiny that they were also keen devotees of astrology. Inspired by the glittering night skies  this fragrance is heavenly  divine and fit for the gods.

name: full-gallop-1
detail: Full Gallop is a celebration of Diana Vreeland's love of dance. She discovered dance as a child. As well as giving her credit for her posture and great self-confidence  dance also gave her a sense of rhythm and cadence throughout her life. She would always reference and celebrate Diaghilev  Nijinsky  the Ballets Russes and Nureyev  among others.

name: beautiful-eau-de-parfum
detail: The fragrance of a thousand flowers. Romantic  tender  memorable  Beautiful is represented by a bride to symbolise the place it holds in the hearts of women everywhere. Like a thousand flowers in a single bouquet  with a woody warmth and a touch of citrus.
ingredients: ['Lily', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Jasmine (Morocco)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Tuberose', 'Orange Blossom', 'Carnation', 'Iris / Orris', 'Mandarin', 'Marigold', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Oakmoss', 'Clary Sage', 'Sandalwood', 'Thyme', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Vetiver']

name: cashmere-mist-1
detail: This sheer floral scent is profoundly personal and luxurious  and as private as the sensual embrace of cashmere on bare skin.

name: jolie-fleur-verte-1
detail: Jolie Fleur Verte  a uniquely easy-going  crisp and spirited fragrance inspired by the flowers and colors in Tory's garden.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: lesedi-la-rona-viii
detail: Inspired by the majestic heritage of the past leading to the vibrant modern culture of the East today  Lesedi La Rona VIII is a precious luxury aroma that transcends time and suffuses memories.

name: cashmere-mist-eau-de-toilette
detail: A sublime whisper of cashmere against bare skin. Cashmere Mist Eau de Toilette is a sheer floral fragrance. A lighter  fresher interpretation of the eau de parfum with a subtler concentration of essences.

name: jaipur-chant
detail: Jaipur Chant focuses on the essential oil of the tuberose flower. Spikenard is associated with love  sensitivity and intense emotions. In this fragrance  its effects are amplified by enveloping Moroccan jasmine  narcissus and sensual musk  illuminated by sparkling Italian lemon  for a ravishingly beautiful and feminine bouquet.

name: monoscent-g-1
detail: To impress  all you need is a white T-shirt. To make an impression  all you need is G Monoscent®. Unlike a perfume  G Monoscent® can be worn alone or as a base for other perfumes. G Monoscent® is the beginning of your own style that only you control and create. Wear it alone and let its subtle effect turn heads.

name: diamante
detail: A concept perfume through which we tried to recreate the idea of ​​unique notes  just like the gemme from which the fragrance takes its inspiration.

name: velvet-desert-oud-1
detail: Dolce & Gabbana Velvet Desert Oud presents a bold confrontation between incense  pink flashes of berries and fragrant flowers.

name: another-13-1
detail: Another 13 is a new exclusive fragrance from master perfumers. The name plays on the idea of superstition and fortune  and the number 13 is also the exact number of ingredients used to create the fragrance.

name: cuirs-1
detail: Redolent with nostalgia for a bygone era of artisan ateliers  where pipe smoke filled the air fusing with the scent of freshly tanned leather.

name: he-wood-rocky-mountain-wood
detail: Inspiration is the majestic beauty of pure pristine nature. An invitation to experience nature in-depth  feel one with its might and magnificence.

name: burberry-her
detail: Burberry Her is the embodiment of the Londoner attitude - adventurous  spirited  bold. It's a dedication to the city of London - a beautiful  bustling  creative metropolis that's eclectic and full of life.

name: musician
detail: My violin  a passion that is my obsession  one that makes me vibrate. It both punishes me and rewards me  it makes me soar and then lets me fall. The smell of wood  its feel. I caress its four strings with the bow  I press its neck firmly until notes emerge  reborn as feelings. Its touch against my neck  a forced hug  gruelling repetitions. Both of us lost in the loneliness of my room  united in the search for perfection until the melody transforms into art.

name: mercedes-benz-eau-intense-1
detail: A seductive city man  a charmer  sure of his strength  sure of himself  sure of his power to go further. To be stronger. For him  intensity is a question of personality. And his perfume reveals his sensuality. This is a sophisticated scent with a deep sillage that confirms the man's identity and accentuates his singularity. A fragrance that goes beyond and challenges the limits of power and seduction . To last.

name: ravenclaw-2022
detail: A refreshing and captivating scent that celebrates the value of aspirational intelligence  wisdom and charming creativity of Harry Potter's Ravenclaw House.

name: jv-x-nj-blue-edition
detail: "He's a musician  he's an artist  he's an actor  he's intrigued by everything in the world and I had a real connection with that " John Varvatos about his collaboration with Nick Jonas

name: verdigris
detail: Cardamom is the spark that ignites the explosive freshness of Verdigris. Aromatic notes accelerate to a powerful cool with the cold winter accord  a collection of high-tech fragrance molecules evoking a lasting aquatic quality from top to base.
ingredients: ['Z11 (Woody ambery)', 'Cardamom', 'Cascalone (Marine)', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)', 'Aldehyde', 'Thyme', 'Violet Leaves', 'Hivernal (Lily of the valley)', 'Titanium accord']

name: maxima-icon-1
detail: Icon  a powerful development unit of modern fragrances and ancient treasures  is crafted with an intense vibrancy of ingredients. The fragrance structure is faceted with rich textures and luminous florals that leave a lasting impression.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Pink Pepper', 'Floral Notes', 'Mandarin', 'Hivernal (Lily of the valley)', 'Amber', 'Jasmine', 'Woody Notes', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: armani-code-sport
detail: "A concentrate of pure tension  like an explosion of citric and icy freshness on a base of vibrant wood and sensual amber "  Jacques Cavallier  Perfumer.

name: nautica-blue-ambition-1
detail: There is who I am and who I strive to be. We are in constant chase. Only hard work and discipline allow me to race my best self across the water towards the horizon. Using every ounce of strength  victory is in sight.
ingredients: ['Bergamot', 'Clearwood (Patchouli note)', 'Oakmoss', 'Pine Needles', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Amber', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Mandarin', 'Hivernal (Lily of the valley)']

name: kenzo-homme-sport-extreme
detail: "Kenzo Homme Sport Extreme creation stretches this approach to the 'extreme' with a man who is completely relaxed  virile and sure of himself." - François Demachy  Perfumer

name: musk-freeze
detail: Overcome the greatest heights. Discover unlimited freshness in a bold scent that embodies your brave spirit. Shatter your limits.
ingredients: ['Mint', 'Mountain Air', 'Ice Cube Effect', 'Basil', 'Clary Sage', 'Juniper Berries', 'Oakmoss', 'Hivernal (Lily of the valley)']

name: haiku-reflections-1
detail: Haiku Reflection takes you on a journey of inner peace and balance. The simple elegance of this fragrance makes it perfect for everyday wear.

name: malbec-ultra-bleu-1
detail: The most intense and striking version of Malbec Bleu is inspired by the depths of the ocean. It is made for the man who is sure of himself in any occasion and who knows that confidence makes him even more attractive.

name: leau-dissey-eaumagnolia
detail: Undulating water  both fresh and enveloping  meets mischievous magnolia. There is an almost divine connection between two elements: water  so silky against the skin  and air radiant with light that shines through magnolia petals. An infusion of flowers like vibrant  sun-kissed dew. An intense scent that cannot be captured. Almost a daydream  yet so addictive.

name: glacier-air
detail: Glacier is for the man who seeks the thrill of adventure. A fragrance inspired by the most exhilarating moments in nature.

name: malbec-bleu
detail: "Malbec Bleu is a fragrance that represents the sea. The great challenge of this project was to bring a striking and modern freshness to the woody personality of the fragrance. We worked with the aquatic notes of the Aquazone® molecule  highlighting a mineral nuance and a totally innovative signature strength"  Alberto Morillas  Perfumer.

name: thats-me-honest-1
detail: With Honest  Helene Fischer reveals even more about herself and her remarkable character  which is reflected in her songs. The all-rounder comes across like her scent: honest  honest!

name: acqua-di-gio-profondo-1
detail: Aqua di Giò Profondo is more than a fragrance; It is a captivating immersion in the depth of the soul  which embraces the values ​​of freedom  sensory and modern masculinity to reveal an increasingly intimate dimension.

name: musk-freeze-2
detail: Dive into the intense invigoration with the ice-cold cuttings of crisp  chilled notes  energised by alpine aromatics  the essence of icy peaks  all rising from an earthy base. The exclusive Ice chord brings the cold mountain air and creates a unique freezing sensation.
ingredients: ['Basil', 'Mountain Air', 'Oakmoss', 'Mint', 'Clary Sage', 'Juniper Berries', 'Herbs ', 'Tangerine', 'Hivernal (Lily of the valley)']

name: mercedes-benz-le-parfum-1
detail: The eternal masculine fragrance. This man takes his place in a luxurious and refined world. He reflects his time. Urban and self-confident. Refined and elegant. The epitome of savoir-vivre. He knows what he owns the past and accepts his place in tradition. Man  at his best.

name: blue-gin
detail: Blue Gin is a play on words and meanings  an effect of materials and sensations  somewhere between the supple and loyal cotton of denim and the freshness of ice cubes before the gin ignites the palate.

name: nordic-waters-for-her
detail: The relationship with water in the Nordics runs deep. Everchanging  yet always there  this vibrant watery scent will entice you into this mesmerising aquatic world with each refreshing spritz.

name: acqua-di-gio-pour-homme-essenza
detail: "The strength of the sea and the brightness of the sky are the elements that I am drawn towards the most in Pantelleria. For Acqua di Giò Essenza  I wanted to create a concentrate of power and sensuality." – Giorgio Armani

name: oscar-blue-velvet-1
detail: Modern tweaks bring a contemporary twist to this timeless classic  creating a new legacy of elegance.

name: bendito-beso
detail: Formentera  the aroma of the sea  the green of the Savina forests and the wild bushes. The blinding sun  reflecting on the water  traces on the sand left as the water disappears and the heat of the sun on the skin as a warm tanned body comes out of the water.

name: love-mimosa
detail: Encapsulating a unique essence like no other  the facets of Amouage mimosa are sublimated with rare ingredients that lighten this flower.

name: acqua-essenziale
detail: Acqua Essenziale - the name that evokes the feeling of intimacy through the combination of the most essential natural element  Water. And the highest form of authenticity  Essence. A perfume created for a man in search for authentic emotions.

name: un-musc
detail: A sensation of tender skin.

name: une-vanille-1
detail: The forbidden fruit of an exotic orchid.

name: why-not-a-fougere
detail: Why not a fougère is a modern interpretation of the classical fougère accord. With an overdose of sensual accords  a slightly fruity top note for modernity and a leathery bottom note for depth and elegance.

name: for-your-love
detail: The scent of another. For Your Love is about taking risks. Imagine the scent of a kiss  with all the olfactory sensations that you experience in that fraction of second as you approach the other person. The intimacy of skin  powdery fragrance of lipstick. It's all there. The sensuality of skin touching skin in a gentle caress.

name: poudre-dor
detail: "The idea of this perfume was to create an olfactory fairytale. I have always been fascinated by the quiet and precious moments in the evening  when everyone is getting ready. There is something fairy-like about these moments that remind me of a children's fairy tale when the enchanter blows magic powder from his hands. I chose a narrow palette to go straight to the essential and transcribe the lightness of three elements: gold  powder and light"  Alberto Morillas  Perfumer.

name: xtraem
detail: Xtraem is one in a series of powerful elixirs that redefine contemporary perfumery as we know it. This wonderful fragrance can be worn alone or personalised for an individual edge.

name: 4711-x-hanna-artist-edition-2023
detail: The design of the Artist Edition 2023 comes from the young artist Hanna Schönwald. Her vision is to reintegrate art into everyday life  with nature as the primary model. Elegant figures made of organic lines adorn the bottle. The fragrance of the 4711 x HANNA Artist Edition 2023 combines selected ingredients that combine notes of classic perfume art with modern elements  a high-contrast and feminine homage of ingredients to classic eaux de cologne.

name: daymon
detail: Daymon is a joyful  enigmatic and present spirit  all inside. Daymon is play and therapy. Daymon is love that we give and receive through animals by free will. Daymon is the being without a word that reaches out and loves better than with conventional language. Daymon is the eloquence of silence. Daymon is our spiritual guide. Imagined being embodied in fabulous animals.

name: crystal-saffron
detail: Built around one of the highest quality saffron oils in the world  from the Kozani region of Greece  Crystal Saffron is a 360-degree screen capture of this most expensive and complex of spices  from its piercing iodine flare to its dusky  sunburnt leather finish.

name: ultrae-1
detail: Ultrae is one in a series of powerful elixirs that redefine contemporary perfumery as we know it. Based around a single ingredient  aldambre  this aldehydic woody-amber fragrance can be worn alone or personalised for an individual edge.

name: dancing-night-1
detail: Bright as the night! The fusion of citrus with juicy plump fruit starts of this fragrance as it merges into a floral heart. An irresistible signature creates a perfect drydown like an endless party!

name: ithrah-al-oud
detail: Ithrah Al Oud is your secret potion  with you throughout the day  always on hand to entice your senses.

name: her-brave
detail: Her Brave is a fragrance that represents the authentic  feminine woman who lives intensely  without labels and without fear of being who she is.

name: nox-femme
detail: This fragrance is like the night  unexpected but beautiful. It is lush and intense  with an edgy lingering trail.

name: crystallised-sugar
detail: A sweet  gentle burst of vibrant  electric beauty.

name: oud-eclat
detail: A woody scent of poetic alchemy  set at the counter balance of nature  where beauty needs shadows to be defined.

name: velvet-dusk-1
detail: Velvet Dusk is inspired by Shakespeare's “The Tragedy of Hamlet  Prince of Denmark”. It explores timeless  deep and dark themes like life and death  appearance and reality  strength and weakness  and love and revenge.

name: hydra-figue
detail: Allowing the wearer to journey to a Greek bohemian paradise with a fragrant ode to an island as evocative as it is inspiring  Hydra Figue captures the organic spirit  wild beauty and slow pace of the Greek island  Hydra.
ingredients: ['Oak', 'Fig', 'Sea Water', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Sandalwood', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Cedrat', 'Ginger', 'Lemon', 'Marine', 'Musk', 'Saffron', 'Clary Sage', 'Tuberose', 'Beauty Of The Night', 'Ouzo Accord']

name: myrica-muse-1
detail: What is the moment of the aperitif? A stolen pause  enjoyed alone  quiet  elegant and in reflection for the joy to come. Walking in the evening sun and sitting outside a café. A moment to oneself before joining the party. Myrica Muse is a fragrance that reflects this renewed sense of energy  enthusiasm and hope. Freedom in confidence with an air of retro charm and glamour.

name: belle-au-parfum-de-oud-1
detail: Crossing the city at lightning speed  the Belle left behind a sliver of her being  the Sensual Oud. Adorned with this freshly picked flower  the Belle au parfum de Oud enchanted the whole of Paris  her imprint forever imprinted on our memories.

name: save-me-1
detail: The Save Me Trust defends European wildlife  monitoring related international campaigns. It was founded by Dr. Brian May and Anne Brummer with the intention of saving and safeguarding wildlife. Our fragrance helps to sustain wildlife and the environment to ensure a secure future for every inhabitant of the earth.

name: vanille-safran
detail: Vanille Safran is a delicate and sensual eau de toilette. It offers a pure vision of vanilla.

name: violet-charade-2021-1
detail: A fragrance full of life. Violet Charade is inspired by The Thousand and One Nights  a classic storybook filled with love stories  tragedies  comedies and poems  as well as tales with elements of eroticism. Like the story of life.

name: rouge-prive-1
detail: Rouge Privé is inspired by the dark novel "Roxana" by Daniel Defoe. It tells the story of a woman who has exchanged her virtue for a perverse life as a lucky mistress of rich and powerful men. The novel deals with themes of seduction  dreams of fame  illusions  escape and triumph over personal weaknesses.

name: icon-man
detail: A captivating and captivating masculine fragrance. A fruity blend of citrus aromas with sensual spices on an attractive woody ambery base.

name: the-basilic-1
detail: An inspiration born in the depth of Sri Lanka  shimmering green hills of tea as far as the eye can see  joining fragrant forces with the most symbolic of the aromatic herbs found in the South of France. Thé Basilic is the ideal alchemy between serenity and freshness.

name: jette-7flowers-peony-1
detail: For 7Flowers Peony  Jette was inspired by a legend  which tells of the night before mid-summer  when unmarried girls pick seven varieties of wild flowers from seven different meadows  then place them under their head pillows. At night they are to dream of the man whom they will marry.

name: muse-3
detail: Committed to using the finest and rarest materials  Italian luxury perfume house Xerjoff artfully combines traditional craftsmanship with contemporary creativity.

name: reverie-de-bergamote-1
detail: Bright and quiet mornings  life breathing music in the air.

name: black-datura-2023
detail: Originally launched as a Limited Edition  this mesmerising scent was inspired by the datura  also called moonflower  a flower that opens in the evening. Black Datura leaves you feeling powerful and elegant  ready for the night to unfold  wherever it may take you.

name: like-a-first-day-in-spring-1
detail: Essence Like A First Day In Spring - warm rays of sunshine on the skin  the fresh scent of flowers in the air. It's finally time to go outside - you feel so alive!

name: exquisite-lily
detail: “The luxury winding of flowers with an oriental burst of sensuality ” Emilie Bouge  Perfumer.

name: uden-overdose
detail: Capturing the moment when the waves come crashing over the coastline  their blueness melting with the rocks  turning into foam  and returning to the sea.

name: oud-safran
detail: A powerful  vibrant  and explosive fragrance. The saffron from Greece  with woody and subtle leather notes  brings elegance and character to the oud. A fragrance with a thousand smoky scents enhanced by the smoothness of the rose.

name: caline-tender-moments-2010-1
detail: Reminiscent of morning blooms and delicate freshness.

name: young-man-sea-sun
detail: A wave of freshness by the beach! The salty ocean air heats up step by step and diffuses aromatic marine notes  making for a spontaneous and passionate scent.

name: ithaka
detail: Ithaka is part of Mendittorosa's olfactory trilogy  which explores the relationship between poetry and perfumery.

name: patchouli-cannelle
detail: A cosy  sensual moment like an olfactory caress. A comforting fragrance  as luxurious as skin  that warms both skin and mind.

name: love-1
detail: The heavenly  feminine LOVE fragrance is inspired by the unique feeling of angels. Soft as a first bud  or ever-present.

name: bois-velours-1
detail: The burning kisses of the glowing red sun sting the steppes with hints of dry  hot wood. As the day fades  round notes of leather and flowers fill the air. Whoever then ventures into this forest of brush catches a glimpse of the captive richness of the roots  the velvety depths of this wild land.

name: vivid-velvet
detail: “This nectar of flowers settles on the skin like an ambery flutter ” Emilie Bouge  Perfumer.

name: muse-4
detail: Muse is a gift to women who love all that is beautiful and rare. A sign of modern femininity  delicate notes of white Mediterranean flowers come together with character-defining leather and amber to create an intoxicating scent.

name: baiser-de-neiges
detail: Sparkling and seductive  the Baiser de Neiges woman flirts with retro looks and always knows how to marry creativity and confidence. Her fragrance? It is perfectly aligned to her personality. An undeniably feminine fragrance  deliberately funny to embrace and fully enjoy life.

name: like-hugs-kisses
detail: This is what a date with your favourite fragrance should be like. This fragrance is super fun and makes you feel like you're in love  like hugs & kisses.

name: vixi
detail: Vixi is like a flow of life filled with clarity  an exploration of inner light.

name: dream-ceu-de-baunilha-1
detail: Dream Ceu De Baunilha invites you to give free rein to your imagination and make life much more enjoyable. Imagine a place where all your sweet dreams can come true. Here you are free to dream whatever you want. A world where indulgence is allowed without any judgement.

name: sabha-wa-oud
detail: Sab'ha Wa Oud was created to make one's soul dance in pure joy  embodying inspiring love.

name: oud-d-arabie-2
detail: Oud d'Arabie is a seductive and romantic fragrance.

name: raneen-al-jawahar-2
detail: An enticing  captivating scent with light and refreshing accords.

name: stamina-for-women-1
detail: Avon Stamina and it's sensual aroma carries you away to a charming oriental garden full of flowers in bloom.

name: possess
detail: Timeless  sparkling yet intensely seductive  Possess Eau de Parfum embodies the provocative allure of Cleopatra  whose legendary powers of seduction brought Mark Antony to his knees. Laced with intoxicatingly tempting notes of ylang ylang  this sexy  luminous fragrance leaves no one indifferent as it casts a hypnotic spell of attraction.

name: khashab-al-oud-hindi
detail: Khashab Al Oud Hindi strikes your emotions and quickly changes to delight.

name: frutas-tropicais-1
detail: A light and fruity fragrance that brings vibrant notes of tropical fruits  surrounded by the freshness of pitanga.

name: pink-gold-eau-de-parfum
detail: A deliciously playful perfume that will turn heads wherever you go. This perfume may seem sweet and innocent  but beware! It is dynamic.

name: vip-oud
detail: Take a moment to engage in a truly stunning sensory experience with VIP Oud.

name: humor-liberta
detail: Inspired by the potential for transformation and the free spirit of a generation that does not give up being happy in its own skin  Humor Liberta offers a light and fluid way to wear perfume  with vibrant notes of freedom.
ingredients: ['Apple', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Cedarwood', 'Vetiver', 'Bergamot', 'Pink Pepper', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Geranium', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Maltol (Praline)', 'Musk', 'Suede']

name: andaluiza
detail: Andaluiza is a dive into a thousand-year-old Andalusian garden that delights all five senses and creates a link between the East and the West.
ingredients: ['Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Ambergris', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Vetiver (Bourbon)', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Fir Balsam', 'Mandarin', 'Pink Pepper', 'Pomegranate', 'Saffron', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Vanillin (Vanilla note)', 'Tonkalactone', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Maltol (Praline)', 'Patchouli', 'Damascenone (Apple Rosy note)']

name: rose-somptueuse
detail: An exquisite fragrance  full of energy and joy.

name: dillo-alla-luna-1
detail: Chic  intimate  contrasting. The essence of elegance  a secret whispered under the moonlight.
ingredients: ['Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Juniper Berries', 'Black Pepper', 'Ambrocenide (Woody ambery)', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Ambrostar (Woody Ambery)', 'Bergamot', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon', 'Amarocit (Grapefruit Note)', 'Amber', 'Cardamom', 'Cypress', 'Lavender', 'Pink Pepper', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Longoza']

name: les-fleurs-de-lanvin-sunny-magnolia-1
detail: A luminous fragrance with an bright  energising sillage.

name: les-fleurs-de-lanvin-water-lily
detail: A delicate scent with a soothing  romantic sillage.

name: essencial-masculino-ato
detail: The exuberance of the Pau-Brasil flower in a golden and luminous accord  intensified by the surprising encounter with Priprioca  a precious Amazonian root.
ingredients: ['Guaiac Wood', 'Priprioca', 'Paubrasilia Flower', 'Cedarwood', 'Sandalwood', 'Vetiver', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Orange', 'Pataqueira', 'Black Pepper', 'Watery', 'Amber', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Orange Blossom', 'Osmanthus', 'Solar Notes', 'Jasmine (Sambac)']

name: build-your-self
detail: Build Your-Self was created for people who think that individuality is a reinterpretation of uniqueness.

name: ambre-cello
detail: This mystical scent evokes the story of a nomad  a genius virtuoso. Divine cello notes. Unspeakable magic. Lyrical and silky amber scents floating in the desert.

name: liqueur-bpm
detail: A tribute to artificial paradises  an infinite source of inspiration for accursed poets of yesterday and today.

name: walking-in-porta-venezia
detail: Imagine you are wandering in the gardens of Porta Venezia  the first public park in Milan  under the effect of the so-called Fée Verte  the green fairy: absinthe. In this scent  the herbal liqueur becomes the key for exploring all the secrets of nature  both its dark side and its luminous aspects. The result is a fragrance that is exhilarating yet dangerous: two forbidden drops hidden amongst woods and flowers.

name: the-rose-1
detail: The Rose is the perfect summer elixir.

name: black-suede-secret-1
detail: This fragrance is your confidence boost to reveal your secret seductive side.

name: cristal-deau
detail: A composition as fresh and airy as a pure breath.
ingredients: ['Iris / Orris', 'Musk', 'Green Apple', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Woody Notes']

name: dove-lacqua-e-piu-blu-1
detail: Elegant  intimate  contrasting. This scent evokes the essence of elegance  a secret whispered under the moonlight.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Bergamot', 'Marine', 'Linalool (Floral Note)', 'Sea Daffodil', 'Ginger', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin', 'Orange', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Cedarwood', 'Musk', 'Patchouli']

name: dirty-rose
detail: Not your traditional rose perfume  Dirty Rose shows the naughty side of this classic floral. Created for the romantics and the heart breakers  the classics and the rule benders  this is a rose perfume you could run away with.

name: spicydelice
detail: "Spicydelice is a homage to my grandmother from Algeria  who knew how to convey the richness of our heritage through her generously spiced cuisine " Marine Ipert  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Cinnamon', 'Muscenone (Musk)', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Elemi', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla (Bourbon)', 'Vanillin (Vanilla note)', 'Cardamom', 'Clove', 'Nutmeg', 'Black Pepper', 'Ginger (Madagascar)', 'Bergamot', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Davana', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Maltol (Praline)', 'Mandarin', 'Patchouli', 'Red Berries', 'Sandalwood', 'Violet', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Vetiver (Bourbon)', 'Linalool (Floral Note)', 'Ambrostar (Woody Ambery)', 'Damascenone (Apple Rosy note)']

name: magnetic-kiss
detail: Magnetic Kiss is an ode to feminine sensuality: addictive  playful and hypnotic  it deploys its aura in all its intensity.

name: spicy-galanga
detail: A cologne infused with sparkling  spicy galangal  contrasted by the softly spicy note of ginger flower. Dry woods add sensuality to the base notes.

name: se-blazing-warmth
detail: Bask in the warmth of new beginnings with this vibrantly intense fragrance. Reminiscent of blazing fires  the scent surges with optimism and joy  capturing the blooming sensations of bright dreams. Luminous and contrasted  an unexpected experience awaits.

name: se-wild-hearts
detail: Feel the freedom of a wild wind touching your heart with.SE Wild Hearts. Inspired by cool  misty lakes  this delicately addictive fragrance exhilarates your senses with true emotions that catapult straight to your heart. An intense calling beats inside  ready to release newfound freedom.

name: mandarina-duck-for-her-1
detail: Mandarina Duck's for Her and for Him traces an authentic generational identikit  where HE and SHE become THEY  a group of people united not only by age  but also through shared values and aspirations. They don't believe that an open mind is a skull fracture. They are ironic  active and great travellers  able to enjoy life and concerned about the fate of the planet.

name: supreme-desire
detail: A dark  aromatic scent.

name: sexy-muse-1
detail: A delicious and bewitching scent.

name: valentina-blush
detail: Valentina Blush leaves a heavenly mist on the skin. A simple gesture is all it takes for the soft yet sharp mischievous hue to surface  revealing its gentle notes and making cheeks turn rosy. The wholesome facets of the citrus blossom unravel against a gourmand background. A bright  radiant signature  overflowing with contrasts.

name: electric-cherry
detail: "Electric Cherry is both effervescent and playful. A fragrance that captures the early  flirtatious stages of romance " Tom Ford.

name: fleur-defendue-forbidden-flower
detail: The new fragrance by Lolita Lempicka is heady  intriguing and leaves you feeling utterly intoxicated  thanks to its forbidden fragrance. Created in the heart of the garden of voluptuous delights  Lolita Lempicka Fleur Défendue has chosen nature as its beautiful setting. This forbidden flower  whose appearance is its only innocent aspect  is misleadingly angelic…

name: paris-santorin
detail: Sail away one last time this sunny season with the vibrant notes of Paris - Santorin  an ode to Figue in all the nuances that nature can bring  uniquely blends the juicy side of the fruit with its fresh green leaves.
ingredients: ['Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Fig Leaf', 'Fig', 'Sandalwood', 'Bergamot', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tonka Bean', 'Iris / Orris', 'Everlasting Flower']

name: love-potion-blossom-kiss-1
detail: Open the doors to a dreamy world! Enjoy the seductive scent of Love Potion Blossom Kiss. A passionate and inviting fragrance.

name: radiant-peony
detail: Renowned for its stunning large blooms and countless petals  the peony flower is beautifully soft with the sweetest scent. This fragrance is a reminder that the beauty of nature is all around us.

name: 212-vip-rose-i-ny-2023
detail: Carolina Herrera celebrates the energy of the world's most vibrant city with 212 VIP Rosé I Love NY. Who doesn't love New York? Carolina Herrera loves it. The legendary brand was born in the Big Apple  and has been deeply rooted in it ever since. "That was my first fragrance project  and I was trying to capture the free  creative and uncomplicated spirit of New York's youth " explains Carolina A. Herrera  Creative Director of I Love NY. Herrera  Creative Director of Carolina Herrera fragrances. In 2023  the brand pays homage to an enduring symbol of the city that never sleeps: the I Love New York logo  created by Milton Glaser in 1977  with a unique version of the iconic women's fragrance from the 212 collection. 212 VIP Rosé I Love NY  the bubbly fantasy for her  incorporates lactic and spicy nuances with a surprising twist. Its creators  perfumers Emilie Coppermann and Marine Ipert  have described it as a "musky latte"  the perfect kind of accessory for those strong women who start their day in New York with a latte to go and a pair of fabulous stilettos or trainers. The fragrance places creamy softness and sweetness at the heart of 212 VIP Rosé's floral explosion.

name: oh-sweet-dulce-de-leche
detail: Just one spritz of this deliciously addictive scent will tantalise your scent tastebuds.

name: bandit-supreme-1
detail: With Bandit Suprême  Robert Piguet salutes the original scent's extraordinary sensibilities while translating its most daring characteristics for the modern consumer. The end result is a linear formulation that is replete with contradictions as disruptive as they are appealing.

name: noble-xxi-art-deco-amberwood
detail: A smooth and almost translucent amber is enhanced with rich and opulent woods to create a beguiling perfume.
ingredients: ['Timberwood (Woody Note)', 'Angelica', 'Clary Sage', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)', 'Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Bergamot', 'Iris / Orris', 'Patchouli', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Helvetolide (Musk)', 'Muscenone (Musk)', 'Sclarene']

name: morning-waves
detail: Just like the rising sun  rise to every occasion with this exotic fragrance.

name: certified-original-brown
detail: This is an original singular scent with a soft  warm signature.

name: aquarius
detail: This is a fine  fresh  optimistic fragrance with punchy top notes  an elegant heart  and a pure  warm dry down.

name: winter
detail: Whether you are going to the office or to a party  enjoy winter time with this magnificently warm and alluring fragrance.

name: h24-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: The H 24 space opens up  giving expression to the depth and sensuality of the materials. Sage  rosewood  narcissus  and sclarene still compose the olfactory range of the eau de parfum  but shaken up  in different proportions.
