name: orange-amere-de-tunisie
detail: A celebration of the orange trees from Tunisia.

name: orange-calabria
detail: "The light of the sunset reflects on the sea. From the top of the hill  a divine view emerges on a green area. Between vineyards and bergamots  a bright color stands out. By getting closer  I let the bracing essence of this region invade me. At the heart of citrus fruits plantations  a dazzling pearl is waiting me. The Orange from Calabria. Sparkling and fascinating." - Mélanie Leroux  Perfumer

name: une-fleur-doranger-1
detail: Candour liberated from an olfactory oxymoron.

name: forgive-me
detail: Forgive me is like discovering another version of yourself in the mirror. It's a perfume that expresses passion  irresistible attraction  contrasting feelings.

name: eau-de-givenchy-1
detail: Inspired by the original fragrance launched in 1980 by Hubert de Givenchy  Eau de Givenchy conveys cheekiness  joie de vivre and youth. This fresh  crystal-clear fragrance expresses carefree elegance.

name: holy-neroli
detail: Let yourself be captured by the revelation of neroli when  in the midst of this olfactory dance  vanilla and white musk form a edge of honor.

name: flora-carnivora
detail: Our first true floral scent. Flora Carnivora: nature in its primal state.

name: grand-bal
detail: "In Venice  when a ball is held  an air of mystery prevails. Elegance hides behind masks just as jasmine conceals its almost animal potency behind a floral facet. I find that this scent has the powerful  nocturnal and sensual charm of a Venetian ball " François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: neroli-oranger
detail: A work on the purity of orange blossom.

name: wings
detail: A fragrance designed to capture the freedom a woman feels when she lets herself go. For the woman who wants to be free inside. For the woman who wants to feel euphoric  free and spontaneous. A bright fragrance with exciting sensual undertones.

name: love-and-tears-surrender-1
detail: The unconditional surrender to the love of the Mediterranean jasmine.

name: wild-jasmine
detail: Liberate the fearlessly adventurous side of your spirit with Wild Jasmine. We know you'll love the refreshed look of our bestselling Indian Night Jasmine.

name: lelisir-de-nuit
detail: L'Elisir de Nuit is a fragrance full of love  passion and intrigue. Dare to give your daily life creative energy  elegance and refined luxury.

name: shazeb
detail: Walk around and get noticed with Shazeb.
ingredients: ['Woody Notes', 'Lavender', 'Patchouli', 'Bergamot', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Lime', 'Sandalwood', 'Green of Tangerine', 'Amber', 'Floral Notes', 'Fruity Notes', 'Musk']

name: white-blossom
detail: Inspired by the feminine sweetness  purity and beauty.

name: 247-vip-very-ibiza-party-for-him-2021-1
detail: A youthful fragrance  full of personality  that will accompany you all day long  so that you dare to go to the limit at the most VIP Pachá party. Don't miss it!
ingredients: ['Vanilla', 'Black Pepper', 'Green of Tangerine', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Bergamot', 'Ginger', 'Grapefruit', 'Musk', 'Green Apple']

name: isis
detail: Agonist Isis  a perfume dedicated to a vision: the flowers trapped in the ice during the winter and which the new season releases  exploding with energy; the new life of nature. There is a deep connection between winter and spring  and this transition  though violent  is remarkably similar to the tension that exists in glass when it is being blown... a creative tension that then explodes into a new form.

name: bouquet-de-hongrie-1
detail: It is getting ready. It is a beautiful day. The sky is blue. Like every morning  she goes out onto her flower-filled balcony. Her flat  on the 4th floor  overlooks the gardens of the Palais Royal. She is happy and smiling  thinking about the day ahead.

name: remarkable-people-1
detail: Remarkable People  these are our people. The remarkable citizens of Etat Libre d'Orange  the Orange Free State. The "un" people  uncompromising  unexpected  unconventional  unpredictable. We salute them  we honour them by offering the extraordinary fragrance they deserve.

name: the-ghost-in-the-shell-1
detail: Ghost in the Shell is a perfume that speaks of the human phenomenon and its paradox  a perfume to wear on oneself ab libitum  at one’s pleasure. A perfume as a propagation towards the other  that makes you the axis and the arrow of evolution. Modern  indeed! From the bottom of the matter  rise up.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Peach', 'Vinyl Guaiacol', 'Moss', 'Mugane (Lily of the Valley)', 'Lorenox (Ambergris)', 'Milk', 'Skin Accord', 'Yuzu', 'Watery', 'Orcanox (Ambergris)', 'Hexyl Acetate']

name: stay-cool
detail: Crisp  clean  breezy and invigorating.

name: dangerous-complicity
detail: For inspiration  we look at Adam and Eve. By eating the forbidden fruit  complicity took on another dimension and became dangerous. They lost their innocence and their paradise. The door was opened to carnal energy  they were freed from restrictions and could now create their own version of Eden. That forbidden fruit became a single ticket to the Etat Libre d'Orange.

name: shine-like-a-night
detail: Shine Like a Night is an olfactory score about the exciting moment when a girl puts on her shiny new evening gown and prepares for a night out full of laughter and pure fun with her friends  when girls just want to have fun.

name: woody-gold-1
detail: In this resplendent composition  gold is transmuted into scent  its matchless qualities reflected in a blend of luminous accords. Woody Gold is a dazzling tribute to the most fascinating of all metals.

name: emanuel-ungaro-intense-for-her-1
detail: Intense for Her was conceived for a cosmopolitan  metropolitan young woman who feels the perfume she wears as an empowering means and an authentic form of freedom and self-expression.

name: fleur-universelle-1900
detail: This composition is based on the immortal Eternal Flower  a flower with a unique power of renewal and an ability to endure over time. The chypre scent evokes both the past and the present  melding memories into an incredibly modern  addictive and warm accord.

name: parfum-captive-3
detail: J.F. Schwarzlose Berlin tells the tales that lie in between the obvious. The creation of perfume is an art that has a story to tell; an individual story for every person who wear our Parfum Captives - they will enchant the wearer along with their surroundings.

name: eternity-for-men-cologne-1
detail: Fresh and masculine  this spicy  earthy Cologne is inspired by the simple pleasures of the outdoors. Evoking a crisp ocean breeze fused with the aromantic scent of Mediterranean greenery during an early morning stroll along the beach.

name: les-bouquets-dorlane-autour-de-la-pivoine
detail: Autour de la Pivoine and its sensual aroma carry you away to a charming oriental garden full of flowers in bloom.

name: the-street-artists-of-isola
detail: "I wanted to characterise this perfume with notes of fennel that are both wild and inviting. It gives the composition an exquisite natural effect with a truly unique touch of radiant and vibrant freshness " Véronique Nyberg  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Iris (Florentine/Tuscany)', 'Fennel Seeds', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Mugane (Lily of the Valley)', 'Cyclamen', 'Water Lily', 'Amberwood', 'Lorenox (Ambergris)', 'Musk']

name: let-you-love-me-1
detail: It smells of boldness and sensuality  of determination and femininity  of the invincible strength of a passionate woman kissing the man of her dreams and saying: "I let you love me".

name: tierra-del-fuego-la-martina-1
detail: An intense fragrance with character and a mysterious and captivating trail.

name: luxe-calme-volupte
detail: A sumptuous and lush concoction that transports you to a parallel universe of abundance  away from everyday worries  to a place of sensual calm  offering solace to your soul. Inspired by a line from Baudelaire's poem "Invitation au Voyage"  it will take you to places of pleasure.

name: corfu
detail: There is nothing like fresh air to clean the mind. Refresh yourself with Corfu to revive your sunny holiday memories
ingredients: ['Woody Ambery Note', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Green of Tangerine', 'Bergamot', 'Clary Sage', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: orpheon
detail: To mark its 60th anniversary  Diptyque has chosen to pay homage to the Latin Quarter of Paris  and the heart of the city's artistic and intellectual nightlife. The atmosphere has been recreated  although since there is no one left that can personally recall these places  the key requirement was to reinvent them. Orphéon is an olfactory dream.
ingredients: ['Patchouli', 'Jasmine (Arabia)', 'Juniper Berries', 'Magnolia', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Rose Damascena', 'Amber', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Cedarwood', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Galbanum', 'Honey', 'Lemon', 'Lentisk', 'Musk', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vetiver', 'Ice Cube Effect', 'Green of Tangerine', 'Benzoin (Laos)']

name: venitienne
detail: Galvanised by the weekend effervescence of the floating city  the Sistelle woman is Venetian. Vibrant and sensual at the same time  this fragrance embodies the mysterious and romantic woman who is not afraid to live and love.

name: lucrethia
detail: A fragrance created for hypnotic  spellbinding power and sensual  exciting beauty.

name: la-vie-est-belle-intensement
detail: Joy is a feeling that lives in us and accompanies us powerfully through the here and now. This attitude towards life beats in La Vie Est Belle Intensément.

name: jadore-edition-eau-de-toilette-2007-1
detail: Sparkling  joyful and radiant: the J'adore eau de toilette's dazzling fragrance story continues.

name: etrango
detail: Etrango is a complex scent  vibrant  self-confident  exotic and irreverent  just like the city of Berlin. a kaleidoscope for all senses. Each and every olfactory note is an invitation into the vaudeville of imagination.

name: mandarino-lubin
detail: Alongside a field of jasmine  some children have set up a stall selling lemonade. Their “Mandarino” is made from the juice of a handful of slightly bitter kumquats  and a few sweet mandarins  mixed with some cool orangeade. Their laughter is carried on a fresh and carefree summer breeze.

name: elmira
detail: A symbol of femininity at its best  Elmira exudes elegance  mystery and sensuality.

name: perry-ellis-18-sensual-1
detail: A contemporary and fresh fragrance for sensual and intuitive women.
ingredients: ['Pear', 'Jasmine (Arabia)', 'Woody Notes', 'Freesia', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Dewfruit (Exotic fruits)', 'Skin Accord', 'Vanilla']

name: modern-woman-1
detail: Delicate  elegant and fresh.

name: le-soir-des-possibles
detail: When the shadows come alive and blaze all our senses  follow your desires! Let yourself be enchanted by the sensual and audacious fragrance Le Soir des Possibles.

name: your-moments-1
detail: The energetic cocktail of fruit and spices with notes of patchouli and musk make this fragrance unique. Ideal for adventurous girls!

name: brilliant-woman-n-1-1
detail: Betty Barclay Brilliant Woman N° 1 is a fragrant presence that sparkles like a glass of champagne.

name: bloom-17
detail: Bloom is a delicate  fragile fragrance with an angelic dry down.

name: fantasist
detail: This scent is like an enchanted night at the circus  a delectable treat.

name: with-love-3
detail: When our hearts are filled with love. When we feel protected and safe. We hear the whisper of angels. A message from the heart can be expressed in countless ways. As a personal letter  a gentle touch or as a delicate fragrance.

name: christian-lacroix-bijou-for-her-1
detail: Unapologetically  Christian Lacroix Bijou for Her was created in the spirit of haute couture. Inspired by Sacha Walchoff's eclectic and embellished designs  the complex contrast of sumptuous textile bridging timeless classic with a modern edge  multiple patterns  the playoff mix  and match. This fragrance is an exotic and elegant contradiction of mouth-watering fruity notes juxtaposed with creamy opulent beauty  exquisitely interlaced with a touch of whimsy.

name: jadore-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: J'Adore is an extraordinary fragrance  because it manages to seduce effortlessly and at the same time boast an original signature. Carnal  but not overpowering. A composition that combines contrasts  transforming iconic floral notes into an alluring  unprecedented and mysterious whole. J'Adore invents a flower that does not exist. - François Demachy  Dior Perfumer

name: palais-jamais-1
detail: From the name of an ancient Moroccan palace  a perfume that visualises contemplation lost in a sacred garden  in the warm sunset  the air charged with oriental jasmine. A refuge for the soul where to find  when needed  energy and balance  an escape from the world and everyday life to envelop oneself in the energy of a new spirituality.

name: princesses-de-malabar-1
detail: In the Indian peninsula  on the Malabar coast  the Nair princesses devised a sophisticated and harmonious society in which women took centre stage. Legend has it that the lush forest of Kerala produced magnificent blue birds with golden collars to pay eternal homage to the princesses. Since then  at the end of each day  these fabulous birds create a unique and melodious love song. This is a land where women reign supreme.

name: rock-chic-love
detail: Rock by Chic & Love is a scent with a bright and cheerful blend.

name: white-apple
detail: An enchanting creation that leaves an aura of fascinating femininity.

name: fleur-doranger-1
detail: Fleur d'Oranger recalls the bright and fresh orange blossom present in the sunsets of Al-Andalus.

name: berga-sandal
detail: A fresh scent that evokes citrus fruit slowly ripening under the warm sun.

name: deep-roses-1
detail: The warmth of resins  the crispness of the citrus notes and the delightful flowers reveal the crystalline power of the essence of majestic blooms  caressed by a touch of woody notes.

name: tiara-1
detail: "I remember when I was a little girl and would cut out tiara's from paper mache. I would wear my mother's dress and put on my tiara and think I was the most beautiful princess in the world. I designed tiara for every woman as a reminder that they are still that beautiful princess with elegance  poise and sophisticated." - Nicole S. Mathee  artistic director

name: lhomme-leau
detail: Reinventing identity  L'Homme Prada L'Eau explores the fluid relationship between polar definitions. Notions of freshness take on new meanings  as the tensions between strength and subtlety  airiness and depth reveal themselves through the creation of a unique olfactory signature.

name: pivoine-suzhou
detail: Suzhou is a cultural city that inspired many legends as well as this delicate and sensual perfume.

name: capri
detail: Breathe the fresh air of the Italian seaside with Capri. A perfume that will transfer you to the island of the sirens.

name: ambergreen-1
detail: A green bomb of ultra-fresh  crisp notes emerging from the base defines this anomalous creation. Firmness and diffusion in the heart evoke an irresistible fragrance that propels an abundant dose of leaves and herbs  enhancing a shimmering green aura. An avant-garde composition  light and ethereal yet persistent.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Basil', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Fig Leaf', 'Galbanum', 'Shiso Leaves', 'Green of Tangerine', 'Green Pepper', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Coriander', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Iris / Orris']

name: aftergame
detail: After Game is inspired by that moment of camaraderie that springs up as soon as the game ends and both teams meet to discuss how it went and down over a few beers.

name: la-femme-leau
detail: La Femme Prada L'Eau is a fragrance that charts new territory in freshness through an olfactory signature that re-imagines and exalts an inherent sensuality.
ingredients: ['Frangipani', 'Tangerine', 'Green Notes', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Sandalwood', 'Magnolia', 'Green of Tangerine']

name: rosa-incantevole-i-julie-coeur-1
detail: Julie Coeur is perfect for school and sport  fresh and non-invasive.
ingredients: ['Rose (Turkey)', 'Musk', 'Watermelon', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Bergamot', 'Orange', 'Strawberry', 'Green of Tangerine']

name: oyedo-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Oyédo has the strong taste of yuzu  the Asian citrus fruit. The perfume is inspired by the ancient imperial city of Japan  Edo. At the heart of the fragrance  citrus fruits express their elegance in a chord of juicy raspberry and thyme.

name: jasmine-neroli-1
detail: This natural jasmine fragrance helps you meditate and stay positive despite challenges. This evocative blend is fresh and sexy at the same time  like no other!

name: jasmin-majorelle
detail: Jasmin Majorellea bold association that gives this very luminous fragrance an aromatic dimension. A fragrance for jasmine lovers that will take you on a journey through the Indian plantations that provide us with this rare and delicate ingredient. Jasmin Majorelle  created by Yuri Gutsatz in 1981  was then called Jasmin.

name: deja-vu-white-flower-57
detail: Déjà vu White Flower|57 is a seductive yet warm and comforting scent that is steeped in nostalgia and reminiscent of that memory of falling in love yet also laying the foundations for new exciting memories to come.

name: la-corte
detail: "Masters of arts and commerce during the Renaissance  the identity of the Medici family was inextricably linked to that of the city of Florence. Their refinement and opulence were my inspiration for this perfume". - Fabrice Pellegrin  Perfumer

name: jasminisha-1
detail: Indian autumn has set in: lotus flowers bloom and the wind carries the scent of jasmine. Nisha rehearses her dance before performing at the rich court of the Maharaja. Her movements  looks and elegant gestures narrate the impossible love  seduction and condemnation of a young courtesan. Jasminisha tells a story of passion through a captivating oriental dance.

name: musky-garden-1
detail: A marvelous summer memory  evoking warm days sitting under the shade of a cypress tree.

name: la-traviata
detail: A scent reminiscent of a time when fiery courtesans spread their spells over cities  and the secret and intoxicating dramas of love stirred the imagination.

name: mesmerize-black-for-her-1
detail: A blend of freshness and fruitiness for a passionate juice. The signature this woman is looking for.

name: lisa-ray-jasmine-of-india-1
detail: India's rich and diverse culture is evoked in a breath of exotic jasmine blossom. Garlands adorn temples and women's hair. This sacred scent takes me back to my childhood  reminds me to slow down  breathe and recognise the divine in everyday life.

name: jasmin-au-soleil
detail: Jasmin au Soleil highlights jasmine flowers from India picked at sunrise to preserve their freshness. Petals are complemented by beeswax from France  containing balsamic and honey notes with hints of hay and tobacco  adding a light  velvety dimension to the perfume.

name: indian-dream
detail: Journey to the exotic heart of India with this fragrance.

name: stallion-leather-1
detail: Stallion Leather is a love letter to nature  beauty and strength  based on floral  spicy and leather notes that evoke memories of Balaclava  a fabulous racehorse that Carolina Herrera rode daily as a teenager and has since considered her lucky talisman. Bottled in an evocative sculpture with hints of honey  this eau de parfum is a symbol and an ode to success. Stallion Leather  like all Herrera Confidential fragrances  was born of Carolina Herrera's own family history. The bold blend of warmth and sweetness  of floral and leather notes  is a tribute that Carolina A. Herrera  Creative Director of Beauty  pays homage to her mother's bold personality. "The inspiration for this fragrance comes from Balaclava  a racehorse my mother owned as a teenager in Caracas. It was her father's birthday present to her on her fifteenth birthday  and she considered the horse her most precious jewel". The beauty  strength and agility of Balaclava  as well as the nostalgia of youth and the winning spirit of the horse  are the key concepts of Stallion Leather  a fragrance that belongs to Herrera Confidential's Gems collection. Here  the gem is a symbol not only of Balaclava  but of Carolina Herrera's fascination with Arabian horses in general  a world that has influenced the Herrera aesthetic since its inception. Carolina A. Herrera has designed Stallion Leather with perfumer Jordi Fernández (Givaudan). Together they have created a luxurious ambery and leathery floral eau de parfum  a perfect balance of strength and sensuality that fits with Carolina Herrera's iconic fashion collections.

name: jasmin
detail: Discover the jasmine fragrance thanks to this Eau de Toilette designed in homage to Grasse (South of France).

name: voyage-indian-night-jasmine
detail: Escape to India with night jasmine. Inspired by a moonlit night in a Mughal garden  this seductive  feminine eau de toilette from our Voyage fragrance collection is a blend of floral and oriental accords.

name: oudish-1
detail: Oud is the name of the world's most expensive raw material for perfumes and has a very special fragrance of sweet wood and woodland.

name: oud-cashmere-mood-1
detail: The creation of the Oud Mood collection is a tribute to the kind of perfume that makes you feel as if you are wrapped in a rare and delicate material  which is in perfect harmony with a warm  soft and refined mood.

name: roud-elements
detail: R'oud Elements has a smouldering oud opening that will tingle your nose hairs  then after about twenty minutes  settles down to a velvety oud and lightly spicy woody amber fragrance.

name: oud-superfluide
detail: To start  there’s a scene in a film in which you have the starring role: you see yourself sipping a cup of tea in an oriental palace  hidden in the shadows  savouring a few delicious oriental pastries. The perfumer’s translation  image by image. The winning cast of this great  delicious oriental perfume with its raw sensuality.

name: crazy-for-oud-1
detail: This fragrance is an absolutely divine  a sensory feast that oud lovers will go crazy for.

name: oud-precieux
detail: Oud Précieux evokes an interior oriental and infinite journey. The freshness of gently spiced citrus combines with sparkling white flowers that are preciously dominated by an addictive and sensual base.

name: aoud-line-1
detail: A powerful and mysterious perfume  revealed through valuable notes as they dry down on the skin.

name: cinnamon-oud
detail: This perfume was designed for a person who loves mystery and excellence.

name: bergamot-oud
detail: Bergamot Oud was inspired by the sand dunes in Dubai flooded by sunlight.

name: oud-rose
detail: Oud & Rose is a luxurious fragrance with velvety notes  suitable for both men and women.

name: floral-oud-saffron-flower
detail: Rich  sensual and addictive scent. Oud Saffron Flower is a  powerful  captivating scent embodying preciousness and luxury  perfume as a jewel adorned with the black and red gold of the perfumer.

name: oud-wa-misk-1
detail: The millésime Oud Wa Misk  reveals an animalic and intimate note of Laotian Oud  blended with the sweetness of a musky note. Our perfumers have created a mysterious  deep and distinguished blend.

name: black-aoud-1
detail: A beautiful Oud intertwined with a bouquet of flowers unfolds under an accord with musky and citrus notes combining a passage into a labyrinth within this perfume.

name: oud-dream-1
detail: A wonderfully exotic  spicy and honeyed fragrance. Softly sweet and slightly musky  Oud Dream is a sensual and bewitching fragrance. Like a dream  this refined creation has a leathery scent.

name: ideal-oud
detail: Ideal Oud is a dialogue between two opposite raw materials: oud and the rose. Strength and delicacy; shadow and light. A perfume as beautiful as a silk satin caressing the skin.

name: colors-pink-4
detail: Colours Woman Pink is Benetton's feminine fragrance that invites us to celebrate the diversity that surrounds us. To fill our lives with other flavours  other cultures  other languages... and other colours! and other colours! Let's celebrate diversity  because diversity is not only seeing life in colour  it is also learning from those colours. Diversity is to surprise yourself every day with something new  understanding that every colour  every race and every culture is a new world to discover.

name: aires-del-caribe-1
detail: In the most emblematic natural landscapes of Latin America. Aires del Caribe is the olfactory representation of the sea breeze of a summer day in the Caribbean Sea.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Passion Fruit', 'Musk', 'Frangipani', 'Apple', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Pear', 'Powdery Notes', 'Rose', 'Aldehyde', 'Watery', 'Exotic Fruits', 'Mint', 'Sandalwood']

name: roccobarocco-tre-1
detail: A precious fragrance with a sophisticated design. A perfect fragrance for an elegant and sensual woman.

name: stdupont-pour-femme
detail: Timeless elegance  captured in this modern classic fragrance. Evocative  unforgettable and utterly feminine.
ingredients: ['Oakmoss', 'Passion Fruit', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Melon', 'Patchouli', 'Lemon', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Amber', 'Cyclamen', 'Jasmine', 'Magnolia', 'Musk', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Rose', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: lover-1
detail: Fall under the spell of a fragrance that captures the excitement of new romance.

name: the-pinkprint-1
detail: The fragrance opens with lush  tropical fruits sparkling bright on top of a creamy floral heart. The back provides the soft smoothness of sun-kissed skin. Succulent  feminine and warm.

name: miss-fenjal-floral-fantasy-1
detail: Floral Fantasy is a sweet  refined composition featuring the elegance of floral bouquets  teamed with the fresh liveliness of lush fruits .

name: sun-delight-1
detail: A warm fragrance that awakens your senses and reveals your radiant and enchanting side. A fragrance that glows in the evening and will enhance your power of seduction. A fragrance created for dazzling  life-loving women  full of positive energy  warmth and sensuality.

name: magnolia-passion-fruit
detail: Magnolia & Passion Fruit is a scent of innocence. A meadow in bloom  a tempting Lolita with a wreath of flowers in her hair. Graceful  witty and seductive.

name: passiflora
detail: Sunny and invigorating  Passiflora blends the flavour of a sun-soaked passion fruit with the smoothness of ylang-ylang flowers  in an aquatic freshness reminiscent of the crystalline waters of a lagoon.

name: eau-de-juice-good-energy
detail: Full disclosure: this is our perfume but if it didn't smell good  I wouldn't have included it in this roundup  k? TBH  this scent is perfect all year 'round (I mean  the blend of passion fruit and tiger lily notes are timeless)  but the woody and milky notes definitely add a texture to the scent that makes it perfect for the fall.

name: flowerbomb-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Flowerbomb Eau de Toilette is full bodied and opulent. It explodes into a bouquet of sensations with its addictive floral notes which leaves a trail  like a whirlwind  that is distinctly couture. It is an antidote to reality  an expression of our dreams.

name: true-life-for-her-1
detail: Crafting the perfect balance between freshness and delicate sensuality  this fragrance personifies her joie de vivre. Its captivating femininity bonds with pure comfort for a friendly  upbeat smile.

name: lychee-rose
detail: New York founder Laura Slatkin was inspired to create Lychee Rose while attending a dear friend’s wedding just outside of Tuscany. Laura wanted to capture the incredible aromas and joyful mood of the celebration with a fruity floral fragrance reminiscent of this magnificent evening.

name: infinite-moment-for-her
detail: Celebrate the love that captivates your heart for a lifetime. Embrace the night with endless romance.
ingredients: ['Lady Of The Night Flower', 'Vanilla', 'Raspberry leaves', 'Orchid', 'Amber', 'Champagne Rosé', 'Hinoki Wood', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: humor-de-salto-alto-1
detail: This fragrance brings notes of sparkling pink with a hint of wild strawberry and lemon. Perfect for everyday wear and special occasions.

name: bella-donna-gold
detail: Bella Donna Gold is a sparkling  sensual scent aimed at women who go their own way confidently  cheerfully and calmly.

name: signature-3
detail: Aedes de Venustas honours the past  present and future of perfumery with its signature scent. This first fragrance was originally created in 2012 and breaks out of traditional perfume structures  offering an olfactory reflection that embodies the spirit of the famed boutique in which it was born.

name: iris-dargent
detail: Iris d'Argent is an elegant and versatile green chypré that you can wear day to night  any time of the year. A modern classic reinventing iris; delicacy and strength combined.

name: eau-de-sisley-1-1
detail: Floral and Joyful  Eau de Sisley 1 is a sun-kissed dress  brimming with the mystery of a summer garden. Joyful  romantic  tenderly feminine  Eau de Sisley 1 has the sensuality of a delicately chosen bouquet.

name: desiree-elegance
detail: An elegant floral bouquet that reflects the Désirée woman.

name: leau-revee-disa
detail: L'Eau Rêvée d'Isa has the depth and lightness of a seduction dream. Full of contrasts  it stages the miraculous encounter of essences with an alchemy that is both obvious and surprising.

name: intimacy-sheer-1
detail: Intimacy Sheer reveals each woman's sensual identity through a unique olfactory signature and is a true delight for the senses.

name: chypre-de-coty-1
detail: Chypre  in French  refers to the island of Cyprus  the birthplace of Venus  the legendary goddess of love. The name is appropriate because Chypre de Coty set the standard for a new type of fragrance.

name: soho-lounge-1
detail: Honest and authentic  that's Soho Lounge. Elegant  with a sense of humour and never embarrassed. The man who wears this classic fragrance is discreet yet seductive. He creates an aura brimming with joie de vivre and energy.

name: keep-calm-and-love-sylt-1-1
detail: If you spend time on Sylt  you'll see it's a feast for the eyes which fill the air with the smell of roses  delicate  pink  white and this was the inspiration for this fragrance  a modern  youthful rose fragrance that skillfully underscores the sensual femininity of its carrier.

name: la-panthere-parfum-1
detail: Feel the softness of La Panthère under your fingers and breathe in the warmth of its fragrance.

name: lumiere-de-venise-1
detail: Traveling Venice by boat on a moonlight bathed lagoon  at once mirage and reality  a myriad of delight with its narrow waterways and splendid palaces; the magic of Venice fascinates forever.

name: lost-paradise
detail: Inspired by the memory of the fragrances of the 80's where opulence and “sillage” were a must! This Chypre construction is a modern rework with an overdose of transparent ingredients and soft “gourmand” notes. A daring fragrance for the audacious ones…

name: magnifying-patchouli-1
detail: The elegant scent of Magnifying Patchouli casts a spell with stark sensuality. A precious and powerful seduction.

name: animale-azul-1
detail: Animale Azul for Men  a fragrance as stylish as the man who wears it. A fragrance that combines modern and traditional elements of marine and woody notes to create an inspiring  energetic  and masculine scent for the vibrant and exhilarating man. A fusion between intensity  masculinity and freshness.

name: ume
detail: Journey back to 1930's Japan  precious interiors  patinaed lacquers  and sumptuous silk fabrics. A fruity chypré enriched by delicious Japanese plum and is illuminated by May rose and Tsubaki aka Japanese camellia.

name: waka-madagascar
detail: "A perfume with an enchanting and stimulating flavour that combines the benefits of exotic plants from Madagascar". Stéphanie Bakouche perfumer.

name: midnight-elegance-1
detail: Fruity  Delicious  Chypre: These are the three pillars on which Midnight Elegance  the fascinating women's fragrance.

name: leau-revee-dalma
detail: If it was a picture on the wall. L'Eau Rêvée d'Alma would be a French countryside brimming with reeds  rivers and ponds. It has the silky clear depths of fresh waters. It's like a crystalline song that grasps and awakens you.

name: souffle-de-soie
detail: "Personally  I see this perfume as a profusion of live flowers on a silk scarf. Like a delicate breeze  a bouquet of jasmine  rose and tuberose conveys a sensual message  like a whisper on the skin or a kiss on the nape of the neck"  François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: cuba-vip-for-women
detail: Cuba VIP for Women is a sensual but sophisticated scent that brims with excitement  desire  and naughtiness.

name: gglovely
detail: Some women live life with a wink. They know exactly how to wrap others around their pretty little fingers with their sweet  charming and cheeky ways. GGLovely perfectly captures this sparkling outlook on life. Invigorated by effervescent notes gently enveloped by the candy apple sweetness of love  life is easy and carefree!

name: rosso-epicureo-1
detail: Rosso Epicureo opens with joyful and sparkling notes  leading to a passionate heart revealed by a sensual bouquet of flowers. As it dries down  a new generation creates a generous and endless trail.

name: nuit-rose
detail: Fiorucci Nuit Rose is an enveloping scent that enchants the romantic woman leaving a seductive trail.

name: 007-for-women-ii
detail: 007 for Women is a fresh  daytime companion to the classic and mysterious evening scent  007 For Women. This Floral Oriental scent is lighter yet deeply feminine with notes reminiscent of Pink Champagne which capture the true spirit of the Bond Woman.

name: sirena
detail: Minorca the birthplace of Juan Famenias Floris and home of the bronze mermaid of Mohon  was the inspiration for this creation. The scent captures the spirit and warmth of this sun-kissed Mediterranean island and its rich flora lingering on a gentle sea breeze. A distillation of summer memories.

name: paradiso-1
detail: The sea breeze plays with her hair  carries the scent of flowers and a tingle of joy and freedom. She has a cheerful disposition. She makes the most of life and transforms every occasion into a precious opportunity to be savoured and treasured. Bathed in the golden light of the Mediterranean. She has found Paradiso. Where pleasure never ends.

name: vanilla-anise-1
detail: Vanilla & AniseThe Vanilla Orchid transports you to the floral landscape of Madagascar and captures the fleeting moment of the flowering of the rare vanilla orchid. The fragile cream and white flowers of the vanilla vine are a precious discovery: only one or two appear in the morning and seem to disappear in the evening.

name: eve-duet-contrasts-daring-1
detail: Spicy and crisp notes open this delectable creation  brimming with exuberant energy and bright personality - a scent perfect to reflect your daring side  while the heart opens with a luscious floralcy. In the signature lies the spirit of this spontaneous woman  richly warm  encouraging you to indulge in your spontaneous desires.

name: santal-nabataea-1
detail: A Sandalwood fragrance inspired by the ancient kingdom of Nabataea and their capital Petra. An olfactory journey depicting the story of the people  their vast relationships in trade  their architectural craftsmanship and the very environment they spent their lives in.

name: arethusa
detail: This exclusive scent is based around the scents and reflections of beautiful Sicily  where history  art and nature are intertwined in an enchanting sea of emotions. You will find delicious fruits paired with sublime smelling flowers  harmoniously contrasted with the spices that surround the beautiful Ortigia Island.

name: white-peacock-lily
detail: A lone peacock floats above cream lilies  oleanders and a sea of alabaster violet. Orchestral notes of harps and horns sound. A pale blue mist hangs over the distant woods.

name: archimede-2021
detail: Archimede is a powerful fragrance inspired by ancient Sicily and pays homage to one of its geniuses: Archimedes of Syracuse.

name: lumis-1
detail: The pleasure of celebrating every achievement  the perfect moment to toast to success. The happiness of achieving desires and the fulfilment of making dreams come true  immortalising an instant.

name: azzaro-pour-elle-1
detail: Passionate about perfume since he was a child  Loris Azzaro had in mind to develop real "weapons of seduction" through his fragrances. In 1975  he embarked on the adventure of creating perfumes with Azzaro  a feminine fragrance with surprising chypre notes  before creating one for men with an extremely daring style.

name: viva-la-juicy-le-bubbly-1
detail: A bright  crisp scent is bursting with fun and sparkles. This ultra-modern interpretation is as energetic and electrifying as the pop of a cork!

name: moschino-toy-2-pearl-2
detail: "I thought of lemon sorbet  which brings together freshness  addiction  sunshine and the Italian culture. I wanted to create a sparkling  floral and watery perfume. A timeless yet fun fragrance ” Domitille Michalon-Bertier  Perfumer.

name: flowerbomb-tiger-lily
detail: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily is an invitation to a sensory journey laden with untamed elegance and seductive charisma. Here  the wild meets the sun and sensuality knows no bounds.

name: flowerbomb-holiday-ltd-ed-2020-1
detail: For the 2020 holiday season  Viktor&Rolf turn Flowerbomb's explosion of flowers into a magical snowfall  a whirlwind of fantasy. Snowflakes transform into flower flakes  a myriad of extraordinary flowers that cover the bottle  the landscape  the world. Wear it for a night out on the town with the girls  a romantic dinner  or a spontaneous adventure with no definite destination.

name: angel-elixir
detail: It is the soul of Angel  reinvented. The Angel you don't expect. A pure Elixir  expressing the heightened femininity of today's fearless superwomen.

name: angel-elixir-fantasy-2023
detail: Imagine a floral Milky Way captured in Mugler’s iconic star-shaped perfume bottle  morphed into a captivating deep blue and shimmering glitters. More than a fragrance  Angel Elixir is the catalyst to reinvent your reality. Because the real world is not enough.

name: mini-glamour
detail: Effervescent  the top notes are composed of citrus and tropical fruits. The elegance of white flowers dominates a sensual heart to give way to warm and sweet touches of rich gourmand notes.

name: 402-vanille-caramel-santal
detail: 402 VANILLE CARAMEL SANTAL is a sweet  powdered scent suitable to men and women who like the sweeter things in life!

name: white-coffee
detail: White represents purity and minimalism. Coffee represents one of the most appetising smells. An olfactory combination that is sweet and explosive at the same time.

name: feelin-para-ela
detail: Feelin' Para Ela is more than just a touch. Feelin' Para Ela reveals a state of consciousness that goes beyond touch and emotion.

name: messy-sexy-just-rolled-out-of-bed
detail: A fragrance inspired by the photos of Marilyn taken by the photographer Douglas Kirkland in 1961.

name: s-smile-by-shakira
detail: A sweet and intimate scent designed for women with joy to live. Women who use their emotions with pride and are not afraid to share them and know that an image can speak more than a thousand words. And this life is too short not to make the most of it.

name: on-me-1
detail: Egeo On Me is the first fragrance developed through artificial intelligence. On Me is about living within the digital world. On Me is to be switched on  alive and moving!
ingredients: ['Leaves', 'Orange Blossom', 'Apple', 'Toffee', 'Almond Blossom', 'Acacia', 'Freesia', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Passion Flower', 'Rose', 'Tuberose', 'Amber', 'Anise', 'Bergamot', 'Cucumber', 'Lemon', 'Melon', 'Peach', 'Pepper', 'Pineapple', 'Vanilla', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Raspberry', 'Sandalwood', 'Prunella (Plum)']

name: eudora-golden
detail: Eudora knows that a confident woman is not afraid to flaunt her radiance. Eudora Golden is her scent.
ingredients: ['Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Ambertonic (Woody Ambery)', 'Lychee', 'Rose', 'Violet', 'Benzoin', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Bergamot', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Pear', 'Pink Pepper', 'Raspberry', 'Violet Leaves', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Toffee Apple', 'Prunella (Plum)']

name: haiku-avon-1
detail: A fresh floral perfume that evokes the serenity of a Japanese garden... Be perfectly Zen with Haiku.

name: so-de-la-renta
detail: A sheer  luscious floral infused with exotic fruits and rare woods. Its bright  effervescent top notes sparkle. The scent of femininity is a bouquet of vibrant florals  followed by the richness of vanilla.

name: shadow-for-him-1
detail: Shadow For Him is a fragrance designed for confident  down-to-earth men.

name: solid-oud
detail: Whether you are heading to an important business meeting  a party with friends or a hot date  Solid Oud is always a great choice. This fragrance boosts your confidence whenever you want to shine.

name: bill-blass-couture-3
detail: Celebrate your individuality with a fragrance as unique as the dresses that inspire them. The simple elegance of the haute couture dress in velvety sandalwood fragrance notes.

name: bel-ami-vetiver
detail: Without altering the past order  the same balance  the same confident elegance  the same classic structure. Perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena created his own interpretation of Bel Ami with a new ingredient: vetiver.

name: full-speed-electric-1
detail: Rev up your adrenaline with a supercharged electric scent that helps promote a sense of energy.

name: ecorce-depices
detail: Ecorce d'Epices is built around a compelling aromatic blend. This spicy bouquet gives a twist to the cliché  confronting its effervescent verve wit graceful and seductive amber. The result is a fragrance with a remarkable character.

name: vince-camuto-solare-1
detail: Vince Camuto's Solare presents another option for the Camuto man to express his individuality and polished style. With the men's fragrance collection I wanted to introduce a new scent that would both inspire confidence and provide an accessory to the modern man's overall sense of style.
ingredients: ['Woody Notes', 'Cardamom', 'Red Apple', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Mandarin', 'Musk', 'Clary Sage', 'Pimento Leaves', 'Lavender (Provence)']

name: linterdit-eau-de-parfum-rouge-1
detail: With the Eau de Parfum Rouge  L’Interdit arouses and burns with incandescent sensuality. It is not about resisting it but giving in to it.

name: velvet-orchid-lumiere
detail: An increase of dazzling citrus gems blend easily with the magnificence that communicates freshness and depth  delivering a more luminous EDT statement. This takes both the carnally rich floral aspects of the namesake Black Orchid Accord and the brilliant light of the original EDP into a new territory that has its own way to mesmerize.

name: poivre-electrique-1
detail: The plan was to sail east. The waves were calling... Adventure was what they sought. Discovering who they are was their common goal. When they arrived  their dream came true. The atmosphere was electric. They could not resist walking towards the distant lights.
ingredients: ['Black Pepper', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Bitter Orange', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Sandalwood (New Caledonia)', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Pimento Leaves', 'Myrrh', 'Sichuan Pepper']

name: alhada
detail: A hazy curtain of sky over the pink-tinged mountain welcomed the maiden in Alhada at the break of dawn. The alluring scent kissed her skin and sweeping through her flowing dark locks  imprinted an overwhelming serenity. She opened her eyes and smiled at the sun shining dashes of memories back home.

name: joop-go
detail: A thrill-seeking spirit. Dynamic and determined in equal measure. Joop! Go is an energetic fragrance for a man of boundless energy  hell-bent on spreading his infectious sense of having fun.

name: rosa-carnivora-1
detail: “This is nature: unfiltered  with all its little flaws. This rose is not romantic. It is strangely beautiful  real  imperfect and ambiguous ” Daphné Bugey  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Rose Damascena', 'Pink Pepper', 'Pimento Leaves', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Rose Centifolia', 'Ciste Labdanum']

name: kinetic-gmt-1
detail: The ideal scent for the ambitious man who knows what he wants and inspires everyone around him.

name: marbert-man-pure-black-intense
detail: A long-lasting fragrance  ideal for very special occasions where spontaneity and passion are paramount.

name: of-the-wild
detail: Welcome mysterious traveller  get initiated into air mastery by one of the most magnetic scents around! Of the wild is an olfactory trance  an inner flight over your imaginary continent. Inhale  spread your wings and get reborn  aerial. Magnified.

name: candy-1
detail:
Candy perfume was launched by Prada.
The dominant ingredients of the fragrance are toffee  iris  vanilla  bergamot and benzoin.
The perfume is for women

name: lucky-candy
detail: Wearing Lucky Candy is like drawing a tarot card that continually unveils a delicious surprise. Say hello to your new lucky charm.

name: sakeena
detail: A zesty blend of citrusy freshness and fruity juiciness intertwine in the impeccable luxury of Sakeena.

name: good-girl-gone-bad-extreme-1
detail: "Deep in the rich heart of exquisite flowers  I emphasized the intense character of Good Girl Gone Bad's Extreme version." - Alberto Morillas  Perfumer

name: sticky-toffee-pudding-1
detail: This wonderfully buttery  sweet-toothed concoction  made with dates  is the best in England. It's delicious and sugary and makes us happy.

name: smooch-by-so-vixen
detail: Smooch By So...? Vixen is inspired by the mysterious  rebel woman who lives by her own rules.

name: vanilla-love
detail: "Alliance of seduction  mystery  and joy  Vanilla Love makes us sparkle with sensuality " Michel Almairac  Perfumer.

name: a-la-carte-n-6-1
detail: Just a fleeting hint or absolute surrender to a precious  fatal and authentic oud: this acutely sensual fragrance is a revelation with fine gourmand notes and rapturous opulence.

name: un
detail: Stand out with this classic fragrance. A burst of juicy and sweet tones is followed by spicy aromatics and a deep sensual dry down to transport you to nirvana.

name: patchouli-sauvage
detail: When the wind blows  the leaves of patchouli rustle with a gentle sound  liberating an inebriating perfume simultaneously woody  earthy  and dry with smoky accents. The sumptuous Patchouli Sauvage represents the freedom of nature.

name: vetiver-eau-de-toilette
detail: Natural elegance. A modern man: authentic  sober  confident in his choices. A new interpretation of freshness. A point of view on masculinity. A certain vision of elegance.

name: rossa-boheme-1
detail: Rossa Bohème is an unforgettable composition that evokes the atmosphere of Theatre Alla Scala in Milan.

name: boise-fruite-1
detail: This green and woody fragrance combines citrus notes with a heart of spices that develops subtly to set off a refined and sensual base of resins and gourmand notes.

name: essence-n-6-vetiver
detail: The irresistible metamorphosis. Union of the two most noble lines of this timeless wood. Essence No. 6 Vetiver embodies all the fine elegance of Elie Saab creations.

name: vetiver-java
detail: Elegant and magnetic  Vetiver Java is a unique interpretation of the vetiver essence. A bold and charismatic perfume.

name: ambre-muscadin-1
detail: The opulence of Ambre Muscadin is adorned with mystery. Bold  charming  and naturally elegant  this fragrance radiates the charms of the Orient.

name: sultan-vetiver-1
detail: Sultan Vetiver opens with a citrusy note intensified by highly prized herbs in the same pot! As the sultans were the true conquerors for centuries  Sultan Vetiver is the new rule breaker of its kind.

name: a-day-in-my-life
detail: The perfect moment to create my rose. The only flower  the queen of flowers: the rose. Not a normal rose  a rose out of space  futuristic  unique  twisted  surprising  modern  vibrant  sensual and deep. The flower par excellence shown in a new context. My eternal rose... for you!

name: ultimate
detail: Baldessarini Ultimate  an invigorating and ultimately exciting fragrance  that separates the men from the boys.

name: dunhill-pursuit-1
detail: A stylish  distinctive  self-assured fragrance inspired by the timeless masculinity of an alluring Clark Gable  in the classic movie Mogambo; set in Africa  where the freedom of the wide-open space holds the promise of real adventure.

name: patchouli-nosy-be-1
detail: This fragrance is the perfect union of floral and woody notes  each perfectly combined to create this aromatic dream.

name: intense-pepper-1
detail: An exciting explosion of spicy berries unveils a beautiful floral heart and fragrant leaves to create a rich sillage of luxurious oud  sensual woody notes and precious amber.

name: kriska-delirio-1
detail: Charming and unforgettable  Kriska Delírio is an unexpected combination of delicious notes to create an irresistible fragrance.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Cardamom', 'Chestnut', 'Almond Blossom', 'Freesia', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Amber', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon Zest', 'Popcorn', 'Sandalwood', 'Sea Water', 'Vetiver', 'Pepper (Peru)']

name: tonka-4
detail: The Majorelle Garden in Marrakech served as inspiration for Tonka  the limited edition packaging was Yves Klein blue as a tribute to the garden's magnificent design. The Ourika Valley  just outside the city  is full of bergamot plants and in the villages leather is dried on wooden supports. Tonka is a blend of all these heady ideas. A complex  exotic and cleanly elegant fragrance.

name: le-paradis-de-lhomme
detail: Touch after touch  the fragrance of your dreams embodies contemporary men  their strength  their sensuality...and offers them a supreme sense of well-being  of harmony and serendipity.

name: amsterdam
detail: That moment when when Autumn is captured going into winter. The freedom of cycling past the former spice warehouses of the Warmoesstraat to a canal-side apartment on Prinsengracht on the elegant south side of the city. Wind in your hair. Now you're inside. Cosy and warm. Dark wooden furniture  flowers in the window.

name: loubihorse
detail: Hidden in the depths of the sea  this unique fragrance rises to the surface  surrounded by a surreal labyrinth of coral and guarded by a curious seahorse. Signed by the perfumer Christophe Raynaud  Loubihorse whispers the secrets of the sea with its refreshing and summery wake.

name: savour-1
detail: An exquisite fresh herbal fragrance inspired by the art of haute cuisine. Warm and spicy  perfect for the provocative  creative man with refined tastes. A pleasure that will surprise you.

name: paradis-lointains
detail: A fantasy. A memory or an extract from the romance between Alexandra and Tom. A sensual short film that transports us far away.

name: festival-party-for-him
detail: Hollister Festival Party for Him is an aquatic aromatic scent that captures the energy of a pool party. The free-spirited Hollister boy knows how to enjoy each new day and recreate his own party atmosphere by the pool.

name: berlin-1
detail: Evoking the concrete and steel of Berlin then add the lakes on the edge of the city. Carefree summers  the freshness of the water  swimming at the Strandbad Wannsee. Gritty urban living. It's a city of brutalist apartment blocks concrete  elegant parquet floors  modern bohemians.

name: drago-nero
detail: The dragon – a fabled  mythological creature  bound in legend and a symbol in Asia for chaos and origin  for wisdom and luck. DRAGO NERO pays homage to vetiver grass  also native to Asia  which has been cultivated as a crop for centuries  and plays an important role as both a healing remedy and as an ingredient in perfumery.

name: byerley-1
detail: The Parfums de Marly fragrance collection  named after the famous French château de Marly  is inspired by the legacy of Louis XV. Through his love of horse breeding and perfume creation  the rich heritage is evident in this bold fragrance full of soft  warm and enveloping notes.

name: ve-velvet-2019
detail: Velvet gives us an idea of "lived" and distant memories. It is loved by men and women in all its infinite nuances  just like vetiver  so powerful as a raw material.

name: empty-wishes-well
detail: A perfume full with optimism: "I still have my hope. I know rain will come and I will melt in the soil I walked on and nature will bring nurture and more shall live again " David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi  Founder-Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Amyris', 'Vetiver (Java)', 'Myrrh', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Rain Notes', 'Clary Sage', 'Dry Leaves', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Earthy Notes', 'Galbanum', 'Metallic Notes', 'Patchouli']

name: soul-of-patchouly
detail: Inspired by the essence of character  patchouli became a symbol of the hippy movement  bursting with artistic freedom.

name: vetiver-8
detail: Inspired by cool luxury  Vetiver is a scent that relives male energy and lusts for the opposite sex!

name: java-wood-1
detail: "The little way sinks at the heart of the island. Rice terraces overlook the landscape. Its volcanic heat is suddenly flying away  letting the humidity of this green wood takes its place. As a simple grass bouquet  its humility seizes me. Its roots shape deeply infinite labyrinths under my feet. While closing my eyes  I am transported by this woody essence. The Wood from Java. Evasive and audacious." - Mélanie Leroux  Perfumer

name: bois-vetiver
detail: It invites you into the world of mystery with the sensual warmth of earthy woods.

name: zaad-expedition
detail: Zaad Expedition encourages you to explore the world  to experience all that life has in store for you. The world is yours. Explore.

name: lunar-vetiver
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the seduction of nightfall. The perfumer wanted to capture the ethereal glow that occurs just as the sun and moon share the sky in what he calls an "olfactory dream". Lunar Vetiver is both luxurious and noble.

name: light-blue-forever-pour-homme-2021-1
detail: A  bold expression of freshness  Light Blue Forever pour Homme blends intensity and light to create a scent that is both generous and addictive.

name: boss-bottled-pacific-2023
detail: Boss Bottled Pacific is a refreshing scent that adds a touch of Californian cool to the signature Boss Bottled fragrance. With citrus and salt top notes  this intensely fresh composition transports the wearer to the beaches of Malibu  where days are spent chasing waves and relaxing in the shade of palm trees.

name: signorina-ribelle-fashion-edition-2020
detail: Salvatore Ferragamo's Signorina Ribelle rediscovers its rebellious and charming side thanks to its new fuchsia tint. Its bold character is combined with the delicate matt finish of the classic bottle  giving a fascinating new dimension to the personality of this Signorina.

name: love-relentlessly-toi-et-moi
detail: Love Relentlessly Toi et Moi captures the sentiment of eternal love that touches the soul. Profoundly passionate sensuality arises from the long-lasting and enveloping notes  evoking a lingering warmth.

name: ibiza-bohemia
detail: Bring light and the bohemian spirit into your days with Ibiza Bohemia. In just a few breaths  you will travel to the most elegant of islands.

name: cypress-grapevine-cologne-intense-1
detail: Foliage and revelry enliven the expansive terraces and noble arches of the ancient Hanging Gardens. Statuesque cypress trees infuse the air with their fresh  aromatic scent  marrying with woody notes of trailing grapevines. Depths of amber ground this verdant scene in intensity and sensuality.

name: match-point-1
detail: "With a bold signature of gentian and cashmeran  Match Point embodies the great breathtaking thrill that we experience in those decisive moments of our lives " Sophie Labbé  Perfumer.

name: patchouli-tentation-2
detail: A luminous and irresistible floral composed around a trio of patchouli that reflects the evolution of a fiery Temptation.

name: royal-earth-1
detail: Royal Earth is a noble fragrance that roots the wearer as the enduring attraction of the earth. Elegant and enigmatic  it is a dignified Yin fragrance that attracts and empowers.

name: iris-porcelana-1
detail: Iris Porcelana is a contemporary take on iris pallida  the most precious and graceful flower of high perfumery. The secular yet modern craft of French porcelain inspired our perfumer  who patiently designed this fragrance with the same delicacy and know-how. The result is a smooth and second-skin scent  intensely addictive.

name: guess-seductive-noir
detail: “Guess Seductive Noir is a warm  enveloping floral scent that will capture the imagination of anyone that gets even the slightest scent of its sillage ” Laurent le Guernec  Perfumer.

name: acqua-nobile-iris
detail: A radiant creation that celebrates the precious Iris pallida flower  illuminated by the first rays of the sun.

name: molecule-01-iris-1
detail: "I have a long love affair with iris. The iris pallida absolue I used here is one of the most expensive ingredients in perfumery. It's radical to put this much in a fragrance. The scent is fantastic. It's a bomb  but a subtle bomb " Geza Schoen  perfumer.

name: valentino-donna-1
detail: A hint of elegance  fragility  irreverence and candour emerge in this sensual and independent person  capable of sudden passion and unexpected shyness. Is she an actress? A lover? A film noir character? She knows the rules of high society well  and knows how to break them with panache. She breaks the illusion  like in a nouvelle vague film  aware that being oneself also means playing a role.

name: la-vie-est-belle-limited-edition-2023
detail: To celebrate the end-of-year holidays  Lancôme invites you to dive into the heart of the Night of Wonders with a limited-edition bottle of the iconic La Vie Est Belle l'Eau de Parfum.

name: n-19-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A daring  distinctive fragrance. A floral-woody-green fragrance with perfect balance. The last fragrance launched and worn by Gabrielle Chanel. An uncompromising composition  in the image of Mademoiselle.

name: my-way-le-parfum-1
detail: My Way Parfum harnesses an open outlook and the idea of creating one’s own life story. It conjures the powerful exhilaration of shaping one’s own path and moving through the world on one’s own terms  with an inimitable  unshakable vision. This powerful scent evokes a willingness to be open to new horizons and plot one’s own journey into the unknown.

name: la-vie-est-belle-ltd-ed-2021
detail: Light. Grace. Happiness. Freedom. A declaration of the beauty of life. La Vie Est Belle in a limited edition bottle.

name: iris-torrefie-2021
detail: "Iris is such a sublime  chic  and sometimes rather serious flower. I wanted to make it smile by associating it with coffee " Delphine Jelk. Perfumer.

name: n-19-poudre
detail: Chanel N°19 Poudré is a luminous interpretation of Mademoiselle Chanel's iconic fragrance with an incredibly soft  musky and voluptuous composition.

name: n-19-parfum
detail: A daring  distinctive fragrance. A floral-woody-green fragrance with perfect balance  housed in a bottle hand-sealed with a baudruche film. An uncompromising composition  in the image of Mademoiselle.

name: la-vie-est-belle-iris-absolu
detail: Authentic and generous  La Vie Est Belle Iris Absolu draws from the sources of the original fragrance the inspiration of an intensely captivating scent  vibrant with happiness.

name: la-vie-est-belle-lextrait-de-parfum-2023
detail: La Vie est Belle L'Extrait reminds you that every moment of happiness is precious.

name: parfum-de-metamorphose
detail: Parfum de Métamorphose embraces metamorphosis  because at heart it is a gift of precious flowers with the transformational message of spreading your wings and flying.

name: laque-2019
detail: Laque is both complex and simple  inspired by an elegant elimination of excess  mixed with an exotic and contemporary influence.

name: la-vie-est-belle-leau-de-parfum
detail: Much more than a trail  La Vie Est Belle carries a universal and eternal message. A powerful statement  like a timeless truth. More than a perfume  a hymn to happiness.

name: la-vie-est-belle-limited-edition-2022
detail: Discover the iconic eau de parfum La Vie Est Belle in a luxurious limited edition  adorned with an explosion of pink glitter. A true declaration of joy and happiness! A tribute to the creation of this timeless perfume  present in the hearts of French women for 10 years.

name: la-vie-est-belle-leau-de-parfum-x-orlinski-2022-1
detail: In 2022  for the holiday season  the iconic scent of La Vie Est Belle is adorned with a beautiful Lancôme x Orlinski rose.

name: argentina-1
detail: Here the sun is a laughing character. Warm and welcoming like the oud. Here the common bird  the hornero  has an intense  quick and unexpected way of singing and calling its partner. Like the tango. Here the floor resounds with the steps of the dancers  the sky is filled with birdsong and an enveloping perfume floats in the air.

name: starnight-intense
detail: You will shine brightly with Starnight  the intense and glittery eau de parfum  with joyful  delicious and luminous femininity.

name: white-moss-snowdrop-2018-1
detail: A fragrance contrast. Snowdrop petals peeking through powdery snow. Greeting forest-fresh moss  iridescent under winter sunlight. A warm touch of golden amber  topped with a luminous burst of cardamom.

name: dylan-turquoise-2
detail: Vibrant and luminous  Dylan Turquoise embodies tradition and innovation.

name: sun-eau-de-parfum
detail: The purity and euphoria of the sun's touch will fill every woman’s spirit with elemental harmony. Distilled into a dynamic fragrance  solar radiance becomes an uplifting and invigorating elixir.

name: eau-de-rochas-escapade-au-soleil-2020-1
detail: Savour the warm breeze of a radiant summer  the freshness of the ocean mist  and the relaxing sound of the crashing waves: Escapade au Soleil whisks us away to a sunny beach where time stands still.

name: white-moss-snowdrop-2018
detail: A contrast of fragrances. Snowdrop petals peeping through the powdery snow. Fresh forest moss  iridescent in the winter sunlight. A warm touch of golden amber  crowned with a luminous burst of cardamom.

name: tiffany-love-for-him
detail: Tiffany & Love for Him is an enticing composition from the first encounter. A masterful composition.

name: verte-envolee
detail: Verte Envolée is an invitation to reconnect with your vitality by immersing yourself in an energising race made of tea and green notes. A refreshing freshness to feel free in a twirling nature.

name: s-kiss-by-shakira-2023
detail: There are as many types of kisses as there are reasons to kiss. Love kisses. Friendship kisses. Kisses for coming and kisses for going. Consolation kisses and kisses with passion. Requited kisses and kisses for no reason. Kisses behind a screen or in real life. But the important thing  usually  is not the kiss but who you give it to. After the great success of 2017  Shakira is relaunching her S Kiss perfume in a unique limited edition. Iconic and irresistible  it is ready to devastate. Like that first love that you'll never forget. A young fragrance  with the innocence of the first kiss at the school gate. A seductive and feminine aroma. Fruity and passionate. Like secret kisses at work. A heartfelt and true perfume. Like a kiss you've missed.

name: so-chic-1
detail: So Chic! The elegance of a bold  yet natural eau de toilette. Romantic and passionate  the fragrance is all about tenderness  love and dreams.

name: cool-water-oceanic-edition-2023
detail: The scent of the sea with natural ingredients.

name: cool-water-reborn
detail: Reborn is the call to action in and of itself. Our times are yearning for a sense of new birth. And the world has been changed already  so in a sense the planet is aching to be reborn  too. The man now goes fully and deeply into his origins within the ocean. There he re-forms  body and soul. He emerges in a burst of water and light. Being Reborn himself  he is ready to be a part of the Reborn world.

name: kenzo-memori-cedre-secret
detail: In the living room  by the fire  the warmth of cedar wood mingles with the autumnal lights that fill the room. This memory inspired a fragrance from the Kenzo Memori Collection: Cèdre Secret.

name: esprit-pure-summer-edition-for-men-2017-1
detail: The fragrance of a sunset by the ocean. An invigorating wave of fresh masculinity.

name: iris-empire-3
detail:
Created by the perfumer Nelly Hachem-Ruiz in collaboration with Carolina A. Herrera  Iris Empire fuses surprising and revitalising ingredients. Top notes of davana (Indian aromatic herb) merge with cinnamon  which gives way to subtle notes of violet and iris. The base closes with lasting notes of leather and patchouli.
Iris Empire is a powerful and opulent fragrance  paying homage to the majesty of black. This magnificent fragrance  inspired by the legendary black diamonds and empires of antiquity  evokes elegance and independence through a fascinating aromatic blend.

name: floral-fields-of-ireland-intense-1
detail: I lie on my blanket in a flowering meadow and observe the colourful bounty of nature all around me. The pleasant scents of wild flowers and grass mingle in the air here in my beautiful flower meadow.

name: dance-ocean-2023-1
detail: Immerse yourself in this limited edition full of energy and freedom. Feel the good vibes of summer and its salty dips. Feel the force of the waves and the wet dances. Let Dance Ocean turn your tide with a refreshing blend of citrus and spicy florals. A unique fragrance that will make you surf and dance life like no other.

name: cool-water-woman-reborn-2
detail: A stronger  more sensual version of the iconic scent.

name: cuir-zerzura
detail: This is the myth of Zerzura  “the oasis of little birds” in Arabic  a mesmerizing luxuriant paradise surrounded by a sea of sand and rock where the hot desert air is laden with the captivating sensuality of woods and spices.

name: pacha-ibiza-247-feeling-for-her-2023-2
detail: Feel how your senses are heightened at the exact moment when day turns into night. Be aware of your instinct and that moment when suddenly everything is more mystical  more magnetic  more hypnotic it will last 24/7. Feel the island 24 hours a day  7 days a week with Ibiza 24/7 Feeling for Her. The scent will rev up your senses and prepare you for what the night has in store. You are at one with the sunset  the sea and the beach. Just let it sweep you away.

name: lilac-amethyst-hermina
detail: An addictive  intense and feminine floral woody fragrance  inspired by the irresistible beauty of the amethyst.

name: only-the-brave-street
detail: Only The Brave Street reinterprets courage with freshness: start from scratch  dare  dream and go forward  always. Express yourself without limit.

name: girlcrush
detail: Welcome to the family Ghost Girlcrush! It's all about celebrating being yourself  spreading love  and having fun!! It takes just one spritz of this uber-cool girl-power perfume to fall in love. Immediately feminine  it's a tantalising  summery perfume.

name: cool-water-woman-reborn-eau-de-parfum
detail: Davidoff has revisited the Cool Water freshness with a floral fruity fragrance.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-french-panache-pour-lui
detail: An ode to René Lacoste's victory during his last match at Roland Garros in 1929.

name: otto-kern-intense
detail: Otto Kern Intense is an irresistible fragrance with masculine charm.

name: erl-sunscreen
detail: ERL Sunscreen perfectly evokes the fleeting memory of a nostalgic summer. Feelings of the warm West Coast sun against salty skin transform into cool splashes of ocean water and chlorine suspended in the air. The scent of Venice Beach  California.

name: cool-water-reborn-eau-de-parfum
detail: The rise of a unique  intensely fresh aromatic woody fragrance.

name: feels-like-summer-women-2023
detail: A joyful scent for very special summer feelings.

name: on-the-edge
detail: On the Edge is a bold fragrance  perfect for a rebellious woman with an unmistakable style. This woman exudes irreverence and confidence  with irresistible contrasts and a touch of humour. With an electrifying presence  this is a woman who is spontaneous and unconventional.

name: santal-du-pacifique-extrait-1
detail: Experience the fragrance Santal du Pacifique in its purest form. Subtle touches differentiate the extrait from its eau de parfum and bring forth an unmatched intensity and depth  making the original scent richer  more opulent and utterly captivating.

name: santal-du-pacifique-1
detail: Santal du Pacifique takes you on an adventure to the uncharted territories of the Pacific. This refreshing and unique orchestra of notes results in a touch of paradise.

name: midnight-sandal
detail: Intense  precious and vibrant  Midnight Sandal is a tribute to the birthplace of the precious sandalwood: India.

name: sherwood
detail: "I have created a spicy and captivating sandalwood cream. The deep  soft woody signature of sandalwood is enhanced by the richness of sensual cashmeran and precious oakwood " Juliette Karagueuzoglou  perfumer.
ingredients: ['Sandalwood (New Caledonia)', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Rose Damascena', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Oak', 'Pink Pepper', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Orange Blossom']

name: zaad-santal
detail: Zaad Santal brings the warmth and sophistication of sandalwood to enrich the routine of the man who enjoys intense and elegant perfumes.

name: desert-eden-1
detail: Imagine the breathtaking moment when the sun’s rays spread over the desert sand at dawn  surrounding you in a warm  luminous aura  taking you on a new adventure for mind  body and soul.
ingredients: ['Rose (Turkey)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Sandalwood (New Caledonia)', 'Lily', 'Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Cardamom', 'Grapefruit', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Hinoki Wood', 'Sichuan Pepper']

name: brioni-eau-de-parfum-eclat-1
detail: Turning every moment of the day into a delight is an art. An art that the Brioni man practises with charm and effortlessness. He lives by intuition. Experience joy with Brioni Eau de Parfum Éclat.

name: macaque-fuji-apple-edition-1
detail: Sweet notes of Fuji apple dance through a pine forest  welcoming you to Macaque. The fragrance is exuberance tempered by calm  sublimity buoyed by joy  a happy harmony of meditative bliss.

name: leau-de-lily-soleil
detail: L'Eau de Lily Soleil evokes the meeting between the fresh sea breeze and the exuberant sunrise.

name: santal-d-n-sh-1
detail: Santal Dān Shā captures the dreamy ambience of Chinese palaces and regal gardens. The fragrance evokes a refreshing  gentle summer breeze at sunset  inspired by the aromatic trees and vegetation of the gardens  and the tranquil freshness of their lakes.

name: defy-parfum
detail: A defying twist on an icon  with even more power.

name: bois-des-iles-extrait-1
detail: In 1922  the "Bœuf sur le Toit" cabaret opened in Paris and immediately became the epicenter of society nightlife. In its smoky  Bohemian atmosphere  flappers danced the Charleston and Black Bottom to the sound of hot jazz improvisation. Inspired by this wave of exotic energy  Coco Chanel launched Bois des Iles  a captivating fragrance that transports us to the tranquil  unknown waters of distant islands  filled with languid flowers and opiate scents.

name: allure-homme-sport-eau-extreme-1
detail: Allure Homme Sport Eau Extrême incarnates a man who lives his life without limits or compromise.

name: velours-boise-1
detail: Velours Boisé (wooden velvet in English) evokes a warm and heavy fabric used in fashion for its unique  sensual touch. Jacques Fath frequently used velvet for his evening gowns.

name: macaque-yuzu-edition-1
detail: Sweet notes of yuzu dance through a pine forest  welcoming you to Macaque. The fragrance is exuberance tempered by calm  sublimity buoyed by joy  a happy harmony of meditative bliss.

name: entre-ciel-et-mer
detail: Entre Ciel et Mer "Between sky and sea " tells a story of etesian winds  azure skies and flying over seascapes at top speed. Icy  soaring and powerful  the first whiff feels as though it had been sculpted out of the Meltem - north wind that blows over the Aegean Sea. A strikingly novel interpretation of marine fragrances.
ingredients: ['Sandalwood (New Caledonia)', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Lavender', 'Ambergris', 'Sea Water', 'Sea Breeze', 'Animalic Notes', 'Moss', 'Pear', 'Thyme', 'Green Leaves']

name: eden-roc
detail: “I composed this fragrance by imagining myself arriving at the Eden-Roc hotel by sea. The salt  sun  pale rocks and luxuriant vegetation. A legend of luxury and oxygen  of extreme sophistication and exquisite simplicity. A perfume comes to life when it is worn. A place when it is lived in. So let us wish a very long life to Eden-Roc!” François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: leau-revee-dikar
detail: Free and adventurous  L'Eau Rêvée d'Ikar (named after Icarus) takes inspiration from the radiant sun  freshness and proud landscapes of Corsica  one of the places the d'Ornano family call home. A powerful and seducing fragrance.

name: luxuriance
detail: Generous and complex  this river is brimming with nature. A source of wild freshness which primitive energy is magnified by the geranium.

name: tau-1
detail: Tau is a fresh yet ancient perfume  and almost primordial in its playful imprint  influenced by the call of the woods and the animals that inhabit them.
ingredients: ['Oakmoss', 'Lentisk', 'Juniper Berries', 'Patchouli', 'Bergamot', 'Birch', 'Cedarwood', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Geranium', 'Clary Sage', 'Black Pepper', 'Pine Needles', 'Red Chili']

name: fatale-intense
detail: Fatale Intense is an emotionally addictive love potion  an ultra glamorous scent that awakens desire  sensual pleasures.

name: citrus-batikanga
detail: Tasting a freshly squeezed bergamot mixed with chilli inspired Thibaud Crivelli to create a citrusy  spicy and woody accord  providing a totally new approach to this key perfume raw material.

name: boccanera-1
detail: The creator borrowed a quote from Guido Ceronetti: "The parts where it smells are those where it collects the most blood". Gualtieri. This perfume speaks to the senses and "lives" on the skin by matching the wearer's instinct.

name: fiery-curry
detail: Thai curry with Demeter spices is an invigorating and refreshing experience.

name: red-aoud
detail: The highest quality ingredients are highlighted in this elegant Aoud  celebrating the spicy notes and delicate woody accents for a rich potency.

name: lumiere-noire-pour-femme-1
detail: I love the association of the words Lumière and Noire (Light and Black)  an attraction and repulsion. A black hole lit with the image of a mysterious perfume that attracts until it provokes self-abandon. It is the idea of two opposing powers that unite to create a whole that relates  at its turn  a new story.

name: loewe-001-man-eau-de-toilette
detail: Distilling the youthful purity of the scent's original concept in a lighter and fresher interpretation.

name: uomini-black-1
detail: An innovative fragrance  Uomini Black was created for sensual and mysterious men  who have intense masculinity and a remarkable personality.

name: vitriol-d-illet
detail: Anger is notched into the heart of this perfume. Cuffed by wallflower  nailed down by cloves  it packs a punch! Abandoned on the silk slit of a buttonhole  the shredded petals of carnation tear apart the skies and the soul.

name: jaguar-classic-red
detail: This fragrance aims at the modern man who lives for excitement.

name: black-lotus-1
detail: Single-handedly redefining the notion of floral fragrance: the classic English rose  dressed in a black leather jacket.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-cologne-intense-1
detail: Cologne Intense provokes shivers and raises the temperature. Its timeless seduction is just like sipping a frosted tall drink.

name: pompelmo
detail: Bitterness is   in my opinion  one of the brightest scents in perfumery. This may be the result of my Italian background  where several beverages celebrate bitterness. To create Pompelmo  I have worked on both the lively and sour freshness of grapefruit  while stressing its bitter scent ” Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer.

name: iris-malikhan-1
detail: “The intention behind this creation was to express the facets of iris with a very original approach while keeping its reﬁned and powdery inner facets. The structure of this fragrance contrasts softness and strength " Marc Zini  Perfumer.

name: gold-tuberose-nights
detail: Gold Tuberose Nights explores new feminine territories with a powerful and mystical scent.

name: matahari-di-bali
detail: Matahari Di Bali invites you on an olfactory journey to the island of Bali. Awaken your inner sun.

The inspiration for this exciting blend comes from an original formulation dating back to the late 1850s  when Truefitts offered a service of tailoring exclusive fragrances for various regiments  prominent institutions and other persons of eminent status. 1805 was launched in 1999  a fragrance to commemorate the year in which William Francis Truefitt first opened the doors of his salon  establishing a business that was to continue successfully for the next two centuries.

name: varens-moi-lenvie
detail: When desire is far removed from reason. All senses are awakened with sparkling citrus top notes. Elegant floral fragrances succumb to aniseed aromas  while woody notes and musks prolong the lure of an unforgettable trail.

name: vanilla-musk-nights-1
detail: Vanilla Musk Nights emerge from the constellations of perfumes in The Nights Collection as a red star. It's very high temperature is due to the alliance of vanilla  which traditionally enhances oriental fragrances  and musk  which brings a characteristic warm and suggestive animal note. Vanilla Musk Nights  the hottest star in the high perfumery constellation.

name: gold-cedar-nights
detail: The constellations that make up the galaxies brighten up our sky. They are the shining references full of light. We admire them  we need them  they guide us on our way. The perfume universe needs those constellations  which are points of light in infinity  showing us the right direction.

name: oud-venture-1
detail: "The aim of creating this fragrance was to work around patchouli oil. The fragrance is precious  elegant  charming  with noble raw materials. It exudes curiosity  depth and warmth  like the themes of the novel "The Citadel  Wisdom of the Sands" by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry"  Marc Zini  Perfumer.

name: intimate-elixir
detail: “This mystical fougère  with a creamy accord  elevates sophistication above the sky " Marc Zini  Perfumer.

name: noble-musk-nights
detail: He is a lover of luxury  in search of adventure. This is a man who wants to go further. He looks for the sublime in everything; he desires perfection. He is a cultured man who enjoys beauty. He does not settle for just anything and always looks for more. He adores living out new experiences.
ingredients: ['Musk', 'Black Pepper', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Amber', 'Tonka Bean', 'Bergamot', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Apple', 'Cedarwood', 'Patchouli', 'Aromatic Notes']

name: soulle-ambar
