detail: A spirit of adventure  a statement of freedom  Soulle Ámbar excites the senses  anticipating new discoveries just over the horizon and inviting you to embrace life and take a chance.

name: reliqvia
detail: Reliqvia evokes the nail of Christ's Passion  reminding us that life is precious  and short. Enjoy it to the fullest.
ingredients: ['Smoke', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Lentisk', 'Blackcurrant', 'Elemi', 'Nutmeg', 'Orange', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Amyris', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Clove', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Orange Blossom', 'Patchouli', 'Sandalwood', 'Pine Needles']

name: kill-the-lights
detail: He comes with the storm  biting as the smell of his leather jacket that remembers thousands of miles. The engines roar  knees get weak  you’re out of control. All or nothing. The smell of rule-breaker  one of a kind. Kill the lights. You’ll see what comes.

name: ambre-dor
detail: Ambre d'Or combines aromatic top notes with a sensual floral heart and a precious base that brings warmth and longevity.

name: 34-boulevard-saint-germain-leau-du-trente-quatre-1
detail: Imagine the boutique at 34 boulevard Saint-Germain in the springtime. The air is cool  the sun is shining through the door and windows. The air fills with the smell of fresh spices  blond and luminous wood  and green  acidulated notes. All these scents come together in L’Eau du Trente-Quatre  in the style of a springtime olfactory mood that is only waiting to venture out of its bottle.

name: frank
detail: Frånk was inspired after the perfumers trip to Somaliland last year and takes notes that marry together unlike the traditional arcane or noble church scents.

name: mousse-arashiyama
detail: You walk in this forest as in a sacred place. Cradled by the softness of the moss  your steps obey an old instinct  a deep intuition. At the bend of the trail  your eyes finally meet this powerful tree you know  but whose name you do not remember. Your soul  freed from gravity  subtly separates itself from the ground and lingers to savor the scents of nature.

name: citizen-x
detail: Citizen X  The rooftop of a luxury hotel suspended above the City of light. Suddenly  an intense ray runs on the skin and makes you shiver.

name: grain-de-plaisir
detail: Grain de Plaisir is like diving fully dressed into invigorating water. Spicy  insolent and mischievous.

name: harmonie-pastorale
detail: This perfumed composition is inspired by the harmony of notes found in Beethoven's Symphony No. 6  nicknamed "Pastoral"  much appreciated by Lucien Ferrero.

name: perle-de-mousse
detail: Perle de Mousse depicts a woman walking barefoot through the woods at dawn  listening to its secrets. A faceted composition cut like a precious stone: Perle de Mousse.

name: le-male-supreme-collector-2019
detail: Le Male 'Supreme' is a dominating scent for the supremely elegant man who isn't afraid to stand out in the crowd and live life to the fullest!

name: jv-xx-indigo
detail: JV XX Indigo is a fragrance inspired by the celebration of style and music  the heart and soul of the John Varvatos brand. This men’s cologne sets a fresh  confident tone for the day and a sensuous signature after dark.

name: green-neroli-1
detail: Green Neroli is inspired by the abundant aromatic flowers that bloom in the Mediterranean in summer.

name: mercedes-benz-the-move-express-yourself-1
detail: The Move Express Yourself relishes the freedom to think  move  dance and experience life to the max. He is free to let his true self shine through. He is free to be who he truly is. #Express Yourself

name: lhomme-menthe
detail: L'Homme Menthe epitomises modern  self-confident masculinity.

name: re-verse-for-man-1
detail: Replay Re-Verse for Man is a daring fragrance for the Re-Verse man who loves collecting iconic objects to express his own personality.

name: y-eau-fraiche-1
detail: Invigorating like an ocean breeze on a California beach  Y Eau Fraiche captures the spirit of a man in search of personal fulfilment. Young  effortlessly fresh  yet deeply driven by his creative journey. Always on the verge of a new idea. Eager to find his purpose to give meaning to his quest.

name: mint-man
detail: The top notes awaken your senses  with an inviting cocktail  packed with energy. Fine nuances combine with the refreshing vitality. The middle notes reveal the transparency and charisma of this active fragrance combined with the rich warmth of freshness – the essence and origin of its name. A base note with tones lends this fragrance its irresistible masculine charm. Mint Man. It's cool  it's fresh!

name: full-speed-300-kmh-surfer
detail: This unique scent invites you to dive right in and experience the unforgettable adrenaline and thrill of scoring an epic surf. A fragrance that takes you on a wild ride and makes you feel alive!​

name: boss-bottled-united-2021
detail: Boss Bottled United brings together masculine freshness and urban warmth. A lively fragrance that awakens the senses.

name: quasar-next-star-wars-the-mandalorian
detail: This incredible intergalactic journey is inspired by one of the biggest cinema phenomena in the world. Star Wars is about adventures  about having no boundaries to get where you want. Not to mention that it's set in outer space. It's all about Quasar Next  isn't it?

name: jaguar-classic-motion
detail: Jaguar Classic Motion is not just a fragrance  it's an adventure. Created to encourage the masculine character with a raw combination of dynamic  sensuous and freshness. The vibrant appearance and desirable essence will indulge the senses. The ultimate fragrance experience with an invigorating breeze for an unmistakably masculine presence. Don't stop! Stay in motion and be alive!

name: the-most-wanted-2
detail: Azzaro The Most Wanted Intense is the fragrance of a daring man  with an infinite power of attraction. Day and night  he dares  he gambles  he constantly challenges. Heads or tails? Without hesitation  he flips a coin and takes a chance. His courage pays off  his attitude and his charisma make him "The Most Wanted Man"  the most desired man.

name: herbae-leau
detail: A delicate and soft fragrance with a crystalline floral effect  which is followed by subtle  enveloping notes.

name: idole-lintense
detail: Here's to the Idôles  who daringly shine the path for others. To those whose aura radiates with success and greatness  inspiring the Idôle that resides within each one of us. Create a community of Idôles and illuminate the world!

name: idole-aura
detail: Idôle Aura embodies the unstoppable light of success that is spread and shared from one woman to another. A powerful energy that brings together and unites a whole community of idols. Together nothing is impossible. Together we are all idols.

name: terre-de-lumiere-sparkling-edition-2019-1
detail: As the day draws to a close  the sky is set alight  embracing all the shades of gold. Beauty is suspended in time as this stunning spectacle reaches its height. This is the golden hour. Meaning 'land of light. The special time of day in Provence is known as the golden hour. A short moment at dusk as the sun falls and the sky fills with golden and purple light. The air is filled with the most fragrant Provençal scents.

name: pur-blanca-harmony
detail: An invigorating and authentic fragrance that transports you to a simple yet beautiful world. Find the perfect harmony between mind and body and wrap yourself in this gentle perfume.

name: paradoxe-1
detail: Paradoxe captures the essence of the indefinable  ever-changing Prada woman  who is never the same  but always herself. With a timeless bouquet of white flowers reinvented in an avant-garde signature  the fragrance embraces all the paradoxical dimensions of scent and self.

name: white-tea-2
detail: Pure  simple and exquisitely uncomplicated. White Tea is tea in its purest form. Echoing this powerful simplicity  Elizabeth Arden White Tea takes you to a place of luxurious indulgence that allows you to revel in the moment. Special and delighting  this fragrance will transport you to an inviting setting  immerse you in a warm memory  making it the perfect escape for your senses.
ingredients: ['White Tea', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Mandarin', 'Iris / Orris', 'Serenolide (Musk)', 'Sylkolide (Musk)', 'Fern', 'Mate', 'Clary Sage', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Notes', 'Sea Breeze', 'Ambermax (Woody ambery)']

name: big-pony-purple-4-for-women-1
detail: Edgy and refined with a taste for the exotic  this Oriental floral is designed for the stylish woman; her flair expresses her unique personality and catches the eye and hearts of anyone who crosses her path.

name: island-fantasy-1
detail: A tantalizing fragrance that evokes warm sunshine  ocean breezes and brings you to a place where you can wiggle your toes in the sand. Escape from it all through Island Fantasy.

name: definition-1
detail: Christina Aguilera's power can be defined as an innate confidence that radiates from within. It is something she intimately knows and exudes. Without a need for explanation  her presence alone  illuminates her inner strength.

name: orchid-soleil
detail: Impressive and extraordinary as the solar eclipse; a rare perfumery phenomenon conjured by the star of Tom Ford.

name: dylan-purple
detail: "Through Dylan Purple  I felt the need to give back to Italy what it had given me in the past: a simple  pure  unadorned happiness. I created this fragrance as an invitation to travel " Christophe Raynaud  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Freesia', 'Pear', 'Ambrofix (Ambergris)', 'Mahonial', 'Pomarose (Apple Rosy note)', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Belambre (Woody ambery)', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Sylkolide (Musk)']

name: toy-boy
detail: Toy Boy speaks to a unique  dynamic  enthusiastic and passionate man  but one who is not afraid to reveal his more tender and playful side. Toy Boy is an exciting play of endless codes seeking out re-evaluation and liberation.

name: vince-camuto-ciao-1
detail: A fragrance that instantly say's "Ciao!" The warmth of the Italian sunshine comes alive through in the opening with radiant citrus. Gem-like fruits create sparkle throughout with a floral heart that will make you smile. A striking and mesmerizing background fills the air with glowing and captivating notes.
ingredients: ['Rose', 'Blackberry', 'Strawberry', 'Honeysuckle', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Passion Flower', 'Peony', 'Amber', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Grapefruit', 'Mandarin', 'Amaro Siciliano', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Sylkolide (Musk)']

name: tommy-girl-summer-ocean-wave-2022-1
detail: Escape to the islands and embrace a summer of seaside discovery with Tommy Girl Summer Ocean Wave  a limited edition inspired by the breathtaking beaches of Hawaii.

name: oud-minerale-2024
detail: Oud Minérale captures the refreshing play of surf and sea against the burning flame of smoked wood. Tom Ford's reinvention of oud marks an olfactive watershed that pairs two of the world's most intriguing elements to reveal tonalities both exhilarating and powerfully transcendent.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Ambergris', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Vetiver', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Pepperwood', 'Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Fir Balsam', 'Patchouli', 'Pink Pepper', 'Styrax', 'Sylkolide (Musk)']

name: ever-bloom-eau-de-parfum
detail: Ever Bloom is all about femininity at its ultimate and most subtle power. The perfume is a messenger  a perfect wave diffusing the boundless aura. A beautiful woman  which lead to the creation of a fragrance that is a perfect fusion of delicacy and sensuality.

name: abyssis
detail: I am a giant monster that can crush the biggest wooden hulls and no one can beat me. More powerful than the winds and the tides. I am a Kraken  a creature from the deep. Abyssis is my sea power.

name: tubereuse-nue
detail: Like the labyrinthine passages of the enchanted city of Jaisalmer  the "Golden City" that houses the maharaja's palace  the perfume reveals itself in a mystical dance of temptations.

name: pure-pastel-mint-1
detail: This spring  cool mint tones are mixed with pastel lemon  giving rise to new and unusual combinations in the fashion world. When combined with pinks and reds  these contrasts create an even more summery freshness. The diversity of pastel prints with floral and graphic elements heralds the warmer months.

name: guess-1981-indigo-for-men
detail: Embolden your senses with this timeless scent  expertly capturing the strength and natural sensuality of the GUESS brand.

name: missoni-eau-de-toilette
detail: A delicate fragrance inspired by the morning sunrise and dedicated to a sensual and exuberant woman whose femininity really stands out.

name: ever-bloom-extrait-absolu-1
detail: Like an ever-blooming flower  she opens gently and gradually. Unfolding herself to the energy surrounding her  she suffuses every circumstance with her sweet aura  transforming its ambiance  moment by moment  revelation by revelation. She lingers - like an unforgettable scent - in the mind of all who meet her.

name: my-pearls-1
detail: My Pearls is inspired by the preciousness of the pearl  symbol of femininity  loved by the great sopranos who have graced the stage of the Gran Teatro La Fenice.

name: my-scent-1
detail: She's young  dynamic and cosmopolitan. She's sincere  and successful. She follows her dreams and pursues her goals with strength and determination. She know s how to distinguish herself and to express her personality through her fragrance: Trussardi My Scent.

name: pink-flamingos
detail: A cloud of pink bubbles floating in the heart of Tokyo. The joyful embrace of nature and the synthetic animates the familiar to produce an exalted form of beauty. Pink Flamingos is the scent of fluorescent pink flowers  stylised and innocent.

name: vert-de-fleur
detail: There are days in winter when the Tom Ford man gets a premonition of spring across the European capitals  Paris  London  Vienna. It comes unconsciously  as though poking through a wet blanket of grey fog or light snow; a pulsating call to leave the city and run to the hills.

name: idole-eau-de-parfum-valentines-day-edition-2021-1
detail: Declare you are the future with this iconic floral perfume and be your own Idôle. Do not compromise with your dreams. And when it comes to love  dare to go beyond the limits. Love is something you experience  it must be declared to exist: dare to say it out in the air.

name: look-1
detail: The protagonist of this very special perfume is one of the most representative icons of Agatha Ruiz de la Prada's fashion collections  the eye. On this occasion it becomes the perfect perfume for those who are willing to get thousands of likes.

name: vesper-glitz
detail: Vesper Glitz celebrates with radiance the airiness of an impertinent night out in Paris. Enjoy the beauty of a nocturnal sillage in which floral notes of jasmine and mimosa embrace intoxicating emanations of ambery notes.

name: the-amara
detail: Thé Amara is like an olfactory stroll  a tranquil wander through tea plantations in the early morning.

name: inverness
detail: A fragrance imagined as a tribute to Amyris and guided by a deep and subtle woody conviction  which keeps its mystery intact  and to which we return  as if magnetised.

name: idole-emily-in-paris-2021
detail: As the saying goes  you're never fully dressed without perfume. Idôle Emily in Paris is presented in a unique bottle dressed in Emily's famous heart shape and Eiffel Tower handbag charm and brings a sense of power and sensuality that captures the exuberant joie de vivre of the French capital.

name: idole-eau-de-parfum-holiday-edition-2021
detail: The fragrance of a new generation of conquering women. Strong. Outspoken. Empowered. The fragrance of the leaders of tomorrow  who dare to reach the sky and open new horizons. The fragrance of the new idols  who pave the way for others. Idôle. Declare you are the future with this iconic floral perfume and be your own Idôle.

name: paradoxe-intense
detail: A delicate  intense scent for the bold  powerful woman.

name: tommy-hilfiger-impact
detail: A celebration of Tommy Hilfiger's love for music and his passion for emerging musical talent - a vibrant  modern composition with real soul and rock 'n roll roots.
ingredients: ['Akigalawood (Patchouli note)', 'Cypress', 'Cocoa Leaves', 'Sandalwood', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Cedarwood (Texas)', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Grapefruit', 'Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Elemi', 'Musk', 'Pink Pepper', 'Red Apple', 'Clary Sage']

name: narciso-rouge-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Narciso Rouge Eau de Toilette is an irresistible  intense and magnetic fragrance to awaken and excite your passion.

name: celtic-rose-1
detail: The Rose compass used by sailors to keep the right path  also called Celtic knot  was inspired by the celtic symbol of a rose. Nature's secret of clear vision revealed.

name: idole-nectar-2
detail: Driven by the vision of a new fragrant delight  Idôle Eau de Parfum Nectar widens the field of olfactory possibilities to set the body and mind in motion. A fragrance inspired by the future  for all women charting a new course for tomorrow.

name: idole
detail: To the generation that dream big: strong women  empowered and outspoken. To the leaders of tomorrow: daring  pursuing new horizons and paving a new path. “I always say my idol is my future self ” says Idôle ambassadress  Zendaya. I can  we will. We are Idôles.

name: sport-n-11-evasion-polar
detail: Slide across the mountain accompanied by a wave of marine freshness  citrus and a youthful cantaloupe accord. In the heart  an aromatic accord of rosemary and lavender blends with a powerful ginger and ends with the comforting accord of wood and amber. Musk is added to the trail to prolong the duration of the fragrance on the skin. A fresh and totally revitalising scent.

name: flam
detail: A fragrance that brings to mind the magnetic energy of the northern lights alongside the protective warmth of a cos wooden house.

name: white-fire-1
detail: The silence of the snow; its dazzling white brought alive and sparkling by the flickering flames. The fragrance is simple and silvery. The crisp clean air  the energising fresh smell of snow  the intoxicating oxygen  and the dampened smell of fire on ice  all in the glow of the first light of dawn. This fragrance embodies the unique power and beauty of nature  crystal clear in our eyes  hearts  and our most intimate olfactory memories.

name: dans-la-peau
detail: An infusion of leather  an invitation to explore the senses. Travelling often has the power to embolden desire. Dans La Peau imprints on the skin like indelible ink. A scent that doesn't feign desire. It lays it bare.

name: matsukita
detail: A bedazzling scent that will turn heads. Just as the Japanese princess mesmerised the Victorian courts with her mystical elegance and grace  this perfume will dazzle all that encounter its colourful  silken-like trail.

name: radianza
detail: "My love for flowers is infinite. So for this symphonic floral perfume  I blissfully orchestrated my floral parts and pieces thinking of the natural life cycle of a flower: from the closed bud to its eclosion  its magnificent turgescence  its nocturnal exhalations  it's languid fading away. And then the petals landing softly on the ground  exhausted but still redolent " Rodrigo Flores-Roux  Perfumer.

name: sumatera-1
detail: Fresh extracts from the island of Sumatra embrace lush and mysterious spices.

name: jasmin-moghol
detail: Inspired by the Arabian Gardens of Paradise  Jasmin Moghol evokes a Jaipur love garden of captivating beauty; the narcotic floral and mystical garden of the Royal Palace in Jaipur.

name: terre-de-lumiere-leau-8
detail: Experience the magic of a Provencal sunrise with Terre de Lumière L'Eau  and let its tender fragrance transport you to a world of pure bliss. Indulge in the beauty of this shimmering dewdrop at daybreak and cherish this moment forever.

name: tommy-hilfiger-impact-intense-1
detail: The first burst of freshness features a bright energetic start. The heart is dominated by creamy  rich  and addictive notes  adding a sensual and captivating element to this intense scent. The signature is inspiring and spirited  igniting to fulfil one's dreams!

name: soul-of-my-soul
detail: "Soul of my Soul speaks of the fire god of Persia and the gods of India  and the worship of offerings to honour the gods. And to remember  by a wake in the air  the foaming whiteness of the soul that comes from everything. Here  perfume is soul  the soul is perfume " Etienne de Swardt  Founder.

name: chrome-parfum-1
detail: Prepare to immerse yourself in the deep blue of the Mediterranean with Azzaro Chrome Parfum.

name: light-blue-italian-love-pour-homme-2022-1
detail: Dolce & Gabbana captures the essence of profound passion and summer intensity with Light Blue Italian Love pour Homme.

name: noble-epine
detail: A fruity freshness  enhanced with floral and almond sweetness and musky notes.

name: burning-desire
detail: A modern interpretation of the rose that expresses the tenderness and sensuality of the woman who wears it.

name: very-good-girl-glam
detail: Very Good Girl Glam is an ode to the power of femininity  fearless and brilliantly bold!

name: tender-light
detail: A burst of pure light lifts you up into a palace of dreams. Awakening  illuminating and energising  this scent will leave you feeling radiantly alive.

name: kar-wai-1
detail: He is spectacularly handsome and uninhibited: the most dangerous lover I have ever known. He intoxicates me with his power  allowing me to lose myself completely. With him  I surrender to my senses.

name: fleur-de-the-rose-bulgare-1
detail: Fleur de Thé Rose Bulgare is a direct expression of a rose accord. While that may sound simple  it is truly a masterpiece of perfumery.

name: bvlgari-eau-parfumee-au-the-noir
detail: Created under the concept of wellness  Bulgari's Eau Parfumée Au Thé Noir is inspired by the essence of black tea  and radiates with its mythical powers of rejuvenation.

name: woody-mood
detail: Something about it feels ritualistic  shamanic almost. The deeply rooty  spicy smell of the woods  herbs and spices will run through your spirit like a hot knife through butter  cleaning out the dust in your mental corridors.

name: bvlgari-eau-parfumee-au-the-vert
detail: Eau Parfumée au Thé Vert is meant to be shared. The simplicity and freshness of this green tea cologne was inspired by the ancient Oriental tea ceremony. When worn  it immediately reveals citrus notes  spices and blossoms  then slowly releases the green tea heart. This precious extract has recognized beneficial properties and epitomizes the sensuality of body-pampering rituals. Eau Parfumée au Thé Vert is an expression of refined elegance and personal indulgence.

name: very-good-girl
detail: Very Good Girl takes you on an astonishing olfactory journey  from top notes of mischievous red currant and exotic lychee  to seductive middle notes of rose. Top notes of vetiver and vanilla add a contemporary and surprising finish. Fun  fabulous and fearless  Very Good Girl is a bold interpretation of the iconic Good Girl.

name: lair-du-temps-x-antoinette-poisson-2022-1
detail: For this limited-edition version  Nina Ricci’s most iconic bottle has donned a veil of immaculate white  evocative of porcelain. A dazzling hue  on which several graceful doves have settled  delicately etched out in blue ink. This is the second time Antoinette Poisson has been invited to reinterpret the L’Air du Temps bottle. The scent formulated for this fleeting edition is a gourmand floral fragrance infused with the same sense of liberty  playfulness  and joie de vivre as the original L’Air du Temps.

name: sparkle
detail: Sparkle captures the unique sensations that take over New York as the sun sets and the city lights begin to twinkle. That moment when you feel an irresistible  addictive and exuberant blend of floral and gourmand scents waft through the air. Sensual and inspiring  the fragrance celebrates a captivating and luminous personality whose halo leaves no one indifferent.

name: wild-achillea-2023
detail: Golden bundles of wild achillea frame remote ruins alive with nature. Sparkling with bright citrus entwined with the tangy sting of nettle  the greenness balanced on a base of soft accords.

name: i-want-choo-christmas-edition-2022
detail: I Want Choo Christmas Edition is a powerful fragrance that explodes with joy and finishes with a seductive twist.

name: good-girl-collector-gold-fantasy-2022
detail: With its contrasting blend of ingredients that are at once sweet and sensual  Good Girl represents every side of a woman’s femininity from light to dark  softness to strength. For this limited release  the emblematic Good Girl high-heeled shoe is entirely doused in perfectly polished gold.

name: bad-boy-collector-dazzling-garden-2023
detail: The electrifying power of nature is at the beating heart of Bad Boy  the scintillating scent encased in a bolt of powerful lightning. And today  we’re bringing the enchantment and excitement of a dreamlike world to the Bad Boy family in the form of Dazzling Garden  a dramatic take on the iconic bottle.

name: good-girl-midnight-1
detail: Good Girl Midnight is a special limited release of Carolina Herrera’s Good Girl  a global success story in fragrance since its first edition in 2016. A bold version celebrating the magic of the night  Good Girl Midnight is an intense and textured eau de parfum that transcends the very essence of the original Good Girl. Exclusively available in the Middle East  the opulence of the fragrance is a tribute to the magical mystery of the night. Good Girl Midnight speaks to modern women with its complex and multi-faceted femininity. Assuredly sensual  unexpectedly layered and contrasted  it boldly states what every Good Girl knows: when night falls  the true magic happens.

name: in-paradise-riviera-2022-1
detail: Inspired by the spirit of a burning afternoon on the French Riviera  this scent sublimates its floral notes and expresses a sexy and addictive signature.

name: la-perla-luminous-1
detail: La Perla Luminous is as joyful and confident as the woman who wears it  inspired by the peek-a-boo style of the La Perla lace bralettes  encapsulated in a woody yet creamy floral bouquet.

name: good-girl-blush-elixir
detail: An intense  incandescent blend of rose  vanilla  and smoky patchouli  Good Good Blush Elixir is a seductive eau de parfum that’s both a chypre (woody and mysterious) and floral adventure.

name: bad-boy-collector-superstars-2021
detail: Strong  but sensitive  heroic  yet vulnerable  the Bad Boy is confident in who he is  embracing all sides of his contrasting personalities. Bad Boy captures the multiple facets of contemporary manhood in an explosive yet sophisticated modern scent.

name: blanche-bete
detail: I am an imaginary animal  wild and lonely. My immaculate body is that of a fabulous white horse. I wear a single horn on my forehead. I embody love and mystery. Can you dream hard enough to see me? Because I am the animal that never existed. Blanche Bête is my legend.

name: possibilities-1
detail: Heads turn  eyes and minds wander. Was it just an innocent glance or the promise of a flirtation? Only you will know. Your aura is magnetic  but utterly mysterious. Hopelessly curious  all a stranger can see is possibilities. Who knows what will happen next?

name: angel-nova-eau-de-toilette
detail: ​An inspiring fragrance for a modern heroine  who makes her dreams a reality and reality a dream. ​It is a perfume for women of today who believe in themselves.​ A lively and luminous breath  for irresistible femininity that radiates with pleasure and confidence. With this new women's fragrance by Mugler  dreams burst with infinite brightness and freshness.​

name: burberry-her-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Captivating  confident and effortlessly individual  Her Eau de Toilette embodies the essence of the modern Burberry woman as she explores the city. Enraptured  she sees the world from a new perspective. A break with expectations. A new discovery.

name: boss-the-scent-for-her-le-parfum
detail: An intense fragrance to ignite your senses  unleashing an alchemy of attraction impossible to resist.

name: good-girl-collector-ruby-sparkle-2021-1
detail: Celebrate 40 years of Carolina Herrera with this special collector’s edition of our iconic Good Girl fragrance  covered in graduated red and pink Swarovski crystals  our signature house colours and a symbol of optimism  light and energy.

name: raving-rose
detail: “The rose is an icon for Dries but I wanted to disrupt its classicism to create a rose that is not a rose  not taking itself too seriously  ultra-modern and spicy ” Louise Turner  Perfumer.

name: bad-boy-extreme
detail: Strictly unconventional yet rebellious and tender  Bad Boy Extreme represents a fiery evolution with its unexpected use of ingredients. Formulated by Quentin Bisch  Louise Turner and Yann Vasnier  this exciting fragrance enters extraordinarily new territory in both the combination and sustainable sourcing of these ingredients.

name: la-perla-signature
detail: A sparkling floral bouquet as radiant  confident and sensual as the La Perla woman.

name: good-girl-collector-dazzling-garden-2023
detail: It’s time to step into an enchanted new world  a Dazzling Garden  in fact  where the colours are bolder  the evening sky is sparkling  and the air carries a sweet fragrance like none other.

name: i-want-choo-forever
detail: I Want Choo Forever captures the playful spirit of Jimmy Choo. This enchanting scent is guaranteed to become the backdrop to your most memorable evenings.

name: limitless-shopping-via-della-spiga-1
detail: "A sophisticated  faceted fragrance that attracts like honey  it is ideal for warming the soul in winter while strolling down the luxurious Via Della Spiga with its fabulous boutiques " Amélie Jacquin  co-Perfumer.

name: musc-1
detail: Musces like fire and ice. A warm and rounded fragrance  a fragrance that elegantly evokes the sweet scent of clean skin.

name: libre-labsolu-platine-2023
detail: Libre l'Absolu Platine expresses the absolute intensity to burn from cold and shiver from heat. The perfume of a strong  bold and free woman experimenting her freedom absolutely.

name: curtidas-de-humor-1
detail: Humor is a way of looking at life. Because grace is greater when we share and allow ourselves to laugh at ourselve.

name: crystal-noir-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: He has presence. She walks with her head held high and has a special smile. She has an innate ability to be sexy and is always very confident. She is sure of her fashion sense  constantly exploiting her natural elegance. She loves the eccentricity and glamour of the haute couture spirit. She is the Versace woman.

name: dark-vanilla
detail: This unique  warm and deep powdery creation around the vanilla introduces the resinoid of Rooibos. An absolute first in fine perfumery for this complex fragrance with its soft connotations  revealing dark  balsamic and sensual facets.  Rounded off with spicy notes and powdery notes of Dark Vanilla invites you to experience this olfactive mystery.

name: marsiglia-musk-1
detail: The interpretation of the new cleanness  Marsiglia Musk is a fragrance dedicated to those who like wearing a crisp white shirt.

name: hello-kitty-candy
detail: Hello Kitty Candy translates all the cuteness and delicacy of the character with a fruity romantic olfactory path.

name: nativa-spa-royal-plumm-1
detail: Royal Plum invites you to feel life with your skin and soul. The cologne brings a more intense version of the Plum fragrance  with ingredients that bring floral notes  allied with delicious fruits to revealing an intense  sensual and extremely elegant essence.

name: cuide-se-bem-sol-e-agua-fresca
detail: Cuide-Se Bem Sol e Água Fresca is a fragrance that combines the comfort of coconut with the delicacy of frangipani flower.

name: inlove-1
detail: The aromas of fruits  flowers and gourmand notes with a touch of vanilla make InLove a love potion!

name: lheure-bleue-eau-de-parfum
detail: "The sun has set  but night has not yet fallen. It's the suspended hour. The hour when one finally finds oneself in renewed harmony with the world and the light " Jacques Guerlain liked to say. He was referring to his favourite moment  when "the night has not yet found its star". It was this fleeting sensation that he tried to express in 1912 with L'Heure Bleue.

name: baiser-vole-parfum-1
detail: An abundance of lilies with velvety petals  more sensual than ever  like a touch of balm on the skin.

name: series-6-synthetic-garage
detail: Garage is a socially incorrect fragrance based on man-made places and materials of daily life.

name: boss-alive-eau-de-parfum
detail: Created entirely by women  for women  Boss Alive is a fragrance for women who make bold moves. Independent  elegant and powerfully feminine  the women who represent the spirit of Boss Alive understand that spontaneity and happiness are as important to their story as dedication and focus. They know that being true to themselves is their greatest strength.

name: concrete-flower
detail: The hyper-energising interpretation of an eau de cologne: green herbal energy  white blossoms and cold stone. It will make the concrete flourish!

name: sens-et-bois
detail: Imagine a frolic through the wood  the magic  and mystery that surrounds: seductive scents  flowers that scatter afoot  spicy woods reaching to the sky. The magic is no longer a mystery!

name: cedarwood-15
detail: A refreshing yet powerful scent with an elegant trail.

name: boss-alive-eau-de-parfum-2021
detail: Celebrate the holiday season with this limited edition of Alive  sparkling with precious golden snowflakes. A fragrance leaving a trail of positive energy  which invites you to surpass yourself and live your life to the fullest.

name: santal-des-indes-1
detail: The freshness of deep things  of noble trees with ancient roots. Grounded and serene  Santal des Indes is a poetic gesture of gratitude for the gifts of the earth.

name: body-kouros-1
detail: A singular fragrance and one that is multifaceted. Rich and proudly different. A blend never seen before. More than a fragrance. A magnetic force.

name: hespereden
detail: This fragrance is a surprising blend of bitter  spicy and sensual notes that transport us to an ideal garden  where a majestic cedar stands amidst citrus trees.

name: rose-de-caroline
detail: Inspired by Chopard's Artistic Director Caroline Scheufele  the perfumer created Rose de Caroline Eau de Parfum to pay homage to Caroline's favourite flower.

name: jazz-bar
detail: The scent of citrus evokes old times  slow and leisurely. The taste of honey stain in rum makes the stories in your memory more and more vivid. The coffee beans are grinded  the whiskey glass is spilled  and the scent breaks out instantly. Cigar mixes with jazz  swaying corridor swirls in dreams.

name: cafe-gourmand
detail: Enjoy the contrasts of a lively and bold  calming and soothing fragrance with Café Gourmand.

name: iristretto
detail: A tribute to one of the most iconic Italian coffee: the ristretto.

name: coffee-bomb
detail: Taking inspiration from his time spent in the Arabic countries  the perfumer Arturetto Landi creates an enveloping and rich fragrance seducing all of our senses.

name: amygdala
detail: “I tried to create a fragrance that is so amazing  it can change our facial expressions " Luca Maffei  Perfumer.

name: ajayeb-dubai-black
detail: Ajayeb Dubai captures the essence of tradition and modernity  evoking a sensation of unparalleled warmth and sophistication.

name: amen-angel-men
detail: Would you like to go beyond the perfume with A

name: natura-homem-reconecta
detail: Reconnect with yourself to connect with each other. A fragrance that awakens the feeling of confidence.

name: soleil-brulant-1
detail: Soleil Brûlant captures the high-shine brilliance of the golden sun beaming on a private oasis.

name: terra-mia
detail: Eyes half closed  the sun on my skin. All around the sea brings a thousand scents that are those of a place of the heart  "my" homeland  Terra Mia. A vibrant and ancient soul watching an idyllic sea and listening to the echoes of the land  our passion  Mi Terra - Terra Mia.

name: khamrah-qahwa
detail: A vibrant scent with exciting  sensual accords.

name: whisky-nobile
detail: The soft light of a lamp  a briefcase absent-mindedly placed on the desk. A strong and persistent aroma of whiskey and coffee in the air. Rivers of ink wet the blank pages of a book still to be written.

name: fan-your-flames
detail: Ignite your life. Look for those who fan your flames.

name: solarissimo-favignana
detail: Azzaro Solarissimo Favignana is a scent that was inspired by the meeting between the sun and the Mediterranean sea.

name: vanille-benjoin-1
detail: To showcase this exceptional marriage  Affinessence has combined two types of vanilla notes and blended them with an exquisite alter ego  benzoin. As the notes unfold  they exude the carnal notes  transcending with an intoxicating scent as if to better diffuse their bewitching trail.

name: trace
detail: Tra.ce. is an evocative scent where each drop forms a timeless blend.

name: perfect-oud
detail: Oud. An extraordinary wood which  when burnt  reveals its personality fully. Perfect Oud is an impression  an "olfactive memory" when only emotions are left.

name: dunhill-british-leather
detail: Liquid leather captured in a bold bottle  the Dunhill British Leather fragrance takes notes from history and the present  the masculine fern scent is offset by feminine violet leaf  a contemporary concoction for the modern man.

name: quasar-2019-1
detail: Boost your achievements with Quasar! A burst of energy and vitality for the determined man who faces life and its challenges with the passion of a winner.

name: cologne-de-figuier-1
detail: "This Cologne adds another dimension to the fig tree. It sets off the traditional fruity accents of the fig and releases the whole tree. We can sense the wood  the leaves  the branches. I wanted a composition that could be worn at any time of the year  like a desire to instantly remember a nap against a tree." - Alberto Morillas  Perfumer

name: strength-1
detail: Strength fuses the tenacity of tobacco leaves with rich  gourmand notes.
ingredients: ['Guaiac Wood', 'Honey', 'Tobacco Accord', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Tonka Bean', 'Cade', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Pine Needles', 'Apricot', 'Smoke', 'Vulcanolide (Musk)']

name: mirabilis-1
detail: The contrast is striking from the outset. Mirabilis attempts to reconcile the artificial and the sacred. On the skin  the fragrance is as rational as it is mystical.

name: rose-exaltante
detail: "We haven't met yet  but I know that from now on you won't be able to live without me. I'm going to be your new obsession. You won't see me coming and before that  you'll only smell my delicate fragrance of Bulgarian rose. You won't be able to choose me. You won't be able to catch me. It is I who comes to you. My scent is as powerful as woods and balsams and hides the sensuality of musk that trembles under the skin"  Alberto Morillas  Perfumer.

name: ck-all
detail: An invitation to self-expression. A stage for all - inclusive of all genders and diversities. An amplifier for all tribes and communities.

name: orange-feuilles-fleurs-1
detail: Breathe deep into a field of wild orange trees  on the hills of the Mediterranean. From the tree from which the leaves and twigs are distilled  we obtain a scent with a green  vegetal  fresh note that evokes the power of sunny citrus fruits as much as the delicacy of sweet oranges.

name: crystal-pistil
detail: Add clear orange blossom water or crystalline flower petals and dew to any fragrance  or just use it on its own!
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Floral Notes', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Jasmine', 'Paradisone (light Jasmine)', 'Dew Drop', 'Pink Pepper', 'Civet', 'Musk']

name: vert-empire
detail: Winter has just ended. This is the moment when the citrus fruits that have been in the orangery are back outside. Bringing out the lemon and orange trees  what could be more trivial for a gardener? But for Alberto Morillas  Perfumer  this familiar gesture is one of the most fragrant there is. Vert Empire is a delicate evocation of this moment.

name: tres-chere
detail: Tres Chere is the poetic dedication of perfumer Alberto Morillas to an unforgettable encounter  a moment that will remain forever etched in his mind. "Everything was there. The sweetness of your voice  the grace of your gestures. Your profile outlined by the light  unforgettable and delicate like a precious white flower".

name: cant-stop-loving-you
detail: Kilian Hennessy creates in Can't Stop Loving You a true declaration of love: a perfume that celebrates love. Both luminous and sombre  this unique fragrance is a floral narcotic that threatens peace.

name: musc-eternel
detail: Imagine a heart of flowers nestled in a cocoon of white musks. A sensual powdery caress  like a second skin.

name: mon-guerlain-eau-de-parfum-florale
detail: Today's woman is an accomplished woman  comfortable in her own skin  knowing herself perfectly  who has made assumed choices in her life. She has discovered joy  fear  happiness  sadness. Tracing her journey of self-discovery. All those emotions have built the person she is today: fulfilled  strong  free and independent  embracing all the sides of herself.

name: punta-ala
detail: "Endless views  hypnotic horizons  vivid colours  the Italian coast stands out for its natural beauty. A resplendent Mediterranean paradise that I wanted to represent with this composition"  Alberto Morillas  Perfumer.

name: voce-viva-intensa-1
detail: The sound of your voice  the scent of your fragrance  so much a magnetic presence. Voce Viva Intense celebrates the unique voice of every woman in a statement: My voice  my strength. An invitation to express and live your dreams.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-rose-eau-fraiche-pour-elle
detail: Feel the energy of Lacoste with the Eau de Toilette L.12.12 Rose Eau Fraîche. Reinvent the rules of the game  feel free to move with assurance thanks to the unexpected lightness of this unique scent. An explosion of vitality  providing an exhilarating comfort.

name: behind-the-curtain-piazza-alla-scala-1
detail: "I was inspired by the atmosphere of Teatro Alla Scala. I  therefore  chose saffron  one of the most precious spices in the world and natural woods  to recreate the luxurious and traditional ambiance of this majestic theatre " Amandine Clerc-Marie  Perfumer.

name: summer-festival-2021
detail: A fragrance embodying the spirit of Coachella  the biggest summer music and culture festival of all time. An electric scent that captures the promise of sunny days and fun-filled nights!

name: gingembre-rouge-edition-or-2020-1
detail: A talented duo of French perfumers  Amandine Clerc-Marie  and Alberto Morillas  imagined a floral and fruity fragrant universe with energising benefits  which has at its heart an extract of Nigerian ginger and 10 other precious natural distilled essences  including sweet orange and red berries.

name: cool-water-woman-jasmine-tangerine-2022
detail: Feel the explosion of freshness and sensuality. A floral made for you: Davidoff Cool Water Jasmine & Tangerine.

name: island-water-women-1
detail: Island Water Women is a tribute to the free spirit Musa-Shiya  called "The Shirtmaker"  the inventor of the Hawaiian shirt. Driven by his restless creativity and strong entrepreneurial spirit  Shiya moved to Honolulu from his home country Japan in the early 1930s.

name: illusione-tonka-solaire-for-her-2021
detail: A pure floral-vegetable accord enhanced by precious woods.

name: la-nuit-tresor-fleur-de-nuit
detail: Close your eyes  feel the blossoming of romance and prepare to be mesmerised by the most sensual and blooming love. Dare to enter the exclusive secret night garden of La Nuit Trésor. An enchanting place where only the most beautiful flowers grow and the most precious love stories bloom. This floral and ambery update of the legendary fragrance of love seduces the heart with an irresistible mystery.
ingredients: ['Rose Damascena', 'White Flowers', 'Coffee', 'Jasmine', 'Tuberose', 'Beauty Of The Night', 'Benzoin', 'Cream (Chantilly)', 'Patchouli', 'Woody Notes']

name: nina-soleil-1
detail: Be ready to get a taste of summer with Nina Soleil!

name: sunset-wood
detail: A vibrant scent with a deep  warm trail.

name: valentino-donna-born-in-roma-intense
detail: An outstanding tribute to Rome and its sunsets  Born in Roma Intense aims at exalting your magnificent personality  celebrating a night in the eternal city.

name: enflamme
detail: "I like true colours that resonate. Nothing makes me sadder than undefined  faded and expressionless colours." - Hubert de Givenchy

name: aromatic-greens-1
detail: This warm and calming fragrance encapsulates the serenity and tranquillity of nature’s vibrant beauty.

name: voce-viva
detail: Voce Viva celebrates every woman's voice  and as a voice  a fragrance is personal  intimate  and leaves a trace.

name: amber-kiss
detail: "An amber fragrance of a unique sensuality. An ultra-glamorous luminous veil to create full desire." Amandine Clerc-Marie  Perfumer.

name: instinctive-marine
detail: When one secludes oneself for a moment of introspection on the beach  the waves crashing against the rocks add a thrilling salty note that seems to dissolve into the infinite sweetness of an embrace with its eternal dualism of passion and feeling. Instinctive Marine evokes the precious moments when solitude makes us better people.

name: la-nuit-tresor-dentelle-de-roses-2021-1
detail: Lancôme's iconic La Nuit Trésor has been adorned with a veil of Haute Couture lace for 2021. Encapsulated in this precious bottle  this unique olfaction is composed of an overdose of rose and carefully dressed in an intense fruity velvet dress.

name: romance-pink-pony-edition-2020-1
detail: "Romance Pink Pony Edition is for anyone who believes in love and its power of true connection  energising positivity and potent healing. The fragrance covers you with love  from a passionate hug to a sensual warm touch " Honorine Blanc-Hattab and Amandine Clerc-Marie  Perfumers.

name: porsche-design-woman-satin
detail: The world of Porsche Design is modern  elegant  and clear  similar to the concept of Porsche Design Woman Satin. Perfumer Amandine Clerc-Marie has placed a modern rose at the centre of the composition: a statement as feminine and charismatic as the wearer herself.

name: sunburst
detail: It's still early in the morning. The first rays of sunshine warm your skin. You open the window and breathe in the cool morning air. You start the day full of energy. Sunburst is fresh  sparkling  and invigorating.

name: scent-of-kiss-my-heart
detail: Armand Basi scent of Kiss My Heart is built on a very complex olfactory score in which opposites attract  repel and intertwine to find their irresistible harmony.

name: burberry-goddess
detail: This is a quest for female emancipation where you reveal who you truly are  where you reconnect with your inner strengths. A unique definition of this major archetype: the Goddess. The fiercely kind. Unleash your lioness with Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum.

name: candy-love-2020-1
detail: Welcome to Candy Land! Go to the heart of the most extravagant funfair with Candy Love for women. Are you ready to live the extraordinary life and indulge in the sweetest treat?

name: foudroyant-1
detail: Behind a half-open door  a hypnotic gaze seems like an invitation. Foudroyant is the olfactory expression of this surprising and hypnotic sensation.

name: la-nuit-tresor-intense-2022-2
detail: It only takes a second for passion to take hold. Inspired by the most potent  fiery form of love  La Nuit Trésor Intense has an addictive power  composed of indulgent notes that bewitch the senses and offer renewed seduction to the iconic flower found in the trail of La Nuit Trésor  the Isparta rose. This red rose is a scarlet melody of a trio of olfaction delights.

name: vanira-moorea-1
detail: Our perfumers unlock a wild and sensual vanilla with delicious and addictive notes. A unique trip into the Polynesian lands. A solar and tropical blend.

name: lovann
detail: Communicating through fragrances  just like ants do. With a sophisticated formulation of the theoretical system inspired by the theory of communication used by ants  which leads us to a new way of creating and using fragrances.

name: secrets-dessences-vanille-noire
detail: Succumb to the temptation of a fragrance skin of a rare sensuality. Between freshness and sensuality  transparency and depth  Vanille Noire reveals a smooth temperament in contact with the skin.

name: a-une-madone
detail: A Baudelairean vanilla. A magnetic scent. A muse of contradiction.

name: shalimar-souffle-intense
detail: The perfumer wanted to create an eau de parfum as light as a breath of air  a whisper of pure sensuality. Shalimar Souffle Intense is a delicately scented caress  a sensory journey  a precious and luminous adornment on the skin.

name: vanille-de-tahiti-extrait
detail: This perfume embodies the search for the sublime balance of raw materials in a crescendo of elegant sensuality.

name: vanille-de-tahiti-1
detail: "I dreamed of giving voice to the soft scent of vanilla flower other than the sweetest aroma typical of vanilla most commonly used in perfumery. Thanks to the exclusive raw materials of excellence  like this vanilla tahintesis  I was finally able to realize my olfactory painting  " Gian-Luca Perris  Perfumer.

name: shalimar-souffle-de-parfum-1
detail: The perfumer wanted to create an eau de parfum as light as a breath of air  a whisper of pure sensuality. Shalimar Souffle de Parfum is a delicately scented caress  a sensory journey  a precious and luminous adornment on the skin.

name: you-kissed-me-in-paris-1
detail: The flowers of the Seine bear witness to their relationship. Embraced  they lived each moment as if it were their last. With their eyes closed  they sealed their love with a deep and passionate kiss  which inspired this very special fragrance.

name: mon-guerlain-eau-de-parfum
detail: "Notes of a woman. Her choices  emotions  and dreams embody modern femininity " Thierry Wasser.

name: lune-feline-extrait
detail: The Lune Féline Extrait is an intense special edition that enhances all of the features of the original fragrance. Expect a fragrance that walks closer to the dark side of the moon with this dramatic take on one of our most beloved scents.

name: eleonore
detail: Louis  a charismatic young man  is caught up in the revolutionary mutiny of 1840. Sentenced to life imprisonment  his fate  however  is soon to change and he arrives disguised as the young Éléonore. With her help  Louis escapes in disguise. Many years later  he still cannot forget the sweet scent of her skin. She feels healthy despite the fact that Louis  the love of her life  is now hailed throughout France as Louis Bonaparte: Napoleon III.

name: vanille-cafe-1
detail: Vanille Caféis a harmonious blend of coffee and vanilla.

name: shalimar-souffle-de-parfum-collector-edition-2018
detail: This limited edition of Shalimar Souffle de Parfum pays tribute to the luxuriance of Shalimar's gardens. A radiant and enchanting fragrance.

name: ecko-unltd-72-1
detail: Packed with confidence and a bold attitude  Eckô Unltd. 72 makes a fresh impact statement. The crisp opening ignites your senses and the warm core fuels your passions to live fearlessly and without limits.

name: terre-dhermes-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: An experience through the pleasure of the material  the story of a perfume that navigates the elements  cheerfully  vigorously  gently. A novel that tells a story of alchemy. Feeling the material  lying on the ground  gazing at the sky.

name: inexcusable-evil
detail:
"Today I remembered destruction. The pain of life often makes me forget the more disgusting pain of having it taken.
Fallen buildings on the news  crying babies  burnt flowers " David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi  Founder-Perfumer. Inexcusable Evil calls attention to the destructive nature of war.
ingredients: ['Incense / Olibanum', 'Gunpowder', 'Blood Accord', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Rain Notes', 'Iodine', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Floral Notes', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Sandalwood', 'Burn accord']

name: iron-duke-1
detail: A tribute to Arthur Wellesley  Duke of Wellington. A surprisingly powerful fragrance with animalic depths  an apparition of the celebrated horseman  warrior politician and sartorial pioneer.

name: tonnerre-1805-1
detail: England's evening sparkle and a citrus kiss rumble on your lips. In Victory drink long  drink deep as glory fades tonight.

name: 360-very-blue-for-men-1
detail: 360° Very Blue For Men has a refreshing top note. The irresistible middle notes add style and strength to the fresh top notes. The power of creation advances in the base with a refreshing dynamic signature.

Named after the street number of London's first bijou shop  154 is a chameleon fragrance. Let yourself be taken on an olfactory journey  from citrus to herbaceous lavender and basil  ending with a woody base of sandalwood and vetiver that simply captivates the senses.

name: 250-for-him-2020
detail: Celebrating the past and paving the way to a contemporary new beginning  250 for Him is a tribute to the classic  avant-garde gentleman of today.

name: highland-heather-2023
detail: Morning haze across the Highlands fades to reveal a wilderness blanketed by swathes of heather. An amethyst vision captured in a woody scent.

name: english-lavender
detail: At first glance  vibrant and fresh  but then a surprisingly natural  dry and rich fragrance that exudes a warm and lasting embrace.

name: english-lavender-2
detail: Yardley's signature fragrance  chosen for its aromatic freshness and delicacy of scent. Lavender is a therapeutic plant that is effective in relaxing  calming and balancing mind  body and spirit.

name: english-pear-sweet-pea
detail: Sun-warmed orchards spring to life as tempting green pears fill the branches. The sensuous freshness of luscious fruits enveloped in softly scented pastel sweet peas  nestled on a base of powdery white musk.

name: timeless-2022
detail: A modern interpretation on a classic Victorian cologne  a refreshing perfume alive with sparks of ginger  sparkling lime and classic English lavender.

name: silver-birch-lavender-1
detail: Morning light falls through a spacious garden framed by silver birch trees. A breath of fresh air blows  the iconic scent of English lavender pervades the air. A charismatic smell.

name: 250-for-her-2020-1
detail: Celebrating the strength and empowerment of the contemporary woman. This unique limited-edition symbolises Yardley London’s legacy and expertise in creating exquisite fragrances for discerning generations of women the world over.

name: himalaya
detail: Himalaya celebrates the spirit and exuberance of the highest peaks of natural perfection. A luminously clean scent of uplifting freshness  Himalaya also reveals hidden layers of meaning with a seductive ambiguity that transcends categorisation. The frosty silver packaging brings to mind the image of ice on mountain rocks.

name: terre-dhermes-parfum
detail: By changing the perspectives of its initial formula  Terre d'Hermès Pure Perfume produces a balance in the resonance of its raw materials and offers intensity. Exploring the sensations created by assertive style and form of expression.

name: terre-dhermes-parfum-pure-perfume-2021
detail: By changing the perspectives of its initial formula  Terre d'Hermès Pure Perfume produces a balance in the resonance of its raw materials and offers intensity. Exploring the sensations created by assertive style and form of expression in a limited edition bottle.

name: blazing-lily-1
detail: With the energy of Red Lily  one is able to stand tall and sure  speak with conviction  be grounded and be true to one's self. The energy given by the Red Lily  encourages a dynamic interplay between thoughts and feelings. It stimulates leadership and fighting for a passion.

name: amazingreen-1
detail: A dazzling fusion of organic and mineral  of freshness and depth.  An astounding blast of green energy  the creation of the ultimate green fragrance  Amazingreen

name: la-fin-du-monde-the-end-of-the-world
detail: Okay  we know what you're thinking. Been there  done that  bought the t-shirt. Apocalyptic visions  Armageddon. Doomsday cults  mass suicides. The Mayan calendar. We endured the panic of the Millennium. We've seen the films  from “Dr. Strangelove” to “Melancholia”. We know the New Testament prophecies  we've heard about the End Times and the Rapture. We know how the end of the world will look  but how will it smell?

name: amber-remastered
detail: Amber / Remastered is a soft and elegant fragrance with a sophisticated trail.

name: rand-1
detail: RAND pays homage to the “desert flower”; a delicate flower yet determined and strong enough to grow in and endure/ survive the most challenging environment. Rand stands proudly and fights for its beliefs without compromising on its true nature. A treasure that lets itself be found where least expected.

name: dama-bianca-1
detail: Dama Bianca is a special edition that pays homage to the sophistication and elegance of the modern woman. Dama Bianca La Dama Blanca" is the story of a woman trapped in her dreams  contemplating what lies beyond the sights. Locked behind walls of jealousy and deceit. Her only escape is the aromatic notes of fruits and flowers just beyond her reach.

name: original-penguin-iconic-blend
detail: Iconic Blend is an ultra-masculine  long-lasting and wearable eau de toilette for any occasion  day or night  casual or formal. An aromatic sensual seductive scent  uniquely refined and undeniably intriguing.

name: orange-sanguine
detail: It was the kind of moment you would want to revisit. Everyone was here  gathered on the terrace for breakfast  and the scent of fresh oranges was diffusing in the yellow heat. A symphony of their laughter and waves hitting the cliffs played in the air.

name: darby-rose-2019-1
detail: This exquisitely feminine creation draws you in with a radiant beginning that unfolds into a blooming bouquet of femininity and a seductive touch that underlines the sophisticated woody base.

name: perry-ellis-1
detail: A brand rooted in tradition with an emphasis on comfort  quality and optimism  Perry Ellis describes this men's fragrance as refreshing  refined  and confidently cool. Classified as vibrant  fresh fougère.

name: thinking-of-love-1
detail: Inspire new moments and memories with romantic notes to remember.

name: romantica
detail: I'm a hopeless romantic. I'll buy flowers and love decorating them at my house. Romantica is the floral jewel in my fragrance collection. If fairy tales were made of flowers  undoubtedly they would smell like Romantica. Charming  fresh and fabulous! It is like an enchanting bouquet of blooms  sure to cast a magic spell! And no one is too old for fairy tales!

name: tudor-1
detail: Symbol of the end of the Hundred Years' War  the Tudor rose is the peace that comes after a long journey  a demonstration of how human existence and every life must face unexpected obstacles  lacerating wounds that prevent us from reaching the deepest part of ourselves.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Geranium (China)', 'Ambergris', 'Amberwood', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Earthy Notes', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)']

name: i-am-scotch-and-soda-men
detail: Inspired by relentless optimism and the power of self-expression  this scent captures the free spirit of Amsterdam.

name: onekh-1
detail: OnekhThe word Onyx  an ancient Levantine word meaning Onyx long ago  derives its mystery from Naram  the first Mesopotamian king and god of the moon. A perfume as bewitching and supernatural as onyx  the blackest of precious stones.

name: black-oud
detail: Black Oud is a juice rich of charm and appeal. It enchants at first sniff and is incredibly attractive. It is part of the Museum Collection  which uses classic raw materials and olfactory families from Europe and Asia  reminiscent of the fragrance library of an ancient perfumer.

name: ambitious
detail: For those who constantly aspire to set the world on fire  a perfume full of purpose and intent. Ambitious will match the wearer’s zeal in every way  its rose-scented heart surrounded by the top and base notes full of ardent desire.

name: rumba-fever
detail: An ode to the dangerously addictive Latin energy. Inspired by red  the ultimate color of passion and temptation  Rumba Fever raises the temperature and revisits this dance of charm and attraction to the rhythm of the sensual movements of warming-up bodies. A fragrance with a red heart for daring women who live intensely.

name: tinhare
detail: "Tinharé reminds me of the warm sand and the nonchalant atmosphere of the Brazilian islands " Jean-Claude Ellena  Olfactive Director.

name: steamed-rainbow
detail: "I've wanted to make something that smelled like a rainbow for a long time (especially inspired by Terry Riley's A Rainbow In Curved Air). The concept is to use materials of every colour in the rainbow in a certain proportion that is softened in the humid air of their abode. Now you can wear rainbows. Wait 'til you sniff how delicate they are " David Seth Moltz  co-Founder and Perfumer.

name: forever-mine-into-the-legend-for-men
detail: The incarnation of the Chevignon man is conveyed through icons of the past and present attesting to a timeless style of casual elegance that transcends trends and eras.

name: flowerbykenzo-red-edition
detail: It only takes a flower to make life more beautiful  and a poppy to make the world more beautiful. An overdose of red. A concentrate of red  an explosion of life and creativity. A radical and powerful red  the sign of a vibrant summer.

name: mumbai
detail: Fresh and invigorating scents permeate the air in this vibrant  energetic city  Mumbai. We captured the memories and vibrant smells of the city in a bottle.

name: mauboussin-pour-femme-1
detail: A fragrance for sensual  seductive women who love luxury. Mauboussin Pour Femme adorns women with precious gems and fragrances that enhance their inner magic. When a fragrance becomes a jewel.

name: paris-amour-eau-florale
detail: A timeless saga of romance.

name: lovely-garden-1
detail: This fragrance is like a sumptuous garden  the memory of an early evening when night begins to fall  with a sillage full of sensuality.

name: solar-power
detail: Bathed in brilliance  Solar Power is a golden floral musk composition that exudes the sensuality of salty  sun-kissed skin.

name: city-of-stars
detail: City of Stars is an evening cologne  a nocturnal fantasy in the heart of a city that never sleeps. In a rhapsodic Los Angeles  City of Stars recounts a night of promises  ardent emotion  soft sensuality and darkness opalising in the morning’s first light.

name: polo-red-rush-1
detail: Polo Red Rush delivers an instant rush of freshness and energy. It demands that you seize the moment and feel the rush of passion  energy and freedom.

name: bark-1
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the Arabic word “Bark” and by its meaning: that strong and rough shield that protects the most fragile essence of the plants. The inspiration behind BARK was the memory of an influential man of great culture and substance  admired by his charisma  for his direct and assertive manners  and for his perfume: a unique leathery scent that BARK wanted to reinterpret.

name: sabotage
detail: Sabotage your senses with this blissful cocktail from Art de Parfum. It provides a fresh soundtrack to the senses and will have you feeling upbeat and optimistic  and at the same time serene and radiant.

name: tub3r0se-x-f1g-1
detail: Tuberose petals growing inside figs. The cunning figs developed a meticulous strategy to seduce tuberose flowers to grow inside them  The purpose was to serve people with the most delicious and ever-imagined fig-tuberose smell.

name: amber-garden-1
detail: Amber is believed to ward off negativity  in turn cleansing the mind to focus on positive matters. At the height of the warmest seasons  Benzoin tears from trees are preciously collected. Once distilled  the honey droplets transform into amber needles  weaving and warming the structure of the fragrance. This is when the sharp powers of the amber clear the mind and let positive thoughts take over.

name: safran-troublant-1
detail: Safran Troublant is a spicy oriental fragrance  with a blend of saffron  rose and vanilla.

name: mankind-unlimited
detail: "Mankind Unlimited was inspired by my affinity for discovering amazing ingredients while travelling. I long to explore again. This fragrance was created with ingredients from around the world to transport the wearer to beautiful places and exotic destinations " Guillaume Flavigny  perfumer.

name: delectation-splendide
detail: Délectation Splendide is inspired by sumptuous palace delicacies and oriental spices. The luxurious scent combines gourmand notes with spicy undertones to create a delicious fragrance.

name: avon-classic-1
detail: Crafted for an urban  assertive and charismatic man  Avon Classic aims to create a mysterious and intriguing trail. This fragrance captures the essence of a confident and sensual masculinity.

name: individual-blue-unlimited-for-him-1
detail: Inspired by the confident modern man that is not afraid to express his individuality  this fragrance is a masculine attitude and energy that shows why he is unforgettable.

name: coffee-woman-sense
detail: If you are a woman full of personality  you know what you want and you are looking to enhance your power of seduction even more  you will be surprised by Coffee Woman Sense.

name: tom-ford-noir-extreme-parfum
detail: "Nour Extreme Parfum expresses the dramatic duality of a refined man"  Tom Ford.

name: aqua-wood
detail: An ode to the rush of adventure  a fierce adrenaline rush of citrus and pear. In every note  the fresh wilderness of the ocean and the radiance of the sun. Easy to love  impossible to forget.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-ginger-lover-1
detail: Ginger Lover changes the deal.  Temptation and fascination work in tandem to create the highly intoxicating weapon of seduction.

name: eau-noble-2022-1
detail: In 1972  with the liberation of traditional values  attitudes changed and women borrowed Eau Noble from men  making it a fragrance to be freely shared between genders. Fifty years later  perfumer Rodrigo Flores-Roux  who maintains a close relationship with Le Galion  has designed a purer olfactory composition featuring a dominant woody and abstract accord  with energising green notes and a subtle gourmand touch. In 2022  Eau Noble is back  as contemporary and mixed as ever.

name: infinite-celtic-gold-pour-homme-1
detail: The ultimate fragrance for men for whom luxury knows no bounds. Launched as a tribute to the refinement of Celtic art  this fragrance is inspired by the famous steel wire  the iconic signature of the House of Charriol.

name: pepe-jeans-cocktail-for-him-1
detail: Nature reflected in the form of a cocktail shaker. It looks like summer  it smells like summer.

name: oranger-moi
detail: A perfumed bouquet  a magical and unusual creation. The scent of the Orient and a sophisticated citrus burst. A modern fragrance in the secret garden of desire.

name: pure-nautica-discovery-1
detail: Energetic and fresh  Pure Nautica Discovery is an adventurer's scent. For the man who refuses to be bound by life's daily grind. He takes to the seas  finding inspiration in the rough waters and cool breeze  connecting with friends while reconnecting with himself. Life is a journey and he wants to chart his own course.

name: violet-noir-1
detail: "A perfume has to perform  but it also has to have a soul. John Gamba  Perfumer

name: lbk-water-2
detail: L.B.K. Water (short for liang bai kai  meaning "cooled boiled water")  brought back childhood memories for the generation that grew up in the 1980s and 1990s  when many families still boiled tap water for drinking and daily use.

name: marc-jacobs-men-1
detail: Marc Jacobs has let his love for classics and mastery of unassuming detail dictate the message of his first fragrance for men  Marc Jacobs Men. The scent challenges the traditional boundaries of men's fragrances: it is familiar in essence but entirely unexpected in execution…

name: white-rabbit
detail: En memoria del caramelo de leche White Rabbit.

name: simone-1
detail: Waves crest along the white sand of Sydney's Bondi Beach  as the sea fills with surfers and swimmers alike. With sun-kissed hair and bronzed skin  the fearless young beauty dives into the fray.

name: victoria-2013
detail: Fresh. Sexy. Totally irresistible. Victoria  everything you love about Victoria's Secret. A sparkling blend of berries  classic florals and gourmand notes. Spray on for a scent that lasts.
ingredients: ['Rose', 'Red Berries', 'Crème Brulée', 'Jasmine', 'Lotus', 'Peony', 'Primrose', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Rose (English Heritage)', 'Apple', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Passion Fruit', 'Pear', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Amber', 'Mango', 'Marshmallow', 'Musk', 'Oak', 'Peach', 'Tonka Bean', 'Benzoin (Laos)', 'Nirvanolide (Musk)', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)']

name: cerruti-1881-blanc-pour-femme-2006
detail: A musky floral  1881 Blanc evokes 'a lazy morning between fine white linen sheets'  the caress of a summer breeze  the 'soothing fragrance of a field of cotton blossoms'. Under the sign of whiteness  this collectible version of Cerruti's classic women's scent is available in a limited edition for summer.

name: rebecca-minkoff
detail: Rebecca Minkoff is for the woman who wants to look like herself  not the masses. Fashion is important to her but she is too busy enjoying life to be governed by the latest trends. It's the perfect scent for the woman of “now” who cares about the world around her  and is making a difference where she can.

name: the-girl
detail: "The Girl" means being true to yourself and having fun while you're at it. For me  that's appreciating every moment  laughing at myself  and surrounding myself with everything that makes me feel happy " Gigi Hadid  model.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Pear', 'Jasmine', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Amber', 'Fig Leaf', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Shiso Leaves', 'Violet Leaves', 'Karmaflor (Floral notes)']

name: own-your-zone-uplift-uplft
detail: Built through science for a sports state of mind for life  Uplift / Uplft is a viatlising scent that takes inspiration from a female runner who never gives up. Uplift your life everyday with the inspiration of your run.

name: marseille-1
detail: A sunny  poetic fragrance to celebrate the beautiful city of Marseille  in the South of France.

name: be-jeweled-1
detail: Bright and flirty  Vera Wang Be Jeweled captures the energy and excitement of the perfect girls' night out. Each girl is a "jewel" in her own right  exuding confidence and charm. Their presence captivates as soon as they enter the room.

name: serial-player-1
detail: Serial Player is for the vivaciously playful  who put their biggest bet on joy. A luminous  fun-loving and vibrant eau de toilette to pair with colourful accessories for a happy-go-lucky adventure.

name: eyes-on-me-1
detail: Eyes on Me is for those who bring the light: pleasure-seeking  adventure-taking  glittering into the night. An elegant and dazzling eau de toilette to wear with pearls  studs or sequins  for a daily dose of shimmering fantasy.

name: tiffany-co-wild-iris-2021
detail: "Tiffany & Co Wild Iris can be compared to a piece of fine jewellery. Each ingredient was carefully selected and integrated into the structure with the idea of creating an elegant and precious fragrance " Daniela Roche-Andrier  perfumer.

name: angelique-noire-2021
detail: "In this fragrance in chiaroscuro lighting  the bitter flower is confronted with a delicious vanilla elixir in order to emerge more tantalising than ever before. An exquisite mystery  a sweet sorcery " Thierry Wasser  Perfumer.

name: jardin-de-lorangerie-1
detail: “A beautiful duality of nature-inspired orange blossom with the contrast of sweet opulent  milky  mature orange blossom. This flower can express so many different faces ” Daniela Andrier  Perfumer.

name: belle-darles
detail: “The inspiration for this perfume is Arlésienne  this beautiful woman who embodies the apogee of feminine elegance. The infinite care that the Arlesienne takes in getting ready  pinning and layering the fabrics  preparing for hours. This fragrance is a tribute to the embodiment of this sublime feminine " Daniela Andrier  Perfumer.

name: amarena-2018
detail: Amarena  meaning Morello cherry in Italian  is a lush  fruity floral as exuberant and intoxicating as the precious stone that inspired it. A mosaic of rose notes  a carnal and appetising perfume that gives it its charismatic and exuberant sensuality  it will seduce the most sophisticated  extroverted and passionate woman.

name: selima-2018-1
detail: Selima invites you on a journey through the rich world of the Arabian Peninsula. It is inspired by carnelian  a sacred gemstone symbolising serenity and abundance  life and wealth  replacing the negative with the love of life. Selima  an evocative Arabic name meaning "serene and tranquil"  is a spicy  relaxing and incandescent oriental Eau de Parfum of exquisite red energy.

name: lhomme-water-splash
detail: L’Homme Prada Watersplash  at once refreshing and indulgent  explores the fluid space between polar definitions  rejecting cliché conventions to forge new realities.

name: la-femme-water-splash
detail: At once refreshing and indulgent  La Femme Prada Water Splash offers an olfactive escape  transporting its wearer to a tropical paradise.

name: bel-oranger
detail: This new variation on orange blossom was inspired by Sicilian sun-soaked citrus fruit.

name: la-femme-velvet-edition
detail: Housed in a decadent velvet bottle to echo Prada's Autumn/Winter 2017 collection  the Prada La Femme Velvet Edition boasts an aesthetic redolent of '70s-style. A sophisticated  warm scent

name: miu-miu-fleur-de-lait
detail: Inspired by the iconic Mango Pomelo Sago dessert  Miu Miu Fleur de Lait is a floral-fruity fragrance in which mouth-watering fruits blend with delicate flowers and velvety notes of coconut milk to create a bold  captivating  and refined fragrance.

name: twist-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Routine kills the wonder of life - so we always want to live harder  bigger  stronger. MIUximize your life! Let Twist Eau de Toilette be the key to allow you to feel the intense thrill anytime!

name: noorah-2018
detail: An olfactory journey  a fragrance that tells the story of its origins  mysterious and sensual.

name: tiffany-sheer-1
detail: Tiffany Sheer  has a multi-faceted structure that is playful  yet elegant. The aromatic equivalent of a diamond in its purest form  Tiffany Sheer is subtle luxury for the skin.

name: infusion-dylang
detail: Infusion d'Ylang is fresh  stimulating and sensual  a sparkling citrus in a perfume bottle.

name: she-was-an-anomaly-1
detail: "This perfume is the result of something unexpected " Daniela Roche-Andrier  Perfumer.

name: calaluna-2018
detail: The pure and magnetic raw materials that make up this gourmand floral resonate with feminine mystery. A milky  tender and "round"  yet addictive perfume that will seduce soft  intuitive  graceful  welcoming  magnetic and mysterious women. A sensual perfume  infinitely tender  full of candour.

name: les-fleurs-du-dechet-i-am-trash-1
detail: "To design a perfume that gives meaning to waste and other residues of the perfume industry and to tell everyone  faster  stronger  that miasma can reflect beauty and that our waste still has a lot of sense to recycle " Etienne de Swardt  Founder.

name: zahira-2018
detail: Zahira takes you on a journey through the hot golden deserts of Arabia. It evokes the intense radiance of the imperial topaz  a shimmering gem that radiates energy  bestows confidence and charisma  inspires admiration and respect.

name: infusion-de-figue
detail: Infusion de Figue encapsulates the vibrant personality of the fig in a woody green fragrance.

name: infusion-de-vanille-1
detail: Mysterious and luminous  Infusion de Vanille blends a smoky  gourmand infusion with contrasting  luminous top notes and a rich base.

name: twist-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Routine kills the wonder of life  so we always want to live harder  bigger  stronger to feel the intense thrill anytime. Miuximise your life!

name: fleur-dargent-chinese-new-year-2020-1
detail: Limited edition for Chinese New Year collectors  Miu Miu Fleur d'Argent is a luxurious  sophisticated and addictive fragrance.

name: lost-in-grace
detail: Lost in Grace is for those who embrace their sensuality with touch  precious rituals and self-love. An intimate  enveloping eau de toilette to pair with a silky  sophisticated ensemble for a special moment of self-love reconnection with yourself.

name: lazulia-2018
detail: Lazulia  which means "deep blue" in Arabic  is a mysterious and divine secret. Embark on a nocturnal journey through the wondrous and sensual tales of the Arabian Nights. A jewel of royalty and spirituality  representing the celestial since time immemorial.

name: like-an-egyptian
detail: This perfume is an invitation to travel through time and space. An olfactory journey that takes us back in an instant to the cradle of perfumery  to the time of the pharaohs.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Black Pepper', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Amber Xtreme (Woody Ambery)', 'Cardamom', 'Cinnamon', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Ambrocenide (Woody ambery)', 'Cumin', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Red Berries', 'Saffron', 'Sandalwood (India)', 'Vetiver (India)']

name: lhomme-ideal-eau-de-toilette
detail: The ideal man  in French L'Homme Idéal  is probably one of the most sought-after things for many people. Does he really exist? Guerlain's message is basically to stop trying to become the ideal man. Put on the fragrance and you will see. Of course  behind all this is a clever sense of humour. Life can be boring enough as it is  so don't waste your time being too serious  enjoy some fun moments.

name: guerlain-homme-leau-boisee-1
detail: This olfactory version of Guerlain Homme arose from an encounter. That of the Guerlain Perfumer and the inhabitants of the high plateaus that overlook the city of Coimbatore in India. This is where Thierry Wasser discovered a new vetiver essence with incredible power and elegance.

name: george-1
detail: He is born of tradition yet forever a punk - even in a three-piece suit. I'm enamoured by his cutting sense of humour and humbled by his eccentric sensuality. To him  rules mean nothing and risks are seductive. His creativity  like his mind  is wild and always meandering.

name: starlit-mandarin-honey-2021
detail: Vibrant citruses sweetened with honey and wrapped in the powdery warmth of precious base accords.

name: neroli-marocco
detail: Neroli Marocco is a majestic fragrance. To this marvellous  enveloping flower  extremely rich and powerful in anyone's imagination  aromatic facets are added for an invigorating and refreshing touch.

name: lawrence
