detail: He is regal  impossible  impenetrable  and extremely intelligent. Bewitched by a dark desire  he fulfills my penchant for discovery and my love of the unexpected. He favours grand statements  always with an air of style and adventure.

name: imperial-bloom
detail: A scent inspired by a thousand piles of snow.

name: vigorous-cologne-1
detail: With its yellow notes of citrus  Vigorous Cologne is The Collection’s response to the classic  immaculate white shirt: the alpha and omega of every elegant man’s wardrobe  and symbol of spotless success. The iconic citrus structure is amplified by a woody patchouli fiber that brings body and character. A jolt of clean  invigorating freshness.

name: maria-callas
detail: A perfume that is like Maria Callas  with its range of emotions  its unmistakable elegance  the gift of its unique voice  but also its contrasts  its pathos  and its complex personality to be revealed that have created the myth: an unforgettable and mysterious fragrance  ready to conquer you.

name: tulip-moonshine
detail: The scent of autumn.

name: mortel-noir
detail: Combining a virile force with natural harmonies  Mortel Noir suggests skins heating up against one another: the strength of black pepper from Madagascar blended with incense from Somalia  myrrh and benzoin reveal the erotic spell of pure cistus.

name: naive
detail: Innocence and desire mix in this concoction of bright citruses livened with fresh white florals and fantastical herbs.

name: lupin-patchouli-2019
detail: Reminiscent of canal banks  awash with colour. A rainbow of lupine flower  enriched with luxurious rose and deepened with rebellious patchouli. A striking contrast with a fresh vitality.

name: mallow-on-the-moor-2023
detail: Purple mallow flowers spill across an untamed landscape  beckoning bees with their vivid colour. These pretty petals flutter alongside powdery heliotrope in this soft floral scent enriched by the naturality of violet leaves.

name: woodiris
detail: Woodiris is a tribute to the rare and highly sought-after blue orris notes with a wild imprint of woods.

name: nowness
detail: I've always liked old  worn-out clothes  but it takes a long time to achieve this effect. A long time ago I decided to create this kind of style and became a vintage designer. I don't want to look back. If you look back  you can't progress.
ingredients: ['Georgywood (Cedarwood note)', 'Black Pepper', 'Iris / Orris', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Vetiver', 'Cardamom', 'Pink Pepper', 'Mock Orange', 'Musk', 'White Flowers', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: medie-1
detail: A freshness that runs on the skin  leaving a desirable trace of amber and leather on the surface.

name: fig-man-1
detail: ”Inspired by the wondrous illustration Homme Figuier by Dali  Fig Man takes seemingly classic earthy notes subverting them to create a fanciful aroma that will titillate senses.”

name: vetiver-haiti
detail: Vetiver Haiti is an ode to the simple and irresistible beauty of the most precious vetiver species. The result is a fragrance at once natural and refined  evoking the essence of a blooming forest.

name: willow-amber-2019
detail: The expressive weeping willow  gently draping across the fresh morning water. Captured in the woody paring of smoky notes and enhanced by a softly sensual base.

name: ash-flower
detail: Ash Flower is an aromatic interpretation of the rosebay willowherb.

name: elae-1
detail: Extremely feminine  bathed in light and freshness. The young  white flowers are blended with sensual balms.

name: sculptor-2022-1
detail: You step into the sculptor’s studio. Materials  each with their own gift: the hardness of granite  the ductility of tempered metals  the forcefulness of the mallet  the precision of the chisel. All of them ready to face each other  a clash of titans  without respite  until they reach the point of creative ecstasy  the materialisation of the idea.

name: mean
detail: This scent evokes a large handful of freshly cut roses  wrapped in the freshness of a night of rain and dew.

name: stubborn
detail: Incense is like a dose of bitter medicine slowly boiled in the dark night. Smoky  accompanied by the sweetness and richness of benzoin  this bitter medicine becomes more stubborn as time goes on  and it will never compromise.

name: yann-vasnier
detail: An adventurous scent that inspires you to dare something new.

name: james
detail: James pays homage to James Atkinson's commitment to uncompromising quality. Composed of a variety of valuable ingredients  Atkinsons has succeeded in creating a masterful fragrance with James  consisting of woody amber notes and spicy facets.

name: sicilian-leather
detail: An island. Whose name recalls the song of a cicada. The sun stands proud  the earth welcomes it  the fruits are gorged with it. The spirit of the Etna volcano  its sovereign presence. An island of character. For her  a perfume that is as telluric as it is aerial.

name: calypso-clementine-mist
detail: A scent that smells like smells like a light  bright and playful citrus celebration.

name: 50s-glam-1
detail: Be an icon of vintage style. 50's Glam is a modern twist on timeless elegance. A romantic bouquet of blushed florals  voluptuous fruits and fresh  green sophistication.

name: clementine-california
detail: Summer 1955. When he saw her  he immediately had a lump in his throat. He had been looking for her for months all over Los Angeles. Enough of these artificial actresses. This perfect stranger was the perfect incarnation of the natural and fresh beauty that he found it disturbing. In the formal path of the studios  she was thinking about all the things she had left to finally make her dream come true.

name: zeste-dagrumes
detail: The tangy notes of this perfume pay homage to citrus fruits.

name: classic-eau-de-parfum
detail: A blend of floral and fruity notes  youthful and vibrant.

name: 1902-orange-fizz-1
detail: The 1902 Tradition Eau de Cologne Orange Fizz is a fragrance that sublimely encapsulates the multiple dimensions of citrus fruits. Its modern facet positions it in the collection’s contemporary line.

name: new-york-flowers
detail: Celebrate NYC’s annual spring spectacle of blooms  when flowers take center stage. New York Flowers honors not just the democracy of city’s “public” botanicals  but also celebrates the spirit of joy  renewal and the natural wonders that each spring brings to our town. A celebratory scent that opens with sparkling notes  almost like popping the cork off of a bottle of champagne.

name: clementine-1
detail: Don’t tease me honey! Playful bursts of clementine freshness flirt with the uplifting bitterness of petitgrain. A fascinating citrus floral keeps you wanting more.

name: little-italy-1
detail: Capturing the essence of its namesake neighborhood  this unisex fragrance is inspired by the cobblestone streets of Little Italy  where the homemade orange gelato brings festivity to nostalgia. Mellow but intriguing  adorned by a high-gloss orange bottle with a subway token insignia.

name: tel-aviv
detail: Sun. White  yellow  bright. Gold jewellery on tanned skin. A lingering seventies glamour. It's sexy  it's a party. It's life in the bubble. It's strolling along the beach  bare skin  feeling relaxed  languid  but it's the big city  there's noise  people and a sense of intensity and madness. It's stopping at Dizengoff's juice stand. It's Bauhaus. It's the heat  the sweat  the cigarette smoke  the flowers on the balconies.

name: w-by-banana-republic
detail: A sheer  cool fragrance with hints of simple white flowers and delicate greens. Make this clean scent your signature.

name: jolie-princess
detail: Jolie Princess represents the contemporary woman clothed by Luciano Soprani. Both elusive and self-confident  romantic and daring  she lives each moment of her life. Jolie Princess is her signature of elegance and femininity to be worn all over the world.

name: dance-shakira
detail: Dance is a language without words. It's a way of communicating  of bringing together cultures. Of meeting other people and discovering oneself. Shakira's Dance is charged with rhythm and sensuality that appeals to all the senses. Are you ready to come and dance?

name: candy-florale
detail: Prada Candy L'Eau was created with a young  joyful  elegant and indulgent fictional female character in mind. Candy's personality reflects the range of notes that come together in this fragrance. The spirit of the fragrance lies in Candy's optimistic view of the world  which affirms that there is no time like the present to be alive.

name: sol-y-sombra
detail: In every existence on earth  the sun and shadow (sol y sombra) represent divine harmony. What a pleasure it is to leave the scorching rays of the sun for a moment and take refuge in the thirst-quenching shade. Sometimes on an endless coast where the Caribbean Sea flirts with the sand  sometimes in Havana  a mythical city  flayed to the bone with its languid shadows  daughters of the dying sun.

name: cotton-candy
detail: Cotton Candy captures that fresh  warm scent of cotton candy just made at the fair on a warm summer day. If there is a more pleasant childhood memory to be had  we have yet to find it.

name: vio-volta
detail: Vio Volta comes from working with materials just for the fun of it.

name: kissing-1
detail: When else can you experience something so sweet and burn calories all at the same time? "Kissing Burns 6.4 Calories A Minute Wanna Work Out" is a luscious remix of floral and gourmand notes  it speaks to the most perfect sport for couples with incredible chemistry. Just like a great kiss  as the perfume evolves the emotions get more intense.

name: sugar-cookie-1
detail: Demeter Sugar Cookie smells like our mother's cookies  made from a recipe clipped from the Ladies Home Journal in 1963. Yum... sweet and simple!

name: tonkandy
detail: With Tonkandy  welcome to a world of unctuous delights  childhood memories and gourmandise. A cloud on the skin.

name: police-to-be-woman
detail: Beware of this highly seductive perfume. With the strong power of a magnet  this fiery perfume is overflowing with charm and ensures immediate attraction and passion.

name: generation-godard
detail: A cinematic scent that recalls the memory of the movie theatre  popcorn  soda and cigarettes.

name: jadore-touche-de-parfum
detail: J'Adore Touche de Parfum by Dior is a new olfactory and sensory experience created by François Demachy. It is more than a fragrance: it is an unexpected invitation  a new creative and sensual approach that leaves each woman the freedom to adapt her J'Adore fragrance to the moment and her desires.

name: classique-eau-fraiche-1
detail: In short  it still smells fresh and great ! Like a torrid sugar cane syrup  combined with ginger  white flowers and vanilla.

name: kids-girl-1
detail: Tous Kids Girl and Tous Kids Boy - We like to have fun and play. Birthday parties  being friends  jumping about. The thing is  some of us like fairies but others like insects. It's true. That's why we need things that are a bit different. We are the same in different ways.

name: intense-red
detail: The aromatic aspect of Intense Red contrasts with animalic warmth to create an unprecedented modernity. The addiction is almost sexual  and quickly becomes an obsession like the intense red of the glass that contains it.

name: vanille-abricot
detail: A delicious association of gourmand and juicy fruits with tropical flowers resting on a comfortable background of sandalwood and musk.

name: jardin-exclusif-1
detail: This is an addictive and captivating fragrance  with a bewitching alliance and a greedy  sweet accord.

name: matin-calin-1
detail: The sweet note of milk and the sweetness of fudge and vanilla bean make this scent warm and sensual.

name: eternity-for-men-parfum-1
detail: Luxurious and masculine  Eternity Parfum for Him is a burst of freshness with a bold  boozy twist. A striking scent that evokes a brilliant setting sun.

name: eve-become-1
detail: In Eve Become  sparkling notes mingle with vibrant woods to illuminate your glorious transformation.

name: in-love-with-you-freeze-1
detail: In Love With You Freeze is a vibrant fragrance that conveys the spark of love as joyful  strong  everyday as the first day.

name: acqua-di-gio-profondo-lights-2021-1
detail: Acqua di Giò Profondo Lights is an invitation to find adventure on a deeper level and to discover the mysteries that lie beneath.

name: acqua-di-gio-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: An eternally iconic fragrance  reinvented for the future. A unique  contemporary tribute to the relationship between man and sea.

name: apres-1
detail: The freedom of the mountains  the rush of alpine air  the invigorating freshness of evergreens and the richness of gourmand accords. Après is a celebration of the winter outdoors.

name: florist
detail: Sheer  modern  and beautiful  Florist is a celebration of the citrus floral. Featuring the enchanting  powerful tuberose  this unique scent creates a stunning arrangement that lingers like a flower-tinted spring breeze.

name: father-figure
detail: Commanding yet tender at the same time. Rooted in lushness  Father Figure is a vivid green fragrance that captures the intimate feeling of cool.

name: tease-candy-noir-1
detail: Light up the night with Tease Candy Noir  the wild and free sister to the iconic Tease fragrance.

name: victorias-secret-tease-cocoa-soiree-2023
detail: Indulge your desires with this irresistibly tempting gourmand scent.

name: st-barts-seascape-women
detail: Inspired by the feeling when you first arrive at that tropical dream destination  St Barts Seascape transports you to that moment when you first breathe in the ocean air and feel the warm sand beneath your feet.

name: ready-for-rose
detail: Summer vibes in a bottle. This is a French summer knocking on the door  with all its promises. A dive in the big blue  a rest under the sun  maybe a new romance by sunset and always a delicious glass of wine by the beach. So good it cannot be wrong!

name: maritime-voyage-1
detail: Maritime Voyage was made for the spirited voyager  a man on a mission.

name: marble-fruit
detail: Marble Fruit turns soft sensibility into strength with a mature yet structured olfactory composition of subtle fruity tannins  spices and woody notes. A true melody of traditionally masculine and feminine chords intertwined effortlessly.

name: one
detail: One is a feeling  an energy  a way of being that reflects harmony and brings peace. One is internal and eternal. It is not limited  but it is expansive  vulnerable  and powerful. Today our world needs one-ness  realising we are one world and one people. Living for one shared hope  one bigger meaning and purpose. One goal. One dream. Connected  not separate  we are One.

name: st-barts-seascape-men
detail: Capture the feeling of freedom and serenity that island shores create with St. Barts Seascape. It's the perfect blend of diverse scent notes that bring to life that feeling of island living: salty and breezy  with a hint of golden hour.

name: sun-fruit
detail: Tan lines  bare skin and sun-warmed florals  Sun Fruit is unapologetically heady  brazen and rich. Addictive and aspirational  it's the kind of scent that inspires vacation day dreams.

name: divine-moon
detail: Divine Moon captures the essence of peace. Heady and enchanting  unique yet familiar  it is an intoxicating blend inspired by Tory’s garden and apiary in Antigua. Divine Moon is one of five scents in the Essence of Dreams collection  celebrating the power of dreams.

name: 16a-orchard-1
detail: Not just a smell  but a feeling. Something that is nurtured and then grows. But rather than recognising a single note or fragrance category  16a Orchard presents a bit of a mystery. You don’t know what to make of it right away  and that’s what makes it interesting. It teaches you to think and live  outside the box.

name: phloria
detail: "For me  it's almost like sunshine in a bottle " Frank Voelkl  Perfumer.

name: ck-everyone-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: I am One  I am Many. The infinite freedom of self-expression. Break the rules. Push the boundaries. Always out loud. I love Everyone of Me.

name: bare-rose
detail: An exquisite scent with a captivating  velvety trail that is both effortless and vibrant.

name: segno-true
detail: An impactful and inspiring fragrance that relies on the man that inspires other to be fully themselves.

name: chrome-eau-de-parfum
detail: Chrome Eau de Parfum is a celebration of the heritage between father and son with an invigorating and intense freshness. With its woody notes  the fragrance plunges into the heart of a Mediterranean pine forest. The ultimate celebration of joie de vivre  it invites you to share intense and unique moments.

name: santal-vanille
detail: Santal Vanille is reminiscent of a cashmere sweater  wrapped in creamy  exotic notes and infused with the long-lasting notes of rich sandalwood. Made with sustainably sourced sandalwood from Sri Lanka.

name: narcotic-elixir
detail: A hypnotic perfume  Narcotic Elixir leaves a highly sensuous intoxicating wake.

name: doux-amour
detail: Allow the spotlight to fall on you because the scent of Doux Amour will draw everyone's attention to you.

name: knight-of-love
detail: This fragrance is inspired by rival knights  in love with the same woman. One knight is tempted to betray his best friend  the other is determined to uphold his honour. Knight of Love celebrates their decision to take the right path and act with noble intentions. A fragrance where only honour will triumph.

name: lamour-absolu
detail: Let yourself be carried away by L’Amour Absolu's addictive accents.

name: couleur-vanille
detail: It looks like an odyssey  a spiritual quest. A long-distance voyage  with no inclement weather  no bad winds  no rattling sails  no scorching sun. Like a sailor who obtains the Holy Grail by sailing around Cape Horn  the perfumer is fulfilling a somewhat crazy dream by composing the scent for a journey he has never undertaken. Or maybe not... who knows?

name: wonderwood-3
detail: Bewildering in its conception  spectacular in its evolution: mysterious yet perturbing in its application  luxurious but uplifting in its effect. A world overflowing with wondrous woods  the creation of the ultimate wood fragrance  Wonderwood.

name: lucky-charm-1
detail: Bedazzled  this delightful fragrance will spread joy all around you.

name: purple-fig
detail: What would you do if it were your last night on earth? For Johann Friedrich Struensee  doomed doctor of the Danish court  it meant a picnic with his love and their friends on the last night before his death. As always  champagne and figs  his favourite fruit  were on the menu  as dusk turned the sky purple. Joy and tears  sorrow and laughter  a bitter-sweet cocktail that lives on in this Purple Fig.

name: alien-eau-de-toilette
detail: This dazzling reflection of Alien by MUGLER is captured in a pure crystal stone bottle. Immortalized in clear liquid serenity  the luminosity of the Alien Eau de Toilette permeates the soul.

name: ch-men
detail: "Life if a journey  Ch Men is its essence " Carolina Herrera.

name: deep-1
detail: He's a natural. The scent of water on his skin is the scent that he loves. Ocean breeze accord and citrus awaken the soul.

name: le-loden
detail: Jacques Fath like to wear eccentric accessories or clothes the he bought from his travels. Contrasting with the rest of his classic wardrobe. Among others  a classic Loden coat he wore as a trench  which he brought back from Austria.

name: little-song-1
detail: Man's loneliness passes through the sound that accompanies him in his thoughts  in the interpretation he makes of his life  through a small song  infinitely repeated  that sounds in the silence  a perfume. In his hands he holds a bouquet of roses. Who are these roses for?

name: the-beat-for-men-1
detail: The Beat for Men is for people who are very modern  very urban and well connected to London Rock n' Roll. The fragrance is fresh and woody with a citrusy start that should appeal to a younger audience. This fragrance comes from the heart  just as women want it to be.

name: liris-de-fath-leau-de-parfum
detail: Wild and Sensitive  the Eau de Parfum version of L'Iris de Fath challenges the aura of the extract with its sensational solfeggio of the most noble notes and its harmony with a perfect fall.

name: polo-green
detail: A man's fragrance in the polo tradition. Ralph Lauren's legendary Polo Green fragrance blends the very best of wood  leather and other natural scents to convey a handsome  enduring character.

name: vetiver-10
detail: From the fields of Indonesia and the islands of La Réunion  the deep  intense fragrance of Vetiver Bourbon with its bitter  green  sensually smoky features.

name: kromo-fire
detail: A fragrance inspired by a strong and confident man  willing to release the power of his inner strength.

name: route-du-vetiver
detail: Raw and wild  this fragrance traces a steep path lined with vetiver that transports us from Reunion Island to the Orient. An escape between exoticism and mysticism.

name: new-york-2049-man
detail: A fresh olfactory adventure with a dynamic top of citrus and aldehyde touches opens a heart of brave floral accords. In the bottom  a sophisticated and modern encounter of woody notes seals the creation with strength and virtue.

name: the-journey-collection-boston-1936-man-1
detail: The Journey is a collection dedicated to travellers  to those who feed on emotions and hunger for discovery. It is a journey along the roads of the American continent through the places of myth and the most intimate wilderness  made of visual and olfactory suggestions  made of the American dream. A journey that begins in Boston where  in 1936  a small factory called Blauer was born.

name: beyond-majestic-cashmere
detail: A glittering embroidery of powdery notes offsets Majestic Cashmere's main note  created a multi-faceted scent.
ingredients: ['Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Orcanox (Ambergris)', 'Vetiver (Bourbon)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coriander', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Musk', 'Patchouli']

name: karite-corse
detail: Imagine a roasted shea almond  under the arid African sun.

name: orange-bitters-cologne
detail: A recipe for a warm winter cocktail. Take two splashes of bright citrus  add sweet orange and a burst of ripe mandarin. Finish with a splash of bitter orange to reveal a rich  sensual base.

name: orange-bitters-cologne-2023
detail: A recipe for a warming winter cocktail. Take two dashes of bright citrus  add sweet orange and a burst of ripe mandarin. Finish off with a splash of bitter orange to reveal a rich and sensual base.

name: elle-laime-eau-de-toilette
detail: The scent of Elle L'Aime is luxurious  warm and sensual. It is feminine  delicate and the oriental-floral scent smells very seductive.

name: fairy-juice-pink-1
detail: Longing for sweetness? Your fragrance is Fairy Juice Pink! You can see life through rose-coloured candies! Your colour is pink  the colour of romanticism and subtle seduction. A dream of sweetness sugared with purely olfactive calories  tenderly childlike.

name: oolong-tea-1
detail: Delectable Oolong Tea. Rounded with a buttery softness. Grown in rolling mountains  handpicked and dried on bamboo and heated for a precious woody elegance. Withered  curled and twisted. Perfectly formed. A cocooning  creamy rare tea infusion.

name: bonbon-1
detail: It is a delight to indulge  to live and breathe  celebrating beauty. In the realm of pleasure  a moment to herself  just for herself. It's so delicious  so good to let go. Hmmm  it's so good!

name: midnight-black-tea
detail: Carnal Midnight Black Tea. Deeply seductive. Intrinsically exotic. Infused and matured for a sensual intensity. Sun-drenched tea leaves  ever more intoxicating with time. A rich  alluring rare tea infusion.

name: silver-needle-tea-1
detail: Softest Silver Needle Tea. For centuries  a delicacy reserved for the imperial family of China. Inspired by its delicately floral  supple and velvety nuances. Enriched with opulent florals. Tender and enveloping. A glistening  romantic rare tea infusion.

name: bonbon-gourmande
detail: Gourmet and irresistible  Bonbon is a timeless sensation that invites you to a moment of pure pleasure. A delicious fragrance  so good we could eat it!

name: gentil-suono
detail: Amusing melodies  touching vocal duets  passionate dramas. The genius and emotions of Italian lyrical tradition  which founds in Tuscan composers its most celebrated interpreters. The emotion of a theatrical representation  encoded into a fragrance.

name: karl-lagerfeld-pour-femme-1
detail: “I love perfume. I have worked with fragrances in the past and I'm thrilled to be launching Karl Lagerfeld Woman. I love women's and men's fragrances. They make life more beautiful. Perfume is like fashion for the nose …" Karl Lagerfeld.

name: orange-bitters-cologne-2016
detail: A recipe for a warming winter cocktail. Take two dashes of bright citrus  add sweet orange and a burst of ripe mandarin. Finish off with a splash of bitter orange to reveal a rich and sensual base.

name: bonbon-edition-limitee-c-ur-couture-2020-1
detail: Bonbon Coeur Couture by Viktor & Rolf for this limited edition explores the total satisfaction of self-indulgence through the different facets of caramel.

name: bois-flotte-1
detail: Imagine some driftwood carried by the wind and engraved with Mediterranean sea salt  hurled onto our Provencal shore. The perfect fragrance for the wild and dreamy personality.

name: olivier-onde-1
detail: This elegant perfume for men brings a combination of woody and green notes. Perfect for the sophisticated personality to express confidence and status.

name: bonbon-pastel-1
detail: Bon Bon Pastel is a delicate  fresh and bright perfume.

name: jade-leaf-tea
detail: Vivid Jade Leaf Tea. Inspired by the smoothest Japanese sencha. Bright new buds  steamed to preserve their distinct green colour and flavour. Bracing with a note of citrus. A crisp  invigorating rare tea infusion.

name: golden-needle-tea
detail: Magnetic Golden Needle Tea. Notes of spice in the air. The warm wooden interior of Chinese tea houses in cloud-veiled mountains. A deep  burning gold. Smooth with addictive glowing resins. A dark  mysterious rare tea infusion. Glowing and mysterious.

name: stronger-with-you-absolutely
detail: Stronger with You Absolutely pays homage to the absolute power of love  in the spirit of a fragrance.

name: 500-years-1
detail: Released with brand new olfactory ingredients  the 500 Years eau de parfum blends top notes of rose  the power of spices and the sensation of something precious  in a precious creation.

name: cotton-almond-2019-1
detail: A spell of soft  elegant  white velvety. The caress of the almond's addictive  creamy notes combined with the honey-sweet aroma of the Heliotrope blossom is gently kissed by the fluffy cotton blossom.

name: stronger-with-you
detail: Unpredictable  she surprises with her originality. She has inherited a confident elegance  with the easy nonchalance of youth  she communicates with sensuality.

name: stronger-with-you-oud
detail: Paying tribute to the mythical ingredients of the Orient  Stronger with You Oud heightens the sensuality of the original olfactory signature with powerful oud  one of the most precious ingredients in perfumery.

name: black-2
detail: A fragrance dedicated to all fragrance lovers. A composition that captivates with stylish elegance  simple luxury and powerful masculinity.

name: stronger-with-you-2023-1
detail: A limited edition of the original Stronger With You  more addictive and magnetic than ever before.

name: do-son-eau-de-parfum-limited-edition-2023
detail: A limited edition of Do Son's bottle adorned with blue. An evocation of the freshness of tuberose mingling with the sea air  of turquoise water that merges with the sky in the distance  of the scent of mystery that permeates the night. An invitation to let your imagination soar.

name: 37-rue-de-bellechasse
detail: The former Abbey de Penthemont used to be home to women of polite society  (Joséphine de Beauharnais lived there for a time). It was also on this site that the couture house's new headquarters was to be established. Thanks to the perfumers  37 Rue De Bellechasse pays tribute to this simultaneously sacred and sacrilegious atmosphere where the high mass of fashion has replaced religious services.

name: stronger-with-you-intensely
detail: This addictive fougère fragrance features spicy notes and a woody signature. It reflects the personality of today's young man looking for an intense fragrance that illuminates his deep love story.

name: exit-the-king
detail: Exit the King is the story of a fall. The fall of certainties  but above all  the fall of power. Exit the King tells the story of leaving a world full of old rules for a new world. A world full of freedom and discovery. Because nothing can rule us.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Moss', 'Rose', 'Pink Pepper', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Sandalwood', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Soap Accord']

name: velvet-incenso-1
detail: The smoke of incense elicits the mystical atmosphere of the Sicilian Arab palaces  standing under the shadow of tumultuous volcanoes.

name: crystal-bloom-moonlight-magic-2018
detail: A fantastic fragrance with the both the clarity of a winter night and the gentle warmth of the moon  where the world is gently embraced.

name: stronger-with-you-amber
detail: Stronger With You Amber  created for both men and women  reveals an even more sensual and passionate aspect of Stronger With You  celebrating an everlasting love story. A captivating scent inspired by the perpetual luminosity of the amber stone.

name: venise-2021
detail: In 2021  the journey ends in a green Venice: that of the vegetable gardens of the lagoon  the Mediterranean breath and the vegetal aromas in the freshness of the early morning. The scent of earth mixed with capsicums  tomatoes and citrus fruits.

name: crystal-bloom-eternal-dazzle
detail: Like a field of flowers flourishing in the light of the sunset  the shiniest and sparkly  gorgeous fragrance in the world.

name: bluebell-sweet-pea
detail: Forming part of our Contemporary Classics range  the English Bluebell fragrance by Yardley is inspired by a diverse variety of flowers. A light  feminine and fresh fruity fragrance.
ingredients: ['Sweet Pea', 'Bluebell', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Peony', 'Rose', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Vanilla', 'Woody Notes']

name: my-burberry-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: My Burberry captures the fragrance of a London garden after the rain and inspired by the cult trench coat of the Burberry brand.

name: 101-rose-pois-de-senteur-patchouli-2
detail: Glamour  so sweet  rose.

name: limperatrice-gardenia-1
detail: The generosity and the joyful character of Elisabeth embodies in a beautiful gardenia  very textured and multi-faceted.

name: crystal-bloom
detail: A bouquet of flowers realise an instant that shines beautifully forever  providing the most translucent  lovely fragrance in the world.

name: sweetpea
detail: This small plant  a very popular garden flower  is a dark horse that has been confounding perfumers since time immemorial.

name: jimmy-choo-blossom-1
detail: Inspired by the effervescent life of the Jimmy Choo woman. A sense of sexiness  fun and happiness embodies the spirit of this fragrance. The secret of the Jimmy Choo party girl: turn pink and don't take yourself seriously!

name: carven-le-parfum-1
detail: "I wanted to play with the Carven values: timeless elegance that also seems absolutely effortless. I wanted a fragrance that would resemble a huge bouquet of freshly cut flowers  with personality and lingering sillage " Francis Kurkdjian  Perfumer.

name: naturelle-indra
detail: Let Indra wrap you in the cosy embrace of warm sunlight and experience depth and warmth in every spritz of santal and mimosa.

name: pomelo-paradis-2022
detail: An addictive scent for optimistic and charismatic people.

name: orange-blossom-3
detail: The scent of clementine leaves in the morning dew shimmers over a heart of orange blossom and water lily  transporting the wearer to a garden oasis.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Lilac', 'Iris / Orris', 'Mandarin Orange Blossom', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Water Lily', 'Oakmoss', 'Vetiver', 'Lemongrass', 'Citrus Leaves']

name: true-story-men
detail: True Story Men tells a love story  dedicated to Chris' husband and Criss' father. He often wears his favourites together  creating a totally personal and individual fragrance blend. True Story Men is the perfect fragrance for what they consider to be an equally perfect man.

name: fiorucci-western-girl-2011
detail: Liberating  exciting  and wild.

name: hamsah-1
detail: Hamsah is a honeyed fragrance that deliciously unfolds its layers to reveal its true character. It whispers to the world that you are as strong as you are sweet  and the world comes closer to hear it.

name: animale-instinct-femme
detail: Animale Instinct Femme Eau de Parfum is dedicated to attractive women  who enjoy releasing their wildest desires and celebrating passion.

name: tiger-ink
detail: The eye of the tiger. A sultry fragrance that evokes feelings of an urban night under neon lights.

name: perceive-soleil-1
detail: Perseive Soleil will evoke summer sensations and a serene  peaceful existence. Illuminated with notes of freshness that will help you create the ambiance of a carefree summer day.

name: lee-cooper-originals-for-ladies-1
detail: Lee Cooper Originals for Gentlemen and Ladies read like a music store. As much a part of them as their denims  the guitar is never far away. From dusk to dawn  the muse sings to her favourite rock star. At first light  the sensuous strains linger on… lips touching lips. A perfect union  remembered in fragrance. A love story from London town  never to die away.

name: happy-donald-robertson-2022
detail: The same iconic fresh  bright and sensual scent in a limited edition bottle by Donald Robertson.
ingredients: ['Magnolia', 'Jasmine (Indonesia)', 'Bergamot', 'Crinum Lily', 'Mimosa', 'Orchid', 'Exotic Flower Accord', 'Grapefruit', 'Mandarin Orange Blossom', 'Boysenberry', 'Woody Notes', 'Laurel']

name: essencial-supreme-woman-2019-1
detail: Essencial Supreme brings an aroma that is intense  to feel and impress everyone around you. A fragrance that accompanies you in special and unique moments.

name: treselle-1
detail: This fragrance will unleash your deepest emotions while leaving you feeling heady with a sophisticated radiance.

name: un-matin-dorage-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: The air  heavy only a few minutes before  has become almost fresh. You can smell the rain that has just stopped  as well as the scent of magnolia and gardenia flowers  intensified by the damp earth: a true moment of grace. For Camille Goutal and Isabelle Doyen  it is a morning storm in a lush Japanese garden.

name: splash
detail: Like everything is going my way. Plunge into energizing citrus and masses of flowers in a refreshingly light splash. Splash has the ability to transport you back to a special time  and smelling it after that time  might recall those memories and wonderful moments.
ingredients: ['Magnolia', 'Grapefruit', 'Boysenberry', 'Crinum Lily', 'Floral Notes', 'Mimosa', 'Orchid', 'Exotic Flower Accord', 'Jasmine (Indonesia)', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin Orange Blossom', 'Laurel']

name: happy-2022-1
detail: Fresh  bright  soft and sensual. A unique scent made of citrus vibrancy  combined with the cool petal florals. These exotic notes have never been used before in a fragrance.
ingredients: ['Magnolia', 'Jasmine (Indonesia)', 'Bergamot', 'Crinum Lily', 'Mimosa', 'Orchid', 'Exotic Flower Accord', 'Grapefruit', 'Mandarin Orange Blossom', 'Boysenberry', 'Woody Notes', 'Laurel']

name: happy-mom-vibes-2023
detail: Fresh  bright  soft and sensual. Give your mom Happy Vibes. For Mother's Day  gift an exclusive  limited-edition Clinique Happy fragrance bottle featuring a colourful  floral illustration by award-winning artist Sol Cotti. It's one of a kind  just like your mom. Exclusive to Macy's.
ingredients: ['Magnolia', 'Jasmine (Indonesia)', 'Bergamot', 'Crinum Lily', 'Mimosa', 'Orchid', 'Exotic Flower Accord', 'Grapefruit', 'Mandarin Orange Blossom', 'Boysenberry', 'Woody Notes', 'Laurel']

name: un-matin-dorage-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: The air  heavy only a few minutes before  has become almost fresh. You can smell the rain that has just stopped  as well as the scent of magnolia and gardenia flowers  intensified by the damp earth: a true moment of grace. For Camille Goutal and Isabelle Doyen  it is a morning storm in a lush Japanese garden.

name: eau-de-varens-n-8-1
detail: It opens with a refreshing cascade of citrus and frosted mint. The solar radiance of ylang is adorned with floral notes of mandarin blossom for tonic water.

name: pure-honey
detail: Pure honey is an irresistible fragrance  evoking Kim's infinite charm with its heady  voluptuous floral notes. A fragrance as radiant and golden as the woman who created it. Pure Honey is intoxicating  sensual  exquisitely feminine and inviting.

name: riviere-siam
detail: Rivière Siam takes you away to the beautiful rivers in Thailand  where the waters shimmer under sun-kissed skies.

name: dream-angels-love-is-heavenly-1
detail: Love is fresh. Love is pure. Love is Heavenly. Water lily  mandarin flower  luminous musk.

name: dune-pour-homme
detail: Original and balanced  Dune pour Homme is inspired by long walks by the sea. Its composition combines fresh  woody and oceanic notes  for a fragrance that exudes serenity and harmony with nature.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Fig Leaf', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Mandarin Orange Blossom', 'Tonka Bean', 'Sandalwood', 'Blackcurrant', 'Floral Notes', 'Moss', 'Fig', 'Jasmine', 'Clary Sage']

name: happy
detail: Fresh  bright  soft and sensual. A hint of citrus  a wealth of flowers. The top note blends the unique freshness of citrus vibrancy  combined with the cool petal florals. These exotic notes have never been used before in a fragrance.

name: eternity-flame-1
detail: Eternity Flame is a celebration of the infinite beauty and the power of the natural elements  capturing the timeless journey of intimacy and love with added sensuality and passion.

name: love-chloe-eau-florale-1
detail: Love  Chloé Eau Florale has an infectious elegance. A now-legendary perfume embraced by those who love to combine style with femininity  a scent newly interpreted like a wisp of air. A delicate and refined fragrance. A fresh and powdery floral scent  Love Chloé Eau Florale gracefully ushers elegance into a new era of lightness.

name: carven-leau-de-toilette-1
detail: Described as “different from the original  but not in opposition.” Perfumer Francis Kurkdjian imagined the eau “like a lightweight piece of clothing  as easy to wear as Le Parfum but made of a different fabric  probably more airy.”

name: tender-blossom
detail: Time for romance  time for Betty Barclay Tender Blossom. Matching the most beautiful season  Betty Barclay has created a romantic fragrance  a fragrance like spring itself.

name: reaction-for-her-1
detail: Bright  dynamic  sensual. Reaction for Her is a totally modern fragrance that nails the true nature of today's independent young woman. It has a vibrant floral body that is reminiscent of sunshine and romance.

name: supra-floral
detail: Daring  breathtaking  addictive  noble... a new dimension in the fragrance universe. A collection of unique creations and original alchemies  crafted around the major themes of traditional perfumery. This opus crystallizes the essence of the Mugler brand and reveals a little of the creator's inner life  quite simply letting us into his secret.

name: lady-blanche-7
detail: A darling of London Society  and one of the most influential ladies in Britain. Her aloof beauty  mysterious past and blazing passions are scrutinised by all from shop-girls to Royalty. She would do anything to climb the social ladder still further. Her latest scheme is to poison her husband  Lord George  inheriting his wealth and burying his secrets for ever!

name: rosa-rubus
detail: How to find you in my most beautiful moment? The perfumer remembers the past of his youth  and the creative idea is a white bouquet  white love. A new sense of olfactory beauty. Soft as the wind  like the eyes of a young man when he wakes up from a long night.

name: zen-2007
detail: Use your heart. Free your mind. The fragrance of the spirit. Breathe in the calm. Breathe out the chaos. Breathe in the peace. Breathe out the aggression. Zen.
ingredients: ['Patchouli', 'Peach', 'Lotus', 'Pineapple', 'Red Apple', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Freesia', 'Gardenia', 'Grapefruit', 'Hyacinth', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Marine', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Skin Accord', 'Violet', 'Rose (China)']

name: josephine-8
detail: A scent inspired by the love between Napoleon Bonaparte and Joséphine.

name: cherry-musk-1
detail: Anxious awakening. Innocent talisman. Sudden  casual and shameless as a compliment  from the heart centre of a cherry in a bed of white flowers  resting on the aphrodisiac paradise of musks.

name: zen-gold
detail: Zen Gold is as precious  elegant and radiant as real gold  that implies eternity and generates a rare and incredible energy.
ingredients: ['Incense / Olibanum', 'Lotus', 'Rose (China)', 'Patchouli', 'Peach', 'Pineapple', 'Red Apple', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Freesia', 'Gardenia', 'Grapefruit', 'Hyacinth', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Skin Accord', 'Violet']

name: secret-1
detail: Secret as the name suggests  is an exotic and mysterious fragrance composed of a bouquet of precious notes designed for a woman who does not want to be labelled. A woman who seduces with ease  using both her playful character and her mysterious attitude.

name: blue-hyacinth-2017
detail: "When we visited Charleston in the middle of the English countryside  I didn't know what to expect but I fell in love with it. When I was there  I made a storyline in my head from morning to afternoon to evening so the five fragrances have a natural evolution. What I particularly loved about the Bloomsbury Set was the juxtaposition of domesticity and simplicity with this hugely intellectual environment "  Yann Vasnier  Perfumer.

name: desert-paintbrush-2021
detail: Sandy bracts bud on the high road to Taos. Desert paintbrush plant holds the silent scent of gardenia built of hyacinth heads colouring vast vistas of New Mexican rock  shrub  and scree.

name: anais-anais-loriginal-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: For the quite young girl  almost already a woman  she is multi faceted. Like her perfume Anaïs Anaïs. Fresh as dew on freshly cut stems. Romantic like brews of white flowers. Sensual when the powdery musks caress her skin. Or carnal  when this skin is burning under the fire of amber woods. Irresistible  actually ...

name: chamade-extrait
detail: A heart that beats "la chamade" translates the effervescence of love  the moment when the heart capitulates in the face of emotional intensity. This perfume is a hymn to love that unfurls like the spring with equal grace  femininity  independence and attraction.

name: aire-de-sevillas-gardenias
detail: Aire de Sevilla Gardenias is a soft and fresh perfume that reflects an elegant  jovial and cheerful personality.

name: bluebell-7
detail: By name and by nature! The joy of fresh bluebells is instant. A floral that is as singular as it is pure. Behind the charming simplicity lies an intricate mosaic construction: a contrasting bouquet that tells the story of a single flower. A breath of (exquisite) fresh air. England's favourite flower recreated in a clean  innocent scent.

name: vent-vert
detail: Vent Vert  a mythical perfume  embodies the distinguished elegance which tricks time and fashion. The nobility of the galbanum  used in overdose for the first time in History  delivers with impertinence  all its fresh and green density. A perfume revealing a powerful trail printed with authenticity and purity.

name: hyacinth
detail: In typical Demeter fashion  our Hyacinth is the scent of the sweet living flower in full bloom  with powerful and bright green undertones. An extraordinary fragrance  you'll feel like you're standing in a field of Hyacinth.

name: chamade-eau-de-toilette
detail: Chamade evokes the accelerated pulse of an unbridled heart wrapped in the effervescence of love. A heart that capitulates  struck by intense emotion. It is an ode to love  grace and femininity. It is a complex floral that tells the story of a romantic and daring woman who serenely assumes the inclinations of her heart.

name: hyacinth-1
detail: Hyacinth is the scent of the sweet living flower in full bloom  with powerful and bright green undertones. You'll feel like you're standing in a field of hyacinths. An extraordinary scent.

name: tuberosa-4
detail: Fresh and sensual  Tuberosa is dedicated to all those who do not want to go unnoticed but in a subtle way. A fragrance that reflects a sweet and seductive personality  releasing a burst of energy and joie de vivre.

name: puppys-breath
detail: Puppy's Breath is a revelation of warm  moist and wonderful comfort. Slightly sweet  and undeniably organic and alive  this fragrance captures the experience of meeting that new puppy for the first time  up close and personal  a rainbow swirl of happy feelings and memories. It remains transparent  yet full and rounded. Mystical  like breath itself.

name: alaia-paris-1
detail: For this project  Azzedine Alaïa meticulously and personally controlled every detail  taking advice from a team of experts in pursuit of excellence. As soon as perfumer Marie Salamagne heard about Mr. Alaïa's commission (the smell of cold water falling on hot chalk)  she immediately started looking. "Quickly " she says  "I found a formula that evoked this sensation.

name: imperial-oud-1
detail: A walk in the forest  magnificent and enigmatic. I lost myself in its heart.

name: elvish-musk
detail: Tender  extremely sensual  and very elegant  this is one of the most magical and spiritual fragrances.

name: amber-temper
detail: "There is only one difference between a madman and me. The madman thinks he is sane. I know I am mad " Salvador Dali  Arstist.

name: fuzzy-sweater-the-library-of-fragrance
detail: Warm  enveloping  and inviting while remaining light and understated. This fragrance will make you feel like you just put on your favorite fuzzy sweater.

name: oh-tiara-amethyst
detail: This scent was inspired by a woman in love in the most romantic city in the world.

name: libertine-neroli-1
detail: This scent represents the abandonment of pleasures  or luxury intended as the enjoyment of life with a sense of freedom and relaxation.

name: poker
detail: A bold scent for the rebellious minds.

name: blood-oranges-1
detail: Excessively juicy. Blood orange is a cross-breed of exotic pomelo and virginal clementine. Humble citrus in perfumery can disappoint and disappear  but the muscular blood orange  thirsting for air-space  grabs your attention.

name: varanasi
detail: "Varanasi is inspired by a trip to India in 2017 and it tells what India left in my heart  mind and soul. Varanasi is also the perfume that tells the deep bond of friendship and sharing of the journey  experienced as a unique bond  born among the people who have lived this magical and true experience. Varanasi is an olfactory mandala " Meo Fusciuni.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Animalic Notes', 'Jasmine', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Vetiver', 'Amber', 'Cardamom', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Leather', 'Nutmeg', 'Rose', 'Jatamansi / Spikenard', 'Saffron', 'Ambrette Seed']

name: bugatti-signature-blue
detail: This maritime-sporty eau de toilette gives you a feeling of lightness and freedom. Thanks to its animalic notes  it then becomes more masculine and deep. Relax and be sure of your stylish appearance  because you know you have a perfect fragrance companion.

name: peau-de-soie-1
detail: "I'm a man who is passionate about women  especially my wife. I'm fascinated with their mysteriousness. I also know that I will never understand them  that between men and women beauty exists at the heart of an undefined paradoxical space where to find each other  they have to let go  to give up a little of their femininity or masculinity." - Philippe Starck

name: metal-chypre
detail: "Like a good alchemist  I strive to reproduce the scent of copper  surging  cold  metallic and resolutely modern. The result is a dry  leathery amber composition. Almost as if the copper melded with the chypre olfactory theme to give rise to a completely new alloy". - Romano Ricci  Olfactory Director

name: temperantia
detail: The essence of calmness  modesty and great wisdom. To know  to see  to feel  but not to act. Reminiscent of that moment of pure calm and tolerance  holding your nerve in the most challenging of times.

name: oud-radieux
detail: A rare substance with woody and animalic notes  revealed in all its authenticity whose mysterious characteristics are explored by the perfumer.

name: black-musk-2
detail: Black Musk is like an irresistible aura in the wake of a Princess.  Irresistible  priceless and royal.

name: cuir-28
detail: Cuir 28  our Dubai exclusive  is Easy Rider without the sweat and petrol  blending powerful  dark and mysterious notes to create a powerful personality. Sweet  spicy and gently animalic notes give Cuir 28 its addictive  oriental finish.

name: tommy-girl-weekend-getaway-2018
detail: Inspired by beach getaways  filled with sunshine and ocean air.

name: terre-de-lumiere-intense-1
detail: Terre de Lumiere Intense captures that "golden hour" after sunrise and before sunset.

name: for-her-fleur-musc-eau-de-toilette-florale
detail: Fleur Musc EDT Florale transforms the sense of intimacy and immediacy that radiates with sparkling vitality  reinterpreting a woman's sensuality with supreme confidence and passion.

name: lair-du-temps-x-antoinette-poisson-2021
detail: Chiming beautifully with porcelain  this luminously sensual floral is creamier  with even more sparkle than the original L’Air du Temps. As a counterpoint to the world’s tumults  L’Air du Temps is a reminder of how dreams and poetry are more than ever a part of our era.

name: crazy-hot
detail: "Crazy Hot is as sweet and sparkling as the most undeniable attraction " Perfumer Calice Becker created this composition with the aim of embodying the chemistry and attraction between two lovers.

name: tommy-girl-now-2018-1
detail: A trendy  unpretentious fragrance with compositions intended for younger  urban populations.

name: woman-in-gold-1
detail: A perfume as complex and dazzling as the woman who wears it. Inspired by the 1907 portrait of leading Viennese art patron and taste-maker  Adele Bloch-Bauer - the only woman Klimt painted twice. Woman in Gold is full of the same shimmering complexity  bewitching glamour and intrigue  which the perfumer describes as "texturised and brilliant  rich and voluptuous."

name: terre-de-lumiere-leau
detail: In Provence  there exists a unique moment where the light of the dawn ignites the sky and nourishes the earth in a moment of ephemeral grace. When this light is translated into perfume  a tender  feminine and iconic signature appears; the perfect match between the blossoming of a luminous floral heart  delicate like a cloud of petals  and the unique and enveloping sensation of the sweetness of dawn.

name: figuier-rose-1
detail: What better flower than the rose to flatter the magnificent fig tree  so symbolic of the Mediterranean region?

name: love-dont-be-shy-extreme-1
detail: Love Don't Be Shy Extreme is such an addictive pleasure that sensitive souls are asked to abstain. A luminous elixir that no gourmand lovers can resist.

name: jadore-eau-de-parfum-roller-pearl-1
detail: J'adore  the spontaneous and joyful expression famously used by Monsieur Dior to guide him in his creative decision making. It's the expression that caught the fancy of the Christian Dior Parfums team and answers as if by magic Jean Cocteau's pronouncement about Christian Dior: "This subtle genius of our time holds the magic pun in his name with the words God and Gold."

name: love-dont-be-shy-rose-oud-special-blend-2022-1
detail: Each year  Kilian revisits one of his most popular and iconic perfumes  Love  Don't Be Shy  to draw a new dimension of his complex perfumery personality towards the richness of oud. The fragrance receives a limited edition interpretation in 2022  highlighting the incredibly rich and diverse facets of oud oil.

name: love-dont-be-shy-rose-oud-special-blend-2020-1
detail: Kilian Paris revisits one of its most popular and iconic perfumes: Love  Don’t Be Shy  to draw a new dimension of its complex perfume personality towards the richness of Oud.

name: kologne-shield-of-protection
detail: Kologne Shield of protection takes a classic out to party. With luminous citrus notes throughout  this unique scent is a splash of freshness. Created as a shield of protection  it's a fragrance to spray around oneself like an aura of purity and vitality.

name: lair-du-paradis
detail: Faithful to her philosophy and her deep attachment to Art  Nina Ricci invites the painter and illustrator Martyna Zoltaszek to draw Nina Ricci's Paradise. She animates Le Paradis de Nina Ricci. Lush vegetation  exotic fruits  wonderful creatures. The artist signs a poetic fresco that comes to dress the cases of these limited editions. A window opens on the wonderful.

name: agua-de-bambu-radiant-1
detail: With each touch of the crystal bamboo  its sound echoes through the forest like a percussion instrument  creating a beautiful musical harmony  a symphony of Agua de Bambu.

name: agua-de-bambu-mujer
detail: With each touch of the crystal bamboo  the sound echoes through the forest like a percussion instrument  creating a beautiful musical harmony  a symphony of Agua de Bambú.

name: bambou
detail: An ode to Asian countries  an encounter with the majesty of bamboo forests  an unwavering symbol of tenacity  combining elegance and resistance.

name: bambu-mujer
detail: Bambú Mujer is inspired by bamboo due to its unique strength and its strikingly feminine flower. An authentic  powerful and sensual woman is evoked.

name: agua-de-bambu-hombre-radiant-edition-1
detail: A fresh  masculine fragrance created for the progressive and fashionable thinker  with a timeless touch and sensual warmth.

name: green-garden
detail: Green Garden is a fragrance that reflects the elegance of the castle garden with a variety of roses: seductive with a light freshness. The light evening breeze envelops ball gowns with the fragrant notes of the rose garden.

name: bambu-by-jeremy-scott
detail: Message of friendship for this mischievous panda. In Japanese culture  the bamboo  the staple food of the panda is a symbol of friendship and loyalty. A unisex fragrance which seduces with its fresh notes of bergamot and bamboo shoots.

name: hei
detail: The cyclical creation and release of energy are the inspiration for Hei Alfred Sung. The relationship between nature's elements – earth  wood  and minerals – and their continual movement evoke balance and harmony. The harnessing and release of energy are the underlying themes of the structure of the fragrance.

name: bamboo-1
detail: It is from the new  smaller shoots of the bamboo plant  very green with a light  fruity tone  that the delicate green scent of Demeter's Bamboo cologne is created.

name: aurora-3
detail: Aurora is a fragrance dedicated to French elegance and sophistication  named after the title of Charles Wong's book  where he pays homage to his time in France and all the beautiful and elegant things that inspired him.

name: bamboo-intense
detail: Harmony and balance straight from bamboo fields.

name: bambou-woman-2002
detail: A discreet and persistent touch characterizes Bambou. A light and fruity fragrance to start  then a segue into a warm and woody base which helps Bambou symbolise independence and refinement. An outstanding mark of timelessness.

name: playful-bamboo-lime
detail: This scent captures the essence of walking through a dewy bamboo forest  all in just a spritz.

name: series-1-leaves-calamus-1
detail: Calamus is a reed plant in the marshes  green and fresh  blowing in the wind epitomised by the young bamboo leaf and the celery grains. Verdant pastures in a modern world.

name: black-bamboo-1
detail: Black Bamboo is a passionate blend of bamboo shoots paired with aromatic greens  with added touches of ginger. A deep  mellow and exotic scent that is truly unisex.

name: bamboo-path
detail: A scent inspired by the Cangcang Bamboo Forest Temple. The bells are ringing late. The spring rain is steady  the bamboo forest is full of vitality  Similar to the clear ink technique of traditional Chinese painting  it has a sense of cleanness and clarity.

name: black-suede-green
detail: Black Suede Green is a refreshing and vibrant scent for the adventurous man.

name: relaxing-fragrance
detail: A moment of exquisite calm. In today's world of continually more pressure and more stress  women long for comfort  both mental and spiritual. To this end  Shiseido has combined Eastern spiritual thinking with advanced aromachology science to create a new kind of fragrance that actually helps you relax. Deeply thoroughly; body and spirit.

name: bamboo-watermelon-2021-1
detail: "Bamboo & Watermelon is the perfect subtle summer companion! It's a light fragrance that imparts a holistic sense of well-being " Alexandra Monet  Perfumer.

name: stronger-with-you-freeze
detail: Celebrating unconditional love and the strength of togetherness  Stronger With You Freeze is a powerful  long-lasting fragrance. Freeze the moment and make it last forever.

name: rain-shower-leaf-2023
detail: Wake up and smell the rain with this undoubtably unisex floral. Dripping with bracing sprays of cool freshness  refreshing orange flower rides on the notes of cool rain deep in the heart of green leaf for a lasting zing.

name: si-passione-holiday-edition-2019
detail: To celebrate the 2019 Festive Season  this iconic bottle is decorated with a golden star to celebrate Giorgio Armani's beauty icons in a festive and colourful takeover.

name: the-yulong
detail: Known for its tea trees that grow high in altitude and its magnificent landscapes  the Yulong Mountains in the Yunnan region of China is home to one of the most beautiful black teas as interpreted in Thé Yulong.

name: le-temps-des-reves
detail: There are certain precious moments when we feel that our dreams can come true. Le Temps des Rêves recalls the cherished time during which Annick Goutal allowed herself to dream of becoming a perfumer. A time marked by the landscapes of her early days in Grasse and the comforting scent of orange blossom.

name: blackberry-woods-1
detail: The essence of autumn. Blackberry Woods is a sensual  woodsy blend of berries  leaves  and woods. Intense and enchanting like a forest walk at dusk.

name: melrose-apple-blossom
detail: A free-spirited fragrance designed for life. Dancing blossoms spiked with moreish salted toffee apple  sharp lemon bamboo and cool chilled amber. A fun and frivolous fragrance that’s all apples and no apps!

name: tallulahs-camellia-1
detail: A rebellious and spirited floral guaranteed to stand out. Elegant bluebells set the scene as the soft whisper of white flowers dance on the breeze. Blond woods embrace as you succumb to temptation.

name: si-passione-intense-1
detail: Sì Passione is a more intense and uncompromising fragrance  for the self-confident woman ready to make extreme choices  a woman who dares to say yes.

name: si-passione-eclat
detail: A bold  radiant and passionate fragrance that inspires you to reveal your inner strength. A fascinating invitation to illuminate your life with passion.

name: melilot
detail: A vegetal freshness and floral sweetness  subtly enhanced by cereal and milky notes.

name: si-eau-de-parfum-intense-2023
detail: A tribute to the power of saying yes  Sì represents a choice driven by both reason and emotion. Saying Sì is saying yes to passion  to freedom  to love and to oneself  and emboldens the expression of contemporary femininity. Sì Eau de Parfum Intense gives Sì a warmer facet  blending blackcurrant nectar with a velvety floral heart and a sensual vanilla bouquet.

name: folie-dun-soir-1
detail: The strength of a sudden impulse  the magic of love at first sight. Folie d’un Soir dares us to reshuffle the cards  just like Annick Goutal  who didn’t think twice when she decided  one night  to spread her wings and leave Paris for London.

name: tonka-angelica-2022
detail: A fragrance so good it should be illegal A tale of Angels and Demons. Sweet and heavenly.

name: si-passione-limited-edition-2022-1
detail: Our iconic bouquet of flowers encased in a jewel-like red bottle.

name: the-yulong-soie-de-nacre-1
detail: Yulong Tea is a unique aromatic combination of black tea and green tea extracts that will take you on a sensory journey through one of the most renowned landscapes of the Yunnan region  the Yulong Mountains.

name: valentino-uomo-born-in-roma-yellow-dream-1
detail: Born in Roma Yellow Dream evokes a perfumed image of Rome: a romantic golden halo  contrasted with a more urban electric fluorescent.

name: police-to-be-superpure-1
detail: This unique fragrance is an invitation to reconnect with our most essential selves and rid ourselves of excesses. It is a manifesto about consciously loving ourselves as we are  free of filters and rules. A fragrance that unites girls and boys in an extraordinary shared story  a shared fragrance trail.

name: police-to-be-green
detail: To Be Green is dedicated to all citizens of the world  people who reflect with their behaviour the sensitivity to the environment that surrounds them  their unique and precious home. A perfume that smells of freedom to be yourself and looks to the future with energy and positivity.

name: amethyst-haze
detail: Amethyst Haze is a tribute to the creativity within us all  fueled by ingenuity  imagination  patience and savoir-faire. This formula is designed to enhance the unique qualities of creative projects  whether it’s amethyst  a scent  or an idea you firmly believe in.

name: lovely-laura-1
detail: Lovely Laura reflects the dreams and emotions of a lovely woman in the embrace of an ethereal and enchanting shade of pink.

name: yuzu-10
detail: An awakening of the senses between the fruits illuminated by the sun and the melody of the wind.

name: favolosa
detail: Favolosa is a modern and unforgettable perfume for a woman who lives with charm and joyfulness.

name: paula-solar
detail: Paula Solar is a scent inspired by the happiness  energy and optimism brought by a warm sunlight on an endless summer. A young and happy scent to accompany you while you enjoy life to the fullest and live moments that you will keep forever in your heart. A scent that celebrates life.

name: paraiso-floral-ltd-ed-2020-1
detail: Paradise Floral is a refreshing fruity fragrance with sparkling citrus facets. Radiant and luminous  it enhances femininity and sensuality.

name: cocoa-beans
detail: A delicate creation that describes the various forms of expression of nature.

name: honeysuckle-25
detail: This creation represents the privilege of a walk in the wild nature.

name: dans-ma-bulle-de-fleurs-1
detail: Dans Ma Bulle de Fleurs immerses us in the delicacy of flowers  evoking a stroll in a garden  between style and naturalness. A bubble of flowers exudes a natural  dazzling  cheerful and enchanted beauty.

name: brit-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Burberry Brit embodies the spirit of Burberry and modern British style. A fruity  green oriental that features a surprising mix of sugar and spice. Refreshingly unpretentious  and celebrates an effortless style.

name: dragee-1
detail: Delicate and sensual notes  sweet romanticism for pure charm.

name: volare-forever
detail: Immerse yourself in the soft embrace of Volare Forever Eau de Parfum. So subtle and feminine  it carries the softness to create an unforgettable moment that will be remembered forever.

name: lady-code
detail: Lady Code is the embodiment of the frigid yet irresistible seductress. Feminine without being overdressed  this model is inspired by chic à la française  the effortless elegance that conceals an unspoken structure of codes. Beneath an impassive façade  Lady Code reveals a warmth that only her inner circle knows  a warmth that everyone wants to glimpse.

name: louve
detail: "An iconic creature since the mists of time  here the she-wolf retains her mystery  tainted with an almond bitterness. A singular  white enigma  a solitary figure at the top of her snow castle." Serge Lutens.

name: almond-2
detail: Demeter's Almond perfectly captures the lightly toasted  sweet fullness of the California almond.

name: mon-instant-calin
detail: Mon Instant Câlin is a certified organic scent for baby  as soft and enveloping as a caress.

name: mon-bouquet-blanc
detail: Mon Bouquet Blanc captures the emotions of one of the most beautiful days in the life of a woman  the day of their wedding. This floral scent captures this memory  the embodiment of boundless joy that makes the heart beat faster.

name: my-burberry-black-elixir-de-parfum
detail: Celebrating a deep  dark sensuality  this addition to the My Burberry collection fuses stunning florals with gourmand notes  while preserved  spicy citrus and smoky woods complete the composition for a long-lasting finish.

name: le-bouquet-de-la-mariee
detail: Guerlain created the crucial companion for the most exceptional  unforgettable and moving day of all: the day the bride says “I do” to the one she loves.

name: romantic-montmartre
detail: Embrace your love in the streets of Montmartre. A romantic and sensual perfume  that imparts a sweetness of love forever!

name: a-la-vida
detail: A perfume that reminds you that every step you took has been worth it and invites you to decide what your next step will be.

name: le-reve-nirmala-1
detail: A dream of delicious delights. Romantically stylish  Le Rêve Nirmala's supremely feminine flacon is a faithful replica of its elder  a celebration of young women and those who intend to remain so.

name: dans-ma-bulle-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: The Carven girl emancipates herself. She travels  discovers  feels and lives every moment. Dans Ma Bulle translates as "In my bubble" and is the fragrance symbol of her world. A world that she shapes  that she dominates  where she alone writes the rules. A perfume full of contrasts and fantasy  which invites us to enter her bubble  her Carven bubble.

name: brit-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Burberry Brit embodies the spirit of Burberry and modern British style. A fruity  green oriental that features a surprising mix of sugar and spice. Refreshingly unpretentious  and celebrates an effortless style.

name: iris-dragees-1
detail: Inspired by one of Europe's oldest forms of confectionary  Iris Draguées is a tribute to sugared almonds  accented by precious floral undertones. An assemblage of two delightful extractions  this resplendent fragrance combines leathery inflexions with velvety notes of iris resinoid  housed in a engraved vessel with a gold-tone stopper.

name: innocent-1
detail: Innocent is a surprising fragrance that mingles seduction and innocence with the whimsy of childhood and the wisdom of maturity. For sparkling  mischievous  and seductive women!Innocent is the forbidden deliciously dangerous fruit.

name: louve-2
detail: The she-wolf  the imagination runs wild. What creature lies behind this name? Where would a wolf live?  This she-wolf is heraldic. She lives on top of a mountain in a castle of snow. A tale from the dawn of time  and a perfume.

name: almond
detail: This scent perfectly captures the lightly toasted  sweet fullness of the California almond.

name: le-plus-beau-jour-de-ma-vie
detail: Guerlain has created Le Plus Beau Jour de ma Vie for all women who wish to make the unforgettable magic of a special day last forever.

name: ch-hot-hot-hot-2022-1
detail: A flowery breeze in a bottle!

name: sunday-mood
detail: Sunday Mood is the fragrance that makes the last day of the week seems the first  the second  the third  any day! Because the desire to go outdoors and enjoy the sun has no preference.

name: gold-myrrh-absolute
detail: Precious myrrh is at the heart of this powerful scent. The strong character of this perfume is reflected in its composition  which opens with floral top notes of immortelle and a spicy touch of black pepper. The middle notes are sweet  liquorice and cocoa  while in the base  vanilla and myrrh blend harmoniously. Gold Myrrh Absolute is a tribute to the exclusivity of myrrh and an invitation to experience the opulence of gold. This latest addition to the Eastern Treasures line is inspired by Carolina A. Herrera's travels to the Middle East and the richness of gold. Herrera's travels to the Middle East and the Arabian traditions of perfumery passed down to her by her mother.

name: the-duckers-resort-lover-1
detail: The Duckers Resort Lover was inspired by a trip to a spa resort in the Bahamas. “It was a luxurious oasis of happiness. I felt I was at the centre of the world  only surrounded by calmness and the beauty of nature " Véronique Nyberg  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Osmanthus', 'Watery', 'Patchouli', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Bergamot', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Tonka Bean', 'Violet Leaves']

name: cedar-wood-30549
detail: The olfactory memory of an ancient garden hidden in the centre of a city.

name: police-to-be-supernatural
detail: Inspired by nature’s complexity  Police To Be Super

name: tous-man-chill
detail: Feeling free and enjoying the fresh air is what Tous Man Chill is all about. A trip to the beach  a short (or long) distance adventure  a glimpse of the rooftops of the most cosmopolitan cities. An oasis of freshness for the Tous man.

name: 004-lifeguard
detail: He is not only your hero  but your guardian angel disguised in this alluring aquatic bouquet. He makes you forget you are just a mortal trying to be saved by his grace.
ingredients: ['Calone (Marine)', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Bergamot', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Cardamom', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Incense / Olibanum']

name: jones-beach-1
detail: Sand  surf  sunshine. Bare skin and bare feet. Carefree weekends. Concerts by the water. Real people  real moments  Real New York.

name: vince-camuto-homme-intenso
detail: Homme Intenso is for the man who lives a life of passion and adventure. Dive into the deeply mysterious and sensual Mediterranean. Invigoratingly crisp and unforgettably modern. Revealing a unique sensorial experience in the heart of a blue universe  this signature inspires profound confidence and independence in every man.

name: robinson-bear
detail: Inspired by the exploits of Robinson Crusoe  that bold  indomitable hero  Atkinsons Robinson Bear is an exhilarating and edgy eau de parfum that captures the wanderlust spirit that lies within.

name: solarissimo-marettimo
detail: Reaching its highest point  the sun gleams. It bronzes the skin  warms the sand. It brightly sparkles patterns onto the endless azure sea spraying its cooling mist. Marettimo captures this moment  a chance to get away and break free.

name: joop-splash
detail: The Joop! Splash man is the sexy urban hipster who puts an irreverent dose of new wave into the old-school way. Like a splash of sensual adrenaline  his fragrance reflects his bursting flow of energy and freshness. In short: Joop! Splash is a constant reminder of the question which is never far from his lips “how far can I take this?”

name: azzaro-pour-homme-wild-mint
detail: Wild Mint awakens the instinct of seduction. Its sensual freshness cuts to the chase as desire is born in an instant. As irresistible as it is wild.

name: mare-pacifico
detail: The aroma of the Pacific Ocean is part of that olfactory genre considered among the most difficult from a technical and compositional point of view  which is marine waters. If you are a lover of this type of aroma  Mare Pacifico is for you!

name: hos-n003-1
detail: Immersed in the fresh vitality of new life  Hos N.003 carries distinct notes to create a masterpiece of volcanic fusion inspired by the moment of a new beginning and a sense of masculine resilience  emerging from the heart of the ocean in a journey towards uncharted territory.

name: fly-away-1
detail: Lively then captivating. Feel each moment as if in a waking dream … for a floating sensation.

name: velour-animal
detail: A unique perfume with an almost animalic strength.

name: hypaer
detail: Hypaer is one in a series of powerful elixirs that redefine contemporary perfumery as we know it. Based on a single ingredient  cashmeran  this animalic  musky fragrance reveals undertones of wet concrete  and can be worn alone or personalised for an individual edge.

name: john-varvatos-artisan-1
detail: Artisan was inspired by driving to upstate New York in the spring and opening the window and getting a burst of clean  fresh air.

name: velvet-patchouli-1
detail: "Patchouli: the first fragrance that I felt really belonged to me. It became my go-to perfume " Stefano Gabbana.

name: john-varvatos-artisan-black-1
detail: Artisan Black is a dark  woody interpretation of Artisan  it showcases the John Varvatos signature mix of old world craftsmanship with a modern edge.
ingredients: ['Blackwood', 'Patchouli', 'Woody Notes', 'Boxwood', 'Lemon', 'Neroli', 'Orange', 'Iris / Orris', 'Kephalis (Woody note)', 'Leather', 'Musk', 'Vetiver', 'Belambre (Woody ambery)', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Calone (Marine)', 'Cardamom', 'Coriander', 'Ginger', 'Orange Blossom', 'Basil (Thai)', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Orange Blossom (Morocco)']

name: encre-noire-pour-elle-1
detail: For the women who used to borrow Encre Noire from their men! A perfume believed to have been made to measure  distinguished  addictive and sensual.

name: aqua-intense-1
detail: Aqua Intense opens on an energising note. At the heart  a wave of freshness evoking the feeling of the fresh ocean emerges boasting assertive and refined masculinity. The signature is round and sensual  making the fragrance enveloping and memorable.

name: kenzo-homme-eau-de-toilette-intense-2
detail: Kenzo Homme Eau de Toilette Intense reinvents the code of perfumery to further delve in the naturalness of a world of increasingly sustainable beauty. A fragrance reminiscent of sun-warmed salty skin. An olfactory journey in complete freedom.

name: attitude-7
detail: Attitude reflects the spirit with which every sportsman approaches his discipline. Fresh  luminous  marine and woody  the fragrance transmits the right freshness necessary to undertake any competition.

name: urbano
detail: The movement of the street invites you to know it  and in it you discover an energy different from everything you have ever felt. It is art that vibrates and inspires you. An inner manifesto  which liberates creativity within the city  within you.

name: joyce-jade
detail: Explore the unexpected paths that make you thrive with this joyfully sparkling eau de toilette. Brimming with fresh  hopeful vibes and effervescent hints of enthusiasm  it reveals the solar beauty of wild orchid blossom. Reminiscent of sunny days and a colourful lifestyle  inspiring energetic splashes of colour. Enjoy the pure and absolute joy of the moment.

name: princess-belle
detail: From Disney's series of fragrances that evoke fairy tale princesses  this scent is as beautiful as Belle.

name: chess-in-blue
detail: A Charismatic fragrance with a timeless refinement. Chess In Blue is a modern and elegant fragrance opening with a fresh and sparkling blend. It blossoms into an aromatic heart while the unforgettable trail  being both masculine and classy  features the presence of rare ingredients.

name: boss-bottled
detail: Boss encapsulated in a bottle: classic values of elegance and style. For those who seek achievement. An expression of those who have already made their mark. It's about achievement in the distinctive Boss way.

name: choice-of-champions-be-bold
detail: Choice of Champions Be Bold was created for dynamic and elegant men  passionate about the brand and about sports.

name: fresh-apple-1
detail: A cheerful  fresh scent that smells wonderful.

name: dahab-by-kajal
detail: The Dahab woman creates magic  she is hypnotic  mysterious and enchanting; has a defying confidence. Her character exudes richness  with one look  she turns things into gold; she defies luxury - she IS luxury.

name: fadas
detail: Who loves the magic of the mystic world! This fragrance enchants all with a mysterious journey.

name: imari-elixir-1
detail: Close your eyes  breathe deeply  and give in to your most passionate desires. Imari Elixir exudes hypnotic sensuality with its rich and enticing fragrance. A dark and mysterious sensuality that is as intoxicating as it is liberating. Imari Elixir  where passion deepens.

name: maritime-journey-1
detail: Maritime is fuelled by a passion for discovery  like a full-sail ride across the waves.

name: 201-pomme-verte-muguet-poire
detail: Vivid and sparkling floral heart.

name: virgin
detail: Virgin is a unique composition evoking innocence and dynamic energy.

name: smyth
detail: A crisp green apple is rounded with watery notes and sheer white woods for a bright finish.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Green Apple', 'White Tea', 'Sandalwood', 'Woody Notes', 'Apricot', 'Melon', 'Pineapple', 'Jasmine', 'Musk', 'Watery']

name: aurora-1
detail: Aurora is inspired by the unique beauty of the gently raising morning.

name: amore-mio
detail: Enter this perfumed Garden of Eden  and find a nectar of sweetness. A modern fairytale with a falsely ingénue heroine! Revisit the forbidden fruit myth with this sparkling and powdery fragrance.

name: macaque-1
detail: High up in the mountains  a group of macaques rest and play. Inside a solemn temple  in the ancient mossy forest  a ceremony is held in search of inner peace. Incense  white oud and jasmine tea sing in meditative harmony  their light flowers and sweet offerings in rhythm with the scents of nature.
ingredients: ['Green Apple', 'Moss', 'Galbanum', 'Cedarwood', 'Green Tea', 'Mandarin (red)', 'Honey', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Jasmine Tea', 'Musk', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'White Oud', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: dubhe
detail: A perfume made from raw materials jealously and secretly kept in the olfactory library of the Terenzi family for more than 50 years. Outer space and the absolute silence that hovers between the shining stars have been reflecting on us for thousands of years and will do so again.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Saffron', 'Guaiac Wood', 'White Oud', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Sandalwood', 'Vanilla', 'Amber', 'Iris / Orris', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Geranium', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Rose']

name: the-muse
detail: A muse inspires by her character  her charisma and her human attention. The charisma of every muse is characterised by her strength and personality. It gives you a unique vibe of perfect freshness and purity. The feeling and smell of fresh laundry that accompanies you throughout the day becomes your Clean Molecule: "The Muse".

name: mirach-1
