detail: Mirach is one of the most famous stars in the constellation Andromeda  not least because of its incredible dimensions  which are four times those of our Sun. It is therefore classified as a Red Giant and is capable of releasing huge spirals of fire that dance sinuously in the silent cosmos. This creation collects this powerful yet gentle fire  making it dance on the skin with a sinuous and fluctuating rhythm.

name: kahwa-1
detail: Inspired by the Arabs' love of kahwa (meaning coffee in Arabic)  this perfume is the ultimate example of tradition fused with a contemporary twist and will instantly transport you to a moment of relaxation.

name: lovely-apple-1
detail: A multi-fruity scent with all summer freshness  perfect on its own or combined with Scent Mix Tutti Frutti.

name: golden-dynastie-1
detail: A fragrance that evokes the opulent life of a rich and prestigious dynasty  characterised by a deliciously intoxicating blend of mature notes united by the delicate essence of rose. An extremely refined  luxurious and sun-drenched fragrance  dominated by its glorious past. An opulent fragrance for a queen or a princess.

name: soleil-de-provence-1
detail: Inspired by the sun-drenched landscapes of Provence  Soleil de Provence asserts itself like a warm smile with a sparkling freshness. Signed by the Master Perfumer Daphné Bugey  the fragrance first presents itself as an homage to the mimosa flower and its bright yellow colour that guides the road stretching from Bormes le Mimosas to Grasse. This ‘winter sun’ offers its green  floral and powdered notes with honeyed and woody facets to this luminous scent. Yellow comes up again with the sparkling freshness of lemon and bergamot. Sunshine is at the heart of Soleil de Provence  with the sun-soaked ylang-ylang flower and the heat emanating from the balmy notes of benjoin and vanilla. A joyous fragrance that remains close to its ingredients and embraces a southern art of living.

name: obscuratio-1
detail: The lure of Ylang-ylang among the treetops.

name: narciso-rodriguez-all-of-me-2
detail: All of Me is a multi-faceted fragrance created for a special generation of women who confidently embrace all that makes them unique  their beauty  their grace and their power.

name: police-potion-for-her-1
detail: This sensual elixir envelops you like an intense embrace and seduces you with its warm forbidden notes.

name: far-away-rebel-diva-1
detail: Unleash your confidence  showcase your multifaceted talents and bring to life your irresistible charm with Far Away Rebel & Diva.

name: brazilian-crush
detail: One of our essential beauty secrets is being cheirosa (sheh-rō-zah)  which means to always smell incredibly delicious from sunrise to sundown. Brazilian Crush  our Body Fragrance Mist  instantly transports you to the sultry beaches of Rio de Janeiro.

name: volare-gold
detail: Volare Gold is a modern interpretation of the rose  with the fragrance opening with bright  succulent notes before leading into a supreme heart  before evoking a deliciously gourmand drydown that enchants.

name: scandal-le-parfum-1
detail: How about we get rid of good manners? Once and for all! Scandal le Parfum is making its debut and it should be quite sensational. Be aware: the emotion will be strong  the fun  complete. A thunderstorm. An intense eau de parfum that is scared of nothing. Absolutely nothing. A scandalous red that loves to offend. Spectacular legs that turn heads. The audience is bowled over. Upset. In a single spray. What a wake! And what an outrage! From the great Gaultier.

name: sol-cheirosa-62
detail: “In Brazil  everywhere you look you’re surrounded by natural beauty. But the most amazing thing is how Brazil makes me feel – happy and full of life.” - Jerome Epinette  Perfumer

name: vicious-cacao
detail: Vicious Cacao is an emotional trip down memory lane  as well as a soft and intriguing caress on the skin. A fragrance that thrives on contrasts.

name: mauboussin-pour-lui-in-black
detail: Pour Lui en Noir is a sensual and powerful eau de parfum that plays with the codes of virility and seduction signed by Mauboussin Parfums.

name: changing-constance-7
detail: Sister to Lady Blanche  Constance is what one would call a very modern woman. Her fresh and spicy entrance hits an immediately intriguing (disobedient??) note. Constance oozes with an attitude of laissez-faire.

name: 2am-kiss-1
detail:
Late night on Crosby Street. A beautiful  passionate  allencompassing first kiss. The smell of salty caramel blended with sweet amber creates an irresistible slightly intoxicating and 
addictive experience. A kiss you won't forget.

name: sunset-hour-1
detail: As a blazing sun dips into the Indian Ocean  the scent of fragrant native fruit pervades the languorous evening breeze. A heavenly cocktail of citrus and spicy delights awaits  giving way to a deliciously gourmand and sensuous floral heart  best served at sunset hour.

name: petit-attitude-happy-bug
detail: For girls who like to live life to the fullest. Their joys and dreams represented in Petit Happy Bug.

name: brazilian-crush-cheirosa-62
detail: This scent is like a blend of the best summer you ever had and the best summer you’re about to have.

name: mystic-incense
detail: The Mystic Incense fragrance is inspired by the Muda d'Egitto. The Muda d'Egypt  from Venice to the Egyptian cities of Damietta and Alexandria. This is where the Incense Route began. From this Muda came raw materials such as frankincense  fragrant cypress  myrrh  jasmine  white nigella  etc.

name: 221-tigre-deau
detail: Tigre d'Eau is the olfactory allegory of a white tiger stretched out in fresh grass.

name: tero-1
detail: This perfume is dedicated to the world in which we all live  and we invite you to feel the earthy aromas that dominate the fragrance.

name: chill-1
detail: The free-spirited dreamer. A believer in wanderlust  spontaneity  dream catchers  horoscopes with a bohemian style and tattoos that tell her story.

name: choice-power
detail: Choice Power was created for the seductive and engaging woman  who knows that her sensuality goes far beyond the body and uses it as a form of empowerment.

name: bomb-purple
detail: Create the unexpected and leave a delicious trail! Egeo Purple Bomb is a fun and exciting scent that allows you to enjoy the possibilities  to live like there was no tomorrow. Egeo Purple Bomb is irresistible and perfect to tempt those around you!

name: amburana-ao-sol
detail: L'Occitane au Brésil reveals the beauty of the Amburana tree in the evening light to create a sophisticated fragrance.

name: q-by-dolce-gabbana-eau-de-parfum
detail: Passion. Power. Strength: This is Q by Dolce & Gabbana. A woody  fruity fragrance worthy of the strength and charisma of a true queen.

name: loubidoo
detail: What good luck! Wherever you are  this lucky cat will bring you good fortune! Tiptoeing on velvet paws  it blends straightforward simplicity with opulence. Loubidoo is a fragrance with a high mischievousness content.

name: green-wood
detail: A free-spirited and sensory experience that tells everything about you and your personality. It is the most intimate and distinctive element  which makes you recognizable and different in a non-descriptive way. We like to think of Green Wood as a personal accessory that defines the style and character of Dsquared2.

name: rose-milano-1
detail: A fragrance of contrasts where delicacy and audacity come face to face  Rose Milano is a tribute to Milanese elegance  offering a new interpretation of the rose. While the enveloping petal aromas of rose absolute are lifted by earthy  smoky notes of patchouli and moss  they are softened by sublime fruity notes.

name: roma-uomo-green-swing
detail: Roma Uomo Green Swing is the fragrance that Laura Biagiotti dedicates to men's active lifestyle.

name: classique-eau-de-parfum-airlines-2020-3
detail: Now boarding  Classique Eau de Parfum Airlines is a fragrance built on a fabric softener; clean and fresh like an impeccable tank top that you slip into - because a tank top is always sexy.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Vanilla', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Narcissus', 'Orchid', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Amber', 'Lemon Zest', 'Mandarin', 'Rum', 'Star Anise', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ginger', 'Papyrus', 'Sandalwood']

name: citron-28-1
detail: This complex composition is dedicated to Seoul  an alpha city  one of the iconic capitals of the world. A city with its own contradictions  rooted in tradition and history yet at the forefront of all that is modern and forward thinking. Opposing forces that only a bohemian citrus can embrace.

name: scandal-gold
detail: Exclusive to the Middle East  Scandal Gold is a love letter from Jean Paul Gaultier to the region  and an olfactory interpretation of the captivating spirit  mystery  and charm of the lands.

name: scandal-noel-collector-2020
detail: Turn over Scandal's collector's edition snow globe: beneath the glitter appears the iconic flask  dressed in a gradient metallic red. Scandal is an overdose of fun  a unique kind of women's perfume. An addiction that is so Jean Paul Gaultier!

name: rose-milano-soie-de-nacre
detail: Rose Milano Soie de Nacre is a unique edition of the original couture fragrance imagined by Giorgio Armani as a tribute to Milan  a city that is more than an emblem of fashion  it is the home of Giorgio Armani's fashion. Through this signature fragrance  he wanted to encapsulate his vision of Milanese elegance  at once raw and refined.

name: k-by-dolce-gabbana-eau-de-parfum
detail: K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum  offers an intimate glimpse into the heart of a modern King. Intense  magnetic  and sensual  the Eau de Parfum now unveils the full depths of his passions. Balancing strength with a heart that is always kind  he proves that he was born not only to wear his crown but also to truly own it.

name: leau-dissey-pour-homme-au-fil-de-leau-2022-1
detail: Issey Miyake takes us on a summery journey in 2022. An invitation to follow the flow of water away from the daily grind defies every imaginable cliché: the concept combines the most cherished Mediterranean memories of Dora Baghriche  Daphné Bugey  and Marie Salamagne. Using the exquisite corpse method  each perfumer worked after the other to create a completely unique fragrance  the fruit of their combined emotions. To visually illustrate these fragrant emotions  French artist Kevin Lucbert drew the main steps of the journey using his faithful ballpoint pen  his artist’s instrument of choice which he uses incredibly poetically.

name: so-scandal
detail: She walked past me without even a second glance. A storm in just a tuxedo jacket  and her bare legs. Like an endless compass that one would follow to the end of the world.  So sexy. As she strolled by  I saw them all stop mid-sentence. A shock in slow motion. So scandal-ised!

name: loubidoo-rose-2023
detail: Fall under the spell of a rare and precious revival of Loubidoo with Loubidoo Rose. Faceted by master perfumer Daphné Bugey  this scent was inspired by a three-dimensional expression of a rose  then brought to life via the expert extractions of a centifolia rose absolute  a centifolia rose infusion sourced from the region of Grasse and an otto rose essence.This intoxicating trio bursts forth from the fragrance’s rose heart accompanied by head notes of cedar and base notes of musk that draw out the flower’s true character and reveal all the sensual secrets between its petals.

name: flowerbykenzo-poppy-bouquet-eau-de-toilette-2022-1
detail: With Poppy Bouquet Eau de Toilette  Kenzo Parfums explores flowers from every angle. This unique chapter takes us into a bucolic universe inspired by a morning stroll in a Japanese flower market. A natural floral addiction to let bloom on the skin.

name: mon-paris-dress-me-wild-2020-1
detail: Unleash your beauty instinct. Dress wild. Be wild. Go out and party. You are party animals. Like love at first sight  Mon Paris Dress Me Wild envelops the senses  intoxicates and bewitches. Isn't it time you got high on love?

name: imperiale-iris-malika
detail: Iris Malika is a tribute to powerful women  to those who take charge of their destiny. It is an essence worthy of a queen.
ingredients: ['Iris / Orris', 'Boysenberry', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Rose Damascena', 'Jasmine (Grandiflorum)', 'Ylang-ylang (Madagascar)', 'Bergamot', 'Cinnamon', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Pink Pepper', 'Raspberry', 'Benzoin (Siam)', 'Styrax', 'Woody Notes', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Vetiver (Haiti)']

name: 212-heroes-for-her
detail: Alluring  magnetic  relentless  and forever unforgettable.

name: charnelle
detail: This fragrance captures sensual moments experienced through small  mundane acts: the touch of lovers' hands  the thrill of a caress  when time stands still.

name: oud-gardenia
detail: Oud is reputed to be one of the most expensive types of wood in the world. Combined with Gardenia and Saffron this exquisite scent also features a white floral complex in the heart and sensual  smoky base notes.

name: faux-semblant
detail: Faux Semblant is elusive. It oscillates constantly between dusk and dawn  between the gloom of a corridor and the sumptuously lit halls of the Hôtel Particulier. He slips  dodges  hides. He constantly plays with appearances. Its complex personality is expressed in a fragrance created in chiaroscuro where orange blossom  wrapped in woody essences  reveals surprising facets. This is how we discover that this supposedly innocent flower keeps its cards close to its chest.

name: mon-paris-lumiere-1
detail: Mon Paris Lumière is as hopeful as the first light of day. As joyful as that first  blissful kiss. As exhilarating as that moment when you want to cry out "Mon Paris  je t'aime !" from the top of the Eiffel Tower.

name: vanille-malika-imperiale
detail: Vanille Malika is the fragrance of an elegant woman of sovereign and eternal beauty.

name: mon-paris-intensement
detail: Mon Paris Intensément is an intense perfume dedicated to the passionate and sensual woman. This perfume is a powerful declaration of love  and as grand as the Eiffel Tower  Mon Paris je t'aime!

name: flowerbykenzo-poppy-bouquet
detail: FlowerByKenzo Poppy Bouquet Eau de Parfum celebrates a contagious energy and the power to make the world more beautiful.

name: gardenia-antigua-1
detail: A superb celebration  Gardénia Antigua is infused with a pure  intense and sophisticated light echoing Giorgio Armani's haven of peace  Antigua Island.

name: blue-seduction-wave-for-men-2022-1
detail: A fragrance that challenges the senses and envelops you in a halo of seduction.

name: mon-paris-sparkling-love-collector-edition-2020
detail: Discover the dazzling limited edition version of the classic Mon Paris Eau de Parfum with a sparkling bottle symbolising the majestic glow of the Eiffel Tower along with a bold new asymmetrically shaped lavaliere in the classic Saint Laurent Couture style making it the most spectacular collector's item to date and a perfect gift of love.

name: fame-parfum
detail: More seductive. More glamorous. More iconic than ever before  Fame Parfum is a powerful scent with an unforgettable Parisian twist. Inspired by a magnetic night in Paris  the city of mysterious seduction  she rules the darkness and answers a night call to entice all those who dare. Blending effortless Parisian style with effervescent confidence  the Fame Parfum woman reveals a fantastical facet of attraction to capture the spotlight once again. Enveloped in the fragrance of sensuality  she leads the way for a confident femininity and ignites irrepressible desire. She’s a star. She’s irresistible. She’s Fame.

name: victorinox-forget-me-not
detail: A scent of self-love  an olfactory union of the ethereal with the expressive. This fresh floral takes inspiration from the unapologetic  raw and yet fragile beauty of Swiss nature; a free-spirited fragrance that evokes joy and self-confidence.

name: starfruit-white-flowers-1
detail: The blossoming scent of Starfruit & White Flowers will lend its wearer positive energy. It is all about natural beauty  radiating like the sun  inside and out.

name: coach-green
detail: Coach Green is inspired by the relaxing feeling of vivid green escapes amidst the dynamic energy of the city. This signature scent offers the perfect balance between a lively urban spirit and a natural  out-of-time feeling.

name: black-opium-over-red
detail: Black Opium Over Red takes the iconic original scent into ultra sensorial overload with a decadent  juicy red cherry accord over black coffee and white jasmine. Indulgent. Thrilling. Multisensory. Over red. Over senses.

name: jimmy-choo-blossom-special-edition-2022-1
detail: Jimmy Choo Blossom Special Edition 2022 celebrates self-confidence and the joys of springtime.

name: osmanthus-blossom-2023
detail: A new season sweeps through the city while tiny white flowers collect in clusters on bushy evergreens  filling the air with a joyful scent: Osmanthus Blossom.

name: noir-by-night
detail: Night by Noir is a juxtaposition of textures and flavours that offers a unique experience between freedom and sensuality. The fragrance brings confidence and elegance to the fore with a bold expression of silken caviar and rich woods.

name: valentino-donna-born-in-roma-pink-pp-2023
detail: A dazzling fragrance inspired by Valentino's Pink PP colour  born from the fusion of vibrant Madagascar Bourbon vanilla and a magnificent orange blossom accord.

name: leau-dissey-pour-homme-vetiver
detail: An echo to nature revisited by the encounter of vetiver with water.

name: boss-alive-parfum
detail: In celebration of the power and positive energy of the Boss woman  this uplifting fragrance invites you to live like a Boss by doing whatever makes you feel Alive.

name: alien-goddess-supra-florale
detail: Alien Goddess Supra Florale turns the signature solar jasmine of the original scent into a monumental  otherworldly supra flower. Shapeshifting  fascinating  the new bloom is the symbol of the augmented femininity embodied by Alien Goddess. The future of florality  infused in a daring and avant-garde eau de parfum. More than a scent  this fragrance transforms into a supra-sensorial experience. Let it bloom.

name: jimmy-choo-blossom-special-edition-2023-1
detail: Jimmy Choo Blossom is back in 2023 with a unique  limited-edition bottle of its celebrated scent. Embodying a joyful and effervescent atmosphere  this floral  fruity and woody fragrance owes its success to its addictive and sensual trail.

name: leau-dissey-pivoine
detail: L’Eau d’Issey Pivoine celebrates nature in all its beauty  starting with water  of course  but also ushering in lush  vibrant florals.

name: rose-blush-2022-1
detail: Delicate rose petals suspended in a delectable jelly. The charm of these blushing pink petals inspires a prized preserve  prepared for the great British summer fete. Vibrant basil and a juicy note of lychee add a modern twist to this soft floral scent  cocooned in the embrace of white musk.

name: pink-me-up
detail: Experience uplifting emotions with the radiating glow of happiness  joie de vivre and frivolity. Pink Me Up is like a joyous bubble of pleasure  swirling in a crystal glass  symbolising the pleasures of life.

name: alien-goddess-intense-1
detail: A magnetic signature  Alien Goddess Intense carries an unprecedented positive energy. The extraordinary olfactory manifesto reveals a generous nature coupled with an inner radiance  instantly transporting us to a world bathed in solarity and benevolence. This energy has never been so intense. It is extraordinary  in a bottle.

name: rose-blush-2024
detail: Delicate rose petals suspended in a delectable jelly. The charm of these blushing pink petals inspires a prised preserve.

name: riviera-sunrise
detail: Riviera Sunrise revels in the golden light of the Mediterranean sun. The scent expresses an atmosphere that oscillates between the meditative morning calm and bursts of radiant solar energy. A unique fragrance with an orange  golden glow kissed by childhood memories.

name: rose-saltifolia
detail: A walk by the sea  through a field of roses exposed to the salty sea air  Rose Saltifolia is a crystalline perfume. Sparkling  spicy  slightly fruity. Floral  luminous  pure. Silky  enveloping.

name: musc-rose-1
detail: A captivating and sensual blend of rose  patchouli and candied fruit  all wrapped in a rich musky character.

name: eau-parfumee-souffle-apaisant-rose-1
detail: Eau Parfumée Souffle Apaisant Rose is a gentle fragrance like relaxing ecstasy  especially for those desired moments of tranquillity and a sense of relaxation and well-being.

name: rose-cruise-3
detail:
Rose Cruise is a classic heritage scent with mandarin and blackcurrant  followed by a trio of roses for a natural sensuality. Centifolia rose  the most elegant variety grown in Grasse  fuses with damask rose  which adds a touch of freshness. Bulgarian rose completes the accord  enveloping all the nuances.
Rose Cruise is a refined  floral and elegant fragrance that will evoke moments of pleasure in your life. You will feel as if you are sailing in a floral breeze  enjoying the freedom of the open sea. Rose Cruise recaptures the memories of Carolina A. Herrera and evokes the pleasure of sailing without a destination.

name: lamour-rose-saint-tropez
detail: L'Amour Rose Saint-Tropez is an ode to love and magic  celebrating the essence of the dreamy paradise for which it was named.

name: eau-parfumee-souffle-vivifiant-rose-1
detail: Eau Parfumée Souffle Vivifiant Rose with a hint of rose water to create a burst of energy and vitality.

name: rose-cardamome
detail: This fragrance reveals the aphrodisiac powers of the Cardamom from Guatemala. It prolongs the journey into a heart of a thousand fresh  fruity  gourmet  and suave petals of the Grasse Centifolia rose. Intensely luxurious  this is the fragrance of sun-kissed skins.

name: cafe-rose-in-black
detail: Enchanted rose  dark coffee  wild charm. The combination is like a rose blooming in the dark  a forbidden flower.

name: miss-dior-rose-essence-1
detail: Women  flowers  water. The roses are in bloom. We pick them and we talk to them. We distil them and love them. The still is ready  the movements sure. Drop by drop  the rose water is filtered. Wonderfully scented  beneficial  sweet. Spring on the skin. It is the lovely month of May. The time of beloved roses  soon to be enjoyed to the last drop.

name: rose-aria-1
detail: “I have always adored the delicate scent of a garden rose  the indelible beauty of its scent infused with subtle hues of green and fresh air. One of nature’s greatest gifts ” James Heeley.

name: carnal-rose
detail: Carnal Rose reveals a singular facet of your personality  the passionate and seductive one.

name: rosewater-1
detail: The romantic and enchanting fragrance of Rosa centifolia  the hundred-petal rose  has inspired perfumers throughout the centuries. Our eau de toilette pays homage to this captivating ingredient with an enticing blend.

name: r-rose-1
detail: This fresh rose fragrance is an olfactory ode to Rrose Sélavy (a play on "Eros  C'est la Vie")  the female alter ego of writer  artist and provocateur Marcel Duchamp  and is as playful as his muse.

name: roses-on-ice-1
detail: Kilian Hennessy wanted to recreate the "Gin on the Rocks" tasting with a splash of lime  his wife's favourite drink. Roses on Ice is perfect for the after party  when the mood is serene and the extravaganza fills the room.

name: rose-poivree
detail: "I am a contrast without equal. I am a sillage in majesty  my flower is the queen of perfumery. Mellow  warm  fresh  its many facets make it inexhaustible. Its spicy notes stand out here. We fall in love with me for my honesty  we love me for my balance. I am for women and men  my rose has no gender. Devilishly voluptuous  I am a monument of perfumery. I am Rose Poivrée " Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer.

name: eau-parfumee-souffle-euphorisant-rose
detail: The sudden desire to laugh. For a joyful and spontaneous moment  discover Eau Parfumée Souffle Euphorisant Rose  ideal for encouraging a good mood!

name: new-look
detail: "More than a legacy  more than a silhouette  the New Look is a state of mind  a way of viewing and reinterpreting the world " Francis Kurkdjian  Perfume Creative Director.

name: for-her-christmas-2022
detail: Be ready to shine for Christmas! The iconic black bottle gets a radiant makeover with the colour of Christmas: gold. An enveloping fragrance in an exquisite bottle to offer as the perfect gift.

name: cologne-blanche-2022-1
detail: A great perfume House possesses its own singular  signature Cologne  as polished as this exercise in style should be. Francis Kurkdjian created Cologne Blanche  graced with a princely allure and worthy of a Versailles salon. A daytime version that still retains the finery of flawless elegance.

name: clary-sage-1
detail: Inspired by the Sussex countryside and its fields of clary sage. The heady scent of an aromatic plant amidst a vast pastoral landscape.

724 translates the vibrant energy of New York into a perfume. Previously called 754 and available only at Bergdorf Goodman department store  this elegant  contemporary and comfortable creation is now available worldwide.

name: miss-dior-blooming-bouquet-2023
detail: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet is an immediate pleasure  a declaration of love for life that takes hold of you. It is an emotion that embraces the senses without waiting and reminds us that Miss Dior has the soul of a passionate woman. A spontaneous and surprising bouquet with a lively and tender character  flowers  flowers and more flowers!

name: narciso-rodriguez-for-her-pink-edition-2021
detail: To celebrate Christmas  the original Eau de Toilette for Her is adorned with the brand's iconic pink. Born of simplicity and essentiality. Guided by femininity and elegance.

name: le-male-xmas-collector-2022-1
detail: Edgy and masculine  this fragrance is seductively perfect and utterly evocative.

name: leau-qui-enlace
detail: L'eau qui enlace  is a free and sentimental interpretation of the linden tree at its apogee when its scent fills the air with its honeyed notes and bees buzz with joy in its branches! A joyful enchanting fragrance which evokes memories and shines with its gentle intimacy.

name: le-male-pride-collector-2020-2
detail: He's a sailor and a sex symbol  on land and at sea. Le Male  who has always thrown conventions overboard  is this year hosting the party flag and making some waves. More than ever he's loving the dance. We are all a celebration  a love party  a one-world nation.

name: miss-dior-blooming-bouquet-roller-pearl-2023
detail: A bouquet of delicate Peony and Rose notes honed by the freshness of Calabrian Bergamot and adorned with a lacework of White Musks. This floral bouquet pays homage to Christian Dior's legendary passion for flowers.

name: aqua-universalis-cologne-forte-1
detail: Aqua Universalis Cologne Forte embodies the joy of whiteness  radiance  the purity of a breath of fresh  enveloping air.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Bergamot', 'Freesia', 'Mock Orange', 'Sweet Pea', 'Rose Damascena']

name: lhomme-a-la-rose-1
detail: "With this fresh and luminous Eau de Parfum  today I give men the power to wear a rose. L'Homme À La Rose is my free interpretation of a rose for men " Francis Kurkdjian  Perfumer.

name: elie-saab-le-parfum-lumiere-1
detail:
Dawn. The time when night meets day  when a ray of light softly glides across the darkness and reveals the golden hues of daybreak. A magical hour  cool and still veiled in silence  when the scents of nature can be 
detected crystal clear. Elie Saab Parfum Lumière captures the sensual sparkle of light.

name: aqua-media-cologne-forte
detail: Evoking both water and light  green is the middle colour of the rainbow prism and reflects balance in motion. It is embodied in the vibrant freshness of Aqua Media Cologne Forte.

name: aqua-celestia-cologne-forte-1
detail: Aqua Celestia Cologne Forte releases a bright  crystal-clear aura and offers a flight towards the horizon.

name: fleur-de-figuier-2021-1
detail: An invitation to a gourmand nap in the Mediterranean.

name: le-male-xmas-collector-2021-1
detail: Bold and masculine  this fragrance is seductively perfect and totally evocative.

name: eau-noire-2022
detail: Composed by Francis Kurkdjian  Eau Noire  as stylish as a nocturnal silhouette  sees its original brilliance fully restored. For a suggestive  chic effect and a long-term impression that is mysterious and intense.

name: gaultier-2023-1
detail: After a long absence  Gaultier²  the non-conformist fragrance launched in 2005 by Jean Paul Gaultier is back. It once again throws off the shackles of convention to celebrate the alchemy of gender with a juice that is true to itself and as magnetic as ever. Endless pleasure to the power of 2.

name: fleur-de-figuier-edition-or-2020-1
detail: Conceived during a trip to a Mediterranean garden in the Estérel region  the fresh and fragrant fig blossom gives off sensations of lightness and gluttony.

name: le-male-christmas-collector-2020
detail: Edgy and masculine  this fragrance is seductively perfect and utterly evocative.

name: rose-barbare-2021
detail: "The rose forms a cherished part of our Guerlinade. Rose Barbare celebrates the flower for what it is  beautiful  rebellious  almost wild  Thierry Wasser  Perfumer.

name: dioriviera
detail: This eau de parfum composed by Francis Kurkdjian combines two concepts in one name: the south of France  his source of inspiration  and Paris  the city where Dioriviera was created. A fragrance that conveys the love story between Christian Dior and the French Riviera  and draws inspiration from its solar beauty.

name: jasmin-bergamote-7
detail: Jasmin & Bergamote captures the beauty of a flower as it blooms in the morning light. This sensual and sparkling scent is a tribute to the jasmine flower.

name: danger-parfum-pour-femme-1
detail: "Loaded with powerful aphrodisiacs  this creation is not dangerous for the woman who wears it  but for the man who smells it". - ROJA DOVE.

name: britannia-parfum-1
detail: “I wanted to create a very self-assured scent; something that feels familiar yet also unexpected. That sense of quality you can't quite put your finger on  as I believe that is what the British are like.” - Roja Dove

name: jasmin-secret
detail: A true jewel of perfumery  jasmine is a symbol of the Grasse region. Jasmine remains today an eternal symbol of feminine beauty. Flower of mystery  it embodies sensuality  delicacy and elegance .

name: canyon-dreams
detail: Inspired by the canyons of California; a contrast between the freshness at the top of the canyon and the darkness from below  resulting in a fragrance that is both light and dark. A perfectly hedonistic perfume.

name: clair-obscur
detail: Clair-Obscur was inspired by a jasmine flower Keiko found in her travel journal. Keiko transports you to a summer morning in Provence and a sun-washed field of Jasmine. The perfection of Jasmine of Grasse encased in the glass waiting for release.

name: jasmin-bonheur-1
detail: A sillage illuminated by the southern light so dear to the painter Henri Matisse  where jasmine exudes an irresistible joie de vivre. A perfect idea of happiness signed Guerlain.

name: herat-1
detail: A magnificent interpretation of Afghan hashish  the black gold of this troubled country torn between war and poetry. A disturbing composition.

name: eugenie
detail: A subtle  yet deeply feminine charm that captures the heart  mind and senses.
ingredients: ['Bergamot', 'Jasmine (Grasse)', 'Ambergris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'White Flowers', 'Magnolia', 'Mandarin', 'Rose', 'Iris (Florentine/Tuscany)', 'Melon', 'Neroli', 'Passion Fruit', 'Oakmoss', 'Peach', 'Sandalwood', 'Vanilla', 'Vetiver', 'Violet Leaves']

name: danger-essence-de-parfum
detail: "Dangerous not only for the wearer  but for the smeller. Remember you have been warned " Roja Dove.

name: rouge-magistral
detail: Rouge Magistral is a thrilling journey to the taste of the forbidden. An insatiable fantasy  the innocence of the cherry here underlines its beautifully flowery heart which finally languishes on robust and poisonous notes. A glamorous and tangy fragrance.

name: jasmin-des-anges
detail: Jasmin des Anges fragrance is a walk through the jasmine fields of Grasse  where the scent of the flower fills the air. This fragrance has its roots in the South of France and echoes the name of the legendary Baie des Anges in Nice.

name: beautiful-magnolia-1
detail: The lightning bolt moment you saw each other for the first time. The swirl of contradictory feelings  an explosion of passion. A fragrance as fresh as new love itself.

name: magnolia-sensuel-2
detail: "The magnolia is a note  a magnificent flower with large petals that rise up as if they were reaching for the sky. A unique fragrance so special  that one always remembers the first time it has been inhaled. An unforgettable note " Jacques Cavallier  Perfumer.

name: green-tea-lavender
detail: Fresh  relaxed  carefree  everyday  Green Tea Lavender invigorates with renewed optimism through a vision of fragrant  sun-drenched purple fields. A place of peace and harmony.

name: beautiful-magnolia-intense
detail: Capturing a whirlwind of emotions  Beautiful Magnolia Intense brings to life the intensity  romance  and passion of love.

name: latin-lover-1
detail: We bring you that provocative tempting love with Latin Lover  an addictive fragrance full of character  made with love.

name: jadore-parfum-deau
detail: Imbued with floral freshness  J'Adore Parfum d'Eau is the occasion to rediscover J'Adore in a new light. Effusive from its first notes  the bouquet unfurls weightlessly  deliciously fresh yet tenacious. Spontaneous  generous  the scent subtly renews the beauty of J'Adore and reinvents  thanks to its revolutionary formula  the very idea of a perfume that stays close to the skin.

name: beautiful-magnolia-leau
detail: Beautiful Magnoloa L'Eau captures an epic love story from beginning to end  daring you to dream of a lifetime of love. Aglow with happiness  your body and soul become one  letting your heart open like a magnolia in full bloom.

name: full-magnolia
detail: Full Magnolia is a radiant scent that’s an instant classic in the making.

name: happy-magnolia-bouquet
detail: Magnolia Bouquet is a tenderly soothing floral elixir. May this exceptional creation bring you a profusion of positive emotions.

name: looking-glass-1
detail: Dusk on Crosby Street. A break-up. A woman stands alone in an empty apartment. She dances with abandon and is reborn in the joy of the moment.

name: love-deluxe-1
detail: Her lips are a vibrant blush  which matches the satin wallpaper in her downtown loft. She's enveloped herself in flair  drama  excess and her partner's embrace. Hers is a love deluxe.

name: linvitation-au-voyage
detail: Island of Ceylon  in the heat of a tropical mist. The sun sets on a wooden hut in the cinnamon plantations.

name: infini-2018-1
detail: Infini is an ode to modernity  a fragrance of absolutes.

name: pour-un-homme-de-caron-le-matin
detail: “With a surprising duo of lavandin and ginger  I wanted to offer an invigorating contemporary lift to the legendary Pour un Homme de Caron " Jean Jacques  in-house Perfumer.

name: linvisible-qui-luit-1
detail: The fresh scented breeze of an early morning in an old stone house.

name: santal-precieux-1
detail: Santal Précieux is above all a fragrance of essences. Inspired by Caron’s heritage  it features a duo of rare and precious essences that are a favourite of the brand. Luxurious rose absolute encounters an extraordinary sandalwood.

name: vetiver-infini-1
detail: Vétiver Infini is the perfectly harmonious expression of two notes that define Caron’s identity: iris  an ingredient that is more precious than gold  and vetiver. This Vétiver Infini is an authentic fragrance that creates a veritable aura!

name: accord-119
detail: In perfume  as in music  there are themes that never go out of style. Accord 119 brings together in its wake a sumptuous diva  patchouli  and a rising star with irresistible freshness: blackberry. On the skin  it is an unforgettable concert!

name: pour-un-homme-de-caron-parfum
detail:
“With Pour Un Homme de Caron Parfum  I wanted to highlight the iconic signature of Pour Un Homme in a more concentrated version  to create a powerful and assertive lavender-vanilla duo ”
Jean Jacques  Caron's in-House Perfumer.

name: muguet-du-bonheur-2021-1
detail: Muguet du Bonheur is a dazzling perfume that's like springtime in a bottle.

name: tabac-exquis-1
detail: "I wanted to reinvent Caron's iconic tabac by infusing it with the gourmandise of a deliciously modern chocolate accord " Jean Jacques  Caron's in-House Perfumer.

name: poivre-sacre
detail: Poivre Sacré is much more than a fragrance: it’s a show of fireworks!

name: eau-de-rocaille-1
detail: This Eau de Rocaille has a radiantly fresh and delectable fragrance.

name: champ-bleu-du-ciel-1
detail: Cocktails and lemonades by the pool  a sunny day with a jazz song in the air.

name: flor-salvaje-limited-edition-2022-1
detail: A feminine and sensual fragrance with a floral heart of magnolia and lotus flower  enhanced by the citrus top notes of Italian mandarin  yuzu and mango. In the base notes  wood and musk blend with vanilla  highlighting the most seductive side of this fragrance.

name: tabac-blond
detail: Evoking the transgressive atmosphere of the Roaring Twenties  Tabac Blond is a lightly powdery leather scent that is both dark and delicate with an enchanting ambivalence.

name: lheure-vagabonde
detail: A romantic getaway under the Parisian starry sky  along the River Seine.

name: fleur-de-rocaille
detail: Nod to Fleurs de Rocaille  the strength and fragility of women.

name: poivre-imperial
detail: A multifaceted fragrance  Poivre Impérial delicately balances both warm and cool tones. A delicate surprise.

name: ivre-de-liberte-1
detail: A sunny day on the seaside. A deep breath of fresh air. A wholeness moment.

name: naimez-que-moi
detail: A love message in a bottle  the gift from the soldiers to their fiancées before the front  the scented letters.

name: aimez-moi
detail: Love me  the cry of a woman in love. A message in a bottle  a nod to the iconic N’Aimez que Moi.

name: musc-oli-1
detail: Prepare for the unknown. Indulge your emotions without restraint. Draw in a crystalline and powerful energy . Musc Oli is a fascinating exploration  an unusual fragrance that opens the doors to a world that is both singular and familiar: our inner world.

name: rose-croquante-1
detail: A natural composition that glows with a crisp radiance  underlined by a pleasant dose of sass.

name: pour-un-homme-de-caron-le-soir-1
detail: "With Pour un Homme de Caron Le Soir  I wanted to work on a 'nocturnal' lavender by combining it with an essence of oak wood from recycled Cognac barrels. The oak reveals another face of lavender  more sensual  more confidential " Jean Jacques  in-house Perfumer.

name: delire-de-roses-1
detail: A pure folly  Délire de Roses is unapologetically contemporary.

name: raspberry-jam-donut
detail: Let the aroma of a sweet treat take you to the patisserie of your dreams.

name: egeo-hit-1
detail: Egeo Hit is pure fun. An irresistible fragrance full of shine.

name: femme-fatale-pink
detail: The sensuality of this fragrance is explored from the fragrance to its packaging with a mouth-shaped bottle and its pink leather-textured cartridge.

name: replicated-wood
detail: A splash of intense freshness that awakens the body like an infinitely delicious wave.

name: royal-amber-8
detail: No place is out of place. No remark is out of context. Your fragrance announces your arrival  akin to the reputation that precedes you. Walk into a room full of turning heads and approving nods every single time with Royal Amber.

name: her-secret-flame-2023
detail: Your senses sharpen  your skin awakens  your pulse races. Passion dominates each one of your steps. This is not the time to look for explanations  to reason  to ask yourself where the limit is. You are going to play  to test yourself. Exchanging glances. Getting closer. A light touch. It’s your moment  don’t deny yourself anything  don’t retreat. You long to feel the connection  to let yourself go and  burst into a thousand different emotions at once. Something in you has ignited and has begun to burn: Her Secret Flame. A warm  sweet scent with a spicy touch  delving into the most primal and exciting feeling of seduction. The one that emerges from your depths when the attraction is irresistible and desire is activated  the spark that ignites and becomes a flame. Proceed with caution: don't get burned.

name: jacomo-de-jacomo-in-white
detail: Jacomo by Jacomo In White is a vibrant  contrasted scent with a powerful  ardent olfactory imprint that bewitches the senses.

name: dr-botica-pocao-da-forca-1
detail: Full of personality and determination  the children's fragrance inspired girls to be more confident  strong and determined from an early age  of course without missing out on the fun!

name: suna
detail: Suna is inspired by one of the oldest places in Barcelona's Mediterranean: the Gothic Quarter.

name: miraculous-ladybug-1
detail: Feminine and gourmet  this fragrance combines fruity notes with sweetness and perfectly embodies the personality of the courageous Ladybug.

name: sarmadi
detail: Sarmadi is an unparalleled scent  its effect remain in the hearts and minds of those who come into contact with it.

name: insouciance
detail: To coat yourself in the fragrance of carelessness  or joyfulness  is to immerse yourself in nature. Rivières de Cartier symbolise life  its fragrance  the colour of its emotions  yours for the taking.

name: glamour-midnight
detail: Inspired by the mystery of a starry night  Glamour Midnight is a mysterious and enchanting fragrance that awakens new sensations.
ingredients: ['Balsam (Peru)', 'Plum', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Lady Of The Night Flower', 'Almond', 'Amber', 'Benzoin', 'Dates', 'Cocoa', 'Patchouli', 'Hot Milk', 'Hot Spices']

name: jardin-damman
detail: Jardin d'Amman  exuding the freshness of an exotic and tropical garden.

name: stellar-times
detail: A subliminal journey through time  to rediscover the splendor of fairy tale temples  of gardens embroidered with mosaics and marvellous fountains. A major amber scent  completely reinvented in zero gravity. A beautiful escape on the magic carpet of dreams.

name: ambre-precieux-ultime-2014-1
detail: Ambre Précieux Ultime has a woven texture of olfactory notes  sensually enveloping narcotic effect when sprayed onto the skin  lighting it with a thousand feelings.

name: ambre-precieux
detail: Ambre Précieux is an exceptional scent with a unique and timeless trail.

name: velvet-orchid
detail: The top note of the fragrance enhances the velvety and textural aspects  heightening the sense of provocation and caress to an unbearable breaking point. Wild and warm  Velvet Orchid projects the aura and presence of a body lying next to you in the dark.

name: soie-malaquais-2
detail: “I fell in love with Dries’ silk dresses in his Quai Malaquais boutique. The texture was so fluid it merged with the skin  which gave me the idea for a silky  enveloping perfume  a mix of chestnut with sensual vanilla ” Marie Salamagne  Perfumer.

name: osang
detail: "All the elevations of my mind begin in my blood". - Rainer Maria Rilke. A celebration perfumed with saints and superstitions.
ingredients: ['Balsam (Peru)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Amber', 'Fenugreek', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Benzoin', 'Myrrh', 'Animalic Notes', 'Sandalwood', 'Floral Notes', 'Heliotrope', 'Honey', 'Iris / Orris', 'Nutmeg', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Styrax']

name: byzantium
detail: Byzantium envelops the senses and the mind  to give rise to an enchanting and multifaceted essence like a precious Byzantine mosaic.

name: panama-amaryllis
detail: A romantic heart that beats around Queen Amaryllis is enhanced by heady Jasmine and intense Magnolia with unexpectedly warm Incense undertones.

name: douceur-vanillee
detail: Comforting  solar  and addictive  the unbeatable Vanilla is worked in all its facets for a resolutely feminine  soft  and sophisticated fragrance. Vanilla envelops us in softness for a most comforting effect.

name: taif-roses-1
detail: A truly majestic scent created with the most luxurious  precious flowers. This is a scent that will leave an intoxicating trail.

name: fortnum-mason-taif-aoud
detail: The fragrance is constructed around the rose  the emblem of England  as a nod to the regal approval of the Fortnum & Mason store since its opening in 1707.

name: art-07-rosa-del-deserto-1
detail: On one of my several visits to Saudi Arabia  during the beautiful spring month of April  I had the great good fortune to visit one of the oldest cities in the world  Taif  in the Al Hadi Mountains  2 000 metres above sea level and overlooking the Holy City of Mecca. It was just as the roses were being harvested. Many small local farmers grow the Ward Taifi rose  which led to the region once being named the Rose of Arabia. It was an amazing experience and I have a wonderful photo of me immersed in Taifi rose petals. "Desert Rose" is my tribute to the Taifi rose and my memories of an unforgettable morning with the queen of all flowers.

name: the-black-rose-1
detail: "On a recent trip to Taïf  I discovered the incredible fragrance of its rose. With its combination of freshness and enticing energy  it is a true pleasure for the senses that one also experiences when looking at a desert oasis." - Pierre-Constantin Guéros  Perfumer

name: moonlight-rose
detail: “The idea behind the creation of this fragrance was to pay homage to an extraordinary rose  the precious Taif rose  which has a fragrance like no other ” Fabrice Pellegrin  Perfumer.

name: taif-extreme-1
detail: A dusk delight. Ta'if Extrême holds an opulent composition that makes a bold entrance and is confident enough to sweep everyone else to one side a real belle of the ball.

name: rose-de-taif-1
detail: Rose de Taif is an explosion of blooming roses that will hypnotise your senses.

name: rose-pompon-eau-de-parfum
detail: Imagine yourself in a rose garden. Intensely floral and fruity  delicately gourmand and round or even sparkling  this 1 000-petal rose plays tricks on us and keeps telling us not to trust appearances. Pompon Rose  a cheeky fragrance? Oh yes  and what a hymn to joy!

name: noorolain-taif
detail: Inspired by the Noor-ol-Ain diamond in the tiara worn at the wedding of the Iranian Empress Farah Pahlavi to Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi in 1958.

name: aabir
detail: A path paved in blue heads towards the royal palace. The darkness takes on his scent  reflecting his veiled  elegant steps. The young prince strolls distractedly among the water fountains. Suddenly he senses a vibration floating in the air  a mixture of Taif rose and saffron that he has never smelled before  it is Aabir  Arabic for "good smell".

name: taif-intensivo
detail: Few flowers can survive and thrive on a dusty hilltop in scorching 45° temperatures  but the Ta'if rose. Ta'if Intensive is made to withstand extreme heat  with its elegance and composition intact.

name: babe-oud
detail: If you're feeling exotic  Babe Oud has the richness of the middle eastern aromas.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Rose (Taif)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Jasmine', 'Patchouli', 'Saffron', 'Black Pepper', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Neroli', 'Orange', 'Pink Pepper', 'Red Berries', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vetiver']

name: palace-oud
detail: A royal and precious fragrance. In the empires along the Spice Route  which stretches from Asia through the Middle East to Europe  palaces have been filled with fragrances  an integral part of royal celebrations  worship  scented gardens and interiors  and daily rituals for thousands of years.

name: arabian-rose
detail: Working in the offices of the architect  or the desire to escape.

name: rose-gold-1
detail: Ormonde Jayne presents Rose Gold  a vigorously assertive rose perfume  more baroque than a traditional floral. Enchanting and sumptuous  Rose gold will stand out at any gathering  transforming you from ordinary to extraordinary. A tenacious fragrance that carries a warning: beware of dangerous relationships.

name: eifer

name: artig

Spellbound A name for a perfume that has a touch of magic in every note. If you are one of those who believe that certain fragrances have an enchanting "something" about them  you may be absolutely right. A mysterious  seductive quality.

name: narciso
detail: Designed to recreate the magical alchemy between the finest natural ingredients  this  combined with ethereal vibrations that are capable of bringing out precious exotic ingredients in warm and sensual tones along with strong and purposeful chords to create harmonious  elegant and highly refined blends to interpret and enhance the preciousness as part of the Colourfull Collection.

name: jr-j-ai-l-air-de-ce-que-je-suis-1
detail: J.R. delivers on its promise of a delicate yet serene relationship. Restful  not restive  for a change.

name: 1926-turandot-opera-collection
detail: Like Princess Turandot  this irresistible and mysterious perfume airs elegance with its floral bouquet ruled by carnations and then succumbs to its more powerful and sensual amber nature.

name: narcisse
detail: A fragrance as light as air  full of idyllic beauty and extremely romantic.

name: rare-flowers-solar-narcissus

name: eau-de-narcisse-bleu-1

name: chaldee-2013

Feminine emancipation began as restrictive corsets and bras were cast aside and daring swimming costumes made their controversial appearance on the beach. Today  Chaldée is a fragrance that evokes the opulence of La Belle Epoque and an era of freedom and change.

name: white-diamonds-lustre
detail: Elizabeth Taylor glowed. Her radiance captivated  her beauty enthralled and her impact on the world is timeless. Lustre evokes this lifestyle - an aspirational dream that sparkles with the energy of youth  the beauty of a strong personality  and the mystery of what might come next for those brave enough to dream and live  big.

name: oud-nejma-5
detail: The fifth daughter of Nejma  Five offers a fruity head not  a fresh and bubbly alliance of citrus combined with velvety and suave influences of fruit and berries. Its heart unites a sumptuous floral harmony of essences of fragrant flowers and a more discreet note provided by the magic of a delicious woody blend enriched with amber and a touch of spice.

name: peur-de-rien
detail: Peur de Rien echoes Hubert de Givenchy's most daring creations. "I felt like someone jumping off the top of a mountain  I was clearly oblivious but I believed in this project and nothing  could put me off." - Hubert de Givenchy

name: wild-geranium-1

name: central-park-west

He told me that the fragrance should be 'high-powered' to reflect the magnificent architecture of that neighbourhood  and the result is exquisite " Laurent Le Guernec  Perfumer.

name: sculpture-voyage-en-orient

name: macomba-1

name: savane-di-seta-1

name: iberian-leather

name: fleur-de-the

name: oceani-di-seta-1

name: lavender-mist

The ideal fragrance for women who like to be natural. They are poetic and dreamy  yet active and anchored in their effervescent everyday life.

name: ch-men-hot-hot-hot-2022-1

name: karl-hamburg-alster-1

The original pink and pearly shades of the bottle match wonderfully with Smiley’s aura. Enjoy the scent of happiness!

name: a-rose-for

name: vetiver-root-green-tea-cedarwood-1

name: green-tea-nectarine-blossom-1
detail: Known for its velvety aroma and delightful taste  the nectarine is the perfect comfort for a warm summer evening. Against a backdrop of fleeting sunlight  animated laughter  and clinking glasses  nectarines emanate endless summer days. Just like the memory of eternal summer  the nectarine is known to symbolize never-ending friendship.

name: eau-fraiche-the-vert

name: mandarin-tea
detail: Inspired by the intricate décor  rich colours  infusion of local flora and cultural mysteries of the Silk Road  renowned master perfumer Carlos Benaim has created a collection for Shanghai Tang that captivates all the senses. The collection pays homage to the grandeur of Chinese culture through the many facets and mystical essence of its unique scents.

name: green-tea-fig-1
detail: "Just like some Japanese rituals include adding just a tad of sugar plum puree to the inside of a teacup  I imagined nibbling on juicy  nectar-filled figs while savouring a warm  fragrant cup of tea; all of it happening under the enveloping branches of a fig tree!" Rodrigo Flores-Roux  Master Perfumer.

name: vera-wang-embrace-green-tea-pear-blossom-1
detail: Inspired by the simplicity of its ingredients  Vera Wang Embrace : Green Tea and Pear Blossom is a modern fresh floral  that opens  into a radiant heart. At the base  fresh comfort is felt as they mingle  for a confident finish.

name: blue-tea-1

name: green-tea-summer-2005

name: black-tea-1
detail: Our Eaux de Toilette range contains natural beetroot alcohol and a "pinch" of synthetic molecules to offer a selection of fragrances as wide as that of traditional perfumers  but whose composition is as natural as possible.

name: mandarin-green-tea
detail: The intensity of the light  the warmth of the sun  and the vital energy released by the aromas of the Mediterranean citrus. A fresh and tangy fragrance that celebrates the bright encounter between Green Tea and the essential oils of Orange  Grapefruit  Mandarin  and Bergamot.

name: green-tea-5
detail: From a lush  green world of freshness comes Elizabeth Arden Green Tea  the fragrance that energises the body  excites the senses and invigorates the spirit.

name: 1902-the-vert-1
detail: "A sparkling and very fresh start that gradually mellows through the light botanical notes of green tea"  Cedric Alfenore  Perfumer.

name: carbon-reign-2
detail: Inspired by the glow of victory after an intense race  celebrated by the whole team who made winning possible.

detail: Aire Evolution is the ideal fragrance for young  modern and connected men. The fragrance expresses the satisfaction of living free.

name: between-two-trees
detail: El búho observa el crepúsculo between two trees.

name: midnight-cologne-1
detail: A smooth blend of cool spices  aromatic woods  and sensual base notes.

name: my-shadow-on-the-wall
detail: Pálida luna de verano. Oh silencio. My Shadow On The Wall.

name: un-poivre-1
detail: Un Poivre is a disarmingly chic fragrance.

name: uno-1
detail: A fragrance designed for the authentic man  who faithfully believes in his original essence and leaves his mark on everything he does.

name: kalos-tech-1
detail: Kalos Tech is Esika's first male perfume created with artificial intelligence. For men who see beyond obstacles and break the limits of reality.

name: explorer-deep

name: ow-c-est-toujours-agreable-d-etre-attendu
detail: This scent is a love story with twists and turns  one should never underestimate the irresistible appeal of playing hard to get.

name: besos
detail: A come-hither kiss  sensual and deep that leaves you wanting more. Besos has an air of romance with a robust sprinkling of lust.

name: violet-shot
detail: Elegant and woody  violet shows off all its facets in Violet Shot.

name: be-mine
detail: Discover this floral leather fragrance: a true concentration of ecstasy with a lingering sensual scent.

name: 300-kmh-supersonic-1
detail: The future is supersonic. Speed ​​breaks down sound barriers. Where would you go if you could get there in half the time? Go beyond your limits. Fly and make your mark with this intense and lasting fragrance.

name: noir-eau-de-parfum
detail: "Noir is enigmatic  complex and surprising. Its spicy notes are soft and extraordinarily sophisticated; it juxtaposes a grand and feminine rose with a fresh and extremely precious lily. Then  the oriental warmth draws you closer in an almost addictive way. Noir is perhaps my most personal fragrance to date " Tom Ford.

name: cologne-cedrat
detail: A long-lasting citrus with a facet of fresh tea and spice.

name: be-exceptional-gold-1
detail: Be Exceptional Gold  is an irresistible scent that will appeal to the discerning gentleman accustomed to luxury and sophistication.

name: d600
detail: A fragrance that captures the urban lifestyle and Mediterranean spirit of Barcelona; a vibrant spicy scent with a touch of mystery.

name: chypre-shot
detail: Dark and original  Chypre Shot is a chypre with a very strong  undiluted character. Its grumpy  masculine personality takes on a casual floral touch in the form of peony  which gives the scent a spicy  almost rubbery dimension...

name: spice-blend
detail: "Although I don't remember the scent of the famous Bay Rhum aftershave  I do remember a bottle in my father's medicine cabinet that piqued my curiosity. Spice Blend is the olfactory translation of an exotic image that emerges from my childhood. Like a gust of wind  Spice Blend leaves us wondering whether it fuels the fire or cools it"  François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: santal-wood-1
detail: This sophisticated cologne is an olfactory ode to nature in three stages. Crisp marine and berry notes give way to a warm woody heart before landing on a fresh  woody base of oakmoss.

name: infinite
detail: This composition offers a fragrance experience characteristic of the new generation with a modern  exciting  alluring appeal. The fragrance embodies a desire for a genuine freedom and individuality. It will appeal to men who are on a journey of self discovery while giving its wearer a sense of youthful  modern elegance and power.

name: coach-blue-1
detail: Coach Blue is inspired by journeys that start and end in New York City. Fresh and full of energetic contrasts  it evokes the free-spirited attitude of Coach.

name: ikat-bleu-2020
detail: Created in homage to the ancient Indonesian dyeing technique of ikat  Ikat Bleu epitomises Giorgio Armani’s haute couture philosophy.

name: 212-vip-men-black-i-ny-2023
detail: Carolina Herrera celebrates the energy of the world's most vibrant city with 212 VIP Rosé I Love NY. Who doesn't love New York? Carolina Herrera loves it. The legendary brand was born in the Big Apple  and has been deeply rooted in it ever since. "That was my first fragrance project  and I was trying to capture the free  creative and uncomplicated spirit of New York's youth " explains Carolina A. Herrera  Creative Director of I Love NY. Herrera  Creative Director of Carolina Herrera fragrances. In 2023  the brand pays homage to an enduring symbol of the city that never sleeps: the I Love New York logo  created by Milton Glaser in 1977  with a unique version of the iconic men's fragrance from the 212 collection. 212 VIP Black I Love NY offers a variation on Carolina Herrera's most nocturnal and rebellious men's fragrance  like the shot of espresso needed to keep up with the city that never sleeps.

name: lhomme-eau-de-parfum-2
detail: It's a scent as sophisticated as the coolest neo-retro cocktail. A warm  intense and desirable blend that will make you fall in love with L'Homme all over again.

name: la-nuit-de-lhomme-bleu-electrique-1
detail: Don't I know you? More than a question  it's the shock of instant recognition. An electryfing sense of déjà-vu. Like catching a scent that's strangely familiar  but just as striking.

name: 702-encens-lavande-bois-de-cachemire
detail: Can you smell those delicious sweet aromas? For us  gluttony is not a bad thing - quite the opposite!

name: capeline
detail: "It was the sensual and sophisticated duality of the lily that inspired this fragrance. With accents of black vanilla pods  I wanted to evoke the elegance of the Parisian woman  who hides under her lofty beauty  a mysterious sensuality." - Juliette Karagueuzoglou  Perfumer

name: lhomme-yves-saint-laurent-le-parfum
detail: The perfumers were responsible for the composition of this woody  powerful and sophisticated signature.

name: sport-n-10-libertad-extrema
detail: Feel the thrill of the open road with Libertad Extrema. Enjoy its refreshing citrus accords and luminous black pepper in the top notes. In the vibrant heart  licorice blends with aromatic herbs to provide the masculine character of the fragrance. A dark background of wood and vanilla contrasts with the heart notes to give the perfume its full personality. An extraordinary scent that feels like the extreme freedom of a motorcycle trip.

name: a-balm-of-calm
detail: Be advised  you may find your problems vanish. As if by some mysterious conflagration of the planets  suddenly the impossible seems unimportant  the most terrible seems inconsequential  and the dramatically disastrous  insignificant. Breathe in. Breathe out. It’s time for a spray of serenity delivered in a cloud of peace-of-mind. Lavender  an instant serenity remedy. Float in a cloud of geranium  rum and soft woods for instant peace-of-mind. Breathe in a dose of composure with Penhaligon’s tranquility blend.

name: queen-of-the-night-7
detail: An opulent scent that takes you back to the time of pharaohs.

name: terror-magnificence-1
detail: Terror a& Magnificence is inspired by the works of architect Nicholas Hawksmore  whose foreboding structures pierce the London landscape. Hawksmore continues to attract interest for his distinctive churches  which introduced elements of Egyptology into traditional ecclesiastical settings.
ingredients: ['Styrax', 'Birch Tar', 'Kyphi Accord', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Myrrh', 'Saffron', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Pebbles', 'Vetiver', 'Papyrus', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Black Pepper']

name: phantom-legion-2022-1
detail: Phantom Legion  the collector's edition. The iconic chrome bottle is adorned with the timeless camouflage pattern. Competition  team spirit and thrills: are you ready to play?

name: 212-vip-men-red-black
detail: VIP Black Red means supporting a charity cause and combating AIDS in Africa. Friendship and collaboration are among the values promoted by 212 VIP.

name: 212-vip-men-wins-2021
detail:
212 VIP Men WINS launches into a new olfactory league with its innovative 100% vegan and cruelty-free formula that respects the planet. Top notes of mandarin and green yuzu give way to lavender and black pepper from Madagascar  Haitian vetiver and base notes and heart notes of tonka bean absolute  for a green and fougère olfactory experience.
Discover 212 VIP Men WINS  a new limited edition vegan fragrance inspired by the energy and excitement of American football.

name: jimmy-choo-urban-hero-gold-edition-2021
detail: Urban Hero Gold Edition is a powerful fragrance with vibrant creativity. Contemporary and determined  it is full of contrasts: dark and bright  elegant and transgressive. A scent at the crossroads between art and life.

name: tuxedo-2022
detail: The most iconic fragrance of Le Vestiaire des Parfums  Tuxedo  gets adorned in an ultra-exclusive jewel bottle for it first collector edition. An encounter between two icons: the tuxedo  and one of the most successful YSL afshion collections: the Mondrian Collection  evoking the artistic and architectural imaginary of Monsieur Saint Laurent. 2000 unique pieces enhanced with geometrical lines create an outstanding pattern made to match Tuxedo’s shape perfectly.

name: colors-man-holo-2020-1
detail: This masculine fragrance is distinguished by the radiant  fruity top notes melting into a refined heart. The finishing touch is provided by the seductive base notes.

name: phantom-parfum
detail: Phantom Parfum is a captivating fragrance created to reveal a darker  more enigmatic facets of masculinity and seduce from the very first moment. Inspired by a dream–like night in Paris  Phantom Parfum encapsulates the man who rules the darkness. Electrifying the jet–black sky with his unbridled passions  he reveals his enigmatic aura as he answers the Phantom night call. Every precious note tells a story. Every drop captures a captivating aura that permeates the night. The result is an exceptional blend crafted to liberate the most magnetic facets of sultry masculinity. More daring. More sensual. More intense. Phantom Parfum envelops you in a unique fragrance experience to reveal the magnetic aura within you.

name: freesia-musk
detail: An enveloping fragrance that gives a moment of security to let yourself blossom.

name: ilia-plena
detail: Ilía Plena invites you to always transform yourself in search of your best version.

name: luna-valentia
detail: Luna Valentia is an invitation for women to liberate themselves and live without the shame of being themselves.
ingredients: ['Moss', 'Jasmine', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Patchouli', 'Blackberry', 'Floral Notes', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Mandarin', 'Pear', 'Pink Pepper', 'Rose', 'Strawberry', 'Amber', 'Musk', 'Priprioca', 'Tonka Bean']

name: desire-blue
detail: Desire Blue defines the search for inner self. It is the fragrance of discovery and balance for the man who seeks it  contemplates it and then consciously chooses to understand it. Always individual  he is masculine without reserve and wise without arrogance. Desire Blue: The scent of peace.

name: just-me-for-men-1
detail: The initial impact is young  sparkling-fresh and full of energy while at the same time deeply sensual and seductive. Momentum is gained in the heart of the fragrance and irresistible drydown defines masculinity.
ingredients: ['Lime', 'Mandarin', 'Sea Breeze', 'Clary Sage', 'Bergamot', 'Blackcurrant', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Lemon Zest', 'Tangerine', 'Amber', 'Clove', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lotus', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Nutmeg', 'Patchouli', 'Reed']

name: pink-paradise
detail: "I conceived Pink Paradise in a flight of poetry. I wanted to find a new way of expressing mineral and woody notes. To make them limpid  yet as downy as a cloud. To me  this fragrance evokes a strong  cheerful  kind personality." - Ane Ayo  perfumer.

name: via-veneto-15
detail: Via Veneto is a lively olfactory expression full of euphoric energy that celebrates the dolce vita.

name: verge
detail: Verge paints the picture of a classy  outdoorsy day with an element of distinctiveness.

name: cedrat-ceruse-1
detail: “The realisation of a childhood dream: to create a new vegetable facet. Working with vegetables means returning to the source of perfumery and indeed of oneself. in Cédrat Céruse  I love the lively  aniseed-flavoured freshness of fennel " Quentin Bisch  Perfumer.

name: eternity-summer-daze-for-men-2022-1
detail: Calvin Klein Eternity Summer Daze for Men exudes a marine freshness. Taking inspiration from the intimacy of setting sail on the ocean  the juice is evocative of feeling at one with nature.

name: musamam-white-intense
detail: An explosive scent with elegant and sensual accords.

name: candy-sugar-pop
detail: A scent as addictive as a pop song. Like the brightly coloured fuzz of Pop Art  it's soaked in sophisticated irony. An irony where candy and sugar are metaphors for the irresistible sweetness of an object of desire. Love equals addiction.

name: tous-man-sport-1
detail: You want something of mine? Take my fragrance  Tous Man Sport.

name: calandre
detail: Calandre is Paco Rabanne's first rose "metal" fragrance. Created in 1969  it is a radical and experimental scent  just like Paco Rabanne. Calandre is an Eau de toilette that provokes deep sensations  it is a rose revolution. Fresh  metallic and provocative. Calandre is a mischievous perfume that symbolises the feminine avant-garde.

name: free-hugs-1
detail: You know that warm feeling you get when you are hugged? That feeling that you can't find anywhere else but in a hug? With this idea Free Hugs was born.

name: bucato-royale-1
detail: The interpretation of the new cleanness  Bucato Royale is a fragrance dedicated to those who like wearing the crisp white shirt.

name: tabac-original-edt-1
detail: Tabac Original Eau de Toilette  the unmistakable sour freshness fragrance  which gives you an unmistakable feeling of freshness and an individual aura of discreet masculine grooming.

name: dancing-1
detail: Perfect for a cheerful and fun girl  who definitely shines and stands out in the crowd.

name: dia-40-woman
detail: A fragrance of grace and nobility  Dia 40 elegantly balances its many layers to conjure a sense of passing time in three acts: sunrise  zenith  and sunset.

name: semi-bespoke-no-22-1
detail: The best-kept secret of Haute Parfumerie  Roja Dove's elusive Semi-Bespoke collection. Numbered from 1 to 16  each of these creations has been crafted from the finest natural raw materials in the world  regardless of cost or scarcity  they are the perfumery equivalent of Haute Couture. Offered to a select elite clientele  once 50 names have been added to the "Book" of creations  the book will be closed.

name: pure-eve-pure-virgin
detail: Pure Eve  Just Pure is born from a simple idea. To create a simple and comfortable perfume  fresh and luxurious and as soft and elegant as a Seersucker shirt or a black dress. For her or for him  a purely sensual luxury to wear every day.

name: unravel-0714-1
detail: Unravel is about seeking and finding. Finding solace. Finding yourself. Unravel 07|14 is a sophisticated and complex blend of florals and musk that truly feels like the final destination of your journey

name: tabac-original-eau-de-cologne
detail: Tabac Original Eau de CologneThe unmistakable fragrance of tangy freshness  which gives you an unmistakable feeling of freshness and an individual aura of discreet masculine grooming.

name: no-more-rose
detail: Is it possible for a perfume to evoke spirituality like abstract paintings do? The answer is this experimental perfume. By incorporating ingredients that are irrelevant to the rose  the perfumer creates an imaginary rose to express his firm belief in eternal true love.
ingredients: ['Aldehyde', 'Galbanum', 'Musk', 'Iris / Orris', 'Osmanthus', 'Tuberose', 'Pink Pepper', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Black Pepper', 'Amber', 'Beeswax', 'Geranium', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Leather', 'Neroli', 'Patchouli', 'Sandalwood', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla']

name: n-22-extrait-1
detail: In 1921  Ernest Beaux composed the legendary N°5 for Coco Chanel. The very next year  he presented a variation with a delicately worked accord that leaves a caressing trail. N°22  like 1922  the year of its creation  resonates like an absolute of femininity.

name: n-5-leau-1
detail: Nº5 L'Eau is the Nº5 of today. A perfume that captures the essence of its time. A fragrance for the here  now and always. L'Eau in praise of simplicity. L'Eau  the obvious choice.

name: aldehyde-44-1
detail: Aldehyde 44 is a small wonder that sits between an overdose of aldehydes  a sublime floral composition and a bed of musks. The result is aesthetically admirable and unique. You should know that we receive numerous hate mails from perfume lovers who have somehow turned their nose up at some Aldehyde 44 and are now considering a holiday in Dallas. Our bad?

name: florissa-encore
detail: Florissa Encore is a modern interpretation of the original scent from 1978.

name: leau-serge-lutens-1
detail: Cool water  clean  crisply ironed laundry  a starched pillowcase which shares all your dreams. L’eau Serge Lutens allows us to rebuild ties with a world where real luxury is embodied first and foremost by cleanliness. Definitive  radical  waving goodbye to considering fragrances as a hygienic and social habit.

name: tubereuse-supercritique
detail: The tuberose flower possesses the most powerful scent in the plant world. Like a white queen  it lures you to its temple. Opulence and boldness underpin its extraordinary trail.

name: absolument-homme-1
detail: Bringing aromatic strength  Absolument Homme is a perfume that skilfully combines elegance  virility and refinement. An exceptional perfume  powerful and full of art.

name: study-india
detail: Indian Studio / Santal +++ is a fragrance without concessions or gender. Where women and men will recognise each other.

name: attar-1
detail: The scent of Maharajas a seamless composition of precious woods and royal floral notes.

name: sandalwood-sacre-1
detail: Sandalwood Sacré is an airy and spiritual Eau de Parfum. Milky sandalwood and patchouli will transport you to the heart of Indian rituals  where incense sticks burn precious woods. This fragrance will take you to meet Yuri Gutsatz  founder of Jardin Retrouvé  who has worked intensively in India to discover the aromatic plants of this country rich in aromas. Sandalwood Sacré  created in 1981 by Yuri Gutsatz  was then called Eau de Sandalwood.

name: sandal
detail: Sandal...and enjoy its luxurious and sensual beauty.

name: bois-de-mysore
detail: Never before had a perfumer used sandalwood the way Alberto Morillas does with Bois de Mysore. From the top to the roots  all the nuances of sandalwood are expressed in this unique creation. A sumptuous wood for the skin.

name: soul-of-santal
detail: Inspired by the last millennium  Soul of Santal evokes meditation rituals and radiates clarity.

name: original-santal
detail: Original Santal is made with the heartwood essence of royal sandalwood trees from Mysore  India and other pure ingredients revered for their capacity to soothe.

name: beyond-love-prohibited
detail: This forbidden elixir is for adventurers of love. It delivers the coup de grace with a fabulous animal note that vanquishes all attempts at resistance.

name: 903-baies-du-nepal-safran-oud-2019-1
detail: The contrast between fresh notes of Nepal and hot Saffron opens up a sophisticated link of Tonkin musk wood cashmere. A striking note that evokes the body eroticism seeking and merging in a mesmerizing symbiosis. This luxurious note is made vibrant by an undeniably woody background of oud and sandalwood. It brings depth and power to this haunting fragrance.

name: magnificat
detail: A gentle-natured  yet firm perfume  delicate and strong. The union of two opposing souls that are united in a magnificent unison. It gives reassuring strength.

name: sublime-vanille-1
detail: Composed in the cool arcades of an ancient villa  resting under a brocade canopy  a young woman daydreams. Her fingers slowly remove the vanilla pod  diffusing the intense aroma  timeless magnificence  its beauty becoming succulent flavour.

name: 02-owari-1
detail: From the ends of the earth comes a transparent fragrance in nature.

name: hand-in-hand-rose-oud
detail: Not long ago  a perfume connoisseur threw down a gauntlet to me. He asked  “Why don't you combine two of your favorite scents  woods and flowers  to create a new and original fragrance?” I accepted the challenge. I chose the rose  the most mythical flower in the history of perfumery  and imagined its tenderness and romanticism combined with the strength and solemnity of oud to compose a unique hand-in-hand fragrance. – Ramon Monegal

name: marlowe-1
detail: Christopher Marlowe was a magnificent bad boy who led a tumultuous  bohemian life in the Elizabethan period. Jardins d'Écrivains interprets Marlowe in the spirit of a dense  heady  animal ... a theatrical fragrance.

name: royal-water
detail: Fresh and cool  Royal Water is an invigorating celebration of personal spirit. Regal  refined  yet refreshingly approachable  just like the beloved Princess who sparked its creation. A universal scent.

name: original-vetiver
detail: Green  with a kiss of Mediterranean citrus and spice  Original Vetiver is a warm  sensual  totally original fragrance evoking the lingering sunshine and relaxed sophistication of summers in the South of France. Captivating  romantic  clean  and refreshing. A universal or shared scent  Original Vetiver is equally alluring on either women or men.

name: muscs-koublai-khan-2
detail: Evocative of China and its splendour during the reign of the legendary Kublai Khan  this tribute to China  with echoes of gold  lacquer work and Khanbaliq smoking dens  reveals its silky outer layer in a multitude of singular stages.

name: pure-love-1
detail: Pure Love is a luminous fragrance tenderly woody  spicy and leathery. An astonishing composition resonating with love and harmony.

name: santal-basmati-1
detail: Bold and exquisite  this close-knit duo intertwines in a layer of multi-note lace  forming a spellbinding perfume that leaves an addictive and classy trail.

name: otello
detail: OtelloInspired by Giuseppe Verdi's opera  this regal fragrance will revive your mind.

name: sandalo-1
detail: A richly faceted virility  able to impose itself with kindness  as complex as the sentiments it is able to express. Warm and oriental  like tradition  yet with a modern  citrusy opening.

name: sacred-wood
detail: Sacred Wood evokes the mystical scent with astonishing precision: like its model  it is so rich and faceted that it is a fragrance in itself. Its silky  sensual scent is surprisingly long-lasting  yet never overpowering. It is the answer to every sandalwood lover's prayers.

name: habanita-x-marie-guillard-2021
detail: In 2021  Molinard celebrates100 years of its legendary perfume Habanita by inviting the French artist Marie Guillard to reinterpret its bottle. Marie added two nude female figures in a sensual and mysterious dance. A tribute to the resolutely free  daring and committed Habanita woman.

name: 1904-madame-butterfly-opera-collection-1
detail: With complete elegance  this powdery floral scent embraces Madame Butterfly's delicate femininity. Iris with its complex design radiates through its communion with mandarin and neroli  while cedar and musk impart a sensuality attributed to the Levant.

name: avant-le-jour
detail: At dawn  the sky is tinged with pink in the East  the colour of full love and passion  and the air is illuminated. Avant le Jour brings about total love  both corporal and spiritual  bewitching with captivating passion.

name: iris-palladium
detail: Just like the fine watchmaking of Switzerland which inspires the designer  Iris Palladium is an olfactive composition with precious cogs.

name: parfum-captive-1
detail: J.F. Schwarzlose Berlin tells the stories behind the obvious. The creation of perfumes is an art that has a story to tell; an individual story for each person who wears our Parfum Captives  which will enchant the wearer along with his or her surroundings.

name: violette-4
detail: This cologne exudes soft and subtle notes that suggest a warm and emotional universe.

name: spell-on-you-flowers-faces-pumpkins-2023
detail: The delicious  exciting and magnetic scent in a limited edition bottle decorated by Yayoi Kusama's iconic flowers.

name: voile-de-jasmin-1
detail: Bvlgari Voile de Jasmin is a delicate ovocation of white jasmine  a fresh floral perfect for the warmer seasons. A refined and classic fragrance that is designed for women who seek lightness and luxury.

name: love-in-white-for-summer
detail: A dreamy fresh floral that bottles white-hot nights on the Côte d'Azur and the quest for eternal summer. This scent transports wearers to the French Riviera where chic white accessories  crisp waves and long holiday escapes reign. Like the sparkling hues of the ocean's reflection  iris and cedar shine through at the heart of this serene seasonal scent.

name: jebel-2019-1
detail: A magical secret weapon  Jebel is universal  a gorgeously understated. perfume too elegant to think of as merely a skin scent.

name: cedre-iris-1
