detail: Cèdre-Iris is a fragrance that will stir the senses to the depths with its stunning fusion of sophisticated  intensely persistent scent and musky sensibility.

name: fiore-di-portofino-1
detail: FIORE DI PORTOFINO is a unique bouquet inspired by Portofino  the enchanting Italian place considered one of the eight wonders of the world. It is a bright and lively fragrance full of the transcendent magic of the bay: the chromatic spell of its waters  the shimmering horizon  the glamorous personalities and VIPs who have contributed to its history and fame  the olfactory history of its nature that blossoms with uncommon beauty.

name: 001-rives-x-ausmane-1
detail: Light and resistant  the bergamot and fig are in the spotlight. A true emblem of the Mediterranean  they bring vitality. The iris here represents dominance and strength but with finesse. A singular fragrance in all its subtlety.

name: joy
detail: Be enchanted with Joy! A cheerful fragrance  perfect for happy  fun women who like to enjoy the best of life.

name: cool-water-woman-caribbean-summer-edition-2018
detail: Davidoff Cool Water Caribbean Summer edition evokes endless expanses of white sand  caressed by gently lapping waves. A world where colours are more dazzling  sensations more vibrant  emotions more intense. An earthly paradise  a destination dreams are made of. Welcome to the Caribbean.

name: bombay-dreams
detail: An intense floral fruity fragrance designed for sophisticated and charismatic young women.

name: tales-ibiza
detail: Tales Ibiza sets the mood for everlasting happiness  for the woman who loves to indulge in delightful celebration of the sweet moments of life.

name: crystal-aoud
detail: A vibrant fruity aoud: exotic and succulent fruity notes rest on a deep woody base  softened by gourmand and spicy notes.

name: incanto-amity
detail: Incanto Amity by Salvatore Ferragamo is a light  fresh and bewitching fragrance for women.

name: sheer-halston
detail: A true classic created for the woman of contemporary tastes  the light  fresh scent is distinctively feminine.

name: cool-water-woman-pacific-summer-edition
detail: This summer  embark on an unforgettable journey. Transport your senses to the magnificent blue waters of the Pacific and dive in. Your travel diary will record the coolest summer trips! Pack your passport so you can set sail and explore the exquisite beauty of the sun-kissed shores of the Pacific in all its splendour. Discover the Pacific paradise and dive into the magnificent blue waters of the Pacific Ocean.

name: le-parfum-de-therese
detail: Brilliant  complex  incredibly modern  Le Parfum de Therese was created in the early 1950s by Edmond Roudnitska  one of the greatest perfumers of the 20th century. The fragrance was never produced commercially and remained a secret because Thérèse  Roudnitska's wife for whom it was created  was the only person authorised to wear it. Considered a masterpiece because its aquatic fruit accord is 40 years ahead of its time  this complex fragrance is also reminiscent of glorious perfumes of the past.

name: teenz-female
detail: Teenz Female is a floral fragrance for youth  being fresh  bright  slightly moist  sweet  with a rich aroma of flowers and fruits from different Ajmal excellent resistance and created a vibrant and soft floral-fruity perfume.

name: porsche-design-180-blue-1
detail: Casual yet elegant. Porsche Design 180 Blue presents a refreshing new kind of fougère that is modern  dynamic and invigorating. A fragrance with raw power  from every angle.

name: very-sexy-for-him-2
detail: Just when you thought it couldn't get any sexier. Very Sexy For Him 2 Cologne Spray. The second men's fragrance from Victoria's Secret  features crisp  confident and inviting notes of berries  herbs and spices.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Juniper Berries', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Clary Sage', 'Geranium', 'Fennel Seeds', 'Green Pepper', 'Melozone (Melon note)', 'Cardamom', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Musk', 'Nutmeg', 'Sandalwood', 'Teak Wood', 'Whiskey']

name: polo-blue-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: The freedom of the big  blue sky  the energy of the open waters  an invigorating blast of fresh air. Polo Ralph Lauren Blue is a new definition of casual elegance. Cool  fresh  warm spice. A crystal blue sensation.

name: nymphea-1
detail: Fleurs D'Ombre : Nymphea is the olfactory evocation of a Monet painting  spring flowers with pastel notes.

name: free-spirit-28
detail: Charismatic  sophisticated and sensual  this scent helps you rediscover yourself  find your own way  going into the unknown.

name: flirt-dete
detail: A summer morning on a sunny terrace  sipping a fruity cocktail under a palm tree. Melon  orange and mandarin for vitamins. A handful of fruit to nibble on and a surprise under the plate: a telephone number scribbled on a napkin. Later  a bouquet of jasmine and a sweet conversation at the bar will make the perfect summer flirt. Flirt d'Été is born.

name: clean-rain-1
detail: The pure scent of rainfall has been captured. Hints of flowers and fruit together with sheer musks embrace the moment when droplets cling to flower petals and the world feels quiet  soft and bright.

name: tuxedo-1
detail: Long before it became known as the timeless sartorial statement  the tuxedo was an elegant over garment. Worn by aristocratic gentlemen in the 19th century  its principal function was to protect their evening wear from the smoke of their cigars  which were savoured in the privacy of exclusive gentlemen's smoking rooms. By turning this elegant must-have into a woman's outfit  Mr Saint Laurent built one of the most unshakable pillars of the modern woman style.

name: coriandre-extrait-de-parfum
detail: "In Coriandre I wanted to find the olfactory emotions of my youth: the subtle and delicate perfume of my mother and the captivating scents of the countryside around Grasse" Jacqueline Couturier  perfumer.

name: black-vetyver-cafe
detail: Born from a passion to create the perfect coffee note  Black Vetyver Café is a rich  sensual scent. The deep  bitter character of the coffee bean is steeped in earthy notes of vetiver and temple incense.

name: marine-wood-coriander
detail: An afternoon in Tuscana. The upcoming sunset over the sea  and the expected evening whirl of joy.

name: coriander-cardamom
detail: Coriander and Cardamom Cologne is a fresh twist on a traditionally warm and spicy scent.

name: coriander-1
detail: A fresh uplifting scent. Inspired by cool spices and Mediterranean sea breeze - like the hills above Odessa.
ingredients: ['Coriander', 'Leaves', 'Pine Needles', 'Lavender', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Lime', 'Litsea Cubeba', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Green Pepper', 'Clove', 'Geranium', 'Mace', 'Magnolia', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Clary Sage']

name: agua-fresca-de-mimosa-coriandro-1
detail: Agua Frescade Mimosa Coriandro generates a sparkling freshness defined by the original character of the mimosa along with a sensual and spicy touch of coriander and jasmine.

name: poison
detail: Some perfumes are born as a myth. Provocative and mysterious since its creation  Poison is Dior's ultimate weapon of seduction. Its exceptional alchemy is due to a rich blend of spicy  fruity and ambery notes  with sensual accords of honey and musk. An unforgettable and charismatic oriental fragrance.

name: leau-pour-homme-blue-tea-1
detail: For today's men  well-being is synonymous with beauty. Blue Tea expresses this concept wonderfully: it has the same beneficial substances as the best beauty creams and has been symbolically linked to the very concept of strength and virility since ancient times.

name: created-by-shirin-1
detail: Shirin David lets worlds and realities collide with her Created by Shirin fragrance: Shirin's loud and expressive self-assurance merges with the emotionality and closeness of her alter ego Babsi to create a perfect olfactory work of art.

name: warni-warni
detail: Our world is a playground that follows the rules of diversity and sharing  and Warni Warni is a trip to the heart of cosmopolitan cities.

name: tahitian-gardenia
detail: A scent that smells excitingly exotic. At the heart of this creation is Tahitian gardenia  a symbol of love  unity  grace and strength.

name: brassee-de-roses
detail: In Dr. Renaud's garden  plants are not only a source of performance and results. Fruits and flowers bring their perfume  their colour  their freshness in a collection of light waters that inspire in those who wear them the same sensation of radiance as with care. These are the Radiant Waters  they make life lighter and more joyful.

name: pucheng-osmanthus
detail: A scent inspired by the hundred years old trees in Pucheng  China.

name: waha-sahara
detail: Breathtaking  unique  and addicting  Waha Sahara is an inimitable statement of individuality and seduction.

name: black-rose-tea-eau-de-toilette
detail: "When I first saw the Teaology line  I immediately thought of a refined perfume evoking stillness and serenity  capable of evoking the tea ceremony and its beneficial effects. Thus Black Rose Tea was born"  Nathalie Lorson  perfumer.

name: 1-bergamot-tea-leaf-sandalwood
detail: Inspired by the freshness of the Mediterranean and the feeling of spring air  it transports you to the beginning of summer: the sea breeze  with the characteristic landscape of the coasts of Spain  Italy  Croatia and Greece.

name: passion-tea-eau-de-toilette
detail: A refined infusion of floral notes with a soft and gourmand heart warmed by a finish of patchouli and light woods. A modern and enveloping olfactory masterpiece suitable for women and men of all ages to stand out with self-confidence.

name: kado-japon
detail: Kadõ (華華/華華) meaning "the way of flowers" or "the art of bringing flowers to life") is the traditional Japanese art of flower arrangement  also known as Ikebana. Through the freshness of the seasonal rainwater  a wave of aromatic tea and floral sweetness enchants and leads us on a journey through the traditions of the Land of the Rising Sun  to seasons well marked by cultural and ancestral patterns."

name: anori-1
detail: “Anori is an intense thrill. The expression of the northern winds. I imagined a bouquet of frost flowers and salt flowers braided with a spray ribbon " Jean-Claude Ellena.

name: oh-oooohoh-1
detail: Returning from a long journey across the United States  Bertaux and Miller created a fragrance that travels up and down the West Coast to lose itself in the myth of Dreamland...

name: valparaiso
detail: The dew-laden wind mingles with the smell of the Valparaiso coast. Small grains and spices blend with bitterness. A unique creation developed in the tradition of French Haute Parfumerie  based on noble and distant essences inspired by the travels of botanist Louis Feuillée.

name: acqua-di-parma-colonia-assoluta-1
detail: Colonia Assoluta is a modern interpretation of Acqua di Parma's premier Colonia fragrance. It retains much of the classic citrus freshness of the original  while incorporating a deeper  woody dry down. A statement of pure sophistication and refinement  Colonia Assoluta is an exquisite fragrance to wear on any occasion.

name: 13eme-note-homme-1
detail: Note 13 for men is aromatic  fresh and spicy. Inspired by a dish by chef René Berges  it is probably the most innovative and complex perfume for the elegant man.

name: today-tomorrow-always-celebrate-1
detail: Celebrate the scent of love and embrace the emotion of joy with this beautiful perfume.

name: vetivera-1
detail: When the salty sea spray mixes with the vibrant woody scent of vetiver  a bewitchingly charming fragrance is revealed.

name: winter-oak-1
detail: Inspired by walking the oak-lined trails of the Chumash Lands of California on cool winter mornings  when crushed oak leaves and twigs release their rich scent.

name: mimosa-2
detail: A fragrance as light and soft as velvety breath.

name: cuir-de-venise-1
detail: The timeless city of Venice perpetuates an exceptional craft originating from the city's prosperous period in the 13th century: leather craftsmanship. Its deep  dense tone evokes a precious stone of great beauty: brown tourmaline. Enchanted by the refined  honeyed scent of leather  perfumers Michel Almairac and Clément Marx created a powerful composition with sophisticated facets and enhanced by warm  spicy notes.

name: dirty-vanilla
detail: She is a complex creature with unmistakable allure  from first shy blossom to aromatic climax. For this seductress  Dirty Vanilla was born. It is our interpretation of the Vanilla Planifolia orchid herself. A beautiful enigma  a subtle femme fatale.

name: pistil-whip
detail: What would it smell like to be mugged by a flower? One of the Fragrance Foundation's top 5 finalists for Perfume Extraordinaire in 2017  Pistil Whip is a unique olfactory hallucination.

name: glorious-indigo-1
detail: "Glorious Indigo is like an aura of confidence you could wear. Both powerful and soft  it knows how to make its presence noticed without imposing itself. The quiet force of its trail reveals the boldness of the man who wears it " Clément Marx  Perfumer.

name: florgasm-1
detail: What would it smell like if a flower had an orgasm? Like a sunny afternoon when you feel fresh and perfectly primal  Florgasm is a tantalising fragrance that quickens the heartbeat and captivates the senses.

name: tempting-rose
detail: "Enveloping and sensual  tempting rose expresses all the beauty and delicacy of the rose " Clément Marx  Michel Almairac  Perfumers.

name: bentley-for-men-silverlake-1
detail: Limits are there to be challenged. Borders to be crossed. He knows what he's capable of. And he's always ready to prove it. Independent and determined  he's at home in boardrooms or airport business lounges. But when he gets back to nature  he is most truly himself. His free spirit is expressed by the cool  bracing accents of his signature fragrance. More than a scent. Bentley For Men Silverlake. An attitude.

name: femme-magique
detail: This scent exudes seduction  magnetism and a natural glow. The Femme Magique woman is confident and vital: simply charming. Wake up the magic in you!

name: her-secret-bloom
detail: Few things encapsulate femininity as well as a flower. Its splendor emerges at precisely the right moment  It opens slowly at first  but before long  nothing can stop it. The unique magnetism of its presence commands your attention. This is Her Secret Bloom.

name: first-snow
detail: Comforting and sumptuous  First Snow is a fragrance of natural beauty. Inspired by the stillness of the first snowflakes  it’s tranquil yet full of promise. Redolent of a Swiss snowscape in the evening light  it transports you to a peaceful winter scene  where you can relax inside with a warm cup of tea  while outside delicate snowflakes hug the branches.

name: musk-air-1
detail: Musk Air feels like an invigorating cold blast sensation as if you were at the top of an icy mountain.

name: immense-peony-1
detail: As the sun sinks into the sea on the horizon and the evening sky is tinged with pink  the air is infused with a fragrance that blends dreams and reality. Immense Peony is like a strawberry-coloured sky over a sea of peony petals with an expanse of moss as a secret  sensual backdrop.

name: wonder-7
detail: Escape from modern urban life and embark on an exotic journey: the air is mixed with Ceylon black tea and Indian curry  and the eyes are full of mysterious totems and gorgeous veils. The body and the mind lead to the same place  travelling far and travelling in the mind  always on the way home  always on the way.

name: a-drop-dissey-eau-de-parfum-fraiche
detail: Truly immersing you in nature  A Drop d’Issey Eau de Parfum Fraîche captures the journey of a raindrop in springtime. From the moment it falls from the sky  the drop travels through the elements  grass  flowers  wood  and more  to reveal each of their facets  almost as if it were awakening nature on the way  boosting the sensory experience.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-blanc-x-roland-garros-1
detail: Lacoste honors the legendary Roland Garros tennis tournament in this unique limited edition of L.12.12. Enveloping  textured  and original  this innovative eau de parfum directly captures the clay-court from Roland Garros to offer you an exclusive creation.

name: bohemian-lime-1
detail: Set under a sunny canopy of lush rainforest  the fragrance evokes an image of indigenous citrus fruits coming to life in the nearby waterfalls.

name: guess-seductive-homme-blue
detail: The Guess Man is a force of attraction  style and intrigue. His fragrance is a powerful blend of excitement  allure and sensuality. It awakens the senses with an explosion of spicy citrus. The heart notes reinforce the freshness of the fragrance and create a bridge to the sensual and provocative base. The overall effect is a bold and uncompromising fragrance that captures the essence of Guess.

name: caviar-lime
detail: Caviar Lime brings us closer to the wild nature of the Australian subtropical rainforest through an explosion of citrus notes and marine accords.

name: a-la-folie-1
detail: Eat the last piece of cake. Laugh out loud. Declare your love. Dare to do it. Relax. A hymn to joy  good humour  and wishes  À la Folie is about love itself!

name: castelbajac-homme
detail: Castelbajac Homme is Castelbajac's first fragrance for men  rich in contrasts: spiritual and energetic  classic and modern  sporty and chic!

name: citron-caviar
detail: An ode to the crisp  tangy notes of the unique citrus caviar.

name: jimmy-choo-urban-hero-1
detail: Embodying a determined man full of confidence. The man of today.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-blanc-edp-pour-lui
detail: A far cry from pre-established codes  this modern yet timeless fragrance plays with contrasts to adapt to the wearer.

name: rainbow-fantasy-1
detail: Imagine an idyllic place where the troubles of reality do not exist and dazzling surprises await. Rainbow Fantasy Britney Spears whisks you away to that dreamland of prismatic beauty. Uplifting and alluring  this scent transcends the every day  allowing those who experience it to enjoy an enchanting world of Britney's creation.

name: bold-red-1
detail: Perry Ellis Bold Red radiates a powerful yet pleasant appeal representing confidence  passion  and alluring masculinity.  The harmonious sensation of warm and fresh elements creates a stylish and sophisticated vibe  stimulating a mysterious and magnetic attraction.
ingredients: ['Mahogany', 'Caviar Lime (Finger)', 'Ginger Flower', 'Red Apple', 'Skin Accord', 'Tonka Bean', 'Black Pepper', 'Aromatic Notes']

name: joyful-nashi-bloom
detail: When you are comfortable with yourself and others  sitting on a rock and chatting on a glorious summer day. A moment like this is all that is needed to feel wonderful during a summer break.

name: melrose-paradise
detail: Surfing  palm trees  sunsets and golden hours  treat yourself to a shot of Californian lifestyle with Melrose paradise.

name: hug
detail: This scent is like waking up from a sweet dream in the afternoon. The day seems to have just begun and is about to end.

name: voile-docre-1
detail: On the edge of the desert  the ochre citadel invites you to relax. On the horizon  the hot sand dunes envelop you in a halo of golden light. A vibrant sensuality is born.

name: lay
detail: Find a piece of heaven and earth in the lush grass. The head rests on the ground  the weight of the body makes the grass and leaves ooze fresh green juice  and the smell is even a bit pungent and unreasonable. Enjoy natural positivism and joy.

name: sit
detail: In the early morning mist  the pines and cypresses become forests  the grass and leaves are covered with a layer of dew  and the calm fragrance emitted by the trees is dizzying. Taking advantage of the fast and bright sky  you sit on the pile of fallen leaves  looking up at the sunlight through the forest leaves. The smell of the earth is everywhere.

name: noctambule-1
detail: When night falls  the Givenchy circle gathers discreetly to celebrate the feverish nocturnality. Darkness and freedom go hand in hand. An irresistible scent lingers in the air. A juice in which classic elegance twists with a hint of madness. Noctambule celebrates the Centifolia de Grasse rose with passion  excess and extravagance.

name: a-drop-dissey-essentielle
detail: The journey of a drop morphed into a mist through the sunlight  and infused with the essential scents of nature.

name: chloe-l-eau-de-parfum-lumineuse
detail: Chloé Eau de Parfum Lumineuse is inspired by the image of a freshly-picked rose gilded by rays of sunlight.

name: hasard-bazar
detail: We challenge our points of reference  we experience new experiences  we bring opposites together. Experience the unexpected  seize the opportunity!

name: think
detail: If a walnut had dropped on Newton's head  it would have smelled like this scent. Lingering  enveloping  nourishing. And the inspiration suddenly appears.

name: void
detail: In the empty and windy valley depression  there is a relaxing scent in the air. Some indescribable emotions rise and bring back distant and melodious memories.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-rose-pour-elle
detail: L.12.12. Rose pour Elle is inspired by Lacoste's iconic polo shirt. The perfume is packed with confidence and femininity  creating a sense of movement and elegance.

name: selva-exotica-ltd-ed-2020-1
detail: Let yourself be seduced by the irresistible sensuality of the new Selva Exótica fragrance. A sophisticated terracotta accord enhances the sensuality and delicacy of the flowers like never before  giving way to a background of exotic woods and vanilla. A hypnotic and incredibly addictive scent.

name: quatre-iconic
detail: A fragrance with a radiant personality that depicts the daring of a free woman.

name: la-ronde-des-fleurs-fleur-de-tiare
detail: Fleur de Tiaré will become the new addiction you simply won’t be willing to give up.

name: balade-tiare-de-tahiti
detail: "On the old harbor of Palermo  while I was looking for a boat heading East  I was embraced by breezes of gardenia and tiare  emanating from a ship freshly returned from an expedition in the Pacific. Suddenly  Polynesia met Italy  and the golden beaches of Tahiti appeared in my heart " Maître de Claude  Perfumer  18th century.

name: coco-paradise-mist
detail: Coco Paradise is like stepping into an oasis of warm  sweet and relaxing luxury.

name: voyage-polynesian-island-tiare
detail: Escape to Polynesia with the Tiare flower. Inspired by a sunny day on the tropical island of Polynesia  this luminous  bright and fresh eau de toilette from our Voyage fragrance collection features a blend of floral and citrus accords.

name: tiare-2
detail: The Tiare  wild and rare  embodies the South Pacific. A small gardenia exclusive to Tahiti  it is the flower of beauty and love.

name: intense-tiare-1
detail: A delicious harmony of ingredients will transport you to the tropical delights of an exotic island holiday.

name: day-dreams-1
detail: Reminiscing about warm summer nights in Greece  where the joy from the warmth of the sun is endless.

name: oree-doree
detail: A floral  sophisticated and deep eau de parfum that evokes summer and the sun.

name: fleur-de-tiare-1
detail: With Fleur de Tiaré  we wanted to evoke a holiday to French Polynesia and honour its emblematic flower. This perfume celebrates a solar femininity. A promise of instant escape  throughout the year.

name: bronze-goddess-azuree-soleil
detail: Bronze Goddess Azurée Soleil embodies the lush tropical beach scent and is reminiscent of a sensual blend of natural tiare petals delicately infused in pure coconut oil  used for centuries by Tahitian women to nourish their skin and hair.

name: wild-child-1
detail: Unleash your inner troublemaker with this flirty blend of jasmine and gardenia. Best worn with a twinkle in the eye.

name: absolu-tiare
detail: When perfume makes us go on vacation… Such is the promise of Absolu Tiaré. Resolutely addictive and captivating  Absolu Tiaré in itself embodies the delicious olfactory memory of the beach  warm sand  coconut palms  skin tanned by the sun  and the spray of sunscreen.

name: lys-41-1
detail: Is an overwhelming white floral. A blend of fragrant white flowers bewitching and noble  warm and sunny in its approach yet treacherous once caught in its web of noble woods and gourmand notes. Lys 41 rewards those looking for a statement with an addictive floral buzz that is as potent as its wake and as insistent as the people following you around. Good luck.

name: dream-away-1
detail: A playful composition that invites you to dream away.

name: swiss-army-for-her-lilac-jasmine
detail: Nostalgic and intriguing  For Her Lilac Jasmine will enchant you from the first spray. Evocative of after-dark adventures  this is a scent of sublime sensuality. Treat yourself to a sensual escape today  where possibility and passion thrive.

name: pino-silvestre-amber-woods-1
detail: As the boiling sun warms the desert sand  soothing creamy woods are warmed by pleasantly comforting spices. The soul of the desert is bottled at last in an aromatic  woody blend.

name: uomo-levriero-1
detail: Style as a necessity and elegance expressed through a constant search for beauty  virtue and truth: this is the magic of Trussardi Uomo Levriero.

name: hope-1
detail: Hope captures the nectar-filled flesh of lush  radiant peach  where sweetness becomes suggestive and addictive.

name: rock-the-myrrh-1
detail: “Inspired by the Dries Van Noten Parisian boutique  with its elegant and precious textures  and its eclectic and mystical atmosphere  an overdose of myrrh is joined by resins of benzoin and cistus dressed up with cypress and pink pepper ” Amélie Jacquin  Perfumer.

name: muy-mio-gold
detail: Muy Mio Gold is a memorable fragrance that will help you handle everything.

name: island-lush
detail: Carnal and bountiful  Island Lush is a sumptuous perfume with a heart of modern woods. A wind of exoticism transports you on a journey to islands beyond the horizon  where radiant spices  powdery orris  vegetal roots and luscious resins envelop smooth wood species.

name: mistica-8
detail: A bewitching scent with a deliciously intriguing trail.

name: the-best-of-me
detail: The Best of Me is pure elegance  transcending traditional boundaries.

name: fastrack-beat-for-him
detail: Balancing the fresh with the bold  this masculine fragrance is for those who don’t like to play by the rules. From work commitments to party scenes  you’re sorted!

name: source-of-life-woman
detail: A feminine fragrance inspired by the majestic beauty of the Earth’s springs. With its invigorating aquatic notes  this clean  sparkling fragrance captures the essence of the refreshing flow of the sea and brings a liquid sensation that awakens the senses and is like a fresh wave of joy.

name: abundance-v8
detail: V.8 is a hymn to abundance. It is a love song to our land. It draws you in instinctively.
ingredients: ['Christmas Tree / Flame Tree', 'Pink Pepper', 'Akigalawood (Patchouli note)', 'Sandalwood', 'Incense (Somalia)', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Bitter Orange', 'Benzoin (Laos)']

name: splendid-vanilla-1
detail: A generous  creamy fragrance with a distinctive touch of vitality and sharpness.

name: rose-de-chine-1
detail: "Rose de Chine has an untamed  decadent quality. Contrasted with Chinese peonies  it intoxicates " Tom Ford.
ingredients: ['Rose', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Geranium (Egypt)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Violet', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Peony', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Oak', 'Oakmoss', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Coriander', 'Honey', 'Clary Sage', 'Star Anise', 'Styrax', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Spearmint', 'Ambrofix (Ambergris)']

name: cuir-imperial-2
detail: "The idea was to make a very pleasant leather scent  at the same time fluffy like a jacket in which we love each other  and at the same time a little dark through its woody notes. This fragrance reflects the more rock'n'roll facets of the Zilli man  who is not lacking in character!". Delphine Lebeau-Krowiak  Perfumer.

name: hyades-1
detail: Hyades is the deity of rain  also represented in the Greek mythology of the Titans as the goddess who guards the tears of the gods. This fragrance embodies the strength of a powerful good luck charm  gliding like tears of happiness through the reverberations and fougère seductions of the call of one of the most powerful elements in the universe: life-giving water.

name: pluie-noire
detail: As if enveloped by the twilight  the cliffs stand upright  vertical. The only horizon  the vertiginous vision of a sobbing curtain of sky. A black rain  touching the warm earth and leaving a special aroma in its wake... A landfill rain  running down our necks and seeping into our bodies. Like the tears of a passionate love.

name: pelargonium-2021-1
detail: A contemporary Baroque take on geranium highlights the raw grace of the prized olfactive material. A strikingly elegant still life in scent  Pelargonium portrays its namesake ingredient like one of the mysterious floral compositions of Dutch Golden Age paintings. Originally launched in 2017.

name: loubicharme
detail: Loubicharme evokes Christian Louboutin's admiration for beetles which symbolize luck and magic. The wings of the magnetic beetle are made of the iconic red soles.

name: intention-for-man-1
detail: The attraction starts with a look. In each look  an intention! The look can reveal your intention  that split second capable of making any moment unforgettable.

name: police-contemporary-amber-gold-for-man
detail: Amber Gold for Man is the celebration of the contemporary Police man  elegant and extremely strong. You can feel his charisma wherever he goes. He polarises attention and attracts glances.

name: tommy-now-2018-1
detail: A trendy  unpretentious fragrance with a composition intended for the younger  urban population.

name: acqua-absolute-1
detail: Acqua Absolute is a scent inspired by the breeze of freshness  the sun and icy water crashing on the rocks.

name: istanbul-1
detail: That feeling of an old city  but with a freshness  a modernity. An old luxury and a new confidence. Sometimes clichés are in the popular imagination for all the right reasons. It is the meeting of two continents and two cultures. Coffee  creaminess. Leather. Suede. Spices. Incense. Waking up in Moda  crossing the Bosphorus and a balmy night in Karaköy.

name: tom-tailor-be-natural-for-him-1
detail: In a world that is turning faster and faster  we focus on the essentials. Light and carefree. Naturally. An olfactory journey to ourselves. Be Natural for Him brings out your own personality and combines the lightness of nature with the bubbling energy of life.

name: mon-patchouly
detail: The mysterious scent of patchouli from overseas  emblematic of the flower power movement. Together with gourmand notes and spices  it makes a statement of presence.

name: blue-titanium
detail: "The most modern fragrance of the trio in its structure. The freshness of the fern  made even more sensual by the sage  gives this perfume a cool  shimmering  almost metallic look. For a lively and daring trail". Delphine Lebeau-Krowiak  Perfumer.

name: le-3e-homme-de-caron-1
detail: Created in 1985  this leathery woody scent remains instantly recognisable  and deploys a sensual olfactory signature with an elegant simplicity.

name: accento-overdose-2
detail: Awakening a range of emotions with each of its delightful notes  Xerjoff's Accento Overdose fragrance dresses the skin with an enchanting mist that fuses fruity and floral accents. Amplifying the olfactory experience through a specialised enhancement technique  this refined fragrance offers a romantic aura with a touch of mystery.
ingredients: ['Fruity Notes', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Green Notes', 'Eucalyptus', 'Pine Needles']

name: vibrant-fruity-2
detail: As the name suggests  Scent Mix Vibrant Fruity is a perfume so delicious and enchanting you'll want to eat it.

name: my-honey-1
detail: My Honey is the perfect fragrance to fall in love with. Its fruity  sweet notes remind you of being in love for the first time  the feeling you get when you think of your first true love. My Honey is the perfect declaration of love  to your loved ones.

name: zelimir-1
detail: Zelimir is an intense floral fragrance for the modern  self-confident woman. The rich blend of floral  fruity and woody notes makes a very intense impression and instantly underlines your personal appeal. Zelimir is inspired by the magic of the Orient.

name: en-el-bosque-1
detail: Enchanting  joyful  and charming.

name: endora
detail: Endora is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women blended in floral and fruity notes with a soft cadence and earthly sophistication.  It reminds you of spring with its fresh accords.

name: eau-so-sexy-eau-de-parfum
detail: You look good and you know it: that's what Eau So Sexy feels like... My latest crush is me. And I'm pretty cool with that.
A refreshing yet mysterious scent with a sensual trail.

name: exclusive-pink
detail: This sensual and exotic fragrance from Majestic Perfumes is perfect for young women & those who yearn to emit vibes of youthfulness. A very floral fragrance  Exclusive Pink is your answer to feeling fresh and bubbly when you most need it.

name: another-sense
detail: An overdose of precious ingredients for an explosion of powerful and subtle scents.

name: touche-pour-femme
detail: A scent inspired by nature’s fruity blooms at their most tempting.

name: northern-beauty
detail: Like the radiant light of Swedish summer  Northern Beauty enlivens the senses with sparkling notes. The floral heart releases a fresh breeze  magnified by a royal elegance  while the base settles into comfortable silage.

name: cassandra
detail: Treat yourself to a fragrance that will make you stand out in every situation. Jeanne Arthes Cassandra for women is an embodiment of exclusive luxury and its intricate composition will delight even the most discerning fragrance lovers.

name: mademoiselle-jacadi-petite-cerise-1
detail: Mademoiselle Jacadi Petite Cerise is like a sunny afternoon under the cherry trees. This gorgeous creation  with delicate and addictive notes  is suitable for children's skin  but will also appeal to adults.

name: cherry-blossom-3
detail: Inspired by the cherry blossom  (sakura) is Japan's unofficial national flower. It has been celebrated for many centuries and takes a very prominent position in Japanese culture. This composition is a soft  sheer floral with a hint of cherry.

name: sweetheart-cherry
detail: A scent that smells like a sweet surprise from a secret admirer.

name: ryukyu-cherry-blossom
detail: This dreamy scent is a celebration of the cherry blossoms that were brought from Ryukyu to Paris in the 17th century.

name: lovefest-burning-cherry-48
detail: Have you ever smelled a wonderful  intense and bewitching scent that instantly sets your soul on fire? Lovefest Burning Cherry The 48 will do that to you.

name: cherry-oud
detail: “In this creation between the sacred and the mischievous  I wanted to play on the contrast between the rarity  mystery  and darkness of oud wood  and the smiling irreverence of cherry " Delphine Jelk  Guerlain Perfumer.

name: opus-xiv-royal-tobacco
detail: One of knowledge and aesthetic pleasure  Opus XIV Royal Tobacco is a fragrant journey along the Tropic of Cancer from Oman to Cuba  connecting royal frankincense to regal tobacco.
ingredients: ['Tobacco Leaf', 'Oud (Assam)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Vetiver', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Myrrh', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Birch Tar', 'Elemi', 'Musk', 'Anise', 'Basil', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Fenugreek', 'Lavender', 'Liquorice (Licorice)', 'Orange Blossom', 'Osmanthus', 'Rose (Bulgaria)', 'Prunol (Plum)']

name: shangri-la
detail: Shangri-LaThe Promised Land  whether it exists or not  does not matter. It is important that people dare to leave all prejudices  all fears  to follow the path  to find the place where people are always meant to be.

name: harmony
detail: Harmony is the melodic aroma of life  skilfully combined with the notes of food  drink and spices. It forms a joyful song with a fragrant aroma that describes prosperity  wealth and harvest.

name: sway-with-me-1
detail: Sway With Me is an ode to love and nature  dance and movement.

name: oud-khol
detail: “In this work on oud wood  I wanted to capture the incandescence of bakhoor  the captivating incense that has been burned for centuries in the Middle-East " Thierry Wasser  Guerlain Master Perfumer.

name: oud-seven-2021
detail: The idea for this fragrance was to refine a rough precious Assam oud by shaping it with seven facets.

name: opus-xiii-silver-oud-1
detail: Silver Oud is an olfactory representation of Stendhal's 19th century French novel  The Red and the Black  and its intelligent and ambitious protagonist  Julien Sorel. The fragrance is a manifestation of the tension between idealism and realism  the contradiction between thought and feeling and the power of mimetic desire.

name: silver-oud
detail: Silver Oud is an olfactive depiction of Stendhal’s 19th-century French novel  The Red and the Black  and its intelligent and ambitious protagonist  Julien Sorel. Paying tribute to the House’s signature storytelling tradition  our perfumer brings Silver Oud to life in a scent that showcases the most precious oud in all its glory.

name: oud-ulya
detail: A barnyard oud  deep  dark  and sensuous. Extreme velvety potency. Generous like the nature of the oasis of Ulya.

name: fleur-du-desert
detail: Hiding spectacular wonders and unforgettable emotions  the desert is magnified with an immensity that invites us to dream even further. For the fifth work in this collection  Louis Vuitton Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier-Belletrud wanted to capture the natural wonders of the desert in its original setting  blossoming at the heart of a rich and resolutely sophisticated composition. More than a perfume: a signature.

name: opus-xv-king-blue
detail: King Blue evokes the union of the real and the unreal  the clashing of the impossible and the mundane  the surrealistic manifest that life is never truly what it seems to be  the meeting of fire and nightshade. An oneiric wood supreme. Surrealism in scent.

name: oriental-oud
detail: Oriental Oud is made from the finest raw materials and stands for elegance and style.

name: oud-nude-1
detail: "I composed this fragrance as a fairy tale whose fragrances express the sensuality of bodies  their curves  their skin " Delphine Jelk  Guerlain perfumer.

name: equivoque-1
detail: Équivoque is an enigma  a paradox. An elusive fragrance  made for discreet personalities who keep their cards secret  except perhaps in the secrecy of a private office.

name: cherry-cream
detail: Cherry Cream bursts with fresh cherry fruit  perfectly balanced with smooth  creamy Vanilla. A true treat for the senses.

name: cherry-fever
detail: Cherry Fever is a contrasting fragrance  with subtle yet powerful accords that create an intoxicating trail.

name: lyrd-artisan-cherry-vetiver
detail: Lyrd Artisan introduces you to a world of authentic fragrances expertly crafted by master perfumers: captivating gender-neutral scents with unexpected combinations of the finest ingredients that are exquisite alone  but even more fascinating together.

name: intense-cherry-1
detail: The intense cherry and citrus are adorned with hints of highly fragrant flowers which leave a warm sillage of woody gourmand notes  followed by a woody base that rests gently on the skin.

name: cherry-ambition
detail: Cherry Ambition is not just a fragrance  it’s a statement of your inner fire and destiny. Embrace your ambition and leave a trail of inspiration wherever you go.

name: flora-notis-cherry-blossom-scent
detail: Like the cherry blossoms that bloom in the spring  sweet to the touch  it fascinates with its surroundings overflowing with a vivid  sensational and bold. Like a woman loved by everyone with a carefree smile  this fragrance creates spirit and courage.

name: wet-cherry-liquor
detail: This scent is an over-sensual  almost erotic journey into the depths of temptations and memories. It is the search for elation that brings inner rebirth.

name: giovanna-baby-cherry-1
detail: A romantic  engaging and unique scent. A delicious love potion.

name: ma-cherry
detail: A nod to the cherry blossom. A spring fragrance that evokes the freshness of a cherry orchard in bloom and the renewal of nature. Nothing opulent or ostentatious  only a tender and delicate fragrance.

name: chocolate-covered-cherry
detail: Let the scent of a sweet treat take you to the patisserie of your dreams.

name: black-essential-self-1
detail: Black Essential Self captures the essence of masculinity with an air of sophistication  inviting you to feel the best part of being authentic. A fresh scent that conveys an elegant air of confidence.

name: n-7-frescor-mediterraneo
detail: Discover the refreshing personality of the Mediterranean. An intense citrus freshness is mixed with the elegance of an unmistakable marine accord. Spicy notes blend with an exquisite combination of woods that add character and masculinity to the fragrance.

name: far-away-beyond
detail: A fragrance that redefines the meaning of glamour and sophistication. Embark on a new journey of discovery that reveals the beauty and femininity of Far Away in unexpected ways. Escape to the island of Madagascar and explore a new natural and authentic side of vanilla. Sustainable and respectful of nature  it is a fragrance that leaves an unforgettable trail of diffusion.

name: eliana-glamour
detail: Eliana Glamour fragrance is a scent that translates her femininity and glamour through the surprising combination of flowers and fruits with the touch of vanilla.

name: choc-1
detail: An enveloping scent that provokes an immediate seduction.

name: selection-by-soliver-women-eau-intense
detail: Effortless  confident and with a seductive intensity. This olfactory creation offers the perfect cloak of fragrance for an exquisite mise-en-scène. For a night out in a classy bar of choice  a chic private party or a club in the city  Selection Eau Intense is the perfect fragrance for a special evening  making it a glamorous gift for the holidays.

name: baldessarini-signature-1
detail: Baldessarini Signature embodies strong traits: masculine  intense  sophisticated  unmistakable and unwaveringly fresh. This fragrance will be the first choice for confident men who go through life with an unmistakable signature; men who are not afraid to make their mark anytime  anywhere; men who love the good things in life  but don't need these things to feel validated.

name: patchouli-indonesia
detail: Patchouli Indonesia is a deliciously enveloping and velvety woody fragrance  expressing all the depth and mystery of patchouli  enhanced by green  resinous and soft notes  together with fresh and bright touches.

name: 247-for-her-1
detail: A perfume for girls who know how to have fun 24 hours a day.

name: arbo-forest-1
detail: Arbo Forest believes that nature is the most powerful charger ever. The forest is a true source of energy  and being in contact with it awakens the senses and brings renewal.

name: black-label-men
detail: Black and white: the opposite and yet the perfect unity. Purist and anything but boring. The classic scent that embodies pure elegance and manages to make a clear statement in its simplicity. One that is found in the new s.Oliver Black Label fragrances.

name: sirenis
detail: Laying on the rock  the mermaids sing their songs  like perfume  with irresistible charm to attract the seafarers near the rugged shore. This fragrance is a mirage  a song of magical  invigorating and euphoric smells that give hope on the horizon: the discovery of a promised land with new scents. A lively  slightly iodised fragrance. A wind of love: Sirenis.

name: levidence
detail: L’Evidence  is a story of freedom  the idea of leaving a mark for a better world.​

name: shakira-golden-dream-2020
detail: Shakira presents Golden Dream  the emblem for achievement  dedication and courage in its most golden elegant version. Shakira has made it to the top. She has fulfilled her dream to be an internationally recognised artist. It's time for her to share the secret of her success with all her fans. The dream continues with you.

name: 214-jasmim-patchouli
detail: We have chosen the most fragrant and striking flower to be the protagonist of this eau de parfum. Jasmine raises the olfactory level with its strength and femininity. Patchouli  an ingredient so often used in fine perfumery and on the international market  is in this jewel-like creation because it contains its most premium and pure fraction  guaranteeing the sophistication of the fragrance.

name: the-duckers-into-the-jungle-1
detail: The Duckers Into The Jungle is an adventurous and exciting journey in search of nature's ultimate splendours. It has the same exotic and erotic appeal of a big cat in its natural element: the jungle.

name: quasar-surf-1
detail: The perfumer went looking for ingredients in the most spectacular surf spots around the world  creating a fragrance with a freshness to inspire you to overcome your fears.

name: dama-da-noite-1
detail: In the moonlight a new garden blooms. The beams of light passing through the flowers reveal previously hidden colours  and the dew falling on the leaves announces the freshness of the night. It is at this moment that the flower of the Lady of the Night awakens and becomes the jewel of the garden.

name: frescor-exotico-limited-edition-2023-1
detail: Explore an exotic nature. Feel the absolute freshness of citrus as it melts into sparkling spicy notes  while precious base notes bring seduction and durability to the perfume on the skin.

name: 300-kmh-quantum
detail: 300km/h Quantum presents an adrenaline rush out of this world! A fragrance made for the man who challenges himself to go beyond the imagination and overcome barriers.

name: ikat-jasmine
detail: "Ikat Jasmine embodies the modern woman  effortless style and intriguing femininity " Aerin Lauder  Founder.

name: spring-jasmine-1
detail: Inspired by the intricate decor  rich colors  infused with the local flora and cultural mysteries of the Silk Road  renowned master perfumer  Carlos Benaim has created a collection for Shanghai Tang that captivates all of the senses. The collection pays tribute to the grandeur of Chinese culture through the multiple facets and mystical essence of the unique scents.

name: rosa-turca-1
detail: Rose Turca is inspired by the tradition of Isparta  the homeland of roses. While the intense rose hypnotises  a bouquet of flowers and musky notes prolong an endless song.

name: peace-jasmine
detail: Calm. Like teatime with your best friend. Indulge in a soothing pause in an otherwise crazy day. Peace & Jasmine has the ability to transport you back to a special time  and smelling it after that time  might recall those memories and wonderful moments.

name: jasmin-exclusif
detail: A composition full of contrasts around oud and jasmine  two raw materials of rare depth and with multiple facets. A sensual treasure.

name: so-flowers-1
detail: A bouquet full of highly fragrant flowers comes together to create a delicate and bewitching composition. A musky base of warmth and sweetness completes the fragrance.

name: instant-crush-1
detail: This irresistible scent is sensual and romantic with a wave of elegance that will stir your senses.

name: jasmin-angelique
detail: He had prepared for this moment for several months. Each clue would lead her to the next recalling one by one the places of that magical first encounter. She is finally there. Overcome by the beauty and power of jasmine in bloom  it is apparent their love is ready for the next step.

name: jasmine-sun-rose-eau-de-toilette-2
detail: An Egyptian landscape captured in late summer’s blushing dusk. Royal jasmine blooms  painted as tiny stars in a sea of fields. Faraway rose sands rise and fall like dynasties with a single brushstroke. Beguile your senses with a deltaic masterpiece.

name: quatre-en-bleu-1
detail: A multifaceted composition with a solar sillage that expresses audacity and self-confidence.

name: aoud-jasmine-1
detail: The alliance of the fruity and citrus notes open Aoud Jasmine while the sensual floral heart sublimates Aoud from Nepal for a fleshly sillage in the base.

name: dana-buchman-luxury
detail: Dana Buchman luxury is a radiant floral fragrance that captures timeless glamour and relaxed elegance. Designed to be the finishing touch to your wardrobe  Dana Buchman Luxury is a fragrance to wear anytime  anywhere  because its scent is inherently feminine and classically elegant.

name: wood-jasmin-1
detail: He walks through large tree-lined streets and a strange golden light appears. You hear a soft melody. Behind the wall decorated with jasmine  there is a fairy. She is lying in the water and her golden hair caresses the river. He is mesmerised. But he must leave before nightfall  because the forest is beautiful but also mysterious.

name: cookies-kisses
detail: A nostalgic and indulgent fragrance that instantly reminds you of the aroma of spiced and buttery home-baked goods.

name: always-red-femme
detail: Always Red Femme pulls you into the world of the trendsetter who's always on the move  leaving a trail of leather and lace as she sets the pace of the city. Confident and inherently feminine  she walks in. It's all or nothing.

name: perfectly-marvelous-1
detail: 'Why don't you' - Celine Barel was inspired by Ms. Vreeland's quote: "If it's not a passion  it's not burning  it's not on fire  you haven't lived!" to create Perfectly Marvelous.

name: aspire-debut
detail: Aspire is inspired by the warmth and passion of women determined to follow their path. Aspire Debut. Be anything. Be everything.

name: desire-red-extreme
detail: "Our vision for Dunhill Red Extreme was to create a modern expression of passionate energy  sophisticated luxury  and masculine sensuality " Carlos Benaïm and Céline Barel  Perfumers.

name: be-delicious-summer-squeeze-2020-1
detail: Seize the day and make the most of the moment with DKNY Be Delicious Summer Squeeze. A playful citrus floral scent blending effervescent fruit  bright white flowers and lush warmth  it’s a fragrance as sunny and juicy as the season itself.
ingredients: ['Grapefruit', 'Vanilla', 'Green Apple', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Mandarin', 'Orange', 'Ginger', 'Musk', 'Woody Notes', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: be-delicious-pool-party-mai-tai-2019-1
detail: Dive into this playfully addictive fragrance - DKNY Be Delicious Pool Party Mai Tai makes a splash this summer with this limited-edition Pool Party scent  Inspired by trendy summer cocktails that are staples at every pool party  one spray will make you feel as if you're lounging next to the water.

name: jolie-fleur-bleue
detail: Jolie Fleur Bleue  a uniquely understated  elegant and captivating fragrance inspired by the flowers and colors in Tory's garden.

name: sparkly-citrus-2
detail: Citrus bathes you in an invigorating burst of sunny notes to impart a whirlwind of lively  exhilarating freshness.

name: vent-du-sud-azur
detail: Inspired by infinite blue skies  Vent du Sud Azur is a fresh floral scent  evoking freedom when sailing in the late afternoon.

name: first-instinct-sheer-for-her-1
detail: First Instinct Sheer for Her is a fragrance for women who trust their passions and follow their instincts.
ingredients: ['Hibiscus', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Orange Blossom', 'Bergamot', 'Amber', 'Musk', 'Pink Pepper', 'Woody Notes']

name: indigo-mist
detail: This delicate and refreshing signature captures the unique scent of a flower garden following a rain shower.

name: jasmine-in-tangerine-1
detail: A mischievous British take on a flower suffused with Eastern promise. The most British of exotic flowers  which is steeped in the floral language of love and grand passion.

name: jolie-fleur-rose-1
detail: Jolie Fleur RoseA romantic  classic and modern fragrance inspired by the flowers and colours of Tory's garden.

name: dragonfly-2021
detail: Like a lotus spreading its petals  Dragonfly opens with a rush of beautiful aquatic florals. Hints of rice and white flowers diffuse from within a lush shroud of green  beneath the intimate aroma of an imminent summer shower. Dragonfly encapsulates the richness and romance of impressionism  a canvas of florals under a watery veil.

name: olympea-legend-5
detail: A modern-day goddess. Heaven-scent. Iconic  chic. Unique. Half-myth  half-muse. Smiling on victory as her natural reward. Ready to seduce Zeus. Trouble in paradise endures this sensual salty-vanilla  earthly scent.
ingredients: ['Salty Vanilla', 'Plum', 'Tonka Bean', 'Amber', 'White Ginger Lily', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Desert Palm Flower']

name: dkny-women-summer-2019
detail: New York's rooftop pool parties are the place to see and be seen. Soaring over the city on a hot summer day is the perfect way to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life  relax and enjoy summer in the city. DKNY's summer fragrance for women will embody the look and feel of a chic  fun and vibrant New York rooftop party.

name: 4711-remix-electric-night
detail: Party in the club and all eyes are on you. You feel sexy and free  letting the sound of the music pulse through you as you dance. A glittery outfit and glossy lips  you're turning heads in the club. The night is really just beginning. Pump up the volume and let yourself shine with this electrifying scent!

name: dkny-be-tempted-eau-so-blush-2016
detail: Be Tempted Eau Blush draws you in to experience a softer side of temptation with a fresh floral and woody blended scent.

name: baby-bouquet
detail: A fresh and powdery scent that conveys the nostalgic and innocent feeling of childhood.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Skin Accord', 'Mandarin', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Ambertonic (Woody Ambery)', 'Petitgrain', 'Vetiver', 'Spearmint']

name: shawn-mendes-signature
detail: An addictive scent for the new generation of men and women. Designed to be worn as an individual expression of confidence  passion and determination.

name: neroli-nasimba
detail: For Neroli Nasimba  Thibaud Crivelli  founder of the brand  was inspired by a personal experience of discovering orange blossom on safari. From this memory was born the desire to create a surprising and daring perfume.

name: aqua-allegoria-nerolia-vetiver
detail: Nerolia Vetiver is  first and foremost  an emotion. A fragrant memory of the landscapes of the island of Ischia in the bay of Naples: the generosity of nature  whose light inspires this fragrance with its freshness sculpted by shadow. It is also a love story. Thierry Wasser and Delphine Jelk  Guerlain Perfumers  fell in love with an exceptional material: an extraordinary neroli from Calabria. The result is a floral allegory of Mediterranean light.

name: eau-de-cologne-jean-marie-farina-1
detail: The original eau de cologne  the legendary perfect balance between the dazzling freshness of citrus fruits and the elegance of aromatics.

name: neroli-facetie
detail: Néroli Facétie has an attitude that's cheerful  joyful  playful. The sheer art of having fun with facial expressions or little games.

name: neroli-e-orchidea
detail: A fragrance with unpredictable facets: joyful and pure like a citrus flower  tender and provocative like a magnificent orchid.
ingredients: ['Orchid', 'Neroli', 'Musk', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Kumquat', 'Lemon Blossom', 'Orange', 'Peach', 'Woody Notes']

name: neroli-portofino-acqua
detail: Neroli Portofino Acqua is an invitation to the seductive atmosphere of the Italian Riviera from a new perspective: floating on the idyllic blue waters of the coast with endless skies and steep green hillsides in sight.

name: neroli-outrenoir-2021-1
detail: Neroli  so incredibly pure  is reinterpreted here in a play of contrasts between white and black  between innocence and mystery " Delphine Jelk  Perfumer.

name: neroli-peace
detail: I am fullness  calm and serenity. I connect to the moment  here and now. I was born from the harmony between neroli  orange blossom and musks. I am in the ray of the sun  in the breath of meditation. I am the sweet scent of chill.

name: neroli-3
detail: A hymn to the duality of neroli  whose innocence hides a true sensuality.

name: iris-neroli
detail: Iris & Néroli is a sensual aroma that carries you away to a charming oriental garden full of flowers in bloom.

name: neroli-woods-1
detail: Stimulating mandarin leaves wrap around darker notes for an exhilarating blend.

name: secrets-dessences-neroli
detail: A symbol of subtle and delicate femininity  this original musky floral creation based on Neroli provides a sensual and refined sensation of freshness thanks to its exceptional raw materials.

name: neroli-intense-1
detail: Néroli Intense echoes the sensual relationship between man and nature  an invigorating and refreshing citrus fragrance that transports you to the heart of Provence in summer.

name: just-jack-neroli
detail: Just Jack Neroli is the embodiment of luxury and exclusivity. Treat yourself to a fragrance that will make you absolutely unique wherever you are.

name: mango-skin-1
detail: Mango Skin is meant to bring the many pleasures of sun  joy  flirting  love  and happiness to the skin.

name: passiflora-3
detail: A delicate and sensual artisanal perfume that surrounds one with melodious and harmonious notes. A delightful alliance of fruity and floral notes that brings with it the simplicity and freshness of a new Spring day.

name: dirty-mango
detail: A wildly explicit fragrance of ripe fleshy mango  sun-kissed skin and creamy woods. Inspired by sultry tropical nights dancing to cumbia beats  fiery make-out sessions under damp jungle vines and the unforgettable aroma of a thick mango fresh from the tree. An exotic little getaway in a jar.

name: green-gaya
detail: Summer comes with the warmth of the Arabian sun. You see a mirage in the middle of the desert that carries the ray of hope you have always been looking for. Then you know that with effort comes prosperity. The heat of summer would feel like a breeze in spring  it makes me feel happy because I am sure to find you. You are my purpose and my destiny.

name: mango-mood
detail: Mango Wood is a dynamic  ripe fruit fragrance that threads a balance between grounded sweetness and unbridled sensuality.

name: alegria-brasileria-1
detail: Alegria Brasileria is a sweet floral fragrance that is a little bit of every corner of Brazil.

name: sunplosion-aloha-state-of-mind
detail: An explosion of vitality and energy which embodies the Sun of Hawaii. Surfers  massive waves  bronzed skin  and the freedom feeling that you breathe on the magnificent beaches of Oahu. A taste of Hawaii that celebrates the local symbol fruit by realising a unique and special fragrance  the delicious Excel Mango from Makaha.

name: daisy-ever-so-fresh
detail: Daisy Ever So Fresh exudes a burst of freshness that embodies a bright  bold attitude  overflowing with vivacious energy and inspiring spontaneity through its youthful spirit and effervescent charm.

name: miss-giordani-1
detail: A glamorous  elegant and ultra-feminine fragrance. Miss Giordani encompasses the passion and subtle sophistication of the Italian lifestyle.

name: hauts-bijoux
detail: The fresh  tropical scents of Hauts Bijoux was inspired by the sweet and wondrous essence destiny and prosperity that bring to us a sense of newfound wisdom and optimism for all things beautiful. This scent is an luminous expression of the abundant beauty and sweet fortunes that the world has to offer.

name: mango-thai-lime
detail: “Thailand is a very special place for me and a constant source of inspiration. I love the sharp zesty qualities of the Thai Lime and shot over mango it creates a very clean  cologne-like scent.” – Jo Malone

name: soleil-de-jeddah-mango-kiss
detail: Soleil de Jeddah Mango Kiss is a bold  vitamin-packed version of Soleil de Jeddah. An irresistibly gourmand fragrance of great pleasure.

name: we-rock-for-women
detail: We Rock! For Women represents the energy  gorgeous dresses and bright lights and dancing the night away in the nightclub.

name: something-about-sofia
detail: She lives in a dream more dazzling than fiction  imaginary yet real she defies all prediction. An incredible girl Sofia draws you right in  to where the every day ends "and magic begins.”

name: treffpunkt-8-uhr
detail: When you are getting ready to go on your blind date  you go through all types of emotions.

name: cool-water-grapefruit-sage-2022
detail: A unique form of natural masculinity awakens through this refreshingly sensual accord.

name: magnolia-tree
detail: An unconventional scent that exudes inner confidence and fortitude.

name: do-son-eau-de-toilette-limited-edition-2022
detail: In limited edition  Do Son is adorned with blue. An evocation of the freshness of tuberose mixed with sea air. With turquoise water merging with the sky in the distance. With the scent of mystery permeating the night. An invitation to let the imagination fly.

name: bergamote-racines
detail: Revel in the elegance of this sparkling and sumptuous scent.

name: esprit-de-la-vallee
detail: A deep woody fragrance that smells like the wind in the mountains  able to release the inner pressure and escape freely.

name: the-wedding-velvet-santal-35-2023
detail: Designed as an ode to everlasting love  Mona and Hassan created The Wedding Collection to wear on their special day. Aptly named after the silk gown Mona wore and the velvet suit Hassan wore on their wedding day. The Wedding Silk Santal | 36 and The Wedding Velvet Santal | 35 were inspired by and are bound by the strength of creamy sandalwood. Timeless when worn alone yet amplified when layered together  these juices are made to be shared and celebrate love in all its forms.

name: passionate-chypre
detail: Passionate Chypre captures the emblematic signature of the pocket square. A surprising and addictive scent that gets pulses racing.

name: white-ballad
detail: This scent inspires a walk by night  under the moonlight  from dusk to dawn. A sleepless night  a midnight bath in the Trevi Fountain  a hypnotic dance by a queen of the night.

name: mercedes-benz-sign-your-attitude
detail: Happy  sure of himself and his aura  the Sign your Attitude man displays an assertive  fulfilled attitude. He knows he has succeeded and he makes the most of it.

name: nashi-blossom-2023
detail: As spring awakens  so does nashi blossom. An emblem of purity  these blousy white  speckled flowers bunch along the arching branches of the nashi tree  soon to become succulent pears. With petaly rose  this radiant bloom’s playful fruity scent is cushioned in white musk.

name: eclat-de-tubereuse
detail:
A spark in the darkland  Éclat de Tubéreuse  the flower of the night  a daring and luminous perfume sparkling in the obscurity  to set us in
motion and seek our own destiny.

name: leau-papier-1
detail: L’Eau Papier is a flawless portrayal of paper and a way for each wearer to express their unique individuality.

name: barbotine
detail: An aromatic freshness mixed with the floral delicacy of chamomile and warm  woody notes.

name: ilio-eau-de-toilette-2023
detail: Ilio is a tribute to the Mediterranean land  bathed in light and fragrance. The artist Erik Winkowski has illustrated the iconic oval on this limited-edition bottle  a creation of coloorful simplicity that celebrates the authenticity of nature in the summertime.

name: do-son-eau-de-toilette-limited-edition-2023
detail: A limited edition of Do Son's bottle adorned with blue. An evocation of the freshness of tuberose mingling with the sea air  of turquoise water that merges with the sky in the distance  of the scent of mystery that permeates the night. An invitation to let your imagination soar.

name: neroli-7
detail: The ecstasy of the sun  the gentle heat of the rays at the zenith on the skin. With Néroli  the illusion is perfect.

name: patchouli-mania-by-fabrice-pellegrin
detail: "I imagined a sensual patchouli  at once addictive  deep and mysterious. The composition finds a balance between the richness of patchouli and the powdery sweetness of cocoa " Fabrice Pellegrin  Perfumer.

name: botica-214-fiji-paradise
detail: Botica 214 Fiji Paradise evokes the sensory journey and energy of the Fijian Islands  where the harmony of nature invites you to live every moment to the fullest.

name: marinis-1
detail: The sea and its essences; water that gently caresses the skin  providing an instant sensation of peace and tranquillity.

name: fellas
detail: This is a soft  earthy  and sensual scent that depicts a vision of modern masculinity  empowering the man who wears it.

name: bay-rum
detail: Burning with the spicy glints of crushed bay leaves  this fragrance is wonderfully invigorating. Vibrant  fresh and invigorating  it is a striking cologne reminiscent of the West Indian islands.

name: master-cedar
detail: "The modernity of man with his heritage past still present"  Azzi Glasser  Olfactory Director and Perfumer.

name: phy-arctic
detail: Experience a breakthrough of freshness with Phy Arctic. Inspired by the ocean  refreshing and icy.

name: saved-by-the-musk-1
detail: "Let us read  and let us dance  these two amusements will never do any harm to the world " Voltaire  French Writer.

name: flamboyant
detail: Live the limitless life most men dream of! For an urban globetrotter in search of total perfection and a unique luxurious lifestyle.

name: aramis-900
detail: Tradition with a dash of the unexpected. Contemporary  exciting  crisp and adventurous.

name: voltaire
detail: With Voltaire  Boulevard has created the olfactory portrait of a man at home with the dynamics of his age.

name: cigar-1
detail: In this masculine creation  everyday sensations are left behind. Cigar by Rémy Latour is powerful and spirited.

name: new-west-skinscent-for-him-1
detail: The fresh ozonic top note mixes with crisp citrus and leafy green accents. The brisk clarity of herbs forges a counterpoint to fragrant spices. A combination of fragrant grassy notes mingles with rich background woody notes.

name: vibrant-fruity
detail: There is nothing more refreshing and invigorating than the fresh burst of vibrant fruits! Complemented with a flirty twist of delicate floralcy and a comforting background. This fragrance is effortlessly beautiful and makes you feel alive every time you breathe in!

name: mure-et-musc-extreme-1
detail: Extremely fruity from the start  extremely sweet and strong: this eau de parfum is another way to love blackberry with passion! A delight that is both fresh and intoxicating. Sweetness and sensuality to the core. Mûre et Musc Extrême is deep and unique... wear it all day long  from early in the morning until late at night  for those special  rare and refined evenings.

name: brilliant-woman-n-2-1
detail: Betty Barclay Brillian Woman N° 2 is a glamorous fragrance  even more alluring than a cocktail dress.

name: vanille-blackberry-1
detail: A delightful fragrance mixing fruits and flowers: a refreshing start with citrus  followed by a generous bouquet of flowers in the heart. The final print is gourmet mixed with musky and woody notes.

name: 203-frambroise-vanille-mure-1
detail: Sweet ray of sunshine and red berries.

name: mure-et-musc
detail: Mûre et Musc is the iconic debut of L'Artisan Parfumeur's first collection and stands out for its innovation and  ultimately  its classicism. Bold and unforgettable

name: mure-framboise
detail: Mûre Framboise a delightful fruity fragrance for the exciting woman.

name: charismatique-blackberry
detail: This clean  natural fragrance transports you to a glorious garden.

name: sexy-9-blackberry-vanilla-musk
detail: A sexier  more sultry way to wear 9 Blackberry and Vanilla Musk. Infused with Amazon lilies  the intoxicating scent of patchouli  and the added warmth of amber.

name: blackberry-lily-1
detail: Blackberry Lily is a warm perfume inspired by cosy gatherings with the ones you love. Enjoy endless compliments. Bring aromatherapy joy to those around you.

name: encanto-charming-1
detail: Encanto Charming is a seductive  floral spritz with the scent of blackberry and warm musk. Leaves skin feeling cool and refreshed.

name: mora-bella-1
detail: A delicious association of sweet and juicy fruits with tropical flowers resting on a comforting background of sandalwood and musk.

name: bouquet-fruite
detail: In Dr. Renaud's garden  plants are not only a source of performance and results. Fruits and flowers bring their perfume  their colour  their freshness in a collection of light waters that inspire in those who wear them the same sensation of radiance as with care. These are the Radiant Waters  they make life lighter and more joyful.

name: blackberry-vanilla-musk-9
detail: Think sweet dreams with Trish McEvoy's #9 Blackberry and Vanilla Musk  a sheer sweet scent.

name: blackberry-pie-1
detail: It is unusual to centre a fragrance around blackberry  and that unique perspective is both apparent and well served in this one-of-a-kind scent.

name: mure-2
detail: Blackberry by Solinotes  a tangy fragrance with fruity charms.

name: fruit-damour-pink-blackberry
detail: Pink Blackberry was created with the modern  mysterious and sensual woman in mind.

name: eau-de-mure-1
detail: Eau de Mûre is delicious like a walk in the woods where you escape from the path to pick juicy  tart berries.

name: 501-praline-reglisse-patchouli
detail: 501 PRALINE RÉGLISSE PATCHOULI evokes the deliciousness of sweet pastries and powdered iris.

name: vanille-rouge
detail: Vanille Rouge encompasses the Madagascar vanilla  adding a hint of pralines. The sweet tones are accompanied by a powdery musk accord. The powerful fragrance contains an unexpected rose note.

name: agua-de-bambu-secret-mist-edition-2020-1
detail: Adolfo Dominguez invites us to rediscover the bamboo forests. A journey through the most spectacular nature  the most mysterious sensuality  and evanescent beauty.

name: smoky-tonka
detail: Smoky Tonka whisks us away to a classy chalet in the French Alps where we relax in front of a crackling fire as we dive into the world of desserts.

name: connect-her-1
detail: Soft and mysterious  a sophisticated and sensual fragrance for the modern  free-spirited girl.

name: ooh-la-rouge
detail: A sparkling and bright yet rich and intoxicating fragrance with an element of gourmand temptation.

name: naturelle-mira
detail: A beautiful vanilla scent wrapped in delicious praline.

name: police-contemporary-amber-gold-for-woman-2
detail: Amber Gold for Woman is an homage to a magnetic and alluring femininity. This scent is dedicated to a confident woman who is ready to own her sensuality with a sophisticated and luminous attitude.

name: boum-vanille-pomme-damour-1
detail: "Boum Vanille et sa Pomme d’Amour" that’s the magical world of the funfair and circus. Boum! You are in the middle of circus tents  candy floss  and sparkling lights! This is the romantic side of this magical and mysterious fragrance.

name: petit-caprice
detail: It's never too late to stroll down rue des Remparts in Bordeaux. When window-shopping  you never know what to choose  what you will like  what will seduce you. And suddenly  there it is. Surrounded by chocolate croissants  a praline heart covered in a vanilla peel  sprinkled with orange zest. We are about to push open the door and leave. We must be strong. But the desire is still there; it's stronger than ever and we can't resist any longer. But what fun it is to succumb to a whim.

name: daphne-2
detail: A beautiful  soft  white flower Daphne has a delicate  sweet  spicy and soapy scent. The Napa Valley in California is the only place in the United States where this plant grows wild.

name: intimacy-capri-2020
detail: Capri  the name conjures up dreamy images of a sunny beach  surrounded by the bright azure blue waters of the Mediterranean. Imagine a scent that transports you to a carefree life on an island where the sun always shines.

name: f-for-him-1
detail: Invigorating  luminous and sensual.

name: togs-unlimited
detail: To celebrate the Brand’s 40th anniversary  Chevignon has launched Togs Unlimited  a fragrance that will whisk you away to one of America’s great arid deserts  dominated by red and amber earth.

name: for-a-kiss-bohemian-love-2020-1
detail: A sweet perfume for girls dreaming of escaping to an idealistic world with a bohemian spirit.

name: solano
detail: "Solano is a burst of sunshine  the expression of the southern winds. I wanted to blend the spicy aromas of the desert with the bright ambery accords of ylang-ylang and artemisia flowers " Jean-Claude Ellena  Olfactory Director and Perfumer.

name: courreges-homme-2018
detail: A masculinity full of nuances  at once elegant and full of strength. Feel the burst of frosty lavender. A silent and powerful shudder. Elegance and sensuality.

name: infinite-shine
detail: “In the Middle-East  I had the privilege of experiencing an unforgettable ritual. The moment when men and women scent their garments in the smoke of smouldering oud  the folds of gold-embroidered fabric swirling and fluttering  filling the whole room with fragrance. This was my inspiration to create this rich duo of sensuous rose and wild saffron.” - Corinne Cachen  Perfumer

name: nubica
detail: Jean-Claude Ellena has created this sensual woody  ambery fragrance to evoke the habitat of the lion  slinking through the hot savannah. This is perceived through the warmth and sensuality of Tonka Bean and Patchouli. This unique composition has been crafted in the traditions of French haute perfumery  using only the most precious primary ingredients.

name: gems-party-2021
detail: You’re invited to the most exciting party ever  where you’re the most important guest because you’re a precious stone and you shine more than ever!

name: n-16-flor-exotica
detail: A sensual fragrance with touches of luminous accords that evoke sensuality and femininity.

name: michalsky-iii-for-women
detail: A soft powdery temptation  Michalsky III for Women seduces with a refined combination of fruity notes and delicate florals. A silky combination that delicately unfolds on the skin and appeals to the sensual side of every woman.

name: fort-royal
detail: "Fort Royal evokes the islands of the Caribbean  full of warmth and exoticism. A luxurious nature wrapped in amber and gourmand notes". Jean-Claude Ellena  Olfactory Director

name: quartz-rose-1
detail: The Quartz Rose woman is independent  elegant  and sparkling. In daylight as well as at night  life belongs to her. The future seems far for her  she doesn't care about tomorrow. A very sensual and slightly gourmand  this fragrance is a real jewel.

name: damascus-desert
detail: Let’s break the rules with an audacious scent of fascinating originality. Fizzy start sets the tone with the vivifying finish. Unconventionally chic yet contrasted!

name: 1902-freesia-coton-1
detail: A fresh and cosy eau de toilette. Freesia & Cotton highlights an immaculate bouquet of white and freesia flowers.

name: n-15-flor-oriental
detail: A unique combination of addictive notes in which seduction and femininity predominate.

name: young-man-peace-and-love-1
detail: This sunny  woody fruity scent is for boys looking for thrills  freedom  and action.

name: moon-river
detail: A sparkling and audacious perfume. Moon River celebrates the freshness of natural citrus essences by combining them with iconic French perfume notes for exceptional performance.

name: venetian-blue-intense-1
detail: This intense composition captures the look of the man who likes to be bold and extraordinary.

name: flor-tropical-limited-edition-2022
detail: A feminine and sensual fragrance that highlights the delicacy of rose petals illuminated by the freshness of gardenia and the strength of jasmine. The base notes are composed of the more velvety note of vanilla along with tonka bean and musk.

name: patchouli-baie-rose-1
detail: Spicy patchouli infused with light and freshness. Unexpected accords create a tropical  woody  oceanic sea breeze  as invigorating as it is fascinating.

name: 104-orange-verte-jacynthe-lierre-2019
detail: A perfume that wakens with fresh notes. It mixes jasmine and hyacinth floral notes with aquatic scent. It reveals a woody base with seductive and powerful notes. A complex fragrance that is not easily tamed.

name: pride-intense
detail: An intense and more sensual interpretation of Pride Pour Homme.

name: amber-magic
detail: Amber Magic  a perfume designed for men who are game changers with their magic and charm. With the spicy undertone and woody composition  this fragrance delivers a strong aroma.

name: penthouse-larvotto
detail: If your dreams don’t scare you  they are too small. With Penthouse Larvotto  dream big  be confident and rule the world!

name: aromatic-spices-jasmine
detail: Aromatic spices mingle with jasmine to envelop the senses. A heavenly fragrance for those who want to feel confident as they go about their day  for work or play  with a spring in their step as fragrant jasmine heart notes accentuate the air.

name: n-4-apres-lamour
detail: This nuanced  multi-layered scent captures the erotic energy and languorous mood of skin meeting skin.

name: equipage-geranium-1
detail: "I tried to capture the smell a thousand times  a thousand times it escaped me. Drawn by its complexity  its sumptuousness  I took this perfume with me when I travelled to discover it." - Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer

name: joyful-revel-1
detail: C-Thru Joyful Revel is a Joyful fragrance  inspiring with it's elegance. The fragrance is intended for special occasions for women who  on the one hand  like to stand out  and on the other  celebrate secrets.

name: full-speed-max-turbo-1
detail: Experience the thrill of driving in the fast lane of this adrenaline-pumping fragrance. Get in the driver's seat and feel an immediate rush of speed and acceleration from this heart-pounding opening. Celebrate the excitement and passion with your hands on the steering wheel  a man craves as you're elevated to the sensational heights of freedom and energy on the open road.
ingredients: ['Bergamot', 'Skin Accord', 'Fresh Spices', 'Buchu / Agathosma', 'Adrenaline accord', 'Apple Sorbet', 'Amber', 'Leather', 'Ozonic Notes']

name: desafiant-1
detail: The stage lights highlight that bold and uncomplicated attitude. They want to get closer  decipher every detail that they can't see. Challenge them to meet you.

name: bogart-story-blue
detail: Bogart Story Blue by Jacques Bogart Cologne. Leave your mark wherever you go by wearing Bogart Story Blue for men. This scent begs to be worn daily!

name: british-sterling-him-reserve-1
detail: H.I.M. Reserve is a sensual fragrance that offers the perfect blend of sophistication and joy.

name: karst
detail: With its subtle mineral notes  Karst or ‘The Shore’ signals a landscape sculpted by nature’s most skilled architect: water. The coming and going of the tide creates a world in which departure and return  inhalation and exhalation  exist in a constant loop  where time is both accumulating and transitory.

name: officer-gold
