detail: Fragrance of contrasts  a real elixir of seduction  Officer Gold opens with a sparkling blend of fresh notes. The powerful and virile heart is a spiced combination enlightened by a floral touch. The rich and sensual drydown reveals the presence of some rare and precious woods of amber.

name: 300-kmh-max-turbo-1
detail: The cooling addictive frozen apple is blended with an exclusive Adrenaline Accord  adding a unique load of citrus freshness. Sophisticated luxe leather leaves a remarkable trail long after you’ve reached full speed.

name: tobacco-rush-1
detail: A beautiful representation of power and success.

name: cedrat-boise
detail: This is a gorgeously blended  remarkably versatile  and enjoyable fragrance.

name: jardin-des-thes
detail: Jardin des Thés is a modern and sophisticated fragrance with an invigorating trail and irreproachable longevity

name: leau-neuve-evocations-1
detail: L'Eau Neuve  created in 1968  offers a citrusy freshness with aromas of Mediterranean undergrowth. Its chic  casual elegance  underlined by notes of patchouli and bergamot  encapsulates a time of fun and freedom.

name: quorum-1
detail: Sophisticated leather and tobacco notes combine with a lively complex of green aromatics that give it a dry masculine personality.

name: riviera-drive
detail: The mythical scenic drive along the coastline of the French Riviera  so vividly captured in Hitchcock's 'To Catch A Thief'  starring Grace Kelly and Cary Grant  is the inspiration for Rivera Drive. This reviving scent highlights the coastline's panoramic charm and adventurous spirit.

name: pour-homme-la-collection-1
detail: The original classic fragrance in a new bottle. Yves Saint Laurent Pour Homme. A refined fragrance. A timeless and elegant fragrance. A citrus harmony

name: marjolaine-1
detail: Marjolaine is a dazzling floral. It is a fresh and romantic feminine fragrance  both long-lasting and sensual. The innocence of the pastel shades hides a rich and reassuring personality  like an unforgettable second skin.

name: juniper-berry-marjoram-1
detail: Juniper Berry Marjoram  a declaration of love to the sense of smell.

name: 58-avenue-montaigne-pour-homme-1
detail: A timeless woody architecture  modernised by an ambery signature and boosted by an urban aromatic freshness.

name: valoroso-men-1
detail: Valoroso for Men is a refreshing and exotic fragrance made for a courageous  goal-setting  visionary man.

name: via-camerelle
detail: This scent shares its name with the most prestigious street on the island of Capri. A memory  an emotion  a walk in the harmony of a ray of sunshine  through blue skies and freshly picked flowers.

name: corvette-black-2
detail: The legend is as black as coal. As black as shadows. The dark side of power. The power under the hood. Speed is inside your chest. Steel in your hands. Feel the power - Corvette Black.

name: four-thieves-1
detail: Four Thieves is the perfumer's medieval herbal concoction reimagined.

name: agua-fresca-1
detail: Agua Fresca is an authentic and relaxing signature male scent.

name: attimo-pour-homme
detail: For a man  every instant has to be lived with intensity and style and needs to be fully savoured. Attimo Pour Homme is the fragrance that carries the intensity of life's decisive moments  because a man's life is thrilling.

name: malia
detail: A charm or "malìa" in Italian  is that mysterious ability to trap your prey by using a sort of occult persuasion  not necessarily the result of magic in the true sense of the word.

name: le-dieu-bleu-1
detail: Created in ancient Egypt  4000 BC  Le Dieu Bleu exhales its divine and mysterious perfume to inspire beneficial mediation with the powers beyond. Now beautifully reconstituted by perfumer Dominique Ropion  its marvellous  intoxicating and solar essences evoke the colourful splendour of the temples and frescoes of ancient Egypt.

name: les-nuits-1
detail: A hot summer night in 1838 at the Maison de Nohant  where famous and sumptuous evening parties were held. The air is saturated with the sumptuous perfume of French novelist George Sand  now recreated by perfumer Dominique Ropion. A unique and intoxicating fragrance with a fiery personality.

name: beso-dorado
detail: As sensual as a second skin  Beso Dorado associates mysterious accords and energetic ingredients to create the scent of a summer evening.

name: tous-loveme-the-emerald-elixir
detail: More than a jewel-perfume  The Emerald Elixir is a nectar that is blended with subtle citrus and floral chords  creating a trail of irresistible sophistication. A constant inspiration to experience the luxury of being true to oneself.

name: magma-1
detail: "The idea for Magma came from the stunning coastline of the Reykjanes Peninsula. A place with dormant volcanoes surrounded by endless lava. I played with fresh and warm notes to make you feel in this magical place in a single whiff " Dominique Ropion  Perfumer.

name: ralphs-club-parfum
detail: This intense fragrance was created for the true mavericks of style and those who inspire others to enjoy the fullness of life around them.

name: alien-hypersense
detail: A radical rebirth of Alien  Alien Hypersense takes the captivating essence of the original Alien fragrance and drives it into a unique hyperbolic and hypnotic territory  igniting the awakening of your hyper senses through three captivating revelations.

name: sur-tes-levres-eq
detail: A sensual scent to evoke the sublime sensation of a lover's kiss.

name: ralphs-club-elixir
detail: Discover the exceptional intensity of Ralph’s Club Elixir. Grounded in the iconic woody sophistication of Ralph’s Club reinterpreted to reveal a more intense and luxurious facet  Ralph’s Club Elixir combines sensual notes refined through an intoxicating ambery quality. The perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to stand out from the crowd and make a statement that lasts long after the night is over.

name: eau-the-audacity
detail: A caution to all those who were of the persuasion that pleasures are best delayed  rules  there to be respected  convention  followed. You may find your world turned upside down! You may be on a one-way path to the discovery of new sensations  to intense delights  to new horizons of unimagined pleasure. How would it feel to dare greatly  with a little fear-not formula? Bold incense and confident orange absolute. A daring twist spiced with saffron and Turkish rose. Leather and vanilla for a soft suede base  reassuringly seductive and strong. For when Doctor Dare prescribes a little fear-not formula. A word of warning: you may find that everything feels possible.

name: y-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: Highly cool. Intensely sensual. Y Eau de Parfum Intense lets you turn up the volume and share your drive. Because ultimately  fragrance is what connects us. And there’s nothing cooler than sharing what you’re passionate about.

name: vanille-leather
detail: "I love this fragrance because it’s a mysterious and audacious perfume  paying tribute to the majestic vanilla " David Benedek  Founder.

name: hacivat-oud
detail: Hacivat Oud was crafted to address the taste of those who desire a luxurious scent that embodies elegance and charm but still has traces of Hacivat. It's the perfect choice for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

name: la-vie-est-belle-leveil-2022-1
detail: Discover the iconic La Vie Est Belle in a refillable limited edition: L'Éveil. Imagined by a prestigious Parisian art school  La Vie est Belle L'Éveil combines two values ​​dear to Lancôme: artistic creation and eco-responsibility. With La Vie Est Belle  Lancôme offers a resolutely contemporary vision of happiness by transforming each moment into a unique moment.

name: jtc-400-1
detail: JTC 400 has been inspired by the exhilarating shopping atmosphere of one of the most celebrated retail stores in the world  located in London at 400  Oxford Street.

name: brioni-eau-de-parfum-intense-1
detail: Rich  vibrant  long-lasting  as elegant as the perfect dinner jacket and just as sexy  Brioni Eau de Parfum Intense is a fragrance that marks your presence with an unforgettable trail. Because it becomes part of who you are. The aura of a legend.

name: carvi-jardin-de-figuier-1
detail: A fresh  floral and fruity scent  evocative of the fragrant fig tree. Carvi and Jardin de Figuier incorporate the essence of fruity citrus notes that sit on a spicy floral heart.

name: desert-orange-blossom
detail: From the skyline of Dubai at dusk  you can see the birds dancing high on rising thermals. At dawn  the call of the desert is intense. The atmosphere turns to gold and the sand unveils hidden dreams: your dream kept vivid long after this immersion.

name: fate-man-1
detail: Fate Man is a spicy and woody construction parodying the force and power of the inevitable.

name: soleil-dambre
detail: The sweetness of jasmine and tiare flowers encounters the energy of amber.

name: boundless
detail: Boundless is a burst of joy  a fleeting euphoria  translating the vertical tension that empowers those who want to enclose in their hands the immensity of the world.
ingredients: ['Vanilla (Bourbon)', 'Cinnamon Leaf', 'Papyrus', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Elemi', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Blood Orange', 'Cocoa', 'Cardamom', 'Ginger', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Moss', 'Oakmoss', 'Patchouli', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Vetiver']

name: maquis-exquis-immortelle
detail: This fragrance is a tribute to Corsica. Its spicy and woody facets make it surprising and strong  symbolising the aridity and humidity of the Corsican soil.

name: lhomme-patchouli
detail: L'Homme Patchouli is a timeless woody fragrance for the classic gentleman.

name: bois-poudre
detail: A subtle blend of flowers and wood with warm  powdery notes.

name: bracken-woman
detail: Recreating the symbols of peace and freedom with luminous ferns and flowers of the woodland  Bracken Woman is a Green Floral inspired by the Flower Power of the 1960s.

name: closer
detail: Oud is known as one of nature's most precious gifts. As an aromatic resin with subtle notes  it is used for the most precious and mysterious perfume compositions. Closer celebrates oud in an unexpectedly fresh way. This scent is literally close  sexy  deep woody and yet fresh  free and floating. An exclusive and precious composition. Extravagant  exciting  uncompromising.

name: bloomy-heaven-1
detail: "I love being able to create atmospheres  unique fragrances and think about the emotions they could arouse. Bloomy Heaven opens with an explosion of femininity before revealing the beauty of a bouquet of white flowers  and then leaves a trail of elegance and sensuality." - A word from the perfumer  Karine Vinchon-Spehner.

name: happy-juice-1
detail: Mild  sweet and adorable: Happy Juice from the Douglas Privée Collection is the perfect scent to feel just as good and vibrant.

name: rose-paris-rose
detail: A touch of gold  everything begins in Paris  Memo's home. The unforgettable city where each souvenir is unique. From the rooftop of the Opera Garnier  Rose Paris Rose is ready to fly following the two bronze statues from Charles Gumery. Harmony and Poetry with their wings spread ready for flight.

name: apollonia-1
detail: Apollonia is a homage to the space shuttle Apollo 11  through which the first moon landing took place  on July 20th 1969. This essence evokes the charm of the deep space  of a night sky illuminated by thousands of shining stars. And in its seductive scent one can perceive the yearning of man for infinity  the need to dream of new worlds.

name: hot-splash
detail: Take a plunge into the unknown and your future as you indulge in a spontaneous escape into the blue ocean. Offshore  far from everyday worries  you feel free. To dream  to hope  to be. A perfect awakening of the senses that was missing from this moment of sunny escape.

name: santal-sohar
detail: This scent is a celebration of Sohar  one of the richest ports of the Persian Gulf. It evokes the golden aura of a thousand celestial lights glimmering over the ancient harbour of Sohar whence spices and sandal used to flow.

name: rose-paris-rose-2
detail: It all started in Paris for Memo. In this unforgettable city  which is the birthplace of our perfume house. In its streets  its avenues  on the terraces of its cafés  in the splendour of its museums  where each memory is unique. Here creation is fully expressed  like a statement: Rose Paris Rose is one of them. Made to freedom  to love  to the rose  to the light  to the gold of the statues of Paris  to the beauty of the bridges of the Seine. An olfactory journey into the heart of an eternal Paris.

name: myths-man-1
detail: Myths for Man is a surreal mirage of oriental elements intoxicated with enigmatic tones of smoke and wood  creating a fusion of dream and ambivalence.

name: overture-man
detail: Overture Man is inspired by a man's solitude in the world; chaotic  ironic  and full of tragedy. A magnificent portrayal of a gentleman's mystique  Overture Man evokes stories of elegance  grandeur  and emotion  often celebrated in operatic performances.

name: happy-juice-2
detail: Mild  sweet and adorable. Happy Juice is the perfect scent to feel vibrant.

name: lineage
detail: A dream of faraway. Sundrenched horizons  empty lands and a whiff of sea spray that altogether smell like the promise of breaking free from the world.

name: spicy-charm-2
detail: Spicy Charm is for the elegant and mysteriously sensual woman.

name: amber-gold-1
detail: A lively  sensual composition designed to awaken the senses and inspire romance. Amber Gold can be used according to mood  time of day or occasion. A composition made with high quality ingredients  intended for both men and women.

name: peach-oolong-tea-1
detail: Turned to blush  it's just the right time to brew a cup of tea.

name: aroma-terapia-menos-stress-por-favor
detail: Aroma & Therapy Minus Stree  please believe in the power of natural ingredients to bring you what you need: fragrant doses of relaxation.

name: police-to-be-camouflage
detail: Police to be Camouflage is dedicated to men who follow fashion and like modern concepts and strong ideals.
ingredients: ['Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Mint', 'Cinnamon', 'Amberwood', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cardamom', 'Lemon', 'Red Apple', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Antillone (Fruity notes)', 'Lavandin', 'Nutmeg', 'Orange Blossom', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Rhubarb', 'Solar Notes', 'Violet']

name: gentleman-1
detail: The modern Oscar man is the epitome of style. The Oscar man is a smart gentleman that is always here to win. He knows perfectly what he is doing and the mysterious charm in his eyes makes him effortlessly but irresistibly sexy.

name: wulong-cha-1
detail: It opens with citrus notes  while Mediterranean fruits and musky notes provide a base to the fragrance. Delicious tea from China hypnotises in an elusive way.

name: colognise
detail: Colognise is a sophisticated scent for elegant men and women.

name: oolang-infini-1
detail: His breath fogged the window while he watched new snow fall upon the frozen lake. He came here to catch up on his writing and escape the city. At that moment  the fireplace crackled  ice settled in his glass and his thoughts made their way back to the ink.

name: creative-inspiration
detail: To live a creative life we must lose the fear of making mistakes. Some people feel the rain  others just get wet. Some people smell a good perfume  and others travel through perfume to exotic destinations of their imagination.

name: bohea-boheme-1
detail: Bohea Bohème captures the smoky delicacy of the distinctive teas grown in the Wuyi Mountains of China. The precious  smoky  woody tea is prized for its complex aroma and rich character. The result is a luxurious woody fragrance with a balsamic  unconventional and seductive vibrato.

name: grape-milk-tea-2
detail: Surprising at first smell  fall into it after weaving.

name: osmanthus-oolong
detail: A fragrance full of charm.

name: noir-okoume
detail: "I've always been fascinated by the futuristic beauty and plastic genius of some of the works of African statuary. Mysterious and hypnotic  they seem to have been shaped by extra-terrestrial hands. The meeting with a reliquary guardian figurine Fang (Gabon) made me want to explore the African theme again  ten years after Aomassai " Pierre Guillaume.

name: just-jack-j
detail: Just Jack J is a unique fragrance with a blend of contrasting ingredients.

name: naomi-campbell
detail: Naomi Campbelles sensual  mysterious  erotic  perfectly conveys the hypnotic power of pure feminine attraction - a fragrance as highly provocative and proud  as the woman who created it: Naomi Campbell! Even if you have a desire for eroticism and sensuality and want to be surrounded by an aura of mystery  you should get to know this scent - it will be love at first sight!

name: new-york-intense-1
detail: Like the city that never sleeps  fragrance stimulates and spices up the life of the wearer.

name: anti-anti
detail: An ultra-modern  soft and noble  edgy and moving scent like a modern sculpture.

name: spicebomb-infrared-1
detail: Bare skin  glowing in the dark with infrared light. Burning with yearning. Pulsating. This is your body. Indulge. Surrender. Turn up the heat. Pearls of sweat slowly running down your torso. Heavy breathing. Faster. Harder. Hotter. Unleash your lust. Go. Let yourself go.
ingredients: ['Benzoin', 'Red Berries', 'Hot Pepper', 'Grapefruit', 'Pimento', 'Red Apple', 'Saffron', 'Cedarwood', 'Cinnamon Leaf', 'Lavandin', 'Lavender', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Woody Ambery Note']

name: night-star
detail: Stimulating nights  daring eroticism  sparkling sensuality! Night Star is the radiant fragrance for women who love to show their seductive side and enjoy being the centre of attention. An effervescent fruit cocktail is in perfect harmony with the feminine elegance of flowers and creamy signature. Night Star - The extroverted and cheeky side of glamour.

name: ferrari-red-power-1
detail: A consensual fragrance gathering the worldwide codes of masculinity. Oscillating between a straight aromatic freshness hinted with spices and a Mediterranean citrus freshness  the heart reveals a meticulous turning of spicy floralcy wrapped up by the warmth of a refined Latin woody-ambery sensuality.

name: iris-ginger
detail: This scent is a kind of ginger soliflor  reinforced by a huge bouquet of spices but balanced by the softness of a musk presence.

name: sublime-rose-1
detail: Sublime Rose captures the essence of love. Alluring and beguiling  it combines classic rose with a hint of blackcurrant and a warm wood undertone. It is one of five scents in the Essence of Dreams collection  celebrating the power of dreams.

name: charme-magnetique
detail: With its bewitching scent  this fragrance is nothing less than an unstoppable weapon of seduction. Under the spell of Charme Magnetique  attraction is inevitable  pulling bodies and hearts together in an intense magnetic field. Gradually hypnotised  no one can escape the fascination.

name: molecule-04
detail: Molecule 04 contains no odorants other than a single molecule that radiates futuristic freshness with a metallic citrusy edge.

name: lov-u-a-touch-1
detail: A touch of love has the power to make your love last. Dreamy  romantic and sincere.

name: bel-absinthe-1
detail: An exquisite green fairy.

name: suncrest
detail: Suncrest is a fragrance about happiness. It captures a youth-like spirit that radiates optimism and playfulness.

name: persica-1
detail: Persica opens with an infectious sparkle of citrus notes. The heart adds brilliance to the sheer smoothness of the base. To wear it is to be irresistible.

name: bubble-lover
detail: Inspired by a love story’s greatest fantasy  Bubble Lover blends bubbly top notes with sensual touches of white flowers to reveal the warm woody base note.

name: quantum-molecule-1
detail: Take your inner strength and self-confidence to a whole new level. Feel up to any challenge and enjoy every day with this sparkling  fresh and dreamy creation.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-blanc-eau-fraiche-pour-lui-1
detail: Feel the energy of Lacoste with L.12.12 Blanc Eau Fraîche. An explosion of vitality  providing an exhilarating comfort.

name: jil-sander-sunset-1
detail: Jil Sander Sunset is a modern portrait of the seaside and the sound of the waves at dusk. It is a feminine blend of sun and sensuality  an homage to the golden hour when the sand is warm  and a woman feels alive.

name: camelia-k
detail: Camélia K is a fragrance that leaves the kind of scent you always want to return to  on your hands  your hair  your lips. A poetic invitation to desire

name: essencial-feminino-ato
detail: An intense fragrance that brings the splendor and golden glow of the brazilwood flower accord  enhanced by the surprising explosion of priprioca  a precious Amazonian root.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Amber', 'Priprioca', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Osmanthus', 'Rose', 'Solar Notes', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Paubrasilia Flower', 'Apple', 'Blackcurrant', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin', 'Pepper', 'Raspberry', 'Vanilla', 'Watery', 'Musk', 'Patchouli']

name: cool-water-woman-odyssey-parfum-1
detail: In an increasingly alienating world  Davidoff Cool Water Woman Odyssey Parfum reminds us that true elegance stems from our ability to reconnect with nature and with ourselves. This empowering experience enables us to harness our inner power and become the true heroes of our own lives.

name: for-her-musc-noir-rose
detail: With this fragrance  the For Her woman undresses  reveals her true self and reveals the most personal facets of her femininity  without pretence or artifice. Its frankness disarms and expresses a delicate sensuality that captivates with its subtlety.

name: for-her-pure-musc-absolue-1
detail: "The trail of this fragrance had to be as strong as a white flower's. I imagined a flower that smells of musk  then I imagined this flower on the skin of a woman. Milky  warm  sensual  pure  but with an amazing presence  an inner beauty  her own bloom. A glowing aura. An intimacy that expresses itself on the outside " Sonia Constant  Perfumer.

name: harmattan-8
detail: Like a grain of sand  I am uplifted by the Harmattan. Its powerful waves caress my skin  sneak between the folds in my sarouel and deposit a thousand fragrances in their wake. In the morning  saturated with my perfume  the wind continues its travels in Africa’s immensity guiding mankind in its search for voyages unfettered by boundaries.

name: rose-de-pushkar
detail: Rose de Pushkar is a proud  majestic  riotous and fiery rose inflamed by the oud.

name: for-him-bleu-noir-parfum-1
detail: Inspired by Narciso Rodriguez's fascination with the deep hues of the night sky  its blue and black tones at first almost indistinguishable  but increasingly evident the closer you look  the bleu noir line has a distinctive duality at its heart. With Bleu Noir Parfum  this duality is intensified  embodying a man whose sublime elegance conceals an intriguing darkness that only amplifies his magnetic appeal.

name: l-air-du-temps-x-alix-d-reynis-2023
detail: A revisit of the emblematic signature of Air du Temps  comforting  refined and mdern. A natural floral bouquet where each flower expresses itself with accuracy and balance  in harmony with a spicy eugenol note and the creaminess of sandalwood.

name: i-want-choo
detail: "We wanted to put the Jimmy Choo woman at the centre of all the attention  dress her with all these glitters that suit her so well. The perfume is a photogenic star that glows and takes in the light in an amazing way " the perfumers.

name: tous-loveme-the-silver-parfum
detail: A jewel of a perfume with a hypnotic effect that is an authentic portrayal of the silver that inspires it.

name: cool-water-woman-oceanic-edition-2023
detail: The scent of the sea for her in a limited edition version.

name: narciso-rodriguez-for-her-forever
detail: A powerful tribute to the iconic For Her collection  For Her Forever reinvents the Narciso Rodriguez musc with a luminous reinterpretation of the inimitable olfactive signature.

name: moonlight-patchouli-le-parfum
detail: Moonlight Patchouli le Parfum is a bewitching and magnetic composition that seems to have captured the intensity of the night.

name: la-belle-le-parfum
detail: There she is! That's her! It was already hot in this garden  but now it seems to be scorching! In the garden of sin  only the merriest of sinners are allowed in. Tonight gluttony is no longer a sin. You can take as many bites of the apple. What more could one want?

name: call-me-darling
detail: For kissing out loud  put on your best lipstick  give a stranger a wink and  “Call Me Darling” over your shoulder! When it comes to being your fun flirtatious self  there’s no time like the present  so don’t think twice: pucker up and embrace life. Like an arm of mass seduction  this sensual and generous fragrance wears its orange flower heart on its sleeve. Once it has your attention  it draws you in with base notes of tonka bean  inviting you to stay a while. Just as you’re settling in and getting comfortable  a surprise visit from cherry milk top notes. They make their way through the fray causing heads to turn and hearts to sway.

name: hazy-rose
detail: At dawn  when the darkness begins to fade with the incipient light and the warmth of the sun gains intensity  the silhouette of the wild rose is blurred against the light. This scent expresses the moment when the queen flower’s heart is uncovered . for us to enter  between dew and gloom  to steal her reason for being.

name: young-rose-1
detail: Reframing tradition through the perspectives of a new generation  Young Rose presents an ode to the perennial restlessness of youth: an olfactive diary of those who are writing their own future. The fragrance deliberately defies convention  offering a twisted take on classic romance.

name: ccori-rose-1
detail: Life is more beautiful in pink. Live every moment with vibrance  colour and joy. Ccori Rosé is a floral fragrance with sweet brushstrokes and an unmistakably modern touch.

name: eau-rose-eau-de-parfum
detail: Eau Rose Eau de Parfum brings together the most unexpected accords. A delicate flower or a juicy fruit here  a green vegetable there. A verdant profusion of whimsical beauty.

name: rose-oud-2019
detail: A perfume that whispers secrets from the oud mixed with the delicacy and grace of the rose.

name: roses-de-la-nuit
detail: Just like a Damascus rose that blooms at night  this dark  earthy  and sensual scent intrigues and captivates the senses instantly. Mysterious and attractive  it allows you to discover its fullest charm after a while. The inspiration to create this fragrance was the secret stories told by few to very few  after dawn  in confidence  and in trust.

name: oud-baie-rose
detail: A spirited and enveloping perfume. It opens with the explosive  almost exuberant energy of pink peppercorn. Next comes an exotic rosy heart flirting with the beauties of the East. Sun-kissed aromas and the sophisticated trail shape a completely addictive fragrance.

name: rose-de-shiraz-1
detail: Imagine a starry night sky above the curving Persian rooftops and stroll through narrow streets echoing with the sounds and smells of market day.

name: nativa-spa-rose-1
detail: Enjoy the perfect alchemy of this fragrance that highlights the most modern facets of the rose.

name: ccori-cristal-rose
detail: A fragrance inspired by Latin women with a strong personality  who inspire and express their creativity through work  art and life.

name: the-king-rose-gold-1
detail: Imposing and enlivening  The King will not fail to protect and command. Its fruity opening illustrates its charisma  while its dry finish will make you feel confident and grounded. Adorned with a rose gold shield and Ahood's personal logo.

name: rose-ardoise
detail: Rose Ardoise is a daring interpretation of the rose  where the flower reveals itself to be urban and mineral. A unique composition that asserts its androgynous and contemporary character.

name: boss-bottled-on-the-go-spray
detail: Boss encapsulated in a bottle: classic values of elegance and style. For those who seek achievement. An expression of those who have already left a mark. It's about achievement in the distinctive Boss way.

name: tobaccomore-1
detail: Tobaccomore is a mysterious and opulent fragrance with all its sweetness and extreme addiction.

name: calvin-klein-women-eau-de-toilette
detail: A fragrance for Women  inspired by Women. A statement of modern femininity with an underlying strength  luminosity and sensuality that glows from within to personify a new expression of feminine freedom.

name: lolita-lempicka-le-parfum
detail: An enchanting nectar oscillating between sweetness and freshness  Le Parfum is one of those fragrances whose breeze is instantly recognisable.

name: comme-une-evidence-leau-de-parfum-2022
detail: "A timeless chypre accord bathed in light  like the sensation of infinite space" Annick Ménardo  Perfumer. For the New Year's Eve celebrations in 2022  the bottle is dressed in twinkling stars to blend into the immensity of the firmament.

name: white-intense
detail: An intense fragrance for the masculine man who embraces life to the fullest.

name: encre-indigo
detail: Encre Indigo is an invitation to dive into infinite waters  an immersion in sublime strata of blue displaying a whole palette of tints and nuances  from bright  sparkling water to the darkest ink. A fragrance that is both intense and luminous  for the man in search of movement.

name: blue-sky-1
detail: It is a fresh woody aromatic fragrance.

name: beyond-wild-vetiver-1
detail: Extracted from the roots of a bush that grows wild in Indonesia  vetiver essence is so rich it is a perfume in itself. And  Wild Vetiver is an odyssey to Java.

name: crystal-oud
detail: A first class trip. The perfect gentleman's identity card.

name: southern-bloom-1
detail: Southern Bloom pays homage to the rare and lovely native scented flower  Boronia  during its brief September 'spring bloom' on Australia's southernmost island  Bruny  off the coast of Tasmania.

name: capua
detail: The ancient art of perfumery was revered and refined by the Romans  and Capua was the heart of the perfume industry. The city was the inspiration for this irresistibly challenging scent  guaranteed to turn heads and break hearts.

name: monsieur-de-givenchy-les-mythiques
detail: Combining the freshness of Lemon with the delicacy of Vetiver  this Citrus Woody Citrus Eau de Toilette is the masculine expression of absolute elegance. Chic  soft and refined in equal parts  the masculine fragrance Monsieur is the quintessence of French-style masculine seduction.

name: archetipo
detail: Archetipo is the world  the space  the time  the imagination. It is the moment when we are ready to see beyond reality. Shadows of what we really are. So far  yet so close.

name: white-gold-1
detail: An energising scent.

name: himalayan-oud
detail: Driven by the wind  capricious clouds blur as I am going forward a humid and misty forest. A delicate moss ground slows down my rhythm. Around me ferns spread out in fan  tropical pines and wild rhododendrons invite me to follow hem. Disconcerted by a divine woody trail  I venture to a green maze  in pursuit of this sacred tree. Its perfumed  wild and captivating resin transports me out of time. Oud from Himalaya.

name: desert-absolute
detail: Inspired by unforgettable nights that will be a part of your memory.

name: portrayal-woman-1
detail: An olfactive portrayal of the 1920's cultural liberation  poised with a playful refinement.

name: lavalliere-1
detail: Blurring the line between masculinity and femininity  Lavallière's sensual floral sillage is a fragrant tribute to YSL's most flowing accessory  inspiring the most fluid attitude.

name: boss-bottled-parfum-1
detail: Boss Bottled Parfum is a woody-ambery composition that expresses the strength and charisma of the Boss man. This richly textured fragrance captures the ultimate moment of being your own Boss.
ingredients: ['Fig Tree', 'Iris / Orris', 'Leather', 'Ambrocenide (Woody ambery)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Mandarin', 'Pink Pepper', 'Patchouli', 'Flower Stems']

name: cool-water-intense
detail: Discover the Intense freshness from the sea. Davidoff  for the first time has revisited Cool Water's freshness with an ethically sourced ingredient: the green mandarin. This handpicked citrus was harvested by a community in the Vale Do Caí in Brazil  as part of a sustainable sourcing partnership monitored by the perfume creator. The scent unfolds into oriental notes of coconut water blended with the sensuality of amber accord. Your ultimate call of freshness  hedonism and seduction.

name: overture-woman
detail: Be sure to make your grand entrance with Overture Woman. Evoking an essence of self-assured beauty and glamour that treats even the simplest of occasions with the fanfare of an evening at the opera.

name: boss-bottled-infinite
detail: Boss Bottled Infinite allows the man of today to choose the scent that reflects his needs for the day. Enabling him to be the best version of himself  whatever he does and wherever he finds himself.

name: illusione-for-her-1
detail: Away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life  lies a sunny Italian villa. Gentle breezes warm the air  water ripples in a nearby pool. In the distance you can hear the gentle buzzing of cicadas. In this setting  all the senses are heightened  creating an intoxicating sense of calm. For an instant  time stands still and the line between dream and reality blurs.

name: sensual-orchid-my-paradise-1
detail: An exciting  sparkling and natural composition  it reawakens the senses and the desire to escape to some exotic paradise where everything has the scent of nature  beauty  and freedom.
ingredients: ['Orchid', 'Cherry Blossom', 'Wild Berries', 'Musk', 'Apple', 'Heliotrope', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Powdery Notes', 'Violet', 'Citruses', 'Woody Ambery Note']

name: brisa-cubana-2024
detail: Brisa Cubana is a vibrant scent inspired by the hedonistic spirit of an unforgettable Cuban vacation with friends.

name: slogan-1
detail: The scent of a beating heart. A fragrance with an evocative name: Slogan. A fragrance that expresses the energy of bodies in free movement meeting and vibrating together. It is both the radical and romantic aesthetic of emotions that Courrèges wanted to highlight. A creation between vibration and olfactory addiction.

name: bois-darmenie-2021
detail: "Using the art of perfumery to evoke the smell of burning incense was a conceptually complex idea. At the heart of creation  there is a strong presence of benzoin  an extremely balmy note " Thierry Wasser  Perfumer

name: sports-car-club-3
detail: Champagne showers. Checkered flags. The scent of our champion dominates the sharp turns of pink pepper. Eucalyptus roars over the freshly cut grass  a patchouli and woody fougère at full strength!

name: ikat-rouge-2020-1
detail: Created in homage to the ancient Indonesian dyeing technique of ikat  Ikat Rouge epitomises Giorgio Armani’s haute couture philosophy.

name: boss-bottled-absolute-edition-2019
detail: Dress to celebrate.

name: forever-gold
detail: Forever Gold for Her is dedicated to a woman's infinite capacity for love and has the captivating sensuality of a ray of sunshine on the skin.

name: orange-smoke-1
detail: “When the sky touches the earth: the pureness of an orange flower with the mineral facet of incense. I chose to play with the chiaroscuro – light  and shade – quality of incense  combining its fresh mineral nature with the luminous sweetness of orange blossom ” Annick Menardo  Perfumer.

name: boss-bottled-tonic-on-the-go-spray
detail: Boss Bottled Tonic  refreshing and not too intense  is described as an ideal scent for work and for everyday occasions.

name: brut-black-1
detail: Masculinity  charisma  and sophistication all in one bottle. Brut Black will bring out your true self in an instant.

name: espoir-de-zhang
detail: This fragrance is inspired by an exemplary female figure in Chinese culture  Zhang. She was the mother of Mencius  the most famous philosopher after Confucius. She raised her son all alone after becoming a widow when Mencius was still a child. She did so great that she turned into a model of maternity in China for the devotion she showed to her son's welfare.
ingredients: ['Dog Rose', 'Vanilla', 'Anise', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Tuberose', 'Greater Stitchwort', 'Tonka Bean', 'Almond', 'Coconut', 'Musk', 'Plum']

name: mauboussin-pour-lui-2
detail: Strong and fragile at the same time  Mauboussin pour Lui is a charmer who claims a unique kind of manliness  full of emotions and subtly.

name: au-masculin
detail: Pure and baroque  rugged and soft  Au Masculin is smooth  deep-rooted and ethereal; massive and elegant. Like a tree in its passionate youth  it lingers between strength and purity.

name: pilotage-1
detail: An attractive fragrance stamped with magnetism and elegance. Pilotage opens with fresh and sparkling notes that blossoms into apowerful aromatic heart of providing a captivating and pleasant effect. The wake is an elegant blend of precious woods  softened by delicate amber and musk.

name: iceberg-effusion-man-1
detail: A sexy and seductive Iceberg Effusion Man is a refined fragrance for the man who enjoys the best in life.

name: michalsky-for-men
detail: Michalsky for Men welcomes you to the top!

name: dark-leather-eau-de-toilette
detail: A bold yet hedonistic fragrance for those who harbour a rebellious inclination.

name: glicine-acqua-di-colonia
detail: Originating in China and Japan where it is the symbol of friendship  this vigorous climbing shrub is graced with a spectacular blossoming of flowers in spring  and while in summer an abundance of fresh  green leaves adorn it. In the language of flower  Wisteria means tenderness.

name: oh-denim-extreme
detail: Jeans  timeless yet always contemporary  belong to everybody. The more it wears out the better it looks. Careless or sparkling chic  for day or night  dirty work or a wild party. The many facets of the same unique fabric that has been revolutionary for men and women. Denim is a state of mind that unites social levels  genders  and cultures.

name: alba-sui-navigli-1
detail: This unique scent faithfully reproduces the aromas that can be noticed from the balcony of a house overlooking the Navigli canals in Milan  on a spring morning  when the crisp air mixes the memory of an exciting evening with a desire for a wonderful summer.

name: united-dreams-love-yourself-4
detail: Look in the mirror. Take a moment to appreciate the person looking back at you. The small things that define you as an individual are precious. Everybody has something to give to the world  everyone deserves to be appreciated for who they are. You are unique  you are special: Love Yourself! Be inspired by your ability to dream. Because whatever we have now was once a dream. United Dreams.

name: queen-of-seduction-4
detail: She walks into an elegant party scene on the Mediterranean  without even realising it  she turns heads of those around her  both men and women. She's the Queen of Seduction in an understated way.

name: her-secret-1
detail: Obviously  she's a real woman. She's confident about her power of seduction. Nothing resists her. She is a modern enchantress who uses her magic to seduce you. Her potion  her fragrance is Her Secret.

name: juliana-paes-exotic
detail: Dedicated to women who see an extra touch of femininity. Exotic  says Juliana  "is for those times when you want to have a presence".

name: united-dreams-open-your-mind-1
detail: Infinite chances to do the things you want to do. It's time to connect with your dreams. Time to liberate your mind from prejudices and fears. It's time to refresh your dreams. It's time to Open Your Mind.

name: the-icon-eau-de-parfum-for-women
detail: A seductive scent full of subtleties for the free and bold woman.

name: king-of-seduction-4
detail: A whirlwind of elements unleashed in an essence of powerful contrasts. Intense and energetic  while fresh and elegant. A sensual dance  strong yet delicate  that will take you to the kingdom of seduction.

name: love-rock-by-shakira-1
detail: Love Rock Shakira reflects the special bond she shares with the millions of fans around the world that love her music. A special reflection of the passion and strength that her fans devote to her at each concert.

name: united-dreams-dream-big-1
detail: Live life to the fullest. Have no fear  dream big and dare to fail. Embrace failure and let it help steer you in the direction of your dreams. Believe in them with United Dreams Dream Big. Because whatever we have now was once a dream.

name: n-4-peonia-imperial
detail: A refreshing scent that reflect the essence of the living with nature.

name: united-dreams-just-united-for-women-1
detail: Life doesn't run in slow motion. Seize every moment  let yourself go and live it to the fullest.

name: muy-mia
detail: VERY MIA reflects the passion of the creator. He wants a sexy  sensual and very feminine woman  who reflects the little girl she once was.

name: diavolo-gentleman-1
detail: Antonio Banderas' Diavolo Gentleman is an elegant scent for the distinguished man.

name: clandestine-for-man-1
detail: It is the fragrance for men who are not afraid to go with the mystery when seduced. If you dare to live an unforgettable experience Pacha Ibiza is for you.

name: love-forever-love-1
detail: Love Forever Love! It can be a moment  a person  a journey  love  a gift or whatever you want. Love Forever Love is a fragrance combination of fresh and romantic notes  which contrasts with vitality and charm.

name: united-dreams-live-free-4
detail: It is more than a word  it is a universal aspiration. It is a right not a privilege. Something that the women who came before us fought for and are still fighting for today. The thing that gives us the right to be ourselves  to express who we are without fear and without prejudice. Live Free! Be inspired by your ability to dream. Because whatever we have now was once a dream. United Dreams.

name: n-1-azahar-radiante
detail: This scent reflects the essence of the most vivid nature with refreshing aromas of flowers all year round.

name: united-dreams-stay-positive-1
detail: Fight hate  end discrimination. Release yourself from fear and take a stand. You can make a difference because everyone has the power to change things for the better. It is time to dream of a better world with optimism and positive energy  make it happen. The first step is to Stay Positive! Be inspired by your ability to dream. Because whatever we have now was once a dream. United Dreams.

name: clandestine-for-woman-1
detail: It is the perfume for most enigmatic and seductive girls  if you are using the mystery as a weapon of conquest. Sophisticated and powerful  Pacha Ibiza Clandestine girls do not go unnoticed  are the queens of the most exclusive parties in town. They play by their rules and know how to enjoy every moment without limit.

name: only-diavolo-1
detail: Fall into the temptation of an irresistibly devilish seduction with Only Diavolo  an incredibly provocative perfume for men.

name: n-2-rosa-fresca-3
detail: A romantic and feminine scent  where the notes of litchi and rose stand out.

name: viva
detail: Viva! Is a fragrance with a fresh and seductive scent with character. A fragrance that represents a sincere and genuine declaration of intent for a secure  optimistic and daring  able to face any situation. The Viva! woman is desired by men and a confidant to her friends. Its style  its independence and its sympathy make it unique and charming.

name: paula
detail: Paula is a fragrance that reflects the smell of the sea of Candás  the birthplace of the actress  the smell of soap from her grandmother  the smell of her daughter Daniella and even her wedding day.

name: united-dreams-be-strong-4
detail: Stand your ground and face forward. Never give up  never compromise. Take control and be strong. All this is possible with United Dreams Be Strong!

name: united-dreams-go-far-4
detail: Life doesn't happen in the slow lane. Let yourself go  live life to the fullest and go far with United Dreams Go Far.

name: united-dreams-aim-high-4
detail: There are no limits to what you can achieve. Choose your own path  embrace your dreams and aim high. All this is possible with United Dreams Aim High!

name: king-of-seduction-absolute-4
detail: An audacious seducer. And an ocean to get lost with her. When you leave all your competitors behind... You're absolutely the king... King of Seduction Absolute.

name: russian-leather-eau-de-parfum
detail: Unbounded steppes contour bleak passes  glaciated peaks set a stark mood. Thick snow whites out all in its wake; enveloping deserted paths in an intriguingly blank canvas. The eerie solace of Chuysky Trakt softened by a lavender-infused breeze  a roaring lakeside fire crackles with birch and leather-rich heat. Shroud yourself in the enigmatic strength of a winter dessert.

name: mesmerizing-oudh-accord-gold-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: The burnished sienna façade of Talatal Ghar palace commands the golden twilight. Inside  a heady infusion of resinous olibanum  styrax and opulent oud swing majestically from gilt-edged incense burners. Labyrinthine galleries are fit for a King in their intricate resplendence. Delve into the myriad mysteries of Assam.

name: oh-bella-1
detail: OH BELLA reveals the personality of the Mandarina Duck woman. A woman who doesn't go unnoticed leaves a trail of expressions of admiration or joy such as Oh Bella  a typical Italian compliment. Because she is spontaneous and lively. Curious and restless. Dynamic and active. She moves gracefully. She is natural and authentic. She is happy. She smiles. She overflows with optimism and has a positive outlook on life. She sees the glass as half full.

name: pacha-queen-rose
detail: This fragrance is for the romantics who believe totally in love. Girls who wear Pacha Ibiza Rose are loving  friends of their friends and real partners.

name: eau-fraiche
detail: A fresh and dynamic fragrance designed for the unstoppable woman  with passion in her eyes.

name: helium-2he
detail: I was inspired by the ideas of a hot air balloon and smoke.... I thought of a meditative scent  a zen atmosphere". - Silvie Fisher  Perfumer

name: esencia-de-vl
detail: A fragrance for a contemporary man  combining a contemporary style with a classic touch.

name: dark-leather-eau-de-parfum
detail: Unearth your brooding  mysterious side with this scent’s smouldering fusion of wild and soft notes.

name: night-instinct
detail: Night Instinct is a modern and addictive scent for the distinctive and refined gentleman.

name: passenger-cruise-pour-femme-1
detail: Passenger Cruise for Her is an enveloping floral fragrance whose delightful olfactory signature stretches out into the glowing trail of carnal femininity.

name: sun-pop-green-fusion-1
detail: Stand-out this summer with Jil Sander Pop Green Fusion  a trendy iconic scent.

name: wild-sex
detail: Only if you dare! Wild Sex is an exciting and uninhibited scent for the Ibiza man who lives for the night!

name: couleur-kenzo-rose-pink-2013
detail: The drape of a scent? The scent of a dress? Colour and fragrance fuse and swirl in the air. Couleur Kenzo Rose-Pink - dazzling  chic  and radiance in shock scent.

name: sun-pop-arty-pink-1
detail: Stand out this summer with Jil Sander Pop Arty Pink  an iconic fashion fragrance.

name: blue-cosmo
detail: A sweet fragrance with a refreshing vivacity.

name: paris-shenandoah
detail: The sensuality and elegance of woody notes come together as the masculine strength asserts its power in a spice-scented breeze.

name: vanille-et-coco
detail: Exotic  smooth and sensual  this is a wickedly delicious cocktail that is simply irresistible.

name: dark-rum-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A scent with cult status. Dark Rum is a modern interpretation of traditional Bay Rum  distilled for women and men. This fine fragrance is an intoxicating elixir for an alluringly warm  and incredibly sensual and utterly addictive scent.

name: kaiak-ultra
detail: Kaiak Ultra Feminino is for women seeking a surprising and modern freshness to each day.

name: satin-musk
detail: Satin Musk carries a personality of powdery intimacy that offers sweetness  discretion and romanticism  embellished with the most flattering amber nuances.

name: shine-for-him
detail: A bright  striking scent with a spectacular trail.

name: lucco-bad-1
detail: Lucco Bad  a scent for the man who wants to be noticed wherever he goes. A young man who does not follow the trend: they follow him.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-bois-precieux-2010-1
detail: Azzaro Pour Homme Precieux is an extremely magnetic scent for the seductive man who leaves a lasting impression wherever he goes.

name: papier-carbonne-1
detail: Papier Carbone is a childhood memory. The paper at school  the wood of the library and the liquorice we loved as children. An indelible and comforting scent.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-1
detail: Pure  unadulterated seduction  fashioned by Italian elegance and sophistication. Timeless  sensuous and sleek  Azzaro Pour Homme is a fragrance with character  owing its success to its simultaneously fresh and powerful nature.

name: cuir-cuba-intense
detail: "Although I hate smoking  I have always loved the aroma of the tobacco leaves used to make cigars. When I was a child at my parents' house  I appreciated being asked to pick up the cigar box. It was a pleasure to open it and smell those delicate aromas. It was a fragrance that really transported me. Many years later  I discovered this scent in my laboratory thanks to the tobacco leaf absolute  the starting point for Cuir Cuba Intense". - Patricia de Nicolaï

name: abilos-2
detail: Abilos; fresh and sporty. The freshness and aquatic notes in the start  combined with an aromatic heart  warm as the perfumes leads into a woody signature.

name: en-terrasse-eau-fraiche
detail: En Terrasse Eau Fraîche is an invitation to escape to the shores of the Mediterranean sea.

name: geek-chic-1
detail: Avant-garde  Geek Chic is the dandy 3.0! His offbeat vision sets him apart and makes him an outstanding creative. His discreet charm is revealed in the small details like his bow tie  his "designer" glasses  or perfume  which we always remember. A sweet charmer  and poetic  he is ahead of his time  the GEEK CHIC is a rare species  so coveted.

name: empire
detail: Empire is a striking fragrance that mixes traditional aromatic notes with all the freshness that the modern man needs. Live the indescribable feeling of being ahead of time. The future is now.

name: esencia-eau-de-toilette
detail: Intense and authentic  Essence Eau de Toilette defines each of us as individuals  yet universally unique.

name: mr-burberry-eau-de-parfum
detail: Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum is an intense interpretation of the original Mr. Burberry. The fragrance captures the essence and anticipation of London at night.

name: jamaica-man-1
detail: Puma Jamaica ² Man. A subtle men's fragrance that has a sexiness and an air of passion. Perfect for the carefree Jamaican vibe. As warm and gentle as the Caribbean breeze.
The year in which the head of the Forbes clan was named "First Lord of Scotland"  forty-seven years before Columbus set sail!

name: gigember-e-estragone-1
detail: The freshness of the top notes mingles with the effervescent  vivacious heart  while warmer spices anchor in the trail.

name: sheer-2017-1
detail: Michael Kors Sheer is a softly feminine scent inspired by the brand's best selling signature perfume. This delicate yet evocative fragrance combines soothing herbal notes with rich florals  and a woody base to conjure moments of sheer intimacy.

name: kingsman-the-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: What is the concept of being a Kingsman? It starts with the fragrance. Directly inspired by the secret weapons of K. It continues when you enter the shops  directly immersed in the famous secret cabinet. Class and British elegance.

name: cortina-1224-madame
detail: Cortina 1224 Madame is a soft and spicy fragrance with a sensual trail.

name: agua-de-colonia-n4-spearmint-tea
detail: Between the freshness and sensuality  transparency and depth  this fragrance proposes a dive into nature.

name: vespri-esperidati
detail: The ancient Kingdom of Sicily  impregnated with history and different cultures  full of contradictions and ambiguities  has generated Vespriesperidati Uomo.

name: vivo-herve-1
detail: Escape the routine  feel alive. Breathe  live  connect with nature. This energetic herbal fragrance evokes sensations known only to those who feel alive when they take refuge in the immensity of nature  heading towards adventure and the unexpected.

name: alyssa-ashley-white-musk
detail: White Musk exalts the graceful sweetness of a silent and dreamy feminine world. Sensual above all because it’s real.

name: danger-parfum-pour-homme-1
detail: A rich  sensual base is refreshed by lush green notes with hints of sweetness from a floral bouquet before warming up with a woody base.

name: gelsomino-viola-1
detail: Warming  heady and enveloping.

name: cornucopia-1
detail: Cornucopia otherwise known as The Horn of Plenty  is a symbol of an overflowing abundance  a contemplation focused away from any type of unfulfilled personal needs or wants. The expansive  all-encompassing scent lets you fall back  breathe easy and feel as if you will never need for anything again.

name: lovestruck-1
detail: "Lovestruck is about the excitement and rush you feel when you fall in love and go for it. Those moments of spontaneity that make your heart flutter". - Vera Wang

name: el-born
detail: The winding cobbled streets flow seamlessly between the old stones of medieval times  witness to Barcelona's history. Plants and flowers fall from small decorated balconies sharing the limelight with vintage shops  patisseries  patisseries  old bookshops  wine shops  a group of old friends playing cards  young people arguing by the fountains  tourists enjoying a glass of Champagne  this is El Born.

name: angeliques-sous-la-pluie
detail: Inspired by the fleeting scent of a bouquet of Angéliques picked just after a shower  Jean-Claude Ellena's creation unfolds as a chamber music arrangement. Angéliques Sous La Pluie: an outpouring of emotion.

name: pink-vetiver
detail: "Vetiver. To me  it's the smell of my father and his crisp white shirts  the spice markets in Grasse  and a hotel tucked away in Florence where the scent lingers gently in the night air " Jo Malone.

name: rebel-3
detail: Breaking notes of aromatic angelica seed and papyrus peel away to reveal bittersweet saffron warmed by intimatenotes of smoky  tarry  leathery styrax  benzoin  and myrrh  framing a boldly complex and sensual Oudh base.

name: rain-angelica-2014
detail: City rain. The park at dawn  saturated with dew. Clean  revitalising. A light shower  falling gently infusing the air with petal-washed scent. An afternoon cloudburst  drenching gardens exuberant with summer blooms. As dusk descends into the night  the downpour.

name: tuberose-angelica-cologne-intense
detail: The queen of white florals. Tuberose Angelica Cologne Intense is touched with green spiciness. Sumptuous with warmth  intoxicating and desirable.

name: lyric-man-1
detail: Lyric ManA deep  hypnotic fragrance for men that evokes the sombre sound of eternity. A powerful and elegant fragrance.

name: angelica-sinensis
detail: A bright and cheerful scent for the romantic woman.

name: malai
detail: Malai is a very spiritual perfume  evoking ancient ceremonies  and creating a mysterious and esoteric atmosphere around those who wear it.

name: oui-a-lamour-1
detail: "Oui à L'Amour is an audacious and passionate scent. It is the unexpected encounter of a sparkling freshness and a vibrant sensuality. Oui à L'Amour is the perfume of an endless love. " - Sophie Labbé  Perfumer

name: gosha-rubchinskiy
detail: Skateboarding on a summer day. Wheels burning on the hot concrete sidewalk. The smells of rubber and tar colliding to create a scent of youth and freedom.

name: aura-1968-1
detail: Aura 1968 is the perfume of a generation that loves life and lives up to it. A classical Farfalla perfume  as ever.

name: angelica-florae
detail: A scent inspired by a unique herb. "Angelica or archangelica is the herb of angels  a plant with virtues that are surrounded by benefits " Nicolas Bonneville  Perfumer.

name: sweet-do-nothing-2021-1
detail: Timeless hangs  orange blossom special  rock tank swimming  cacti  the life.

name: john-varvatos-artisan-pure
detail: John Varvatos Artisan Pure is inspired by the lush hills of Xalapa  Mexico  and its extensive coffee and citrus groves. As refined as it is fresh.
ingredients: ['Bergamot', 'Orange Blossom', 'Cedarwood (Texas)', 'Lemon', 'Orange (Valencia)', 'Petitgrain', 'Angelica', 'Cardamom', 'Coffee Blossom', 'Coriander', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Resins', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Notes', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)']

name: amazonian-green
detail: The soul of the forest in a bottle enriched with phytogaia extracts to bring all the benefits of natural plant extracts into a fragrance.

name: police-to-be-or-not-to-be
detail: This fragrance is a magnetic elixir that magically seduces.

name: patchouli-antique
detail: Patchouli Antique offers a unique olfactory signature  at once enchanting and elegant. Highly addictive and irresistibly tempting.

name: sancti
detail: Water  liquid purity and universal solvent  is the oldest symbol of purification. Holy Water is a sacred protection that has great healing powers. Sprinkled abundantly on the face  giving energy to see. A heavenly scent.

name: ck-free-for-men-1
detail: Cool and fresh with a signature leafy feel ck Free For Men conveys the free-spirited nature of Calvin Klein  big open sky  light and easy attitude  dynamic freedom.

name: man-only
detail: This unusual fragrance has a refreshing top note  a balmy heart  and is like a relaxing seaside walk.

name: adrenaline-1
detail: A provocative contrast between a top full of freshness and a heart that beats in spicy and vibrant woods  sensual and creamy leather to embody a true modern masculine.

name: agua-fresca-verbena-hombre-2023
detail: Agua Fresca Verbena Hombre is a celebration of summer  of a simple life  of people  the land and the sea. It's a return to our origins. A limited edition fragrance created with natural  vegan ingredients  gentle and respectful of your skin. Wild  bright  amazing. As simple as that.

name: santal-carmin
detail: He had a spark from an early age  with a keen intuition and boundless curiosity. One day he would be called a revolutionary. The time had come to fight for his dreams and take his ideas to the world. Possibly a new era would begin.

name: police-to-be-indigo-night-2022
detail: The essence of Police To Be Indigo Night represents an unparalleled expression of male vigour and the contrasts of life.

name: eau-epicee
detail: L'Eau Épicée is a feminine-masculine floral and spicy fragrance  a surprising duo for intense warmth/coolness. Surrender to the sweet and intoxicating appeal of jasmine flower studded with spicy pink berries. Spicy Water is appreciated as an incendiary cocktail  to be consumed slowly but without moderation.

name: capri-2019-1
detail: Capri is an invigorating citrus perfume. One of the most exclusive destination on the Mediterranean  an island with thousands of scents.

name: geranium-pepper
detail: A vibrant scent composed around a symphonic accord of woods.

name: natura-homem-neo
detail: Homem Neo is a woody fragrance that balances the intensity and comfort of cashmeran and evokes the multiple aspects of a man in a changing world.
ingredients: ['Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Pataqueira', 'Vetiver', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Cardamom', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Nutmeg', 'Pink Pepper', 'Black Pepper']

name: 1-million-royal-1
detail: Powered by your inner confidence  enter the 1 Million Royal kingdom with the ultimate fragrance of defiant self-expression  made for you by Paco Rabanne. Unconstrained by convention  find the freedom to live by your own rules with 1 Million Royal: a flamboyant fresh woody blend that collides with a distinctive sensuality to unleash what makes you uniquely you. Claim the stage  you’re the king. It’s time to rise with 1 Million Royal.

name: myslf
detail: MYSLF is the expression of the man​ you are with all your nuances.

name: malbec-elegant-2023
detail: Malbec Elegant is the scent of the self-confident and naturally attractive man. The harmony between strength and authenticity.

name: luna-coragem-1
detail: An invitation to women to have the courage to change in order to create a new world. A fragrance inspired by the exuberance of protea  a flower that symbolises resistance and hope.

name: pepe-jeans-sobold-for-him
detail: Sobold is character  power and rebellion. He is a non-conformist who finds his freedom by creating his own rules. He rejects the establishment and expresses his desires freely. He is an idealist  and even in love  makes no compromise  but still acts with respect and passion.
ingredients: ['Clary Sage', 'Leather', 'White T-shirt note', 'Lavender', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Tonka Bean', 'Violet Leaves', 'Vetiver (Haiti)']

name: memoire-de-roses-1
detail: This fresh and cheerful rose is dressed with mandarin  bergamot and a veil of cotton musk in a pink case. This Eau de Parfum is a hybrid of rose and citrus that rose breeders could only dream of. Perfumer Christophe Raynaud  virtuoso as he is  wanted the rose to be uncluttered. He simply refreshed it with citrus  as if to immortalise the freshness of a fleeting beauty  keeping its memory forever.

name: 1-million-golden-oud-2023
detail: Supremely powerful and intense  a fragrance as precious as gold enriched with the most majestic ingredient of perfumery. Its magnificent emerald jewel shines brightly to echo the jewel of Kings.

name: 1-million-elixir
detail: A boozy  intense and highly addictive interpretation of the iconic original.

name: constantinople-7
detail: The steady tides of the Bosphorus  like the constant ebb and flow of time  anchor the Queen of cities at a unique crossroads between Europe and Asia  between the Black and the Aegean blue seas.

name: scandal-pour-homme-le-parfum
detail: Ladies and gentlemen  please welcome the king of the ring: Scandal pour Homme le Parfum! You dreamed of it  you expected it. Surprise ! The reigning darling of Maison Gaultier makes a resounding return in an even more outrageous and intense eau de parfum  which is likely to cause a stir. Everyone wants to applaud this champion that struts around like no one else. A few flashy feats are sometimes enough to set a room ablaze: a bewitching footwork  caressing punches  an intense look. His perfume? A shock wave. That's right. So go see this handsome athlete launch his geranium strike then deploy his sultry super hot antlers. And his addictive tonka bean. A fine tactic.

name: botica-214-fiji-paradise-for-men
detail: Botica 214 Fiji Paradise takes you on a paradisiacal journey to feel the energy of the Fiji islands  where the harmony of nature invites you to live each moment to the fullest.

name: polo-red-parfum
detail: Polo Red Parfum is an unforgettable journey into the desert.

name: yes-i-am-collector-edition-2021
detail: The rallying call for a generation: A fragrance of empowerment. A scent celebrating self-belief. A symbol of the transition into strong  independent womanhood. A declaration of femininity wholly owned. A statement of self-affirmation for a young woman writing her own story  a young woman defining who she is and where she is going. Yes I Am. With a capital "A".

name: humor-on-line-masculino
detail: An innovative fragrance to celebrate life and exude mood. With a vibrant touch of pitanga  an ingredient of Brazilian biodiversity. Online Humor arouses excitement and invites you to experience a whirlwind of positive emotions.

name: cuir-grenat
detail: A radiant leather with glimmers of amber adorns a powdery raspberry.

name: moncler-pour-homme
detail: This scent evokes a crisp  cool ode to the great outdoors wrapped in an opulent cocoon of warmth.

name: wild-mint-lavandin-eau-de-toilette
detail: The rush of a crystal clear  cool forest stream; a shady bank of shrubs  stalks and bushes. Fresh  wild mint fills the air; a stimulating yet soothing tonic. Warm orris root and creamy nutmeg are grounded by deep tonka bean  tinged with powerfully aromatic lavandin. Meet the wild with the refined; naturally enliven your spirits.

name: empire-legacy
detail: The Empire Legacy fragrance was designed for determined men who understand that the impact they leave on the world is their greatest signature.

name: le-passant
detail: Le Passant is an homage to men's perfumes. It hints of a certain masculine sensuality.

name: evoluzion
detail: For the visionary and innovative man who changes the rules and completely transforms the way of doing things. He sees opportunities where others don't and generates a positive change in the world.

name: sound-of-the-brave-1
detail: Sound of the Brave gives a shout-out to men who have the courage to share their sound to take a stand. There are a million ways to be brave  but one voice can be enough to make a difference.
ingredients: ['Lavandin', 'Juniper Berries', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Cardamom', 'Elemi', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Orange Blossom', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Vanilla', 'Green Apple']

name: mexx-black-gold-for-him-2023
detail: A festive scent to keep you energised all day long.

name: fougere-sombre-1
detail: Inspired by a classic male olfactive family which in this composition has been given a darker personality.

name: horizonte
detail: An intense fragrance for free-spirited men who know it's time for new adventures.

name: wild-country-rush
detail: Feel the call of life with Wild Country Rush  a scent full of wildness and freedom.

name: talc
detail: Talc  a woody  sweet  and rich fragrance meant for your summer days.

name: alameda-1
detail: A bright and refreshing scent with an intense trail.

name: wild-mint-lavandin-eau-de-parfum
detail: The rush of a crystal clear  cool forest stream; a shady bank of shrubs  stalks and bushes. Fresh  wild mint fills the air; a stimulating yet soothing tonic. Warm orris root and creamy nutmeg are grounded by deep tonka bean  tinged with powerfully aromatic lavandin. Meet the wild with the refined; naturally enliven your spirits.

name: couture-sport
detail: The ideal perfume for the elegant man.

name: decades-70s-couture
detail: "It amazes me that I have been famous for sixty years. When I started everything was changing  and just like music  art and clothes  perfume changed too. These fragrances represent those decades for me. There was electricity in the air and life smelled of excitement " Cher.

name: cactus-garden
detail: Cactus Garden contains an extraordinary garden. On an exotic patio that offers shelter from the heat  astonishing scents blossom.

name: yerbamate
detail: An endless expanse of green blending into the sky. The scent of grass and hay  of countless plants and various small flowers  of aromatic herbs and fields blowing in the wind  warmed by the sun. An evocation of simple  pristine nature.

name: cologne-intense-extrait-de-parfum
detail: A precious cologne with a classical structure enriched by modern elements. An olfactory journey from past to future that immediately conquers the senses with its refined freshness.

name: crazy-hours-6
detail: Based on the same philosophy as the first Crazy Hours perfume with fresh top notes contrasting woody base notes. The fragrance denotes the same emotion when you see Franck Muller's iconic Crazy Hours ‘not everything is what it seems’ watch. The number 6 also represents love and harmony.

name: fig-tea
detail: Dazzling vertigo of a rare instant. Bewitching power of an overwhelming fragrance. Fig-tea: a step on the delicate path of perfume.

name: leather-n-green
detail: Leather N' Green is an elegant and refined fragrance created from nature's most precious treasures. Mystical  seductive  alluring. Elegant leather notes meet the mystical breath of juniper almost like royalty  giving the impression that you are on a stately estate  enjoying a horseback ride through the surrounding woods. A perfume that achieves its goal of seducing with precision.

name: inle
detail: Time stands still over Lake Inlé  in Burma. The women take up their silk embroidery and the men dance above the waters  in boats that resemble palaces. The fruit and vegetable market is coming to life in the refreshing mist. You can see the first light of day  and hear the first sounds of celebration  a farewell tonight  or a welcome to the dawn.

name: esencia-azul-para-el
detail: A fragrance with a fresh and seductive character  evoking the tranquility and freshness of the sea.  For Bustamante  Essence is Blue "is a smile that reminds me of my childhood  the sea  blue sky  the horizon of the Cantabrian Sea".

name: inle-iris-1
detail: Journeys in memory are not always long. During short but extraordinary stopovers  you can dream of a limited edition fragrance. Presented in a leather case  it is dressed in gold and light. In a booklet composed for the occasion  it inspires a fragrant story with touching illustrations that linger in our hearts and minds.

name: ryokucha-1
detail: Instantly vibrant  sparkling and effervescent as a modern interpretation of the classic Cologne  this dazzling and immense freshness brings light to this wonderfully radiant perfume.

name: xiii-la-treizieme-heure
detail: "There are moments when everything can be transformed  when it is impossible to distinguish the real from the unreal. A matter of exact seduction  leather notes  an object of desire and a metamorphosis between shadow and light. It is time to breathe the emptiness and face the adventure. An exquisite vertigo of the unknown. Then  we are no longer able to distinguish true from false  night from day  and we surrender to the realm of the vague  the clear darkness of nature that makes everything unique and possible.

name: fleur-de-mate
detail: Fleur de Maté is a concentration of magnetic energy of the darkest and most mysterious woods.

name: irish-leather
detail: It's one of those icy  biting mornings. The sun scarcely manages to break through the heavy grey clouds. The air is crisp and dry  and the wind slips beneath my clothes. The Northwind whips the grass that sticks to my boots. I walk into the stable and swing open the wooden tack room doors. Its age-old odor stands out sharply in the frozen morning air. My horse whinnies softly. It's the smell of her freedom.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Mate', 'Juniper Berries', 'Birch', 'Iris / Orris', 'Flouve oil', 'Amber', 'Pink Pepper', 'Clary Sage', 'Tonka Bean']

name: cologne-intense
detail: A precious cologne with a classical structure enriched by modern elements. An olfactory journey from past to future that immediately conquers the senses with its refined freshness.

name: infinite-definitive-1
detail: A hymn to nature  a moment suspended in time. The fragrance of serenity  a quest for the essential.

name: love-love-love-2
detail: Pale pink liquid makes us daydream romantically  while drops of the fragrance remind us of the most beautiful feeling in the world  feeling of love. In order to depict the magnificence of love  creators made top notes suggest fluffy feelings  heart notes to accentuate the core of love  while base notes warm the essence of the fragrance protecting it with a gentle and warm embrace.

name: poppy-barley
detail: Rich ripened poppies dancing in the wind. Flowers that come alive with colour blend with fruity notes. Cocooned by grains and softened by powdery notes in the base.

name: bamboo-franck-olivier-women
detail: Sensual  intensive and sophisticated. This fragrance is an explosion of delightful notes and intoxicating scents. Wonderfully infused green leaves with berries fill our senses with wonder. The middle and base notes of this unique fragrance are but the promise of a floral journey where notes subtly combine with powerful scents.

name: soleil-1
detail: Soleil is a heady blend of flowers. An intensely radiant fragrance that irresistibly evokes the noontide southern sun. This is the great Fragonard classic.

name: laventure-blanche-1
detail: Clean and crisp like a diamond beam  it's a scent with a modern dream. L'Aventure Blanche is a new character; gracious and gleam. Fragrance projecting passion  playfulness and power  an irresistible combination of strength  sensuality and elegance; full of beauty  mystery and grace.

name: allegresse
detail: Beautiful and joyful  the river quivers with delight as tuberose passes by. Leaf after leaf  the vivacious river flourishes  bathing in fresh citrus notes.

name: portrait-of-a-lady
detail: Consider the perfume as a portrait of its wearer: the sound of her voice  her gaze  the way she plays cards. At once timeless and contemporary  this fragrance speaks of her innate sophistication. A charm that emanates from within  boldly represented on the outside; an expressive portrait of modern grace.

name: tous-eau-de-toilette
detail: Tous achieved to make true one of their dreams  the creation of a fragrance that was transmitting the same emotions than their jewellery designs: simplicity  clean lines  silver and brilliant tones.

name: peace-love-juicy-couture
detail: Girls adore peace  love and of course  couture! Now you can have it all in one scent. While reminiscing about the splendor of her beach escape  our lovely girl exclaimed  “This feeling must be bottled!” Inspired by earthly beauty and far-fetched things  the free spirited  hippy vibe of Malibu has been captured...

name: little-sky-1
detail: Little Marcel's Little Sky is a swirl of freshness and dizzying happiness. An anticyclone to moroseness. This is a "feel good fragrance" of stunning gaiety.

name: amazone
detail: Amazone. A woman riding side-saddle. Tender yet fiery. A spirited and cheerful fragrance.

name: incantation-1
detail: This darkly divine perfumed-potion strikes a soothing yet arresting beat on the skin. Though magnificently luring with a bright  engaging temperament  'Incantation' has a deep inky edge that should come with a warning. Follow this fragrant enchantress to a place of closely guarded secrets and succumb to the call of this aromatic adornment.

name: eau-soleil-1
detail: Capture the wonder and lightheartedness of summer with Biotherm's Eau Soleil.

name: cassis-rhubarbe-1
detail: Crumple the leaves of Cassis with both hands  crush one of these buds with his fingertips and immerse yourself in intoxicating fragrances.

name: capelli-doro
detail: Linari's Capelli d'Oro or (Golden Hair) is an irresistibly fresh fruity mixture creating an exquisite  long-lasting sensual feminine perfume.

name: mimosa-austral
detail: Like a golden watercolour with light dabs that form small yellow and silky pompoms arranged in clusters. At the bottom of the rocky garden  the shimmering mimosa tree stretches out to embrace the spring.

name: mediterranean-honeysuckle-mimosa
detail: This fragrance evokes the sweetness of divine moments in the sun. A magical  rejuvenating escape.

name: velvet-mimosa-bloom-1
detail: Born from the Sicilian memories of Domenico Dolce  the pure scent of Mimosa has an unmistakable  graceful and persistent trail. A tribute to women in their simplicity and light.

name: sea-mimosa-1
detail: “Sea Mimosa” is born on the hills of the Riviera  where mimosas are called “sun of winter”. They offer a must-see spectacle in February: their golden bells resemble a golden firework. This new fragrance captures the essence of this magical moment when their scent is mingled to the Mediterranean sea breeze. Take a breathe  follow this intense floral and delicately iodized fragrance and its musky base.

name: mimosa-in-the-air-1
detail: February  and suddenly winter gives way to the first sign of summer. A thousand tiny yellow clouds of joy grow on trees and fill the sky with the promise of balmy  longer  softer days.

name: herba-mimosa
detail: This tender  powdery fragrance echoes a memory from the perfumer's youth: the awakened senses and stirred emotions of discovering the mimosa blooming in the hills of Grasse when she was 20. Mimosa blossoms with powdery  woody  vegetal and luminous facets that lend fullness to the composition.

name: mimosa-tanneron-1
detail: Mimosa Tanneron is an ode to tenderness  sweetness  and the sensations of blossoming love.

name: infusion-de-mimosa-1
detail: It is the scent of the tree in full bloom  perhaps in late summer in the south of France. Powdery  floral  with an almost tactile yellow velvet softness. Mimosa subverts the traditional interpretation of its main ingredient and gives it a new meaning. It is incredibly present and yet impossible to capture; a blend of the everyday and the imaginary.

name: flowerful-decadent-mimosa
detail: Decadent Mimosa is inspired by the sweet  rich sugar-spun aroma of Mimosa. It captures the feelings of a summer's day.

name: mimosa-indigo-1
detail: It was three o'clock in the morning. She was on her way home in a taxi. Still in her purple dress  she looked beautiful. As she passed a jazz club  she could hear the music playing inside. She asked the driver to stop and pushed open the door. She slowly approached the musician sitting in the dark and said  "This is MY music.

name: jasmine-white-moss
detail: Fresh citrus blends with berries for a feeling of sparkling sophistication. The traditional signature green notes were also modernized with dewy leafy impressions  lightening the overall fragrance  adding a refined subtlety.
ingredients: ['Moss', 'Galbanum', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Patchouli', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Birch Leaves', 'Basil', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Chamomile', 'Dill', 'Iris / Orris', 'Leatherwood', 'Mandarin', 'Marigold', 'Orange Blossom', 'Rose', 'Vetiver', 'Violet', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Broom', 'Jasmine (India)', 'Mimosa (India)', 'White Moss Mist']

name: lilas-y-mimosas-1
detail: A captivating and elegant perfume. There is nothing more moving and evocative than remembering wonderful walks through lilac and mimosa gardens. A unique  seductive and elegant fragrance.

name: morning-mimosa-1
detail: Morning Mimosa is a delicious fragrance with sweet and sensual notes that will leave a seductive veil on the skin.

name: modest-mimosa-1
detail: "The mimosa flower may be shy  but it's also widely regarded for its tenacity - it spreads it's grown as soon as it takes root. It reminds me of the Monarch butterfly  which also appears delicate but can fly 3 000 miles during migrations. There's a fascinating juxtaposition there that I was eager to explore " Jan Ahlgren  Olfactive Director.

name: mimosa-cardamom
detail: A new bohemia awaits. Mists of golden  honeyed mimosa float over the spicy splendour of freshly crushed cardamom. Creamy sandalwood and Tonka pulse beneath powdery heliotrope and Damascus rose picked at dawn. Warm  ethereal  mesmerising.

name: mimosa-cardamom-1
detail: Mimosa & Cardamom is a sensual  addictive  and charismatic fragrance.

name: multilotus
detail: Multilotus Eau de Parfum is inspired by the spiritual side of the Lotus Flower  a light green flower used as a gift to the gods in Sri Lanka.

name: lotus-blanc
