detail: Velvet Oud is a scent that evokes memories and introduces a new level of luxury to those who appreciate the extraordinary.

name: black-noir
detail: Black Noir is a fragrance of oriental mystique  its heart filled with a rare oud meticulously selected by Mancera.

name: kronos
detail: There is a darkness within Kronos and it is my favourite. Undoubtedly the most famous Titan in mythology  Kronos is the most powerful son of Uranus  the controller of time and its flow. Able to manipulate space and dominate the entire universe.

name: tughra
detail: A luxurious and mysterious scent inspired by the Ottoman culture. Exclusive to Beymen.

name: oud-masira
detail: A homage to Masira  a kitesurfing paradise and a top-class nightlife spot in front of Oman

name: coffee-break-golden-dallah-1
detail: Golden Dallah is dedicated to the Arabic coffee culture. As a matter of fact  Dallah is the name of the traditional Arabic coffee pot used for centuries to brew and serve a spicy  bitter coffee traditionally served during feasts like Eid al-Fitr.

name: themis-1
detail: Inspired by Greek mythology  from the creative vision of Paolo and Tiziana Terenzi  always able to combine tradition and innovative research  comes a new creation  Themis. Titaness of justice and balance  she was the emblem of unshakable solidity  just like the extraordinary persistence of this fragrance.

name: coffee-break-golden-moka
detail: Golden Moka is a truly tantalising explosion of rich coffee and enlivening citrus.

name: oud-cambodi-7
detail: With the authentic Oud Cambodi  you can create a luxurious aura of elegance that embodies a serene spirit.

name: lillipur
detail: A country where history  civilisation  and myths intertwine  Nepal places the traveller in cosmic time  perfect for exploring the soul and discovering one's innermost self. Lillipur is a spectacular agglomeration of temples. Standing out among them is the incredibly beautiful Golden Temple. Here  in every corner  huge braziers burn with incense to aid meditation. Lillipur is considered one of the most spiritual places on Earth.
ingredients: ['Carnation', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Tobacco Accord', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood (Lebanon)', 'Amber', 'Benzoin', 'Cinnamon', 'Cyclamen', 'Galbanum', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Thyme', 'Tonka Bean', 'Birch', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Star Anise', 'Wormwood']

name: royal-oud-1
detail: A dream perfume from the pages of the Arabian Nights  Royal Oud is a scent that dazzles all the senses with its evocation of the rosy Persian dawn. The mysterious sounds of the night give way to the exotic awakening of a new day redolent of all the scents of the gorgeous East.

name: giullare
detail: This fragrance is a tribute to humour and fun. With its essence  it invites us to balance the pleasant and playful aspects of potentially daring situations.

name: ferrari-cedar-essence-1
detail: Scuderia Ferrari Cedar Essence draws inspiration by the resinous Cedarwood from Lebanon and its slightly aromatic needles of vibrant blue color. It also exudes a scent of freedom when ocean sprays drop along the road where connoisseurs ride their Ferraris.

name: leon-1
detail: Leon was created to celebrate the artist Leon Battista Alberti. Leon represents stylistic elegance with a touch of mystery.

name: encke-1
detail: Encke is one of the most famous and brightest comets in the cosmos. Thanks to its trail of stardust  this comet is also well known for having generated two meteorite swarms visible in the northern hemisphere from June to July and then again in November. Encke is a creation of a regal character that can be appreciated by those who love to be simply unique and dazzling  wearing the trail of an exclusive comet!

name: versace-woman
detail: A perfect blend of fashion and fragrance  a magical instrument of seduction  an indispensable pleasure.

name: noble-potion-1
detail: Describing Mediterranean beauty through olfactory sensations  led me to seek the most tactile essences. Noble Potion embodies the smooth sensuality of the finest ingredients  making the wearer both attractive and mysterious. A true feminine aphrodisiac.

name: malatesta
detail: Malatesta is inspired by the essence of nobility and strength characteristic of the Malatesta family  one of the most important in Italian history. An elegant and seductive creation that encapsulates the spirit of royalty in a drop of perfume.

name: kenzo-jungle-pour-homme
detail: The desire for freedom  space and strong emotions resonates in Kenzo Jungle pour Homme.

name: rosso-pompei
detail: A persuasive and mysterious emotion envelops him completely in his arcane  making his charm as irresistible and unforgettable as the mythical atmosphere of Pompeii.

name: liquid-crystal
detail: Melted glass sensation  luxurious feeling on your skin. When the hot melted glass slowly but intensely changes in shape and suddenly freezes and solidifies for eternity.

name: beso-canalla-1
detail: A lively departure prompts barefoot walks on the cool sand under the pier at Beso Beach. A meeting of sun and gourmand notes spread across the tables  while music floods the space and provides harmony in a moment that you never want to end.

name: vanille-santal-2
detail: The warmth of Madagascar vanilla. The sensuality of Indian sandalwood. A balance inspired by these two emblematic raw materials  with a touch of gourmand spices.

name: 6-jasmin-sandalwood-oriental-musk
detail: Sandalwood nobility from India is the main note of this soft  sweet floral fragrance.

name: beso-negro-1
detail: An elegant  strong and charismatic sunset. The most provocative kiss has given way to the provocation of the night. A unique personality that comes together in a carnal kiss where the darkness and the moon are the only witnesses.

name: santal-wood
detail: Santal Wood is instilled with the aura of Sandalwood providing an ethereal feeling of so pure poetry.

name: absolutely-vital-1
detail: Elegant is innate' - Created by Yves Cassar  Absolutely Vital uses the highest quality natural ingredients sourced from Grasse  France  to create this ode to Mrs Vreeland's love of India and her passion for sandalwood.

name: woodgrain-sandalwood
detail: The sumptuous fragrance of the gardens of maharajas and maharanis was exclusive to Indian royalty. Using the sumptuous gardens of rare sandalwood trees  Caswell-Massey distilled the exotic scent for the Sandalwood Collection.

name: acqua-di-parma-sandalo-1
detail: Sandalo is a solar and intense creation where sandalwood plays a unique role  smooth yet fresh and bright.

name: dunhill-indian-sandalwood
detail: Focusing on the warm scent of soft wood  the Dunhill Indian Sandalwood will make a subtle addition to your fragrance edit. Intertwined with bergamot  it is uplifted with breezes of tree moss and patchouli.

name: santal-pao-rosa-1
detail: "Sandalwood can sometimes take on a pinkish-pink hue. Santal Pao Rose is both woody strength and floral grace. Like a sacred love"  Delphine Jelk  perfumer.

name: wirtanen-1
detail: The amazing comet Wirtanen  more than any other comet  is surrounded by many mysteries that remain unsolved today  as it is present for a very short period in our neighbourhood. A creation with a strong and mysterious character  it requires time to be appreciated. However  it has the ability to seduce with the sweetness of a caress  thanks to the balance of its notes. A journey into the beauty of the infinite cosmos.

name: a-quiet-morning-1
detail: The timeless charm of India is found in A Quiet Morning  which captures the aroma of Basmati rice thrown skyward  the opulence of exotic spices and the warmth of Indian sandalwood with Tibetan cedar.

name: sandalwood-musk-1
detail: Sandalwood pierced with light  shining in the dark. Enhancing both the dark woods  and the soft creaminess of sandalwood oil with different ingredients. Animalic  addictive  leather suede accentuates sandalwoods darkest qualities.

name: acqua-di-parma-colonia-sandalo
detail: Colonia Sandalo  a fascinating olfactory journey in which for the first time  the fresh  citrus notes of Colonia meet the rich and smooth woody notes. An unexpected and intriguing result; this original reinterpretation of Acqua di Parma's iconic fragrance  Colonia Sandalo is the new and luxurious Eau de Cologne.

name: lyrd-artisan-santal-musk
detail: Lyrd Artisan introduces you to a world of authentic fragrances expertly crafted by master perfumers: captivating gender-neutral scents with unexpected combinations of the finest ingredients that are exquisite alone  but even more fascinating together.

name: santal-nuit
detail: This is a dark  mineral fragrance brightened with sparkling zest and combined with vibrant and deep spices. It is a Signature Blend created with two EPC Essential Eau de parfum: Bergamot Incense and Sandalwood Musk.

name: magnat-imperium-1
detail: Luxury is not what you own  it's how you enjoy life. It's waking up in new places and living unique experiences that others could only imagine. Magnat Imperium is your perfume if you are a man who enjoys living life differently.

name: mon-immortelle-1
detail: Wild and spicy  Mon Immortelle takes us on a journey to the scorching hills of Corsica  scented with herbs  at the height of summer. It is a nectar of the gods  a divine elixir  a golden sun that never fades.

name: ambra-4
detail: Ambra offers a unique version of the traditional vanilla and labdanum blend.

name: aqua-motu-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A sea breeze blows on this invigorating accord  enhanced by the elegance of a heart composed of fresh notes of warm sand  magnified by a richly musky base.
ingredients: ['Marine', 'Sand Accord', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk']

name: blanche-immortelle-1
detail: Her boundless generosity defined her  but she preferred to remain hidden. With fire and passion  she secretly devoted every moment of freedom to the cause that could make an eternal difference. Her actions would irreversibly alter the established order.

name: la-femme-absolu
detail: Truly distinctive and seductive  La Femme Prada Absolu possesses a strong and powerful character that is described as very luxurious  refined and exceptional.

name: vinyle-collection-de-nuit
detail: An intense  sensual and carnal fragrance that dresses the skin.

name: virens
detail: Bronzed forearms twist the boat's steering wheel  while the wind ruffles the hair. Beyond the splashes  the acrobatics of water skiing ripple the line.

name: noble-viii-rococo-immortelle-1
detail: Charmingly known as the everlasting flower thanks to its golden petals which never fade  the herbaceous immortelle blends with spice accords to create a playful  charming scent.

name: mandarine-immortelle-1
detail: A deep and bewitching perfume. The Immortelle  olfactory signature of the Corsican maquis  sublimated by the freshness of citrus fruits. The intoxicating power of the Immortelle is magnified with Mandarin and honey notes to reveal all the facets.

name: tabac-imperial-1
detail: This scent is a sublimation of tobacco absolute and a celebration of the brand's artistry and craftsmanship.

name: jasmin-immortelle-neroli
detail: Floral and feminine  this fragrance balances the white notes of gardens at dawn with the gold of a flower that still flourishes throughout the Corsican maquis.

name: relativamente-rosso-1
detail: The first smell  sinuous and enchanting  bewitches the mind like an olfactory spell  while the heart  enveloping  gourmand and sensual  gives off an exotic high. This philtre is completed on the dry descent  with a voluptuous embrace.

name: ne-moubliez-pas
detail: Guerlain pays tribute to its legendary Parisian address  with a unique creation exclusive to 68  Champs-Elysées. A century after it was established  it remains the epitome of French art de vivre.

name: royal-rose-15
detail: Royal Rose is the absolute incarnation of femininity and sensuality. A fragrance inspired by Queen Marie-Antoinette  the last queen of France  and her love for perfumes and especially floral scents.

name: liberty-maze
detail: Take a stroll through the leafy trail of Liberty’s heritage Orchard print and meander through a picturesque artist’s garden in 1970s springtime. As you soak up this crisp and tranquil citrus scent  clusters of blossoming jasmine are revealed  while hints of solar honeysuckle pull you deep into a silver birch woodland with whispers of soft musk  billowing in the sun.

name: mod-blush
detail: This scent was inspired by the modernity  freedom of expression and individuality of subculture popularised in ’60s London.

name: soleil-vibrant
detail: She walks on the wild side  which is where the sun is. Because she is a creature of light and nature. Vibrant. Elemental. Vividly alive. In tune with her emotions. In tune with the world. Every place she goes  everything she does  everyone she loves is affected by her golden light. She knows you can choose your energy. And she likes good vibes.

name: piano-santal-gold-edition
detail: Piano Santal is a white woody dream in which languid sandalwoods  a pheromonal accord and a milky creaminess define the composition.

name: not-a-perfume-1
detail: "A fragrance made from a single element called Cetalox. It is normally used in perfumery as a base note  but I decided to make it the protagonist because it is one of my favourite ingredients. Another advantage of this composition is that it is allergen-free. The result is minimalist  elegant  pure". Romano Ricci  Artistic Director.

name: iso-e-molecule
detail: Iso E Molecule is a soft fragrance that we like to feel up close. Its sensuality  wrapped in something mysteriously powdery  gives the fragrance an unforgettable outstanding personality.

name: patchouli-ardent-2020
detail: Patchouli Ardent devotes a singular ode to patchouli  a noble ingredient whose sensual scrolls have transcended the borders of the East to conquer the whole world. An intense and luminous wake to intoxicate the senses.

name: baccarat-rouge-540-1
detail: Baccarat Rouge 540. Powerful and distinguished  it's name evokes a metamorphosis of a clear crystal mingled with 24-carat gold powder and gradually brought to fusion at 540 degrees arousing a glowing scarlet appearance.

name: suggestion-pour-lui
detail: Suggestion pour Elle and pour Lui are a duo of luminous and exciting perfumes  with the same codes of seduction  love and power.

name: not-a-perfume-superdose
detail: An intense version of NOT a Perfume: Not a perfume Superdose! An explosive name for an explosive fragrance.

The story of Barneys New York begins in 1923. The wife hands her husband their precious engagement ring to support his dream. With the money exchanged for the ring  the founder Barney Pressman opens his store with 40 designer suits. Barneys Eau De Parfum 1923 captures this heart-warming tale of how Barneys New York came into being.

name: ambroxan-molecule
detail: Ambroxan is the olfactory version of a look. A name that has become iconic. It is a unisex fragrance that creates its own story and invites you to do the same.

name: mercedes-benz-man-private-1
detail: Mercedes-Benz Man Private will appeal to young men who are seductive  self-confident and slightly arrogant  but full of irresistible charm.

name: luna-rossa
detail: The power of the wind and the waves give us half a second to change the ship's direction. But when symbiosis between men's creation and the elements is achieved  then it is sheer grace.

name: amwaaj-al-oud
detail: Amwaaj Al Oud is a beautiful scent  enveloping  sensual  and warming.

name: sveva
detail: "1992. It was Friday afternoon. I was with my mother going to my father’s fragrance laboratory to pick him up before all of us going together to our country-house. It happened that he haddn’t finished his work so I had time to play  mixing raw materials in his laboratory. I wanted to be a nose  exactly like him. I was mixing raw materials hoping to create the perfect composition. It never happened but I had never lost hope. My father reformulated my formula  25 years later. He was finally able to create my perfect composition " Roberta Cerizza  Founder.

name: densa-1
detail: Nebbia's Densa (dense)  the extension of a branch fallen in the wet moss and sailed by our stumbling steps among the trees that move the cathedral of mystery  with no horizons. The measure of things  the everyday breath  are missing in the dark green iced by the thin clouds  reshaping all the forms with a dump proud.

name: this-is-really-him
detail: The scent of a passionate soulmate walking the streets of Paris  looking for new adventures with Her.

name: open-sky-2021
detail: ”While being stuck in one place  our memories have become particularly vivid  and what I remember most often is travel. Beyond the physicality of spaces  that idea of movement (of journeys  of being on your way somewhere)  is something I truly miss. The void that exists in-between places: I wanted to capture that ” Ben Gorham  Creative Director and Founder.

name: paragon
detail: Paragon goes beyond the skin all the way to the soul and leads you to another dimension: plenitude. A scent that stimulates the mind and opens the heart.

name: md-nous-sommes-amants
detail: You put on the perfume and  suddenly. You are no longer friends  partners or spouses  but lovers. It blends notes in an animal  sensual fragrance. For a skin-on-skin experience at once instinctive and irrational. Control freaks had better stay away.

name: venezia-essenza-pour-homme-1
detail: Venezia Essenza Pour Homme pays homage to the city of Venice  the cultural base and constant inspiration for The Merchant of Venice. A fascinating masculine fragrance  capable of embodying the essence  uniqueness and beauty of the city.

name: elisir-n2-palo-santo
detail: Elisir N.2 Palo Santo is a fragrance inspired by the ancient shamanic tradition  according to which priests burned palo santo in initiation rituals of purification. The olfactory notes that characterise it are enveloping  like the fumes that rose from the shamans' bonfires  releasing a mystical essence into the air.

name: biografia-assinatura-masculino-1
detail: The sophistication of oak moss is combined with the freshness of palo santo and rosemary involved by the breu-branco  an ingredient of Brazilian biodiversity  to form this indispensable colony.

name: santo-incienso-sillage-sacre
detail: An inspired composition that unleashes the magical power of Palo Santo  the tree that purifies the heart and spirit. Santo Incienso Sillage Sacré is an Extrait de Parfum with a surprising contrast between freshness and warmth.

name: privilege
detail: "My personal interpretation of the term 'privilege' is that for me it is a privilege  to have water  nature  greenery  forests and the sea at my disposal. In other words  having nature around me is the ultimate privilege. Privelege has become my homage to the natural elements"  Nathalie Feisthauer  perfumer.
ingredients: ['Galbanum', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Mineral Notes', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Amyris', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Palo Santo', 'Flower Stems', 'Blackcurrant', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Marine', 'Rhubarb', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Ambrette Seed']

name: functional-fragrance-1
detail: A fragrance with a function  designed to help you reset at times of high stress. Developed using data insight and research into the connection between cognitive function and the olfactory system. This is an anti-stress supplement delivered in the form of a unisex fragrance.

name: dirty-ginger-1
detail: We dance with rhizomes and flirt with citrus in this bright and provocative version of nature's hottest root. With energising and purifying botanicals  it's a little Ayurvedic spa in a bottled paradise.

name: essencial-palo-santo-1
detail: An intense and exuberant fragrance that celebrates one of the most fragrant woods in the world  used to attract prosperity  open paths  and celebrate achievements.
ingredients: ['Palo Santo', 'Pink Pepper', 'Orange Blossom', 'Rose', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Sandalwood', 'Woody Notes', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Pear', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine (Sambac)']

name: vintage-radio
detail: A nostalgic perfume that transports you to simpler  more elegant times.

name: eilish-no-2
detail: "I really liked the idea of a darker  rainier world for Eilish NO. 2. We started with the original 'Eilish' elements of warmth and sweetness  but then added spicy and woody elements for a more sensual  wetter feel " Billie Eilish.

name: palo-santo-patchouli-vert
detail: Palo Santo & Patchouli Vert is reminiscent of Carlotha's bedroom  a room filled with the scent of palo santo wood furnitur. The perfumer Jean-Michel Duriez immersed himself in the childhood memories of the creator of the brand such as the smell of talcum powder  burning candles  guava leaves to create this unique fragrance with a cocooning spirit.

name: my-attitude-1
detail: The fragrance for girls who have an attitude. My power is to make my own choices. The fragrance for girls who decide their own rules and know they can be who they want  whenever they want.

name: phoenicia
detail: Inspired by the region of the Mediterranean coast. A luxurious scent that breathes life into an imaginary journey  lost in time. Both noble  powerful and gentle  in the style of the elegant and contemporary Heeley's brand.

name: bois-de-gaiac-genievre
detail: Be swept away by the perfect balance between the slightly smoky notes of the Guaiac wood essences and the aromatic accents of the Juniper berries.

name: gaiac
detail: The unique and rare aroma of precious Gaiac wood.

name: gaiac-10
detail: Don't expect this woody musk to leave a perfumed trail from wherever you are to Hokkaido (unless you're already in Hokkaido)  but it will stay with you and stay with you  regardless of your mood  for days and days  and nights and nights.

name: molecule-01-guaiac-wood
detail: "Guaiac Wood has the smoky  aromatic flavour of a great whisky  along with a creamy warmth. It has a soft 'snuggle around the fireplace in winter' feel to it. It's like an emulsified smoke that melds with the Iso E Super to create a very sexy and erogenous skin scent " Geza Schoen  perfumer.

name: nero-oudh
detail: Tiziana Terenzi's creations are more than fragrances: they evoke emotions in unusual alchemies of chords. Nero Oudh is inspired by the new moon  a lunar cycle of rebirth that is believed to be a sign of good luck  prosperity and happiness.

name: gaiac-eternel
detail: Gaïac Eternel invites you to find the hidden treasures of an unreachable nature  deep in the Paraguayan rainforest. Follow the golden line and let yourself be carried away by the deep and enchanting scent of the guaiac forest.

name: hamdani
detail: Hamdani was often considered as the symbol of power and beauty and was thought to be a pure and athletic horse.

name: ambra-guaiac
detail: Ambra Guaiac  the research of a unisex fragrance  with a strong Middle Eastern scent  finds in Amber the sensation of uniqueness that smells of Rose and Oud.

name: the-architects-club
detail: A group of architects gather for cocktails at Mayfair's smartest Art Deco smoking room. As they settle in the warm interior of dark woods  leather and velvet  London's bright young things burst in  frosted martinis in hand surrounded by a cloud of laughter and fine vanilla.
ingredients: ['Guaiac Wood', 'Oak', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Juniper Berries', 'Woody Notes', 'Ambermax (Woody ambery)', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Pepperwood', 'Amber', 'Vanilla', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Angelica', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Cardamom', 'Coriander', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lavender', 'Lemon', 'Nutmeg', 'Pink Pepper', 'Clary Sage', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: absinthe-gaiac
detail: Distinguished and sublime Absinthe Gaïac provides an invigorating start  slightly bitter  green and full of elegance. Absinthe Gaïac is a grand and alluring fragrance.

name: bois-de-gaiac-et-poire
detail: Explore the memory of history. Explore the most intimate zones of expression. Bois de Gaïac et Poire.

name: 601-amber-gaiacwood-1
detail: The olfactory facet 601 finds its heart in Guaïac wood  a small tree also known as Guayacan that has been used for centuries for its properties and aroma. The result is an elegant  warm and sensual fragrance.

name: nostalgia
detail: With this composition  the Officina di Santa Maria Novella tries to evoke the smell of the racing cars during the "Millemiglia".

name: falcon-leather
detail: Inspired by a falconer's leather glove with a tanned nubuck facet accentuated by resins  spices and carnal accents.

name: oximoron
detail: This contradictory fragrance smells like a meadow of flowers after a summer rain  or like a new leather jacket  or like the skyline of a big city. Deep  smoky  contrasting.

name: tom-ford-london-1
detail: A unique dynamic between elegant  urbane composure and carnal  sometimes scandalous amusements.
ingredients: ['Tonka Bean', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Honey', 'Birch Tar', 'Saffron', 'Amyris', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Cardamom', 'Coffee', 'Coriander', 'Cumin', 'Jasmine', 'Black Pepper', 'Geranium (Egypt)']

name: mississippi-medicine-1
detail: Based on the rituals of the proto-Mississippian death cult of the 13th Century.

name: tea-tonique-1
detail: "I often happen to travel in Asia - and one of my favourite moments is when I arrive in a new location and a fragrant cup of tea is offered with a smile. There is a different world in every cup. Some are pensive  others joyful  some are a relief  others are full of energy. Every time a new discovery. Earl Grey  with its happy  vibrant  and fresh  almost feminine character is a favourite. Dual  intense  yet light - this is my celebration of its character "  Mathieu Nardin  Perfumer.

name: lincendiaire
detail: "I am the protagonist of this story  turning my anger into passion. My aggressiveness hides my fear and patches up my courage. L'incendiaire gives me the spark I need  and by declaring my flame I ignite what burns inside me  and it consumes me. My heroine springs from the depths of my cowardice and my flaws reveal the golden glow of her virtues. It is love that sustains me in my darkest hour  even as I mourn her loss"  Serge Lutens.

name: qafiya-sport-1
detail: Aimed at health-conscious men and women with a sporty outlook on life and who enjoy an extrovert lifestyle.

name: samar
detail: Samar is a fragrance that hides like the moon behind the clouds  exchanging the silence of conversations with sensations and creating a magical journey into the world of mystery.

name: chinese-tobacco
detail: “There are elements of different legendary movies like Indochine in the fragrance of Chinese Tobacco. A reflection of East meets West taking place in the '30s to 50's colonial French Indochina. I'm often captured by these strong contrasts and different ambiances when traveling in Asia. A major inspiration for the scent was the powerful scene in the movie Apocalypse Now ” Johan Bergelin  Olfactive Director.

name: poltergeist-1
detail: Take a late-night motorcycle ride through a lush  dense pine forest with Poltergeist  a fragrance inspired by the physical energy of spirits themselves. Part smoke  part green  Poltergeist is all wild magic. Don’t worry if you start chasing the green fairy: it’s a known side effect of this intoxicating mix.
ingredients: ['Birch Tar', 'Wormwood', 'Pine Needles', 'Cade', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Cedarwood', 'Palo Santo', 'Champaca', 'Juniper Berries']

name: storm
detail: This fragrance will remind you of bright blue skies and sparkling waterfalls that are serene and uplifting.

name: cuir-de-russie-extrait
detail: In 1920  the Grand Duke Dimitri was exiled from Russia to Paris  leaving in his trail the white steppe and the icy Neva River  furs and crinolines. Charmed by the sumptuous Byzantine style  Gabrielle Chanel adorned her creations with Slavic and gold embroidery. Cuir de Russie is a distant escape that blends birch bark with swirls of blonde tobacco in a musky  sophisticated fragrance. A testament to passionate elegance.

name: poirier-dun-soir-1
detail: Evocative of the warm honeyed blooms that encircle a pear and orchard at dusk. Poirier d'un Soir is inspired by the contrasting flavors and complex aromas of ripe  juicy fruits and their delectable possibilities. Like lights ablaze in a dusking sky  a combination of fresh citrus and delectable berries introduce a glimpse of warmth and a touch of caramelized gourmand note. A rich heart of spice  royal blooms  and smoky  earthy notes  create a core signature. Shadows of top and heart dry down to a smooth base of wood notes make Poirier d'un Soir a memorable delight.

name: coal-1
detail: Coal is based on one of Maacks' original drawings made with black coal. It captures the feeling of creating this work  the smudge on the fingertips  the coal falling through the white paper as the hand moves to create a drawing and the broken pieces at the bottom of the page.
ingredients: ['Birch Tar', 'Leather', 'Pink Pepper', 'Cedarwood', 'Papyrus', 'Sandalwood', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Juniper Berries', 'Patchouli', 'Shiso Leaves', 'Black Pepper']

name: play-black
detail: Play Black. Design by not designing. No design is design. The prototype is strong. Absence of concept is creation.

name: laigle-de-la-victoire
detail: The "Victoire"  the victory of Wagram in 1809 near Vienna made Napoleon master of the whole of Europe. Once again  Napoleon's genius prevailed over a numerous  determined and well-armed enemy  led by expert generals. French admiration for Napoleon grew and was expressed in mass demonstrations and in the writings of leading literary figures. Rancé decided to pay homage to the Emperor by creating a new perfume that would have the strength of spirit and determination of the Victor.

name: patchouli-24-1
detail: Even though it is vital to the olfactory shock this perfume generates  Patchouli is not easy to detect in this formula. The smoky character takes over in the first few seconds  making this signature absolutely unique and difficult to situate. Fortunately  a touch of vanilla brings calm to this little world  evoking peace  sensuality and softness to these provocative notes. A scent filled with danger for those of us who like to walk a tight rope.

name: aventus-cologne
detail: Aventus Cologne is a universal legend that perfectly complements its counterparts while providing an expressive and unconventional fresh olfactive experience entirely of its own. Aventus Cologne bottles the defining moments of individuality and one's journey to own it.

name: peau-despagne-1
detail: Typically masculine  it is an acidic blend of birch essences  with traces of Brazilian Linaloe  which is a resin that must be collected on full moon nights to make the most of its aroma. It is reminiscent of the smell of saddle and harness leather  for which Spanish craftsmen are famous.

name: flash-back-in-new-york
detail: The surprise factor is one of the city's hallmarks. Exuberant and full of contrasts  Flash Back in New York begins with an energetic mix of notes.

name: cabiria-2020-1
detail: Let yourself be transported to dreamland with this extravagant fragrance. Cabiria is a tribute to the Oscar-winning director Federico Fellini and an infectious explosion of seduction and happiness. This luxurious  multi-faceted fragrance  like a Fellini film  will leave you suspended between a dreamlike state and reality.

name: spirit-for-men-legacy
detail: Your story begins with your ancestors and lives on in you. Transmitting these values ​​and virtues to new generations is your commitment  your brand. And now it's your fragrance.

name: elisir-nero-1
detail: This spicy and delicate fragrance is an elixir against negativity and stress.

name: bruno-banani-man-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: This is what the self-confident man who knows what is important wears.

name: my-looks-man-extreme
detail: My Looks in the "extreme version" of Wolfgang Joop's signature fragrance presents itself as an intense and powerful masculine fragrance. A warm scent that is more than just a statement!

name: infinite-celtic-pour-homme-1
detail: Infinite Celtic for men is a contemporary tribute to the refinement of Celtic art  and ancient European civilisation. This distinctive  virile fragrance has a modern signature and timeless elegance designed for the active  urban and cosmopolitan man; a man of good taste who appreciates the finer things in life without pretension.

name: perry-ellis-m-1
detail: Perry Ellis M for the man who is sexy and charismatic  this fragrance opens with genuine masculinity that brings exotic aroma through sensual tones. Powerful  deep and sexy. Masculinity defined. Playful  intense and sensual.

name: adhil
detail: Adhil is a famous star in the constellation Andromeda. The stylistic and creative principle is based on extreme research  almost acrobatic  which explores the boundaries of Andromeda and its continuous evolution. This creates an original and unique composition  built with precious raw materials.

name: lince-1
detail: In the city the Solstice festivities were being prepared and the people were animated by that confident euphoria that precedes great events  full of expectation for the blessing of the new harvest  the fruit of their hard work in the fields. Luck  they said  was coming to the city and so they lit up the darkness with bonfires and the streets with the colour and hypnotic perfumes of flowers.

name: the-man-of-passion-1
detail: With his charisma  passion and sensuality  he makes an impression on women all over the world. Man of Passion is a fragrance for the confident man with a sensual  seductive and irresistible charm.

name: scuderia-ferrari-black-signature-1
detail: Radiating with class and elegance  Black Signature blends the well-behaved and sexy codes of masculinity.

name: boss-selection
detail: Boss encapsulated in a bottle; classic values of elegance and style. For those who seek achievement. An expression of those who have already left a mark. It's about achievement in the distinctive Boss way.

name: carlisle
detail: Parfums de Marly brings us  Carlisle  which once again takes inspiration from the equestrian world by basing its latest offering on a stunning horse from the past. Carlisle has been named after the legendary 1695 English horse of the same name.

name: decas-1
detail: Decas celebrates the 10 year anniversary of the first perfume in the Xerjoff 1861 collection and evokes an inspiring mood with intriguing and opulent accords.

name: felino-1
detail: Symbol of power for the Catalan bourgeoisie  a desire to demonstrate progress and economic success. The lion becomes the expression of business achievement.

name: this-is-not-a-blue-bottle-14
detail: 1.4  the Yin  natural energy  focuses on itself  the inner power  the depth of the elements  the return to the sources  and the reflection.

name: shaal-nur
detail: Shaal-Nur  the Indian queen of dawn's suffused light  promises abandon and plays with the senses  stimulating them  calming anxiety and dispelling stress. Ultimately leading us to reveal what we had so far kept hidden.

name: or-kanabo
detail: Or Kanabo goes back in time. To our childhood  to warm and deep feelings; aromatic biscuits  juicy fruits  powdered dolls  creamy ice creams... and affectionate hugs.

name: essence-n-3-ambre-1
detail: A luminous reinterpretation of a mythical Haute Parfumerie accord: Amber. This composition pays tribute to the essence of the Couturier's dazzling work. The brightness of this fragrance bursts forth from darkness  a spectacular embroidery of black glitter and coppery crystals.

name: or-des-indes
detail: Or des Indes is like the rustling of silks woven with gold threads in the palaces of the maharajas. Opulent and brilliant  it leaves an undeniably majestic imprint on the skin.

name: cuir
detail: Opening with a whiff of Gauloise-like smoke it quickly becomes toasted spices and sweet absinthe before the appearance of the leather. Neatly straddling the line between biker and Birkin bag  the leather is almost carnal in its depth. This is a welcome walk on the wild side that would be wonderful on a man. On a woman? Only one way to put it: Cuir is ruthlessly chic.

name: opoponax-1
detail: The opoponax plant originated in Somalia. The Egyptians and Babylonians used it to fumigate and also to flavour wine.

name: mirabile
detail: An apotropaic perfume with relaxing properties like the loving caress of a mother. It has magical powers to ward off the influence of "evil spirits".

name: slow-dance
detail: The slow dance: A rites-of-passage moment for both girls and boys before they metamorphose into women and men. A feeling of exhilaration tempered by awkwardness  a heady collision of innocence and experience  not knowing and knowing  felt across countries  cultures  and time.

name: sanguine-muskissime
detail: This scent evokes the charm and passion of a Sicilian getaway in the first days of September. The spontaneity of a trip on two wheels  criss-crossing scorched lands and citrusy valleys.

name: tangerine-boy
detail: Tangerine Boy isn’t a shy guy  he’s always the center-of-attention. Not for the faint of heart  a day with Tangerine Boy will be a fun one  and guaranteed to be extra juicy. Audaciously bright  obnoxiously bold  and undeniably sexy  this unisex fragrance blends seamlessly to the skin.

name: eau-de-bonpoint
detail: "Perfume is the dream that transports me " says the perfumer.

name: jardin-damalfi
detail: Early 20th century  dusk  a garden in Italy. A slightly acidic  spicy  lively scent floats in the air among the trees. The landscape is a vivid panel of colours. Green  orange  yellow  red. Isadora Duncan's performance begins. The goddess of modern dance  dressed in a simple white veil  bare feet on the grass. Her body is free  her movements generous and original  her veil undulates over her grace. Always in search of harmony of body and soul. The audience is dazzled.

name: capim-limao-tangerina-1
detail: A fragrance that brings citrus and fruity notes combined with the freshness of lemongrass and the energy of tangerine  inspired by the wind's path through nature.

name: mandarino-basilico
detail: A light and delicate citrus fragrance with a refreshing and sensual trail.

name: bien-etre-mandarine-fleur-de-cotton-musc-blanc
detail: Mandarine Fleur de Coton Musc Blanc is a subtle and delicate fragrance with inviting notes that promotes well-being.

name: berlin
detail: Refreshing and citrusy  Berlin is like the magic of the night  a trail of colours.

name: verbena-y-azahar-1
detail: An invigorating and refreshing citrus scent. The vibrant top notes transport you to the Mediterranean Sea and its gardens. Light  fresh and aromatic notes make it suitable for any age  day or night.

name: cologne
detail: Cologne is aimed at all lovers of luxury who appreciate premium ingredients and the original composition of the fragrance.

name: acqua-energia-da-manha-1
detail: Sun  heat and holiday. Inspired by this relaxed mood  the fragrance captures the vibrancy of a beautiful summer morning.

name: eau-apaisante-body-mist
detail: Elderflower and orange blossom come together in this perfume with relaxing  benevolent aromas.

name: jasmin-ylang-solaire
detail: This delicate and luminous fragrance brings you back to summer with floral and sunny notes.

name: imitation-man-1
detail: "Imitation is a personal account of how one moment and one experience can alter a child's perception of the world. I am a child seeing snow for the first time in 1970  in New York. I am looking at this experience through a snow dome  exploring a city that is full of tension and displacement. As I walk through Lower East Side with its intense colours and smells and amalgamation of Latin and American cultures  I see an artistic community living on the fringe of society in an iconic era " Christopher Chong  Olfactive Director.

name: ambre-sensuel
detail: A warm scent with a swirl of woody and ambery notes.

name: joie-eclat-essentielle
detail: A fragrance that evokes an exhilarating walk through the citrus groves of Sicily surrounded by aromas of neroli and orange blossom.

name: gingembre-vetiver-sensuel-1
detail: Fresh  sparkling yet powerful fragrance with citrusy and woody notes  combined with Ginger. A seductive scent!

name: fleur-passion
detail: A passion fruit juice inspired this joyful fragrance  which captures the fruit's complex and unexpected depths…

name: mirage-du-desert
detail: Spicy  woody notes entice us away to the deserts of the Middle-East.

name: mefisto-gentiluomo-1
detail: Mefisto Genitluomo is a perfume with timeless elegance  the one that allows you to imagine yourself in an evening stroll  freshly shaved and combed  while talking about world affairs with a group of gentlemen colleagues.

name: cedre-iris-soyeux
detail: This Cèdre et Iris Soyeux incorporates the essence of fresh notes adorned with a light and powdery accord composed of woody accents. Bold and masculine  yet soft and light  this fragrance accompanies its wearer to the height of sophistication.

name: mimosa-heliotrope-poudre
detail: An irresistible and voluptuous fragrance with floral and powdery notes. Elegant and harmonious  this fragrance is soft and delicately sweet.

name: iris-deau
detail: Fresh green notes enhanced by the intensity of cedar wood.

name: part-time-hero-1
detail: A little clueless and tardy by nature  that's our hero. He is not  of course  the perfect lad  but he has that "je ne sais quoi"  (I do not know what) going for him that makes him completely irresistible. A fragrance combines romanticism without getting too excited  to put your feet back on the ground.

name: eau-stimulante-body-mist
detail: The combination of cucumber and mint makes this body mist both refreshing and energising.

name: papyrus-moleculaire
detail: "I wanted to take a different approach when working on a papyrus-based fragrance to create a contrast between hot and cold  with fresh  effusive notes of coriander leaf  followed by the spicy aspect of elemi  and the intense  smoky woody side of papyrus. This composition is warmed by a milky  musky amyris  which has heady cigar notes. I have added a touch of iris and powder to bring a touch of elegance and sensuality to the perfume". - Leslie Girard  Perfumer

name: eau-rassurante-body-mist
detail: A generous and comforting red berry mist to take you back to your childhood.

name: vanilla-club
detail: The unisex Vanilla Club embodies a subversion of the uniform approach to fragrances. It is designed for women  for men  for everyone. A fragrance that challenges you to embrace the diversity of existence.

name: sensualite-essentielle
detail: A fresh rose with fruity and sparkling accents for a radiant and sensual trail.

name: glam-flower
detail: Seductive as the citrus fades into a captivating and intoxicating rose.

name: orange-kush-1
detail: A Palm Angels + 19-69 collaboration  Orange Kush is dedicated to the origins of skateboarding. The fragrance is unexpected  fresh  effervescent and orangey.

name: les-4-saisons-ete
detail: A surprisingly fruity and fresh green mandarin.

name: green-mandarin
detail: The Green Mandarin fragrance surrounds the body with the freshness of Mediterranean citrus fruits. Sunlight expressed in the harmony of the precious citrus essences  which refresh the skin and revitalise the spirit.

name: voyage-english-dawn-white-gardenia
detail: Escape to the peace of a British country garden with delicate white gardenia. This glorious  lively fragrance captures the scent of hundreds of English white gardenia flowers blooming in the first light of dawn.

name: fleurs-de-gardenia
detail: Translucent  delicate  ethereal  stimulating  sparkling  romantic. A happy return to the first flowering of love  created by two generations of the House of Creed. A pure  soft  dreamlike reality of stirring hearts and high spirits. The sumptuous notes chosen by the young generation of the House of Creed become the master perfumer's portrait of how love used to be... and how it can be again.

name: dirty-gardenia-1
detail: Brimming with the vivacious beauty of sensual Colombian gardenias  Dirty Gardenia brings a unique and modern floral experience with its intoxicating floral atmosphere and green freshness. Lush  hypnotic and otherworldly  it is a weapon of mass seduction.

name: tuberose-gardenia
detail: Tuberose Gardenia reaches an unparalleled level of purity and potency  comparable to the aromas that the flowers themselves emit through the air.

name: flowerful-luxe-gardenia
detail: A perfume inspired by bountiful  beautiful and blossoming floral bouquets.

name: gardenia-eau-de-parfum
detail: The white camellia  a flower whose perfect shape makes one forget its lack of fragrance. It was the emblem of Coco Chanel  appearing here and there in her creations; on the brim of a hat  a buttonhole or a piece of jewellery. In 1925  she created a fragrance in its image and called it Gardénia.

name: flora-by-gucci-garden-emerald-gardenia-2019-1
detail: Gucci Floral Emerald Gardenia is inspired by a snapshot of an early summer's morning  where orchards ripe with fruit are covered with dew.

name: gardenia-15
detail: The scented flower par excellence.

name: vintage-gardenia
detail: A captivating blend  classic florals gardenia and tuberose combine with cardamom  sandalwood and myrrh to create a rich seduction for the senses.

name: jour-dhermes-gardenia
detail: "Gardenia  a flower that radiates as much through its beauty as through its fragrance  is the essence of Jour d'Hermès." Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer

name: flora-by-gucci-garden-gorgeous-gardenia-2021-1
detail: Escape into joy-fuelled fantasy land with Flora Gorgeous Gardenia  a sparkling floral signature built around the splendid gardenia flower.

name: mallorca-mujer
detail: Become acquainted with Mallorca Mujer through its aromas. A fragrance that will transport you to the courtyards and gardens typical of Mallorca.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Night Blooming Jasmine', 'Water Lily', 'Musk', 'Almond Blossom', 'Lily Of The Valley']

name: fils-de-joie-1
detail: "A laugh awaits a sentence  a word  or a situation to proclaim itself. A laugh may burst forth or be stifled by a hand that tries to contain it. But if it is sincere  it cannot be contained. On the skin  its fragrance is Lady-of-the-Night  a paradoxically radiant scent!" Serge Lutens.

name: jasmin-de-minuit-1
detail: Jasmine at night  when the sun gives in and the air finally becomes gentle and cool. A clean  sparkling jasmine  tempered by the soft winds and the air of the ocean. Enhanced by vetiver and patchouli. Intense and sensual.

name: moonlight-bloom
detail: An opulent fragrance for the woman who  like Christina  comes alive at night with a captivating air of mystery that blossoms under the spell of the moon.

name: princess-jasmine-x-disney
detail: The essence of enchantment. Inspired by Disney's animated Aladdin  it captures the beauty and romance of the Disney Princess.

name: or18
detail: A dreamy blend of the exotic and the familiar  this exceptional perfume with mystical notes  comes alive on the skin as the perfume dries.
ingredients: ['Night Blooming Jasmine', 'Lemon', 'Cream (Chantilly)', 'Blood Orange', 'Myrrh', 'Star Anise', 'Tonka Bean', 'Cannabis Accord', 'Driftwood']

name: vampire-blood
detail: An exciting scent that is equal parts fruity  floral and frightful.

name: jazmin-de-noche-1
detail: A wonderfully enveloping perfume that makes this floral blend a symphony of elegant fragrances and memories.
ingredients: ['Night Blooming Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Neroli', 'Amber', 'Iris / Orris', 'Orange Blossom', 'Lemon', 'Musk']

name: varens-in-the-sky
detail: A citrus wind refreshes the night  a heavenly thrust spangled with berries  melds into a swirl of white flowers. Silently  jasmine hatches  and its olfactory aura reaches the heavens. A musky cloud engulfed the patchouli’s dark aftermath and the caramel sweetness  night has come.

name: tsum-tsum-mickey-mouse
detail: A light  casual and fun scent for all the little ones.

name: after-hours-2023
detail: The rhythm of Rio After Hours. Intoxicating and velvety  this amber floral fragrance invites you to experience the magnetism of an uninhibited evening.

name: savage-jasmine
detail: Jasmine is often tempered by other notes in perfumery  but here  it is practically stripped bare - raw and intoxicating  with just a whisper of musk to anchor it. It pays olfactory homage to balmy summer evenings where the scent of night-blooming jasmine fills the air.

name: amber-dunes-2023
detail: An exquisite  sultry and floral aroma that mimics the beauty of intricate art found along ancient corridors. A complex and seamless scent like you're watching the sunset over the top of the soft sand of the desert dunes.

name: bat-2020-1
detail: Mystical  mysterious murmurings glide up a blanket of inky sky. Shadows smear across the moonlight  their darting journey shrouded in darkness. Bats  the only mammal capable of true flight  are enigmatic and alien.
ingredients: ['Moss', 'Night Blooming Jasmine', 'Guava', 'Earthy Notes', 'Hay', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Mineral Notes', 'Animalic Notes', 'Fig', 'Leather', 'Passion Fruit', 'Pebbles', 'Teak Wood', 'Vetiver']

name: animale-intense-for-women
detail: This seductive fragrance opens with an explosion of citrus and sparkling fruits that meld into a floral heart of intoxicating flowers with a hint of crushed berries. The base envelops with warm sensual notes to create an irresistible and addictive trail.

name: tropical-nights-2022-1
detail: Move your body and free your mind as the boss beats begin. This sultry  woody fragrance captures the heady romance of dancing a summer night away.

name: black-suede-essential-1
detail: Black Suede Essential is a masculine fragrance created with wild lavender  rich suede and an unexpected hint of citrus.

name: peony-blush-suede
detail: Peonies in voluptuous bloom  exquisitely fragile. Flirts with the juicy bite of crisp fruit and the opulence of flowers  mingling with the sensuality of soft blushing suede. Luxurious and seductive.

name: cuir-cordoba
detail: A sensation 'just under the skin. A suede-like olfactory texture delicately perfumed with powdery floral notes. An androgynous composition.

name: suede-de-suede-1
detail: Inspired by the memories of the perfumer  Suède de Suède unveils a perfume that evocatively caresses the skin like soft Swedish gloves. A smooth note warms you like the silky underside of fur.

name: white-suede
detail: White Suede captures the whisper of whiteness  the subtlety of shadow. Luxurious  expensive and textural elements envelop you in a sense of warmth and intimacy  exploring the primal tension between soft  typically masculine suede and feminine musky florals; White Suede has an enveloping emotional impact that hypnotically draws you into its soft sensuality.

name: oud-suede-1
detail: The Oud Suede Cologne is a traditional  intense fragrance derived from rare Middle Eastern Oud wood.

name: black-suede-intense-1
detail: Bold black sexy pepper  sophisticated leather  and oriental accords will linger on the skin for hours.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Leather', 'Black Pepper', 'Ambergris', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Tonka Bean', 'Clary Sage', 'Suede', 'Violet Leaves']

name: sleek-suede-collection-orientale
detail: Like leather  suede preserves the sensuality of its animal origins. But its velvety touch makes it similar to the skin. Yves Saint Laurent often used it in his collections.

name: clean-suede
detail: A tribute to tomorrow’s glorious possibilities. This is fresh  pure water washes away the sins of the night and leaves the skin luminous.

name: daimiris-1
detail: This is Pierre's olfactory experiment. Fragments of amethyst and shades of purple reflected in alcohol: the nose has created a fragrance that captures the feminine caress of velvet and the gaze of a man contemplating a woman's body.

name: byzantium-saffron-1
detail: According to Greek mythology  saffron is central to the legend of young Crocus and Smilax. With the classic elegance of its notes  Byzantium Saffron embraces and enriches the passion of this ancient idyllic love.  The ingredients in this perfume make the olfactory passe-partout of those who love travelling in luxury to the most intriguing and exuberant lands.

name: suede-et-safran-1
detail: Suède Et Safran gives the feel of a tailored leather jacket spiced with saffron from Iran and fragrant seeds and spices from India. A chic and fascinating signature ensemble.

name: baume-du-doge-1
detail: Born of the seas and magically built on stilts  Venice was for centuries the gateway to the Orient and prospered under the rule of its elected leader  the Doge. Under his reign  a world of spices and resins came to Venice  flanking and often mingling with local products. Thus was born an extraordinary world of perfumed ointments  and Baume du Doge: a warm  exciting and rich fragrance.

name: day-dream-1
detail: A soft and floral fragrance that invites you to dream. The delicate warmth of cashmere tickles your nose like the long-awaited rays of sunshine on a cold winter's day. Day Dream gently accompanies you throughout the day and opens your heart to all the beautiful moments that life has to offer.

name: ambre-de-siam-1
detail: Ambre de Siam is an Asian dream. Using ingredients from Indochina in 1920  René Duval and Germaine Madeline created an enchanting fragrance. The woody and amber notes take us to the heart of the myths of the colonial empire.

name: replica-matcha-meditation-1
detail: A fragrance inspired by a quiet afternoon of meditation. Imagine a bright  clear day in Tokyo accompanied by a hot cup of Japanese matcha tea. Replica : Matcha Meditation is a serene moment of relaxation for all your senses.

name: grand-soir
detail: Dress up in your best attire and shine your look. Wander through an endless night and enjoy the daring radiance of a magnificent Parisian evening time and time again.

name: tabacco-1
detail: Tabacco: wearing the scent of tradition. A real riot of senses.

name: bonne-chauffe
detail: A powerful perfume inspired by a blazing fire  the one that heats  illuminates  shapes and awakens the senses.

name: un-ete
detail: This fragrance will remind you of the creamy notes of sunscreen on your skin after a long day at the beach. This is the perfume of your memories  this is Un Été.

name: attendre-esperer
detail: P.Frapin & Cie pay tribute to Edmond Dantes  the Earl of Monte Cristo  an embodiment of elegance  strength  intelligence  and mystery  by olfactory interpreting the sentence 'Attendre & Espérer' (Wait & Hope) marked by Taoism and Christian hope  through a very original walnut-vetiver accord. The result is a dandy fragrance  full of philosophy and mystery.

name: signature-absolue
detail: Sparkling  radiant and intense  this unique fragrance offers the Montblanc woman a new way to project her character and express her desire to illuminate her universe effortlessly  inviting others to follow in her irresistible wake.

name: replica-under-the-stars
detail: Under the Stars evokes the memory of a starry night spent in the wilds of nature. Its timeless blend of oud essence and labdanum resinoid notes recalls a dark  mystical night.

name: vanilla-milk
detail: Delicious yet sophisticated  faceted yet smooth  Vanilla Milk is a fragrance of paradoxes. Ellis Brooklyn’s Bee Shapiro and female Irish perfumer Meabh McCurtin  two outsiders to the perfume world  came together to create a vanilla fragrance from a fresh perspective: one that is uniquely addictive.

name: bee-2
detail: Dripping with honey  Bee is the magical journey of finding and falling in love with yourself. It is for lovers of warm  spicy scents and the kind of fragrance where you can't help but smell yourself.

name: ambre
detail: Amber has exerted its spellbinding effect for millennia and evokes the stories and rituals of "the thousand and one nights". Amber captures sensuality and timeless secrets.

name: linnommable
detail: "What you hold back  speaks for you. My benzoin is Thai  but at the heart of the fragrance is the use of cumin/caraway". A fragrance inspired by the film "Metropolis".

name: after-midnight
detail: I am sorcery and enchantment. Once night has fallen  and the twelfth stroke of midnight has sounded  no one can turn away from my captivating and sensual wake. I am After Midnight.

name: makassar
detail: Rare sandalwood is used as the pivot of this perfume tailored for a modern dandy. A chord of rose and ambergris sublime its nobility. Precious woods and balsamic notes reaffirm its sensuous warmth

name: vanilla-nomad-1
detail: This fragrance was inspired by founder Amy's travels in the North African desert  where vanilla incense was burned as a nightly ritual  evoking feelings of calm and gratitude.

name: vanille-ambre
detail: The 90% natural Vanilla & Amber eau de parfum will make you discover the warm and refined lands of Madagascar. Its irresistible and ambery notes of Bitter Orange  Tonka and Red Sugar blended with the sweetness of Vanilla and Musks will bring you sweetness and indulgence.

name: voyage-madagascan-vanilla-flower
detail: Escape to Madagascar with vanilla flower. Inspired by a sunny day on the tropical island of Madagascar  this warm and sensual eau de toilette from our Voyage fragrance collection features a blend of floral and oriental accords.

name: fleur-de-vanille-de-madagascar
detail: This eau de toilette Vanilla Blossom transports you to the island of Madagascar offering you a sweet fragrance and delicious thoughts throughout the day.

name: 7-patchouli-oud-vanilla-1
detail: A unique scent with a precious  animalic trail.

name: vanille-santal
detail: 90% natural Vanilla & Sandalwood is a true passport to India. Discover a mysterious Orient where Vanilla is sublimated with the sparkling notes of Tea  Bergamot  blended with sweet accords of Musk and Sandalwood.

name: bosca-vanilla-forte
detail: On the warm sand of a Corsican beach fringed by a eucalyptus forest  dozens of pieces of driftwood are washed up by the waves. Shaped by the elements  infused with sunshine and sea water  they inspired the Guerlain Perfumers to craft a woody vanilla fragrance with an intensely addictive sillage.

name: vanilla-cake-1
detail: A gourmet and bewitching fragrance. A real vanilla cake just out of the oven with a deliciously sweet signature.

name: vanille-ylang
detail: Vanille & YlangEl eau de parfum 90% de origen natural de Polynésie exalta la pasión de viajar. Its addictive and intense Vanilla embraces the notes of Ylang Ylang and Radiant Jasmine to immerse you in the paradisiacal islands of Polynésie.

name: acqua-di-parma-colonia-vaniglia-1
detail: Acqua di Colonia's Vaniglia is inspired by the fascinating and colourful islands of Madagascar  highlighting sweet vanilla notes.

name: acqua-di-parma-vaniglia-1
detail: A sun-filled interpretation of vanilla's intriguing and fascinating notes. The sweet essence of vanilla is extracted from the pods and combined with notes to create an enveloping and warm composition. An artistic combination celebrating Madagascar's precious essence.

name: vaniglia-piccante-1
detail: Vaniglia Piccante is a warm and captivating scent glowing with floral head notes  a woody and sugary heart and seductive lingering base notes.

name: black-vanilla
detail: Black is deep and intense  the Vanilla exalts its power in this divine  addictive and solar fragrance.

name: 214-black-vanilla
detail: 214 Black Vanilla Eau de Parfum is an exceptional combination of Vanilla combined with enchanting notes to promote the refined gourmand encounter of perfumery revealing an intoxicating and unforgettable fragrance.

name: vaniglia-madagascar
detail: A delicious scent with addictive accords.

name: aoud-vanille
detail: Warm  rich  mysterious and striking  this captivating fragrance hovers between ambery and gourmand.

name: expanded-carbon
detail: A gentle  delectable woody abstract revealing a halo of soft light.

name: lilas-exquis-1
detail: A joyful opening opens this fragrance  while the deep  bold heart reveals a modern  aquatic floral note. In the trail  the notes play with different facets  to create a unique and delicious scent.

name: vaninger-1
detail: The meaning of Vaninger is sweetness that turns spicy  rounding off the composition into an addictively soothing fragrance.

name: monoscent-e
detail: These fundamental aromatic molecules are contemporary classics. Just as the iconic white T-shirt serves as the foundation for a style of its own  Monoscent® can be customised  worn alone or layered.

name: sel-dargent
detail: Late afternoon on the rocks of Corsica  the isle of beauty. The silver sea glimmers under the fading light. Our last swim was barely an hour ago and I can still taste the salt on my skin. The moon  discreet  is rising in the sky as the red sun sets. On the way home  the scent of the fig trees perfumes the early evening and the fresh  clear sea air already signals the wistfulness of the end of summer.

name: ormonde-jayne-prive-1
detail: Every breath of this fascinating perfume gathers pilgrims onto its long  beautiful journey. Privé Eau de Parfum integrates itself into the wearer  opening the senses and creating a nostalgic experience. A complex formulation of the many favoured and private perfume oils of Ormonde Jayne – our DNA personified.
ingredients: ['Gardenia', 'Tonka Bean', 'Musk', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Magnolia', 'Freesia', 'Osmanthus', 'Clary Sage', 'Vanilla', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Bergamot', 'Coriander', 'Mandarin', 'Neroli', 'Petitgrain', 'Pink Pepper', 'Rice', 'Sandalwood', 'Timbersilk (Cedarwood note)']

name: moscow-mule-3
detail: A fragrance inspired by the famous cocktail  "Moscow Mule"  an unforgettable  tantalizing  and seductive composition totally dedicated to the city of Moscow.

name: notorious-oud
detail: Notorious Oud fragrance takes inspiration from Notorious B.I.G.  one of Brooklyn  New York's treasures. An unlikely muse  this Eau de Parfum uses a worldwide perspective.

name: golden-oud-2
detail: One summer evening at the end of August  Alberto Morillas is strolling along the shores of Lake Geneva. Two figures pass him. A scent fills the air. This perfumer immediately recognises the oud in the perfume impregnating the air. This essential oil  which is sourced from remote corners of Asia  along the Bangladesh-India border  is the soul of Golden Oud.

name: midnight-oud-2
detail: "Midnight  the depth of the night  when the unexpected happens. Suddenly  a face appears. Someone tries to escape from the palace. The unknown shadow pulls out a shining object... Is it a weapon? No  it's a bottle... Oud  clouds of intoxicating smoke captivate the senses  blending majesty and charm to the mysterious character".

name: calamity-j-1
detail: Inspired by the character of Calamity Jane. Calamity Juliette doesn't shoot at everything that moves  but both have in common a particular taste for breaking the established rules. Defiant and wary  Calamity Juliette can certainly not be told how to behave. Impulsive  she's definitely not the typical romantic type  and although she speaks out  her sassiness also hides a certain fragility.

name: bois-iridescent
detail: Bois Iridescent. What a strange name! Iridescent as in irised rainbow? This is where the magic stands  a mystery which tells in two words a perfumer's enthrallment for wood. Bois iridescent is a very singular perfume  enhancing wood to take us far far away…

name: les-frivolitees
detail: The first sensations of this unique scent are sparkling and cheerful with a fruity and spicy opening. The heart is very feminine containing a blooming bouquet of flowers. On the drydown  the intense heart is combined with a velvety trail wrapping the entire fragrance in a veil of sensuality.

name: paradis-perdu-1
detail: Paradis Perdu is an ode to the vineyards surrounding the property. The perfumer drew creation from the expanses of land  conjuring effervescence with curved lines  between budding and enveloping.

name: ir1s-x-tr0p1c4l-1
detail: Orris flowers growing in a tropical fruit garden. The roots of these flowers have been infected by a plague of tropical fruits after falling in love with the colour and shape of its petals. This is not your typical iris perfume.

name: elixir-de-musc-1
detail: This is the perfume for skin that sleeps in the sun. Just as you are about to close your eyes  a gentle warmth soothes the mind and body before giving way to sleep. Elixir de Musc is aptly named. This perfume should be worn like a second skin  radiant and warm.

name: frescor-acai
detail: A tropical and revitalising scent! The energy of the forest and the freshness of the palm trees are represented by Açaí notes  combined with fresh green and floral touch.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Açai Berry', 'Musk', 'Peony', 'Rose', 'Violet', 'Apple', 'Apricot', 'Guava', 'Lychee', 'Pear', 'Pineapple', 'Raspberry', 'Almond', 'Cetalox (Ambergris)', 'Lemon Zest', 'Sandalwood', 'Tonka Bean']

name: lipstick-fever-2
detail: A creation inspired by a trace of lipstick. Embracing in its texture  and its historic notes. Lipstick Fever stands out as the ultimate jewel. A signature scent and an irrecoverable hymn to femininity.

name: escentric-02
detail: Escentric 02 is a clean  clear scent that dries down to something warm and sexy. The perfumer lets the ingredients play off each other using molecules in a high concentration and adds other ingredients to form an alluringly minimalist composition.
ingredients: ['Vetiver', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Bergamot', 'Cream Soda', 'Freesia', 'Ginger', 'Iris / Orris', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lime', 'Mandarin', 'Pink Pepper', 'Clary Sage', 'Tonka Bean', 'Muscone (Musk)']

name: opus-vii-1
detail: Green woods and leather evoke the juxtaposition of harmony with an intensity of recklessness.

name: afrika-olifant-1
detail: Afrika-Olifant an animal scent that will stimulate hidden desires. Shy and bold at the same time.

name: i-dont-know-what
detail: A fragrance enhancer with a transparent radiance that gives any perfume a certain  as the French say  " I don't know what."

name: escentric-04-1
detail: The perfumer took inspiration from the citrus accents  resulting in a uniquely fresh interpretation. The ingredients play off each other using molecules in a high concentration and adds other ingredients to form an alluringly minimalist composition.
ingredients: ['Grapefruit', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Bergamot', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Methyl Pamplemousse (Grapefruit note)', 'Javanol (Sandalwood)', 'Cannabis Accord', 'Juniper Berries', 'Pink Pepper', 'Freesia', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lentisk', 'Osmanthus', 'Rose', 'Muscone (Musk)']

name: musc-nomade-1
detail: In the Orient of 1 001 Nights  princesses perfumed their bodies and hair with a divine mixture of musk and refined essences. Like a trip through time  Musc Nomade invites us to join the caravans that carried the precious ingredients used in this perfumed ritual.

name: aigner-pour-homme-1
detail: Composition with character for the modern man  Aigner pour Homme was created to connect a timeless elegance with the spirit of the new Millenium.

name: musk-vulcain-1
detail: The opening freshness of Musk Vulcain entices the vibrancy and effervescence of this scent  while the heart conveys reassuring masculinity  highlighting a refined signature with virility and elegance.

name: rose-atlantic-1
detail: Spritzers aboard the famous Salt Spray Rose. Sinatra's summer wind  dune grass in the distance  rosehip  the white lighthouse.
ingredients: ['Rose', 'Moss', 'Sea Breeze', 'Floral Notes', 'Linden Blossom', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Sea Water', 'Muscone (Musk)']

name: vanille-44
detail: We all know that Paris is the city of love  but Paris is also the city of Vanille 44! We also know that our Vanille 44 doesn't just smell like vanilla. It's vanilla in disguise. Some will say it's scandalous to launch this fragrance only in Paris. Others will say it's already too much and will try to ban it in the name of normality  where vanilla smells like vanilla.

name: coeur-de-cologne
detail: "Coeur de Cologne has a special place in the collection. I created it to offer an extreme freshness and density that can be worn alone or with another perfume. Imagine the colour white on a painter's palette: alone  it expresses itself beautifully under the artist's brush  in a duo  it shades another colour  revealing new chromatic ranges. Coeur de Cologne is a little like the white in the palette of perfumes that I propose to everyone". - Alberto Morillas  Perfumer

name: luxury
detail: Perfume of the powder  scents of make-up and creams. A woman gets ready while a man observes her. This man  it is Alberto Morillas  perfumer  of this moment  he creates Luxury  a pure concentrated of femininity.

name: onde-7
detail: Onde 7 is a fragrance of hope  a new era of generosity and peace  inspired by Egypt and in particular by the Kyphi  which is the first origin of the perfume. Onde 7 is a true plea for serenity  a hypnotic and magnetic scent.

name: cuirissime-1
detail: "I imagined a soft leather-like satin skin and I combined it with violet leaves to give this leather note a fresh  slightly herbaceous facet that supports the floral notes of the Iris. It's a unique combination  at once refined and sensual. As a perfumer  I am wholly at the service of my ingredients  which are sculpted  mastered  sublimated  brought to light in a simple and direct manner ” Fabrice Pellegrin  Perfumer.

name: coffeeze-1
detail: “I transform the textures  the ingredients split  then recombine  stretched to the limit of the bearable. They become mobile  as if on a tightrope infinite vertigo. Oud and Café  an infernal couple  like in the Serge Gainsbourg song  “Je t'Aime  moi non plus.” I love you  neither do I ” Aurélien Guichard  Perfumer.

name: extreme-sky
detail: For the daredevil who has it all and knows no limits. Introducing Michael Kors Extreme Sky  the gravity-defying new men’s scent that captures the heart-pounding sensation of conquering the sky and soaring high above it all.

name: prerogative-rave
detail: Release your inhibitions. Get your dose of adrenaline. With Prerogative Rave  you'll live like there's no tomorrow!

name: tudor-7
detail: Run your hand across a vast  richly-textured Merchant print tapestry hanging off the hallowed beams of Liberty’s flagship store and awaken Tudor. This ornamental and bohemian woody scent is released with vivid bursts of grated ginger  nutmeg and crushed juniper berries that vibrate with intense freshness  while deep woodland notes and resins unfurl.

name: extreme-journey
detail: Michael Kors Extreme Journey captures the thrill of adventure. Evoking the harsh intensity of racing across the sands of the Sahara  it is a powerful blend where peppery aromas  warm desert woods and worn leather notes run wild. For the pioneer who blazes his own trail.

name: mediterranean-neroli-1
detail: The sparkling citrus note of Mediterranean and the herbal freshness brighten an elegant and intoxicating heart. Smoky notes add a dramatic contrast  power  and sensuality to a sophisticated composition of light and dark. Layer this citrus amber fragrance with a linen tee-shirt  luxe leather jacket  and dark denim jeans for an exhilarating Vespa ride down the Amalfi Coast at sunset.

name: portrayal-man
detail: An olfactive portrayal of the 1920's bohemian culture  exuding an air of exquisite audacity.

name: eclat-amour-1
detail: The eau de toilette for women that sweeps you away to an enchanting world of romance. Soft whispers of love captured by delicate notes. Scents that are as enticing as they are alluring. This is romance as you always dreamed it  as your love holds you close.

name: interlude-black-iris-man
detail: Interlude Black Iris Man was approached as an overpainting of the original fragrance creation. Interlude Man  the underpainting  gives a context in which the paint-strokes of orris and other ingredients become more resonant and powerful. The creative intention was to reveal different facets of Interlude Man.

name: sky-blossom-2018-1
detail: Sunny rays. Blue skies. Spring blooms. Living the dream. Michael Kors Sky Blossom is a fragrance inspired by the laid-back glamour of a sunny Spring day.

name: everlasting-dream-1
detail: Everlasting flower oil is said to have uplifting properties. Many believe it helps heal emotional scarring and enhances the energy. It heals the heart and connects the body and mind. Nature's secret of connecting with oneself unveiled.

name: opus-xi-1
detail: Opus XI is a dynamic composition and a celebration of integrity  creativity and virtuosity.

name: imitation-woman-1
detail: "Imitation is a personal account of how one moment and one experience can alter a child's perception of the world. I am a child seeing snow for the first time in 1970  in New York. I am looking at this experience through a snow dome  exploring a city that is full of tension and displacement. As I walk through Lower East Side with its intense colours and smells and amalgamation of Latin and American cultures  I see an artistic community living on the fringe of society in an iconic era " Christopher Chong  Olfactive Director.

name: italian-bergamot
detail: "I wanted to capture the essence of the eau de cologne with a 21st century vision. Using bergamot  the most notable noble Italian citrus note  with sleek woods  this fragrance is intended for the refined urban man " Pierre Negrin  Perfumer.

name: lumiere-diris
detail: A scent that hesitates between flower and wood  between the masculine and the feminine  to find its perfect balance marrying both  in an explosion of light  radiance and mystery. Ultimate chic revisited by the sunshine of the Côte d’Azur.

name: spicebomb-night-vision-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Spicebomb Night Vision Eau de Parfum by Viktor & Rolf is an intense scent that will complement your masculinity.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Green Apple', 'Cedarwood', 'Cardamom', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Black Pepper', 'Red Chili', 'Coriander', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Fir Balsam', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lentisk', 'Patchouli', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Pistachio']

name: florentine-iris
detail: Florentine Iris is a blend of three iris varieties to reveal earthiness and warmth. Uplifting and crisp note in the top weave through the heart of this masterwork  adding a sophisticated freshness  following through with sensual musky notes that enhance the modern style of Florentine Iris by creating an intoxicating composition.

name: super-amber
detail: Ever imagined perfume as a texture? Meet Super Amber  a cozy  super warm  addictive scent that envelops like a cashmere blanket on warm bare skin.

name: ck-one-platinum-edition-2018
detail: ck One Platinum Edition is a young  optimistic and confident scent – it captures and celebrates a break from convention and the status quo. Free of gender norms and rules; it can be worn by all.

name: pure-grace-tropical-summer-2021-1
detail: Revel in a summer state of mind with Pure Grace Tropical Summer. Luscious  sparkling and carefree  this fragrance is made for sunny moments!

name: interlude-53-1
detail: There is that moment when a new light is shed on Interlude. One may think one knows Interlude and yet  that day  one truly discovers it. Interlude 53 is a wonderful discovery and a deeper story of the iconic Interlude fragrance.

name: iluminas-prismatic-1
detail: Spontaneous  positive  and enthusiastic about everything she does. Always enjoy the journey and value the journey beyond the result. It is your perfume  you are a strong and energetic woman  who feels free and comfortable in her own skin.

name: salt-1
detail: Salty skin  the creamy heat of the sun and a whiff of tropical florals  Salt is sensual  complex and soul-healing.

name: guess-forever-man
detail: The notes of this scent work harmoniously to create a distinct alluring manly character.

name: spicebomb-night-vision-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Spicebomb Night vision is a complex  daring and an addictive scent. Hyper sensual  this fragrance of seduction takes on the voyeur concept into the digital realm. Being watched is being tracked. Detection guaranteed.
ingredients: ['Geranium', 'Clary Sage', 'Green Apple', 'Cardamom', 'Clove', 'Grapefruit', 'Nutmeg', 'Black Pepper', 'Chilipepper', 'Mandarin (green)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Notes', 'Almond Roasted']

name: encens-superfluide
detail: A mystical and addictive incense instantly projects us into a sacred temple. This perfume is recommended for strong personalities or to those who want to stand out.

name: incense-mist-1
detail: Incense Mist is a mysterious fragrance with exotic and spicy nuances. It is part of the Museum Collection  which uses classic raw materials and olfactory families from Europe and Asia  reminiscent of the fragrance library of an ancient perfumer.

name: series-3-incense-kyoto-1
detail: Kyoto is Buddhism and Shintoism  a fragrance for meditation  named after the city of Kyoto  considered the heart of Japan. Calm and wise  it takes us through the city's temples evoking thought and reconciliation.

name: myrrhe-encens-mysterieux
detail: Myrrhe & Encens Mystérieux is an oriental fragrance that combines spicy notes with the most perfumed aromas. The base is musky and mysterious  where a green note punctuates.

name: encens-asakusa-1
detail: Tokyo's sacred temple. A winter prayer answered by the serene notes of a Koto. A mystical incense. Bewitching  powdery and woody.

name: series-3-incense-ouarzazate-1
detail: Ouarzazate (pronounced 'war-za-zat')  meaning the 'Desert Fire'  is devoted to Islam and named after a small historical town of Ouarzazate in Morroco.

name: incense-vetiver
detail: Discover new dimensions with Incense Vetiver where the mysterious notes of wood and spices intertwine.

name: series-3-incense-jaisalmer-1
detail: Jaisalmer is Hindu and is named after the ancient city of Jaisalmer  located in the desert in northwest India  in Rajasthan. Jaisalmer means "Golden City"  where traders transported ebony to Egypt  a note found in this perfume.

name: incense-di-toscano-1
detail: Incenso di Toscano is a powerful and spicy fragrance with an unusual mix of tobacco and white flowers that fade into hints of sensual woods.

name: encens-suave
detail: A black  addictive and carnal incense.

name: series-3-incense-zagorsk-1
detail: Zagorsk represents Eastern Orthodoxy. It is named after the Russian city that was  until today  one of the most influential Orthodox-Christian places in Russia.

name: incense-city-1
detail: Incense City is mystical  spiritual and restorative. The city is tangible  provocative  wild and full of energy. The fusion of these two states evokes a strong sense of duality.

name: frankincense-1
detail: Demeter's Frankincense is a full  rich  woody  spicy expression of a classic fragrance note. So classic  that the Bible mentions it as one of the three types of gifts the wise men gave to the baby Jesus.

name: angelique-encens-2019
detail: Sensual and theatrical and oriental  Angelique Encens boasts an exquisite aroma that is both rich and delicate in nature. It exudes sheer indulgence and irresistible allure.

name: series-3-incense-avignon-1
