detail: 7 Loewe Cobalt is a sophisticated and intense fragrance inspired by the far reaches of outer space. A sense of timeless mystery.

name: loewe-001-special-edition-man-2019
detail: Loewe 001 is a distinctive and elegant special edition fragrance for the refined Loewe man.

name: solo-loewe-ella-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Solo Loewe Ella is a fragrance that gets back to the purity of the original concept. Unique  full of contrasts  for the free and confident woman. Solo Loewe Ella is a unique  innovative  and mysterious composition.

name: solo-loewe-origami-classic-1
detail: Inspired by the folds  the geometric shapes and the interplay of volumes of the age-old Japanese art of Origami  we introduce the Loewe Solo Origami fragrance.

name: aire-loewe-fantasia
detail: The most sparkling interpretation within the Aire Loewe family. An eau de toilette with character and body  lightness and transparency.

name: loewe-aire-anthesis
detail: Loewe Aire Anthesis is inspired by the fresh and pure air all around us: elemental  uplifting and life-giving. It features the unique Loewe accord  a raw and authentic  ambery scent based on the rockrose  a delicate yet hardy wildflower native to Spain.

name: aire-loewe-fantasia-classic
detail: The most sparkling interpretation of the Aire Loewe family. An eau de toilette with character and body  lightness and transparency.

name: loewe-solo-atlas
detail: An olfactory journey inspired by the contrasts of the Atlas mountains  spanning desert and sea.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Pink Pepper', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Mandarin', 'Neroli', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Marine', 'Lentisk', 'Musk', 'Peony', 'Petitgrain', 'Everlasting Flower']

name: loewe-001-special-edition-woman-2019
detail: Loewe 001 is a distinctive and pure special edition perfume for the elegant Loewe woman.

name: templo-de-debod-1
detail: Mysterious and exotic  Templo de Debod is a fragrance inspired by the Ancient Egyptian relics preserved in the Cuartel de la Montaña Park in Madrid.

name: solo-loewe-mercurio-classic
detail: Discover Loewe Solo Mercurio  a deep and mysterious fragrance in which the contrast between its chords stands out more than ever. A design based on perfectly balanced opposing chords that make the scent consistent and long-lasting.

name: loewe-paulas-ibiza-eclectic-1
detail: The joy of freedom and partying is captured in a fragrance. Open-hearted and hedonistic.

name: esencia-loewe-elixir
detail: Singular and robust  Esencia Elixir blends woody notes with herbs and smoky leather for a captivating impression.

name: paseando-por-la-calle-mayor
detail: Loewe's Paseando por la Calle Mayor Eau de Parfum is a tribute to all the shops that are located in this area of Madrid and that are part of the living history of its community. The mixture of tradition and modernity has allowed them to adapt to the passage of time as this case represents  hand made by Spanish leather craftsmen.

name: agua-de-loewe-442
detail: Loewe Water 44.2 represents everything natural  transparent  and pure  taking the first step towards clean waters of the world  an objective to support the preservation of water  taking care of our oceans and seas.

name: de-la-mano-por-la-rosaleda
detail: De la Mano por la Rosaleda is an explosion for the senses  unfolded in all its magnitude through scents of soft rose and warm musk. Presented in a beautiful golden bottle designed by Spanish jewellery designer Rocío Porres  it is a real treasure to behold.

name: solo-loewe-ella-eau-de-parfum-classic
detail: Solo Loewe Ella is a fragrance that returns to the purity of the original concept. Unique  full of contrasts  for the free and self-confident woman. Solo Loewe Ella is a unique  innovative and mysterious composition.

name: loewe-solo-ella-eau-de-toilette
detail: "Loewe Solo Ella Eau de Toilette is an extraordinary scent with a sublime tail and an unexpected tropical accord. The architecture of opposite accords in equilibrium makes the fragrance bold and yet delicate  sparkling and yet soft. It is the state of balance in a bottle " Nuria Cruelles  Lowe's in-house Perfumer.

name: esencia-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A unique fragrance with a spicy  wild scent with a note of lavender.

name: aura-loewe-white-magnolia
detail: An contemporary and elegant fragrance with the magnolia flower at the center of its composition. A fragrance of enveloping notes

name: solo-loewe-mercurio-1
detail: Discover Loewe Solo Mercurio  a deep and mysterious fragrance in which the contrast between its chords stands out more than ever. A design based on perfectly balanced opposing chords that make the scent consistent and long-lasting.

name: loewe-earth
detail: Earth is inspired by the elements that connect nature  propelling life above and below the ground  from the atmospheric to the tangible  the visible to the invisible  unifying inner and outer worlds.

name: agua-de-loewe-miami-classic
detail: An interpretation of the spirit of Miami  its Art Deco neighbourhood full of light and colour  its elemental geometry and ornamental abundance.

name: de-marcha-por-malasana
detail: A Walk through Madrid is the story of a city that shows a journey through the Past  Present and Future of the House. Emotional and vibrant aromas uniquely reveal every corner and every step of this city.

name: esencia-loewe-eau-de-parfum-classic
detail: A unique fragrance with a spicy  wild scent with a note of lavender.

name: fabulous-magnolia
detail: Fabulous Magnolia is a fabulous clash of the senses impersonated by the luminous and fabulous Magnolia whose scent instills Eric’s childhood memories.

name: acqua-nobile-magnolia
detail: Acqua Nobile Magnolia is a brilliant fragrance that reveals the majestic purity of magnolia blossoms at dawn.

name: magnolia-cherie-1
detail: Totally addictive and comforting  Magnolia Chérie is a cry of tenderness  an invitation to unconditional affection. Wrap yourself in this soft and colourful floral creation.

name: white-rose-magnolia
detail: Pick a fresh and refreshing magnolia  matching the softness and innocence of the white rose  an otherworldly breath is at an unreachable distance. Between the sea of flowers and the moon  you are another kind of beauty.

name: magnolia-2
detail: We were inspired by the magnolia  an extrovert flower with a very feminine aura  to compose a voluptuous and glamorous floral bouquet.

name: flora-gorgeous-magnolia-2023
detail: Flora Gorgeous Magnolia brings out inner strength  highlighting the radiant and powerful magnolia.

name: n-6-magnolia-sensual
detail: A refreshing scent that reflect the essence of the living with nature.

name: magnolia-pivoine-de-soie
detail: Magnolia & Pivoine de Soie is an explosion of luminosity  designed like an infusion of freshness  a bouquet of delicate and subtle peony and magnolia scents enveloped by the captivating sensuality of vanilla.

name: jade-magnolia
detail: Qing Luo's little white orchid fan  with a slender waist and a jade belt dancing in the sky. Suspecting a fairy descending to earth  she looked back and smiled at Sheng Xinghua. Tingtingting Bailan  souvenir of Shanghai. Pure colour flows dark fragrance floats.

name: 4711-magnolia-eau-de-cologne-1
detail: The enchanting magnolia flower has a fascinating and beguiling scent and this captivating fragrance lends its wearer an aura of elegance and serves as a stylish companion.

name: magnolia-charm
detail: The graceful blossoms burst forth  signalling the first sign of spring. The creamy white petals mingled with the sweetly scented sunshine are nature's promise of the season to come.

name: alien-goddess
detail: Leading uncharted paths  Mugler set a particularly bold challenge for Alien Goddess: a total reinvention of floral expression  translated into a powerful olfactory signature to modernise and intensify the traditional floral fragrance. It is an extraordinary homage to the vital role of flowers  whose sacred mission is to bring fruit to the earth.

name: turbulences
detail: An extreme tuberose to stir the heart. Discovering faraway lands can sometimes feel like soaring among the clouds. Inspired by a feeling akin to love at first sight  the perfume pays tribute to the most narcotic of flowers  the Tuberose.

name: molinard-de-molinard-m-de-molinard-1
detail: A marvellous floral symphony  Molinard de Molinard is the epitome of romanticism. A sumptuous bouquet of femininity of great elegance.  A great classic of perfumery  a story of universal loyalty  Grasse in majesty!

name: whispers-of-strength-1
detail: Whispers of Strength is the hope and strength of empowerment. Its energy  gathered from the surrounding anxieties  provides the strength to weather any storm; for where it blossoms  so does hope.

name: desinvolte-1
detail: Désinvolte is a generous bouquet of white flowers with a strong temperament  where naturalness and refinement complement each other.  An invitation to experience The Great Givenchy Style.

name: jasmin-grandiflorum-extrait-30
detail: Jasmin Grandiflorum Extract 30 reveals jasmine in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain. Pushed to its peak  the florality of jasmine dazzles with light and intoxicates with delight  in its ultimate concentration.

name: my-way-intense
detail: My Way Intense is an invitation to live life intensely. The fragrance acts as a talisman whose intensity makes every experience and encounter even more resonant.

name: gelsomino-2
detail: The white flowers of the noblest and most fragrant jasmine variety  caught in the early morning slightly half-closed. For centuries the Gelsomino Grandiflorum is grown in Sicily for its great fragrance.

name: mock-orange
detail: The fragrance is inspired by the intense Swedish summer filled with childhood memories. While we drink homemade juice and eat cookies  bridges are built between the elderly and the children through conversations about life and curiosity towards each other.

name: dirty-jasmine
detail: Fresh  voluptuous and hypnotic  Dirty Jasmine dances on the skin and envelops the senses in the seductive spell of jasmine. It is a lush floral seductress and its soothing tea antidote in a narcotic perfume.

name: my-way-nectar
detail: An addictive fruity floral statement  born from the contrast between fresh juicy pear and creamy radiant tuberose. An invitation to a sensorial journey  capturing a free-spirited vision of femininity.

name: lysandra
detail: Jean-Claude Ellena has created this elegant powdery floral fragrance to evoke the evanescent grace and delicate fluttering of a butterfly around a sunlit glade  awash with Jasminum Grandiflorum and sweet mandarin. This unique composition has been crafted in the traditions of French haute perfumery  using only the most precious primary ingredients.

name: jasmin-deau-2
detail: The iconic flower of Haute Parfumerie  jasmine inspires a composition of extreme refinement  whose play of transparency evokes an impressionist watercolour. True to the spirit of blending cherished by the Maison Lancôme  this fragrance outlines in small touches a totally unique flower.

name: festival-nite-for-him
detail: Festival Nite is an electric scent to wear when the sun goes down  and the energy goes up.

name: magnetic-guaiac-1
detail: A hypnotic composition that mesmerises with an alluring heart and a mysterious base that evokes a powerful wild instinct.

name: angels-share-15-years-2022
detail: Kilian celebrates its 15th anniversary with a limited edition collection for the holiday season  with a special design inspired by the Eiffel Tower  a tribute to Kilian's French heritage. Angels' Share is a unique concoction that only angels should experience.

name: fatale-orchid
detail: A fragrance of potent sex appeal  a fatally sweet and seductive composition.

name: roberto-cavalli-uomo-parfum
detail: A fierce  opulent scent with intoxicating accords.

name: wild-incense
detail: This scent undertakes a mystical journey with its stimulating aromas. A reflection of the brand's dedication to creating luxurious  elegant and sophisticated scents for all.

name: sensual-geranium
detail: Tailored to perfection  sensual geranium encapsulates the impact of a double-breasted suit. Heads will turn with the geranium freshness shaped by the deep sensuality of benzoin in this intense eau de parfum.

name: debonair-gentlewoods
detail: Discover this charming masculine fragrance for the modern gentleman  in which the traditional woody notes of Nordic silver birch unexpectedly meet with a bold note of thorn rose that intrigues  attracts attention and wins hearts!

name: look-kool-2023
detail: Look Kool is the perfect perfume for girls full of vitality and energy  and a bit rebellious. Fun  daring and always in fashion  but above all everything  sooo cool. Elevate your look instantly and show everyone around you that there is nothing that attracts attention more like someone who radiates happiness and positive energy.

name: juliana-paes-rouge-1
detail: A luminous fragrance wrapped in the softness of sensual floral notes.

name: cool-water-woman-mediterranean-summer-edition-2019
detail: The coolest waves are dressed up with summer colors. Let the summer radiance invade you with this lush and luminous summer scent!

name: multiplicity
detail: Moving away from the customary focus on the front stage  the black-and-white visuals created a stark contrast between the quiet runway and bustling backstage. This bold contrast is conveyed in the fragrance of Multiplicity. A backstage full of tension  excitement  and passionate energy.

name: paula-rouge
detail: Paula Rouge is a scent that concentrates all the strength of the contemporary woman. A delicious fragrance that helps express your personality and character.

name: 2040-nectar-tonka
detail: Imagine 2040  captivating and spicy. A dense  textured sensation that will appeal to lovers of enveloping colognes.

name: love-potion-sensual-ruby
detail: Embark on a journey of discovery into the world of the senses on the waves of Love Potion Sensual Ruby and its intoxicating accords.

name: courreges-homme-wild-ocean
detail: As free and wild as the ocean. Breaking wave and natural energy. Extreme depth  endless movement.

name: velour-saffron-1
detail: This scent bears a wild and beautiful aroma that effortlessly blends some of the most rare and precious spices in the world to create a warm and leathery finish.

name: smyrna
detail: "Smyrna evokes a night at the gates of the Orient and the voluptuousness of a spicy rose"  Jean-Claude Ellena  Olfactory Director.

name: soleil-lalique-1
detail: Every day  she wakes up and feels the sunshine. Feeling right. Burning bright. Free to be herself  without limits. Creative and connected  she lives each moment intensely by reinventing the rules. Joyful and radiant  she shines on the world and the world shines with her. Soleil Lalique. The smell of the sun.

name: cite-onirique
detail: Cité Onirique opens the doors a phantasmagorical universe. A total immersion in a vaporous city  with multiple lights  the flourishing and shimmering vegetation  a new world.

name: castelbajac-homme-cool-1
detail: The perfect fragrance for summer  when you're on holiday by the sea.

name: possess-absolute-1
detail: A powerful fragrance with irresistible juicy notes  luminous florals and an intensely woody depth  to embody the goddess within.

name: angels-share-1
detail: Angels' Share is a joint creation of founder Kilian Hennessy and American rapper French Montana. Music is the engine of all good nightlife  like perfume. Invisible vibrations that liven up a party. And so does an incredible cognac-inspired fragrance. Angels' Share x French Montana is the expression of this affinity between hip-hop culture and cognac.

name: re-verse-for-woman-1
detail: A poetic nature where delicate petals meet cheerful fruity notes. The Re-Verse woman loves collecting iconic objects to express her own personality.

name: violette-menthe-1
detail: Violette-Menthe was designed as an intimate evocation of deep and lingering memories. It reflects the colours of forests and gardens  where trees mingle with flowers  moss  light  shadows  birds and ladybirds. This original and very soft fragrance is characterised by a fresh beginning with a powdery floral note. It is a romantic and modern fragrance that produces the most surprising result.

name: fizzy-mint-1
detail: An explosion of scintillating freshness  tangy and light  this fragrance reveals the natural elegance and authentic joie de vivre of the person who wears it.

name: oud-menthe-1
detail: Oud & Menthe is emotive notes for the senses. A creation that celebrates the allure and rarity of the woody ingredient  the Oud & Menthe Eau de Parfum is invigorated with mint  combining and contrasting two emblematic scents from the Middle East.

name: choc-mint
detail: Choc Mint smells like someone who wants to have fun and enjoy all the possibilities as if there were no tomorrow. Those who try it want more.

name: lychee-white-mint-1
detail: Lychee & White Mint is an exhilarating fragrance that transports you to tropical worlds and puts you in a good mood with its exotic freshness. The translucent fruity notes of lychee meets an unusual soft minty accord  leading to an invigorating creation that gives a whole new impetus - and makes a good day an even better one!

name: eau-de-minthe-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Inspired by a Greek myth  Eau de Minthé reinvents an emblematic perfumery accord  fougère  drawing on the scent of mint. A fresh yet deeply profound fragrance.

name: white-jasmine-mint
detail: This enchanting essence  inspired by a sun-drenched morning in an English country garden  perfectly captures the scent of jasmine  lily  orange flower  and rose on the morning breeze. An unexpected twist of soft and sensual wild mint stimulates the senses and teases the palette in this elegant and eccentric fragrance.

name: mint-tonic-1
detail: This clean  fresh and casual fragrance  reminiscent of fragrant English gardens  is perfect for everyday wear for men and women  but comes into its own on hot summer days  when a gentle spritz will instantly transport you to the pleasurable pleasure of a wicker chair in the shade of a willow tree.

name: aoud-lemon-mint
detail: Be prepared to be swept off your feet by the Cuban inspiration of this fresh and sweet cocktail.

name: active-man-blanc
detail: This fragrance envelops you in an aura of nobility as you embrace your role as the protector  shining light through the darkness  and enshrining purity of spirit.

name: al-wisam-day
detail: An energising and intoxicating fragrance for the confident man.

name: salvia-sclarea
detail: Taking the clary sage plant as its inspiration from its soft green scent right down to its velvety leaves  this fragrance is like lying on lush cool grass on a hot sunny day.

name: wild-country-spirit-1
detail: A robust and intrepid fragrance for the adventurous man.

name: french-barber-1
detail: A timeless  masculine fragrance  French Barber is the embodiment of a dandy in modern times.

name: urban-boys-1
detail: Cheerful and youthful  Urban Boys has a unique style  allowing you to move from the urban universe to nature.

name: michael-jordan-1
detail: This crisp  sporty fragrance represents the elements that have shaped Michael Jordan's life from his yearly boyhood to his dazzling basketball career.
ingredients: ['Clary Sage', 'Oak', 'Green Leaves', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Cardamom', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Ivy', 'Jasmine', 'Mandarin', 'Nutmeg', 'Sandalwood', 'Woody Notes', 'Black Pepper']

name: version-sport
detail: Version Sport joins the Jacques St Prés range  maintaining its sober and elegant design in the style of a classic  masculine whisky flask. A modern and sophisticated fougère  designed to stand out among men with many different facets.

name: virgile-1
detail: I wanted a balance between the aromatic notes bright for the mind  soothing and unpublished  which are contrasted with the roundness of the geranium leaf  and the discreet sensuality of vanilla notes  mixed with cedar.

name: attitude-1
detail: Attitude is a daring and powerful fragrance for men. Created for men with attitude  who don't compromise  aim for perfection  and enjoy life to the fullest.

name: eternity-for-men-eau-de-parfum
detail: The Eternity Man is rugged yet refined  powerful yet tender  sophisticated yet accessible. It reinforces the masculinity and sensuality of Eternity Man.

name: speed-legends
detail: Inspired by the timeless quest for the adrenaline of speed  this unique creation takes up the challenge of a new masculinity.

name: cozumel-1
detail: Gathering reflections of a past journey  Marie has infused the olfactory pyramid with a bit of Mexican sunshine  bursts of aromatic herbs mixed with the intimate scent of masculine skin and the wild scents of a distant island.
ingredients: ['Clary Sage', 'Aromatic Notes', 'Cannabis Accord', 'Tonka Bean', 'Basil (Vietnam)', 'Amber', 'Tobacco Accord', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Sandalwood']

name: shake-the-night-1
detail: When a memorable night comes to an end  where to go? Let the evening's fun continue until dawn  with the sensual masculine fragrance.

name: hello-printemps-2020-1
detail: A fresh and sparkling scent. The right balance between a juicy rhubarb and the tangy note of the blackcurrant leaf  all twisted by the energy of citrus. Spray for an immediate good mood effect!

name: mergulho-de-cachoeira-1
detail: When the rain falls in the mountains  it descends and turns into a waterfall. With force she moves and with courage she casts herself in the falls  creating a powerful symphony that makes the plants dance around her. Inspired by the sensation of plunging into a waterfall with the aromatic freshness of the mint leaves  this citrus fragrance provides a vitality bath.

name: stromboli-1
detail: The scent of the Mediterranean. Aromas of the islands mixed with the warm scent of black sand and blue waters. A fresh and cheerful blend  suitable for everyone.

name: eau-vitaminee-1
detail: Eau Vitaminée is a scent that evokes vitality and light with youthful pleasures.

name: marc-ecko
detail: “I wanted it to be like a stimulant  almost caffeinated. I wanted it to be clean and bright  but something that wasn't so clean and soapy that it wasn't sexy. And it was important to me that it has a semi-unisex vibe ” Marc Ecko.

name: comme-des-garcons-eau-de-cologne-1
detail: A feel-good  energy-giving scent which breathes life and vitality into every day.

name: lime
detail: A sparkling  exuberant  and fun composition that radiates vitality.

name: orange-de-sicile
detail: Sunshine citrus blends notes to bring happiness and joy

name: noblige-1
detail: Noblige is the contraction of noblesse oblige. A cloud of citrus that is illuminated by the combination of powdery notes and precious elements that melt into the floral heart with sophistication. The elegance is precise  whispered and unostentatious. The white  light  infinite. The search for perfection that does not exist. All this is Noblige.

name: lemon-line-1
detail: This fragrance is proof that simplicity is sexy.

name: series-4-cologne-citrico
detail: Citrico Series 4 cologne by Comme des Garçons  named after the Spanish word for citrus  is appropriately spicy and stimulating.

name: ca-dreamz-pour-homme
detail: This fragrance is a rich combination  empowering without being overpowering  subtle yet seemingly tangible.

name: monk-fruit
detail: Sweet  citrusy with a touch of powder. This exotic and warm fragrance is different than anything you have experienced.

name: sport-action-kick-1
detail: Live your best energetic life with Sport Action Kick  a woody-spicy scent for the sport-loving man.

name: pearl-8
detail: Pearl is a truly classic  unisex fragrance that leaves a sensual veil on the skin.

name: nautica-oceans
detail: "Nautica Oceans is a contemporary interpretation of the ocean. It exudes a luminous vitality  underlined with a woody sensuality  to reflect the calming yet energising contrast between the ebb and flow of ocean waves"  Patricia Bilodeau  Perfumer.

name: wild-blue
detail: Dive into the ocean of freshness and conquer the world every day with an aquatic fragrance that draws you into a sense of refreshment and calm.

name: air-di-gioia-1
detail: Air di Gioia exudes an energy some term "ozonic"  like the joy of an unexpected waft of sea spray. The olfactory score is an Italian melody; the wake is buoyant and euphoric  as free and exhilarating as pure  fresh air.

name: salt-cyclamen
detail: A unique scent reminiscent of the salty notes of the sea.

name: salt-air-2
detail: Emerging from the ocean with a fresh frame of mind.

name: club-de-nuit-milestone-1
detail: Light  fresh  but utterly unique. Club de Nuit Milestone will capture your heart with its delicate  sophisticated composition. Absolutely ideal for everyday wear.

name: wild-breeze
detail: Wild Breeze is a bright  sunny and refreshing floral perfume for women that invites you to relax on beautiful tropical islands  laying on the warm sand  soaking up the sun  and the feeling of gentle waves at your feet.

name: dans-le-bleu-qui-petille-1
detail: A dive into the heart of the ocean  sea salt crystallising on the skin in the sunshine. In the sparkling blue  the smell of salt and iodine on skin warmed by the sun.

name: guess-1981-indigo-1
detail: Guess 1981 Indigo  is a bold yet feminine fragrance that embodies the rich heritage of the GUESS brand.

name: sel-marin-1
detail: "The theme of Sel Marin is of course salt  air and water. I wanted to capture the scent of skin after a day on the beach. This is why smelling this scent on paper gives you only half the story. It needs to be smelt out in the fresh air to really make it come alive " James Heeley.

name: bamboo-surf
detail: A refreshing scent inspired by boardwalk greenery and salty air beaches.

name: kairo
detail: Unleash your inner elegance with this captivating scent that defines the modern gentleman.

name: mariner
detail: The ocean is at your fingertips with this breezy  sexy  irresistible scent.

name: salt-caramel-1
detail: Liquid temptation. Burnt sweetness. Intense longing. A gourmand fragrance inspired by "Sea Salt Caramel Truffles" by Charbonnel et Walker.

name: ishq-al-shuyukh-gold
detail: Ishq Al Shuyukh Gold is our exotic fragrance and an impact of the blend of culture in your everyday occasions.

name: breaking-news
detail: Breaking News is an addictive unisex evergreen fragrance  for perfect vibes and a sensual mood.

name: caramel-amber-and-cashmere-eau-de-parfum
detail: A warm scent with enveloping accords.

name: di-que-si-caramel-1
detail: A perfume with all the ingredients to say YES to living with joy!

name: caramel-1
detail: An eau de toilette that blends the tenderness of caramel with the reassuring sweetness of vanilla. Its addictive notes transport you to your fondest childhood memories and leave your skin irresistibly sweet.

name: cuide-se-bem-caramelito-1
detail: Light and refreshing  Caramelito will recreate the delicious sensation of the coolness of a bath at any time of the day. With this sweet fragrance  it perfumes the body to the point of refreshingly enveloping your skin in a delicate mist.

name: hot-caramel-soft-musk
detail: Hot caramel is like a mouth-watering dessert.

name: kissme-nude-caramelo-1
detail: KissMe Nude Caramelo is the fragrance of your favourite lipstick colour!

name: caramel-alps-2023
detail: This is a rich and decadent fragrance that has the unique ability to transport you to a cosy cabin in the Swiss Alps.

name: intense-vanilla-1
detail: Intense Vanilla takes sweetness to the next level. A fragrance that is the protagonist of every desire and every temptation.

name: fougere-furieuse
detail: Daring  breathtaking  addictive  noble... a new dimension in the fragrance universe. A collection of unique creations and original alchemies crafted around the major themes of traditional perfumery. This opus crystallizes the essence of the Mugler brand and reveals a little of the creator's inner life  quite simply letting us into his secret.

name: lamborghini-macchina-1
detail: Lamborghini Macchina highlights the adventurous and challenging side in the game of seduction. Ideal for the man who makes adrenaline his philosophy of life. He lives on the move  at high speed  motivated by his desire to win.

name: vanila-planifolia-1
detail: A flower  a perfumer  a story. When he was studying perfumery  Quentin Bisch learned that vanilla came from a unique orchid. Ever since  his dream was to reinvent the smell of the original flower  which hardly exists in nature. Vanilla Planifolia is his ideal composition: delicate petals with spicy and delicious notes  revealing the mysteries of an enchanting  almost carnal flower. To die for.

name: luna-rossa-black
detail: Prada Luna Rossa Black resembles an elegant tuxedo  worn on the shoulders of a strong man. He seeks sophistication in every situation - no matter how casual the intentions.

name: khaltat-al-arabia-royal-blends-gold
detail: Khaltaat Al Arabia Royal Blends Gold is a fruity-sweet fragrance with a tropical touch.

name: natural-savage
detail: Natural Savage is a distinctive masculine fragrance. A soft shadow in the darkness of the night. His eyes are fixed on the movement of the undergrowth. Las hojas secas crujen suavemente a cada paso y cubren las huellas en el suelo del bosque. A sparkling glow rises through the trees. Its breath is intense  a spicy  musky scent wafts through the night. The first drops of rain fall silently as he spots his target.

name: the-formal-1
detail: A decadent fragrance with an intoxicating masculinity that captures an enchanting air. Evoking the seductive exchanges and epic moments in life where fantasies come true  the fragrance captures the essence of the ultimate dinner jacket man.

name: corbo-nero-2021
detail: Nero pour Homme is a powerful scent with a woody-spicy personality.

name: bouquet-ideale-1
detail: Warm and seductive  Bouquet Ideale is wonderfully composed of powdery accords with mysterious gourmand touches. Magically intoxicating  this orchestration embraces your soul and transports it to a distant Mediterranean island  where the southern winds carry the scents of flowers and spices.

name: santal-30793
detail: Indulge in the sensual and captivating aroma of Santal.

name: ilia-lacos
detail: Ilía Laços is an intense floral fragrance. Feel the combination of white flowers with a woody  ambery complex and the sweet touch of coumarin  an ingredient of Brazilian biodiversity. It is the perfect gift for a strong  hard-working woman.

name: spontaneous-generosity
detail: What is generosity? Talent  way of life  credo  filter to your heart? Generous people do not have the best of everything  they make the best of everything.

name: island-water-men-1
detail: Island Water Man is a tribute to the free spirit Musa-Shiya  called "The Shirtmaker"  the inventor of the Hawaiian shirt. Driven by his restless creativity and strong entrepreneurial spirit  Shiya moved to Honolulu from his home country Japan in the early 1930s.

name: tobacco-mandarin-2017
detail: "When we visited Charleston in the middle of the English countryside  I didn't know what to expect but I fell in love with it. When I was there  I made a storyline in my head from morning to afternoon to evening so the five fragrances have a natural evolution. What I particularly loved about the Bloomsbury Set was the juxtaposition of domesticity and simplicity with this hugely intellectual environment "  Yann Vasnier  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Mandarin', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Hay', 'Beeswax', 'Cedrat', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Clary Sage']

name: my-muse
detail: The fragrance My Muse is the softest  purest  extract of magic found in nature  the fragrance that goes in harmony with nature and magically softens lovers’ hearts  it's the perfume of love and intimacy

name: beyond-mellow-heliotrope
detail: "I adore heliotrope! To me  it is one of the most feminine notes in the perfumer's palette. Though it is extremely feminine  it is elegant  rather than provocative. When I composed it  I imagined a soft  sensual woman who wears a scent that is delicately enveloping  yet very diffusive and unforgettable." Karine Dubreuil-Sereni  Perfumer.

name: diabolique-extrait-1
detail: A hypnotic fragrance created for an extremely sophisticated and charming woman. Its delicate presence enchants  captivates and bewitches.

name: my-name-1
detail: Trussardi My Name  expresses the identity of each woman and her relationship with the world in a delicate balance between belonging to a collective heritage and personal distinction. It is unique and universal.

name: andromeda-1
detail: This perfume is the story of a dream. A flight to exotic places where magical and unknown creatures live in scented forests of enchantment. It is the encounter with fairies and elves  with bright colours and wonderful scents  collected and recorded forever in this precious nectar of fantasy. A timeless fragrance that never fails to speak of love and gratitude.
ingredients: ['Rose Damascena', 'Bergamot', 'Peach', 'Jasmine', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Arum Lily', 'Heliotrope', 'Coconut', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Pear', 'Amber', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Ebony Tree', 'Sugar', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Violet Leaves']

name: n22-sg79sthlm
detail: A fresh and iridescent fragrance blending beautiful flowers with sparkling fruity notes. The scent opens with sweet zesty citrus blended with delicately fragrant white flowers. The heart reveals a dewy floral bouquet that rests on a delicately soft base.

name: heliotropia
detail: A perfume inspired by Liberty London building. "The opening of the fragrance evokes a clear image of the traditional Liberty floral patterns and the mid notes are quirky and meant to represent the personal and curated approach that Liberty has. As for 'tropia'  it is a reference to utopia  in the sense of a very pure and elevated idea." Ben Gorham  founder of Byredo.

name: heliotrope-1
detail: A fine floral fragrance. Refreshed at the top with citrus  throbbing in the heart and warm in the sensual base.

name: empireo-1
detail: Empireo is a fragrance with bright  fresh hints  clean like the air of Paradise that Dante perhaps imagines that he breathes while writing his Divine Comedy. A fragrance with a romantic  pure and transparent soul  with an extraordinarily seductive charm.

name: regina-di-fiori
detail: A sensual and mysterious scent for the adventurous man or woman.

name: lheure-bleue-eau-de-toilette
detail: L’Heure Bleue diffuses its atmosphere at the very moment when the sun disappears beneath the horizon and the sky is painted with night’s velvet.

name: paris-florence
detail: The late afternoon sun bathes the Uffizi. On the Ponte Vecchio bridging the Arno  jewellery stands compete with one another in beauty against a breathtaking panorama in every direction. La dolce vita is splashed over a dress with toile de Jouy print.

name: heliotrope-do-re-1
detail: Notes of affection for this olfactory lullaby  taste it for yourself.

name: heliotrope-gingembre
detail: Héliotrope Gingembre. The longing for spices and the awakening of the senses transport us to the famous Mughal gardens with their countless extraordinary perfumes. A bewitching and tender oriental journey.

name: rouge-smoking-1
detail: At dusk  the sky mists up  letting the red light of the windmill shine through the window. In front of her mirror  she prepares herself and applies her make-up. She heads for her wardrobe  inspired by that dinner jacket that will enhance her figure. It's Parisian glam  she knows it well. Her bohemian style and erotic energy leave indelible marks on the streets. She is Pigalle  beautiful and mysterious.

name: lheure-bleue-extrait
detail: One summer evening  Jacques Guerlain was overcome by an intense agitation. It was the suspended hour when the sky has lost its sun  but has not yet found its stars. Everything in nature is covered with a blue light. L'Heure Bleue de Guerlain: an emotion that only this perfume is worthy of expressing.

name: dia-parfum-1
detail: A hypnotic and enticing fragrance with spicy notes that make it irresistible.

name: heliotrope
detail: With its extraordinary elegance  Heliotrope immerses you in a garden of voluptuous fragrances.

name: n-6-elegancia-natural
detail: Virginia cedar and Indonesian patchouli combine with the spicy notes of coriander and black pepper. An amber base enhances the elegance and masculinity of the fragrance.

name: adventure
detail: Vibrant and captivating  Davidoff Adventure explores uncharted fragrance territory. Its fresh spicy woody composition is daring and elemental  inspired by the world's great wilderness and raw  masculine emotion.

name: choice-rebel
detail: Do you know that modern and daring fragrance that you wanted so much? Choice Rebel arrived with an urban touch. There's nothing like the freedom to be able to use what we like and be what we want  right?

name: marah-1
detail: Full of positive energy that will accompany you all the time  so that all our plans will be carried out easily.  Choosing the perfume you dive into the depths of music.

name: calm
detail: A scent that smells like confidence.

name: araucaria-nascente-1
detail: The freedom of a new day. The sunrise in the Araucaria forest  The morning breeze is still full with the frost of the night  spreads through the fields while the Araucaria awakens. L'Occitane au Brésil was inspired by the liveliness of Araucaria at dawn. A fragrance for men who seek their moment of freedom.

name: passion-2
detail: Lose yourself in this luxurious scent. Passion is a sensory adventure and an addictive night-time fragrance.

name: las-des-as-1
detail: The ace of spades strolls through the corridors of a casino  drawing all eyes to him. He is seen in an extraordinarily charismatic dinner jacket  dressed to kill  sharp as the ace of spades. Leaning against the counter  he orders a Lady Grey bitter and savours its citrus notes  with tangy bergamot on top. Now it's time to play his cards right. Enough of turning heads  now comes the roulette wheel. Your cunning sets the tone: the jackpot is guaranteed  a real lady-killer!

name: gold-8
detail: This is something of a departure  as we indulge in scent fantasy and interpretation. While you will experience a warm  golden metallic tang  this fragrance is grounded in light woods and exotic spices.

name: cologne-nocturne
detail: Cologne Nocturne surprises  bewitches and reassures all at once. A mysterious and addictive Cologne to be worn at night between light and shadow.

name: tazkar
detail: A soft and pleasant scent that provides an exotic touch for an ultimate experience.

name: acqua-di-colbert
detail: Acqua Di Colbert for men who know what they want.

name: dudu
detail: A journey through the imagination  through exotic flavours and Eastern lands  for those who tire of nothing.

name: instinct-for-him-1
detail: Wildman is a fragrance for the adventurer who knows no bounds and pushes all the limits.

name: essencial-exclusivo
detail: A celebration of the fifteen years of the essential line  which chose the colour black to translate the elegance and strength of sophisticated men.

name: ps-for-men-1
detail: Oriental complex combining aromatic spices with herbaceous tones of armoise  sage and lavender  gently accented with a floral blend of ylang  rose and jasmine. The background of woody musk tones is supported by patchouli  amber and oakmoss.

name: ombre-10
detail: Ombre  a woody and rich fragrance meant for your summer days.

name: kalan
detail: Kalan is a truly captivating composition with an extremely fresh top note  while the heart evokes the majesty of French formal gardens. Finally  the notes melt into the skin and ignite the imagination.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Spicy Notes', 'Tonka Bean', 'Black Pepper', 'Blood Orange', 'Amber', 'Moss', 'Orange Blossom', 'Sandalwood', 'Woody Notes']

detail: A dreamlike journey to the enchanting Arabian Nights  with magical tales of one thousand and one night. Belly dancing  shisha  narcotic music  and delicious sweets all take your mind away.

name: comme-une-evidence-2
detail: It's obvious  an exceptional moment  there are moments when everything is clear  simple  just right. Moments of perfection and exception when everything around you exudes harmony and fullness. Imagine  a fusion with time  an infinite sensation of space  of open Nature  your well-being is absolute.
ingredients: ['Oakmoss', 'Violet Leaves', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Silk Tree Blossom']

name: mach-2
detail: A modern scent for a man  Mach 2 is the ideal fragrance for a man who loves to move around town.

name: reehet-oud
detail: Reehet Oud means 'the smell of oud' in Arabic. It is a rich  deep and powerful perfume for both men and women.

name: chyprissime
detail: Daring  breathtaking  addictive  noble. a new dimension in the fragrance universe. A collection of unique creations and original alchemies  crafted around the major themes of traditional perfumery. This opus crystallizes the essence of the Mugler brand and reveals a little of the creator's inner life  quite simply letting us into his secret.

name: coriandre
detail: Coriandre is an audacious creation that celebrates the contrast between warm and cool notes. Its initial burst of invigorating freshness surprises with its somewhat masculine personality.

name: 06-black-platinum-1
detail: "Black Platinum is a modern combination of classic notes with elegant florals  over sensual base notes". - Gino Percontio  Perfumer

name: forbes-of-forbes-1
detail: Lord Forbes of Forbes is the full title of our Clan Chief.

name: la-mer-1
detail: La Mer marks a milestone in both men's and women's perfumery.  Its unsurpassed composition is legendary: a recipe that has been in use since the creation of this charismatic fragrance has never been changed and is still one of the most successful perfumes today. Its universal classic character has always been fascinating.

name: coriandre-extrait-de-parfum-2
detail: A modern but faithful reinterpretation of the original formulation. A younger  fresher fragrance  more feminine with hallmarks maintained with the fresh woody notes enhanced with a more prominent floral note.

name: driver-intense-1
detail: Driver Intense is a luxurious  rich fragrance engraved with real gold. It was created for the energetic man  always on the move and with a clear vision of what he wants. A man who leaves a unique imprint on everything he does.

name: fille-deve-1
detail: The fragrance of temptation. Fille d'Eve is a mysterious and seductive  moving  and charming fragrance. It is housed in a symbolic apple-shaped bottle made of deliciously satiny crystal.

name: emanuel-ungaro-intense-for-him-1
detail: Intense for Him was conceived for a cosmopolite  metropolitan young man who values the scent he wears as an authentic form of freedom and self-expression.

name: more-spices-1
detail: If you need a little spice in your life  give this fragrance a try. It's all about contrasting spices. The ultimate in warm fragrances.

name: windsor-tonic-1
detail: An enchanting portrait of a regal British town steeped in history.

name: dandy-me-1
detail: An affirmation of clashing beauty  of romance and irreverence. A fragrance that paints a decadent portrait of someone who craves hedonistic pleasure and enjoys the suspended state of grace of boredom.

name: pepe-jeans-black-is-now-for-him-2020-1
detail: Black is Now for Him is a bold interpretation that expresses a true style  sophisticated and daring. Character is the key to true style!

name: armand-basi-leau-pour-homme-woody-musk-1
detail: Woody Musk is an exceptional chapter in the history of the legendary L'Eau pour Homme. Expressive and evocative  with extraordinary depth.

name: carven-pour-homme-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Carven Pour Homme is reinvented in a version that is magnetic and bewitching. Warm and enveloping  this fragrance is the quintessence of sensuality.

name: cool-water-street-fighter-2021
detail: The time has come to embrace your inner hero  unleash your secret power and answer the burning question: which champion are you?

name: matsu-sunshine-1
detail: An ideal fragrance all year round with the impression of extending the summer forever.

name: j-mat-1
detail: With its bright and hypnotic notes  J-Mat; is the scent of the Z generation of empowered women.

name: elie-saab-elixir
detail: Inspired by Lebanon  Eli Saab Elixir is a love potion brimming with sensuality.

name: halloween-blossom
detail: It is a burst of flowers  freedom and nature. It is connecting with yourself and realising the importance of savouring every second. Enjoying everything around you. It is your essence fully free.

name: mon-petit-chou
detail: Mon Petit Chou recalls that moment of pure tenderness when a new mother holds her baby for the first time and experiences an emotion that she will never forget for the rest of her life. A scent that evokes the marvelous smell of a baby's skin.

name: dunhill-valensole-lavender-1
detail: Presented as part of Dunhill's Signature Collection  which draws on the menswear brand's finest elements and materials  Valensole Lavender captures the fleeting beauty of French lavender fields in bloom.

name: neon-amber-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Sparks of high-voltage amber glow in the nocturnal cityscape. A riot of neon light and darkness. Resinous fumes vibrate. Mysterious yet warmly familiar  where the imagination of the future challenges the past. Reinvent your rules. Play with fire.

name: intimate-1
detail: Intimate is born from an innocent blend of modern femininity and delicate sensuality. A captivating shyness that can reveal many thoughts just by catching someone's gaze.

name: sun-bleached-1
detail: Sun Bleached is a fragrance that passes from shadow to light  following the sun from dusk till dawn.

name: cool-water-woman-street-fighter-2021
detail: The time has come to embrace your inner hero  unleash your secret power and answer the burning question: which champion are you?

name: kenzo-world-power-eau-de-toilette
detail: Kenzo Power Eau de Toilette is an intense yet intimate scent. A committed fragrance that celebrates women and embraces their diverse and authentic beauty. A unique creation that tells each story  beautiful and sensitive  raw and singular. The story that shapes a woman’s identity and strength.

name: pacha-ibiza-247-feeling-for-him-2023-2
detail: Feel how your senses are heightened at the exact moment when day turns into night. Be aware of your instinct and that moment when suddenly everything is more mystical  more magnetic  more hypnotic it will last 24/7. Feel the island 24 hours a day  7 days a week with Ibiza 24/7 Feeling for Him. The scent will rev up your senses and prepare you for what the night has in store. You are at one with the sunset  the sea and the beach. Just let it sweep you away.

name: initial-for-tonight-eau-de-parfum
detail: Life today is about enjoyment with attitude. Self-realisation and self care. See things with different eyes. Discover something special in a world that offers endless possibilities. "I wanted to create a fragrance that appeals to every courageous man and underlines his attraction " says perfumer Jérôme Di Marino. This is Initial for Tonight.

name: shades-of-leather
detail: "Leather has always accompanied people. It envelops and protects us like a second skin. Shades of Leather captures its essence and is much more than an olfactory portrait of this treasure. Leather is strong  has character and exudes indomitability"  Jérôme di Marino  Perfumer.

name: pepe-jeans-bright-for-her
detail: Pepe Jeans Bright feels like a second skin that adapts to your uniqueness  giving you the freedom to be unapologetically yourself.

name: tobacco-1
detail: Tobacco opens with soft notes  while the heart reveals spicy notes which deploy powerful smokey accents. The base is both warm and woody  wrapped in gourmand notes. A contrasted fragrance by its freshness and intensity that leaves no doubt about it's wearers intention.

name: cinnabar
detail: Mysterious. Exotic. Infinitely appealing. Launched in 1978  Cinnabar ushered in a worldwide wave of exotic oriental fragrances. From the ancient Far Eastern symbol adorning the bottle to the mysteriously exotic scent it contains  Cinnabar is spicy  warm... infinitely appealing.

name: loose-5
detail: This scent is like gathering in a dim-lit bar  surrounded by smoke and alcohol.

name: citron-boboli-1
detail: Citron Boboli is an energizing Eau de Parfum with citrus notes and warm spices. An original and comforting fragrance  it will transport you in the footsteps of Yuri  the founder of our House  when he lived in India and discovered the richness of Indian aromas and plants  evoking travels between Asia and Italy. Originally created in 1977 by Yuri Gutsatz  Citron Boboli was then named Citron Poivré.

name: hero-5
detail: Licks of fiery cardamom and cumin seed oil are tempered by refreshing waves of basil andorange  descending into cool  earthy  comforting layers of vetiver root and patchouli.

A unisex perfume created to celebrate the 175 years of history of Santa Eulalia. Past and future are mixed to give life to this scent. With notes of spices  citrus fruits and wood  the fragrance expresses the bonds that unite Santa Eulalia with Barcelona.

name: leau-eau-de-toilette
detail: Created in 1968  L’Eau was the first of the first  an olfactory time machine for inventing the future. Long before anyone else  L’Eau was defying gender codes: it spoke neither to the feminine nor the masculine  it captured both.

name: lagerfeld-classic-1
detail: A mysterious and persistent masculine fragrance  Lagerfeld "Classic" remains a true reflection of its creator's extraordinary personality. Sensual and provocative  designed exclusively for men  it is an innovation for its time.

name: kevin-black
detail: For an engaging and seductive man  Kevin Black has the gift of marking any occasion.

name: infusion-doeillet
detail: "In Les Infusions de Prada there is a luxury that is rare these days. At first  they seem very simple  as if you were tattooing water with an ingredient  but in reality it is a very complex formula. Just as water must be at a certain temperature to create the perfect tea  the base composition allows the beauty of a flower  a wood or a fruit to be revealed in a brilliant and sensitive way." - Daniela Andrier  Perfumer

name: olim
detail: Olim represents the vanity and emotion of a royal era. Powdery notes on beauty; spices evoke decadence and resins hint towards opulence. Olim refers to a form of purity with an underlying richness.

name: dunhill-edition-1
detail: Dunhill Edition is a classical masculine aromatic fragrance from the 1980s featuring fresh  spicy  and woody notes. A well-balanced fragrance for the discerning gentleman

name: madinah
detail: Fresh but still mysterious. Modern  yet timeless.  Madinah will help you remember all the beautiful places you've been to.

name: vanille-plurielle-1
detail: Vanille Plurielle is not an aggressive gourmand scent as one might imagine. Sublimated and highlighted with thousands of roses  some barks of citrus and incense drift to give this marvellous perfume a carnal and aphrodisiac wake.

name: phul-nana
detail: Hindi for lovely flowers. A bouquet of India's choicest flowers. This scent is a rare marriage of the herb garden with the flower garden  unusual in a feminine fragrance.

name: un-jardin-a-paris-2
detail: She walks into a garden in the heart of Paris. Going to a rendezvous. She is in love. Happy with anticipation. With her unique Parisian style  her allure is irresistible and utterly elegant. Paris is for her the only place where she can fully express her emotions and deeply live the romance.

name: spiritueuse-double-vanille-2021
detail: “This is a fragrance composed by Jean-Paul Guerlain  whose grandfather once dazzled the whole world with an overabundance of vanilla in his Shalimar. Nourished by rose  ylang-ylang and jasmine  it stands in ode to the Indian Ocean ” Thierry Wasser  Perfumer

name: oud-royal-7
detail: Experience the majestic power of Oud Royal  a fragrance that captivates the senses with its captivating allure and rich complexity.

name: sultan-22
detail: A woody  herbaceous fragrance  with a refreshing  invigorating and dreamy scent.

name: mystic-oud
detail: Mystic Oud is the essence of mystery and pure  divine  timeless elegance.

name: eutopie-n-10
detail: Along the Silk Road  Samarkand delights the soul of the nomadic couple. Its exhilarating beauty  stemming from the imprint left by the rich civilisations that met here  is the inspiration behind Eutopie No. 10;

name: bois-debene
detail: A dark ambery guaiac wood with Indonesian patchouli and Indian cypriol. The amber facet is accentuated by the addition of Brazilian cabreuva.

name: keriver
detail: The mystical aroma of the temple  lost in the heart of lush humid vegetation whose discovery symbolized the first day of the rest of his life. The energizing alchemy of a fresh  lightly spiced  likeable "eau" that develops a stream of infinite sensations on salty skin.

name: gourmand-oud
detail: This perfume was designed for a person who loves mystery and excellence.

name: velvet-oriental-musk-1
detail: Like a sweet  balmy rising from the walls of ancient Palermo  the Dolce & Gabanna Velvet Oriental Musk allows you to bask in the warmth of the sun wherever you may be. Evoking a land where East meets West  this fragrance is perfect for him and her alike.

name: posi
detail: The word "Posì" means potion and/or poison in ancient Greek. The ancients used the word not only to designate a magic potion  but also to describe the strength of the potion itself  for Posì was the most potent of all potions  which could make a man fall without hope of escape.

name: nagud-1
detail: An intense and memorable composition with a soft and sensual embrace.

name: giapeto
detail: The titan Iapetus (Giapeto) is the pillar of the west that holds up the universe  and is capable of controlling the forces of the world. The same forces of evocative and aphrodisiac power are contained in this perfume extract. Its decisive and sparkling character  combined with its persuasive and bewitching accords  bestow on this creation the magic of uniqueness and mystery.
ingredients: ['Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Saffron', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Ambergris', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Cardamom', 'Cumin', 'Musk']

name: ode-on-melancholy-oil
detail: Ode on Melancholy Oil is inspired by the art of alchemy and fragrance creation  and is formulated to be combined and blended in layers to create a unique and personalised fragrance combination. Built around a core ingredient linked to the House's distinctive codes  each fragrance can be amplified  toned down or fused with other fragrances in the luxurious collection to create a unique scent.

name: scotland-leather
detail: Scotland Leather is coming to put you in the mood of going to a place of fun. It is woody sweet  and the jasmine comes to make it playful and yet balanced. A sunset moment but can be at the same time the smile of sunrise.

name: moving-dunes
detail: Hot desert dunes brought to life by the wind  forever reshaped with every new rush of air. What can you smell? We feel that the scent of the desert is as erratic as its shimmering sands  uneasy to grasp and uneasy to inalterably depict.

name: eau-duelle-eau-de-toilette
detail: An ode to travel and vanilla. Along the Spice Routes  the vanilla at the heart of Eau Duelle takes on new aromas. Travelling through time and over borders  Bourbon vanilla from Madagascar reveals itself between darkness and light.

name: cedre-atlas-2022
detail: The same enveloping and sensual scent in a special bottle interpreted by the visual artist Joe Horner for Atelier Cologne’s Crystal Holiday campaign.

name: bois-et-musc
detail: Over the cedar  the musk adds a soft and unctuous animal note. Milky  creamy dimensions are exalted with orange blossoms and vanilla. An understated perfume.

name: cedar-atlas
detail: "The path enters the forest. The mule loaded down with equipment follows me with a quiet step. Light is playing with branches  falling down into sparkling puddles. Trees are huge. Above my head vaults appear  evoking a majestic cathedral. Air is mild  invaded by its perfume. The Cedar from Atlas. Captivating and verdant." - Mélanie Leroux  Perfumer

name: cedre-solaire
detail: Cèdre Solaire is the expression of the duality between warmth and freshness. The scent of a lush forest in the south of France on a hot summer's day. The golden rays of sunlight through the dense foliage give off a magical chord that is instinctively recognisable.

name: cedre-superfluide
detail: "Atlas Cedar is a precious wood that evokes the smell of shavings in our cabinetmaking workshops. This majestic tree has always seduced me with its multiple facets  strong and soft like the scent left when we sharpen a pencil. It is a rich material that invites calm and creativity. Like the cabinetmaker who creates a beautiful piece of furniture  I wanted to create a beautiful fragrance and adorn the Superfluide collection with a strong yet delicate element " Arnaud Poulain  Founder and Creative Director.

name: moroccan-green
detail: Moroccan Green is an irresistible fragrance with a unique scent that will accompany you throughout the day.

name: eau-de-iceberg-74-cedar-1
detail: How do you approach the man from Iceberg Cedar? By keeping up with him. Always on the move  between two squash matches  two airports  two meetings. He's active  brimming with energy and doesn't let any of life's opportunities slip through his fingers. His presence alone is exhilarating.

name: cedre
detail: The essence of the noble Atlas cedar and its fragrant wood form the heart of the fragrance. It is combined with spices and tea. Its top notes sparkle with citrus and herbs  while a base of musk and ambergris offers a deep oriental sensuality.

name: cedre-atlas-1
detail: He woke up suddenly  foggy and out of place. Scenes flashed in his head. They were chasing him. The snowpack was deep. He did not have what they wanted  but they would not believe him if he stopped. So he ran. Exhausted  he fell again. The moment he regained consciousness  a figure approached  she looked at him intently and spoke  «I can help you».

name: patchouli-cedre-de-tweed
detail: Built around the marriage of cedarwood and patchouli  this sensual  slightly magical and deliciously enigmatic fragrance expresses its insolent seduction... A mysterious  opulent and intense fragrance surrounded by a woody base that expresses all the elegance and richness of wood.

name: night-club
detail: A haunting fragrance that awakens with its insolent charm.

name: haiku-bois-dhinoki-1
detail: "The symbiosis between the fresh fig's luminosity and Hinoki wood's sensuality." - Jean Jacques  Perfumer

name: 003-yuzu-feuilles-de-violette-vetiver-2
detail: A refreshing yet dry cologne. 003 Yuzu Feuilles de Violette Vétiver is a beautiful interpretation of 19th century barber/pharmacist cosmetic tonic infusions for gentlemen and ladies.

name: away-man-1
detail: The journey is a journey  but the destination is a feeling. Away Man is an invitation to pause and just be. This invigorating scent offers a stolen moment of soothing freshness.

name: dirty-violet-2019-1
detail: For Dirty Violet  we partnered with acclaimed drag empress and erotic performance artist Violet Chachki. Gliding effortlessly between the once segregated spheres of masculine and feminine  Dirty Violet refuses to be defined. It's a heady and intoxicating scent that smacks of skin  heat  temptation  and sex.

name: panorama-1
detail: A majestic panorama instantly provokes shock and awe  once the exact spot is found. It is best enjoyed from on high: The Sheats House - a glass and concrete house in West Hollywood overlooking the City of Angels - is where the Olfactive Studio rises and presents Panorama.
ingredients: ['Violet Leaves', 'Wasabi', 'Myrrh', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Galbanum', 'Bamboo', 'Cardamom', 'Fig Leaf', 'Bergamot', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Fir Balsam', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla']

name: balenciaga-paris-1
detail: Between the experimentation of couture and the morale of the cut. In the house of Balenciaga  there is the couturier who obeys the rules of style  but also the artist who embraces the realm of dreams… It is in this world that Balenciaga Paris was born.

name: chypre-silver
detail: Cool and mysterious as moonlight on a woodland pond  Chypre Silver is a rare gem of a fragrance  both sophisticated and stunningly evocative of nature.

name: ivoire-de-balmain-2012-1
detail: Ivoire is the name I give to a dream. The name of a woman of sovereign beauty draped in ultra-pale silk. We crossed paths for a moment on the staircase at the Opera  before she disappeared into the night " Pierre Balmain.

name: balenciaga-leau-rose-1
detail: The sparkling facet of a rose. Delicate bubbles  and fresh pink jus radiate with sparkling femininity entwined with electric youth. L'Eau Rose is a passionate  thrilling fragrance  like the wild dreams of young women today  women who smoulder with sensuality. So passionately feminine.

name: violet-blonde
detail: Violet Blonde has the spirit of a classical European fragrance. It is formal  polished  and yet draws you in closer and closer  like a beautifully dressed woman whose refined presence charms  then fascinates and ultimately seduces you.

name: violet-sapphire
detail: Exotic  effervescent and resonant with the good fortune  wisdom and astute judgement associated with its namesake gemstone  Violet Sapphire glows with spiritual awakening.

name: diavolo-4
detail: It is the most intense aspect of your seductive side. Attractive  nocturnal  mysterious  Diavolo will seduce you.

name: dunhill-amalfi-citrus-1
detail: Presented as part of Dunhill’s Signature Collection  which draws inspiration from the menswear label’s finest elements and materials  the Amalfi Citrus eau de parfum captures the zesty spirit of the southern Italian coastline.

name: amber-mandarin
detail: A luxurious new interpretation of the bittersweet mandarin. An unexpected and unique creation emerges  in which the citrus fruit gleams in a new warm glow.

name: fresh-woman-1
detail: Mexx Fresh Woman  inspired by nature and the sea  evokes the scent of the sea and brings back the feeling of freedom that only holidays can bring.

name: volupte-tendre
detail: Inspired by the radiant femininity that is iconic to Oscar de La Renta  Volupté Tendre is a delicate dance of softness and sensuality.

name: acqua-di-parma-note-di-colonia-iv-1
detail: Celebrating 100th anniversary  Acqua di Parma pays homage to “Manon Lescaut” by Giacomo Puccini with a fragrance that celebrates the strength of love and passion. Like a stolen glance that stirs the emotions  the sparkling and bright notes at the beginning  spark that ignite this elegant bouquet with energy and enthusiasm. The harmony continues to intoxicate through the deep and intense heart.  Love is firmly sealed in mystery by an enveloping base.

name: perry-ellis-love-1
detail: For the romantic  modern  classy and stylish young woman who is looking for a clean  fresh  fruity floral fragrance that can be worn everyday and everywhere.

name: black-opium-illicit-green-1
detail: The Black Opium Illicit Green woman is carried away by her senses  luring us into a festive world under green neon lights. For her  "perfume is pleasure"  ready to dare  to shake it and feel it  all night long.

name: frivole-parfum
detail: A happy-go-lucky perfume. Frivole has fun with citrus and cheerful flowers  languishing into a merry drydown.

name: essence-noble
detail: Hidden behind each Le Galion fragrance is a poet  a musician. A fragrance is more than the result of mixing flowers into a bouquet or adding spices and woods to a selection of flowers. It requires a touch of magic  something Paul Vacher used to add when creating his masterpieces  much like others compose poetry and music.

name: solaris
detail: Inspired by the vibrant midnight sun that never sets during summer in the north. Fresh  warm  and with a spherical roundness in the transitions of the notes  makes this fragrance as magical as the never-ending sunsets.
ingredients: ['Grapefruit', 'Mandarin (green)', 'Ginger', 'Lemon', 'Litsea Cubeba', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Galbanum', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Patchouli', 'Peach', 'Petitgrain', 'Tonka Bean', 'Black Pepper', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Woody Ambery Note']

name: solar-bloom-1
detail: Inspired by dawn's radiance as the warmth begins to caress the skin. Dawn is neither night nor day. Breathe in and feel the alluring appeal of brisk air blended with a solar embrace creating a moment of heavenly comfort.

name: frivole-1
detail: A joyful perfume. Frivole has fun with citrus and cheerful flowers  languishing in a joyful dry-down.

name: chrome-extreme
detail: An exceptional nectar created for today's adventurers  nature lovers and thrill seekers. The promise of a powerful juice inspired by the power of the ocean. Irresistible.

name: free-spirit-ocean-1
detail: A fresh aquatic fragrance  ideal for men with a free and casual spirit  who want to emulate the serenity and the energy of the sea.

name: ocean-wave
detail: An intense alluring and captivating perfume.

name: aqua-for-her-1
detail: This incredibly fresh  aquatic fragrance mixes the breezy scent of blue sky accord  dewy blue lotus  and sensual hot skin musk.
ingredients: ['Lotus', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Skin Accord', 'Cucumber', 'Green Notes', 'Sandalwood', 'Violet Leaves', 'Woody Notes', 'Coconut Milk', 'Lactonic Accord (fruity milky)']

name: reflect-2021
detail: Reflect is an essential men’s fragrance with the authentic message of reflection  of valuing yourself and your achievements through a premium sensory experience.

name: copal-azur-2021-1
detail: Suave clouds of burning copal whirling over Tulum inspire a beachy scent like no other. Mayan incense rising from age-old temples  lashes of sea spray and whiffs of the jungle exhales the lush  spiritual vibes of sacred Tulum. Originally brought to life by perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour in 2014.

name: nautica-blue-1
detail: Nautica Blue. Pure exhilaration. Cool marine notes merge with an invigorating fresh-air fragrance to evoke deep blue vistas and open-air freedom. A surge of fresh spices and subtle woods lifts you higher. Sporty and stylish  Nautica Blue beckons you to a world of adventure.

name: vince-camuto-homme
detail: Inspired by the style of the conscious yet casual man  Vince Camuto Homme is a crisp fragrance that captures the cool confidence of the Vince Camuto man.
ingredients: ['Cypress', 'Lavender', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Artemisia', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Spruce', 'Cedar leaf', 'Fennel Seeds', 'Campari', 'Ginger', 'Orange', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Elemi', 'Juniper Berries']

name: goa-com-amor
detail: Goa is a place that epitomises pristine beauty. The spirit of Goa is captured in Goa Com Amor (Goa with love).

name: signature-2
detail: Highly contemporary  Signature embodies a strong vision of masculinity. Like a rhythmic optical illusion  its enamel and resin lines captivate and invite reflection. Inside the bottle  pure olfactory elegance.

name: sag-harbor-1
detail: It has been called the Hampton that is not Hamptons. It's a summer resort for New York's culture  writers  artists and designers  who savour the quaint  old-fashioned atmosphere of this small borough  infused with the unmistakable cool of Manhattan. While Montauk juts out into the fierce Atlantic  Sag Harbor is literally nestled in its own bay.

name: ber-cavok-1
detail: A fresh  clean  ozonic  musky perfume with a unique inspiration  which combines two completely different worlds: Perfume and Flying.  This fragrance is an interpretation of the bright blue Berlin sky smelt during a flight high above the city under ideal flying conditions.

name: blueted-excited
detail: The Lapidus man is 'man  all man'  now more upbeat and modern in spirit. He is resolutely masculine  strong and protective  yet unashamedly sensuous and natural. His duality impresses and attracts others no less than his mysterious  assertive personality intrigues.

name: nitro-xtreme-1
detail: Extreme  intense  and powerful.

name: perry-ellis-18-intense-1
detail: With its intense and revitalising compositions  it is a fragrance of passion and seduction.

name: sea-breeze
detail: If happiness had a scent  it would smell like Sea Breeze.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Iris / Orris', 'Mandarin', 'Violet Leaves', 'Amberwood', 'Musk', 'Pear']

name: mosquito
detail: For those who “live” Comporta know that 30 minutes a day  a cloud of mosquitos can be around. We suggest you smile on it with this clean  pure transparency  ozonic  light woody floral smelling touch.
ingredients: ['White Flowers', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Sandalwood', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Flower Stems']

name: garden-of-good-eva
detail: Come away with Eva  breeze down a lush lane; she's the fresh rush of splendour  you can't quite explain. So vividly vibrant  with a carefree demeanour. She whirls off to a place.

name: geranium-odorata-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Geranium Odorata pays tribute to this flower used as a boutonnière  but hardly ever in a fragrance. Against all odds  this eau de toilette brightened by notes of citrus and spices is sublime as a men’s fragrance. However  just like a tuxedo  it also fits women like a charm.

name: geranium-1
detail: The fragrance is in the same spirit as the fashion of Franck Boclet. The values are simplicity  elegance  passion  parfums d'exception as well as modernity.

name: agua-de-colonia-n5-geranium-sandal
detail: A sweet and bold fragrance defies the senses thanks to the sublime combination of notes.

name: notes-1
detail: As with music  a great perfume is more than the sum of its notes. However  in contrast to musical melody  the quality of perfume notes is essential for a memorable experience. Notes de Robert Piguet is a tribute to some of the most exquisite materials in the perfumer's palette  a fragrance of exceptional harmony and beauty.

name: jicky-eau-de-toilette
detail: Full of contrasts and duality  a composition of refreshing and oriental notes  Jicky Eau de Toilette plays on the ambiguous nature of the masculine-feminine olfactory repertoire. It was the first composition to be called a "perfume"  the first unisex fragrance in the history of perfumery and the oldest perfume created by the House of Guerlain.

name: geranium-balsamic-note-1
detail: The composition that brings an element of sensual mystery. The unique overture of the apparent ambivalence.

name: jicky-eau-de-parfum
detail: Why the name Jicky? As a student  Aimé Guerlain had a fond memory of a young girl called Jicky to whom he paid a beautiful tribute with one of his most wonderful olfactory creations. By pure coincidence  his nephew Jacques' nickname was also Jicky.

name: rose-geranium-1
detail: Rose Geranium is reputed to have been the favourite essence of Marilyn Monroe.

name: vetiver-geranium
detail: The Acqua Originale collection is Master Perfumer Olivier Creed's living diary of fragrances  chronicling his countless travels around the world through the art of perfumery. The island of Java  Olivier's favourite tropical destination east of Bali and just south of the equator  served as inspiration for Vetiver Geranium. The accords evoke the mountainous hills of the Indonesian landscape.

name: jicky-extrait
detail: Full of contrast and duality  a composition of refreshing  oriental notes  Jicky plays on the ambiguous nature of the masculine-feminine olfactory repertoire. It was the first composition to be termed a "perfume"  it was also the first unisex fragrance in the history of perfume-making and the oldest perfume created by the House of Guerlain.

name: geranio
detail: On Capri  the wild geranium keeps you company as you enjoy the island's walks  overlooking onto the paths from the picturesque cliffs above  and blooming amongst historic areas  right up onto the balconies of the houses where throughout the years it has been tamed and cultivated. Its unabashed presence here has stimulated Carthusia's imagination  who has always turned to Capri's wild and beautiful nature to enrich its choice of fragrances with fresh sensations.

name: 2-agua-geranium
detail: Agua Geranium takes us to an exotic garden in the heart of Lisbon  revisiting such a traditional ingredient as geranium but giving it a contemporary twist. Lyn was enchanted by the Jardim Botânico  an island of tropical flora surrounded by the city.

name: azzaro-pour-homme-intense-1
detail: A prestige version of Azzaro Pour Homme with optimal concentration. For an irresistible appeal...

name: geranio-imperiale
detail: Imagine looking out onto a terrace and enjoying the magnificent views as you stroll along the shores of Lake Como. Admire the mountains plunging into the water  letting the fresh mountain air revive your skin  while the sweet scent of geraniums adorning the panoramic location stimulates your senses.

name: gingembre-rouge-eau-fraiche-2017
detail: Inspired by a stopover in Zanzibar  this energising fragrance reveals the freshness and sensuality of ginger in all its states. Perfume creators  worked together to capture the magical allure of this exotic island and create a love story told through ingredients. The result is a vibrant and addictive fragrance that can be worn everyday.

name: gingerbread-1
detail: Demeter's Gingerbread is a rich  spicy ginger scent  extremely warm and sexy  right for anywhere  anytime.

name: gingembre-rouge-2019
detail: Gingembre Rouge invites you on an exotic journey that is mysterious  spicy and addictive.

name: gingembre-rouge-eau-fraiche-2014
detail: Inspired by a stopover in Zanzibar  this energising fragrance reveals the freshness and sensuality of ginger in all its states. Alberto Morillas and Amandine Clerc-Marie wrote the Gingembre Rouge story. They worked together to capture the magical allure of this exotic island and create a love story told through ingredients. The result is a vibrant and addictive fragrance that can be worn every day.

name: ginger
detail: Magnified and sophisticated  Ginger is nonetheless raw and essential  spreading in its fragrance splendour. Freshly cut ginger’s initial purity envelops us in a spicy start which slowly evolves towards flowery and musky notes melting into a dark syrupy base.
ingredients: ['Ginger', 'Benzoin', 'Orange', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Magnolia', 'Mandarin', 'Petitgrain', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tonka Bean', 'Lychee', 'Musk', 'Pomegranate', 'Red Berries']

name: acqua-zenzero-1
detail: Acqua Zenzero is a whirlwind of spices that will sweep you away. The fragrance starts with a spicy freshness  while the heart radiates a powerful heat. Finally  this spicy symphony is softened in the base.

name: five-oclock-au-gingembre
detail: The first sip of wine  the first time one samples oysters and the first taste of ginger all leave indelible impressions.  Our world is composed of images associated with pleasures and excellence.  Style and elegance are concepts indissociable from that extravagant sophistication reserved for connoisseurs.

name: gingerbread
detail: Gingerbread is a rich  spicy ginger scent  extremely warm and sexy  right for anywhere  anytime.

name: ginger-cola-1
detail: It seems that the energetic punk youth will always be a pair of protagonists whose souls fit together.

name: ginger-essence-1
detail: Ancient Chinese tradition holds that where there is yin  there must be yang. So we've blended spicy ginger with refreshing citrus notes to create the perfect balance of warmth and coolness  energy and calm. The skin is enveloped in a tantalising scent that is impossible to resist.

name: eau-de-gingembre-1
detail: Eau de Gingembre is inspired by trips to India  where the air is refreshed with ginger-scented water. A spicy composition that reinvents the theme of freshness. A sombre  precise and figurative creation  like diving into an artesian well.

name: molecule-01-ginger
detail: "The amazing thing about ginger is how it combines freshness and spiciness in one ingredient. I've always loved it  so when I smelled this new 'fresh ginger oil' from the Ivory Coast  I knew I had to make Molecule + Ginger. It's so clean  so pure  with a sharp effervescent quality that plays beautifully in the landscape of Molecule 01 " Geza Schoen  Perfumer.

name: 1902-gingembre-vert-1
detail: "A spicy blend of cardamom and ginger infuses this Cologne with exquisitely delivered sweet lime facets " Céline Ripert  Perfumer.

name: black-ginger-1
detail: Black Ginger is an invigorating spicy ginger scent  with touches of eastern spice and ginger flowers. It is unique and unusual  in a manner that is classically Demeter.

name: white-heaven-beach-1
detail: White Heaven Beach is like a delicate touch of freedom and happiness. Elegant and stylish: an expression of pure femininity.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Lychee', 'Woody Notes', 'Rose', 'Blackcurrant', 'Cotton Flower', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Vanilla (Bourbon)']

name: black-woman-1
detail: Mexx Black / Woman is a delicate fragrance for the enchanting Mexx woman who looks for a  fragrance with understated elegance.

name: aura-eau-de-toilette
detail: Did you know that thanks to Swarovski crystal has its own fragrance?

name: delicious-1
detail: For a killer night  your scent should be marked as well as your personality

name: bella-7
detail: An enigmatic and captivating essence arrayed in a pale pink bottle. This fragrance is dressed in all its finery to shine like a thousand and one fires.

name: eden-sparkling-lychee-39
detail: Prepare to be tempted! Eden Sparkling Lychee is a radiant and cheerful fruity floral fragrance featuring a beautiful blend of luscious lychee  tart blackcurrant and sweet candied violet.

name: seeds-of-love
detail: Feminine and kind  this is an enveloping creation about nature and elegance inspired by the Tuscan countryside.

name: laloa-sexy
detail: A warm and passionate fragrance  Laloa Sexy reflects the desire and sensuality of women. It awakens passions and is your ally to win the game of seduction: this fragrance accompanies you in your moments of love and passion!

name: la-femme-parfaite
detail: The perfect woman is as multi-faceted as her perfume. En la salida  las notas frescas y afrutadas se realzan con un acorde especiado. The heart reveals a trio of flowers: rose  violet and lily of the valley offer a voluptuous accord  underlined by a velvety peach that brings extra femininity. The rich trail reveals a woody duo of vanilla wrapped in fruity and musky notes.
ingredients: ['Lychee', 'Vanilla', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange', 'Peach', 'Pink Pepper', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Rose', 'Violet', 'Woody Notes']

name: attrape-reves
detail: "Going out to discover distant horizons can lead to experiences as unexpected as they are magical. An aurora borealis rising over a lava desert. A cloud of fireflies taking flight in a tropical forest. A shower of shooting stars on the high seas.
