Such rare and fantastic phenomena are engraved in the memory forever". - Jacques Cavallier-Belletrud  Perfumer

name: rose-litchi
detail: An ode to the rose in full bloom  revealing all its sweetness and femininity.

name: sugar-lychee-1
detail: A fresh fragrance with a juicy sweetness inspired by the exotic and luscious lychee fruit.

name: soliver-for-her
detail: S.Oliver for Her is an ode to the elegance of everyday life  to the great and outstanding moments of happiness. S.Oliver invites you to stop for a minute and enjoy the moment.

name: miss-aura
detail: Miss Aura is the fragrance of an evanescent and joyful young woman who fascinates and enthralls those around her. She glows  swept up in a whirlwind of new emotions. Life is open to her  like a promise of happiness. She smiles at life  which smiles back at her. Luck turns and swirls around her.

name: gkay
detail: Gkay is one of the biggest influencers in Brazil  with more than 20M followers on her social networks. Gkay has created a unique and very sophisticated fragrance  representing authentic and outgoing women  just like the artist.

name: wild-poppy-1
detail: An energetic fragrance created with the delicious aromas of pear  raspberry and apricot infused with hints of Himalayan jasmine and Grasse Rose.

name: pink-molecule-09090-1
detail: The warm breeze that comes in the spring mixed with water and the dark trees in Denmark. A fragrance that has a grand opening of innocence and purity.

name: apricot-privee-1
detail: Undeniably chic. Delightfully decadent. Unexpectedly elevated. Apricot Privée is a fresh take on a juicy scent.

name: matsu-mi-1
detail: This fragrance opens with a cheerful and colourful alliance of juicy ingredients instilling delightful energy in the burst of the scent and blends with the happiness of sun-kissed fruits. The heart of the scent is built around majestic and sensual notes for a subtle and magnetic evocation of femininity. An alluring trail made of hypnotizing ingredients creates a compelling modern charisma for a refined signature.

name: royal-apricot
detail: Royal Apricot is a bright  festive and fresh Apricot fragrance that works anytime  anywhere.

name: apricot-rose-1
detail: A fresh  uplifting and delicious fragrance reminiscent of sun-warmed fruits and heated rose buds.

name: cityscape-for-her-1
detail: An effortlessly elegant scent inspired by the world's most glamorous and sophisticated city landscapes.

name: 214-peonia-apricot
detail: 214 Peônia & Apricot expresses the contrast between the delicacy of the Peony flower and the brightness of the Apricot Blanc of France. The meeting of the notes of these ingredients results in a luminous chord with opulent nuances  which translates into an exceptionally radiant fragrance.

name: dance-alegria
detail: A fragrance that connects the whole world with the vibrations  fun and joy that characterize it. Dance Alegria is refreshed with lush colors that highlight the delights of the jungle and the wonderful streets of Rio de Janeiro.

name: cara-mia-ti-amo
detail: She is elegant  successful and sexy  yet delicate  vulnerable and lovable. She isn't afraid to take a risk to find love. Her coquettish  playful side could captivate any man. She keeps her heart for the right one. When he found her  he wished he could invent new words to express his feelings. I love you  just didn't seem to convey enough. "My love  my dearest  cara mia"

name: lamour-rose-paris-eau-de-parfum-2020-1
detail: The next chapter of the L'Amour Rose story goes back to where it all began ... Paris! Another Spring  a new love story  a new adventure! This is everyone's favourite season  because of one reason: romance is floating in the air carrying with it a sense of freedom and magic.
ingredients: ['Apricot', 'Hualan Flower (Chinese michelia)', 'Amberwood', 'Pear Blossom', 'Rose Petal', 'Lemon', 'Marine', 'Hinoki Wood', 'Sea Water']

name: dreamlife-1
detail: A fragrance with a signature accord of sensual florals; a vibrant composition that blooms against all odds  and conveys a message of optimism throughout the heart of the fragrance.

name: wonderly
detail: Wonderly is an opportunity to open out horizons to endless possibilities. Nothing is impossible. Everything unexpected can happen. Wonderly combines the positive energy and warmth with transparency and elegance.

name: tubereuse-2
detail: The tuberose blossom is once again in the air in this ultra-feminine  sensual and melodious fragrance. A voluptuous and intoxicating fragrance.

name: tubereuse-merveilleuse
detail: Tubéreuse Merveilleuse is an explosive encounter of sensuality and freshness. It was during a trip to Thailand that our perfumer discovered the incredible complexity of white flowers. This olfactory revelation inspired him to create the pairing at the heart of this fragrance: an Indian tuberose  whose heady  creamy carnal scent is contrasted with the zesty pungent note of larger-than-life Nigerian ginger.

name: tuberose-overdose
detail: A daring contrast between light and dark  Tuberose Overdose attempts to blur the lines of feminine and masculine. Provocative and simply irresistible.

name: tuberosa-1
detail: Very sensual  sweet and lingering. This scent evokes dreams of oriental gardens and odalisques resting on silk cushions. It originates from Mexico and arrived in Europe around 1600. It is often used in bridal bouquets and symbolises "voluptuousness".

name: sensual-tuberose-1
detail: Sensuality and femininity transformed into an olfactory creation. With honeyed and exciting notes surrounded by sparkling spicy touches. At the heart  a bouquet of white flowers  blooming  intoxicating. The dry-down is bold and voluptuous  a meeting enveloped by ultra-precious notes.

name: tuberosa-1974-1
detail: A flower  a perfumer  a story. In 1974  the house launched its first perfume  Chloé  inspired by the tuberose flower. Re-orchestrated and renamed Tuberosa 1974  the "first Chloé flower" reveals its spicy notes  bright floral accord and fresh innocence. An iconic sillage with timeless elegance. Very French.

name: radikal-tuberose-1
detail: Radikal Tuberose is an ode to the sweet  sensual fragrance of Tuberose  a sulphurous flower if ever there was one.

name: exotic-tuberose
detail: Not a rose at all  but a white flower like jasmine or orange blossom  with creaminess and a carnal nature emphasised  putting the complete sexiness of this fragrance on full display.

name: tubereuse-de-madras
detail: A floral  creamy  sun-drenched white tuberose. Tubéreuse de Madras is an ode to the legendary Indian city of Madras  where this flower was first cultivated.

name: fracas-1
detail: Fracas is the crown jewel in the collection of Robert Piguet Parfums. A cult favourite  created in 1947 by genius perfumer Germaine Cellier  it is a legend and a trendsetter. Cellier dreamed of a perfume that would make its wearer feel like a bombshell. The result was Fracas - a fragrance that is provocative and glamorous  dramatic and elegant.

name: cafe-tuberosa
detail: He had received a mysterious invitation to Venice just a few days after that unforgettable night. He was wondering what this was all about  then he recognised  "Café Tuberosa". There she was  staring at him. Suddenly it was clear. In a moment they would have the chance to start again.

name: tuberose-parfum
detail: "The tuberose has a reputation as the 'mistress of the night'  electrifying the atmosphere with its dangerous sensuality. In this creation  I've put this famous flower centre stage " Roja Dove.

name: soft-tuberose
detail: A classic fragrance  which we could not resist twisting in the two opposite directions of its olfactory nature.

name: tuberose-in-silk-1
detail: A celebration of the voluptuous tuberose. A balance between purity and sensuous spirit.

name: love-tuberose
detail: "In Love Tuberose  I see a woman enraptured by romance with dreams that can only be found in the classic Russian arts. A manifestation of passion  hope and adventure  the fragrance embodies the excitement and mystery of her unfolding love story " Christopher Chong.

name: essence-n-9-tubereuse
detail: Dazzling  captivating  stunningly feminine… The tuberose is the diva of the floral realm. An icon of haute perfumery  its intensely heady fragrance is so assertive that it takes a virtuoso to tame it. A luminous ode to the voluptuousness of curves  to exalt the most sensuous of flowers.

name: dirty-hinoki-1
detail: Inspired by the ancient practice of forest bathing  or shinrin-yoku  Dirty Hinoki expresses the multi-sensory experience of clearing your mind and truly opening yourself up to the nature around you. Grounding and reassuring yet with a freshedge  this scent expresses both the power and peace of an ancient woodland.

name: flaneur
detail: Imagine wandering around with no honest destination yet to discover the beauty in what we'd otherwise deem common. The result: a romantic  understated scent that encapsulates both the feeling of groundedness and the exoticism of everyday moments.

name: designer-club-ambition
detail: An intoxicating perfume that adds a perfect touch of free-spiritedness to your everyday life.

name: vanilla-patchouli-1
detail: Vanilla & Patchouli is a sweet and voluptuous  intriguing and mysterious fragrance  where the splendid Madagascar vanilla absolute  the undisputed queen of the entire composition  meets the dark charm of precious woods and ambergris.

name: essencial-supreme-man-2019-1
detail: Essencial Supreme with its intense aroma will be felt and impress everyone around you. A fragrance that accompanies you in special and unique moments. Exalt all your intensity and sensuality with the new fragrance of the Brazilian House of Perfumery.

name: jasmin-noir-2
detail: She personifies the everything terribly of impulsive natures  the reflection of an inner incandescence that is readily impassioned. The Splendida Jasmin Noir Woman has a dual unpredictable and unabashed nature. Discrete and confident  determined and intuitive  she has an intense charisma. Everywhere she goes  she is aware of peoples eyes on her  and she knows perfectly well that the unique "something" in the way she laughs  smiles and shines makes her irresistible.

name: cashmeran-vanilla
detail: A light and delicate fragrance  perfect for dreamy  warm summer evenings.

name: alien-musc-mysterieux
detail: A symbol of enchanting and distant lands  intoxicating and refined  a source of mystery and sensuality  of dreams and wonders  the Orient never ceases to fascinate us with its splendour  mystery and richness. Alien Musc Mystérieux evokes these images with this perfume  in which musk first reveals its sombre and then its luminous facets  like the lattices of an oriental palace.

name: noble-vetiver
detail: The Noble Vetiver man loves to share his passion for fine  high-quality objects and is admired by his peers for his self-confidence and bold spirit. As a connoisseur  his Noble Vetiver fragrance is a bold and elegant signature statement  making him the centre of attention wherever he is.

name: lemon-splash-1
detail: Lemon Splash is a Mediterranean blend of citrus fruits that creates an energising composition. It is part of the Museum collection  which uses classic European and Asian raw materials and olfactory families  reminiscent of an old perfumer's library of fragrances.

name: oud-santal
detail: At the heart of the fragrance  a mighty union of two precious woods among the most treasured ingredients in perfumery  used for thousands of years for mystic and traditional rituals. A sophisticated and enveloping fragrance tinged with radiance.

name: batman
detail: Batman has been specially designed for little superheroes and will instantly immerse them in the universe of the great Batman.

name: daisy-pop-2024
detail: A zesty and sparkling composition around surprising citrus fruits.

name: nathalie-lorson
detail: This scent expresses a joyful and positive attitude towards life.

name: gelsomini-di-capri
detail: As is customary in the tradition of the brand which was created and developed in the Island of the Mermaids  the beginnings of this perfume originate from a legend which tells of Carthusians  of father priors and queens  but above all of flowers  the most beautiful in Capri. Among these are delicate jasmines which  as if by magic  evoke the charm of a unique island in the bouquet of its new fragrance.

name: sunset-romance-1
detail: Sunset Romance is a composition that interprets the romanticism of the evening hours. The skin still warm from the day in the sun. As the sun sets in the distance in a dazzling play of colours  the winding path to the old town leads through narrow streets that radiate a refreshing coolness through the whitewashed houses. A glass of rosé wine waits on the table.

name: rose-cuiree
detail: Live a fascinating and unpredictable olfactory experience  as intense and complex as love: a passionate journey to the border where strength and sensuality  audacity and attraction  seduction and danger coexist.

name: rosario
detail: “An unexpected encounter of irresistible citrus notes and blooming rose centifolia amongst flickering embers of incense ” Bernardo Möller  Olfactive Director.

name: myrrh-casati-1
detail: Inspired by Marchesa Casati  the legendary patron of the arts and muse of eccentricity  known for her extravagant dark fashion and lavish fetes replete with exotic animals  gilded servants  and an infectious waft of incense and mystery that surrounded her.

name: twilight-orchid
detail: The heart of this sensuous fragrance is the midnight orchid  balanced by warm notes in the base. While the focus is on the Twilight Orchid  this complex  yet linear blend includes citrus and white flowers  making it lighter  fuller and more complete and wearable anytime.

name: mandarine-ditalie-bergamote-de-calabre
detail: Mandarine d'Italie Bergamote de Calabre is an olfactory journey created from exceptional ingredients selected from around the Mediterranean to create an energetic and sublime fragrance.

name: paris-oud
detail: Paris oud is a unisex scent that balances modern sensitivity with old-world charm.

name: blue-seduction-wave-for-women-2022-1
detail: A fragrance that challenges the senses and envelops you in a halo of seduction.

name: rose-oud-5
detail: Muscat. A bespoke creation for an Omani prince. Hours spent strolling through the streets of the old town  soaking up the colours and the incomparable light to recreate this wonder in the form of fine jewellery with floating arabesques  set with diamonds. An unforgettable experience  that paved the way for Rose Oud  the olfactory expression of this sensual and mysterious Orient.

name: clair-de-musc
detail: A musk born of a rock crystal that dominates eternally snow-capped peaks. A purified  filtered extract  issued from this radiant  astral fragment. A clear and gentle reflection of a moonlight glow  a pure and transparent fragrance.

name: vibrant-woody-mandarin
detail: When the hour begins that changes desires  sailors' hearts melt and an authentic uproar of conflicting emotions begin in the left hemisphere of the brain. The doors of vibrant  vitamin infused energy are opened to the vibrant depth of a memory. At this point  the perfumer Nathalie Lorson masterfully plays with the unfathomable paths that men's thoughts sometimes take. Therefore  heart notes pass from spicy tones to floral accords. The fragrance concludes with a woody blend of base notes.

name: grey-myrrh-1
detail: "The smell of a working man when the heat warms his early washed skin through his white tee-shirt is sublime ” Azzi Glasser  Olfactive Director  and Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Red Berries', 'Myrrh', 'Skin Accord', 'Artemisia', 'Cypress', 'Earthy Notes', 'Clary Sage', 'Woody Notes', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Watery']

name: no-limit-gold
detail: No Limit Gold is an invitation to enter the most luxurious club  where everything has the colour of gold and success on the horizon is within anyone's reach.

name: signature-generation-for-her
detail: Cherish the endless beauty of a mother’s unconditional love with Signature Generation for her  a luminous floral scent for women inspiring the next generation.

name: the-big-bad-cedar
detail: With its heady  bold blend of cardamom  sage and broom  Atkinsons The Big Bad Cedar is exactly what it says on the tin. It's a bold  ruthless fragrance that evokes images of windswept moors  frozen lakes and inhospitable terrain.

name: oud-woods
detail: A precious elixir combining rare and powerful essences. An alliance that reveals an intense and luxurious character  an unforgettable signature.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Tobacco Accord', 'Saffron', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Pink Pepper', 'Black Pepper']

name: vanilla-vibes-2
detail: Like the woman embodying the campaign. A futuristic amazon  dancing with the devil  under a vanilla sky in the Californian desert. Possessed by the electro beats  she offers up her silver covered body by the gods of blissfulness.

name: sheikh-a-1
detail: Hind Al Oud's iconic first creation  Sheikh A  is inspired by royalty. A deep and addictive fragrance  it begins with a unique blend of spicy notes that reveal the deep balsamic aroma of agarwood. Over time  the powerful  sweet scent of amber tells the story of an enduring ending and a profound beginning.

name: intense-so-iris-1
detail: Mesmerising florals mingle with precious woods and luxurious musks  enhancing the fragrance with elegance and sensuality.

name: lavande-ombree-1
brand: Au Pays de la Fleur d’Oranger
detail: Lively lavender is spiked with spice and cloaked in sensual notes in an unexpected take on this classic fougère. Musky and brooding  this is a contemporary fragrance that dares to be different with a light touch of highly fragrant flowers and the earthiness of green notes at the base.

name: bois-de-aoud-1
detail: Oud wood is celebrated through this rare Nejma oil  whilst simultaneously transmitting the character of the East.

name: east
detail: Embark on an olfactory journey like no other with East. Enchanting oud blends with raspberry  leather  and ambrox  crafting a scent of unrivaled allure. Exclusive to Harrods.

name: morning-dew-1
detail: Victorinox Morning Dew evokes the feeling of stepping onto dewy grass as the gentle warmth of dawn melts over your skin. Awaken your senses with the refined scent of a pure blend of citrus  white flowers and light musk. Appreciate the moment  feel revitalised. Each day begins with the promise of a new beginning.

name: hugo-jeans-1
detail: Calling out to rebels and rule-breakers  Hugo Jeans is a bold and carefree fragrance that transcends the seasons  for those who dare to go their own way.

name: noble-xxi-art-deco-blonde-amber-1
detail: A warm scent that tells the story of Art Deco decadence. A riot of flourishing florals and dried fruits join the melee of fine ingredients  creating an indulgent blend.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Tobacco Accord', 'Bitter Orange', 'Tonka Bean', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Osmanthus', 'Patchouli', 'Tuberose', 'Cocoa', 'Dried Fruits', 'Saffron', 'Sandalwood', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Cedarwood', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Ginger', 'Grapefruit', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Musk', 'Myrrh', 'Red Berries', 'Rum', 'Vanilla', 'Vetiver']

name: sophia-violet-1
detail: Brighten up a dull morning with the tantalizing fragrance of Sophia Violet  where the effervescence of youth adds that sublime feeling of invincibility even in the toughest of times. Top it off with citrus and fresh green notes and you've got a completely uplifting experience in a fragrance. A true companion in times of strife it may be  but then again why wait for a dull day when you can keep them at bay with Sophia Violet!

name: odyssey-mandarin-sky-2023
detail: This is a vibrant  fashionable scent with invigorating accords.

name: oud-cardamome-1
detail: Opening with Guatemalan cardamom and Moroccan artemisia  this fragrance reveals the perfect balance between the woody  sensual richness of oud and the smoky scent of Bulgarian tobacco absolute. It is the luminous trail of an impertinent fragrance with intense contrast.

name: mitsouko-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Jacques Guerlain named his creation “Mitsouko” after the name of the heroine in the bestselling novel of that time called La Bataille. Mitsouko  a beautiful married Japanese woman  secretly loves a British officer. In 1905  the Russo-Japanese war breaks out. Mitsouko awaits with dignity the outcome of the battle  nobly dominating her feelings. Mitsouko means "mystery" in Japanese and symbolizes passionate and mysterious femininity.

name: secret-attitude-star-1
detail: Become a superstar with a daring perfume. The perfect fragrance for your inner diva to take centre stage and be the true star.

name: fresh-festival-1
detail: She is determined and fun-loving. She asks you to join the party  even though she hardly knows you. She enjoys every performance in spectacular colour!

name: sable-fauve-1
detail: Sable Fauve is a sensual oriental  warm  deep fragrance full of mystery. As dusk falls with its copper and amber hues  Sable Fauve tells the mystery of burning and wild lands.

name: ben-sherman-gold-1
detail: Ben Sherman Gold is an exciting and timeless fragrance for men who enjoy the finer things in life.

name: wolverine-the-x-men
detail: Bold and sensual.

name: memoire-dune-odeur
detail: A universal scent linking the past and the present  to live and leave a lasting memory.

name: cuba-grey
detail: Cuba Grey is a luxurious and modern scent. Unmistakably masculine  Cuba Grey works well any time you want to boost your confidence and make a stylish statement. Splash it on before an intimate dinner date and enjoy its distinctive aroma all night long.

name: cedar-woodpecker-10
detail: For the men who are not afraid to show their addiction to woody notes. They are crazy about them; they could even eat them! Nothing matters but this woody  velvety and intense accord.

name: evening-rose
detail: An intriguing and seductive elixir. Sensual and luxurious  Evening Rose conveys a soft warmth  like the lingering memory of an unforgettable evening.

name: nativa-spa-orquidea-noire
detail: The Body Splash Nativa Spa Orquídea Noire is an explosion of sensuality that carries the mystery of the orchid in a nocturnal  modern  exotic  and luxurious perfume.

name: 901-muscade-amande-patchouli-1
detail: 901 Muscade Amande Patchouli is a sensual scent that highlights the blond wood  citrus fruits. This scent is suitable for the elegant man or sophisticated woman.

name: lavanda-1
detail: Inspired by attractive and delicate women  Lavender has the freshness of modern lavender  oozes personality and brings a pleasant sense of well-being.

name: jasmine-osmanthus-1
detail: Jasmine flowers growing on an apricot tree. A tribute to white flowers warmed up by hot sand.

name: muguet-2019
detail: Guerlain perpetuates the tradition of Muguet  a luxurious rendez vous that celebrates the arrival of spring. This limited and numbered edition that pays tribute to lily-of-the-valley's little good-luck charm bell.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: kirsch
detail: Kirsch evokes the twisting tension of a first date. A traditional sake headspace.

name: zegna-forte-1
detail: Zegna is the irresistible attraction of opposites and presents a unique combination of freshness and intense seduction.

name: eleventh-hour-1
detail: When oceans will rise  the highest places will be the last refuges and zones that were once considered hostile to humans will become shelters. Eleventh Hour is an exploration around the smell of things ending  a journey to the end of Time  the last perfume on Earth.

name: pure-sensual-orchid
detail: Pure Sensual Orchid stirs with pleasure the carnal aura of the original. Playing with materials as modern as they are precious  Pure Sensual Orchid generously reveals its curves. An intoxicating score if ever there was one  Pure Sensual Orchid takes the very essence of the original to the extreme: sensuality.

name: vanille-supermassive
detail: An incandescent scent with mysterious and majestic accords. Exclusive to Harrods.

name: libertine-ilk-1
detail: This scent story is set in a palazzo in Venice  home to Cassanova  the most famous libertine of all time. Lacking in moral principles  a sense of responsibility or sexual restraint. Dare you be in his presence?

name: chi
detail: Chi offers an adventurous journey into the exhilarating balance of some of the most precious and rare olfactory elements in the world of perfumery.

name: grapefruit-delight-intense
detail: Experience the freshness coming from sparkling sweet grapefruits.

name: cuir-patchouli
detail: Full of textured seduction  Cuir Patchouli recalls grained leather in a powerful presence.

name: myrrh-bean-1
detail: Myrrh & Bean is designed for all those who like to discover new opportunities and long for unforgettable moments full of excitement.

name: parco-palladiano-ix-violetta
detail: Parco Palladiano IX is inspired by the sensual violet flowers that bloom at sunset  in the shade of the centuries-old trees and exposed stones around the villa.

name: mica-doro-i-1
detail: An ode to pleasure and temptation. A hypnotic trail alternating between masculine and feminine  creating a wicked obsession.

name: queen-of-silk
detail: Queen of Silk embodies the richness and allure of silk  a symbol of luxury both then and now. Coveted since time immemorial  silk's rich colors and ethereal lightness cast a spell on all those who encounter it  leaving a trail of sensual allure that captivates the senses.

name: the-lonely-island
detail: The Lonely Island evokes a deserted forest exuding a dry and awe-inspiring atmosphere. The aroma of soil and fir is gradual  moist and delicate  purifying the heart.
ingredients: ['Earthy Notes', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Patchouli', 'Violet Leaves', 'Citruses', 'Pepper', 'Cedarwood', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Woody Notes', 'Pine Needles']

name: porsche-design-pure-50y-2022
detail: Porsche Design Pure 50Y combines a timeless fragrance creation made from innovative ingredients with a reduced  functional bottle design. An eau de toilette that represents masculine purism and exclusivity in its entirety. The perfect fragrance signature for the modern man.

name: ambre-eccentrico-1
detail: Ambre Eccentrico is a harmonious scent that indulges the senses in an eternal game of seduction.

name: iris-nobile-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: In this captivating new perfume from Acqua di Parma  the iris uses the entire fragrance pyramid to convey the vibrant impact of its velvety character.

name: cuoio-toscano
detail: A dry and bitter fragrance  the smell of fine leather. A well-dressed  classy man smoking a cigar in his tweed suit. Smoky and penetrating.

name: voyage-japanese-cherry-blossom-strawberry-kiss
detail: Our irresistibly fruity fragrance  Japanese Cherry Blossom Strawberry Kiss is infused with notes of juicy strawberries and Japanese cherry blossom petals.

name: luna-rossa-ocean
detail: Luna Rossa Ocean is a fantastic playground for reinventing the iconic territory of fresh fragrances  but in a very elegant and sophisticated way. Raw yet elegant  its fresh vitality is where the power of man meets the power of innovation.

name: cafe-1
detail: Café is a fragrance inspired by the aroma of Colombian coffee. A gourmand and elegant harmony.

name: 04n-74w-columbia
detail: In crisis-torn Colombia  blooms a unique explosion of colours and scents - a paradise garden. Among the various shades of green  tropical flowers  adopt every imaginable colour and shape.

name: rose-white-musk-absolu
detail: An English rose. Flowering in the heart of the Arabian desert. Unexpected. Mysterious. Enfolding with petal-fresh sweetness. Rich  soft and sensual. A mesmerising treasure.

name: union-square-andy-warhol-1
detail: “My favourite smell is the first smell of spring in New York  ” Andy Warhol. Andy Warhol's Union Square; a new level of sophistication.

name: eau-sublime
detail: As a tribute to her ancestors who made Maison Rancé world-famous  Jeanna Sandra Rancé has recreated this classic fragrance  under the name of Rue Rancé  the road in Grasse where the Rancé Family lived and had its perfume houses for centuries.

name: vanille-framboise
detail: This deliciously fruity fragrance transports you carefree to a sun-drenched garden on a beautiful summer's day.

name: boise-delicieux-oud-vanille-bourbon
detail: Boisé Délicieux is a scent full of mystery and sensuality evoking the secret of ancient forests  where the woods have accumulated the deep scents of rare orchids.

name: 2060-cedar-pulp-1
detail: Imagine 2060  and be surprised. A perfume between classicism and modernity.

name: serena
detail: "1993. The mountain as a background  the snow out of the window  the fireplace  and my grandfather seated a rocking chair smoking his cigar. The room was cosy: it was there I fell in love with the fireplace. He was swinging  waiting for me to read a fairytale: I used to sit on his immense legs fascinated by him. I still have the smoky smell in my nose combined with the smoky wood in the fireplace. It was the last time I’d ever seen him and I could recognise that smell around one thousand smells " Roberta Cerizza  Founder.

name: cedar-malaki-1
detail: Cedar Malaki is a tribute to the majestic cedar wood  symbol of eternity  king of the forests.

name: fleur-dorchidee-1
detail: "For this creation  I remembered a lovely summer's day  the warmth of the sun on my skin mingling with the fresh sea air." - Emilie Bevierre-Coppermann  Perfumer

name: udv-wild
detail: UDV Wild is a sensual and powerful signature fragrance with a vibrant and wild intensity. UDV Wild  the fragrance of adventure.

name: viva-la-juicy-rose-1
detail: "The fragrance is like a burst of femininity. Like the tiny bubbles in champagne  it is an elegant celebration " Honorine Blanc-Hattab  Perfumer.

name: acqua-nobile-gelsomino
detail: Small and elegant white petals form minute corollas that vibrate impalpably in the breeze  circled by shiny bright green leaves: such is the beauty of the impressive yet delicate jasmine. A fragrance of outstanding quality whose every nuance reveals an aristocratic femininity.

name: gelsomino-nobile-1
detail: A tribute to the "King of Flowers"  Calabrian jasmine is the noble ingredient used in this classic perfume. A unique and elegant fragrance for the modern woman who knows how to savour life.

name: a-floral-verse
detail: A Floral Verse incarnates the ancestral art of curating tea  preciously and slowly  with the finest tea leaves from Sri Lanka  made to liberate extraordinary flavours. Live the magic of an extraordinary blooming tea into a golden chalice.

name: roma-fiori-bianchi
detail: A fresh and exhilarating scent created for women who use tradition as a starting point for their evolution: strong  independent  cosmopolitan  romantic  yet self-aware. These women have a trace of eternity in their hearts and on their skin.

name: cedre-sambac
detail: It is said that cedars know history better than history itself. The Greeks made statues of them  the Romans sculpted their gods from them. Deeply rooted in the sacred earth of this world  a supple jasmine embraces it.

name: today-tomorrow-always-the-moment-for-him
detail: Go back in time with your love and experience a precious moment with each other. Today Tomorrow Always the Moment for Him lets you relive that feeling over and over again with just a whiff. ​

name: cardamom-mimosa-1
detail: Cardamon & Mimosa is a very sensual and addictive fragrance that will make you and those around you fall in love.

name: cypres-du-pays-de-grasse-et-de-citron-ditalie
detail: Cyprès du pays de Grasse et de Citron d'Italie is an olfactory journey created from exceptional ingredients selected from around the Mediterranean to create a refreshing and sublime fragrance.

name: harrods-amber
detail: Harrods AmberA fragrance shared between men and women that perfectly conveys the elegance and style of London  the cosmopolitan capital of the world. Velvety and confident  Harrods Amber is as seductive as a glass of single malt.

name: acqua-di-gioia-jasmine
detail: Exhilarating. Delicate. Acqua di Gioia's signature jasmine heart pulses with fresh  new energy. Its greenest facets are celebrated in a new and vital essence of joy. Green is the colour of nature  endlessly nuanced from verdant forests to cool waters  from tender greens  luminous after a summer rain  to the intense  fathomless greens of a restless sea  each vibrating with life.

name: essencial-mirra-feminino-1
detail: A magnificent encounter with myrrh. A gift from kings  farmed myrrh comes from the east. And from the Amazon  we bring this rare and unprecedented resin  so precious that it became known as mirra brasileria. Essencial Mirra Feminino emerges from this encounter.

name: english-pear-freesia-1
detail: Orchards steeped in golden sunshine  warming the russet curves of luscious pears. The sensuous freshness of the just-ripe fruit wrapped in elegant white freesias  enhanced with rose and rooted in patchouli.

name: nina-illusion
detail: Enter another dimension with Nina Illusion  a colourful fragrance that invites you to step out of the ordinary to live an extraordinary experience. Infused with an irresistible touch of enchantment  this floral fruity chypre fragrance is an invitation to enter its extraordinary universe and reveal your part of magic.

name: pearwood-osmanthus-1
detail: A natural  refreshing scent to use all summer long.

name: tobacco-oud-intense
detail: Tobacco Oud Intense is a richly designed fragrance that is full of luxury and the highest quality ingredients. It is a composition that reflects the very roots of the perfume  a word that literally means "through smoke"  and celebrates the mesmerising sensuality of smoke and the rich potency of oud.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Tonka Bean', 'Coriander', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Castoreum', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Patchouli', 'Raspberry']

name: devotion
detail: Generous and indulgent with a zest for life  Devotion is a tantalising sensation that evokes love for life.

name: beton-brut
detail: Concrete and poetic. Raw beauty. A house as fragrance. Material transition. Exterior becomes interior. Form follows emotion. Emotion follows the senses. A scent like a bed of clouds nestling against wide windows. When massive walls touch the damp earth. Deep green meets hard edges. A modern perfume. Elegant  striking and perfectly shaped.

name: molecule-01-1
detail: Molecule 01 is composed of a single ingredient. It brings an indefinable glow to the wearer. In fact  its effect is almost pheromonic. It is fragrance at its most radical.

name: sun-1
detail: What is your favourite moment in the Sun - is it when you stretch out on the sand  turn your face towards the sun and let its golden light stream through your eyelids  when you finally shed the warm wool and replace it with cool cotton  enjoying its cool caress on your bare skin  or the first time you have a coffee on the terrace  while the sun's rays filter through the still-pale leaves of the trees?
ingredients: ['Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine', 'Patchouli', 'Orange Blossom', 'Vanilla', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Violet', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood']

name: aquavibe-raspberry-1
detail: Aquavibe Raspberry is a radiant and refreshing fragrance that will transport you to a perfect summer day  wherever you are and whatever you are doing.

name: pepe-rosa-e-pera
detail: An olfactory balance with spicy facets: a pink pepper accord blends gently with the fruity notes of freshly cut pear.

name: yasep-1
detail: "Sandalwood oil is like the stones  something eternal from the earth. We take the beauty of nature  put it in a bottle  and offer it to our clients. Yasep's personality is very noble and distinctive; it transports you to another world. It is also demonstrative of the beautiful artistry of perfumery: you put culture in a bottle  on a journey around the world  just as Bvlgari does with stones ” Jacques Cavallier  Perfumer.

name: rosa-di-filare-kimono-rose-1
detail: A sophisticated bouquet created to express timeless elegance and femininity. Fine citrus melds with the vivacity of berries. The top notes evolve into a sensual floral heart  where this elegance merges with preciousness. The warm base notes embrace femininity to underline this unique fragrance.

name: victorias-secret-angel-dream-1
detail: Capture the glamour and excitement of the catwalk with our vibrant and dazzling new fragrance. This luxurious EdP envelops the skin in a captivating scent of lacy florals  iridescent berries and pure woods.
ingredients: ['Violet', 'White Currant', 'Sandalwood', 'Amber', 'Heliotrope', 'Jasmine', 'Peach Blossom', 'Rose', 'Water Lily', 'Benzoin', 'Cucumber', 'Limoncello', 'Plum', 'Strawberry Leaf', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Tonka Bean', 'Green Apple', 'Mandarin (China)', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Apple', 'Cedarwood', 'Green Notes', 'Melon', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Praline', 'Rice', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Watery']

name: osmanto-oud
detail: Inspired by one of the finest and most refined raw materials in the world of perfumery  Oud wood is an ingredient whose secret charm is linked to the cultural tradition of the Middle East.

name: sophie-la-girafe-eau-de-soin-parfumee
detail: A soothing floral fragrance. The scent of childhood.

name: vetiver-tonka
detail: "Initially used in fragrances for women and  with time  in fragrances for men  the unrefined  rough  earthy scent of vetiver appealed to me. I had to appropriate and reinvent it. I wanted a tender  enveloping  warm vetiver. What it needed was Tonka bean! With its caramel  praline and blonde tobacco notes  Tonka bean draped vetiver in softness and gave its woody notes a mellow roundness " Jean-Claude Ellena  perfumer.

name: petite-cherie-eau-de-toilette
detail: A mother gazes at her daughter  pondering all that she desires to pass on to her. Petite Chérie is a fragrance of infinite love between a mother and daughter. Camille was 23 when Annick Goutal created it for her. Now one of the House’s signature scents  Petite Chérie is the fragrance we offer to those we love.

name: une-ville-un-parfum-new-york
detail: New York  New York! How many films  books and lyrics have sung the praises of the city where anything is possible? A land of dreams and pioneers  the Big Apple welcomes your deepest desires and craziest ambitions.

name: oud-5
detail: Rooted in classic ingredients  Oud by Rag & Bone introduces a curious twist on an iconic scent. Imagine ancient woods enveloped in exotic spices and smooth leather.

name: rhum-tabac
detail: A strong and elegant fragrance that combines the aroma of the Rum arranged with spices  and the woody scent of Tobacco leaves. A rather masculine fragrance thanks to its power and density  an ode to the Cuban ambience from the '60s.

name: ruby-rush
detail: With a sleek silhouette and bold attitude  Ruby Rush is a symbol of lust and power that draws attention for all to see and admire.

name: iris-de-syracuse
detail: Iris de Syracuse is a vibrant and elegant floral  inspired by the sunny and rugged lands of Sicily.

name: luiza-brunet-poderosa-1
detail: Poderosa expresses all the success  beauty  and exuberance of Luiza Brunet. A fragrance with an exclusive personality.

name: citrus-riviera-1
detail: Leaving Paris  heading south  I arrive at Cap d'Antibes. In the white house  I rediscover those forgotten sensations: the breeze cooling the veranda  the warmth of the steps leading to the garden  the turquoise water glistening in the pool. I lie under the lemon trees  in the shade  and glance up at the blue sky  where some clouds wander  lost.

name: junoon-leather-pour-femme
detail: Junoon Leather pour Femme fragrance is a unique and elegant symbol for a chic modern woman.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Saffron', 'Patchouli', 'Citruses', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Amber', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Sandalwood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Tonka Bean']

name: acqua-di-parma-osmanthus
detail: Osmanthus is a sun-filled interpretation of the flower's deep and sensual notes. An artistic combination that takes you to the rock forests of South East Asia where the elusive flower blooms with a rich and powerful fragrance.

name: tous-your-powers-1
detail: An olfactory whirlwind  just like you  that sweeps everything in its path  as addictive as you are!

name: patchoulight-1
detail: Patchoulight brings the depth of woods in this powerful scent  with floral elements of violet and iris absolute that highlight the deep green character of the fragrance.

name: peach-fields
detail: Take hold of life’s sweet moments with Peach Fields. There is something quite special about the plentiful harvest of a new season. As the fruit of your labour manifests itself  you can't help but look forward to the future with positivity and gratitude. Let the sun kiss your skin with the sweet joy of the present.

name: nina-christmas-collector-edition-2022-1
detail: A modern fairy tale with a festive bottle to celebrate the end of the year.

name: pear-peony-intense
detail: The joy of juicy pear with a dash of delicate peony.  Pear & Peony Intense opens with the freshness of citruses  mixed with delicious fruits. The heart of the fragrance takes you to a summer garden overflowing with enchanting peonies. The warmth of the base notes meets cool green touches to create the most unexpected signature.

name: ambre-sublime
detail: Thought to affect our sensitivity and artistic inclinations  the scent of Amber remains faithful to its feminine personality  sensuous  modern  bewitching. It's no surprise that this fragrance wears its name  and nothing else!

name: replica-from-the-garden
detail: From the Garden is an uplifting unisex perfume that evokes the joyful feeling of a sunny afternoon spent in the garden. The grounding sensation of placing one’s hands in the earth  the pleasure of picking ripe  juicy tomatoes  the buzz of bees in the air.

name: girl-blooming-2022
detail: A limited edition with 100 per cent good vibes  guaranteed. A unique experience  concentrated in pure joy  for a sisterhood that cultivates happiness every day and does what it takes to see the world in a better light. Answer the call of springtime and celebrate your deepest nature: joyful  luminous  harmonious!

name: grey-vetiver-parfum
detail: A bolder iteration of the original scent  Grey Vetiver Parfum is inspired by Tom Ford's impeccable tailoring and styling.

name: bergamotto-italia
detail: Bergamotto Italia is like a fresh and sparkling water  tonic and dynamic  an ode to happiness and naturality. The scent lets you discover all the fragrant juice of the pulp and fruit for an exclusive bergamot experience.

name: autumn-drive
detail: Autumn Drive smells like a sunny  windows-down ride through the colourful American countryside.

name: humor-on-line-feminino
detail: An innovative fragrance that celebrates life and exudes mood. With a touch of pitanga  an ingredient of Brazilian biodiversity. Online Humor arouses excitement and invites you to experience a whirlwind of positive emotions.

name: good-girl-gone-bad-15-years-2022
detail: Kilian celebrates its 15th anniversary with a limited edition collection for the holiday season  with a special design inspired by the Eiffel Tower  a tribute to Kilian's French heritage. Half innocent  half voluptuous  the precious accords that open the fragrance are met by the ultimate temptress: an explosion of the three flower essences: tuberose absolute  jasmine and narcissus.

name: police-to-be-freetodare-for-woman
detail: This fragrance seduces with its explosive femininity. An impressive explosion of vitality  designed for daring women who like to break the mould.

name: noir-eau-de-toilette
detail: Tom Ford Noir Eau de Toilette is defined by sophisticated contrast. By accentuating the tension between its fresh and creamy aspects  Noir maintains the compelling sensuality while revealing another  even more dynamic facet of this urbane sophisticate.

name: concentre-de-pamplemousse-rose-1
detail: The sustained freshness of grapefruit  nuanced with rose petals  endorsed with full-bodied vetiver.

name: tonka-amande-absolue
detail: Very comfortable  made of enveloping oriental notes  this sweet fragrance finds its softness in sugary facets with delicate spicy accents.

name: nivea-sun
detail: A bright  luminous and captivating scent  suitable for men and women.

name: mirage-world-bright
detail: A fragrance that breaks standards  fresh and sophisticated. The delicacy of a bouquet is finely worked down to the last detail.

name: osmanthus-blossom
detail: Delicately exotic. This white flower captures the duality of stone fruit counterpoised with supple leather. Luminous flowers and blossoms ripple over voluptuous woody notes.

name: assam-grapefruit
detail: The lively  full-bodied aroma of a cup of tea in the morning. An explosion of citrus. An unfurling black tea note  infused with spice and the warmth of patchouli.

name: oscar-blue-orchid
detail: Floral fresh scent with fruity nuances.

name: oud-yuzu-forte
detail: In a deep  dense forest  the trees rise majestically in the twilight. Late in the day  in the setting sun  a ray cuts through the foliage  bathing the darkness in a dazzling light. A moment of pure grace  captured by the Guerlain Perfumers in a deeply mysterious woody citrus.

name: replica-on-a-date-1
detail: On a Date is an exciting fragrance inspired by a magical date on a late summer evening overlooking the magnificent vineyards of Provence at sunset.

name: loewe-solo-ella-elixir
detail: Transgressive and modern  Loewe Solo Elixir reveals delicate notes that combine floral accords with spices and woods.

name: labdanum-18-1
detail: This fragrance is an enigma… It simply doesn't conform to any of the laws of perfumery. A strong concentration of oriental notes  with animal intonations of civet and castoreum  it remains a perfume that's discrete on your skin even though everything's combined to make it a power bomb… Listen to it whisper to your nose and to the senses of those allowed to get close to your skin… Once you start  you won't be able to stop listening.

name: gucci-guilty-intense-1
detail: Gucci Guilty Intense. The love affair continues. Too much can never be enough for the Gucci Guilty woman  who dares herself to embrace ever more powerful sensations.

name: lambre-antique
detail: An extraordinary  elegant and sensual creation.

name: epices-exquises
detail: A sublimely surprising contrast between warmth and freshness and the explosion of noble spices leave an exquisite scent on the skin.

name: opium-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A mythical fragrance  symbol of extreme femininity  Opium represents a quest for the absolute on the edge of luxurious elegant eroticism. An empire for the senses  it encourages to stop time  break the rules and taboos to give free reign to mystery  dreams  and imagination. Beyond time and borders  it is a voyage to a symbolic  enigmatic and multi-faceted elsewhere. Losing oneself in its magic is a heady experience.

name: halfeti-7
detail: So this is love. A mysterious and intoxicating fragrance: refreshing grapefruit  Levantine spices and rose entangled in the moonlight. But what's that on the riverbank - could it be the legendary black rose?

name: shalimar-eau-de-parfum
detail: Shalimar  the first great fragrance of the oriental family and a true pioneer in terms of olfactory composition  was created by Jacques Guerlain in 1925. Today  it is one of the most appreciated fragrances in the world. Voluptuous  sensual  audacious  the ultimate provocation  Shalimar awakens passions beyond the limits of forbidden desire.

name: fables-dorient-1
detail: A miraculous floral milk with a benevolent vibration.

name: babylon-7
detail: Discovery of iniquity or majestic wonder of the ancient world? No matter: the scent of Babylon is simply divine. Warm vanilla  distinguished cedar and decadent saffron. Some mysteries are best left unsolved.

name: rose-cannelle
detail: Treasures of the Damascena rose. Fruity  honeyed  and opulent it whisks away into a spicy heart of Sri Lanka cinnamon and ends its journey in the tender  leathery heat of ambery balsams and woods. A fragrance with captivating charisma  powerful yet delicate.

name: sublime-tonka
detail: Sublime Tonka opens with an enticing blend of balsamic and spicy notes. This intriguing overture gives way to a complex  textured composition that seamlessly blends aromatic  ambery and oriental nuances. But this is only a prelude to the deep  warm and generous tonka bean root note that gives the fragrance its name.

name: a-la-rose-1
detail: À la Rose is an ode to femininity  a declaration of love translated into fragrance. Two hundred and fifty freshly blossomed roses from Grasse offer their incomparable richness to each bottle.

name: violette-6
detail: Exceptional and gourmand  this perfume provides a delicious sensation  as if time were suspended. The olfactory spell pours out into dreams of evasion.

name: nymphea-lumiere-2021
detail: An exceptional work of art  full of light and colour  expressing the same techniques used by the famous Monet.

name: char
detail: A smoky  enticing fragrance.

name: amber-musk-1
detail: “Amber Musk is a warm  inviting scent you want to wrap yourself in  like a soft cosy blanket on a cold snowy night ” Aerin Lauder  Founder.
ingredients: ['Ambrox (Ambergris)', 'Musk', 'Coconut Milk', 'Sandalwood', 'Benzoin (Siam)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Praline', 'Rose Centifolia', 'Magnolia Leaves']

name: la-opale
detail: La Opale  the unsaid desire.

name: 2-citrus-wood-suede-leather
detail: High quality and luxury notes combine to create this elegant perfume  suitable for men and women.

name: un-bois-vanille
detail: In 1519  in the city of Texcoco  capital of the Aztec empire  Hernán Cortés was introduced to a sparkling drink with which he fell in love. This drink was a mixture of vanilla  cocoa and spices. Two years passed. Among the fabulous treasures brought back to Spain was a collection of vanilla pods. The familiar black  natural  rich and syrupy vanilla was transformed into a powdery  comforting and enveloping aroma.

name: tobacco-honey
detail: With Tobacco Honey  Guerlain pays homage to a mysterious and little-known ingredient in perfumery: tobacco. A sulphurous material  raw tobacco is revealed in harmony and reveals its most beautiful facets on contact with honey. A contrasting olfactory tension between the golden light of honey and the bewitching vibrancy of the tobacco accord.

name: neroli-a-la-cardamome-du-guatemala-1
detail: The citrus freshness of Neroli contrasts with a heart of spicy Cardamom  awakening the senses in a delicate play of sensual contrasts.

name: fig-infusion-by-nathalie-lorson
detail: "I imagined a luminous fragrance  full of joy and pleasure. The evocative scent of an afternoon dreaming in the orchard  comfortably settled under the fig trees"  Nathalie Lorson  Perfumer.

name: black-currant-rose
detail: Black Currant Rose may help open the heart chakra and encourage communication with its notes of berries and voluptuous roses.

name: paul-smith-extreme-for-men-1
detail: Paul Smith is the brilliant designer of a style that has a very distinctive identity combining tradition with ingenuity and humor. The perfume Paul Smith Extreme for Men is a classic concept with a "twist" uniquely marrying refinement with derision and sobriety with extravagance. The brand's main hallmark is its famous "multi-stripes" that give a powerful image of seduction.

name: ambre-imperial-1
detail: "I created Ambre Impérial to be the perfect combination of several essences that symbolise the Orient  the legendary and historic cradle of perfume. I carefully selected precious ingredients that  for me  evoke the quintessence of true amber  a blend of sweet  spicy and slightly animalic sensations." - Quentin Bisch  Perfumer

name: violet-musc
detail: Immersed in the romance of Violet  it is a dreamy  delicate and floral bounty infused with voluptuous notes. Reminiscent of fresh summer garden  this fragrance is as feminine as it is daring.

name: jasmine-musk
detail: Mesmerising in its simplicity  a fragrance free of all excess  Jasmine Musk is an ode to the captivating power of a legendary ingredient and a celebration of the perfumer's art. Crafted with a couturier's attention to detail  Musk Pure is  in essence  a sublime composition of two musk notes cleverly balanced by supporting notes chosen to bring out the warm sensuality of musk.

name: oranges-and-lemons-say-the-bells-of-st-clements-1
detail: "This is of course a perfume about Englishness and London in particular. Having lived in France for so long I thought it would be great to do a perfume that I consider to be typically English. I think an eau de cologne worn by a girl can be so chic " James Heeley.

name: light-blue-summer-vibes-2023
detail: Light Blue Summer Vibes captures the dream of a romantic escape to Capri.

name: amaretto-framboise-poudree
detail: Sweet and fruity with hints of vanilla  Amaretto & Framboise Poudrée is a real treat.

name: pomelo-2
detail: “Pomelo is clean and crisp; it's my best friend made up of memories and moments. It's that feeling of fresh linen sheets or a glass of bubbling fizzy water with a slice of lime and lots of crushed ice. I spray Pomelo into my skin a couple of times when I go into the office when I'm out and about and again before lunch or cocktails. Like me  Pomelo has a masculine side to it  it's confident and sharp ” Love Jo x.

name: peony-peppercorn
detail: If you like a mix of flowers and spices  Peony & Peppercorn is the perfect fragrance for you this season.

name: daisy-eau-so-fresh-paradise-1
detail: Capturing the free-spirited allure of a sunset walk through a field of blooming flowers in a phenomenal landscape  Daisy Eau So Fresh Paradise is a harmonious blend of graceful and soft accords.

name: rose-goldea-2
detail: A tribute to the supreme femininity of the golden goddess. Rose Goldea evokes the seductiveness  fascination and impassioned loves of Cleopatra. The Serpent  a symbol of eternity and life  is powerful and captivating. They shared the same divine aura  the same great desire for power.

name: la-fille-de-lair-iris
detail: Iridescent  marine and luminous. La Fille de l’Air becomes more sophisticated with a note of salted iris. Delicate and chic but as free and cheeky as ever!

name: natura-homem-essence
detail: For the man who impresses and knows where he wants to go without fear of being himself. The mystery is wrapped in his gaze  drawing attention to himself. Complete  he is unanimous in the unforgettable item. Courageous  he surrenders body and soul. He knows he's incomparable because he's you.

name: leather-22
detail: Is there anything as strangely addictive as the scent of leather? Our perfumers have re-created the distinguished and luxurious smell of leather by blending natural and synthetic materials.

name: precious-pink-jasmine
detail: Indulgent and discover Precious Pink Jasmine  Trish McEvoy's arresting  irrepressible  a lavish composition that boldly balances a profusion of citrus oils with sumptuous florals and warm  sensual undertones.

name: girl-life
detail: Girl Life isn’t just a perfume  it’s a wave of positive energy. A fragrance that inspires joy and makes you want to relish every moment. An invitation to party through life. Wholeheartedly. Channelling that chic Maison Rochas style.

name: sisterland-blue-neroli
detail: Colors  unite and create! Blue Neroli is a contagiously upbeat  original fragrance. Inspiring  fun  and unique  it already feels like she’s your best friend.

name: cuir-ylang
detail: The fragrance celebrates the essence of Ylang-Ylang for an intoxicating yet harmonious blend similar to smooth leather.

name: yuzu-marmalade
detail: Our travels to the Republic of South Korea exposed us to this traditional Korea treat. The gift of a homemade batch inspired us to make this fragrance.

name: ligno-1
detail: When the ‘’devilish’’ patchouli meets the "pheromonal" grey amber  the result is beyond a perfume  it becomes an alchemists potion with an aphrodisiacal promise.

name: cherry-blossom-millesime-2023-1
detail: Each spring  in homage to the Hanami ritual in Japan  the fresh and floral Cherry Blossom fragrance returns with an exceptional  limited and numbered edition. For its precious 2023 Vintage  Guerlain entrusted the magical adornment of its Flacon aux Abeilles to Ateliers Vermont  a prestigious Parisian embroidery house. As for the scent  it captures the fleeting and dazzling beauty of the cherry trees in spring.

name: madeira-branca-1
detail: This fragrance was an echo of Brazilian architecture: strong and modern  always responding to nature. The aim was to bring freshness and warmth at the same time. It is a woody fragrance  sometimes invigorating  sometimes welcoming.

name: the-kull-gold-2023
detail: The $kull scent is created to evoke a luxurious and sexy olfactive tattoo  leaving a powerful and addictive imprint on the skin. For this limited edition  the iconic black lacquered glass bottle is covered in opulent gold for the most luxurious experience.

name: mon-oranger-1
detail: Mon Oranger is a long love story  a passion for this magnificent white flower  the orange blossom  whose fragrance fills the hills of Grasse. Imagined as a fervent love letter  its perfume is intoxicating and powerful.

name: ptisenbon-eau-de-toilette
detail: The first perfume of life. Very soft and tender  Ptisenbon Eau de Toilette plays with cuddly and light notes to the delight of young children.

name: orchidee-vanille
detail: In Asia  exotic orchids are often associated with the idea of beauty. The exquisite bean of one such orchid  Vanilla planifolia  nests inside an elegant black pod. Falsely discreet  it is soft  languid  gentle and intoxicating. The perfumer wanted a vanilla warmth that was not too sugary  but sweet like candied almond. Joyful  fruity harmonies magnify the floral heart and melt into a multi-faceted vanilla  tender and warm  cradled in a dreamy musk. Feminine and sensual  absolute and bewitching.

name: peau-de-peche
detail: Peau de Pêche is as tender and gentle as a caress of a Japanese white peach wrapped in a veil of orris and sandalwood. A truly Japanese perfume.

name: silky-woods-elixir
detail: Dark and excessive  Silky Woods Elixir is a smoky reawakening of the Australian agarwood originally used in Silky Woods eau de parfum. For true connoisseurs.

name: greenley
detail: A fresh and fruity interpretation of cashmere wood.

name: monocle-scent-four-yoyogi
detail: Yoyogi was inspired by early morning jogs in and around Tokyo's Yoyogi Park with its damp  sweet  and green notes. We see this fragrance that adds a cosy hint to the winter months and a bit of coolness in summer.

name: extract-of-limes-1
detail: Bright green bursts of life-force charge from the tangy sharpness of tropical Limes  while vibrant citrus flashes allow a gentleman's mind to surge with the majesty of life. And as every pore is infused with the zing and zest of freshly squeezed citrus  an exhilarating thrill is marvellously bestowed.

name: rosemary-ginger
detail: A unisex fragrance  Rosemary & Ginger is a fresh  clarifying and seductive scent.

name: orange-blossom-10
detail: A fragrance that reflects the floral  honeyed scent of orange groves in blossom. Wearing this eau de toilette is like going from the shade of a grove to the warmth of the sun. I wonder where I left my Panama hat?

name: coven-1
detail: Inspired by a body of the artist's work deeply rooted in her early fascination with the mysterious dark corridors of the supernatural world. Coven is a journey through the secrets and enchantments of the forest and folklore.

name: bergamot
detail: Bergamot is a seductive fragrance with precious facets of aromatic spices and sweet accords. It is part of the Museum collection  which uses classic European and Asian raw materials and olfactory families  reminiscent of an old perfumer's library of fragrances.

name: acqua-di-cuba
detail: The Acqua di Cuba fragrance by Santa Maria Novella owes its name to the place of origin of its ingredients.

name: cedro-di-calabria-calabrian-citron-1
detail: How to describe the scent of summer? The crisp morning air  the wind full of fruity aromas  the bright light? With this joyful and vibrant fragrance!

name: vert-pivoine
detail: A composition that is both simple and sophisticated  a fragrance that captures nature in a spontaneous  lively  and radiant fragrance.

name: musk-neo-evolution-1
detail: Each conquest a new emotion.

name: absoluto-homme
detail: Absolute Fiorucci is remarkable and unique and will complement the personality of the independent man  who lives by his own rules.

name: paris-eau-de-toilette
detail: A seducing fragrance for an elegant  joyful and refined woman who embodies the contemporary romanticism. A brilliant harmony around the rose.

name: elixir-precieux-ambre
detail: Uncommon ingredients  bold olfactory statements and a creation that knows no limits. This collection reflects the freedom that only true luxury can provide.

name: bogart
detail: Bogard by Jacques Bogart is a dynamic masculine fragrance for today's elegant and modern gentleman.

name: suede-breeze-1
detail: "Unbridled freshness combined with the warmth of leather " Serge de Oliveira  Perfumer.

name: eau-de-mandarine-ambree-1
detail: "I don't know of a more cheerful smell than mandarin  a more velvety one than amber." Jean-Claude Ellena

name: jasminum-sambac
detail: In creating this fragrance  Louise Turner thought of what she considers the most beautiful jasmine sambac of all: the one she smelled on Mother's Day in Bangkok  where it is a favourite gift for that special occasion. The delicate  velvety jasmine petals  as if pearled with dewdrops  bring softness and sunshine to a bouquet.

name: tobacco-absolute-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Rain-splashed tobacco plants dot plots of ruby soil. A nutmeg spiced haze engulfs deeply furrowed fields. Tobacco leaves hang like pendants in open-sided barns; their vast furling forms striking and redolent with sticky  deep mahogany. Enrich your life with olfactory tradition.

name: rhum-dhiver
detail: The love story. A charming memory not to forget. The sound of a woman's footsteps entering a man's life. The meeting after the waiting. The man lets her go. He is left alone. His thoughts go to her as he carries his Rhum D'Hiver. Unforgettable  like all love stories.

name: c-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: "This perfume creates a feeling of confidence and energetic energy  which becomes an attraction for those around you. This is the effect of this particular molecular formulation"  Azzi Glasser  Olfactory Director and Perfumer.

name: xi-lheure-perdue
detail: Imagine it were possible  as a time traveller  to entre l'Heure Perdue: the lost hour in which we could once again share the pleasure of a long-forgotten childhood treat. Ah  that exquisite softness that flows from all our childhoods  from a universal memory.

name: new-york-musk
detail: Finally: An alpha perfume for New York - Bond No. 9 New York Musk. It's part of our Notes series for serious connoisseurs  but that doesn't stop it from having a carnal intelligence.

name: daisy-eau-so-fresh-pop-2024
detail: A juicy and surprising combination of lime and raspberry.

name: black-caviar
detail: With great flourish and a fanfare of flutes  drums and trumpets  Emperor Severus served caviar to the most revered guests in garlands of roses. This fragrance is a celebration of opulence. Complex  harmonious and surprising.

name: 602-poivre-cedre-patchouli-1
detail: 602 POIVRE CÈDRE PATCHOULI is a scent of fresh Southern spices  to create a classic comfortable mystery.

name: cross-the-line-explicit-1
detail: Puma Cross the line Explicit Eau de Toilette is an exciting fragrance for men.

name: ambre-narguile
detail: "Amber  the Western expression of Eastern fragrances  has a warm  enveloping  almost carnal smell. I wanted to imbue this idea of amber with the memory of the East I love where tobacco - blended with the smells of fruit  honey and spices - is smoked in narguilés  or water pipes  and where swirls of smoke diffuse a sweet sense of intoxication.” Jean-Claude Ellena  perfumer
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Benzoin', 'Vanilla', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Candied Orange', 'Caramel', 'Honey', 'Leather', 'Musk', 'Sesame', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Cinnamon', 'Rum']

name: peau-1
detail: Peau is the olfactive restoration of the human body  a sublime epitaph through our sense of smell. Its soft cruelty lies in its evocation of youth  thus life  which by nature is impermanent. From top  heart and base notes  it includes in itself the promise of the full spectrum of life  from beginning to end.
ingredients: ['Ambergris', 'White Pepper', 'Musk', 'Woody Notes', 'Ambermax (Woody ambery)', 'Coriander', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Clary Sage']

name: musk-oud-1
detail: Musk Oud is an exotic oud fragrance that is at once powerful and elegant  complicated and comfortable  bold and captivating.

name: phy-social
detail: Phy Social is one way of taking your party with you  wherever you go.

name: hiris
detail: Hiris  a sensitive watercolour that tells the tale of the freshness of dawn and the cool beauty of iris with its powdery elegance.

name: christmas-tree-1
detail: The Library of Fragrance captures the Christmas spirit and evokes memories of Christmases past  any time of year. Delight family and friends with this comforting and refreshing scent.

name: the-classic
detail: An addictively crisp and masculine interpretation of floral  amber and wood blends  this scent mirrors the idealised classic gentlemen.

name: rose-par-essence-1
detail: Extremely rich in natural ingredients  Rose Par Essence is luminous and fusing. the perfect complement for daily use.

name: viride
detail: The creator borrowed a quote by Guido Ceronetti "The parts where it's smell are those where it collects more blood." Gualtieri. This scent speaks to the senses and 'live' on the skin by agreeing with the instinct of the wearer.

name: osmanthus-2
detail: Osmanthusa delicacy from elsewhere  brought from China in traditional pots. Treasure of perfumers  inspiration of tales and legends  the Osmanthus flower penetrates hearts with a tender feeling of sweetness  voluptuousness and nostalgia.

name: the-blend-cardamom
detail: A sophisticated fragrance that brings the perfect contrast between warmth and freshness!

name: lime-sands
detail: Reminiscent of a tasty and refreshing margarita in a bottle  Lime Sands invites you to get lost in paradise and soak up the sun.
ingredients: ['Lime', 'Sea Water', 'Coconut Milk', 'Verbena', 'Driftwood', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Orange Blossom', 'Vanilla']

name: tobacco-woods-nights
detail: "Tobacco Wood Nights is an ambery fragrance that redifines a pure and intense masculinity  through an impressive sophisticated sillage " Serge de Oliveira  Perfumer.

name: lame-dun-heros-coriolan
detail: 'L'Âme d'Un Héros' The Soul of a Hero  pays homage to the legendary Roman General Coriolanus  who inspired Shakespeare and Beethoven as well as Plutarch.

name: 001-fleur-doranger-petit-grain-bergamote-1
detail: Eternal Cologne with floral notes. Fresh and energising.

name: this-is-him-undressed-1
detail: A vibrant  powerful and even more sensual version of the original This is Him!

name: oud-imperial
detail: Hidden within the lush forests of South-East Asia  oud is truly the regales of all extracts. The spicy and sensual scent is rich in composition  perfect for those that are ready to make a statement.

name: wisteria-sublime-2021
detail: A floral masterpiece  blooming with rich textures and depth  it transports you to Monet's famous Giverny Bridge.

name: broken-theories
detail: The dark corners of a room seem to crawl and stretch as midnight clouds steal the last remnants of moonlight. Memories of smouldering dreams are lost in your mind. Ruminating the scent of mystery and nightfall  the fire you passed through hangs in the air  the spices of anguish linger on your skin. Sure  you know that morning will come  the darkness will dissipate and the theory that everything is still dreadful will shatter and shatter.

name: aquavibe-lemon
detail: Freshen up in an instant and wake up your senses with Aquavibe Lemon.

name: stercus-1
detail: The creator borrowed a quote from Guido Ceronetti: "The parts where it smells are those where it collects the most blood". Gualtieri. This perfume speaks to the senses and "lives" on the skin by matching the wearer's instinct.

name: mythique-lime-mandarin
detail: This scent is the perfect combination of freshness and warmth. Its light scent will leave all those around you in awe.

name: skye
detail: A distinctive bouquet made from a stunning blend of eleven essences in total.

name: vanilla-era
detail: This is your Vanilla Era  embrace it. A scent of innocence and subversion  where vanilla is anything but beige. Heads will turn  and hearts will break as this scent reigns for days  months  and years.
ingredients: ['Vanilla', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Tulip', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Papyrus', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Saffron', 'Beetroot', 'Coffee', 'Black Pepper']

name: eudora-h-energy
detail: Eudora H Energy brings the extra dose of freshness to your day.

name: replica-autumn-vibes-1
detail: This earthy fragrance is inspired by the delight of a colourful autumn day  the sound of golden leaves rustling under heavy footsteps and a breath of fresh air.

name: spring-fling-1
detail: Who knew! Out-of-towners think of Bond No. 9's beloved home town as all concrete  steel and glass  its streets jammed with skyscrapers and manoeuvering Ubers. But come spring  New York defies expectations; suddenly this teeming metropolis is ablaze with flowers throughout the city's parks  gardens  and even sidewalk cracks - not to mention the cut-flower bouquets in front of every bodega.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Passion Flower', 'Musk', 'Freesia', 'Honeysuckle', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Daffodil', 'Amber', 'Geranium', 'Teak Wood']

name: 78-vintage-green
detail: "Vintage Green captures the fantasy of adventure travel with fresh and sensual notes"  Gino Percontino  perfumer.

name: on-the-beach-1
detail: On the Beach tells of the delights of the West Coast and the desire for open spaces  a long  blissful stretch of beach and the gentle bustle of the ocean.

name: acqua-dellelba-arcipelago-donna
detail: The Tuscan Archipelago: a wonderful world of dream places that have lived through all the cultures of the Mediterranean. Places that are so different one from the other but yet have the sea and beauty in common. The notes of the Archipelago fragrance reflect the natural atmosphere and the poetry of these unique landscapes.

name: series-5-sherbet-cinnamon-1
detail: Cinnamon  in the Sherbet range  is a spicy fragrance created to savour the freshness. That makes you want to try it  to taste it!

name: grenade-pivoine
detail: Fragonard's Grenade Pivoine captivates with its charming notes  inviting you to escape!

name: dark-rum
detail: Our Dark Rum is synthesised for its natural  warm notes and overall well-being. Modern and dynamic  this formidable  long-lasting fragrance works on its own or combined with the subtle freshness of our Synthesised Lotus Root  creating a unique sensory balance tailored to an individual or a couple.

name: santal-austral
detail: Santal Austra is a sensual white wood.

name: coffee-woman-fusion-1
detail: Coffee Woman Fusion was created for the naturally intense and seductive woman.

name: fragile-violet
detail: This magnificent and delicate work of art clings to the skin with violet leaves and petals in perfect balance. Clean yet energetic.

name: brilliant-1
detail: In the sea of ​​fantasy  I am the most real. Unique  memorable  and extraordinary.

name: cafe-simien-1
detail: Café Simien is an ode to Ethiopian coffee.

name: luminous-violet
detail: When the unmistakable light of a sunset over the sea reaches the eyes of a woman  myriad emotions start swirling in the right hemisphere of her brain. It leads to a certain confusion between memory and desire  all with an intrinsic sense of solidity echoed by the perennial nostalgia of a gentle embrace.

name: yuzu-2
detail: Solinotes brings a touch of citrus and offers a unique interpretation of Yuzu in a fresh and invigorating composition.

name: french-lime-leaves-1
detail: French Lime Leaves is a very sensual and addictive scent which both you and those around you will fall in love with!

name: oud-black-vanilla-absolute-1
detail: Perry Ellis' Oud Black Vanilla Absolute is a sensual Oud  exotic in character and seductive in its appeal.

name: rose-cuir
detail: An emphatic reinterpretation of Rose  this scent described as a silent storm  reveals a unique and mysterious simplicity imagined by the perfumer.

name: bergamot-2
detail: Rooted in classic ingredients  Bergamot by Rag & Bone introduces a curious twist on an iconic scent. A fresh cologne contrasting vibrant bergamot with warm woods.

name: capim-limao
detail: Made with lemongrass extract cultivated in the Atlantic Forest  it transmits a refreshing essence inspired by the plant.

name: leau-de-liesse-1
detail: The first transparent and luminous notes give way to a dazzling floral heart. In the base  ambroxan  signature ingredient of Maison Courrèges  gives the fragrance a velvety and enveloping trail.

name: white-peaches
detail: Enjoy the essence of summer with the delicate cooling fragrance of White Peaches. A rich refreshing scent.

name: dark-purple
detail: A rich fresh and woody  it carries the brilliant colors of autumn  purple  orange and red by the ingredients used to create this enticing elixir.

name: nitro-intense-1
detail: Nitro Intense is an exhilarating and thrilling scent for men who live life in the fast lane!

name: muguet-2017-1
detail: Guerlain celebrates the arrival of Spring with a numbered  limited-edition fragrance  blending tradition and innovation that perpetuates the charm and delicacy of a bouquet sprinkled with wonderful green notes evoking the springtime dew.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: dirty-grapefruit-1
detail: We’ve been seduced by a tantalising citrus. Squeezed in dewy sweetness  pinched by a tart bite. A scent of soaked florals and potent nectar  bitter pith and irresistible charm. A dualistic fantasy in a bottle.

name: ascendant-1
detail: A phenomenon awaits you. Become a legend. Claim your destiny. For the man born to lead. Rise above the rest and discover the essence of a man. Ascendant The shape of perfection.

name: romantique-peachy-velvet
detail: A little bit sweet  a little bit sexy  this fragrance captures the essence of the modern romantic.

name: floral-oud-orange-flower
detail: Floral Oud Orange Flower opens with a burst of floral notes and a hint of citrus. An aromatic heart gradually comes to life and very soon we are in proper Oud territory  with gourmand notes accompanying the rare resin all the way through to the finish.

name: whisky-cedarwood
detail: Footsteps at dusk on waxed wooden floors. An enigmatic nightcap. A fine whisky  rimmed with spices and finished with warm woods. A fragrance for the early morning. Bold and intriguing.

name: crush-balls-2023
detail: "I love tennis. So do you. There’s nothing like getting on the court to crush balls. Tennis is a whole culture that moves globally. I could see how one could get lost in it. Letting the schedule of tennis rule their life. I admire the dedication. All for hitting the perfect ball over the net with a racquet " David Seth Moltz  Perfumer.

name: dynamic-move-amber
detail: The Dynamic Move Amber man is a doer! He takes matters into his own hands and looks to the future. Progress instead of standstill. He goes through life dynamically and is sure of himself. Energetic  mysterious  self-confident.

name: homme-noir
detail: Homme Noir is a perfect modern fragrance that will give you an unmistakable charisma and allow you to achieve your goals with ease.

name: rose-absolument
detail: Extremely rich in natural ingredients  Rose Absolument is a fantastic  sensuous scent to accompany our perfumes  giving them a more 'evening' character.

name: white-patchouli-2
detail: Tom Ford White Patchouli perfectly captures the myth of a generation. This modern fragrance with retro-classic influences is a sophisticated interpretation of bohemian chic.

name: matin-blanc-1
detail: Matin Blanc evokes the awakening of the day  the sweetness of the soft light  the warmth of the air  as you wake up and enjoy a few moments to yourself before starting the day.

name: majestic-rose-1
detail: Majestic Rose is a delicate and fresh fragrance accompanied by a touch of citrus notes and a soft floral heart. It is part of the Museum collection  which uses classic European and Asian raw materials and olfactory families  reminiscent of an old perfumer's library of fragrances.

name: parisian-musc
detail: A vegetal woody musk.

name: old-school-bench-1
detail: It reminds me of sitting at my desk at school and remembering the smell of pencil shavings and charcoal on paper  while concentrating on the large blackboard in front of me.

name: bergamot-neroli-1
detail: Inspired by the energy and warmth of the Mediterranean beaches  The Art of Shaving's Bergamot and Neroli Cologne contains a premium blended aroma of uplifting and refreshing citrus notes  rounded with the sweet floral and fragrant bitter orange tree blossom. A perfect finishing touch to your grooming routine.

name: les-fleurs-de-lanvin-sweet-jasmine
detail: Sweet Jasmine pays tribute to the delicacy of fragrant jasmine petals dripping in morning dew  carried through the air by a gentle breeze. This light dawn  warmed by the first rays of sunlight awakens the senses and invigorates the mind and body.

name: orchid-oud-1
detail: It is a fragrance as refined as the flower whose name it bears. Orchid Oud embodies the elegance and nobility of black orchid and oud  which create a seductive and passionate olfactory composition.

name: joyau-de-ma-vie-violet-gem
detail: Violet Gem is an intoxicating blend of sweet and exotic accords that create a symphony like no other.

name: pacific-lime-1
detail: The scarlet fuchsia sunset was her only hint to their destination. He had spent months organizing this event in the greatest secrecy. Surrounded by everyone they loved  they savored the moment with joy and excitement. When the doors opened  she recognized the beach of her childhood. Everyone was dazzled by the vibrant colors  the exotic perfumes  and the exhilarating tropical heat. The party could finally begin.

name: attraction-desire-for-her
detail: Attraction Desire for Her fans the flames of desire and allows you to go the extra mile to rekindle your most intimate cravings. Feel the power of true attraction from the very first moment with this indulgent and highly seductive fragrance.

name: vetiver-imperial-by-four
detail: A ravishing perfume capturing rare and exotic ingredients. Extravagantly uplifting with a bright buoyancy that elevates it high above the ordinary  Vetiver Imperiale brings richness and refinement through sumptuous spices and velvety undertones.

name: cuir-vegetal
detail: A sensual fragrance with a blend of warm and spicy notes.

name: mercedes-benz-sea
